original: tasmādanādyanantaṃ hi tāratamyaṃ cidātmanām /

original: ayogyamicchan puruṣaḥ patatyeva na saṃ śayaḥ /

original: tasmād yogyānusāreṇa sevyo viṣṇuḥ sadaiva hi / 1.96 /

original: dānatīrthatapoyajñapūrvāḥ sarve'pi sarvadā /

analyzed: aṅgāni hari sevāyām bhaktiḥ tu ekā vimuktaye

original: balaṃ hi kṣatriye vyaktaṃ j ñāyate sthūladṛṣṭibhiḥ / 2.19 /

mahā

analyzed: gāṇḍīvam dhanuṣām śreṣṭham tena drauṇeḥ varaḥ ūrjunaḥ

analyzed: ityādi ananta vākyāni santi eva arthe vivakṣite

analyzed: kānicid darśitāni atra diś mātra pratipattaye

analyzed: anaupacārikī siddhā brahma tā ca vinirṇayāt

analyzed: pūrṇaprajña kṛtā iyam saṅkṣepāt uddhṛtiḥ su vākyānām

original: śrīmadbhāratagānāṃ viṣṇoḥ pūrṇatvanirṇayāyaiva / 2.172 /
analyzed: śrīmat bhārata gānām viṣṇoḥ pūrṇa tva nirṇayāya eva

analyzed: sa prīyatām paratamaḥ paramāt anantaḥ santārakaḥ satatasam sṛti dustara arṇāt

original: yatpādapadmamakarandajuṣo hipārthāḥ svārājyamāpurubhayatra sadā vinodāt / 2.173 /
analyzed: yad pāda padma makaranda juṣaḥ hi pārthāḥ svārājyam āpuḥ ubhayatra sadā vinodāt  /

analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

vḸakyoddhāro nāma dvitīyo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: vḥakyoddhāraḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: xxxii.(sargānusarga-laya-prādurbhāvanirṇayaḥ )
atha tṛtīyo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha tṛtīyaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / jayatyajo'khaṇḍaguṇorumaṇḍalaḥ sadodito jñānamarīcimālī /
analyzed: om jayati ajaḥ khaṇḍa guṇa ūru maṇḍalaḥ sadā uditaḥ jñāna marīci mālī

original: svabhaktahārdoccatamonihantā vyāsāvatāro harirātmabhāskaraḥ / 3.1 /
jayatyajo'kṣīṇasukhātmabimbaḥ svaiśvaryakāntipratataḥ sadoditaḥ /
analyzed: jayati ajaḥ kṣīṇa sukha ātma bimbaḥ sva aiśvarya kānti pratataḥ sadā uditaḥ

original: svabhaktasantāpaduriṣṭahantā rāmāvatāro harirīśacandramāḥ / 3.2 /
jayatyasaṅkhyorubalāmbupūro guṇoccaratnākara ātmavaibhavaḥ /
analyzed: jayati asaṅkhya uru bala ambupūraḥ guṇa ucca ratna ākaraḥ ātma vaibhavaḥ

original: sadā sadātmajñanadībhirāpyaḥ kṛṣṇāvatāro harirekasāgaraḥ / 3.3 /
analyzed: sadā sat ātma jña nadībhiḥ āpyaḥ kṛṣṇa avatāraḥ hariḥ eka sāgaraḥ

original: “nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /
analyzed: nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīraye“61 / 3.4/
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam

original: jayo nāmetihāso'yaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyaneritaḥ /
analyzed: jayaḥ nāma itihāsaḥ ayam kṛṣṇadvaipāyana īritaḥ

original: vāyurnarottamo nāma devīti śrīrudīritā / 3.5 /
analyzed: vāyuḥ narottamaḥ nāma devī iti śrīḥ udīritā

original: nārāyaṇo vyāsa iti vācyavaktṛsvarūpakaḥ /

original: ekaḥ sa bhagavānuktaḥ sādhakeśo narottamaḥ / 3.6 /
analyzed: ekaḥ sa bhagavān uktaḥ sādhaka īśaḥ nara uttamaḥ

original: upasādhako naraścokto devī bhāgyātmikā nṛṇām /
analyzed: upasādhakaḥ naraḥ ca uktaḥ devī bhāgya ātmikā nṛṇām

original: sarasvatī vākyarūpā tasmānnamyā hi te'khilāḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatī vākya rūpā tasmāt namyāḥ hi tekhilāḥ

original: kṛṣṇau satyā bhīmapārthau kṛṣṇetyuktā hibhārate / 3.7 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇau satyāḥ bhīma pārthau kṛṣṇa iti uktāḥ hi bhārate

analyzed: sarvasya nirṇaya su vākya samuddhṛtī tu svādhyāyayoḥ hari pada smaraṇena kṛtvā

original: ānandatīrthavaranāmavatī tṛtīyā bhaumī tanurmaruta āha kathāḥ parasya / 3.8 /
analyzed: ānandatīrtha vara nāmavatī tṛtīyā bhaumī tanuḥ marutaḥ āha kathāḥ parasya

original: vyūḍhaścaturdhā bhagavān sa eko māyāṃ śriyaṃ sṛṣṭividhitsayā'ra /
analyzed: vyūḍhaḥ caturdhā bhagavān saḥ ekaḥ māyām śriyam sṛṣṭi vidhitsayā āra

original: rūpeṇa pūrveṇa savāsudevanāmnā viriñcaṃ suṣuve ca sā'taḥ / 3.9 /
analyzed: rūpeṇa pūrveṇa sa vāsudeva nāmnā viriñcam suṣuve ca sātaḥ

original: saṅkarṣaṇāccāpi jayātanūjo babhūva sākṣād balasaṃ vidātmā /
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇāt ca api jayā tanūjaḥ babhūva sākṣāt balasam vid ātmā

original: vāyurya evātha viriñcanāmā bhaviṣya ādyo na parastato hi / 3.10 /
analyzed: vāyuḥ yaḥ eva atha viriñca nāmā bhaviṣyaḥ ādyaḥ na paraḥ tatas hi

original: 61 Mahā. Ādi. 1.1 *
analyzed: mahā ādi

original: xxxiii.sūtraṃ sa vāyuḥ puruṣo viriñcaḥ pradyumnataścātha kṛtau striyau dve /
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ puruṣaḥ viriñcaḥ pradyumnataḥ ca atha kṛtau striyau dve

original: prajajñaturyamal . e tatra pūrvā pradhānasañjñā prakṛtirjanitrī / 3.11 /
analyzed: prajajñatuḥ yamal  e tatra pūrvā pradhāna sañjñā prakṛtiḥ janitrī  /

original: śraddhā dvitīyā'tha tayośca yogo babhūva puṃ saiva ca sūtranāmnā /
analyzed: śraddhā dvitīyā atha tayoḥ ca yogaḥ babhūva sā eva ca sūtra nāmnā

original: harerniyogādatha samprasūtau śeṣaḥ suparṇaṇsca tayoḥ sahaiva / 3.12 /
analyzed: hareḥ niyogāt atha samprasūtau śeṣaḥ tayoḥ saha eva

original: śeṣastayoreva hi jīvanāmā kālātmakaḥ so'tha suparṇa āsīt /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ tayoḥ eva hi jīva nāmā kāla ātmakaḥ saḥ utha suparṇaḥ āsīt

original: tau vāhanaṃ śayanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kālā jayādyāṇsca tata prasūtāḥ / 3.13 /
analyzed: tau vāhanam śayanam ca eva viṣṇoḥ kālāḥ tata prasūtāḥ

original: kālā jayādyā api viṣṇupārṣadā yasmādaṇḍāt parataḥ samprasūtāḥ /
analyzed: kālāḥ jaya ādyāḥ api viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ yasmāt aṇḍāt paratas samprasūtāḥ

original: nīcāḥ surebhyastata eva te'khilā viṣvakseno vāyujaḥ khena tulyaḥ / 3.14 /
analyzed: nīcāḥ surebhyaḥ tatas eva tekhilāḥ viṣvaksenaḥ vāyu jaḥ khena tulyaḥ  /

original: vyūhāt tṛtīyāt punareva viṣṇordevāṃ ścaturvarṇagatān samastān /
analyzed: vyūhāt tṛtīyāt punar eva viṣṇoḥ devān catur varṇa gatān samastān

original: saṅgṛhya bīj ātmatayā'niruddho nyadhatta śāntyāṃ triguṇātmikāyām / 3.15 /
analyzed: saṅgṛhya bīj ātma tayā aniruddhaḥ nyadhatta śāntyām triguṇa ātmikāyām

original: tato mahattattvatanurviriñcaḥ sthūlātmanaivājani vāk ca devī /
analyzed: tatas mahat tattva tanuḥ viriñcaḥ sthūla ātmanā evā ajani vāc ca devī

original: tasyāmahaṅkāratanuṃ sa rudraṃ sasarja buddhiṃ ca tadarddhadehām / 3.16 /
analyzed: tasyām ahaṅkāra tanum sa rudram sasarja buddhim ca tad arddha dehām

original: buddhyāmumāyāṃ sa śivastrirūpo manaśca vaikārikadevasaṅghān /
analyzed: buddhyām umāyām sa śivaḥ tri rūpaḥ manaḥ ca vaikārika deva saṅghān

original: daśendriyāṇyeva ca taijasāni krameṇa khādīn viṣayaiśca sārddham / 3.17 /
analyzed: daśa indriyāṇi eva ca taijasāni krameṇa kha ādīn viṣayaiḥ ca sārddham

original: puṃ saḥ prakṛtyāṃ ca punarviriñcācchivo'tha tasmādakhilāḥ sureśāḥ /
analyzed: saḥ prakṛtyām ca punar viriñcāt śivaḥ utha tasmāt akhilāḥ sura īśāḥ

original: j ātāḥ saśakrāḥ punareva sūtrācchraddhā sutānāpa surapravīrān /
analyzed: ātāḥ sa śakrāḥ punar eva sūtrāt śraddhā sutān āpa sura pravīrān

original: śeṣaṃ śivaṃ cendramathendrataśca sarve surā yajñagaṇāṇsca jātāḥ / 3.18 /
analyzed: śeṣam śivam ca indram atha indrataḥ ca sarve surāḥ yajña gaṇān ca jātāḥ  /

original: punaśca māyā trividhā babhūva sattvādirūpairatha vāsudevāt /
analyzed: punar ca māyā trividhā babhūva sattva ādi rūpaiḥ atha vāsudevāt

original: sattvātmikāyāṃ sa babhūva tasmāt sa viṣṇunāmaiva nirantaro'pi /
analyzed: sattva ātmikāyām sa babhūva tasmāt sa viṣṇu nāmā eva

original: rajastanau caiva viriñca āsīt tamastanau śarva iti trayo'smāt / 3.19 /
analyzed: rajaḥ stanau ca eva viriñcaḥ āsīt tamaḥ stanau śarvaḥ iti trayosmāt

original: ete hi devāḥ punaraṇḍasṛṣṭāvaśaknuvanto harimetya tuṣṭuvuḥ /
analyzed: ete hi devāḥ punar aṇḍa sṛṣṭau aśaknuvantaḥ harim etya tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: tvaṃ no jagaccitravicitrasarganissīmaśaktiḥ kuru sanniketam / 3.20 /
analyzed: tvam naḥ jagat citra vicitra sarga nissīma śaktiḥ kuru sanniketam

analyzed: iti stutaḥ taiḥ puruṣottamaḥ asau sa viṣṇu nāmā sṛṣṭaye

original: suṣāva saivāṇḍamadhokṣajasya śuṣmaṃ hiraṇyātmakamambumadhye / 3.21 /
analyzed: suṣāva sā eva aṇḍam adhokṣajasya śuṣmam hiraṇya ātmakam ambu madhye

analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭāḥ hariṇā eva sārddham sarve surāḥ tasya babhūva nābheḥ

original: lokātmakaṃ padmamamuṣya madhye punarviriñco'jani sadguṇātmā / 3.22 /
analyzed: loka ātmakam padmam amuṣya madhye punar viriñca ujani sat guṇa ātmā

original: tasmāt punaḥ sarvasurāḥ prasūtāste jānamānā api nirṇayāya /
analyzed: tasmāt punar sarva surāḥ prasūtāḥ te jānamānāḥ api nirṇayāya

original: nissṛtya kāyāduta padmayoneḥ samprāviśan kramaśo mārutāntāḥ / 3.23 /
analyzed: nissṛtya kāyāt uta padmayoneḥ samprāviśan kramaśas māruta antāḥ

original: papāta vāyorgamanāccharīraṃ tasyaiva cā'veśata utthitaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: papāta vāyoḥ gamanāt śarīram tasya eva ca āveśataḥ utthitam punar

original: tasmāt sa eko vibudhapradhāna ityāṇsritā devagaṇāstameva /
analyzed: tasmāt saḥ ekaḥ vibudha pradhānaḥ iti āṇsritāḥ deva gaṇāḥ tam eva

original: harerviriñcasya ca madhyasaṃ sthitestadanyadevādhipatiḥ sa mārutaḥ / 3.24 /
analyzed: hareḥ viriñcasya ca madhya sam sthiteḥ tad anya deva adhipatiḥ sa mārutaḥ  /

original: tato viriñco bhuvanāni sapta sasaptakānyāṇsu cakāra so'bjāt /
analyzed: tatas viriñcaḥ bhuvanāni sapta sasaptakāni āṇsu cakāra sa ubjāt

original: tasmācca devā ṛṣayaḥ punaśca vaikārikādyāḥ saśivā babhūvuḥ / 3.25 /
analyzed: tasmāt ca devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ punar ca vaikārika ādyāḥ sa śivāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: agre śivo'hambhava eva buddherumā manojau saha śakrakāmau /
analyzed: agre śivā ūhambhavaḥ eva buddheḥ umā manaḥ jau saha śakra kāmau

original: gururmanurdakṣa utāniruddhaḥ sahaiva paścānmanasaḥ prasūtāḥ / 3.26 /
analyzed: guruḥ manuḥ dakṣaḥ uta aniruddhaḥ saha eva paścāt manasaḥ prasūtāḥ

original: cakṣuḥ śrutibhyāṃ sparśāt sahaiva raviḥ śaśī dharma ime prasūtāḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrutibhyām sparśāt saha eva raviḥ śaśī dharme ime prasūtāḥ

original: jihvābhavo vāripatirnasośca nāsatyadasrau kramaśaḥ prasūtāḥ / 3.27 /
analyzed: jihvā bhavaḥ vāripatiḥ nasoḥ ca nāsatya dasrau kramaśas prasūtāḥ

original: tataḥ sanādyāṇsca marīcimukhyā devāṇsca sarve kramaśaḥ prasūtāḥ /
analyzed: tatas sanādyān ca marīci mukhyāḥ devān ca sarve kramaśas prasūtāḥ

original: tato'surādyā ṛṣayo manuṣyā jagad vicitraṃ ca viriñcato'bhūt / 3.28 /
analyzed: tatas usuḥ ādyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ jagat vicitram ca viriñcataḥ bhūt

original: uktakramāt pūrvabhavastu yo yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa sa hyāsurakānṛte ca /
analyzed: ukta kramāt pūrva bhavaḥ tu yaḥ yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa sa hi āsuraka anṛte ca

original: pūrvastu paścāt punareva jāto nāṇsreṣṭhatāmeti kathañcidasya /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ tu paścāt punar eva jātaḥ na aṇ sreṣṭha tām eti kathañcid asya

original: guṇāstu kālāt pitṛmātṛdoṣāt svakarmato vā'bhibhavaṃ prayānti / 3.29 /
analyzed: guṇāḥ tu kālāt pitṛ mātṛ doṣāt sva karmataḥ vā abhibhavam prayānti

original: layo bhaved vyutkramato hi teṣāṃ tato hariḥ pral . aye śrīsahāyaḥ /
analyzed: layaḥ bhavet vyutkramataḥ hi teṣām tatas hariḥ

original: śetenijānandamamandasāndrasandohameko'nubhavannanantaḥ / 3.30 /
analyzed: śete nija ānandam amanda sāndra sandoham ekaḥ anubhavan anantaḥ

original: anantaśīrṣāsyakarorupādaḥ so'nantamūrtiḥ svaguṇānanantān /
analyzed: ananta śīrṣa āsya kara ūru pādaḥ saḥ unanta mūrtiḥ sva guṇān anantān

original: anantaśaktiḥ paripūrṇabhogo bhuñjannajasraṃ nijarūpa āste / 3.31 /
analyzed: ananta śaktiḥ paripūrṇa bhogaḥ bhuñjan ajasram nija rūpaḥ āste

original: evaṃ punaḥ sṛjate sarvametadanādyananto hi jagatpravāhaḥ /
analyzed: evam punar sṛjate sarvam etat anādi anantaḥ hi jagat pravāhaḥ

original: nityāṇsca jīvāḥ prakṛtiśca nityā kālaśca nityaḥ kimu devadevaḥ / 3.32 /
analyzed: nityāḥ ca jīvāḥ prakṛtiḥ ca nityā kālaḥ ca nityaḥ kimu devadevaḥ

original: xxxv.yathā samudrāt saritaḥ prajātāḥ punastameva praviśanti śaśvat /
analyzed: samudrāt saritaḥ prajātāḥ punar tam eva praviśanti śaśvat

original: evaṃ harernityajagatpravāhastameva cāsau praviśatyajasram / 3.33 /
analyzed: evam hareḥ nitya jagat pravāhaḥ tam eva ca asau praviśati ajasram

original: evaṃ vidurye paramāmanantāmajasya śaktiṃ puruṣottamasya /
analyzed: evam viduḥ ye paramām anantām ajasya śaktim puruṣottamasya

original: tasya prasādādatha dagdhadoṣāstamāpnuvantyāṇsu paraṃ sureśam / 3.34 /
analyzed: tasya prasādāt atha dagdha doṣāḥ tam āpnuvanti āṇsu param sureśam

original: devānimān muktasamastadoṣān svasannidhāne viniveśya devaḥ /
analyzed: devān imān mukta samasta doṣān sva sannidhāne viniveśya devaḥ

original: punastadanyānadhikārayogyāṃ stattadgaṇāneva pade niyuṅkte / 3.35 /
analyzed: punar tad anyān adhikāra yogyān stad tad gaṇān eva pade niyuṅkte

original: punaśca mārīcata eva devā jātā ādityāmasurāṇsca dityām /
analyzed: punar ca mārīcataḥ eva devāḥ jātāḥ ādityām asurān ca dityām

original: gāvo mṛgāḥ pakṣyuragādisattvā dākṣāyaṇīṣveva samastaśo'pi / 3.36 /
analyzed: gāvaḥ mṛgāḥ pakṣi uraga ādi sattvāḥ dākṣāyaṇīṣu eva

original: tataḥ sa magnāmalayo layodadhau mahīṃ vilokyā'śu harirvarāhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa magnām alayaḥ laya udadhau mahīm vilokya āśu hariḥ varāhaḥ

original: bhūtvā viriñcārtha imāṃ saśailāmuddhṛtya vārāmupari nyadhāt sthiram / 3.37 /
analyzed: bhūtvā viriñca arthe imām sa śailām uddhṛtya vārām upari nyadhāt sthiram

original: athābjanābhapratihārapālau śāpāt triśo bhūmital . e'bhijātau /
analyzed: atha abjanābha pratihāra pālau śāpāt triśas

original: dityāṃ hiraṇyāvatha rākṣasau ca paitṛṣvaseyau ca hareḥ parastāt / 3.38 /
analyzed: dityām hiraṇyau atha rākṣasau ca paitṛṣvaseyau ca hareḥ parastāt

original: hato hiraṇyākṣa udāravikramo diteḥ suto yo'varajaḥ surārthe /
analyzed: hataḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ udāra vikramaḥ diteḥ sutaḥ yovarajaḥ sura arthe

original: dhātrā'rthitenaiva varāharūpiṇā dharoddhṛtau pūrvahato'bjajodbhavaḥ / 3.39 /
analyzed: dhātrā arthitena eva varāha rūpiṇā dharā uddhṛtau pūrva hata ubjaja udbhavaḥ

original: atho vidhāturmukhato viniḥ sṛt ān vedān hayāsyo jagṛhe'surendraḥ /
analyzed: atho vidhātuḥ mukhataḥ viniḥ sṛt ān vedān haya āsyaḥ jagṛhe sura indraḥ

original: nihatya taṃ matsyavapurjugopa manuṃ munīṃ stāṃ śca dadau vidhātuḥ / 3.40 /
analyzed: nihatya tam matsya vapuḥ jugopa manum munīm stām śca dadau vidhātuḥ

original: manvantarapral . aye matsyarūpo vidyāmadānmanave devadevaḥ /
analyzed: manvantara pral matsya rūpaḥ vidyām adāt manave devadevaḥ

original: vaivasvatāyottamasaṃ vidātmā viṣṇoḥ svarūpapratipattirūpām / 3.41 /
analyzed: vaivasvatāya uttamasam vid ātmā viṣṇoḥ sva rūpa pratipatti rūpām

original: atho diterjyeṣṭhasutena śaśvat prapīḍit ā brahmavarāt sureśāḥ /
analyzed: atho diteḥ jyeṣṭha sutena śaśvat prapīḍit ā brahma varāt sura īśāḥ

original: hariṃ viriñcena sahopajagmurdaurātmyamasyāpi śaśaṃ surasmai / 3.42 /

original: abhiṣṭutastairharirugravīryo nṛsiṃ harūpeṇa saāvirāsīt /

varādajeyatvamavāpa daityarāṭcaturmukhasyaiva baliryadā tadā /

original: ajāyatendrāvarajo'diteḥ suto mahānajo'pyabjabhavādisaṃ stutaḥ / 3.45 /
analyzed: ajāyata indrāvaraja uditeḥ sutaḥ mahān ajaḥ upi abja bhava ādi sam stutaḥ

original: sa vāmanātmā'surabhūbhṛto'dhvaraṃ jagāma “gāṃ sannamayan pade pade“62 /
analyzed: sa vāmana ātmā asura bhūbhṛtā udhvaram jagāma gām sannamayan pade

original: jahāra cāsmācchalatastriviṣṭapaṃ tribhiḥ kramaistacca dadau nijāgraje / 3.46 /

original: pitāmahenāsya purā hiyācito baleḥ kṛte keśava āha yad vacaḥ /
analyzed: pitāmahena asya purā hi yācitaḥ baleḥ kṛte keśavaḥ āha yat vacaḥ

analyzed: na ayācaya aham pratihanmi tam balim śubha ānana iti eva tatas abhyayācata

analyzed: babhūvire candralalāmataḥ varāt purā hi ajeyāḥ asurāḥ

analyzed: taiḥ arditāḥ vāsava nāyakāḥ surāḥ puras nidhāya abjajam astuvan harim

analyzed: viriñca sṛṣṭaiḥ nitarām avadhyau varāt vidhātuḥ ditijau hiraṇyakau

original: tathā hayagrīva udāravikramastvayā hatā brahmapurātanena / 3.49 /
analyzed: tathā hayagrīvaḥ udāra vikramaḥ tvayā hatā brahma purātanena

original: sa cāsurān rudravarādavadhyānimān samastairapi devadeva /

original: niḥ sīmaśaktyaiva nihatya sarvān hṛdambuje no nivasātha śaśvat / 3.50 /
analyzed: niḥ sīma śaktyā eva nihatya sarvān hṛd ambuje naḥ nivasātha śaśvat

original: ityādaroktastridaśairajeyaḥ sa śārṅgadhanvā'tha bhṛgūdvaho'bhūt /

original: rāmo nihatyāsurapūgamugraṃ nadānanādirvidadhe'sṛjaiva / 3.51 /
analyzed: rāmaḥ nihatya asura pūgam ugram nada ānana ādiḥ vidadhe sṛjā eva

original: tataḥ pulastyasya kule prasūtau tāvādidaityau jagadekaśatrū /
analyzed: tatas pulastyasya kule prasūtau tau ādidaityau jagat eka śatrū

original: parairavadhyau varataḥ purā hareḥ surairajeyau ca varād vidhātuḥ / 3.52 /
analyzed: paraiḥ avadhyau varatas purā hareḥ suraiḥ ajeyau ca varāt vidhātuḥ  /

original: sarvairajeyaḥ sa ca kumbhakarṇaḥ purātane janmani dhātureva /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ ajeyaḥ sa ca kumbhakarṇaḥ purātane janmani dhātuḥ eva

original: varānnarādīnṛta eva rāvaṇastadātanāt tau tridaśānabādhatām / 3.53 /
analyzed: varān nara ādīn ṛte eva rāvaṇaḥ tadā atanāt tau tridaśān abādhatām

original: tadā'bjajaṃ śūlinameva cāgrato nidhāya devāḥ puruhūtapūrvakāḥ /

original: payombudhau bhogipabhogaśāyinaṃ sametya yogyāṃ stutimabhyayojayan / 3.54 /

original: tvameka īśaḥ paramaḥ svatantrastvamādiranto jagato niyoktā /
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ īśaḥ paramaḥ svatantraḥ tvam ādiḥ antaḥ jagataḥ niyoktā
bhā pu

original: xxxvii.tvadājñayaivākhilamambujodbhavā vitenire'gryāṇscaramāṇsca ye'nye / 3.55 /
analyzed: tvad ājñayā eva akhilam ambuja udbhavāḥ vitenire agryān caramān ca

original: manuṣyamānāt triśataṃ saṣaṣṭikaṃ divaukasāmekamuśanti vatsaram /
analyzed: manuṣya mānāt tri śatam sa ṣaṣṭikam divaukasām ekam uśanti vatsaram

original: dviṣaṭsahasrairapi taiścaturyugaṃ tretādibhiḥ pādaśa eva hīnaiḥ / 3.56 /
analyzed: dvi ṣaṣ sahasraiḥ api taiḥ caturyugam tretā ādibhiḥ pādaśas eva hīnaiḥ  /

original: sahastravṛttaṃ tadahaḥ svayambhuvo niśā ca tanmānamitaṃ śaracchatam /
analyzed: sahastra vṛttam tat ahar svayambhuvaḥ niśā ca tad māna mitam śarad śatam

original: tvadājñayā svānanubhūya bhogānupaiti so'pi tvaritastvadantikam / 3.57 /
analyzed: tvad ājñayā svān anubhūya bhogān upaiti saḥ upi tvaritaḥ tvad antikam

original: tvayā purā karṇapuṭād vinirmitau mahāsurau tau madhukaiṭabhākhyau /
analyzed: tvayā purā karṇa puṭāt vinirmitau mahā asurau tau madhu kaiṭabha ākhyau

original: tvadājñayā brahmavarādavadhyau cikrīḍiṣāsambhavayā mukhodgatān /
analyzed: tvad ājñayā brahma varāt avadhyau cikrīḍiṣā sambhavayā mukha udgatān

original: svayambhuvo vedagaṇānahārṣatāṃ tadā'bhavastvaṃ hayaśīrṣa īśvaraḥ / 3.59 /
analyzed: svayambhuvaḥ veda gaṇān ahārṣatām tadā abhavaḥ tvam hayaśīrṣaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: āhṛtya vedānakhilān pradāya svayambhuve tau ca jaghantha dasyū /
analyzed: āhṛtya vedān akhilān pradāya svayambhuve tau ca jaghantha dasyū

original: niṣpīḍya tāvūrutal . e karābhyāṃ tanmedasaivā'śu cakartha medinīm / 3.60 /
analyzed: niṣpīḍya tau ūru tal karābhyām tad medasā eva āśu cakartha medinīm

original: evaṃ surāṇāṃ ca nisargajaṃ balaṃ tathā'surāṇāṃ varadānasambhavam /
analyzed: evam surāṇām ca nisarga jam balam tathā asurāṇām vara dāna sambhavam

original: vaśe tavaitad dvayamapyato vayaṃ nivedayāmaḥ pitureva te'khilam / 3.61 /
analyzed: vaśe tava etat dvayam api atas vayam nivedayāmaḥ pituḥ eva tekhilam

original: imau ca rakṣo'dhipatī varoddhatau jahi svavīryeṇa nṛṣu prabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: imau ca rakṣaḥ adhipatī vara uddhatau jahi sva vīryeṇa nṛṣu prabhūtaḥ

original: itīrite tairakhilaiḥ sureśvarairbabhūva rāmo jagatīpatiḥ prabhuḥ / 3.62 /
analyzed: iti īrite taiḥ akhilaiḥ sura īśvaraiḥ babhūva rāmaḥ jagatīpatiḥ prabhuḥ

original: sa kaśyapasyāditigarbhajanmano vivasvatastantubhavasya bhūbhṛtaḥ /

original: gṛhe daśasyandananāmino'bhūt kausalyakānāmni tadarthineṣṭaḥ / 3.63 /
analyzed: gṛhe kausalyakā nāmni tad arthinā iṣṭaḥ  /

original: tadājñayā devagaṇā babhūvire puraiva paścādapi tasya bhūmnaḥ /
analyzed: tad ājñayā deva gaṇāḥ babhūvire purā eva paścāt api tasya bhūmnaḥ

original: niṣevaṇāyoruguṇasya vānareṣvatho nareṣveva ca paścimodbhavāḥ / 3.64 /
analyzed: niṣevaṇāya uru guṇasya vānareṣu atho nareṣu eva ca paścima udbhavāḥ

original: sa devatānāṃ prathamo guṇādhiko babhūva nāmnā hanumān prabhañjanaḥ /
analyzed: sa devatānām prathamaḥ guṇa adhikaḥ babhūva nāmnā hanumān prabhañjanaḥ

original: svasambhavaḥ kesariṇo gṛhe prabhurbabhūva vālī svata eva vāsavaḥ / 3.65 /
analyzed: sva sambhavaḥ kesariṇaḥ gṛhe prabhuḥ babhūva vālī svatas eva vāsavaḥ

original: sugrīva āsīt parameṣṭhitejasā yuto raviḥ svātmata eva jāmbavān /
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ āsīt parameṣṭhi tejasā yutaḥ raviḥ svātmataḥ eva jāmbavān

original: ya eva pūrvaṃ parameṣṭhivakṣasastvagudbhavo dharma ihā'syato'bhavat / 3.66 /
analyzed: yaḥ eva pūrvam parameṣṭhi vakṣasaḥ tvac udbhavaḥ dharmaḥ iha asyataḥ bhavat

original: xxxviii.ya eva sūryāt punareva sañjñayā nāmnā yamo dakṣiṇadikpa āsīt /

original: sa jāmbavān daivatakāryadarśinā puraiva sṛṣṭo mukhataḥ svayambhuvā / 3.67 /

original: brahmodbhavaḥ soma utāsya sūnoratrerabhūt so'ṅgada eva jātaḥ /
analyzed: brahma udbhavaḥ somaḥ uta asya sūnoḥ atreḥ abhūt sa uṅgadaḥ eva jātaḥ

original: bṛhaspatistāra uto śacī caśakrasya bhāryaiva babhūva tārā / 3.68 /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tāraḥ uta u śacī ca śakrasya bhāryā eva babhūva tārā

original: bṛhaspatirbrahmasuto'pi pūrvaṃ sahaiva śacyā manaso'bhijātaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ brahma sutaḥ api pūrvam saha eva śacyā manasā abhijātaḥ

original: brahmodbhavasyāṅgirasaḥ suto'bhūnmārīcajasyaiva śacī pulomnaḥ / 3.69 /
analyzed: brahma udbhavasya aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ bhūt mārīca jasya eva śacī pulomnaḥ

original: sa eva śacyā saha vānaro'bhūt svasambhavo devagururbṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva śacyā saha vānaraḥ bhūt sva sambhavaḥ devaguruḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: abhūt suṣeṇo varuṇo'śvinau ca babhūvatustau vividaśca maindaḥ / 3.70 /
analyzed: abhūt suṣeṇaḥ varuṇa uśvinau ca babhūvatuḥ tau vividaḥ ca maindaḥ

original: brahmodbhavau tau punareva sūryād babhūvatustatra kanīyasastu /
analyzed: brahma udbhavau tau punar eva sūryāt babhūvatuḥ tatra kanīyasaḥ tu

original: āveśa aindro varadānato'bhūt tato balīyān vivido hi maindāt / 3.71 /
analyzed: āveśaḥ aindraḥ vara dānataḥ bhūt tatas balīyān vividaḥ hi maindāt

original: nīlo'gnirāsīt kamalodbhavotthaḥ kāmaḥ punaḥ śrīramaṇād ramāyām /
analyzed: nīlogniḥ āsīt kamala udbhava utthaḥ kāmaḥ punar śrī ramaṇāt ramāyām

original: pradyumnanāmā'bhavadevamīśāt sa skandatāmāpa sa cakratāṃ ca / 3.72 /
analyzed: pradyumna nāmā abhavat evam īśāt sa skanda tām āpa sa cakra tām ca

analyzed: pūrvam hareḥ cakram abhūt hi durgā tamaḥ sthitā ṇsrīḥ iti yām vadanti

original: sattvātmikā ṇsaṅkhamatho rajasthā bhūrnāmikā padmamabhūddharerhi / 3.73 /
analyzed: sattva ātmikā raja sthā bhūḥ nāmikā padmam abhūt hareḥ hi

analyzed: gadā tuvāyuḥ balasam vid ātmā vidyā iti ramā eva khaḍgaḥ

original: durgātmikā saiva ca carmanāmnī pañcātmako māruta eva bāṇāḥ / 3.74 /
analyzed: durgā ātmikā sā eva ca carma nāmnī pañca ātmakaḥ mārutaḥ eva bāṇāḥ

original: evaṃ sthiteṣveva purātaneṣu varād rathāṅgatvamavāpa kāmaḥ /
analyzed: evam sthiteṣu eva purātaneṣu varāt rathāṅga tvam avāpa kāmaḥ

original: tatsūnutāmāpa ca so'niruddho brahmodbhavaḥ śaṅkhatanuḥ pumātmā / 3.75 /
analyzed: tad sūnu tām āpa ca saḥ niruddhaḥ brahma udbhavaḥ śaṅkha tanuḥ pumātmā

original: t āveva jātau bharataśca nāmnā ṇsatrughna ityeva ca rāmato'nu /
analyzed: t au eva jātau bharataḥ ca nāmnā ca rāmataḥ nu

analyzed: pūrvam sumitrā tanayaḥ ca śeṣaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma raghūttamāt anu

original: kausalyakāputra urukramo'sāvekastathaiko bharatasya mātuḥ /
analyzed: kausalyakā putraḥ urukramā usau ekaḥ tathā ekaḥ bharatasya mātuḥ

original: ubhau sumitrātanayau nṛpasya catvāra ete hyamarottamā sutāḥ / 3.77 /
analyzed: ubhau sumitrā tanayau nṛpasya catvāraḥ ete hi amara uttamā sutāḥ

original: saṅkarṣaṇādyaistribhireva rūpairāviṣṭa āsīt triṣu teṣu viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇa ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ eva rūpaiḥ āviṣṭaḥ āsīt triṣu teṣu viṣṇuḥ

original: indro'ṅgade caiva tato'ṅgado hi balī nitāntaṃ sa babhūva śaśvat / 3.78 /
analyzed: indroṅgade ca eva tatas uṅgadaḥ hi balī nitāntam sa babhūva śaśvat
