analyzed: ca bhūpāḥ kṛtavīrya ja ādyāḥ bala adhikāḥ santi

original: sarve hareḥ sannidhibhāvayuktā dharmapradhānāṇsca guṇapradhānāḥ / 3.79 /
analyzed: sarve hareḥ sannidhi bhāva yuktāḥ dharma pradhānāḥ ca guṇa pradhānāḥ

original: svayaṃ ramā sīrata eva jātā sīteti rāmārthamanūpamā yā /
analyzed: svayam ramā sīrataḥ eva jātā sītā iti rāma artham anūpamā yā

original: videharājasya hi yajñabhūmau suteti tasyaiva tatastu sā'bhūt / 3.80 /
analyzed: videha rājasya hi yajña bhūmau sutā iti tasya eva tatas tu sā abhūt

original: ityādikalpotthita eṣa sargo mayā samastāgamanirṇayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: iti ādi kalpa utthitaḥ eṣa sargaḥ mayā samasta āgama nirṇaya ātmakaḥ

original: sahānusargaḥ kathito'tra pūrvo yo yo guṇairnityamasau varo hi / 3.81 /
analyzed: sahānusargaḥ kathitaḥ atra pūrvaḥ yaḥ yaḥ guṇaiḥ nityam asau varaḥ hi

original: pāṇscāttyakalpeṣvapi sargabhedāḥ śrutau purāṇeṣvapi cānyathoktāḥ /
analyzed: pāṇscāttya kalpeṣu api sarga bhedāḥ śrutau purāṇeṣu api ca anyathā uktāḥ

original: notkarṣahetuḥ prathamatvameṣu viśeṣavākyairavagamyametat / 3.82 /
analyzed: na utkarṣa hetuḥ prathama tvam eṣu viśeṣa vākyaiḥ avagamyam etat

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
sargānusargalayaprādurbhāvanirṇayo nāma tṛtīyo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: sargānusargalayaprādurbhāvanirṇayaḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: xl.(rāmāvatāre ayodhyāpraveśaḥ )
analyzed: xlrāma avatāre ayodhyā praveśaḥ

original: atha caturtho'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha caturthaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / athābhyavardhaṃ ścaturāḥ kumārā nṛpasya gehe puruṣottamādyāḥ /
analyzed: om kumārāḥ nṛpasya gehe puruṣottama ādyāḥ

original: nityapravṛddhasya ca tasya vṛddhirapekṣya lokasya hi mandadṛṣṭim / 4.1 /
analyzed: nitya pravṛddhasya ca tasya vṛddhiḥ apekṣya lokasya hi manda dṛṣṭim

original: nirīkṣya nityaṃ caturaḥ kumārān pitā mudaṃ santatamāpa coccam /
analyzed: nirīkṣya nityam caturaḥ kumārān pitā mudam santatam āpa ca uccam

original: viśeṣato rāmamukhendubimbamavekṣya rājā kṛtakṛtya āsīt / 4.2 /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ rāma mukha indu bimbam avekṣya rājā kṛtakṛtyaḥ āsīt

original: tanmātaraḥ paurajanā amātyā antaḥ purā vaiṣayikāṇsca sarve /
analyzed: tad mātaraḥ paura janāḥ amātyāḥ antar purā vaiṣayikān ca sarve

original: avekṣamāṇāḥ paramaṃ pumāṃ saṃ svānandatṛptā iva sambabhūvuḥ / 4.3 /
analyzed: avekṣamāṇāḥ paramam pumām sam sva ānanda tṛptāḥ iva sambabhūvuḥ

original: tataḥ suvaṃ śe śaśinaḥ prasūto gādhīti śakrastanujo'sya cā'sīt /
analyzed: tatas śe śaśinaḥ prasūtaḥ gādhī iti śakraḥ tanujaḥ sya ca āsīt

original: vareṇa vipratvamavāpa yo'sau viśvasya mitraṃ sa ihā'jagāma / 4.4 /
analyzed: vareṇa vipra tvam avāpa yaḥ asau viśvasya mitram saḥ iha ājagāma  /

original: tenārthito yajñarirakṣayaiva kṛcchreṇa pitrā'sya bhayād visṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tena arthitaḥ yajña rirakṣayā eva kṛcchreṇa pitrā asya bhayāt visṛṣṭaḥ

original: jagāma rāmaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena siddhāṇsramaṃ siddhajanābhivandyaḥ / 4.5 /
analyzed: jagāma rāmaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena siddhāṇsramam siddha jana abhivandyaḥ  /

original: anugrahārthaṃ sa ṛṣeravāpa salakṣmaṇo'straṃ munito hi kevalam /
analyzed: anugraha artham saḥ ṛṣeḥ avāpa sa lakṣmaṇa ustram munitaḥ hi kevalam

original: vavandire brahmamukhāḥ sureśāstamastrarūpāḥ prakaṭāḥ sametya / 4.6 /
analyzed: vavandire brahma mukhāḥ sureśāḥ tam astra rūpāḥ prakaṭāḥ sametya

original: atho jaghānā'śu śareṇa tāṭakāṃ varād vidhātustadananyavadhyām /
analyzed: atho jaghāna āśu śareṇa tāṭakām varāt vidhātuḥ tad ananya vadhyām

original: rarakṣa yajñaṃ ca munernihatya subāhumīśānagirā vimṛtyum / 4.7 /
analyzed: rarakṣa yajñam ca muneḥ nihatya subāhum īśāna girā vimṛtyum

original: śareṇa mārīcamathārṇave'kṣipad vaco viriñcasya tu mānayānaḥ /
analyzed: śareṇa mārīcam atha arṇave kṣipat vacaḥ viriñcasya tu mānayānaḥ

original: avadhyatā tena hi tasya dattā jaghāna cānyān rajanīcarānatha / 4.8 /
analyzed: avadhya tā tena hi tasya dattā jaghāna ca anyān rajanīcarān atha

original: tadā videhena sutāsvayaṃ varo vighoṣito dikṣu vidikṣu sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tadā videhena sutāsu ayam varaḥ vighoṣitaḥ dikṣu vidikṣu sarvaśas

original: nidhārya tad gādhisutānuyāyī yayau videhānanujānuyātaḥ / 4.9 /
analyzed: nidhārya tat gādhi suta anuyāyī yayau videha ananuja anuyātaḥ

original: atho ahalyāṃ patinā'bhiśaptāṃ pradharṣaṇādindrakṛt ācchilīkṛt ām /
analyzed: atho ahalyām patinā abhiśaptām pradharṣaṇāt indra kṛt āt śilī kṛt ām

original: svadarśanānmānuṣatāmupetāṃ suyojayāmāsa sa gautamena / 4.10 /
analyzed: sva darśanāt mānuṣa tām upetām suyojayāmāsa sa gautamena

original: balaṃ svabhakteradhikaṃ prakāṇsayannanugrahaṃ ca tridaśeṣvatulyam /
analyzed: balam sva bhakteḥ adhikam prakāṇsayan anugraham ca tridaśeṣu atulyam

original: ananyabhaktāṃ ca sureśakāṅkṣayā vidhāya nārīṃ prayayau tayā'rcitaḥ / 4.11 /
analyzed: an anya bhaktām ca sureśa kāṅkṣayā vidhāya nārīm prayayau tayā arcitaḥ

original: xli.śyāmāvadāte jagadekasāre svanantacandrādhikakāntikānte /
analyzed: xliśyāma avadāte jagat eka sāre su ananta candra adhika kānti kānte

original: sahānuje kārmukabāṇapāṇau purīṃ praviṣṭe tutuṣurvidehajāḥ / 4.12 /
analyzed: sahānuje kārmuka bāṇa pāṇau purīm praviṣṭe tutuṣuḥ videha jāḥ

original: papurnitāntaṃ sarasākṣibhṛṅgairvarānanābjaṃ puruṣottamasya /
analyzed: papuḥ nitāntam sarasa akṣi bhṛṅgaiḥ varānanā abjam puruṣottamasya

original: videhanārīnaravaryasa' nghā yathā mahāpūruṣikāstadaṅghrim / 4.13 /
analyzed: videha nārī nara varya sa nghāḥ yathā mahā pūruṣikāḥ tad aṅghrim

original: tathā videhaḥ pratilabhya rāmaṃ sahasranetrāvarajaṃ gaviṣṭham /
analyzed: tathā videhaḥ pratilabhya rāmam sahasranetra avarajam gaviṣṭham

original: samarcayāmāsa sahānujaṃ tamṛṣiṃ ca sākṣājjvalanaprakāṇsam / 4.14 /
analyzed: samarcayāmāsa sahānujam tam ṛṣim ca sākṣāt jvalanaprakāṇsam

original: mene ca jāmātaramātmakanyāguṇocitaṃ rūpanavāvatāram /
analyzed: mene ca jāmātaram ātma kanyā guṇa ucitam rūpa nava avatāram

original: uvāca cāsmai ṛṣirugratejāḥ kuruṣva jāmātaramenamāṇsviti / 4.15 /
analyzed: uvāca ca asmai ṛṣiḥ ugra tejāḥ kuruṣva jāmātaram enam āṇsu iti

original: sa āha cainaṃ paramaṃ vacaste karomi nātrāsti vicāraṇā me/
analyzed: saḥ āha ca enam paramam vacaḥ te karomi na atra asti vicāraṇā me

original: śṛṇuṣva me'thāpi yathā pratijñā sutāpradānāya kṛt ā purastāt / 4.16 /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva methā api yathā pratijñā sutā pradānāya kṛt ā purastāt

original: tapo mayā cīrṇamumāpateḥ purā varāyudhāvāptidhṛtena cetasā /
analyzed: tapaḥ mayā cīrṇam umāpateḥ purā vara āyudha avāpti dhṛtena cetasā

original: sa me dadau divyamidaṃ dhanustadā kathañcanācālyamṛte pinākinam / 4.17 /
analyzed: sa me dadau divyam idam dhanuḥ tadā kathañcana ācālyam ṛte pinākinam

original: na devadaityoragadevagāyakā alaṃ dhanuścālayituṃ savāsavāḥ /
analyzed: na deva daitya uraga deva gāyakāḥ alam dhanuḥ cālayitum sa vāsavāḥ

original: kuto narāstadvarato hi kiṅkarā sahānasaivātra kṛṣanti kṛcchrataḥ / 4.18 /
analyzed: kutas narāḥ tad varataḥ hi kiṅkarā saha anasā eva atra kṛṣanti kṛcchrataḥ

original: adhāryametad dhanurāpya śaṅkarādahaṃ nṛṇāṃ vīryaparīkṣaṇe dhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: adhāryam etat dhanuḥ āpya śaṅkarāt aham nṛṇām vīrya parīkṣaṇe dhṛtaḥ

original: sutārthametāṃ cakara pratijñāṃ dadāmi kanyāṃ ya idaṃ hi pūrayet / 4.19 /
analyzed: suta artham etām cakara pratijñām dadāmi kanyām yaḥ idam hi pūrayet  /

original: itīritāṃ me giramabhyavetya diteḥ sutā dānavayakṣarākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: iti īritām me giram abhyavetya diteḥ sutāḥ dānava yakṣa rākṣasāḥ

original: sametya bhūpāṇsca samīpamāṇsu pragṛhya taccālayituṃ na śekuḥ / 4.20 /
analyzed: sametya bhūpān ca pragṛhya tat cālayitum na śekuḥ  /

original: saṃ svinnagātrāḥ parivṛttanetrā daśānanādyāḥ patitā vimūrchitāḥ /
analyzed: sam svinna gātrāḥ parivṛtta netrāḥ daśa ānana ādyāḥ patitāḥ vimūrchitāḥ

original: tathā'pi māṃ dharṣayituṃ na śekuḥ sutākṛte te vacanāṃ svayambhuvaḥ / 4.21 /
analyzed: tathā api mām dharṣayitum na śekuḥ sutā kṛte te svayambhuvaḥ

original: purā hi me'dāt prabhurabjajo varaṃ prasādito me tapasā kathañcana /
analyzed: purā hi medāt prabhuḥ abjajaḥ varam prasāditaḥ me tapasā kathañcana

original: balānna te kaścidupaiti kanyakāṃ tadicchubhiste na ca dharṣaṇeti / 4.22 /
analyzed: balāt na te kaścid upaiti kanyakām tad icchubhiḥ te na ca dharṣaṇā iti

original: tatastu te naṣṭamadā ito gatāḥ samastaśo hyastana eva pārthivāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu te naṣṭa madāḥ itas gatāḥ samastaśas hyastanaḥ eva pārthivāḥ

original: xlii.tato mamāyaṃ pratipūrya mānasaṃ vṛṇotu kanyāmayameva me'rthitaḥ / 4.23 /
analyzed: mama ayam pratipūrya mānasam vṛṇotu kanyām ayam eva mā īrthitaḥ

original: tatheti cokte muninā sa kiṅkarairanantabhogopamamāṇsvathā'nayat /
analyzed: tathā iti ca ukte muninā sa kiṅkaraiḥ ananta bhoga upama māṇsu atha anayat

original: samīkṣya tad vāmakareṇa rāghavaḥ salīlamuddhṛtya hasannapūrayat / 4.24 /
analyzed: samīkṣya tat vāma kareṇa rāghavaḥ sa līlam uddhṛtya hasan apūrayat  /

original: vikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tadanantarādhasā pareṇa niḥ sīmabalena līlayā /
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇam tad ananta rādhasā pareṇa niḥ sīmabalena līlayā

original: abhajyatāsahyamamuṣya tad balaṃ prasoḍhumīśaṃ kuta eva tad bhavet / 4.25 /
analyzed: abhajyata asahyam amuṣya tat balam prasoḍhum īśam kutas eva tat bhavet  /

original: sa madhyatastat pravibhajya līlayā yathekṣudaṇḍaṃ śatamanyukuñjaraḥ /
analyzed: sa madhyatas tat pravibhajya līlayā yathā ikṣu daṇḍam śatamanyu kuñjaraḥ

original: vilokayan vaktramṛṣeravasthitaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ pūrṇatanuryathā ṇsaśī / 4.26 /
analyzed: vilokayan vaktram ṛṣeḥ avasthitaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrṇa tanuḥ yathā

original: tamabjanetraṃ pṛthutuṅgavakṣasaṃ śyāmāvadātaṃ calakuṇḍalojjvalam /
analyzed: tam abja netram pṛthu tuṅga vakṣasam śyāma avadātam cala kuṇḍala ujjvalam

original: śaśakṣatotthopamacandanokṣitaṃ dadarśa vidyudvasanaṃ nṛpātmajā / 4.27 /
analyzed: śaśa kṣata uttha upama candana ukṣitam dadarśa vidyut vasanam nṛpa ātmajā

original: atho karābhyāṃ pratigṛhya mālāmamlānapadmāṃ jalajāyatākṣī /
analyzed: atho karābhyām pratigṛhya mālām amlāna padmām jala jāyata akṣī

original: upetya mandaṃ lal . itaiḥ padaistāṃ tadaṃ sa āsajya ca pārśvato'bhavat / 4.28 /
analyzed: upetya mandam itaiḥ padaiḥ tām saḥ āsajya ca pārśvatas bhavat  /

original: tataḥ pramodo nitarāṃ janānāṃ videhapuryāmabhavat samantāt /
analyzed: tatas pramodaḥ nitarām janānām videha puryām abhavat samantāt

original: rāmaṃ samālokya narendraputryā sametamānandanidhiṃ pareśam / 4.29 /
analyzed: rāmam samālokya narendra putryā sametam ānanda nidhim para īśam

original: lakṣmyā samete prakaṭaṃ rameśe sampreṣayāmāsa tadā'śu pitre /
analyzed: lakṣmyā samete prakaṭam rameśe sampreṣayāmāsa tat āśu pitre

original: videharājo daśadigrathāya sa tanniśamyā'śu tutoṣa bhūmipaḥ / 4.30 /
analyzed: videha rājaḥ daśa diś rathāya sa tat niśamya āśu tutoṣa bhūmipaḥ

original: athā'tmajābhyāṃ sahitaḥ sabhāryo yayau gajasyandanapattiyuktayā /
analyzed: atha ātmajābhyām sahitaḥ sa bhāryaḥ yayau gaja syandana patti yuktayā

original: svasenayā'gre praṇidhāya dhātṛjaṃ vasiṣṭhamāṇsveva sa yatra maithilaḥ / 4.31 /
analyzed: sva senayā agre praṇidhāya dhātṛ jam sa yatra maithilaḥ  /

original: sa maithilenātitarāṃ samarcito vivāhayāmāsa sutaṃ mudambharaḥ /
analyzed: sa maithilena atitarām samarcitaḥ vivāhayāmāsa sutam mudambharaḥ

original: purohito gādhisutānumodito juhāva vahniṃ vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ / 4.32 /
analyzed: purohitaḥ gādhi suta anumoditaḥ juhāva vahnim vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: tadā vimānāvalibhirnabhastal . aṃ didṛkṣatāṃ saṅkulamāsa nākinām /
analyzed: tadā vimāna āvalibhiḥ nabhastat didṛkṣatām saṅkulam āsa nākinām

original: surānakā dundabhayo' vinedire jaguśca gandharvavarāḥ sahasraśaḥ / 4.33 /
analyzed: sura ānakāḥ dundabhayaḥ vinedire jaguḥ ca gandharva varāḥ sahasraśas

original: vijānamānā jagatāṃ hi mātaraṃ purā'rthituṃ nā'yayuratra devatāḥ /
analyzed: vijānamānāḥ jagatām hi mātaram purā arthitum na āyayuḥ atra devatāḥ

original: tadā turāmaṃ ramayā yutaṃ prabhuṃ didṛkṣavaścakruralaṃ nabhastal . am / 4.34 /
analyzed: tadā turāmam ramayā yutam prabhum didṛkṣavaḥ cakruḥ alam

original: xliii.yathā purā sāgarajāsvayaṃ vare sumānasānāmabhavat samāgamaḥ /
analyzed: yathā purā sāgarajāsu ayam vare sumānasānām abhavat samāgamaḥ

original: tathā hyabhūt sarvadivaukasāṃ tadā tathā munīnāṃ sahabhūbhṛt āṃ bhuvi / 4.35 /
analyzed: tathā hi abhūt sarva divaukasām tadā tathā munīnām saha bhūbhṛt ām bhuvi  /

original: pragṛhya pāṇiṃ ca nṛpātmajāyā rarāja rājīvasamānanetraḥ /
analyzed: pragṛhya pāṇim ca nṛpa ātmajāyāḥ rarāja rājīva samāna netraḥ

original: yathā purā sāgarajāsametaḥ surāsurāṇāmamṛt ābdhimanthane / 4.36 /
analyzed: yathā purā sāgarajā sametaḥ sura asurāṇām amṛt ā abdhi manthane

original: svalaṅkṛt āstatra viceruraṅganā videharājasya ca yā hi yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: su alaṅkṛt āḥ tatra viceruḥ aṅganāḥ videha rājasya ca yāḥ hi yoṣitaḥ

original: mudā sametaṃ ramayā ramāpatiṃ vilokya rāmāya dadau dhanaṃ nṛpaḥ / 4.37 /
analyzed: mudā sametam ramayā ramāpatim vilokya rāmāya dadau dhanam nṛpaḥ  /

original: priyāṇi vastrāṇi rathān sakuñjarān parārddhyaratnānyakhilasya ceśituḥ /
analyzed: priyāṇi vastrāṇi rathān sa kuñjarān parārddhya ratnāni akhilasya ca īśituḥ

original: dadau ca kanyātrayamuttamaṃ mudā tadā sa rāmāvarajebhya eva / 4.38 /
analyzed: dadau ca kanyā trayam uttamam mudā tadā sa rāma avarajebhyaḥ eva

original: mahotsavaṃ taṃ tvanubhūya devatā narāṇsca sarve prayayuryathāgatam /
analyzed: mahā utsavam tam tu anubhūya devatāḥ narān ca sarve prayayuḥ yathāgatam

original: pitā ca rāmasya sutaiḥ samanvito yayāvayodhyāṃ svapurīṃ mudā tataḥ / 4.39 /
analyzed: pitā ca rāmasya sutaiḥ samanvitaḥ yayau ayodhyām sva purīm mudā tatas

original: tadantare so'tha dadarśa bhārgavaṃ sahasralakṣāmitabhānudīdhitim /
analyzed: tad antare saḥ utha dadarśa bhārgavam sahasra lakṣa amita bhānu dīdhitim

original: vibhāsamānaṃ nijaraśmimaṇḍale dhanurdharaṃ dīptaparaśvadhāyudham / 4.40 /
analyzed: vibhāsamānam nija raśmi maṇḍale dhanuḥ dharam dīpta paraśvadha āyudham

original: ajānatāṃ rāghavamādipūruṣaṃ samāgataṃ j ñāpayituṃ nidarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: a jānatām rāghavam ādi pūruṣam samāgatam j ñāpayitum nidarśanaiḥ

original: samāhvayantaṃ raghupaṃ spṛdheva nṛpo yayāce praṇipatya bhītaḥ / 4.41 /
analyzed: samāhvayantam raghupam spṛdhā iva nṛpaḥ yayāce praṇipatya bhītaḥ

original: na me sutaṃ hantumihārhasi prabho vayogatasyetyuditaḥ sa bhārgavaḥ /
analyzed: na me sutam hantum iha arhasi prabho vayaḥ gatasya iti uditaḥ sa bhārgavaḥ

original: sutatrayaṃ te pradadāmi rāghavaṃ raṇe sthitaṃ draṣṭumihā'gato'smyaham / 4.42 /
analyzed: suta trayam te pradadāmi rāghavam raṇe sthitam draṣṭum iha āgataḥ asmi aham

original: sa itthamuktvā nṛpatiṃ raghūttamaṃ bhṛgūttamaḥ prāha nijāṃ tanuṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ittham uktvā nṛpatim raghūttamam bhṛgūttamaḥ prāha nijām tanum hariḥ

original: abhedamajñeṣvabhidarśayan paraṃ purātano'haṃ harireṣa ityapi / 4.43 /
analyzed: abhedam ajñeṣu abhidarśayan param purātanā uham hariḥ eṣaḥ iti api

original: śṛṇuṣva rāma tvamihoditaṃ mayā dhanurdvayaṃ pūrvamabhūnmahādbhutam /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva rāma tvam iha uditam mayā dhanuḥ dvayam pūrvam abhūt mahā adbhutam

original: umāpatistvekamadhārayat tato ramāpatiścāparamuttamottamam / 4.44 /
analyzed: umāpatiḥ tu ekam adhārayat tatas ramāpatiḥ ca aparam uttamottamam

original: tadā tu lokasya nidarśanārthibhiḥ samarthitau tau hariśaṅkarau suraiḥ /
analyzed: tadā tu lokasya nidarśana arthibhiḥ samarthitau tau hari śaṅkarau suraiḥ

original: raṇasthitau vāṃ prasamīkṣituṃ vayaṃ samarthayāmo'tra nidarśanārthinaḥ / 4.45 /
analyzed: raṇa sthitau vām prasamīkṣitum vayam samarthayāmaḥ utra nidarśana arthinaḥ

original: tato hi yuddhāya rameśaśaṅkarau vyavasthitau tau dhanuṣī pragṛhya /
analyzed: tatas hi yuddhāya rameśa śaṅkarau vyavasthitau tau dhanuṣī pragṛhya

original: yato'ntarasyaiṣa niyāmako haristato haro'gre'sya śilopamo'bhavat / 4.46 /
analyzed: niyāmakaḥ hariḥ tatas śilā upamaḥ bhavat

original: xliv.śaśāka naivātha yadā'bhivīkṣituṃ praspandituṃ vā kuta eva yoddhum /
analyzed: na eva atha yadā abhivīkṣitum praspanditum vā kutas eva yoddhum

original: śivastadā devagaṇaḥ samastāḥ śaśaṃ suruccairjagato harerbalam / 4.47 /
analyzed: śivaḥ tadā deva gaṇaḥ samastāḥ suḥ uccais jagataḥ hareḥ balam

original: yadīraṇenaiva vinaiṣa ṇsaṅkaraḥ śaśāka na praśvasituṃ ca kevalam /
analyzed: yadi īraṇena eva vinā eṣa śaśāka na praśvasitum ca kevalam

original: kimatra vaktavyamato harerbalaṃ harāt paraṃ sarvata eva ceti / 4.48 /
analyzed: kim atra vaktavyam atas hareḥ balam harāt param sarvatas eva ca iti

original: tataḥ praṇamyā'śu janārdanaṃ haraḥ prasannadṛṣṭyā hariṇā'bhivīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas praṇamya āśu janārdanam haraḥ prasanna dṛṣṭyā hariṇā abhivīkṣitaḥ

original: jagāma kailāsamamuṣya tad dhanustvayā prabhagnaṃ kila lokasannidhau / 4.49 /
analyzed: jagāma kailāsam amuṣya tat dhanuḥ tvayā prabhagnam kila loka sannidhau

original: dhanuryadanyaddharihastayogyaṃ tatkārmukāt koṭiguṇaṃ punaśca /
analyzed: dhanuḥ yat anyat hari hasta yogyam tat kārmukāt koṭi guṇam punar ca

original: varaṃ hi haste tadidaṃ gṛhītaṃ mayā gṛhāṇaitadato hi vaiṣṇavam / 4.50 /
analyzed: varam hi haste tat idam gṛhītam mayā gṛhāṇa etat atas hi vaiṣṇavam

original: yadīdamāgṛhya vikarṣasi tvaṃ tadā harirnātra vicāryamasti /
analyzed: yadi idam āgṛhya vikarṣasi tvam tadā hariḥ na atra vicāryam asti

original: iti bruvāṇaḥ pradadau dhanurvaraṃ pradarśayat viṣṇubalaṃ harād varam / 4.51 /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ pradadau dhanuḥ varam pradarśayat viṣṇu balam harāt varam

original: pragṛhya taccāpavaraṃ sa rāghavaścakāra sajyaṃ nimiṣeṇa līlayā /
analyzed: pragṛhya tat ca apavaram sa rāghavaḥ cakāra sajyam nimiṣeṇa līlayā

original: cakarṣa sandhāya śaraṃ ca paśyataḥ samastalokasya ca saṃ śayaṃ nudan / 4.52 /
analyzed: cakarṣa sandhāya śaram ca paśyataḥ samasta lokasya ca sam śayam nudan  /

original: pradarśite viṣṇubale samastato harācca niḥ saṅkhyatayā mahādhike /
analyzed: pradarśite viṣṇu bale samastatas harāt ca niḥ saṅkhya tayā mahā adhike

original: jagāda meghaughagabhīrayā girā sarāghavaṃ bhārgava ādipūruṣaḥ / 4.53 /
analyzed: jagāda megha ogha gabhīrayā girā sa rāghavam bhārgavaḥ ādi pūruṣaḥ

original: alaṃ balaṃ te jagato'khilād varaṃ paro'si nārāyaṇa eva nānyathā /
analyzed: alam balam te jagataḥ ukhilāt varam parosi nārāyaṇaḥ eva nā anyathā

original: visarjayasveha śaraṃ tapomaye mahāsure lokamaye varād vibhoḥ / 4.54 /
analyzed: visarjayasva iha śaram tapaḥ maye mahā asure loka maye varāt vibhoḥ  /

original: purā'tulo nāma mahāsuro'bhavad varāt sa tu brahmaṇa āpa lokatām /
analyzed: purā atulaḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ bhavat varāt sa tu brahmaṇaḥ āpa loka tām

original: punaśca taṃ prāha jagadgururyadā harirjitaḥ syāddhi tadaiva vadhyase / 4.55 /
analyzed: punar ca tam prāha jagadguruḥ yadā hariḥ jitaḥ syāt hi tadā eva vadhyase  /

original: ato vadhārthaṃ jagadantakasya sarvājito'haṃ jitavad vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: atas vadha artham jagadantakasya sarva ajita ūham jita vat vyavasthitaḥ

original: itīrite lokamaye sa rāghavo mumoca bāṇaṃ jagadantake'sure / 4.56 /
analyzed: iti īrite loka maye sa rāghavaḥ mumoca bāṇam jagadanta kesure  /

original: purā varo'nena śivopalambhito mumukṣayā viṣṇutanupraveśanam /
analyzed: purā vara ūnena śiva upalambhitaḥ mumukṣayā viṣṇu tanu praveśanam

original: sa tena rāmodarago bahirgatastadājñayaivā'śu babhūva bhasmasāt / 4.57 /
analyzed: sa tena rāma udara gaḥ bahis gataḥ tad ājñayā eva āśu babhūva bhasmasāt

original: itīva rāmāya sa rāghavaḥ śaraṃ vikarṣamāṇo vinihatya cāsuram /
analyzed: iti iva rāmāya sa rāghavaḥ śaram vikarṣamāṇaḥ vinihatya ca asuram

original: xlv.tapastadīyaṃ pravadan mumoda tadīyameva hyabhavat samastam / 4.58 /
analyzed: xlv tapaḥ tadīyam pravadan mumoda tadīyam eva hi abhavat samastam

original: nirantarānantavibodhasāraḥ sa jānamāno'khilamādipūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: nirantara ananta vibodha sāraḥ sa jānamāna ukhilam ādi pūruṣaḥ

original: vadañchṛṇotīva vinodato hariḥ sa eka eva dvitanurmumoda / 4.59 /
analyzed: vadan śṛṇoti iva vinodataḥ hariḥ saḥ ekaḥ eva dvi tanuḥ mumoda

original: sa ceṣṭitaṃ caiva nijāṇsrayasya janasya sattattvavibodhakāraṇam /
analyzed: sa ceṣṭitam ca eva janasya sat tattva vibodha kāraṇam

original: vimohakaṃ cānyatamasya kurvan cikrīḍa eko'pi narāntare yathā / 4.60 /
analyzed: vimohakam ca anyatamasya kurvan cikrīḍe ekaḥ api nara antare yathā

original: tataḥ sa kāruṇyanidhirnije jane nitāntamaikyaṃ svagataṃ prakāṇsayan /
analyzed: tatas sa kāruṇya nidhiḥ nije jane nitāntam aikyam svagatam

original: dvidheva bhūtvā bhṛguvarya ātmanā raghūttamenaikyamagāt samakṣam / 4.61 /
analyzed: dvidhā iva bhūtvā bhṛgu varyaḥ ātmanā raghūttamena aikyam agāt samakṣam

original: sametya caikyaṃ jagato'bhipaśyataḥ praṇudya śaṅkāmakhilāṃ janasya /
analyzed: sametya ca aikyam jagataḥ abhipaśyataḥ praṇudya śaṅkām akhilām janasya

original: pradāya rāmāya dhanurvaraṃ tadā jagāma rāmānumato ramāpatiḥ / 4.62 /
analyzed: pradāya rāmāya dhanuḥ varam tadā jagāma rāma anumataḥ ramāpatiḥ

original: tato nṛpo'tyarthamudā'bhipūritaḥ sutaiḥ samastaiḥ svapurīmavāpa ha /
analyzed: tatas nṛpa utyartha mudā abhipūritaḥ sutaiḥ samastaiḥ sva purīm avāpa ha

original: reme'tha rāmo'pi ramāsvarūpayā tayaiva rājātmajayā hisītayā / 4.63 /
analyzed: remetha rāmaḥ api ramā svarūpayā tayā eva rāja ātmajayā hi sītayā

original: yathā purā ṇsrīramaṇaḥ śriyā tayā rato nitāntaṃ hi payobdhimadhye /
analyzed: yathā purā ṇsrī ramaṇaḥ śriyā tayā rataḥ nitāntam hi payaḥ abdhi madhye

original: tathā tvayodhyāpurigo raghūttamo'pyuvāsa kālaṃ suciraṃ ratastayā / 4.64 /
analyzed: tathā tu ayodhyā purigaḥ raghūttamaḥ upi uvāsa kālam su ciram rataḥ tayā

original: imāni karmāṇi raghūttamasya harervicitrāṇyapi nādbhutāni /
analyzed: imāni karmāṇi raghūttamasya hareḥ vicitrāṇi api nā adbhutāni

original: durantaśakteratha cāsya vaibhavaṃ svakīyakartavyatayā'nuvarṇyate / 4.65 /
analyzed: duranta śakteḥ atha ca asya vaibhavam svakīya kartavya tayā anuvarṇyate

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
rāmāvatāre ayodhyāpraveśo nāma caturtho'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: rāmāvatāre ayodhyāpraveśaḥ nāma caturthaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: xlvi.atha pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha pañcamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: rāmacarite hanūmaddarśanam
analyzed: rāmacarite hanūmat darśanam

original: Oṃ / itthaṃ viśveśvare'sminnakhila jagadavasthāpya sīt āsahāye
analyzed: om ittham jagant avasthāpya sīt āsahāye

original: bhūmiṣṭhe sarvalokāstutuṣuranudinaṃ vṛddhabhaktyānitāntam /
analyzed: bhūmiṣṭhe sarva lokāḥ tutuṣuḥ anudinam vṛddha bhaktyā nitāntam

original: rājā rājyābhiṣeke prakṛtijanavaco mānayannātmano'rthyaṃ
analyzed: rājā rājya abhiṣeke prakṛti jana vacaḥ mānayan ātmanorthyam

original: dadhre tanmantharāyāḥ śrutipathamagamad bhūmigāyā alakṣmyāḥ / 5.1 /
analyzed: dadhre tat mantharāyāḥ śrutipatham agamat bhūmi gāyāḥ alakṣmyāḥ

original: pūrvaṃ kṣīrābdhijātā kathamapi tapasaivāpsarastvaṃ prayātā
analyzed: pūrvam kṣīrābdhi jātā katham api tapasā evā apsaraḥ tvam prayātā

original: t āṃ netuṃ tat tamo'ndhaṃ kamalajaniruvācā'śu rāmābhiṣekam /
analyzed: netum tat tamaḥ ndham kamala janiḥ uvāca āśu rāma abhiṣekam

original: bhūtvā dāsī vilumpa svagatimapi tataḥ karmaṇā prāpsyase tvaṃ
analyzed: bhūtvā dāsī vilumpa sva gatim api tatas karmaṇā prāpsyase tvam

original: setyuktā mantharā'sīt tadanu kṛtavatyeva caitat kukarma / 5.2 /
analyzed: sā iti uktā mantharā āsīt tadanu kṛtavatī eva ca etat ku karma

original: tadvākyāt kaikayī sā patigavarabalādājahāraiva rājyaṃ
analyzed: tad vākyāt kaikayī sā pati ga vara balāt ājahāra eva rājyam

original: rāmastadgauraveṇa tridaśamunikṛte'raṇyamevā'viveśa /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tad gauraveṇa tridaśa muni kṛta iraṇyam eva āviveśa

original: sīt āyukto'nujena pratidinasuvivṛddhorubhaktyā sametaḥ
analyzed: āyuktaḥ unujena prati dina su vivṛddha ūru bhaktyā sametaḥ

original: saṃ sthāpyāṇseṣajantūn svavirahajaśucā tyaktasarveṣaṇārthān / 5.3 /
analyzed: sam sthāpya āṇ seṣa jantūn sva viraha ja śucā tyakta sarva īṣaṇa arthān

original: vṛkṣān paśvādikīṭān pitaramatha sakhīn mātṛpūrvān visṛjya
analyzed: vṛkṣān paśu ādi kīṭān pitaram atha sakhīn mātṛ pūrvān visṛjya

original: protthāṃ gaṅgāṃ svapādāddhara iva guhenārcitaḥ so'tha tīrtvā /
analyzed: protthām gaṅgām sva pādāt haraḥ iva guhena arcitaḥ saḥ utha tīrtvā

original: devārcyasyāpi putrādṛṣigaṇasahitāt prāpya pūjāṃ prayātaḥ
analyzed: deva arcyasya api putrāt ṛṣi gaṇa sahitāt prāpya pūjām prayātaḥ

original: śaileśaṃ citrakūṭaṃ katipayadinānyatra modannuvāsa / 5.4 /
analyzed: śaila īśam citrakūṭam katipaya dināni atra modan uvāsa

original: etasminneva kāle daśarathanṛpatiḥ svargato'bhūd viyogād
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle daśaratha nṛpatiḥ svargataḥ abhūt viyogāt

original: rāmasyaivātha putrau vidhisutasahitairmantribhiḥ kekayebhyaḥ /
analyzed: rāmasya eva atha putrau vidhi suta sahitaiḥ mantribhiḥ kekayebhyaḥ

original: ānītau tasya kṛtvā ṇsrutigaṇavihitapretakāryāṇi sadyaḥ
analyzed: ānītau tasya kṛtvā sadyas

original: śocantau rāmamārgaṃ purajanasahitau jagmaturmātṛbhiśca / 5.5 /
analyzed: śocantau rāma mārgam pura jana sahitau jagmatuḥ mātṛbhiḥ ca

original: dhik kurvantau nitāntaṃ sakaladuritagāṃ mantharāṃ kaikayīṃ ca
analyzed: dhik kurvantau nitāntam sakala durita gām mantharām kaikayīm ca

original: prāptau rāmasya pādau munigaṇasahitau tatra covāca natvā /
analyzed: prāptau rāmasya pādau muni gaṇa sahitau tatra ca uvāca natvā

original: rāmaṃ rājīvanetraṃ bharata iha punaḥ prītaye'smākamīśa
analyzed: rāmam rājīva netram bharataḥ iha punar prītaye smākam īśa

original: prāpyā'śu svāmayodhyāmavarajasahitaḥ pālayemāṃ dharitrīm / 5.6 /
analyzed: prāpya āśu svām ayodhyām avaraja sahitaḥ pālaya imām dharitrīm

original: ityuktaḥ kartumīśaḥ sakalasuragaṇāpyāyanaṃ rāmadevaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ kartum īśaḥ sakala sura gaṇa āpyāyanam rāmadevaḥ

original: satyāṃ kartuṃ ca vāṇīmavadadatitarāṃ neti sadbhaktinamram /
analyzed: satyām kartum ca vāṇīm avadat atitarām na iti sat bhakti namram

original: xlvii.bhūyobhūyo'rthayantaṃ dviguṇitaśaradāṃ saptake tvabhyatīte
analyzed: dvi guṇita śaradām saptake tu abhyatīte

original: kartaitat te vaco'haṃ sudṛḍhamṛtamidaṃ me vaco nātra śaṅkā / 5.7 /
analyzed: kartā etat te vacaḥ ham su dṛḍham ṛtam idam me vacaḥ na atra śaṅkā

original: śrutvaitad rāmavākyaṃ hutabhuji patane sa pratijñāṃ ca kṛtvā
analyzed: śrutvā etat rāma vākyam hutabhuji patane sa pratijñām ca kṛtvā

original: rāmoktasyānyathātve na tu puramabhivekṣye'hamityeva tāvat /
analyzed: rāma uktasya anyathātve na tu puram abhivekṣya iham iti eva tāvat

original: kṛtvā'nyāṃ sa pratijñāmavasadatha bahirgrāmake nandināmni
analyzed: kṛtvā anyām sa pratijñām avasat atha bahis grāmake nandi nāmni

original: śrīśasyaivāsya kṛtvā ṇsirasi paramakaṃ pauraṭaṃ pādapīṭham / 5.8 /
analyzed: śrīśasya eva asya kṛtvā paramakam pauraṭam pāda pīṭham

original: samastapaurānugate'nuje gate sa citrakūṭe bhagavānuvāsa ha
analyzed: samasta paura anugata inuje gate sa citrakūṭe bhagavān uvāsa ha

original: athā'jagāmendrasuto'pi vāyaso mahāsureṇā'tmagatena coditaḥ / 5.9 /
analyzed: athā ājagāma indra sutaḥ api vāyasaḥ mahā asureṇa ātma gatena coditaḥ

original: sa āsurāveśavaśād ramāstane yadā vyadhāt tuṇḍamathābhivīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ āsura āveśa vaśāt ramā stane yadā vyadhāt tuṇḍam atha abhivīkṣitaḥ

original: janārdanenā'śu tṛṇe prayojite cacāra tena jvalatā'nuyātaḥ / 5.10 /
analyzed: janārdanena āśu tṛṇe prayojite cacāra tena jvalatā anuyātaḥ  /

original: svayambhuśarvendramukhānsureśvarān jijīviṣustāñcharaṇaṃ gato'pi /
analyzed: svayambhu śarva indra mukhān sura īśvarān jijīviṣuḥ tān śaraṇam gataḥ api

original: bahiṣkṛtastairharibhaktibhāvato hyalaṅghyaśaktyā paramasya cākṣamaiḥ / 5.11 /
analyzed: bahiṣkṛtaḥ taiḥ hari bhakti bhāvataḥ hi a laṅghya śaktyā paramasya ca akṣamaiḥ

original: punaḥ prayātaḥ śaraṇaṃ raghūttamaṃ visarjitastena nihatya cāsuram /
analyzed: punar prayātaḥ śaraṇam raghūttamam visarjitaḥ tena nihatya ca asuram

original: tadakṣigaṃ sākṣikamapyavadhyaṃ prasādataścandravibhūṣaṇasya / 5.12 /
analyzed: tat akṣi gam sākṣikam api avadhyam prasādataḥ candravibhūṣaṇasya

original: sa vāyasānāmasuro'khilānāṃ varādumeśasya babhūva cākṣigaḥ /
analyzed: sa vāyasānām asura ukhilānām varāt umeśasya babhūva ca akṣi gaḥ

original: nipātito'sau saha vāyasākṣibhistṛṇena rāmasya babhūva bhasmasāt / 5.13 /
analyzed: nipātitā usau saha vāyasa akṣibhiḥ tṛṇena rāmasya babhūva bhasmasāt

original: dadurhi tasmai vivaraṃ balārthino yad vāyasāstena tadakṣipātanam /
analyzed: daduḥ hi tasmai vivaram bala arthinaḥ yat vāyasāḥ tena tat akṣi pātanam

original: kṛtaṃ rameśena tadekanetrā babhūvuranye'pi tu vāyasāḥ sadā / 5.14 /
analyzed: kṛtam rameśena tad eka netrāḥ babhūvuḥ anye api tu vāyasāḥ sadā

original: bhaviṣyatāmapyatha yāvadeva dvinetratā kākakulodbhavānām /
analyzed: bhaviṣyatām api atha yāvat eva dvi netra tā kāka kula udbhavānām

original: t āvat tadakṣyasya kuraṅganāmnaḥ śivena dattaṃ ditijasya cākṣayam / 5.15 /
analyzed: t āvat tat akṣyasya kuraṅga nāmnaḥ śivena dattam ditijasya ca akṣayam

original: ataḥ punarbhāvamamuṣya hinvan bhaviṣyataścaikadṛśaścakāra /
analyzed: atas punarbhāvam amuṣya hinvan bhaviṣyataḥ ca ekadṛśaḥ cakāra

original: sa vāyasān rāghava ādipūruṣastato yayau śakrasutastadājñayā / 5.16 /
analyzed: sa vāyasān rāghavaḥ ādipūruṣaḥ tatas yayau śakrasutaḥ tad ājñayā  /

original: rāmo'tha daṇḍakavanaṃ munivaryanīto lokānanekaśa udārabalairnirastān /
analyzed: rāmaḥ utha daṇḍaka vanam muni varya nītaḥ lokān anekaśas udāra balaiḥ nirastān

original: śrutvā kharaprabhṛtibhirvarato harasya sarvairavadhyatanubhiḥ prayayau sabhāryaḥ / 5.17 /
analyzed: śrutvā khara prabhṛtibhiḥ varatas harasya sarvaiḥ avadhya tanubhiḥ prayayau sa bhāryaḥ

original: xlviii.āsīcca tatra śarabhaṅga iti sma jīrṇo lokaṃ harerjigamiṣurmunirugratejāḥ /
analyzed: āsīt ca tatra śarabhaṅgaḥ iti sma jīrṇaḥ lokam hareḥ jigamiṣuḥ muniḥ ugra tejāḥ

original: tenā'daropahṛtasārdhyasaparyayā saprīto dadau nijapadaṃ paramaṃ rameśaḥ / 5.18 /
analyzed: tena ādara upahṛta sārdhya saparyayā sa prītaḥ dadau nija padam paramam rameśaḥ

original: dharmo yato'sya vanagasya nitāntaśaktihrāse svadharmakaraṇasya hutāṇsanādau /
analyzed: dharmaḥ yatas asya vana gasya nitānta śakti hrāse svadharma karaṇasya hutāṇsana ādau

original: dehātyayaḥ sa tata eva tanuṃ nijāgnau santyajya rāmapurataḥ prayayau pareśam / 5.19 /
analyzed: dehātyayaḥ sa tatas eva tanum nija agnau santyajya rāma puratas prayayau para īśam

original: rāmo'pi tatra dadṛśe dhanadasya śāpād gandharvamurvaśirateratha yātudhānīm /
analyzed: rāmaḥ upi tatra dadṛśe dhanadasya śāpāt gandharvam urvaśi rateḥ atha yātudhānīm

original: prāptaṃ daśāṃ sapadi tumburunāmadheyaṃ nāmnā virādhamapi śarvavarādavadhyam / 5.20 /
analyzed: prāptam daśām sapadi tumburu nāmadheyam nāmnā virādham api śarva varāt avadhyam

original: bhaṅktvā'sya bāhuyugal . aṃ bilagaṃ cakāra sammānayan vacanamambujajanmano'sau /
analyzed: bhaṅktvā asya bila gam cakāra sammānayan vacanam ambuja janmanā usau

original: prādācca tasya sugatiṃ nijagāyakasya bhakṣārthamaṃ sakamito'pi sahānujena / 5.21 /
analyzed: prādāt ca tasya sugatim nija gāyakasya bhakṣa arthamam sa kamitaḥ upi saha anujena

original: prītiṃ vidhitsuragamad bhavanaṃ nijasya kumbhodbhavasya paramādarato'munā ca/
analyzed: prītim vidhitsuḥ agamat bhavanam nijasya kumbhodbhavasya parama ādarataḥ umunā ca

original: sampūjito dhanuranena gṛhītamindrācchārṅgaṃ tadādipuruṣo nijamājahāra / 5.22 /
analyzed: sampūjitaḥ dhanuḥ anena gṛhītam indrāt śārṅgam tad ādi puruṣaḥ nijam ājahāra

original: ātmārthameva hi purā hariṇā pradattamindre tadindra uta rāmakarārthameva /
analyzed: ātma artham eva hi purā hariṇā pradattam indre tat indre uta rāma kara artham eva

original: prādādagastyamunaye tadavāpya rāmo rakṣan ṛṣīnavasadeva sa daṇḍakeṣu / 5.23 /
analyzed: prādāt agastya munaye tat avāpya rāmaḥ rakṣan ṛṣīn avasat eva sa daṇḍakeṣu

original: kāle tadaiva kharadūṣaṇayorbalena rakṣaḥ svasā patinimārgaṇatatparā'sīt /
analyzed: kāle tadā eva khara dūṣaṇayoḥ balena rakṣaḥ svasā pati nimārgaṇa tatparā āsīt

original: vyāpādite nijapatau hi daśānanena prāmādikena vidhinā'bhisasāra rāmam / 5.24 /
analyzed: vyāpādite nija patau hi daśānanena prāmādikena vidhinā abhisasāra rāmam

original: sā'nujñayaiva rajanīcarabharturugrā bhrātṛdvayena sahitā vanamāvasantī /
analyzed: sa anujñayā eva rajanīcara bhartuḥ ugrā bhrātṛ dvayena sahitā vanam āvasantī

original: rāmaṃ sametya bhava me patirityavocad bhānuṃ yathā tama upetya suyogakāmam / 5.25 /
analyzed: rāmam sametya bhava me patiḥ iti avocat bhānum yathā tamaḥ upetya su yoga kāmam

original: t āṃ tatra hāsyakathayā janakāsutāgre gacchānujaṃ ma iha meti vacaḥ sa uktvā /
analyzed: t ām tatra hāsya kathayā janakā suta agre gaccha anujam me iha mā iti vacaḥ saḥ uktvā

original: tenaiva duṣṭacaritāṃ hi vikarṇanāsāṃ cakre samastarajanīcaranāṇsahetoḥ / 5.26 /
analyzed: tena eva duṣṭa caritām hi vikarṇa nāsām cakre samasta rajanīcara nāṇsa hetoḥ

original: tatpreritān sapadi bhīmabalān prayātāṃ stasyāḥ kharatriśiradūṣaṇamukhyabandhūn /
analyzed: tad preritān sapadi bhīma balān prayātām stasyāḥ khara triśira dūṣaṇa mukhya bandhūn

original: jaghne caturdaśasahasramavāraṇīyakodaṇḍapāṇirakhilasya sukhaṃ vidhātum / 5.27 /
analyzed: jaghne caturdaśa sahasram avāraṇīya kodaṇḍa pāṇiḥ akhilasya sukham vidhātum

original: datte'bhaye raghuvareṇa mahāmunīnāṃ datte bhaye ca rajanīcaramaṇḍalasya /
analyzed: datte bhaye raghu vareṇa mahā munīnām datte bhaye ca rajanīcara maṇḍalasya

original: rakṣaḥ patiḥ svasṛmukhādavikampanācca śrutvā balaṃ raghupateḥ paramāpa cintām / 5.28 /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ patiḥ svasṛ mukhāt avikampanāt ca śrutvā balam raghu pateḥ param āpa cintām

original: sa tvāṇsu kāryamavamṛśya jagāma tīre kṣetraṃ nadīnadapateḥ śravaṇaṃ dharitryāḥ /
analyzed: sa tvā aṇsu kāryam avamṛśya jagāma tīre kṣetram nadīnada pateḥ śravaṇam dharitryāḥ

original: mārīcamatra tapasi prativartamānaṃ bhītaṃ śarād raghupaternitarāṃ dadarśa / 5.29 /
analyzed: mārīcam atra tapasi prativartamānam bhītam śarāt raghu pateḥ nitarām dadarśa  /

original: xlix.tenārthitaḥ sapadi rāghavavañcanārthe mārīca āha śaravegamamuṣya jānan /
analyzed: tena arthitaḥ sapadi rāghava vañcana arthe mārīcaḥ āha śara vegam amuṣya jānan

original: śakyo na te raghuvareṇa hi vigraho'tra jānāmi saṃ sparśamasya śarasya pūrvam / 5.30 /
analyzed: śakyaḥ na te raghu vareṇa hi vigrahaḥ utra jānāmi sam sparśam asya śarasya pūrvam

original: ityuktavantamatha rāvaṇa āha khaḍgaṃ niṣkṛṣya hanmi yadi me na karoṣi vākyam /
analyzed: iti uktavantam atha rāvaṇaḥ āha khaḍgam niṣkṛṣya hanmi yadi me na karoṣi vākyam

original: tacchuśruvān bhayayuto'tha nisargataśca pāpo jagāma raghuvaryasakāṇsamāṇsu / 5.31 /
analyzed: tat śuśruvān bhaya yutaḥ utha nisargataḥ ca pāpaḥ jagāma

original: sa prāpya haimamṛgatāṃ bahuratnacitraḥ sīt āsamīpa urudhā vicacāra śīghram /
analyzed: sa prāpya haima mṛga tām bahu ratna citraḥ sīt ā samīpe urudhā vicacāra śīghram

original: nirdoṣanityavarasaṃ vidapi sma devī rakṣovadhāya janamohakṛte tathā'ha / 5.32 /
analyzed: nirdoṣa nitya varasam vid api sma devī rakṣaḥ vadhāya jana moha kṛte tathā āha

original: devemamāṇsu parigṛhya ca dehi me tvaṃ krīḍāmṛgaṃ tviti tayodita eva rāmaḥ /
analyzed: deva imam āṇsu parigṛhya ca dehi me tvam krīḍāmṛgam tu iti tayā uditaḥ eva rāmaḥ

original: anvak sasāra ha śarāsanabāṇapāṇirmāyāmṛgaṃ niśicaraṃ nijaghāna jānan / 5.33 /
analyzed: anvak sasāra ha śarāsana bāṇa pāṇiḥ māyā mṛgam niśicaram nijaghāna jānan  /

original: tenā'hataḥ śaravareṇa bhṛśaṃ mamāra vikruśya lakṣmaṇamuruvyathayā sapāpaḥ /
analyzed: tena āhataḥ śara vareṇa bhṛśam mamāra vikruśya lakṣmaṇam uru vyathayā sa pāpaḥ

original: śrutvaiva lakṣmaṇamacūcudadugravākyaiḥ so'pyāpa rāmapathameva sacāpabāṇaḥ / 5.34 /
analyzed: śrutvā eva lakṣmaṇam acūcudat ugra vākyaiḥ saḥ upya āpa rāma patham eva sa cāpa bāṇaḥ

original: yāṃ yāṃ pareśa urudhaiva karoti līl āṃ t āṃ t āṃ karotyanu tathaiva ramāpi devī /
analyzed: yām yām pareśaḥ urudhā eva karoti līl ām t āṃ t ām karoti anu tathā eva ramā api devī

original: naitāvatā'sya paramasya tathā ramāyā doṣo'ṇurapyanuvicintya uruprabhū yat / 5.35 /
analyzed: na etāvatā asya paramasya tathā ramāyāḥ doṣa uṇuḥ api anuvicintyaḥ uru prabhū yat

original: kvājñānamāpadapi mandakaṭākṣamātrasargasthitipral . ayasaṃ sṛtimokṣahetoḥ /
analyzed: kva ajñānam āpat api manda kaṭākṣa mātra sarga sthiti pra l ayasam sṛti mokṣa hetoḥ

original: devyā hareḥ kimu viḍambanamātrametad vikrīḍatoḥ suranarādivadeva tasmāt / 5.36 /
analyzed: devyāḥ hareḥ kimu viḍambana mātram etat vikrīḍatoḥ sura nara ādi vat eva tasmāt

original: devyāḥ samīpamatha rāvaṇa āsasāda sā'dṛśyatāmagamadapyaviṣahyaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: devyāḥ samīpam atha rāvaṇaḥ āsasāda sādṛśya tām agamat api aviṣahya śaktiḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā'tmanaḥ pratikṛtiṃ prayayau ca śīghraṃ kailāsamarcitapadā nyavasacchivābhyām / 5.37 /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā ātmanaḥ pratikṛtim prayayau ca śīghram kailāsam arcita padā nyavasat śivābhyām

original: tasyāstu tāṃ pratikṛtiṃ praviveśa śakro devyāṇsca sannidhiyutāṃ vyavahārasiddhyai /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu tām pratikṛtim praviveśa śakraḥ devyāḥ ca sannidhi yutām vyavahāra siddhyai

original: ādāya tāmatha yayau rajanīcarendro hatvā jaṭāyuṣamuruśramato niruddhaḥ / 5.38 /
analyzed: ādāya tām atha yayau rajanīcara indraḥ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam uruśramataḥ niruddhaḥ  /

original: mārge vrajantamabhiyāya tato hanūmān saṃ vārito ravisutena ca jānamānaḥ /
analyzed: mārge vrajantam abhiyāya tatas hanūmān sam vāritaḥ ravisutena ca jānamānaḥ

original: daivaṃ tu kāryamatha kīrtimabhīpsamāno rāmasya nainamahanad vacanāddhareśca / 5.39 /
analyzed: daivam tu kāryam atha kīrtim abhīpsamānaḥ rāmasya na enam ahanat vacanāt hareḥ ca

original: prāpyaiva rākṣasa utā'tmapurīṃ sa tatra sīt ākṛtiṃ pratinidhāya rarakṣa cātha /
analyzed: prāpya eva rākṣasaḥ uta ātma purīm sa tatra sīt ākṛtim pratinidhāya rarakṣa ca atha

original: rāmo'pi tattu vinihatya suduṣṭarakṣaḥ prāpyā'śramaṃ svadayitāṃ nahi paśyatīva / 5.40 /
analyzed: rāmaḥ api tat tu vinihatya su duṣṭa rakṣaḥ prāpya āśramam sva dayitām nahi paśyati iva

original: anveṣamāṇa iva taṃ ca dadarśa gṛdhraṃ sīt ārirakṣiṣumatho ripuṇā viśastam /
analyzed: anveṣamāṇaḥ iva tam ca dadarśa gṛdhram sīd ārirakṣiṣum atho ripuṇā viśastam

original: l.mandātmaceṣṭamamunoktamareśca karma śrutvā mṛtaṃ tamadahat svagatiṃ tathā'dāt / 5.41 /
analyzed: lmanda ātma ceṣṭam amunā uktam areḥ ca karma śrutvā mṛtam tam adahat sva gatim tathā adāt  /

original: anyatra caiva vicaran sahito'nujena prāptaḥ karau sa sahasā'tha kabandhanāmnaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra ca eva vicaran sahita unujena prāptaḥ karau sa sahasā atha kabandha nāmnaḥ

original: dhāturvarādakhilajāyina ujjhitasya mṛtyośca vajrapatanādatikuñcitasya / 5.42 /
analyzed: dhātuḥ varāt akhila jāyinaḥ ujjhitasya mṛtyoḥ ca vajra patanāt atikuñcitasya  /

original: chitvā'sya bāhuyugal . aṃ sahito'nujena taṃ pūrvavat pratividhāya surendrabhṛtyam /
analyzed: chitvā asya tam pūrvavat pratividhāya sura indra bhṛtyam

original: nāmnā danuṃ trijaṭayaiva purā'bhijātaṃ gandharvamāṇsu ca tato'pi tadarcito'gāt / 5.43 /
analyzed: nāmnā danum trijaṭayā eva purā abhijātam ca tatas upi tad arcitā ugāt

original: dṛṣṭvā tameva śabarī paramaṃ hariṃ ca jñātvā viveśa dahanaṃ purato'sya tasyai /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam eva śabarī paramam harim ca jñātvā viveśa dahanam puratas sya tasyai

original: prādāt svalokamimameva hi sā pratīkṣya pūrvaṃ mataṅgavacanena vane'tra sā'bhūt / 5.44 /
analyzed: prādāt sva lokam imam eva hi sā pratīkṣya pūrvam mataṅga vacanena

original: śāpād varāpsarasameva hi tāṃ vimucya śacyā kṛt āt patipurastvatidarpahetoḥ /
analyzed: śāpāt vara apsarasam eva hi tām vimucya śacyā pati puras tu ati darpa hetoḥ

original: gatvā dadarśa pavanātmajamṛśyamūke sa hyeka enamavagacchati samyagīśam / 5.45 /
analyzed: gatvā dadarśa pavanātmajam ṛśyamūke sa hi ekaḥ enam avagacchati samyak īśam  /

original: dehe'pi yatra pavano'tra hariryato'sau tatraiva vāyuriti vedavacaḥ prasiddham /
analyzed: dehe api yatra hariḥ yatas asau tatra eva vāyuḥ iti veda vacaḥ prasiddham

original: kasmin nvahaṃ tviti tathaiva hi so'vatāre tasmāt sa mārutikṛte ravijaṃ rarakṣa / 5.46 /
analyzed: kasmin nu aham tu iti tathā eva hi saḥ uvatāre tasmāt sa māruti kṛte ravijam rarakṣa  /

original: evaṃ sa kṛṣṇatanurarjunamapyarakṣad bhīmārthameva tadariṃ ravijaṃ nihatya /
analyzed: evam sa kṛṣṇa tanuḥ arjunam api arakṣat bhīma artham eva tad arim ravijam nihatya

original: pūrvaṃ hi mārutimavāpa raveḥ suto'yaṃ tenāsya vālinamahan raghupaḥ pratīpam / 5.47 /
analyzed: pūrvam hi mārutim avāpa raveḥ su toyam tena asya vālinam ahan raghupaḥ pratīpam  /

original: evaṃ surāṇsca pavanasya vaśe yato'taḥ sugrīvamatra tu paratra ca śakrasūnum /
analyzed: evam surān ca pavanasya vaśe yata utas sugrīvam atra tu paratra ca śakra sūnum

original: sarve śritā hanumatastadanugrahāya tatrāgamad raghupatiḥ saha lakṣmaṇena / 5.48 /
analyzed: sarve śritāḥ hanumataḥ tad anugrahāya tatra agamat raghu patiḥ saha lakṣmaṇena

original: yatpādapaṅkajarajaḥ śirasā vibharti śrīrabjajaśca giriśaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ /
analyzed: yad pāda paṅkaja rajaḥ śirasā vibharti śrīḥ abja jaḥ ca giriśaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ

original: sarveśvarasya paramasya hi sarvaśakteḥ kiṃ tasya śatruhanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ / 5.49 /
analyzed: sarva īśvarasya paramasya hi sarva śakteḥ kim tasya śatru hanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ  /

original: samāgate tu rāghave plavaṅgamāḥ sasūryajāḥ /
analyzed: samāgate tu rāghave plavaṅgamāḥ sa sūryajāḥ

original: vipupluvurbhayārditā nyavārayacca mārutiḥ / 5.50 /
analyzed: vipupluvuḥ bhaya arditāḥ nyavārayat ca mārutiḥ

original: saṃ sthāpyā'śu harīndrān jānan viṣṇorguṇānanantān saḥ /
analyzed: sam sthāpya āśu hari indrān jānan viṣṇoḥ guṇān anantān saḥ

original: sākṣād brahmapitā'sāvityenenāsya pādayoḥ pete / 5.51 /
analyzed: sākṣāt brahma pitā asau iti enena asya pādayoḥ pete  /

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
rāmacarite hanūmaddarśanaṃ nḸama pañcamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: rāmacarite hanūmaddarśanam pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: li.(samudrataraṇaniścayaḥ )
atha ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha ṣaṣṭhaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / utthāpya cainamaravindadalāyatākṣaṇscakrāṅkitena varadena karāmbujena /
analyzed: om utthāpya ca enam aravinda dala āyata akṣaṇ cakra aṅkitena vara dena kara ambujena

original: kṛtvā ca saṃ vidamanena nuto'sya cāṃ saṃ prītyā'ruroha sa hasan saha lakṣmaṇena / 6.1 /
analyzed: kṛtvā ca sam cām sam prītyā āruroha sa hasan saha lakṣmaṇena  /

original: āropya cāṃ sayugal . aṃ bhagavantamenaṃ tasyānujaṃ ca hanumān prayayau kapīndram /
analyzed: āropya bhagavantam enam tasya anujam ca hanumān prayayau kapi indram

original: sakhyaṃ cakāra hutabhukpramukhe ca tasya rāmeṇa ṇsāṇsvatanijārtihareṇa ṇsīghram / 6.2 /
analyzed: sakhyam cakāra hutabhuj pramukhe ca tasya rāmeṇa

original: śrutvā'sya duḥkhamatha devavaraḥ pratijñāṃ cakre sa vālinidhanāya harīśvaro'pi /
analyzed: śrutvā asya duḥkham atha deva varaḥ pratijñām cakre sa vāli nidhanāya hari īśvaraḥ api

original: sīt ānumārgaṇakṛte'tha sa vālinaiva kṣiptāṃ hi dundubhitanuṃ samadarśayacca / 6.3 /
analyzed: sīt sa vālinā eva kṣiptām hi dundubhi tanum samadarśayat ca  /

original: vīkṣyaiva tāṃ nipatitāmatha rāmadevaḥ so'ṅguṣṭhamātracalanādatilīlayaiva /
analyzed: vīkṣya eva tām nipatitām atha rāmadevaḥ sa uṅguṣṭha mātra calanāt ati līlayā eva

original: samprāsya yojanaśate'tha tayaiva corvīṃ sarvāṃ vidārya ditijānahanad rasāsthān / 6.4 /
analyzed: samprāsya tayā eva ca urvīm sarvām vidārya ditijān ahanat rasa āsthān  /

original: śarvaprasādajabalād ditijānavadhyān sarvān nihatya kuṇapena punaśca sakhyā /
analyzed: śarva prasāda ja balāt ditijān avadhyān sarvān nihatya kuṇapena punar ca sakhyā

original: bhītena vālibalataḥ kathitaḥ sma sapta sālān pradarśya ditijān sudṛḍhāṃ śca vajrāt / 6.5 /
analyzed: bhītena vāli balataḥ kathitaḥ sma sapta sālān pradarśya ditijān su dṛḍhām śca vajrāt

original: ekaikameṣu sa vikampayituṃ samarthaḥ patrāṇi loptumapi tūtsahate na śaktaḥ /
analyzed: ekaikam eṣu sa vikampayitum samarthaḥ patrāṇi loptum api tu utsahate na śaktaḥ

original: viṣvak sthitān yadi bhavān pratibhetsyatīmānekeṣuṇā tarhi vālivadhe samarthaḥ / 6.6 /
analyzed: sthitān yadi bhavān pratibhetsyati imān eka iṣuṇā tarhi vāli vadhe samarthaḥ  /

original: jetuṃ caturguṇabalo hi pumān prabhuḥ syāddhantuṃ śatādhikabalo'tibalaṃ suśaktaḥ /
analyzed: jetum caturguṇa balaḥ hi pumān prabhuḥ syāt hantum śata adhika bala uti balam su śaktaḥ

original: tasmādimān harihayātmajabāhvalopyapatrān vibhidya mama saṃ śayamāṇsu bhindhi / 6.7 /
analyzed: tasmāt imān hari haya ātmaja bāhu alopya patrān vibhidya mama sam bhindhi  /

original: śrutvā'sya vākyamavamṛśya diteḥ sutāṃ stān dhāturvarādakhilapumbhirabhedyarūpān /
analyzed: śrutvā asya vākyam avamṛśya diteḥ sutām stān dhātuḥ varāt akhila pumbhiḥ abhedya rūpān

original: brahmatvamāptumacalaṃ tapasi pravṛtt ānekeṣuṇā sapadi tān pravibheda rāmaḥ / 6.8 /
analyzed: brahmatvam āptum acalam tapasi pravṛtt ān eka iṣuṇā sapadi tān pravibheda rāmaḥ

original: sandhāya kārmukavare niśite tu bāṇe'thā'kṛṣya dakṣiṇabhujena tadā pramukte /
analyzed: sandhāya kārmuka vare niśite tu bāṇethā ākṛṣya dakṣiṇa bhujena tadā pramukte

original: rāmeṇa satvaramanantabalena sarve cūrṇīkṛt āḥ sapadi te taravo raveṇa / 6.9 /
analyzed: rāmeṇa satvaram anantabalena sarve sapadi te taravaḥ raveṇa  /

original: bhittvā catān sagirikuṃ bhagavatpramuktaḥ pātāl . asaptakamathātra ca ye tvavadhyāḥ /
analyzed: bhittvā ca tān sa girikum bhagavat pramuktaḥ pātāl asaptakam atha atra ca ye tu avadhyāḥ

original: nāmnā'surāḥ kumudino'bjajavākyarakṣāḥ sarvāṃ śca tānadahadāṇsu śaraḥ sa ekaḥ / 6.10 /
analyzed: nāmnā asurāḥ kumudinā ubja ja vākyarakṣāḥ śaraḥ saḥ ekaḥ  /

original: naitad vicitramamitorubalasya viṣṇoryatpreraṇāt sapavanasya bhavet pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: na etat vicitram amita uru balasya viṣṇoḥ yat preraṇāt sa pavanasya bhavet pravṛttiḥ

original: lokasya saprakṛtikasya sarudrakāla karmādikasya tadapīdamananyasādhyam / 6.11 /
analyzed: lokasya sa prakṛtikasya sa rudra kāla karma ādikasya tat api idam ananya sādhyam

original: lii.dṛṣṭvā balaṃ bhagavato'tha harīśvaro'sāvagre nidhāya tamayāt puramagrajasya /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā balam bhagavataḥ utha hari īśvarā usau agre nidhāya tam ayāt puram agrajasya

original: āṇsrutya rāvamanujasya bilāt sa cā'gādabhyenamāṇsu dayitāprativārito'pi / 6.12 /
analyzed: rāva manujasya bilāt sa ca agāt abhyenam āṇsu dayitā prativāritaḥ api

original: tanmuṣṭibhiḥ pratihataḥ prayayāvaśaktaḥ sugrīva āṇsu raghupo'pi hi dharmamīkṣan /
analyzed: tad muṣṭibhiḥ pratihataḥ prayayau aśaktaḥ sugrīvaḥ hi dharmam īkṣan

original: nainaṃ jaghāna viditākhilalokaceṣṭo'pyenaṃ sa āha yudhi vāṃ na mayā viviktau / 6.13 /
analyzed: na enam jaghāna vidita akhila loka ceṣṭaḥ upi enam saḥ āha yudhi vām na mayā viviktau  /

original: saubhrātrameṣa yadi vāñchati vālinaiva nāhaṃ nirāgasamathāgrajaniṃ haniṣye /
analyzed: saubhrātram eṣa yadi vāñchati vālinā eva na aham nirāgasam atha agrajanim haniṣye

original: dīrghaḥ sahodaragato na bhaveddhi kopo dīrgho'pi kāraṇamṛte vinivartate ca / 6.14 /
analyzed: dīrghaḥ sahodara gataḥ na bhavet hi kopaḥ dīrghaḥ api kāraṇam ṛte vinivartate ca  /

original: kopaḥ sahodarajane punarantakāle prāyo nivṛttimupagacchati tāpakaśca /
analyzed: kopaḥ sahodara jane punar anta kāle prāyas nivṛttim upagacchati tāpakaḥ ca

original: ekasya bhaṅga iti naiva jhaṭityapāstadoṣo nihantumiha yogya iti sma mene / 6.15 /
analyzed: ekasya bhaṅgaḥ iti nā eva jhaṭiti apāsta doṣaḥ nihantum iha yogyaḥ iti sma mene

original: tasmānna bandhujanage janite virodhe kāryo vadhastadanubandhibhirāṇsvitīha /
analyzed: tasmāt na bandhu jana ge janite virodhe kāryaḥ vadhaḥ tad anubandhibhiḥ āṇsu iti iha

original: dharmaṃ pradarśayitumeva raveḥ sutasya bhāvī na tāpa iti vicca na taṃ jaghāna / 6.16 /
analyzed: dharmam pradarśayitum eva raveḥ sutasya bhāvī na tāpaḥ iti vid ca na tam jaghāna  /

original: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakalaṣemuṣisantateśca tasyājñatā kuta iheśavarasya viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakala ṣemuṣi santateḥ ca tasya ajña tā kutas iha īśa varasya viṣṇoḥ

original: tenodito'tha sudṛḍhaṃ punarāgatena vajropamaṃ śaramamūmucadindrasūnoḥ / 6.17 /
analyzed: tena uditā utha su dṛḍham punar āgatena vajra upamam śaram amūmucat indrasūnoḥ  /

original: rāmājñayaiva latayā ravije vibhakte vāyoḥ sutena raghupeṇa ṇsare ca mukte /
analyzed: rāma ājñayā eva latayā ravi je vibhakte vāyoḥ sutena raghupeṇa ca mukte

original: śrutvā'sya śabdamatulaṃ hṛdi tena viddha indrātmajo giririvāpatadāṇsu sannaḥ / 6.18 /
analyzed: śrutvā asya śabdam atulam hṛdi tena viddhaḥ indra ātmajaḥ giriḥ iva apatat āṇsu sannaḥ  /

original: bhakto mamaiṣa yadi māmabhipaśyatīha pādau dhruvaṃ mama sameṣyati nirvicāraḥ /
analyzed: bhaktaḥ mama eṣa yadi mām abhipaśyati iha pādau dhruvam mama sameṣyati nirvicāraḥ

original: yogyo vadho nahi janasya padānatasya rājyārthinā ravisutena vadho'rthitaśca / 6.19 /
analyzed: yogyaḥ vadhaḥ na hi janasya pada ānatasya rājya arthinā ravisutena vadha ūrthitaḥ ca

original: kāryaṃ hyabhīṣṭamapi tat praṇatasya pūrvaṃ śasto vadho na padayoḥ praṇatasya caiva /
analyzed: kāryam hi abhīṣṭam api tat praṇatasya pūrvam śastaḥ vadhaḥ na padayoḥ praṇatasya ca eva

original: tasmādadṛśyatanureva nihanmi śakraputraṃ tvitīha tamadṛṣṭatayā jaghāna / 6.20 /
analyzed: tasmāt adṛśya tanuḥ eva nihanmi śakra putram tu iti iha tam adṛṣṭa tayā jaghāna  /

original: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakalalokabalasya nityaṃ pūrṇāvyayoccabalavīryatanuḥ svatantraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakala loka balasya nityam pūrṇa avyaya ucca bala vīrya tanuḥ svatantraḥ

original: kiṃ tasya dṛṣṭipathagasya ca vānaro'yaṃ kartaiśacāpamapi yena purā vibhagnam / 6.21 /
analyzed: kim tasya dṛṣṭi patha gasya ca vānara uyam kartaiśa cāpam api yena purā vibhagnam

original: sanne'tha vālini jagāma ca tasya pārśvaṃ prāhainamārdravacasā yadi vāñchasi tvam /
analyzed: vālini jagāma ca tasya pārśvam prāha enam ārdra vacasā yadi vāñchasi tvam

original: ujjīvayiṣya iti naicchadasau tvadagre ko nāma necchati mṛtiṃ puruṣottameti / 6.22 /
analyzed: ujjīvayiṣye iti na aicchat asau tvad agre kaḥ nāma na icchati mṛtim puruṣottama iti

original: kāryāṇi tasya caramāṇi vidhāya putraṃ tvagre nidhāya ravijaḥ kapirājya āsīt /
analyzed: kāryāṇi tasya caramāṇi vidhāya putram tu agre nidhāya ravijaḥ kapi rājye āsīt

original: liii.rāmo'pi tadgirivare caturo'tha māsān dṛṣṭvā ghanāgamamuvāsa salakṣmaṇo'sau / 6.23 /
analyzed: tad giri vare caturaḥ atha māsān dṛṣṭvā ghana āgamam uvāsa sa lakṣmaṇā usau  /

original: athātisakte kṣitipe kapīnāṃ pravismṛte rāmakṛtopakāre /
analyzed: atha ati sakte kṣitipe kapīnām pravismṛte rāma kṛta upakāre

original: prasahya taṃ buddhimatāṃ variṣṭho rāmāṅghribhakto hanumānuvāca / 6.24 /
analyzed: prasahya tam buddhimatām variṣṭhaḥ rāma aṅghri bhaktaḥ hanumān uvāca  /

original: na vismṛtiste raghuvaryakārye kāryā kathañcit sa hi no'bhipūjyaḥ /
analyzed: na vismṛtiḥ te raghu varya kārye kāryā kathañcid sa hi na ubhipūjyaḥ

original: na cet svayaṃ kartumabhīṣṭamadya te dhruvaṃ balenāpi hi kārayāmi / 6.25 /
analyzed: na ced svayam kartum abhīṣṭam adya te dhruvam balena api hi kārayāmi

original: sa evamuktvā harirājasannidhau dvīpeṣu saptasvapi vānarān prati /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktvā hari rāja sannidhau dvīpeṣu saptasu api vānarān prati

original: sammel . anāyā'śugatīn sma vānarān prasthāpayāmāsa samastaśaḥ prabhuḥ / 6.26 /
analyzed: sma vānarān prasthāpayāmāsa samastaśas prabhuḥ

original: harīśvarājñāpraṇidhānapūrvakaṃ hanūmatā te prahitā hivānarāḥ /
analyzed: hari īśvara ājñā praṇidhāna pūrvakam hanūmatā te prahitāḥ hi vānarāḥ

original: samastaśailadrumaṣaṇḍasaṃ sthitān harīn samādāya tadā'bhijagmuḥ / 6.27 /
analyzed: samasta śaila druma ṣaṇḍa sam sthitān harīn samādāya tadā abhijagmuḥ

original: tadaiva rāmo'pi hi bhogasaktaṃ pramattamālakṣya kapīśvaraṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tadā eva rāmaḥ api hi bhoga saktam pramattam ālakṣya kapi īśvaram prabhuḥ

original: jagāda saumitrimidaṃ vaco me plavaṅgameśāya vadā'śu yāhi / 6.28 /
analyzed: jagāda saumitrim idam vacaḥ me plavaṅgama īśāya vada āśu yāhi

original: yadi pramatto'si madīyakārye nayāmyahaṃ tvendrasutasya mārgam /
analyzed: yadi pramattaḥ asi madīya kārye nayāmi aham tvā indra sutasya mārgam

original: prāyaḥ svakārye pratipādite hi madoddhatā na pratikartumīśate / 6.29 /
analyzed: prāyas sva kārye pratipādite hi mada uddhatāḥ na pratikartum īśate

original: itīḍyarāmeṇa samīrite tadā yayau sabāṇaḥ sadhanuḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti iḍya rāmeṇa samīrite tadā yayau sa bāṇaḥ sa dhanuḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ tena sahaiva tāpanirbhayād yayau rāmapadāntikaṃ tvaran / 6.30 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tam tena saha eva tāpa nirbhayāt yayau rāma pada antikam tvaran

original: hanūmataḥ sādhuvacobhirāṇsu prasannacetasyadhipe kapīnām /
analyzed: hanūmataḥ sādhu vacobhiḥ āṇsu prasanna cetasi adhipe kapīnām

original: samāgate sarvaharipravīraiḥ sahaiva taṃ vīkṣya nananda rāghavaḥ / 6.31 /
analyzed: samāgate sarva hari pravīraiḥ saha eva tam vīkṣya nananda rāghavaḥ

original: sasambhramaṃ taṃ patitaṃ padābjayostvaran samutthāpya samāṇsliṣat prabhuḥ /
analyzed: sa sambhramam tam patitam pada abjayoḥ tvaran samutthāpya prabhuḥ

original: sa copaviṣṭo jagadīśasannidhau tadājñayaivā'diśadāṇsu vānarān / 6.32 /
analyzed: sa ca upaviṣṭaḥ jagadīśa sannidhau tad ājñayā eva ādiśat āṇsu vānarān

original: samastadikṣu prahiteṣu tena prabhurhanūmantamidaṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: samasta dikṣu prahiteṣu tena prabhuḥ hanūmantam idam babhāṣe

original: na kaścidīśastvadṛte'sti sādhane samastakāryapravarasya me'sya / 6.33 /
analyzed: na kaścid īśaḥ tvat ṛte asti sādhane samasta kārya pravarasya

original: atastvameva pratiyāhi dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ samādāya madaṅgulīyakam /
analyzed: atas tvam eva pratiyāhi dakṣiṇām diśam samādāya mad aṅgulīyakam

original: itīrito'sau puruṣottamena yayau diśaṃ t āṃ yuvarājayuktaḥ / 6.34 /
analyzed: iti īritā usau puruṣottamena yayau diśam yuvarāja yuktaḥ  /

original: liv.samastadikṣu pratiyāpitā hi te harīśvarājñāmupadhārya māsataḥ /
analyzed: pratiyāpitāḥ hi te hari īśvara ājñām upadhārya māsataḥ

original: samāyayuste'ṅgadajāmbavanmukhāḥ sutena vāyoḥ sahitā nacā'yayuḥ / 6.35 /
analyzed: samāyayuḥ te iṅgada jāmbavat mukhāḥ sutena vāyoḥ sahitāḥ na ca āyayuḥ  /

original: samastadurgapravaraṃ durāsadaṃ vimārgatāṃ vindhyagiriṃ mahātmanām /
analyzed: samasta durga pravaram durāsadam vimārgatām vindhya girim mahātmanām

original: gataḥ sa kālo harirāḍudīritaḥ samāsadaṃ ścātha bilaṃ mahādbhutam / 6.36 /
analyzed: gataḥ sa kālaḥ hari rāj udīritaḥ samāsadam śca atha bilam mahā adbhutam

original: kṛtaṃ mayenātivicitramuttamaṃ samīkṣya tat tāra uvāca cāṅgadam /
analyzed: kṛtam mayena ati vicitram uttamam samīkṣya tat tāraḥ uvāca ca aṅgadam

original: vayaṃ na yāmo harirājasannidhiṃ vilaṅghito naḥ samayo yato'sya / 6.37 /
analyzed: vayam na yāmaḥ hari rāja sannidhim vilaṅghitaḥ naḥ samayaḥ yatas asya

original: durāsado'sāvaticaṇḍaṇsāsano haniṣyati tvāmapi kiṃ madādikān /
analyzed: haniṣyati tvām api kim mad ādikān

original: agamyametad bilamāpya tat sukhaṃ vasāma sarve kimasāvihā'caret / 6.38 /
analyzed: agamyam etat bilam āpya tat sukham vasāma sarve kim asau iha ācaret  /

original: na caiva rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena prayojanaṃ no vanacāriṇāṃ sadā /
analyzed: na ca eva rāmeṇa sa lakṣmaṇena prayojanam naḥ vana cāriṇām sadā

original: na ceha naḥ pīḍayituṃ sa ca kṣamastato mameyaṃ suviniścitā matiḥ / 6.39 /
analyzed: na ca iha naḥ pīḍayitum sa ca kṣamaḥ tatas mama iyam su viniścitā matiḥ

original: itīritaṃ mātulavākyamāṇsu sa ādade vālisuto'pi sādaram /
analyzed: iti īritam mātula vākyam āṇsu saḥ ādade vāli sutaḥ upi sa ādaram

original: uvāca vākyaṃ ca na no harīśvaraḥ kṣamī bhavellaṅghitaśāsanānām / 6.40 /
analyzed: uvāca vākyam ca na naḥ hari īśvaraḥ kṣamī bhavet laṅghita śāsanānām

original: rājyārthinā yena hi ghātito'grajo hṛt āṇsca dārāḥ sunṛśaṃ sakena /
analyzed: rājya arthinā yena hi ghātita ugrajaḥ dārāḥ su nṛśam sakena

original: sa naḥ kathaṃ rakṣati śāsanātigān nirāṇsrayān durbalakān bale sthitaḥ / 6.41 /
analyzed: sa naḥ katham rakṣati śāsana atigān nirāṇsrayān durbalakān bale sthitaḥ  /

original: itīrite śakrasutātmajena tatheti hocuḥ saha jāmbavanmukhāḥ /
analyzed: iti īrite śakrasuta ātmajena tathā iti ha ūcuḥ saha jāmbavat mukhāḥ

original: sarve'pi teṣāmatha caikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmānidamābabhāṣe / 6.42 /
analyzed: sarve api teṣām atha ca aikamatyam dṛṣṭvā hanūmān idam ābabhāṣe

original: vijñātametaddhi mayā'ṅgadasya rājyāya tārābhihitaṃ hi vākyam /
analyzed: vijñātam etat hi mayā aṅgadasya rājyāya tārā abhihitam hi vākyam

original: sādhyaṃ na caitannahi vāyusūnū rāmapratīpaṃ vacanaṃ saheta / 6.43 /
analyzed: sādhyam na ca etat nahi vāyusūnuḥ rāma pratīpam vacanam saheta

original: na cāhamākraṣṭumupāyato'pi śakyaḥ kathañcit sakalaiḥ sametaiḥ /
analyzed: na ca aham ākraṣṭum upāyatas api śakyaḥ kathañcid sakalaiḥ sametaiḥ

original: sanmārgato naiva ca rāghavasya durantaśakterbilamapradhṛṣyam / 6.44 /
analyzed: sat mārgataḥ nā eva ca rāghavasya duranta śakteḥ bilam apradhṛṣyam

original: vaco mamaitad yadi cā'dareṇa grāhyaṃ bhaved vastadatipriyaṃ me /
analyzed: vacaḥ mama etat yadi ca ādareṇa grāhyam bhavet vaḥ tat ati priyam me

original: na ced balādapyanaye pravṛtt ān praśāsya sanmārgagatān karomi / 6.45 /
analyzed: na ced balāt api anaye pravṛtt ān praśāsya sat mārga gatān karomi

original: itīritaṃ tat pavanātmajasya śrutvā'tibhīt ā dhṛtamūkabhāvāḥ /
analyzed: iti īritam tat pavanātmajasya śrutvā ati bhīt ā dhṛta mūka bhāvāḥ

original: sarve'nujagmustamathādrimukhyaṃ mahendramāseduragādhabodhāḥ / 6.46 /
analyzed: sarve nujagmuḥ tam atha adri mukhyam mahendram āseduḥ agādha bodhāḥ

original: lv.nirīkṣya te sāgaramapradhṛṣyamapārameyaṃ sahasā viṣaṇṇāḥ /
analyzed: nirīkṣya te sāgaram apradhṛṣyam apārameyam sahasā viṣaṇṇāḥ

original: dṛḍhaṃ nirāṇsāṇsca matiṃ hi dadhruḥ prāyopaveśāya tathā ca cakruḥ / 6.47 /
analyzed: dṛḍham matim hi dadhruḥ prāya upaveśāya tathā ca cakruḥ  /

original: prāyopaviṣṭāṇsca kathā vadanto rāmasya saṃ sāravimuktidātuḥ /
analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭān ca kathāḥ vadantaḥ rāmasya sam sāra vimukti dātuḥ

original: jaṭāyuṣaḥ pātanamūcuretat sampātināmnaḥ śravaṇaṃ jagāma / 6.48 /
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣaḥ pātanam ūcuḥ etat sampāti nāmnaḥ śravaṇam jagāma

original: tasyāgrajo'sāvaruṇasya sūnuḥ sūryasya bimbaṃ saha tena yātaḥ /
analyzed: tasya agrajā usāvaruṇasya sūnuḥ sūryasya bimbam saha tena yātaḥ

original: javaṃ parīkṣannatha taṃ sutaptaṃ guptvā patatrakṣayamāpya cāpatat / 6.49 /
analyzed: javam parīkṣan atha tam su taptam guptvā patatra kṣayam āpya ca apatat

original: sa dagdhapakṣaḥ savitṛpratāpācchrutvaiva rāmasya kathāṃ sapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa dagdha pakṣaḥ savitṛ pratāpāt śrutvā eva rāmasya kathām sa pakṣaḥ

original: bhūtvā punaścāpi mṛtiṃ jaṭāyuṣaḥ śuśrāva pṛṣṭvā punareva samyak / 6.50 /
analyzed: bhūtvā punar ca api mṛtim jaṭāyuṣaḥ śuśrāva pṛṣṭvā punar eva samyak

original: sa rāvaṇasyātha gatiṃ sutoktāṃ nivedya dṛṣṭvā janakātmajākṛtim /
analyzed: sa rāvaṇasya atha gatim suta uktām nivedya dṛṣṭvā janakātmaja ākṛtim

original: svayaṃ tathā'śokavane niṣaṇṇāmavocadebhyo haripuṅgavebhyaḥ / 6.51 /
analyzed: svayam tathā aśoka vane niṣaṇṇām avocat ebhyaḥ hari puṅgavebhyaḥ

original: tatastu te brahmasutena pṛṣṭā nyavedayannātmabalaṃ pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: tatas tu te brahmasutena pṛṣṭāḥ nyavedayan ātma balam pṛthak pṛthak

original: daśaiva cā'rabhya daśottarasya kramāt patho yojanato'tiyāne / 6.52 /
analyzed: daśa eva ca ārabhya daśa uttarasya kramāt pathaḥ

original: sanīlamaindadvividāḥ satārāḥ sarve'pyaśītyāḥ parato na śaktāḥ /
analyzed: sa nīla mainda dvividāḥ sa tārāḥ sarve pi aśītyāḥ paratas na śaktāḥ

original: gantuṃ yadā'thā'tmabalaṃ sa jāmbavān jagāda tasmāt punaraṣṭamāṃ śam / 6.53 /
analyzed: gantum yadā atha ātma balam sa jāmbavān jagāda tasmāt punar aṣṭamām śam

original: baleryadā viṣṇuravāpa lokāṃ stribhiḥ kramairnandiravaṃ prakurvatā /
analyzed: baleḥ yadā viṣṇuḥ avāpa lokān stribhiḥ kramaiḥ nandi ravam prakurvatā

original: tadā mayā bhrāntamidaṃ jagattrayaṃ savedanaṃ j ānu mamā'sa merutaḥ / 6.54 /
analyzed: tadā mayā bhrāntam idam jagattrayam sa vedanam mama āsa merutaḥ

original: ato javo me nahi pūrvasammitaḥ purā tvahaṃ ṣaṇṇavatiplavo'smi /
analyzed: atas javaḥ me nahi pūrva sammitaḥ purā tu aham ṣaṇṇavati plavaḥ asmi

original: tataḥ kumāro'ṅgada āha cāsmācchataṃ plaveyaṃ na tato'bhijāne / 6.55 /
analyzed: tatas kumāra uṅgadaḥ āha ca asmāt śatam plaveyam na tatas abhijāne

original: apūrite taiḥ sakalaiḥ śatasya gamāgame śatrubalaṃ ca vīkṣya /
analyzed: a pūrite taiḥ sakalaiḥ śatasya gama āgame śatru balam ca vīkṣya

original: sudurgamatvaṃ ca niśācareśapuryāḥ sa dhātuḥ suta ābabhāṣe / 6.56 /
analyzed: su durgama tvam ca niśācara īśa puryāḥ sa dhātuḥ sutaḥ ābabhāṣe

original: ayaṃ hi gṛdhraḥ śatayojanaṃ giriṃ trikūṭamāheta utātra vighnāḥ /
analyzed: ayam hi gṛdhraḥ śata yojanam girim trikūṭam āha itas uta atra vighnāḥ

original: bhaveyuranye'pi tato hanūmānekaḥ samartho na paro'sti kaścit / 6.57 /
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ anye api tatas hanūmān ekaḥ samarthaḥ na paraḥ asti kaścid

original: uktvā sa itthaṃ punarāha sūnuṃ prāṇasya niḥ sīmabalaṃ praśaṃ sayan /
analyzed: uktvā saḥ ittham punar āha sūnum prāṇasya niḥ sīmabalam praśam sayan

original: lvi.tvameka evātra paraṃ samarthaḥ kuruṣva caitat paripāhi vānarān / 6.58 /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva atra param samarthaḥ kuruṣva ca etat paripāhi vānarān  /

original: itīrito'sau hanumān nijepsitaṃ teṣāmaśaktiṃ prakaṭāṃ vidhāya /
analyzed: iti īrita usau hanumān nija īpsitam teṣām aśaktim prakaṭām vidhāya

original: avardhatā'śu pravicintya rāmaṃ supūrṇaṇsaktiṃ caritostadājñām / 6.59 /
analyzed: avardhata āśu pravicintya rāmam caritoḥ tad ājñām

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
śrīrāmacarite samudrataraṇaniścayo nāma ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: śrī rāmacarite samudrataraṇaniścayaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: lvii.(hanūmatpratiyānam)
analyzed: lvii hanumat pratiyānam

original: atha saptamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha saptamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / rāmāya śāṇsvatasuvistṛtaṣaḍguṇāya sarveśvarāya sukhasāramahārṇavāya /
analyzed: om rāmāya śāṇsvata su vistṛta ṣaḍguṇāya sarveśvarāya sukha sāra mahā arṇavāya

original: natvā lilaṅghayiṣurarṇavamutpapāta niṣpīḍya taṃ girivaraṃ pavanasya sūnuḥ / 7.1 /
analyzed: natvā lilaṅghayiṣuḥ arṇavam utpapāta niṣpīḍya tam giri varam pavanasya sūnuḥ  /

original: cukṣobha vāridhiranuprayayau ca śīghraṃ yādogaṇaiḥ saha tadīyabalābhikṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: cukṣobha vāridhiḥ anuprayayau ca śīghram yādaḥ gaṇaiḥ saha tadīya bala abhikṛṣṭaḥ

original: vṛkṣāṇsca parvatagatāḥ pavanena pūrvaṃ kṣipto'rṇave girirudāgamadasya hetoḥ / 7.2 /
analyzed: vṛkṣāṇs ca parvata gatāḥ pavanena pūrvam kṣipta ūrṇave giriḥ udāgamat asya hetoḥ

original: syālo harasya giripakṣavināṇsakāle kṣiptvā'rṇave sa marutorvaritātmapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: syālaḥ harasya kṣiptvā arṇave sa marutoḥ varita ātma pakṣaḥ

original: haimo giriḥ pavanajasya tu viśramārthamudbhidya vāridhimavarddhadanekasānuḥ / 7.3 /
analyzed: haimaḥ giriḥ pavanajasya tu viśrama artham udbhidya vāridhim avarddhat aneka sānuḥ

original: naivātra viśramaṇamaicchata niḥ śramo'sau niḥ sīmapauruṣaguṇasya kutaḥ śramo'sya /
analyzed: na eva atra viśramaṇam aicchata niḥ śramaḥ asau niḥ sīma pauruṣa guṇasya kutas śramaḥ asya

original: āṇsliṣya parvatavaraṃ sa dadarśa gacchan devaistu nāgajananīṃ prahitāṃ vareṇa / 7.4 /
analyzed: parvata varam sa dadarśa gacchan devaiḥ tu nāgajananīm prahitām vareṇa

original: jijñāsubhirnijabalaṃ tava bhakṣametu yadyat tvamicchasi tadityamaroditāyāḥ /
analyzed: jijñāsubhiḥ nija balam tava bhakṣam etu yat yat tvam icchasi tat iti amara uditāyāḥ

original: āsyaṃ praviśya sapadi praviniḥ sṛto'smād devānanandayaduta svṛtameṣu rakṣan / 7.5 /
analyzed: āsyam praviśya sapadi praviniḥ sṛtaḥ usmāt devān anandayat uta svṛtameṣu rakṣan  /

original: dṛṣṭvā surapraṇayitāṃ balamasya cograṃ devāḥ pratuṣṭuvuramuṃ sumanobhivṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sura praṇayi tām balam asya ca ugram devāḥ pratuṣṭuvuḥ amum su manobhi vṛṣṭyā

original: tairādṛtaḥ punarasau viyataiva gacchan chāyāgrahaṃ pratidadarśa ca siṃ hikākhyam / 7.6 /
analyzed: taiḥ ādṛtaḥ punar asau viyatā eva gacchan chāyā graham pratidadarśa ca sim hika ākhyam

original: laṅkāvanāya sakalasya ca nigrahe'syāḥ sāmarthyamapratihataṃ pradadau vidhātā /
analyzed: laṅkā vanāya sakalasya ca nigrahesyāḥ sāmarthyam apratihatam pradadau vidhātā

original: chāyāmavākṣipadasau pavanātmajasya so'syāḥ śarīramanuviśya bibheda cā'śu / 7.7 /
analyzed: chāyām avākṣipat asau pavanātmajasya sā usyāḥ śarīram anuviśya bibheda ca āśu

original: nissīmamātmabalamityanudarśayāno hatvaiva tāmapi vidhātṛvarābhiguptām /
analyzed: nissīmam ātma balam iti anudarśayānaḥ hatvā eva tām api vidhātṛ vara abhiguptām

original: lambe sa lambaśikhare nipapāta laṅkāprākārarūpakagirāvatha sañcukoca / 7.8 /
analyzed: lambe sa lamba śikhare nipapāta laṅkā prākāra rūpaka girau atha sañcukoca  /

original: bhūtvā bilāl . asamito niśi tāṃ purīṃ ca prāpsyan dadarśa nijarūpavatīṃ sa laṅkām /
analyzed: bhūtvā bilāt a samitaḥ niśi tām purīm ca prāpsyan dadarśa nija rūpavatīm sa laṅkām

original: ruddho'nayā'śvatha vijitya ca tāṃ svamuṣṭipiṣṭāṃ tayā'numata eva viveśa laṅkām / 7.9 /
analyzed: ruddhaḥ ūnayā aśu atha vijitya ca tām sva muṣṭi piṣṭām tayā anumataḥ eva viveśa laṅkām

original: mārgamāṇo bahiścāntaḥ so'śokavanikātal . e /
analyzed: mārgamāṇaḥ bahis ca antar

original: dadarśa śiṃ śapāvṛkṣamūlasthitaramākṛtim / 7.10 /
analyzed: dadarśa śim śapā vṛkṣa mūla sthita ram ākṛtim

original: naralokaviḍambasya jānan rāmasya hṛdgatam /
analyzed: nara loka viḍambasya jānan rāmasya hṛdgatam

original: tasya ceṣṭānusāreṇa kṛtvā ceṣṭāṇsca saṃ vidaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ceṣṭā anusāreṇa kṛtvā ceṣṭāṇsca sam vidaḥ

original: lviii.t ādṛkceṣṭāsametāyā aṅgulīyamadāt tataḥ / 7.11 /
analyzed: ā dṛś ceṣṭā sametāyāḥ aṅgulīyam dāt tatas

original: sīt āyā yāni caivā'sannākṛtestāni sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: āyāḥ yāni ca eva āsanna ākṛteḥ tāni sarvaśas

original: bhūṣaṇāni dvidhā bhūtvā tānyevā'saṃ stathaiva ca / 7.12 /
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni dvidhā bhūtvā tāni eva āsam tathā eva ca

original: atha cūl . āmaṇiṃ divyaṃ dātuṃ rāmāya sā dadau /
analyzed: atha cūl āmaṇim divyam dātum rāmāya sā dadau

original: yadyapyetanna paśyanti niśācaragaṇāstu te /
analyzed: yadi api etat na paśyanti niśācara gaṇāḥ tu te

original: dyulokacāriṇaḥ sarvaṃ paśyantyṛṣaya eva ca / 7.13 /
analyzed: div loka cāriṇaḥ sarvam paśyanti ṛṣayaḥ eva ca

original: teṣāṃ viḍambanāyaiva daityānāṃ vañcanāya ca /
analyzed: teṣām viḍambanāya eva daityānām vañcanāya ca

original: paśyatāṃ kalimukhyānāṃ viḍambo'yaṃ kṛto bhavet / 7.14 /
analyzed: paśyatām kali mukhyānām viḍambaḥ yam kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: kṛtvā kāryamidaṃ sarvaṃ viśaṅkaḥ pavanātmajaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā kāryam idam sarvam viśaṅkaḥ pavanātmajaḥ

original: ātmāviṣkaraṇe cittaṃ cakre matimatāṃ varaḥ / 7.15 /
analyzed: ātma āviṣkaraṇe cittam cakre matimatām varaḥ

original: atha vanamakhilaṃ tad rāvaṇasyāvalupya kṣitiruhamimamekaṃ varjayitvā'śu vīraḥ /
analyzed: atha vanam akhilam tat rāvaṇasya avalupya kṣitiruham imam ekam varjayitvā āśu vīraḥ

original: rajanicaravināṇsaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇo'tivelaṃ muhuratiravanādī toraṇaṃ cā'ruroha / 7.16 /
analyzed: rajanicara vināṇsam kāṅkṣamāṇā utivelam muhur ati rava nādī toraṇam ca āruroha  /

original: athāṇsṛṇod daśānanaḥ kapīndraceṣṭitaṃ param /
analyzed: daśānanaḥ kapīndra ceṣṭitam param

original: dideśa kiṅkarān bahūn kapirnigṛhyatāmiti / 7.17 /
analyzed: dideśa kiṅkarān bahūn kapiḥ nigṛhyatām iti

original: samastaśo vimṛtyavo varāddharasya kiṅkarāḥ /
analyzed: samastaśas vimṛtyavaḥ varāt harasya kiṅkarāḥ

original: samāsadan mahābalam surāntarātmano'ṅgajam / 7.18 /
analyzed: samāsadan mahā balam sura antarātmanā uṅgajam

original: aṇsītikoṭiyūthapaṃ purassarāṣṭakāyutam /
analyzed: aṇ sīti koṭi yūthapam purassara aṣṭaka ayutam

original: anekahetisaṅkulaṃ kapīndramāvṛṇod balam / 7.19 /
analyzed: aneka heti saṅkulam kapi indram āvṛṇot balam

original: samāvṛtastathā'yudhaiḥ sa tāḍitaśca tairbhṛśam /
analyzed: samāvṛtaḥ tathā āyudhaiḥ sa tāḍitaḥ ca taiḥ bhṛśam

original: cakāra tān samastaśastal . aprahāracūrṇit ān / 7.20 /
analyzed: cakāra tān

original: punaśca mantriputrakān sa rāvaṇapracoditān /
analyzed: punar ca mantri putrakān sa rāvaṇa pracoditān

original: mamarda sapta parvataprabhān varābhirakṣit ān / 7.21 /
analyzed: mamarda sapta parvata prabhān vara abhirakṣit ān

original: balāgragāminastathā saśarvavāksugarvitān /
analyzed: bala agra gāminaḥ tathā sa śarva vāc su garvitān

original: nihatya sarvarakṣasāṃ tṛtīyabhāgamakṣiṇot / 7.22 /
analyzed: nihatya sarva rakṣasām tṛtīya bhāgam akṣiṇot  /

original: lix.anaupamaṃ harerbalaṃ niśamya rākṣasādhipaḥ /
analyzed: lixana aupamam hareḥ balam niśamya rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: kumāramakṣamātmanaḥ samaṃ sutaṃ nyayojayat / 7.23 /
analyzed: kumāram akṣam ātmanaḥ samam sutam nyayojayat  /

original: sa sarvalokasākṣiṇaḥ sutaṃ śarairvavarṣa ha/
analyzed: sa sarva loka sākṣiṇaḥ sutam śaraiḥ vavarṣa ha

original: śitairvarāstramantritairna cainamabhyacālayat / 7.24 /
analyzed: śitaiḥ vara astra mantritaiḥ na ca enam abhyacālayat  /

original: sa maṇḍamadhyakāsutaṃ samīkṣya rāvaṇopamam /
analyzed: sa maṇḍa madhyakā sutam samīkṣya rāvaṇa upamam

original: tṛtīya eṣa cāṃ śako balasya hītyacintayat / 7.25 /
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ eṣa śakaḥ balasya hi iti acintayat

original: nidhārya eva rāvaṇaḥ sa rāghavasya nānyathā /
analyzed: nidhāryaḥ eva rāvaṇaḥ sa rāghavasya na anyathā

original: yadīndrajinmayā hato na cāsya śaktirīkṣyate / 7.26 /
analyzed: yadi indrajit mayā hataḥ na ca asya śaktiḥ īkṣyate  /

original: atastayoḥ samo mayā tṛtīya eṣa hanyate /
analyzed: atas tayoḥ samaḥ mayā tṛtīyaḥ eṣa hanyate

original: vicārya caivamāṇsu taṃ padoḥ pragṛhya pupluve / 7.27 /
analyzed: vicārya ca evam āṇsu tam padoḥ pragṛhya pupluve  /

original: sa cakravad bhramāturaṃ vidhāya rāvaṇātmajam /
analyzed: sa cakra vat bhrama āturam vidhāya rāvaṇa ātmajam

original: apothayad dharātal . e kṣaṇena mārutī tanuḥ / 7.28 /
analyzed: apothayat kṣaṇena mārutī tanuḥ   /

original: vicūrṇite dharātal . e nije sute sa rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vicūrṇite nije sute sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: niśamya śokatāpitastadagrajaṃ samādiśat / 7.29 /
analyzed: niśamya śoka tāpitaḥ tad agrajam samādiśat

original: athendrajinmahāṇsarairvarāstrasamprayojitaiḥ /
analyzed: athā indrajit mahāṇsaraiḥ vara astra samprayojitaiḥ

original: tatakṣa vānarottamaṃ na cāṇsakad vicālane / 7.30 /
analyzed: tatakṣa vānara uttamam na vicālane  /

original: athāstramuttamaṃ vidheryuyoja sarvaduṣṣaham /
analyzed: athā astram uttamam vidheḥ yuyoja sarva duṣṣaham

original: sa tena tāḍito harirvyacintayannirākulaḥ / 7.31 /
analyzed: sa tena tāḍitaḥ hariḥ vyacintayat nirākulaḥ

original: mayā varā vilaṅghitā hyanekaśaḥ svayambhuvaḥ /
analyzed: mayā varāḥ vilaṅghitāḥ hi anekaśas svayambhuvaḥ

original: sa mānanīya eva me tato'tra mānayāmyaham / 7.32 /
analyzed: sa mānanīyaḥ eva me tatas utra mānayāmi aham

original: ime ca kuryuratra kiṃ prahṛṣṭarakṣasāṃ gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ime ca kuryuḥ atra kim prahṛṣṭa rakṣasām gaṇāḥ

original: itīha lakṣyameva me sa rāvaṇaṇsca dṛśyate / 7.33 /
analyzed: iti iha lakṣyam eva me sa dṛśyate  /

original: idaṃ samīkṣya baddhavat sthitaṃ kapīndramāṇsu te /
analyzed: idam samīkṣya baddha vat sthitam kapi indra māṇsu te

original: lx.babandhuranyapāṇsakairjagāma cāstramasya tat / 7.34 /
analyzed: babandhuḥ anya pāṇsakaiḥ jagāma ca astram asya tat   /

original: atha pragṛhya taṃ kapiṃ samīpamānayaṃ śca te /
analyzed: atha pragṛhya tam kapim samīpam ānayam śca te

original: niśācareśvarasya taṃ sa pṛṣṭavāṃ śca rāvaṇaḥ / 7.35 /
analyzed: niśācara īśvarasya tam sa pṛṣṭavān śca rāvaṇaḥ

original: kape kuto'si kasya vā kimarthamīdṛśaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: kape kutas asi kasya vā kimartham īdṛśam kṛtam

original: itīritaḥ sa cāvadat praṇamya rāmamīśvaram / 7.36 /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ sa ca avadat praṇamya rāmam īśvaram  /

original: avaihi dūtamāgataṃ durantavikramasya mām /
analyzed: avaihi dūtam āgatam duranta vikramasya mām

original: raghūttamasya mārutiṃ kulakṣaye taveśvaram / 7.37 /
analyzed: raghūttamasya mārutim kula kṣaye tava īśvaram

original: na cet pradāsyasi tvaran raghūttamapriyāṃ tadā /
analyzed: na ced pradāsyasi tvaran raghūttama priyām tadā

original: saputramitrabāndhavo vināṇsamāṇsu yāsyasi / 7.38 /
analyzed: sa putra mitra bāndhavaḥ yāsyasi  /

original: na rāmabāṇadhāraṇe kṣamāḥ sureśvarā api /
analyzed: na rāma bāṇa dhāraṇe kṣamāḥ sura īśvarāḥ api

original: viriñciśarvapūrvakāḥ kimu tvamalpasārakaḥ / 7.39 /
analyzed: viriñci śarva pūrvakāḥ kimu tvam alpa sārakaḥ

original: prakopitasya tasya kaḥ purasthitau kṣamo bhavet /
analyzed: prakopitasya tasya kaḥ pura sthitau kṣamaḥ bhavet

original: surāsuroragādike jagatyacintyakarmaṇaḥ / 7.40 /
analyzed: sura asura uraga ādike jagati acintya karmaṇaḥ

original: itīrite vadhodyataṃ nyavārayad vibhīṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti īrite vadha udyatam nyavārayat vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: sa pucchadāhakarmaṇi nyayojayanniśācarān / 7.41 /
analyzed: sa puccha dāha karmaṇi nyayojayat niśācarān

original: athāsya vastrasañcayaiḥ pidhāya pucchamagnaye /
analyzed: atha asya vastra sañcayaiḥ pidhāya puccham agnaye

original: dadurdadāha nāsya tanmarutsakho hutāṇsanaḥ / 7.42 /
analyzed: daduḥ dadāha na asya tat marut sakhaḥ hutāṇsanaḥ

original: mamarṣa sarvaceṣṭitaṃ sa rakṣasāṃ nirāmayaḥ /
analyzed: mamarṣa sarva ceṣṭitam sa rakṣasām nirāmayaḥ

original: baloddhataśca kautukāt pradagdhumeva tāṃ purīm / 7.43 /
analyzed: bala uddhataḥ ca kautukāt pradagdhum eva tām purīm

original: dadāha cākhilaṃ puraṃ svapucchagena vahninā /
analyzed: dadāha ca akhilam puram sva puccha gena vahninā

original: kṛtistu viśvakarmaṇo'pyadahyatāsya tejasā / 7.44 /
analyzed: kṛtiḥ tu viśvakarmaṇā upi adahyata asya tejasā

original: suvarṇaratnakāritāṃ sa rākṣasottamaiḥ saha /
analyzed: suvarṇa ratna kāritām sa rākṣasa uttamaiḥ saha

original: pradahya sarvaśaḥ purīṃ mudā'nvito jagarja ca / 7.45 /
analyzed: pradahya sarvaśas purīm mudā anvitaḥ jagarja ca

original: lxi.sa rāvaṇaṃ saputrakaṃ tṛṇopamaṃ vidhāya ca /
analyzed: rāvaṇam sa putrakam tṛṇa upamam vidhāya ca

original: tayoḥ prapaśyatoḥ puraṃ vidhāya bhasmasād yayau / 7.46 /
analyzed: tayoḥ prapaśyatoḥ puram vidhāya bhasmasāt yayau  /

original: vilaṅghya cārṇavaṃ punaḥ svajātibhiḥ prapūjitaḥ /
analyzed: vilaṅghya ca arṇavam punar sva jātibhiḥ prapūjitaḥ

original: prabhakṣya vānareśiturmadhu prabhuṃ sameyivān / 7.47 /
analyzed: prabhakṣya vānara īśituḥ madhu prabhum sameyivān

original: rāmaṃ sureśvaramagaṇyaguṇābhirāmaṃ samprāpya sarvakapivīravaraiḥ sametaḥ /
analyzed: rāmam sura īśvaram agaṇya guṇa abhirāmam samprāpya sarva kapi vīra varaiḥ sametaḥ

original: cūl . āmaṇiṃ pavanajaḥ padayornidhāya sarvāṅgakaiḥ praṇatimasya cakāra bhaktyā / 7.48 /
analyzed: ā maṇim pavana jaḥ padayoḥ nidhāya sarva aṅgakaiḥ praṇatim asya cakāra bhaktyā  /

original: rāmo'pi nānyadanudātumamuṣya yogyamatyantabhaktiparamasya vilakṣya kiñcit /
analyzed: rāmaḥ api nā anyat anudātum amuṣya yogyam atyanta bhakti paramasya vilakṣya kiñcid

original: svātmapradānamadhikaṃ pavanātmajasya kurvan samāṇsliṣadamuṃ paramābhituṣṭaḥ / 7.49 /
analyzed: sva ātma pradānam adhikam pavanātmajasya kurvan samāṇsliṣat amum parama abhituṣṭaḥ

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
śrīrāmacarite hanūmatpratiyānaṃ nḸama saptamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: śrī rāmacarite hanūmat pratiyānam saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: lxii.(hanūmati śrīrāmadayādānam)
analyzed: lxii hanūmati śrī rāma dayā dānam

original: atha aṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha aṣṭamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / śrutvā hanūmaduditaṃ kṛtamasya sarvaṃ prītaḥ prayāṇamabhirocayate sa rāmaḥ /
analyzed: om śrutvā hanumant uditam kṛtam asya sarvam prītaḥ prayāṇam abhirocayate sa rāmaḥ

original: āruhya vāyusutamaṅgadagena yuktaḥ saumitriṇā saravijaḥ saha senayā'gāt / 8.1 /
analyzed: āruhya vāyusutam aṅgada gena yuktaḥ saumitriṇā sa ravijaḥ saha senayā āgāt

original: samprāpya dakṣiṇamapānnidhimatra devaḥ śiśye jagadgurutamo'pyavicintyaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: samprāpya dakṣiṇam apān nidhim atra devaḥ śiśye jagadguru tamaḥ upi a vicintya śaktiḥ

original: agre hi mārdavamanuprathayan sa dharmaṃ panthānamarthitumapāmpatitaḥ pratītaḥ / 8.2 /
analyzed: agre hi mārdavam anuprathayan sa dharmam panthānam arthitum apāmpatitaḥ pratītaḥ  /

original: tatrā'jagāma sa vibhīṣaṇanāmadheyo rakṣaḥ pateravarajo'pyatha rāvaṇena /
analyzed: tatra ājagāma sa vibhīṣaṇa nāmadheyaḥ rakṣaḥ pateḥ avarajaḥ api atha rāvaṇena

original: bhakto'dhikaṃ raghupatāviti dharmaniṣṭhastyakto jagāma śaraṇaṃ ca raghūttamaṃ tam / 8.3 /
analyzed: bhakta adhikam raghu patau iti dharma niṣṭhaḥ tyaktaḥ jagāma śaraṇam ca raghūttamam tam

original: brahmātmajena ravijena balapraṇetrā nīlena maindavividāṅgadatārapūrvaiḥ /
analyzed: brahma ātmajena ravijena bala praṇetrā nīlena mainda vivida aṅgada tāra pūrvaiḥ

original: sarvaiśca śatrusadanādupayāta eṣa bhrātā'sya na grahaṇayogya iti sthiroktaḥ / 8.4 /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ ca śatru sadanāt upayātaḥ eṣa bhrātā asya na grahaṇa yogyaḥ iti sthira uktaḥ

original: atrā'ha rūpamaparaṃ baladevatāyā grāhyaḥ sa eṣa nitarāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ /
analyzed: atrā āha rūpam aparam baladevatāyāḥ grāhyaḥ saḥ eṣa nitarām śaraṇam prapannaḥ

original: bhaktaśca rāmapadayorvinaśiṣṇu rakṣo vijñāya rājyamupabhoktumihābhiyātaḥ / 8.5 /
analyzed: bhaktaḥ ca rāma padayoḥ vinaśiṣṇu rakṣaḥ vijñāya rājyam upabhoktum iha abhiyātaḥ

original: ityuktavatyatha hanūmati devadevaḥ saṅgṛhya tadvacanamāha yathaiva pūrvam /
analyzed: iti uktavati atha hanūmati devadevaḥ saṅgṛhya tat vacanam āha yathā eva pūrvam

original: sugrīvahetuta imaṃ sthiramāgrahīṣye pādaprapannamidameva sadā vrataṃ me / 8.6 /
analyzed: sugrīva hetutaḥ imam sthiram āgrahīṣye pāda prapannam idam eva sadā vratam me

original: sabrahmakāḥ suragaṇāḥ sahadaityamartyāḥ sarve sametya ca madaṅgulicālane'pi /
analyzed: sa brahmakāḥ sura gaṇāḥ saha daitya martyāḥ sarve sametya ca mad aṅguli cālane pi

original: neśā bhayaṃ na mama rātricarādamuṣmācchuddhasvabhāva iti cainamahaṃ vijāne / 8.7 /
analyzed: na īśāḥ bhayam na mama rātri carāt amuṣmāt śuddha svabhāvaḥ iti ca enam aham vijāne

original: ityuktavākya uta taṃ svajanaṃ vidhāya rājye'bhyaṣecayadapārasusattvarāṇsiḥ /
analyzed: iti ukta vākyaḥ uta tam sva janam vidhāya rājyebhyaḥ aṣecayat apāra su sattva rāṇsiḥ

original: matvā tṛṇopamamaśeṣasadantakaṃ taṃ rakṣaḥ patiṃ tvavarajasya dadau sa laṅkām / 8.8 /
analyzed: matvā tṛṇa upamam aśeṣa sat antakam tam rakṣaḥ patim tu avarajasya dadau sa laṅkām  /
