original: uvāca saumitrimathāntarātmā samastalokasya marud viṣaṇṇam / 8.60 /
analyzed: uvāca saumitrim atha antarātmā samasta lokasya marut viṣaṇṇam

original: brahmāstrato'nyena na vadhya eṣa varād vidhātuḥ sumukhetyadṛśyaḥ /
analyzed: brahmāstrataḥ anyena na vadhyaḥ eṣa varāt vidhātuḥ su mukha iti adṛśyaḥ

original: rakṣaḥ sutasyāṇsravaṇīyamitthamuktvā samīro'ruhadantarikṣam / 8.61 /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ sutasya āṇ sravaṇīyam ittham uktvā

original: athānujo devatamasya so'straṃ brāhmaṃ tanūje daśakandharasya /
analyzed: atha anujaḥ devatamasya sa ustram brāhmam tanūje daśakandharasya

original: mumoca dagdhaḥ sarathāṇsvasūtastenātikāyaḥ pravaro'stravitsu / 8.62 /
analyzed: mumoca dagdhaḥ sa rathān sva sūtaḥ tena ati kāyaḥ pravara ustra vitsu

original: hateṣu putreṣu sarākṣaseśaḥ svayaṃ prayāṇaṃ samarārthamaicchat /
analyzed: hateṣu putreṣu sa rākṣasa īśaḥ svayam prayāṇam samara artham aicchat

original: sajjībhavatyeva niśācareśe kharātmajaḥ prāha dhanurdharottamaḥ / 8.63 /
analyzed: sajjībhavati eva niśācara īśe khara ātmajaḥ prāha dhanurdhara uttamaḥ

original: niyuṅkṣva māṃ me piturantakasya vadhāya rājan sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tam /
analyzed: niyuṅkṣva mām me pituḥ antakasya vadhāya rājan sahalakṣmaṇam tam

original: kapipravīrāṃ śca nihatya sarvān pratoṣaye tvāmahamadya suṣṭhu / 8.64 /
analyzed: kapi pravīrān śca nihatya sarvān pratoṣaye tvām aham adya suṣṭhu

original: itīrite'nena niyojitaḥ sa jagāma vīro makarākṣanāmā /
analyzed: iti īritena ena niyojitaḥ sa jagāma vīraḥ makarākṣa nāmā

original: vidhūya sarvāṃ śca haripravīrān sahāṅgadān sūryasutena sākam / 8.65 /
analyzed: vidhūya sarvān śca hari pravīrān saha aṅgadān sūryasutena sākam

original: acintayan lakṣmaṇabāṇasaṅghānavajñayā rāmamathā'hvayad raṇe /
analyzed: acintayan lakṣmaṇa bāṇa saṅgha anavajñayā rāmam atha āhvayat raṇe

original: uvāca rāmaṃ rajanīcaro'sau hato janasthānagataḥ pitā tvayā / 8.66 /
analyzed: uvāca rāmam rajanīcara usau hataḥ janasthāna gataḥ pitā tvayā  /

original: kenāpyupāyena dhanurdharāṇāṃ varaḥ phalaṃ tasya dadāmi te'dya /
analyzed: kena api upāyena dhanurdharāṇām varaḥ phalam tasya dadāmi tedya

original: iti bruvāṇaḥ sa sarojayonervarādavadhyo'mucadastrasaṅghān / 8.67 /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ sa sarojayoneḥ varāt avadhyaḥ mucat astra saṅghān

original: prahasya rāmo'sya nivārya cāstrairastrāṇyameyo'śanisannibhena /
analyzed: prahasya rāmaḥ usya nivārya ca astraiḥ astrāṇi ameya uśani sannibhena

original: lxviii.śiraḥ śareṇottamakuṇḍalojjvalaṃ kharātmajasyātha samunmamātha / 8.68 /
analyzed: śareṇa uttama kuṇḍala ujjvalam khara ātmajasya atha samunmamātha  /

original: vidudruvustasya tu ye'nuyāyinaḥ kapipravīrairnihatāvaśeṣit āḥ /
analyzed: vidudruvuḥ tasya tu yenuyāyinaḥ kapi pravīraiḥ nihata avaśeṣit

original: yathaiva dhūmrākṣamukheṣu pūrvaṃ hateṣu pṛthvīruhaśailadhāribhiḥ / 8.69 /
analyzed: yathā eva dhūmrākṣa mukheṣu pūrvam hateṣu pṛthvīruha śaila dhāribhiḥ

original: tataḥ sa sajjīkṛtamāttadhanvā rathaṃ samāsthāya niśācareśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa sajjīkṛtam ātta dhanvā ratham samāsthāya niśācara īśvaraḥ

original: vṛtaḥ sahasrāyutakoṭyanīkapairniśācarairāṇsu yayau raṇāya / 8.70 /
analyzed: vṛtaḥ sahasra ayuta koṭi anīkapaiḥ niśācaraiḥ āṇsu yayau raṇāya

original: balaistu tasyātha balaṃ kapīnāṃ naikaprakārāyudhapūgabhagnam /
analyzed: balaiḥ tu tasya atha balam kapīnām nā eka prakāra āyudha pūga bhagnam

original: diśaḥ pradudrāva harīndramukhyāḥ samārdayannāṇsu niśācarāṃ stadā / 8.71 /
analyzed: diśaḥ pradudrāva hari indra mukhyāḥ samārdayan niśācarān

original: gajo gavākṣo gavayo vṛṣaṇsca sagandhamādā dhanadena jātāḥ /
analyzed: gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ vṛṣan ca sa gandhamādāḥ dhanadena jātāḥ

original: prāṇādayaḥ pañca marutpravīrāḥ sa katthano vittapatiśca jaghnuḥ / 8.72 /
analyzed: prāṇa ādayaḥ pañca marut pravīrāḥ sa katthanaḥ vittapatiḥ ca jaghnuḥ

original: śaraistu tān ṣaḍbhiramoghavegairnipātayāmāsa daśānano drāk /
analyzed: śaraiḥ tu tān ṣaḍbhiḥ amogha vegaiḥ nipātayāmāsa daśānanaḥ drāk

original: athāṇsviputrau ca sajāmbavantau prajahratuḥ śailavaraistribhistam / 8.73 /
analyzed: atha aṇ svi putrau ca sa jāmbavantau prajahratuḥ śaila varaiḥ tribhiḥ tam

original: girīn vidāryā'śu śarairathānyāñcharān daśāsyo'mucadāṇsu teṣu /
analyzed: girīn vidārya āśu śaraiḥ atha anyān śarān teṣu

original: ekaikamebhirvinipātit āste sasāra taṃ śakrasutātmajo'tha / 8.74 /
analyzed: ekaikam ebhiḥ vinipātit āste sasāra tam śakra suta ātmajā utha

original: śilāṃ samādāya tamāpatantaṃ vibheda rakṣo hṛdaye śareṇa /
analyzed: śilām samādāya tam āpatantam vibheda rakṣaḥ hṛdaye śareṇa

original: dṛḍhāhataḥ so'pyagamad dharātal . aṃ raveḥ suto'thainamabhiprajagmivān / 8.75 /
analyzed: dṛḍha āhataḥ saḥ upi agamat raveḥ sutā utha enam abhiprajagmivān

original: taddhastagaṃ bhūruhamāṇsu bāṇairdaśānanaḥ khaṇḍaṇsa eva kṛtvā /
analyzed: tad hasta gam bāṇaiḥ daśānanaḥ eva kṛtvā

original: grīvāpradeśe'sya mumoca bāṇaṃ bhṛśāhataḥ so'pi papāta bhūmau / 8.76 /
analyzed: mumoca bāṇam bhṛśa āhataḥ saḥ api papāta bhūmau

original: atho hanūmānuragendrabhogasamaṃ svabāhuṃ bhṛśamunnamayya /
analyzed: atho hanūmān uraga indra bhoga samam sva bāhum bhṛśam unnamayya

original: tatāḍa vakṣasyadhipaṃ tu rakṣasāṃ mukhaiḥ sa raktaṃ pravaman papāta / 8.77 /
analyzed: tatāḍa vakṣasi adhipam tu rakṣasām mukhaiḥ sa raktam pravaman papāta

original: sa labdhasañjñaḥ praśaśaṃ sa mārutiṃ tvayā samo nāsti pumān hi kaścit /
analyzed: sa labdha sañjñaḥ praśaśam sa mārutim tvayā samaḥ nā asti pumān hi kaścid

original: kaḥ prāpayedanya imāṃ daśāṃ māmitīrito mārutirāha taṃ punaḥ / 8.78 /
analyzed: kaḥ prāpayet anyaḥ imām daśām mām iti īritaḥ mārutiḥ āha tam punar

original: atyalpametad yadupāttajīvitaḥ punastvamityukta uvāca rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ati alpam etat yat upātta jīvitaḥ punar tvam iti uktaḥ uvāca rāvaṇaḥ

original: gṛhāṇa matto'pi samudyataṃ tvaṃ muṣṭiprahāraṃ tviti taṃ pupotha / 8.79 /
analyzed: gṛhāṇa mattaḥ upi samudyatam tvam muṣṭi prahāram tu iti tam pupotha  /

original: lxix.kiñcit prahāreṇa tu vihvalāṅgavat sthite hi tasminnidamantaraṃ mama /
analyzed: lxix kiñcid prahāreṇa tu vihvala aṅga vat sthite hi tasmin idam antaram mama

original: ityagnisūnuṃ prayayau sa rāvaṇo nivārito mārutinā'pi vācā / 8.80 /
analyzed: iti agni sūnum prayayau sa rāvaṇaḥ nivāritaḥ mārutinā api vācā

original: tamāpatantaṃ prasamīkṣya nīlo dhanurdhvajāgrāṇsvaratheṣu tasya /
analyzed: tam āpatantam prasamīkṣya nīlaḥ dhanuḥ dhvaja agrān sva ratheṣu tasya

original: cacāra mūrdhasvapi cañcalo'laṃ jal . īkṛtastena sa rāvaṇo'pi / 8.81 /
analyzed: cacāra mūrdhasu api cañca lolam

original: sa kṣipramādāya hutāṇsanāstraṃ mumoca nīle rajanīcareśaḥ /
analyzed: sa kṣipram ādāya hutāṇsana astram mumoca nīle rajanīcara īśaḥ

original: sa tena bhūmau patito nacainaṃ dadāha vahniḥ svatanuryato'sau / 8.82 /
analyzed: sa tena bhūmau patitaḥ na ca enam dadāha vahniḥ sva tanuḥ yatas asau

original: tato yayau rāghavameva rāvaṇo nivārayāmāsa tamāṇsu lakṣmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas yayau rāghavam eva rāvaṇaḥ nivārayāmāsa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: tatakṣatustāvadhikau dhanurbhṛt āṃ śaraiḥ śarīrāvaraṇāvadāraṇaiḥ / 8.83 /
analyzed: tatakṣatuḥ tau adhikau dhanurbhṛt ām śaraiḥ śarīra āvaraṇa avadāraṇaiḥ

original: nivāritastena sa rāvaṇo bhṛśaṃ ruṣā'nvito bāṇamamoghamugram /
analyzed: nivāritaḥ tena sa rāvaṇaḥ bhṛśam ruṣā anvitaḥ bāṇam amogham ugram

original: svayambhudattaṃ pravikṛṣya cā'śu lalāṭamadhye pramumoca tasya / 8.84 /
analyzed: svayambhudattam pravikṛṣya ca āśu lalāṭa madhye pramumoca tasya

original: bhṛśāhatastena mumoha lakṣmaṇo rathādavaplutya daśānano'pi /
analyzed: bhṛśa āhataḥ tena mumoha lakṣmaṇaḥ rathāt avaplutya daśānanaḥ upi

original: kṣaṇādabhidrutya balāt pragṛhya svabāhubhirnetumimaṃ samaicchat / 8.85 /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt abhidrutya balāt pragṛhya sva bāhubhiḥ netum imam samaicchat  /

original: samprāpya sañjñāṃ sa suvihvalo'pi sasmāra rūpaṃ nijameva lakṣmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: samprāpya sañjñām sa su vihvalaḥ upi sasmāra rūpam nijam eva lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: śeṣaṃ hareraṃ śayutaṃ nacāsya sa cālanāyāpi śaśāka rāvaṇaḥ / 8.86 /
analyzed: śeṣam na ca asya sa cālanāya api śaśāka rāvaṇaḥ

original: balāt svadorbhiḥ pratigṛhya cākhilairyadā savīraṃ pracakarṣa rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: balāt sva dorbhiḥ pratigṛhya ca akhilaiḥ yadā sa vīram pracakarṣa rāvaṇaḥ

original: cacāla pṛthvī sahamerumandarā sasāgarā naiva cacāla lakṣmaṇaḥ / 8.87 /
analyzed: cacāla pṛthvī saha meru mandarā sa sāgarā nā eva cacāla lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: sahasramūrdhno'sya bataikamūrdhni sasaptapātāl . agirīndrasāgarā /
analyzed: sahasra mūrdhnā usya bata eka mūrdhni sa sapta pātāl

original: dharā'khileyaṃ nanu sarṣapāyati prasahya ko nāma haret tamenam / 8.88 /
analyzed: dharā akhilā iyam nanu sarṣapāyati prasahya kaḥ nāma haret tam enam  /

original: prakarṣati tveva niśācareśvare tathaiva rāmāvarajaṃ tvarānvitaḥ /
analyzed: prakarṣati tu eva niśācara īśvare tathā eva rāma avarajam tvarā anvitaḥ

original: samastajīvādhipateḥ parā tanuḥ samutpapātāsya puro hanūmān / 8.89 /
analyzed: samasta jīva adhipateḥ parā tanuḥ samutpapāta asya puras hanūmān

original: sa muṣṭimāvartya ca vajrakalpaṃ jaghāna tenaiva ca rāvaṇaṃ ruṣā /
analyzed: sa muṣṭim āvartya ca vajra kalpam jaghāna tena eva ca rāvaṇam ruṣā

original: prasārya bāhūnakhilairmukhairvaman sa raktamuṣṇaṃ vyasuvat papāta / 8.90 /
analyzed: prasārya bāhūn akhilaiḥ mukhaiḥ vaman sa raktam uṣṇam vyasu vat papāta  /

original: nipātya rakṣodhipatiṃ sa mārutiḥ pragṛhya saumitrimuraṅgaśāyinaḥ /
analyzed: nipātya rakṣaḥ adhipatim sa mārutiḥ pragṛhya saumitrim uraṅga śāyinaḥ

original: jagāma rāmākhyatanoḥ samīpaṃ saumitrimuddhartumalaṃ hyasau kapiḥ / 8.91 /
analyzed: jagāma rāma ākhya tanoḥ samīpam saumitrim uddhartum alam hi asau kapiḥ

original: lxx.sa rāmasaṃ sparśanivāritaklamaḥ samutthitastena samuddhṛte śare /
analyzed: sa rāmasam sparśa nivārita klamaḥ samutthitaḥ tena samuddhṛte śare

original: babhau yathā rāhumukhāt pramuktaḥ śaśī supūrṇo vikacasvaraśmibhiḥ / 8.92 /
analyzed: babhau yathā rāhu mukhāt pramuktaḥ śaśī su pūrṇaḥ vikaca sva raśmibhiḥ

original: sa śeṣabhogābhamatho janārdanaḥ pragṛhya cāpaṃ saśaraṃ punaśca /
analyzed: sa śeṣa bhoga ābham atho janārdanaḥ pragṛhya cāpam sa śaram punar ca

original: sulabdhasañjñaṃ rajanīcareśaṃ jagāda sajjībhava rāvaṇeti / 8.93 /
analyzed: sulabdha sañjñam rajanīcara īśam jagāda sajjībhava rāvaṇa iti

original: rathaṃ samāruhya punaḥ sakārmukaḥ samārgaṇo rāvaṇa āṇsu rāmam /
analyzed: ratham samāruhya punar sa kārmukaḥ sa mārgaṇaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rāmam

original: abhyetya sarvāṇsca diśaścakāra śarāndhakārāḥ paramāstravettā / 8.94 /
analyzed: abhyetya sarvān ca diśaḥ cakāra śara andhakārāḥ parama astra vettā

original: rathasthite'smin rajanīcareśe na me patirbhūmital . e sthitaḥ syāt /
analyzed: ratha sthite ismin rajanīcara īśe na me patiḥ bhūmi tal sthitaḥ syāt

original: iti sma putraḥ pavanasya rāmaṃ skandhaṃ samāropya yayau ca rākṣasam / 8.95 /
analyzed: iti sma putraḥ pavanasya rāmam skandham samāropya yayau ca rākṣasam

original: prahasya rāmo'sya hayān nihatya sūtaṃ ca kṛtvā tilaśo dhvajaṃ ratham /
analyzed: prahasya rāmaḥ usya hayān nihatya sūtam ca kṛtvā tilaśas dhvajam ratham

original: dhanūṃ ṣi khaḍgaṃ sakalāyudhāni chatraṃ ca sañchidya cakarta maulim / 8.96 /
analyzed: dhanūm si khaḍgam sakala āyudhāni chatram ca sañchidya cakarta maulim

original: kartavyamūḍhaṃ tamavekṣya rāmaḥ punarjagādā'śu gṛhaṃ prayāhi /
analyzed: kartavyam ūḍham tam avekṣya rāmaḥ punar jagāda āśu gṛham prayāhi

original: samastabhogānanubhūya śīghraṃ pratoṣya bandhūn punarehi martum / 8.97 /
analyzed: samasta bhogān anubhūya śīghram pratoṣya bandhūn punar ehi martum

original: itīrito'vāgvadano yayau gṛhaṃ vicārya kāryaṃ saha mantribhiḥ svakaiḥ /
analyzed: iti īrita uvāc vadanaḥ yayau gṛham vicārya kāryam saha mantribhiḥ svakaiḥ

original: hatāvaśeṣairatha kumbhakarṇaprabodhanāyā'śu matiṃ cakāra / 8.98 /
analyzed: hata avaśeṣaiḥ atha kumbhakarṇa prabodhanāya āśu matim cakāra

original: saśailaśṛṅgāsiparaśvadhāyudhairniśācarāṇāmayutairanekaiḥ /
analyzed: sa śaila śṛṅga asi paraśvadha āyudhaiḥ niśācarāṇām ayutaiḥ anekaiḥ

original: tacchvāsavegābhihataiḥ kathañcid gataiḥ samīpaṃ kathamapyabodhayat / 8.99 /
analyzed: tad śvāsa vega abhihataiḥ kathañcid gataiḥ samīpam katham api abodhayat  /

original: śailopamānasya ca māṃ sarāṇsīn vidhāya bhakṣānapi śoṇitahradān /
analyzed: śaila upamānasya ca mām sarāṇsīn vidhāya bhakṣān api śoṇita hradān

original: sutṛptamenaṃ paramādareṇa samāhvayāmāsa sabhātal . āya / 8.100 /
analyzed: su tṛptam enam parama ādareṇa samāhvayāmāsa

original: uvāca cainaṃ rajanīcarendraḥ parājito'smyadya hi jīvati tvayi /
analyzed: uvāca ca enam rajanīcara indraḥ parājitaḥ asmi adya hi jīvati tvayi

original: raṇe nareṇaiva ca rāmanāmnā kuruṣva me prītimamuṃ nihatya / 8.101 /
analyzed: raṇe nareṇa eva ca rāma nāmnā kuruṣva me prītim amum nihatya

original: itīritaḥ kāraṇamapyaśeṣaṃ śrutvā jagarhāgrajameva vīraḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ kāraṇam api aśeṣam śrutvā jagarha agrajam eva vīraḥ

original: amoghavīryeṇa hirāghaveṇa tvayā virodhaścarito batādya / 8.102 /
analyzed: amogha vīryeṇa hi rāghaveṇa tvayā virodhaḥ caritaḥ bata adya

original: praśasyate no balibhirvirodhaḥ kathañcideṣo'tibalo mato mama /
analyzed: praśasyate naḥ balibhiḥ virodhaḥ kathañcid eṣa utibalaḥ mataḥ mama

original: lxxi.itīrito rāvaṇa āha durnayo'pyahaṃ tvayā'vyo hi kimanyathā tvayā / 8.103 /
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ āha durnaya upi aham tvayā āvyaḥ hi kim anyathā tvayā

original: caranti rājāna utākramaṃ kvacit tvayopamān bandhujanān balādhikān /
analyzed: caranti rājānaḥ uta ākramam kvacid tvayā upamān bandhu janān bala adhikān

original: samīkṣya hītthaṃ gadito'grajena sa kumbhakarṇaḥ prayayau raṇāya / 8.104 /
analyzed: samīkṣya hi ittham gadita ugrajena sa kumbhakarṇaḥ prayayau raṇāya

original: prākāramālaṅghya sa pañcayojanaṃ yadā yayau śūlavarāyudho raṇam /
analyzed: prākāram ālaṅghya sa pañca yojanam yadā yayau śūla vara āyudhaḥ raṇam

original: kapipravīrā akhilāḥ pradudruvurbhayādatītyaiva ca setumāṇsu / 8.105 /
analyzed: kapi pravīrāḥ akhilāḥ pradudruvuḥ bhayāt atītya eva ca

original: śatavalipanasākhyau tatra vasvaṃ śabhūtau pavanagaṇavarāṃ śau śvetasampātinau ca /
analyzed: śatavali panasa ākhyau tatra śa bhūtau pavana gaṇa varām śau śveta sampātinau ca

original: nirṛtitanumathograṃ durmukhaṃ kesarīti pravaramatha marutsu prāsyadetān mukhe saḥ / 8.106 /
analyzed: nirṛti tanum atha ugram durmukham kesarī iti pravaram atha marutsu prāsyat etān mukhe saḥ  /

original: rajanicaravaro'sau kumbhakarṇaḥ pratāpī kumudamapi jayantaṃ pāṇinā sampipeṣa /
analyzed: rajanicara vara usau kumbhakarṇaḥ pratāpī kumudam api jayantam pāṇinā sampipeṣa

original: nal . amatha ca gajādīn pañca nīlaṃ satāraṃ girivarataruhastān muṣṭinā'pātayacca / 8.107 /
analyzed: ca gaja ādīn pañca nīlam sa tāram giri vara taru hastāt muṣṭin apātayat ca  /

original: athāṅgadaśca jāmbavāninātmajaśca vānaraiḥ /
analyzed: athā aṅgadaḥ ca jāmbavāninā ātmajaḥ ca vānaraiḥ

original: nijaghnire niśācaraṃ savṛkṣaṇsailasānubhiḥ / 8.108 /
analyzed: nijaghnire niśācaram sa vṛkṣaṇ saila sānubhiḥ

original: vicūrṇit āṇsca rākṣasāstanau niśācarasya te /
analyzed: vicūrṇit āṇsca rākṣasāstanau niśācarasya te

original: babhūva kācana vyathā nacāsya bāhuṣāl . inaḥ / 8.109 /
analyzed: babhūva kācana vyathā na ca asya inaḥ  /

original: athāparaṃ mahācalaṃ pragṛhya bhāskarātmajaḥ /
analyzed: atha aparam mahā acalam pragṛhya bhāskara ātmajaḥ

original: mumoca rākṣase'tha taṃ pragṛhya taṃ jaghāna saḥ / 8.110 /
analyzed: mumoca rākṣasa itha tam pragṛhya tam jaghāna saḥ

original: tadā papāta sūryajastatāḍa cāṅgadaṃ ruṣā /
analyzed: tadā papāta sūryajaḥ tatāḍa ca aṅgadam ruṣā

original: sa jāmbavantamāṇsu tau nipetatustal . āhatau / 8.111 /
analyzed: sa tau nipetatuḥ tat āhatau  /

original: atha pragṛhya bhāskariṃ yayau sa rākṣaso balī /
analyzed: atha pragṛhya bhāskarim yayau sa rākṣasaḥ balī

original: jagāma cānu mārutiḥ susūkṣmamakṣikopamaḥ / 8.112 /
analyzed: jagāma ca anu mārutiḥ su sūkṣma makṣikā upamaḥ

original: yadainameṣa bādhate tadā vimocayāmyaham /
analyzed: yadā enam eṣa bādhate tadā vimocayāmi aham

original: yadi sma śakyate'sya tu svamocanāya tad varam / 8.113 /
analyzed: yadi sma śakyate isya tu sva mocanāya tat varam

original: iti vrajatyanu sma taṃ marutsute niśācaraḥ /
analyzed: iti vrajati anu sma tam marut sute niśācaraḥ

original: puraṃ viveśa cārcitaḥ svabandhubhiḥ samastaśaḥ / 8.114 /
analyzed: puram viveśa ca arcitaḥ sva bandhubhiḥ samastaśas

original: lxxii.tuhinasalilamālyaiḥ sarvato'bhipravṛṣṭe rajanicaravare'smiṃ stena siktaḥ kapīśaḥ /
analyzed: sarvatobhipravṛṣṭe rajanicara varesmin stena siktaḥ kapīśaḥ

original: vigatasakalayuddhaglānirāvañcayitvā rajanicaravaraṃ taṃ tasya nāsāṃ dadaṃ śa / 8.115 /
analyzed: vigata sakala yuddha glāniḥ ā vañcayitvā rajanicara varam tam tasya nāsām

original: karābhyāmatha karṇau ca nāsikāṃ daśanairapi /
analyzed: karābhyām atha karṇau ca nāsikām daśanaiḥ api

original: sañchidya kṣipramevāsāvutpapāta harīśvaraḥ / 8.116 /
analyzed: sañchidya kṣipram eva asau utpapāta hari īśvaraḥ

original: tal . ena cainaṃ nijaghāna rākṣasaḥ pipeṣa bhūmau patitaṃ tato'pi /
analyzed: tat enā ca enam nijaghāna rākṣasaḥ pipeṣa bhūmau patitam

original: samudgato'sau vivare'ṅgulīnāṃ jaghāna śūlena punaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ / 8.117 /
analyzed: samudgataḥ asau vivara iṅgulīnām jaghāna śūlena punar sa rākṣasaḥ

original: amoghaśūlaṃ prapatat tadīkṣya raveḥ sutasyopari mārutātmajaḥ /
analyzed: amogha śūlam prapatat tat īkṣya raveḥ sutasya upari mārutātmajaḥ

original: pragṛhya jānau praṇidhāya śīghraṃ babhañja taṃ prekṣya nanāda coccaiḥ / 8.118 /
analyzed: pragṛhya jānau praṇidhāya śīghram babhañja tam prekṣya nanāda ca uccais

original: athainamāvṛtya jaghāna muṣṭinā sa rākṣaso vāyusutaṃ stanāntare /
analyzed: athā enam āvṛtya jaghāna muṣṭinā sa rākṣasaḥ vāyusutam stanāntare

original: jagarja tenābhihato hanūmānacintayaṃ stat prajahāra cainam / 8.119 /
analyzed: jagarja tena abhihataḥ hanūmān acintayam stat prajahāra ca enam

original: tal . ena vakṣasyabhitāḍito ruṣā hanūmatā mohamavāpa rākṣasaḥ /
analyzed: tat ena vakṣasi abhitāḍitaḥ ruṣā hanūmatā moham avāpa rākṣasaḥ

original: punaśca sañjñāṃ samavāpya śīghraṃ yayau sa yatraiva raghupravīraḥ / 8.120 /
analyzed: punar ca sañjñām samavāpya śīghram yayau sa yatra eva raghu pravīraḥ

original: vicintayāmāsa tato hanūmān mayaiva hantuṃ samare hi śakyaḥ /
analyzed: vicintayāmāsa tatas hanūmān mayā eva hantum samare hi śakyaḥ

original: asau tathā'pyenamahaṃ na hanmi yaśo hi rāmasya dṛḍhaṃ prakāṇsayan / 8.121 /
analyzed: asau tathā api enam aham na hanmi yaśaḥ hi rāmasya dṛḍham prakāṇsayan

original: ananyavadhyaṃ tamimaṃ nihatya svayaṃ sa rāmo yaśa āhareta /
analyzed: an anya vadhyam tam imam nihatya svayam sa rāmaḥ yaśaḥ āhareta

original: datto varo dvārapayoḥ svayaṃ ca janārdanenaiva purā tataśca / 8.122 /
analyzed: dattaḥ varaḥ dvārapayoḥ svayam ca janārdanena eva purā tatas ca

original: mayaiva vadhyau bhavataṃ trijanmasu pravṛddhavīryāviti keśavena /
analyzed: mayā eva vadhyau bhavatam tri janmasu pravṛddha vīryau iti keśavena

original: uktaṃ mamaivaiṣa yadapyanugrahaṃ vadhe'sya kuryānnatu me sa dharmaḥ / 8.123 /
analyzed: uktam mama eva eṣa yat api anugraham vadhesya kuryāt na tu me sa dharmaḥ

original: iti sma sañcintya kapīśayukto jagāma yatraiva kapipravīrāḥ /
analyzed: iti sma sañcintya kapīśa yuktaḥ jagāma yatra eva kapi pravīrāḥ

original: sa kumbhakarṇo'khilavānarāṃ stu prabhakṣayan rāmamupājagāma / 8.124 /
analyzed: sa kumbhakarṇa ukhila vānarām stu prabhakṣayan rāmam upājagāma

original: te bhakṣit āstena kapipravīrāḥ sarve vinirjagmuramuṣya dehāt /
analyzed: te kapi pravīrāḥ sarve vinirjagmuḥ amuṣya dehāt

original: srotobhirevātha ca romakūpaiḥ kecit tamevā'ruruhuryathā girim / 8.125 /
analyzed: srotobhiḥ evā atha ca romakūpaiḥ kecid tam evā āruruhuḥ yathā girim

original: sa tān vidhūyā'śu yathā mahāgajo jagāma rāmaṃ samarārthamekaḥ /
analyzed: sa tān vidhūya āśu yathā mahā gajaḥ jagāma rāmam samara artham ekaḥ

original: prabhakṣayan svānaparāṃ śca sarvaśo mattaḥ samāghrāya ca śoṇitaṃ piban / 8.126 /
analyzed: prabhakṣayan svān aparām ca sarvaśas mattaḥ samāghrāya ca śoṇitam piban  /

original: lxxiii.nyavārayat taṃ śaravarṣadhārayā sa lakṣmaṇo nainamacintayat saḥ /
analyzed: tam śara varṣa dhārayā sa lakṣmaṇaḥ na enam acintayat saḥ

original: jagāma rāmaṃ giriśṛṅgadhārī samāhvayat taṃ samarāya cā'śu / 8.127 /
analyzed: jagāma rāmam giri śṛṅga dhārī samāhvayat tam samarāya ca āśu

original: atho samādāya dhanuḥ sughoraṃ śarāṃ śca vajrāṇsanitulyavegān /
analyzed: atho samādāya dhanuḥ su ghoram śarān ca

original: praveśayāmāsa niśācare prabhuḥ sa rāghavaḥ pūrvahateṣu yadvat / 8.128 /
analyzed: praveśayāmāsa niśācare prabhuḥ sa rāghavaḥ pūrva hateṣu yadvat

original: yāvadbalena nyahanat kharādikān na tāvataiva nyapatat sa rākṣasaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat balena nyahanat khara ādikān na tāvatā eva nyapatat sa rākṣasaḥ

original: atha prahasyā'tmabalaikadeśaṃ pradarśayan bāṇavarān mumoca / 8.129 /
analyzed: atha prahasya ātma bala eka deśam pradarśayan bāṇa varān mumoca  /

original: dvābhyāṃ sa bāhū nicakarta tasya padadvayaṃ caiva tathā ṇsarābhyām /
analyzed: dvābhyām sa bāhū nicakarta tasya pada dvayam ca eva tathā

original: athāpareṇāsya śiro nikṛtya samprākṣipat sāgaratoya āṇsu / 8.130 /
analyzed: atha apareṇa asya śiraḥ nikṛtya samprākṣipat sāgaratoye

original: avardhatābdhiḥ patite'sya kāye mahācalābhe kṣaṇadācarasya /
analyzed: avardhata abdhiḥ patita isya kāye mahā acala ābhe kṣaṇadā carasya

original: surāṇsca sarve vavṛṣuḥ prasūnairmudā stuvanto raghuvaryamūrdhni / 8.131 /
analyzed: surān ca sarve vavṛṣuḥ prasūnaiḥ mudā stuvantaḥ raghu varya mūrdhni

original: yojanānāṃ trilakṣaṃ hi kumbhakarṇo vyavardhata /
analyzed: yojanānām tri lakṣam hi kumbhakarṇaḥ vyavardhata

original: pūrvaṃ paścāt sañcukoca laṅkāyāmuṣituṃ svayam / 8.132 /
analyzed: pūrvam paścāt sañcukoca laṅkāyām uṣitum svayam

original: sa tu svabhāvamāpanno mriyamāṇo vyavardhata /
analyzed: sa tu svabhāvam āpannaḥ mriyamāṇaḥ vyavardhata

original: tenāsmin patite tvabdhiravardhadadhikaṃ tadā / 8.133 /
analyzed: tena asmin patite tu abdhiḥ avardhat adhikam tadā

original: athāpare ye rajanīcarāstadā kapipravīrairnihatāṇsca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: atha apare ye rajanīcarāḥ tadā kapi pravīraiḥ nihatān ca sarvaśas

original: hatāvaśiṣṭāstvaritāḥ pradudruvubhrāturvadhaṃ cocurupetya rāvaṇam / 8.134 /
analyzed: hata avaśiṣṭāḥ tvaritāḥ pradudruvuḥ bhrātuḥ vadham ca ūcuḥ upetya rāvaṇam

original: sa duḥkhatapto nipapāta mūrchito nirāṇsakaścābhavadātmajīvite /
analyzed: sa duḥkha taptaḥ nipapāta mūrchitaḥ nirāṇsakaḥ ca abhavat ātma jīvite

original: tamāha putrastridaśeśaśatrurniyuṅkṣva māṃ śatruvadhāya māciram / 8.135 /
analyzed: tam āha putraḥ tridaśa īśa śatruḥ niyuṅkṣva mām śatru vadhāya māciram

original: mayā gṛhītastridaśeśvaraḥ purā viṣīdase kiṃ nararājaputrataḥ /
analyzed: mayā gṛhītaḥ tridaśeśvaraḥ purā viṣīdase kim nara rāja putrataḥ

original: sa evamuktvā prajuhāva pāvakaṃ śivaṃ samabhyarcya samāruhad ratham / 8.136 /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktvā prajuhāva pāvakam śivam samabhyarcya samāruhat ratham

original: sa āttadhanvā saśaro rathena viyat samāruhya yayāvadarśanam /
analyzed: saḥ ātta dhanvā sa śaraḥ rathena viyat samāruhya yayau adarśanam

original: sa nāgapāṇsairvarataḥ śivasya babandha sarvān kapivīrasa' nghān / 8.137 /
analyzed: sa nāga pāṇsaiḥ varataḥ śivasya babandha sarvān

original: purā'vatārāya yadā sa viṣṇurdideśa sarvāṃ stridaśāṃ stadaiva /
analyzed: purā avatārāya yadā sa viṣṇuḥ dideśa sarvām tridaśām tadā eva

original: lxxiv.mamāpi sevā bhavate prayojyetyevaṃ garutmānavadad vṛṣākapim / 8.138 /
analyzed: mama api sevā bhavate prayojyā iti evam garutmān avadat vṛṣākapim

original: tamāha viṣṇurna bhuvi prajātimupaihi sevāṃ tava cānyathā'ham /
analyzed: tam āha viṣṇuḥ na bhuvi prajātim upaihi sevām tava ca anyathā aham

original: ādāsya evātra yathā yaśaḥ syād dharmaśca kartavyakṛdeva ca syāḥ / 8.139 /
analyzed: ādāsye eva atra yathā yaśaḥ syāt dharmaḥ ca kartavya kṛt eva ca syāḥ  /

original: vareṇa ṇsarvasya hi rāvaṇātmajo yadā nibadhnāti kapīn salakṣmaṇān /
analyzed: vareṇa hi rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ yadā nibadhnāti kapīn sa lakṣmaṇān

original: uraṅgapāṇsena tadā tvameva sametya sarvānapi mocayasva / 8.140 /
analyzed: uraṅga pāṇsena tadā tvam eva sametya sarvān api mocayasva

original: ahaṃ samartho'pi sa lakṣmaṇaṇsca tathā hanūmān na vimocayāmaḥ /
analyzed: aham samarthaḥ upi sa tathā hanūmān na vimocayāmaḥ

original: tava priyārthaṃ garuḍaiṣa eva kṛtastavā'deśa imaṃ kuruṣva / 8.141 /
analyzed: tava priya artham garuḍa eṣaḥ eva kṛtaḥ tava ādeśaḥ imam kuruṣva

original: tadetaduktaṃ hi purā'tmanā yat tato hi rāmo na mumoca kañcana /
analyzed: tat etat uktam hi purā ātmanā yat tatas hi rāmaḥ na mumoca kañcana

original: na lakṣmaṇo naiva ca mārutātmajaḥ sa caiva jānāti hi devaguhyam / 8.142 /
analyzed: na lakṣmaṇaḥ nā eva ca mārutātmajaḥ sa ca eva jānāti hi deva guhyam

original: atho nibaddhyā'śu harīn salakṣmaṇān jagāma rakṣaḥ svapituḥ sakāṇsam /
analyzed: atho nibaddhi āśu harīn sa lakṣmaṇān jagāma rakṣaḥ sva pituḥ sa kāṇsam

original: nananda cāsau piśitāṇsaneśvaraḥ śaśaṃ sa putraṃ ca kṛt ātmakāryam / 8.143 /
analyzed: nananda ca asau piśitāṇsana īśvaraḥ śaśam sa putram ca kṛt ātma kāryam

original: sa pakṣirājo'tha harernideśaṃ smaraṃ stvarāvāniha cā'jagāma /
analyzed: sa pakṣirājaḥ atha hareḥ nideśam smaram stvarāvān iha ca ājagāma

original: tatpakṣavātasparśena kevalaṃ vinaṣṭa eṣāṃ sa uraṅgabandhaḥ / 8.144 /
analyzed: tad pakṣa vāta sparśena kevalam vinaṣṭaḥ eṣām saḥ uraṅga bandhaḥ  /

original: sa rāmamānamya parātmadaivataṃ yayau sumālyābharaṇānulepanaḥ /
analyzed: sa rāmam ānamya parātma daivatam yayau su mālya ābharaṇa anulepanaḥ

original: kapipravīrāṇsca tarūñchilāṇsca pragṛhya nedurbalinaḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ / 8.145 /
analyzed: kapi pravīrān ca tarūn śilān ca pragṛhya neduḥ balinaḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ

original: śrutvā ninādaṃ plavageśvarāṇāṃ punaḥ saputro'trasadatra rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā ninādam plavaga īśvarāṇām punar rāvaṇaḥ

original: bandhādamuṣmāt pratinissṛt āste kimatra kāryaṃ tviti cintayānaḥ / 8.146 /
analyzed: bandhāt amuṣmāt pratinissṛt āste kim atra kāryam tu iti cintayānaḥ

original: punaśca hutvā sa hutāṇsameva rathaṃ samāruhya yayāvadarśanam /
analyzed: punar ca hutvā sa hutāṇsam eva ratham samāruhya yayau adarśanam

original: vavarṣa cāstrāṇi mahāntyajasraṃ varādumeśasya tathā'bjajasya / 8.147 /
analyzed: vavarṣa ca astrāṇi mahānti ajasram varāt umeśasya tathā abjajasya

original: punaśca tasyāstranipīḍit āste nipetururvyāṃ kapayaḥ salakṣmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: punar ca tasya astra nipīḍit āste nipetuḥ urvyām kapayaḥ sa lakṣmaṇāḥ

original: spṛśanti nāstrāṇi durantaśaktiṃ tanuṃ samīrasya hi kānicit kvacit / 8.148 /
analyzed: spṛśanti nā astrāṇi duranta śaktim tanum samīrasya hi kānicid kvacid

original: vijñātukāmaḥ puri sampravṛttiṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ pūrvagatastadā'gāt /
analyzed: vijñātu kāmaḥ puri sampravṛttim vibhīṣaṇaḥ pūrva gataḥ tadā āgāt

original: dadarśa sarvān patitān sa vānarān marutsutaṃ tvekamanākulaṃ ca / 8.149 /
analyzed: dadarśa sarvān patitān sa vānarān marut sutam tu ekam an ākulam ca

original: lxxv.sa taṃ samādāya yayau vidhātṛjaṃ vimūrcchitaṃ codakasekatastam /
analyzed: tam samādāya yayau vidhātṛ jam vimūrcchitam ca udaka sekataḥ tam

original: āṇsvāsya kiṃ jīvasi hītyuvāca tatheti sa prāha ca mandavākyaḥ / 8.150 /
analyzed: kim jīvasi hi iti uvāca tathā iti sa prāha ca manda vākyaḥ

original: ūce punarjīvati kiṃ hanūmān jīvāḥ sma sarve'pi hi jīvamāne /
analyzed: ūce punar jīvati kim hanūmān jīvāḥ sma sarve api hi jīvamāne

original: tasmin hate nihatāṇscaiva sarva itīrite'smītyavadat sa mārutiḥ / 8.151 /
analyzed: tasmin hate sarve iti īritā ismi iti avadat sa mārutiḥ

original: ityukto jāmbavānāha hanūmantamanantaram /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ jāmbavān āha hanūmantam anantaram

original: yo'sau meroḥ samīpastho gandhamādanasañjñitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ asau meroḥ samīpa sthaḥ gandhamādana sañjñitaḥ

original: giristasmāt samāhāryaṃ tvayauṣadhacatuṣṭayam / 8.152 /
analyzed: giriḥ tasmāt samāhāryam tvayā auṣadha catuṣṭayam

original: mṛtasañjīvanī mukhyā sandhānakaraṇī parā /
savarṇakaraṇī caiva viśalyakaraṇīti ca / 8.153 /
analyzed: savarṇakaraṇī ca eva viśalyakaraṇī iti ca

original: ityuktaḥ sa kṣaṇenaiva prāpatad gandhamādanam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa kṣaṇena eva prāpatat gandhamādanam

original: avāpa cāmbaracaro rāmamuktaḥ śaro yathā / 8.154 /
analyzed: avāpa ca ambaracaraḥ rāma muktaḥ śaraḥ yathā

original: antarhitāṇscauṣadhīstu tadā vijñāya mārutiḥ /
analyzed: antarhitāḥ ca oṣadhīḥ tu tadā vijñāya mārutiḥ

original: udbabarha giriṃ krodhācchatayojanamaṇḍalam / 8.155 /
analyzed: udbabarha girim krodhāt śata yojana maṇḍalam

original: sa taṃ samutpāṭya giriṃ kareṇa pratol . ayitvā baladevasūnuḥ /
analyzed: sa tam samutpāṭya girim kareṇa baladeva sūnuḥ

original: samutpapātāmbaramugravego yathā hariścakradharastrivikrame / 8.156 /
analyzed: samutpapāta ambaram ugra vegaḥ yathā hariḥ cakradharaḥ trivikrame

original: avāpa cākṣṇoḥ sa nimeṣamātrato nipātitā yatra kapipravīrāḥ /
analyzed: avāpa ca akṣṇoḥ sa nimeṣa mātrataḥ nipātitāḥ yatra kapi pravīrāḥ

original: tacchailavātasparśāt samutthitāḥ samastaśo vānarayūthapāḥ kṣaṇāt / 8.157 /
analyzed: tad śaila vāta sparśāt samutthitāḥ samastaśas vānara yūthapāḥ kṣaṇāt

original: apūjayan mārutimugrapauruṣaṃ raghūttamo'syānujanistathā'pare /
analyzed: apūjayat mārutim ugra pauruṣam raghūttamā usya anujaniḥ tathā apare

original: papāta mūrdhnyasya ca puṣpasantatiḥ pramoditairdevavarairvisarjitā / 8.158 /
analyzed: papāta mūrdhni asya ca puṣpa santatiḥ pramoditaiḥ deva varaiḥ visarjitā

original: sa devagandharvamaharṣisattamairabhiṣṭuto rāmakaropagūhitaḥ /
analyzed: sa deva gandharva mahā ṛṣi sattamaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ rāma kara upagūhitaḥ

original: punargiriṃ taṃ śatayojanocchritaṃ nyapātayat saṃ sthita eva tatra ca / 8.159 /
analyzed: punar girim tam śata yojana ucchritam nyapātayat sam sthitaḥ eva tatra ca

original: sa pūrvavanmārutivegacodito nirantaraṃ śliṣṭataro'tra cābhavat /
analyzed: sa pūrvavat māruti vega coditaḥ nirantaram śliṣṭataraḥ utra ca abhavat

original: punaśca sarve taruśailahastā raṇāya cottasthuralaṃ nadantaḥ / 8.160 /
analyzed: punar ca sarve taru śaila hastāḥ raṇāya ca uttasthuḥ alam nadantaḥ

original: punaśca tān prekṣya samutthitān kapīn bhayaṃ mahacchakrajitaṃ viveśa /
analyzed: punar ca tān prekṣya samutthitān kapīn bhayam mahat śakrajitam viveśa

original: lxxvi.sa pūrvavaddhavyavahe samarcya śivaṃ tathā'darśanameva jagmivān / 8.161 /
analyzed: pūrvavat havyavahe samarcya śivam tathā adarśanam eva jagmivān

original: varāṇsrayeṇājagirīśayostathā punarmahāstraiḥ sa babandha tān kapīn /
analyzed: varāṇsrayeṇa aja girīśayoḥ tathā punar mahā astraiḥ sa babandha tān kapīn

original: athā'ha rāmasya mano'nusārataḥ purā'stramevānusaran sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / 8.162 /
analyzed: atha āha rāmasya manaḥ nusārataḥ purā astram eva anusaran sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: pitāmahāstreṇa nihanmi durmatiṃ tavā'jñayā ṇsakrajitaṃ sabāndhavam /
analyzed: pitāmaha astreṇa nihanmi durmatim tava ājñayā ṇsakrajitam sa bāndhavam

original: itīrite tena sa cā'ha rāghavo bhayādadṛśye na vimoktumarhasi / 8.163 /
analyzed: iti īrite tena sa ca āha rāghavaḥ bhayāt adṛśye na vimoktum arhasi  /

original: na soḍhumīśo'si yadi tvametadastraṃ tadā'haṃ śaramātrakeṇa /
analyzed: na soḍhum īśaḥ asi yadi tvam etat astram tadā aham śara mātrakeṇa

original: adṛśyamapyāṇsu nihanmi santaṃ rasātal . e'thāpi hi satyaloke / 8.164 /
analyzed: adṛśyam api āṇsu nihanmi santam rasātal

original: iti sma vīndrasya hanūmataśca balaprakāṇsāya purā prabhuḥ svayam /
analyzed: iti sma vi indrasya hanūmataḥ ca bala prakāṇsāya purā prabhuḥ svayam

original: sammānayitvā'stramamuṣya rāmo durantaśaktiḥ śaramādade'tha / 8.165 /
analyzed: sammānayitvā astram amuṣya rāmaḥ duranta śaktiḥ śaram ādadetha  /

original: anena dṛṣṭo'hamiti sma duṣṭo vijñāya bāhvorbalamasya cogram /
analyzed: anena dṛṣṭaḥ ūham iti sma duṣṭaḥ vijñāya bāhvoḥ balam asya ca ugram

original: viniścayaṃ devatamasya paśyan pradudruve prāṇaparīpsurāṇsu / 8.166 /
analyzed: viniścayam devatamasya paśyan pradudruve prāṇa parīpsuḥ āṇsu

original: hāhākṛte pradruta indraśatrau raghūttamaḥ śatruvibhīṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: hāhākṛte pradrutaḥ indra śatrau raghūttamaḥ śatru vibhīṣaṇa tvāt

original: vibhīṣaṇetyeva surairabhiṣṭuto vijñānamastraṃ tvamucat svasainye / 8.167 /
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇa iti eva suraiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ vijñānam astram tvam ucat sva sainye

original: niśācarāstraṃ hyagamat kṣaṇena rāmāstravīryāddharayo nadantaḥ /
analyzed: niśācara astram hi agamat kṣaṇena rāma astra vīryāt harayaḥ nadantaḥ

original: uttasthuruccorugirīn pragṛhya praśaṃ samānā raghuvīramuccaiḥ / 8.168 /
analyzed: uttasthuḥ ucca uru girīn pragṛhya praśam samānāḥ raghu vīram uccais

original: suraiśca puṣpaṃ varṣadbhirīḍitastasthau dhanuṣpāṇiranantavīryaḥ /
analyzed: suraiḥ ca puṣpam varṣadbhiḥ īḍitaḥ tasthau dhanuṣpāṇiḥ ananta vīryaḥ

original: sa rāvaṇasyātha suto nikumbhilāṃ punaḥ samāsādya juhāva pāvakam / 8.169 /
analyzed: sa rāvaṇasya atha sutaḥ nikumbhilām punar samāsādya juhāva pāvakam

original: vibhīṣaṇo'thā'ha raghūttamaṃ prabhuṃ niyojayādyaiva vadhāya durmateḥ /
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇā utha āha raghūttamam prabhum niyojaya adya eva vadhāya durmateḥ

original: kṛt āgnipūjo nahi vadhya eṣa varo vidhātuḥ prathito'sya tādṛśaḥ / 8.170 /
analyzed: nahi vadhyaḥ eṣa varaḥ vidhātuḥ prathitaḥ asya tādṛśaḥ  /

original: na vai vadhaṃ rāma iyeṣa tasya palāyitasyā'tmasamīkṣaṇāt punaḥ /
analyzed: na vai vadham rāmaḥ iyeṣa tasya palāyitasya ātma samīkṣaṇāt punar

original: sattvojjhito'sāvapi kūṭayodhī na me vadhārho'yamiti sma sa prabhuḥ / 8.171 /
analyzed: sattva ujjhitā usau api kūṭa yodhī na me vadha arhā iyam iti sma sa prabhuḥ

original: sa ādideśāvarajaṃ janārdano hanūmatā caiva vibhīṣaṇena /
analyzed: saḥ ādideśa avarajam janārdanaḥ hanūmatā ca eva vibhīṣaṇena

original: sahaiva sarvairapi vānarendrairyayau mahātmā sa ca tadvadhāya / 8.172 /
analyzed: saha eva sarvaiḥ api vānara indraiḥ yayau mahātmā sa ca tad vadhāya

original: lxxvii.sa juhvatastasya cakāra vighnaṃ plavaǣ ngamaiḥ so'tha yuyutsayā ratham /
analyzed: juhvataḥ tasya cakāra vighnam sotha yuyutsayā ratham

original: samāsthitaḥ kārmukabāṇapāṇiḥ prayudyayau lakṣmaṇamāṇsu garjan / 8.173 /
analyzed: samāsthitaḥ kārmuka bāṇa pāṇiḥ prayudyayau lakṣmaṇam āṇsu garjan

original: ubhau ca tāvastravidāṃ variṣṭhau śaraiḥ śarīrāntakaraistatakṣatuḥ /
analyzed: ubhau ca tau astra vidām variṣṭhau śaraiḥ śarīra anta karaiḥ tatakṣatuḥ

original: diśaśca sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ śarottamairvidhāya śikṣāstrabalairnirantarāḥ / 8.174 /
analyzed: diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ śara uttamaiḥ vidhāya śikṣā astra balaiḥ nirantarāḥ

original: astrāṇi tasyāstravaraiḥ sa lakṣmaṇo nivārya śatroścalakuṇḍalojjvalam /
analyzed: astrāṇi tasya astra varaiḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ nivārya śatroḥ cala kuṇḍala ujjvalam

original: śiraḥ śareṇā'śu samunmamātha suraiḥ prasūnairatha cābhivṛṣṭaḥ / 8.175 /
analyzed: śiraḥ śareṇa āśu samunmamātha suraiḥ prasūnaiḥ atha ca abhivṛṣṭaḥ

original: nipātite'smin nitarāṃ niśācarān plavaṅgamā jaghnuranekakoṭiśaḥ /
analyzed: nipātite ismin nitarām niśācarān plavaṅgamāḥ jaghnuḥ aneka koṭiśas

original: hatāvaśiṣṭāstu daśānanāya śaśaṃ suratyāptasutapraṇāṇsam / 8.176 /
analyzed: hata avaśiṣṭāḥ tu daśānanāya śaśam su rati āpta suta praṇāṇsam

original: sa tanniśamyāpriyamugrarūpaṃ bhṛśaṃ viniśvasya vilapya duḥkhāt /
analyzed: sa tat niśamya apriyam ugra rūpam bhṛśam viniśvasya vilapya duḥkhāt

original: saṃ sthāpayāmāsa matiṃ punaśca mariṣya ityeva viniścitārthaḥ / 8.177 /
analyzed: sam sthāpayāmāsa matim punar ca mariṣye iti eva viniścita arthaḥ

original: maraṇābhimukhaḥ śīghraṃ rāvaṇo raṇakarmaṇe /
analyzed: maraṇa abhimukhaḥ śīghram rāvaṇaḥ raṇa karmaṇe

original: sajjībhavannantaraiva dideśa balamūrjitam / 8.178 /
analyzed: sajjībhavan antarā eva dideśa balam ūrjitam

original: triṃ śat sahasrāṇi mahaughakānāmakṣohiṇīnāṃ sahaṣaṭsahasram /
analyzed: trim śat sahasrāṇi mahaughakānām akṣohiṇīnām saha ṣaṣ sahasram

original: śrameṇa saṃ yojayatā'śu rāmaṃ sajjo bhavāmīti dideśa rāvaṇaḥ / 8.179 /
analyzed: śrameṇa sam yojayata āśu rāmam sajjaḥ bhavāmi iti dideśa rāvaṇaḥ

original: tadapradhṛṣyaṃ varataḥ svayambhuvo yugāntakālārṇavaghūrṇitopamam /
analyzed: tat apradhṛṣyam varataḥ svayambhuvaḥ yugānta kāla arṇava ghūrṇita upamam

original: pragṛhya nānāvidhamastraśastraṃ balaṃ kapī ñchīghratamaṃ jagāma / 8.180 /
analyzed: pragṛhya nānāvidham astra śastram balam kapīn śīghratamam jagāma

original: āgacchamānaṃ tadapārameyaṃ balaṃ sughoraṃ pral . ayārṇavopamam /
analyzed: āgacchamānam tat apārameyam balam su ghoram

original: bhayāt samudvignaviṣaṇṇacetasaḥ kapipravīrā nitarāṃ pradudruvuḥ / 8.181 /
analyzed: bhayāt samudvigna viṣaṇṇa cetasaḥ kapi pravīrāḥ nitarām pradudruvuḥ

original: varo hi datto'sya purā svayambhuvā dharātal . e'lpe'pi nivāsaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: varaḥ hi dattaḥ usya purā svayambhuvā nivāsa śaktiḥ

original: ajeyatā cetyata eva sārkajāḥ plavaṅgamā draṣṭumapi sma nāṇsakan / 8.182 /
analyzed: ajeya tā ca iti atas eva sa arka jāḥ plavaṅgamāḥ draṣṭum api sma

original: pragṛhya rāmo'tha dhanuḥ śarāṃ śca samantatastānavadhīccharaughaiḥ /
analyzed: pragṛhya rāmaḥ utha dhanuḥ śarān śca samantataḥ tān avadhīt śara oghaiḥ

original: sa eva sarvatra ca dṛśyamāno vidikṣu dikṣu prajahāra sarvaśaḥ / 8.183 /
analyzed: saḥ eva sarvatra ca dṛśyamānaḥ vidikṣu dikṣu prajahāra sarvaśas

original: kṣaṇena sarvāṃ śca nihatya rāghavaḥ plavaṅgamānāmṛṣabhaiḥ sa pūjitaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇena sarvām śca nihatya rāghavaḥ plavaṅgamānām ṛṣabhaiḥ sa pūjitaḥ

original: abhiṣṭutaḥ sarvasurottamairmudā bhṛśaṃ prasūnotkaravarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ / 8.184 /
analyzed: abhiṣṭutaḥ sarva sura uttamaiḥ mudā bhṛśam prasūna utkara varṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ

original: lxxviii.athā'yayau sarvaniśācareśvaro hatāvaśiṣṭena balena saṃ vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atha āyayau sarva niśācara īśvaraḥ hata avaśiṣṭena balena sam vṛtaḥ

original: vimānamāruhya ca puṣpakaṃ tvaran śarīranāṇsāya mahāyudhoddhataḥ / 8.185 /
analyzed: vimānam āruhya ca puṣpakam tvaran śarīra nāṇsāya mahā āyudha uddhataḥ  /

original: virūpanetro'thaca yūpanetrastathā mahāpārśvamahodarau ca /
analyzed: yūpanetraḥ tathā mahāpārśva mahodarau ca

original: yayustamāvṛtya sahaiva mantriṇo mṛtiṃ purodhāya raṇāya yāntam / 8.186 /
analyzed: yayuḥ tam āvṛtya saha eva mantriṇaḥ mṛtim purodhāya raṇāya yāntam  /

original: athāsya sainyāni nijaghnurojasā samantataḥ śailaśilābhivṛṣṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: athā asya sainyāni nijaghnuḥ ojasā samantataḥ śaila śilā abhivṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: plavaṅgamāstānabhivīkṣya vīryavān sasāra vegena mahodaro ruṣā / 8.187 /
analyzed: plavaṅgamāḥ tān abhivīkṣya vīryavān sasāra vegena mahodaraḥ ruṣā

original: vīkṣyātikāyaṃ tamabhidravantaṃ sa kumbhakarṇo'yamiti bruvantaḥ /
analyzed: vīkṣya ati kāyam tam abhidravantam sa kumbhakarṇaḥ yam iti bruvantaḥ

original: pradudruvurvānaravīrasa' nghāstamāsasādā'śu suto'tha vālinaḥ / 8.188 /
analyzed: pradudruvuḥ vānara vīra sa nghāḥ tam āsasāda āśu sutā utha vālinaḥ

original: vadan sa tiṣṭhadhvamiti sma vīro vibhīṣikāmātramidaṃ na yāta /
analyzed: vadan sa tiṣṭhadhvam iti sma vīraḥ vibhīṣikā mātram idam na yāta

original: itīrayannagrata eṣa pupluve mahodarasyendrasutātmajo balī / 8.189 /
analyzed: iti īrayan agratas eṣa pupluve mahodarasya indra suta ātmajaḥ balī

original: atho śarānāṇsu vimuñcamānaṃ śiraḥ parāmṛśya nipātya bhūtal . e /
analyzed: atha u śarān āṇsu vimuñcamānam śiraḥ parāmṛśya nipātya

original: mamarda padbhyāmabhavad gatāsurmahodaro vālisutena cūrṇitaḥ / 8.190 /
analyzed: mamarda padbhyām abhavat gatāsuḥ mahodaraḥ vāli sutena cūrṇitaḥ  /

original: atho mahāpārśva upājagāma pravarṣamāṇo'sya śarāmbudhārāḥ /
analyzed: atho mahāpārśvaḥ upājagāma pravarṣamāṇaḥ asya śara ambu dhārāḥ

original: prasaṃ hya cā'cchidya dhanuḥ karasthaṃ samādade khaḍgamamuṣya so'ṅgadaḥ / 8.191 /
analyzed: ca ācchidya dhanuḥ kara stham samādade khaḍgam amuṣya sa uṅgadaḥ

original: nigṛhya keśeṣu nipātya bhūtal . e cakarta vāmāṃ sata odaraṃ param /
analyzed: nigṛhya keśeṣu nipātya cakarta vāmām satas odaram param

original: yathopavītaṃ sa tathā dvidhākṛto mamāra mantrī rajanīcareśituḥ / 8.192 /
analyzed: yathā upavītam sa tathā dvidhā kṛtaḥ mamāra mantrī rajanīcara īśituḥ

original: athainamājagmaturudyatāyudhau virūpanetro'pyatha yūpanetraḥ /
analyzed: atha enam ājagmatuḥ udyata āyudhau virūpa netraḥ upi atha yūpa netraḥ

original: yathaiva meghau divi tigmaraśmiṃ tathā samācchādayatāṃ śaraughaiḥ / 8.193 /
analyzed: yathā eva meghau divi tigmaraśmim tathā samācchādayatām śara oghaiḥ

original: t ābhyāṃ sa baddhaḥ śarapañjareṇa viceṣṭituṃ nāṇsakadatra vīraḥ /
analyzed: ābhyām sa baddhaḥ śara pañjareṇa viceṣṭitum vīraḥ

original: harīśvaraḥ śailamatipramāṇamutpāṭya cikṣepa tayoḥ śarīre / 8.194 /
analyzed: hari īśvaraḥ śailam ati pramāṇam utpāṭya cikṣepa tayoḥ śarīre

original: ubhau ca tau tena vicūrṇitau raṇe raveḥ sutasyorubaleritena /
analyzed: ubhau ca tau tena vicūrṇitau raṇe raveḥ sutasya ūru bala īritena

original: niśācareśo'tha śareṇa sūryajaṃ bibheda vakṣasyapi so'patad bhuvi / 8.195 /
analyzed: niśācara īśaḥ utha śareṇa sūryajam bibheda vakṣasi api saḥ upatat bhuvi  /

original: tataḥ sa sarvāṃ śca haripravīrān vidhūya bāṇairbalavān daśānanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa sarvān śca hari pravīrān vidhūya bāṇaiḥ balavān daśānanaḥ

original: lxxix.jagāma rāmābhimukhastadainaṃ rurodha rāmāvarajaṃ śaraughaiḥ / 8.196 /
analyzed: lxxixjagāma rāma abhimukhaḥ tadā enam rurodha rāma avarajam śara oghaiḥ

original: tadā daśāsyo'ntakadaṇḍakalpāṃ mayāya dattāṃ kamalodbhavena /
analyzed: tadā mayāya dattām kamalodbhavena

original: mayādgṛhīt āṃ ca vivāhakāle pragṛhya śaktiṃ visasarja lakṣmaṇe / 8.197 /
analyzed: ām ca vivāha kāle pragṛhya śaktim visasarja lakṣmaṇe  /

original: tayā sa vīraḥ suvidāritorāḥ papāta bhūmau subhṛśaṃ vimūrcchitaḥ /
analyzed: tayā sa vīraḥ su vidārita urāḥ papāta bhūmau su bhṛśam vimūrcchitaḥ

original: marutsutaḥ śailamatipramāṇaṃ cikṣepa rakṣaḥ pativakṣasi drutam / 8.198 /
analyzed: marut sutaḥ śaila mati pramāṇam cikṣepa rakṣaḥ pati vakṣasi drutam

original: tenātigāḍhaṃ vyathito daśānano mukhairvamañchoṇitapūramāṇsu /
analyzed: tena ati gāḍham vyathitaḥ daśa ānanaḥ mukhaiḥ vaman śoṇita pūra māṇsu

original: tadantareṇa pratigṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ jagāma śaktyā saha rāmasannidhim / 8.199 /
analyzed: tad antareṇa pratigṛhya lakṣmaṇam jagāma śaktyā saha rāma sannidhim

original: samudbabarhātha ca tāṃ sa rāghavo dideśa ca prāṇavarātmajaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: samudbabarha atha ca tām sa rāghavaḥ dideśa ca prāṇa vara ātmajam punar

original: prabhuḥ samānetumatho varauṣadhīḥ sa cā'nināyā'śu giriṃ punastam / 8.200 /
analyzed: prabhuḥ samānetum atho vara oṣadhīḥ sa ca ānināya āśu girim punar tam

original: tadgandhamātreṇa samutthito'sau saumitrirāttorubalaśca pūrvavat /
analyzed: tad gandha mātreṇa samutthitā usau saumitriḥ ātta uru balaḥ ca pūrvavat

original: śaśaṃ sa cāṇsliṣya marutsutaṃ prabhuḥ sa rāghavo'gaṇyaguṇārṇavaḥ smayan / 8.201 /
analyzed: śaśam sa marut sutam prabhuḥ sa rāghavaḥ gaṇya guṇa arṇavaḥ smayan  /

original: prākṣipat taṃ girivaraṃ laṅkāsthaḥ san sa mārutiḥ /
analyzed: prākṣipat tam giri varam laṅkā sthaḥ san sa mārutiḥ

original: ardhalakṣe yojanānāṃ yatrāsau pūrvasaṃ sthitaḥ / 8.202 /
analyzed: ardha lakṣe yojanānām yatra asau sthitaḥ

original: tadbāhuvegāt saṃ śleṣa prāpa pūrvavadeva saḥ /
analyzed: tad bāhu vegāt sam śleṣa prāpa pūrvavat eva saḥ

original: mṛt āṇsca ye plavaṅgāstu tadgandhāt te'pi jīvitāḥ / 8.203 /
analyzed: ye plavaṅgāḥ tu tad gandhāt te api jīvitāḥ

original: rāmājñayaiva rakṣāṃ si harayo'bdhāvavākṣipan /
analyzed: rāma ājñayā eva rakṣām si harayā ubdhau avākṣipan

original: nojjīvitāstataste tu vānarā nirujo'bhavan / 8.204 /
analyzed: na ujjīvitāḥ tatas te tu vānarāḥ

original: chinnaprarohiṇaṇscaiva viśalyāḥ pūrvavarṇinaḥ /
analyzed: viśalyāḥ pūrva varṇinaḥ

original: auṣadhīnāṃ prabhāvena sarve'pi harayo'bhavan / 8.205 /
analyzed: auṣadhīnām prabhāvena sarve api harayaḥ bhavan

original: athā'sasādottamapūruṣaṃ prabhuṃ vimānago rāvaṇa āyudhaughān /
analyzed: atha āsasāda uttama pūruṣam prabhum vimāna gaḥ rāvaṇaḥ āyudha oghān

original: pravarṣamāṇo raghuvaṃ śanāthaṃ tamāttadhanvā'bhiyayau ca rāmaḥ / 8.206 /
analyzed: pravarṣamāṇaḥ raghuvam śanātham tam ātta dhanvā abhiyayau ca rāmaḥ

original: sammānayan rāghavamādipūruṣaṃ niryātayāmāsa rathaṃ purandaraḥ /
analyzed: sammānayan rāghavam ādipūruṣam niryātayāmāsa ratham purandaraḥ

original: sahāyudhaṃ mātalisaṅgṛhītaṃ samārurohā'śu sa lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / 8.207 /
analyzed: saha āyudham mātali saṅgṛhītam samāruroha āśu sa lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ

original: lxxx.āruhya taṃ rathavaraṃ jagadekanātho lokābhayāya rajanīcaranāthamāṇsu /
analyzed: āruhya tam ratha varam jagat eka nāthaḥ loka abhayāya

original: abhyudyayau daśaśatāṃ śurivāndhakāraṃ lokānaśeṣata imān nigirantamudyan / 8.208 /
analyzed: abhyudyayau daśa śatām śuḥ iva andhakāram lokān aśeṣatas imān nigirantam udyan  /

original: āyāntamīkṣya rajanīcaralokanāthaḥ śastrāṇyathāstrasahitāni mumoca rāme /
analyzed: āyāntam īkṣya rajanīcara loka nāthaḥ śastrāṇi atha astra sahitāni mumoca rāme

original: rāmastu tāni vinihatya nijairmahāstraistasyottamāṅgadaśakaṃ yugapannyakṛntat / 8.209 /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu tāni vinihatya nijaiḥ mahā astraiḥ tasya uttamāṅga daśakam yugapad nyakṛntat  /

original: kṛtt āni tāni punareva samutthitāni dṛṣṭvā varācchatadhṛterhṛdayaṃ vibheda /
analyzed: āni tāni punar eva samutthitāni dṛṣṭvā varāt śatadhṛteḥ hṛdayam vibheda

original: bāṇena vajrasadṛśena sa bhinnahṛtko raktaṃ vaman nyapatadāṇsu mahāvimānāt / 8.210 /
analyzed: bāṇena vajra sadṛśena sa bhinna hṛtkaḥ raktam vaman nyapatat āṇsu mahā vimānāt

original: tasmin hate trijagatāṃ paramapratīpe brahmā ṇsivena sahitaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ /
analyzed: tasmin hate trijagatām parama pratīpe brahmā ṇsivena sahitaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ

original: abhyetya pādayugal . aṃ jagadekabhartū rāmasya bhaktibharitaḥ śirasā nanāma / 8.211 /
analyzed: abhyetya jagat eka bhartuḥ rāmasya bhakti bharitaḥ śirasā nanāma  /

original: athainamastaut pitaraṃ kṛt āñjalirguṇābhirāmaṃ jagataḥ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: athā enam astaut pitaram kṛt āñjaliḥ guṇa abhirāmam jagataḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: jitaṃ jitaṃ te'jita lokabhāvana prapannapālāya natāḥ sma te vayam / 8.212 /
analyzed: jitam jitam tejita loka bhāvana prapanna pālāya natāḥ sma te vayam  /

original: tvameka īśo'sya nacā'dirantastaveḍya kālena tathaiva deśataḥ /
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ īśaḥ usya na ca ādiḥ antaḥ tava īḍya kālena tathā eva deśataḥ

original: guṇā hyagaṇyāstava te'pyanantāḥ pratyekaśaścā'divināṇsavarjitāḥ / 8.213 /
analyzed: guṇāḥ hi agaṇyāḥ tava te api anantāḥ pratyekaśaḥ ca ādi vināṇ sa varjitāḥ

original: nacodbhavo naiva tiraskṛtiste kvacid guṇānāṃ parataḥ svato vā /
analyzed: na ca udbhavaḥ nā eva tiraskṛtiḥ te kvacid guṇānām paratas svatas vā

original: tvameka ādyaḥ paramaḥ svatantro bhṛtyāstavāhaṃ śivapūrvakāṇsca ye / 8.214 /
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ ādyaḥ paramaḥ svatantraḥ bhṛtyāḥ tava aham śiva pūrvakān ca ye  /

original: yathā'rciṣo'gneḥ pavanasya vegā marīcayo'rkasya nadīṣu cā'paḥ /
analyzed: yathā arciṣā agneḥ pavanasya vegāḥ marīcayā ūrkasya nadīṣu ca āpaḥ

original: gacchanti cā'yanti ca santatāsttvat tadvanmadādyāḥ śivapūrvakāṇsca ye / 8.215 /
analyzed: gacchanti cāyanti ca santatāḥ ttvat tadvat mad ādyāḥ śiva pūrvakān ca ye  /

original: ye ye ca muktāstvatha ye ca baddhāḥ sarve taveśeśa vaśe sadaiva /
analyzed: ye ye ca muktāḥ tu atha ye ca baddhāḥ sarve tava īśa īśa vaśe sadā eva

original: vayaṃ sadā tvadguṇapūgamuccaiḥ sarve vadanto'pi na pāragāminaḥ / 8.216 /
analyzed: vayam sadā tvad guṇa pūgam uccais sarve vadantaḥ api na pāra gāminaḥ

original: kimeṣa īdṛgguṇakasya te prabho rakṣovadho'śeṣasuraprapālanam /
analyzed: kim eṣaḥ īdṛś guṇakasya te prabhoḥ rakṣaḥ vadha uśeṣa sura prapālanam

original: ananyasādhyaṃ hi tathā'pi tad dvayaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā tasya namonamaste / 8.217 /
analyzed: an anya sādhyam hi tathā api tat dvayam kṛtam tvayā tasya namaḥ namaḥ te

original: itīrite tvabjabhavena śūlī samāhvayad rāghavamāhavāya /
analyzed: iti īrite tu abja bhavena śūlī samāhvayat rāghavam āhavāya

original: varaṃ madīyaṃ tvagaṇayya rakṣo hataṃ tvayā tena raṇāya mehi / 8.218 /
analyzed: varam madīyam tu a gaṇayya rakṣaḥ hatam tvayā tena raṇāya mā ihi

original: itīrite'stvityabhidhāya rāghavo dhanuḥ pragṛhyā'śu śaraṃ ca sandadhe /
analyzed: iti īriteḥ tu iti abhidhāya rāghavaḥ dhanuḥ pragṛhya āśu śaram ca sandadhe

original: vikṛṣyamāṇe calitā vasundharā papāta rudro'pi dharāprakampataḥ / 8.219 /
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇe calitā vasundharā papāta rudraḥ api dharā prakampataḥ

original: lxxxi.athotthitaścā'surabhāvavarjitaḥ kṣamasva deveti nanāma pādayoḥ /
analyzed: atha utthitaḥ ca asura bhāva varjitaḥ kṣamasva deva iti nanāma pādayoḥ

original: uvāca ca tvadvaśago'smi sarvadā prasīda me tvadviṣayaṃ manaḥ kuru / 8.220 /
analyzed: uvāca ca tvad vaśagā asmi sarvadā prasīda me tvad viṣayam manaḥ kuru  /

original: athendramukhyāṇsca tamūcire surāstvayā'vitāḥ smo'dya niśācarād vayam /
analyzed: athā indra mukhyān ca tam ūcire surāḥ tvayā avitāḥ sma udya niśācarāt vayam

original: tathaiva sarvāpada eva nastvaṃ prapāhi sarve bhavadīyakāḥ sma / 8.221 /
analyzed: tathā eva sarva āpadaḥ eva naḥ tvam prapāhi sarve bhavadīyakāḥ sma

original: sīt ākṛtiṃ t āmatha tatra cā'gatāṃ divyacchalena praṇidhāya pāvake /
analyzed: ākṛtim tatra ca āgatām divya chalena praṇidhāya pāvake

original: kailāsatastāṃ punareva cā'gatāṃ sīt āmagṛhṇāddhutabhuksamarpitām / 8.222 /
analyzed: kailāsataḥ tām punar eva ca āgatām sīt ām agṛhṇāt hutabhuj samarpitām

original: j ānan girīśālayagāṃ sa sīt āṃ samagrahīt pāvakasampradattām /
analyzed: ānan girīśa ālaya gām sa sīt ām samagrahīt pāvaka sampradattām

original: mumoda samprāpya ca tāṃ sa rāmaḥ sā caiva devī bhagavantamāpya / 8.223 /
analyzed: mumoda samprāpya ca tām sa rāmaḥ sā ca eva devī bhagavantam āpya

original: atho girerānayanāt parastād ye vānarā rāvaṇabāṇapīḍit āḥ /
analyzed: atho gireḥ ānayanāt parastāt ye vānarāḥ rāvaṇa bāṇa pīḍit

original: t ārāpitā tān nirujaścakāra suṣeṇanāmā bhiṣajāṃ variṣṭhaḥ / 8.224 /
analyzed: ārāpitā tān nirujaḥ cakāra suṣeṇa nāmā bhiṣajām variṣṭhaḥ

original: tadā mṛt ān rāghava ānināya yamakṣayād devagaṇāṃ śca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tadā ān rāghavaḥ ānināya yama kṣayāt deva gaṇān śca sarvaśas

original: samanvajānāt pitaraṃ ca tatra samāgataṃ gantumiyeṣa cātha / 8.225 /
analyzed: samanvajānāt pitaram ca tatra samāgatam gantum iyeṣa ca atha

original: vibhīṣaṇenārpitamāruroha sa puṣpakaṃ tatsahitaḥ savānaraḥ /
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇena arpitam āruroha sa puṣpakam tad sahitaḥ sa vānaraḥ

original: purīṃ jagāmā'śu nijāmayodhyāṃ puro hanūmantamatha nyayojayat / 8.226 /
analyzed: purīm jagāma āśu nijām ayodhyām puras hanūmantam atha nyayojayat  /

original: dadarśa cāsau bharataṃ hutāṇsanaṃ praveṣṭukāmaṃ jagadīśvarasya /
analyzed: dadarśa ca asau bharatam hutāṇsanam praveṣṭu kāmam jagat īśvarasya

original: adarśanāt taṃ vinivārya rāmaṃ samāgataṃ cāsya śaśaṃ sa mārutiḥ / 8.227 /
analyzed: adarśanāt tam vinivārya rāmam samāgatam ca asya śaśam sa mārutiḥ

original: śrutvā pramodorubharaḥ sa tena sahaiva pauraiḥ sahitaḥ samātṛkaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā pramoda uru bharaḥ sa tena saha eva pauraiḥ sahitaḥ sa mātṛkaḥ

original: śatrughnayukto'bhisametya rāghavaṃ nanāma bāṣpākulalocanānanaḥ / 8.228 /
analyzed: śatrughna yuktaḥ abhisametya rāghavam nanāma bāṣpa ākula locana ānanaḥ

original: utthāpya taṃ raghupatiḥ sasvaje praṇayānvitaḥ /
analyzed: utthāpya tam raghu patiḥ sasvaje praṇaya anvitaḥ

original: śatrughnaṃ ca tadanyeṣu pratipede yathāvayaḥ / 8.229 /
analyzed: śatrughnam ca tat anyeṣu pratipede yathāvayas

original: purīṃ praviśya munibhiḥ sāmrājye cābhiṣecitaḥ /
analyzed: purīm praviśya munibhiḥ sāmrājye ca abhiṣecitaḥ

original: yathocitaṃ ca sammānya sarvānāhedamīśvaraḥ / 8.230 /
analyzed: yathocitam ca sammānya sarvān āha idam īśvaraḥ

original: sarvairbhavadbhiḥ sukṛtaṃ vidhāya dehaṃ manovāksahitaṃ madīyam /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ su kṛtam vidhāya deham manaḥ vāc sahitam madīyam

original: lxxxii.etāvadevākhilasadvidheyaṃ yat kāyavākcittabhavaṃ madarcanam / 8.231 /
analyzed: etāvat eva akhila sat vidheyam yat kāya vāc citta bhavam mad arcanam

original: muktipradānāt pratikartṛt ā me sarvasya cātho bhavatāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: mukti pradānāt ā me sarvasya ca atho bhavatām bhavet

original: hanūmato na pratikartṛt ā syāt svabhāvabhaktasya niraupadhaṃ me / 8.232 /
analyzed: hanūmataḥ na syāt svabhāva bhaktasya niraupadham me  /

original: madbhaktau jñānapūrtāvanupadhikabalapronnatau sthairyadhairya
analyzed: mad bhaktau jñāna pūrtau anupadhika bala pronnatau sthairya dhairya

original: svābhāvyādhikyatejaḥ sumatidamaśameṣvasya tulyo na kaścit /
analyzed: svābhāvya ādhikya tejaḥ sumati dama śameṣu asya tulyaḥ na kaścid

original: śeṣo rudraḥ suparṇo'pyuruguṇasamitau no sahasrāṃ śatulyā
analyzed: śeṣaḥ rudraḥ suparṇaḥ upi uru guṇa samitau no sahasrām śatulyā

original: asyetyasmānmadaiśaṃ padamahamamunā sārdhamevopabhokṣye / 8.233 /
analyzed: asya iti asmāt mad aiśam padam aham amunā sārdham eva upabhokṣye

original: pūrvaṃ jigāya bhuvanaṃ daśakandharo'sāvabjodbhavasya varato natu taṃ kadācit /
analyzed: pūrvam jigāya bhuvanam daśakandhara usau abja udbhavasya varataḥ na tu tam kadācid

original: kaścijjigāya puruhūtasutaḥ kapitvād viṣṇorvarādajayadarjuna eva cainam / 8.234 /
analyzed: kaścid jigāya puruhūta sutaḥ kapi tvāt viṣṇoḥ varāt ajayat arjunaḥ eva ca enam

original: datto varo na manujān prati vānarāṃ śca dhātrā'sya tena vijito yudhi vālinaiṣaḥ /
analyzed: dattaḥ varaḥ na manujān prati vānarān śca dhātrā asya tena vijitaḥ yudhi vālinā eṣaḥ

original: abjodbhavasya varamāṇsvabhibhūya rakṣo jigye tvahaṃ raṇamukhe balimāhvayantam / 8.235 /
analyzed: abja udbhavasya vara māṇsu abhibhūya rakṣaḥ jigye tu aham raṇa mukhe balim āhvayantam

original: balerdvārastho'haṃ varamasmai sampradāya pūrvaṃ tu /
analyzed: baleḥ dvāra sthaḥ ūham varam asmai sampradāya pūrvam tu

original: tena mayā rakṣo'staṃ yojanamayutaṃ padāṅgulyā / 8.236 /
analyzed: tena mayā rakṣoḥ tam yojanam ayutam pada aṅgulyā

original: punaśca yuddhāya samāhvayantaṃ nyapātayaṃ rāvaṇamekamuṣṭinā /
analyzed: punar ca yuddhāya samāhvayantam nyapātayam rāvaṇam eka muṣṭinā

original: mahābalo'haṃ kapilākhyarūpastrikoṭirūpaḥ pavanaśca me sutaḥ / 8.237 /
analyzed: mahā balā ham kapila ākhya rūpaḥ trikoṭi rūpaḥ pavanaḥ ca me sutaḥ

original: āvāṃ svaśaktyā jayināviti sma śivo varānme'jayadenamevam /
analyzed: āvām sva śaktyā jayinau iti sma śivaḥ varāt mejayat enam evam

original: j ñātvā surājeyamimaṃ hi vavre haro jayeyāhamamuṃ daśānanam / 8.238 /
analyzed: ñātvā su rājā iyam imam hi vavre haraḥ jayeya aham amum daśānanam

original: ataḥ svabhāvājjayināvahaṃ ca vāyuśca vāyurhanumān sa eṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas svabhāvāt jayinau aham ca vāyuḥ ca vāyuḥ hanumān saḥ eṣaḥ

original: amuṣya hetostu purā hi vāyunā ṇsivendrapūrvā api kāṣṭhavat kṛt āḥ / 8.239 /
analyzed: amuṣya hetoḥ tu purā hi vāyunā api kāṣṭha vat

original: ato hanūmān padametu dhāturmadājñayā sṛṣṭyavanādi karma /
analyzed: atas hanūmān padam etu dhātuḥ mad ājñayā sṛṣṭi avana ādi karma

original: mokṣaṃ ca lokasya sadaiva kurvan muktaśca muktān sukhayan pravartatām / 8.240 /
analyzed: mokṣam ca lokasya sadā eva kurvan muktaḥ ca muktān sukhayan pravartatām

original: bhogāṇsca ye yāni ca karmajātānyanādyanantāni mameha santi /
analyzed: bhogān ca ye yāni ca karma jātāni anādi anantāni mama iha santi

original: madājñayā tānyakhilāni santi dhātuḥ pade tat sahabhoganāma / 8.241 /
analyzed: mad ājñayā tāni akhilāni santi dhātuḥ pade tat sahabhoga nāma  /

original: etādṛśaṃ me sahabhojanaṃ te mayā pradattaṃ hanuman sadaiva /
analyzed: etādṛśam me sahabhojanam te mayā pradattam hanuman sadā eva

original: lxxxiii.itīritastaṃ hanumān praṇamya jagāda vākyaṃ sthirabhaktinamraḥ / 8.242 /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tam hanumān praṇamya jagāda vākyam sthira bhakti namraḥ  /

original: ko nvīśa te pādasarojabhājāṃ sudurlabho'rtheṣu caturṣvapīha /
analyzed: kaḥ nu īśa te pāda saroja bhājām su durlabha ūrtheṣu caturṣu api iha

original: tathā'pi nāhaṃ pravṛṇomi bhūman bhavatpadāmbhojaniṣevaṇādṛte / 8.243 /
analyzed: tathā api na aham pravṛṇomi bhūman bhavat pada ambhoja niṣevaṇāt ṛte

original: tvameva sākṣāt paramasvatantrastvameva sākṣādakhiloruśaktiḥ /
analyzed: tvam eva sākṣāt parama svatantraḥ tvam eva sākṣāt akhila uru śaktiḥ

original: tvameva cāgaṇyaguṇārṇavaḥ sadā ramāviriñcādibhirapyaśeṣaiḥ / 8.244 /
analyzed: tvam eva ca agaṇya guṇa arṇavaḥ sadā ramā viriñca ādibhiḥ api aśeṣaiḥ

original: sametya sarve'pi sadā vadanto'pyanantakālācca navai samāpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: sametya sarve api sadā vadantaḥ api ananta kālāt ca samāpnuyuḥ

original: guṇāṃ stvadīyān paripūrṇasaukhyajñānātmakastvaṃ hi sadā'tiśuddhaḥ / 8.245 /
analyzed: guṇān stvadīyān paripūrṇa saukhya jñāna ātmakaḥ tvam hi sadā ati śuddhaḥ

original: yaste kathāsevaka eva sarvadā sadāratistvayyacalaikabhaktiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te kathā sevakaḥ eva sarvadā sat aratiḥ tvayi acala eka bhaktiḥ

original: sa jīvamāno na paraḥ kathañcit tajjīvanaṃ me'stvadhikaṃ samastāt / 8.246 /
analyzed: sa jīvamānaḥ na paraḥ kathañcid tat jīvanam meḥ tu adhikam samastāt

original: pravarddhatāṃ bhaktiralaṃ kṣaṇekṣaṇe tvayīśa me hrāsavivarjitā sadā /
analyzed: pravarddhatām bhaktiḥ alam kṣaṇekṣaṇe tvayi īśa me hrāsa vivarjitā sadā

original: anugrahaste mayi caivameva niraupadhau tau mama sarvakāmaḥ / 8.247 /
analyzed: anugrahaḥ te mayi ca evam eva niraupadhau tau mama sarva kāmaḥ

original: itīritastasya dadau sa taddvayaṃ padaṃ vidhātuṃ sakalaiśca śobhanam /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tasya dadau sa tat dvayam padam vidhātum sakalaiḥ ca śobhanam

original: samāṇsliṣaccainamathā'rdrayā dhiyā yathocitaṃ sarvajanānapūjayat / 8.248 /
analyzed: samāṇsliṣat ca enam atha ārdrayā dhiyā yathocitam sarva janān apūjayat  /

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
śrīrāmacarite (hanūmati śrīrāmadayādānaṃ nḸama)
analyzed: śrī rāmacarite hanūmati śrī rāma dayā dānam nḥama

original: aṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: aṣṭamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: lxxxiv.(rāmasvadhāmapraveśaḥ )
analyzed: lxxxi vrāma sva dhāma praveśaḥ

original: atha navamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha navamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / athā'ptarājyo bhagavān sa lakṣmaṇaṃ jagāda rājā taruṇo bhavā'śu /
analyzed: om atha āpta rājyaḥ bhagavān sa lakṣmaṇam jagāda rājā taruṇaḥ bhava āśu

original: itīritastvāha sa lakṣmaṇo guruṃ bhavatpadābjānna paraṃ vṛṇomyaham / 9.1 /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tu āha sa lakṣmaṇaḥ gurum bhavat pada abjāt na param vṛṇomi aham

original: na māṃ bhavatpādaniṣevaṇaikaspṛhaṃ tadanyatra niyoktumarhati /
analyzed: na mām bhavat pāda niṣevaṇa eka spṛham tat anyatra niyoktum arhati

original: nahīdṛśaḥ kaścidanugrahaḥ kvacit tadeva me dehi tataḥ sadaiva / 9.2 /
analyzed: nahi īdṛśaḥ kaścid anugrahaḥ kvacid tat eva me dehi tatas sadā eva

original: itīritastasya tadeva dattvā dṛḍhaṃ samāṇsliṣya ca rāghavaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tasya tat eva dattvā dṛḍham ca rāghavaḥ prabhuḥ

original: sa yauvarājyaṃ bharate nidhāya jugopa lokānakhilān sadharmakān / 9.3 /
analyzed: sa yauvarājyam bharate nidhāya jugopa lokān akhilān sadharmakān

original: praśāsatīśe pṛthivī babhūva viriñcalokasya samā guṇonnatau /
analyzed: praśāsatī īśe pṛthivī babhūva viriñca lokasya samā guṇa unnatau

original: jano'khilo viṣṇuparo babhūva na dharmahāniśca babhūva kasyacit / 9.4 /
analyzed: janaḥ ukhilaḥ viṣṇu paraḥ babhūva na dharma hāniḥ ca babhūva kasyacid

original: guṇaiśca sarvairuditāṇsca sarve yathāyathā yogyatayoccanīcāḥ /
analyzed: guṇaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ uditān ca sarve yathā yathā yogyatayā ucca nīcāḥ

original: samastarogādibhirujjhitāṇsca sarve sahasrāyuṣa ūrjitā dhanaiḥ / 9.5 /
analyzed: samasta roga ādibhiḥ ujjhitān ca sarve sahasra āyuṣaḥ ūrjitāḥ dhanaiḥ

original: sarve'jarā nityabalopapannā yatheṣṭasiddhyā ca sadopapannāḥ /
analyzed: sarve ijarāḥ nitya bala upapannāḥ yathā iṣṭa siddhyā ca sadā upapannāḥ

original: samastadoṣaiśca sadā vihīnāḥ sarve surūpāṇsca sadā mahotsavāḥ / 9.6 /
analyzed: samasta doṣaiḥ ca sadā vihīnāḥ sarve surūpān ca sadā mahā utsavāḥ

original: sarve manovāktanubhiḥ sadaiva viṣṇuṃ yajante natu kañcidanyam /
analyzed: sarve manaḥ vāc tanubhiḥ sadā eva viṣṇum yajante na tu kañcid anyam

original: samastaratnodbharitā capṛthvī yatheṣṭadhānyā bahudugdhagomatī / 9.7 /
analyzed: samasta ratna udbharitā ca pṛthvī yathā iṣṭa dhānyā bahu dugdha gomatī

original: samastagandhāṇsca sadā'tihṛdyā rasā manohāriṇa eva tatra /
analyzed: samasta gandhān ca sadā ati hṛdyāḥ rasāḥ manohāriṇaḥ eva tatra

original: śabdāṇsca sarve śravaṇātihāriṇaḥ sparśāṇsca sarve sparśendriyapriyāḥ / 9.8 /
analyzed: śabdān ca sarve śravaṇa atihāriṇaḥ sparśān ca sarve sparśa indriya priyāḥ

original: na kasyacid duḥkhamabhūt kathañcinna vittahīnaśca babhūva kaścana /
analyzed: na kasyacid duḥkham abhūt kathañcid na vitta hīnaḥ ca babhūva kaścana

original: nādharmaśīlo na ca kaścanāprajo na duṣprajo naiva kubhāryakaśca / 9.9 /
analyzed: na adharma śīlaḥ na ca kaścana aprajaḥ na duṣprajaḥ na eva ku bhāryakaḥ ca

original: striyo nacā'san vidhavāḥ kathañcinna vai pumāṃ so vidhurā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: striyaḥ na ca āsan vidhavāḥ kathañcid na vai pumān saḥ vidhurāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: nāniṣṭayogaśca babhūva kasyacinnaceṣṭahānirnaca pūrvamṛtyuḥ / 9.10 /
analyzed: na aniṣṭa yogaḥ ca babhūva kasyacid na ca iṣṭa hāniḥ na ca pūrva mṛtyuḥ

original: yatheṣṭamālyābharaṇānulepanā yatheṣṭapānāṇsanavāsaso'khilāḥ /
analyzed: yatheṣṭa mālya ābharaṇa anulepanāḥ yatheṣṭa pānāṇsana vāsasā ukhilāḥ

original: babhūvurīśe jagatāṃ praśāsati prakṛṣṭadharmeṇa janārdane nṛpe / 9.11 /
analyzed: babhūvuḥ īśe jagatām praśāsati prakṛṣṭa dharmeṇa janārdane nṛpe

original: lxxxv.sa brahmarudramarudaśvidivākarādimūrddhanyaratnaparighaṭṭitapādapīṭhaḥ /
analyzed: brahma rudra marut aśvi divākara ādi mūrddhanya ratna parighaṭṭita pāda pīṭhaḥ

original: nityaṃ suraiḥ saha narairatha vānaraiśca sampūjyamānacaraṇo ramate rameśaḥ / 9.12 /
analyzed: nityam suraiḥ saha naraiḥ atha vānaraiḥ ca sampūjyamāna caraṇaḥ ramate rameśaḥ  /

original: tasyākhileśituranādyanugaiva lakṣmīḥ sīt ābhidhā tvaramayat svarataṃ sureśam /
analyzed: tasya akhila īśituḥ anādi anugā eva lakṣmīḥ sīt ābhidhā svaratam sureśam

original: nityāviyogiparamoccanijasvabhāvā saundaryavibhramasulakṣaṇapūrvabhāvā / 9.13 /
analyzed: nitya aviyogi parama ucca nija svabhāvā saundarya vibhrama su lakṣaṇa pūrvabhāvā

original: reme tayā sa paramaḥ svarato'pi nityaṃ nityonnatapramadabhārabhṛtasvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: reme tayā sa paramaḥ svarataḥ api nityam nitya unnata pramada bhāra bhṛta svabhāvaḥ

original: pūrṇoḍurājasuvirājitasanniśāsu dīpyannaśokavanikāsu supuṣpitāsu / 9.14 /
analyzed: pūrṇa uḍurāja suvirājita sat niśāsu dīpyan aśoka vanikāsu su puṣpitāsu

original: gāyanti cainamanuraktadhiyaḥ sukaṇṭhā gandharvacāraṇagaṇāḥ saha cāpsarobhiḥ /
analyzed: gāyanti ca enam anurakta dhiyaḥ su kaṇṭhāḥ gandharva cāraṇa gaṇāḥ saha ca apsarobhiḥ

original: taṃ tuṣṭuvurmunigaṇāḥ sahitāḥ sureśai rājāna enamanuyānti sadā'pramattāḥ / 9.15 /
analyzed: tam tuṣṭuvuḥ muni gaṇāḥ sahitāḥ sura īśaiḥ rājānaḥ enam anuyānti sadā apramattāḥ

original: evaṃ trayodaśasahasramasau samāstu pṛthvīṃ rarakṣa vijitāriramoghavīryaḥ /
analyzed: evam trayodaśa sahasram asau samāstu pṛthvīm rarakṣa vijita ariḥ amogha vīryaḥ

original: ānandaminduriva sandadhadindireśo lokasya sāndrasukhavāridhiraprameyaḥ / 9.16 /
analyzed: ānandam induḥ iva sandadhat indirā īśaḥ lokasya sāndra sukha vāridhiḥ aprameyaḥ

original: devyāṃ sa cājanayadindrahutāṇsanau dvau putrau yamau kuśalavau balinau guṇāḍhyau /
analyzed: devyām sa ca ajanayat indrahutāṇsanau dvau putrau yamau kuśa lavau balinau guṇa āḍhyau

original: śatrughnato lavaṇamudbaṇabāṇadagdhaṃ kṛtvā cakāra madhurāṃ puramugravīryaḥ / 9.17 /
analyzed: śatrughnataḥ lavaṇam udbaṇa bāṇa dagdham kṛtvā cakāra madhurām puram ugra vīryaḥ  /

original: koṭitrayaṃ sa nijaghāna tathā'surāṇāṃ gandharvajanma bharatena satāṃ ca dharmam /
analyzed: koṭi trayam sa nijaghāna tathā asurāṇām gandharva janma bharatena satām ca dharmam

original: saṃ śikṣayannayajaduttamakalpakaiḥ svaṃ yajñairbhavājamukhasatsacivāṇsca yatra / 9.18 /
analyzed: sam śikṣayan ayajat uttama kalpakaiḥ svam yajñaiḥ bhava ajamukha sat sacivān ca yatra

original: atha śūdratapaścaryānihataṃ vipraputrakam /
analyzed: atha śūdra tapaḥ caryā nihatam vipra putrakam

original: ujjīvayāmāsa vibhurhatvā taṃ śūdratāpasam / 9.19 /
analyzed: ujjīvayāmāsa vibhuḥ hatvā tam śūdra tāpasam

original: jaṅghanāmā'suraḥ pūrvaṃ girijāvaradānataḥ /
analyzed: jaṅgha nāmā asuraḥ pūrvam girijā vara dānataḥ

original: babhūva śūdraḥ kalpāyuḥ sa lokakṣayakāmyayā /
analyzed: babhūva śūdraḥ kalpa āyuḥ sa loka kṣaya kāmyayā

original: tapaścacāra durbuddhiricchan māheśvaraṃ padam / 9.20 /
analyzed: tapaḥ cacāra durbuddhiḥ icchan māheśvaram padam

original: ananyavadhyaṃ taṃ tasmājjaghāna puruṣottamaḥ /
analyzed: an anya vadhyam tam tasmāt jaghāna puruṣottamaḥ

original: śvetadattāṃ tathā mālāmagastyādāpa rāghavaḥ / 9.21 /
analyzed: śveta dattām tathā mālām agastyāt āpa rāghavaḥ

original: anannayajñakṛcchveto rājā kṣudvinivartanam /
analyzed: an anna yajña kṛt śvetaḥ rājā kṣudh vinivartanam

original: kurvan svamāṃ sairdhātrokto mālāṃ rāmārthamarpayat /
analyzed: kurvan su amām saiḥ dhātrā uktaḥ mālām rāma artham arpayat

original: agastyāya na sākṣāttu rāme dadyādayaṃ nṛpaḥ / 9.22 /
analyzed: agastyāya na sākṣāt tu rāme dadyāt ayam nṛpaḥ

original: lxxxvi.kṣudabhāvamātraphaladaṃ na sākṣād rāghave'rpitam /
kṣudabhāvamātramākāṅkṣan māmasau paripṛcchati / 9.23 /
analyzed: kṣudh abhāva mātram ākāṅkṣan mām asau paripṛcchati

original: vyavadhānatastato rāme dadyācchaveta iti prabhuḥ /
analyzed: vyavadhānataḥ tatas rāme dadyāt śavetaḥ iti prabhuḥ

original: matvā brahmā'diśanmālāṃ pradātuṃ kumbhayonaye / 9.24 /
analyzed: matvā brahmā ādiśat mālām pradātum kumbhayonaye

original: t āmagastyakarapallavārpitāṃ bhakta eṣa mama kumbhasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: t ām agastya kara pallava arpitām bhaktaḥ eṣa mama kumbhasambhavaḥ

original: ityavetya jagṛhe janārdanastena saṃ stuta upāgamat puram / 9.25 /
analyzed: iti avetya jagṛhe janārdanaḥ tena sam stutaḥ upāgamat puram

original: atha kecidāsurasurāḥ surāṇakā ityuruprathitapauruṣāḥ purā /
analyzed: atha kecid āsura surāḥ surāṇakāḥ iti uru prathita pauruṣāḥ purā

original: te tapaḥ sumahadāsthitā vibhuṃ padmasambhavamavekṣya cocire / 9.26 /
analyzed: te tapaḥ su mahat āsthitāḥ vibhum padmasambhavam avekṣya cocire  /

original: bhūripāpakṛtino'pi niścayānmuktimāpnuma udārasadguṇa /
analyzed: bhūri pāpa kṛtinaḥ api niścayāt muktim āpnumaḥ udāra sat guṇa

original: ityudīritamajo'vadhārya tat prāha ca prahasitānanaḥ prabhuḥ / 9.27 /
analyzed: iti udīritam ajaḥ vadhārya tat prāha ca prahasita ānanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: yāvadeva ramayā rameśvaraṃ no viyojayatha sadguṇārṇavam /
analyzed: yāvat eva ramayā rameśvaram naḥ viyojayatha sat guṇa arṇavam

original: t āvaduccamapi duṣkṛtaṃ bhavanmokṣamārgaparipanthi no bhavet / 9.28 /
analyzed: t āvat uccam api duṣkṛtam bhavat mokṣa mārga paripanthi no bhavet

original: ityudīritamavetya te'surāḥ kṣipramokṣagamanotsukāḥ kṣitau /
analyzed: iti udīritam avetya te surāḥ kṣipra mokṣa gamana utsukāḥ kṣitau

original: sādhanopacayakāṅkṣiṇo harau śāsati kṣitimaśeṣato'bhavan / 9.29 /
analyzed: sādhana upacaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ harau śāsati kṣitim aśeṣatas bhavan

original: t ānanādikṛtadoṣasañcayairmokṣamārgagatiyogyatojjhitān /
analyzed: ānana ādi kṛta doṣa sañcayaiḥ mokṣa mārga gati yogya tā ujjhitān

original: maithilasya tanayā vyacālayanmāyayā svatanuvā svamārgataḥ / 9.30 /
analyzed: maithilasya tanayāḥ vyacālayat māyayā sva tanuvā sva mārgataḥ  /

original: ājñayaiva hi harestu māyayā mohitāstu ditijā vyanindayan /
analyzed: ājñayā eva hi hareḥ tu māyayā mohitāḥ tu ditijāḥ vyanindayan

original: rāghavaṃ niśicarāhṛt āṃ punarjānakīṃ jagṛha ityanekaśaḥ / 9.31 /
analyzed: rāghavam niśicara āhṛt ām punar jānakīm jagṛhe iti anekaśas

original: brahmavākyamṛtameva kārayan pātayaṃ stamasi cāndha āsurān /
analyzed: brahma vākya amṛtam eva kārayan pātayan stamasi ca andhe āsurān

original: nityameva sahito'pi sītayā so'jñasākṣikamabhūd viyuktavat / 9.32 /
analyzed: nityam eva sahitaḥ api sītayā viyukta vat

original: tena cāndhatama īyurāsurā yajñamāhvayadasau ca maithilīm /
analyzed: tena ca andhatamaḥ īyuḥ āsurāḥ yajñam āhvayat asau ca maithilīm

original: tatra bhūmiśapathacchalānnṛṇāṃ dṛṣṭimārgamapahāya sā sthitā / 9.33 /
analyzed: tatra bhūmi śapatha chalāt nṛṇām dṛṣṭi mārgam apahāya sā sthitā

original: guruṃ hi jagato viṣṇurbrahmāṇamasṛjat svayam /
analyzed: gurum hi jagataḥ viṣṇuḥ brahmāṇam asṛjat svayam

original: lxxxvii.tena tadvacanaṃ satsu nānṛtaṃ kurute kvacit / 9.34 /
analyzed: tad vacanam satsu na anṛtam kurute kvacid

original: nāsatsvapyanṛtaṃ kuryād vacanaṃ pāralaukikam /
analyzed: na asatsu api anṛtam kuryāt vacanam pāralaukikam

original: aihikaṃ tvasureṣveva kvaciddhanti janārdanaḥ / 9.35 /
analyzed: aihikam tu asureṣu eva kvacid hanti janārdanaḥ

original: nijādhikyasya vijñaptyai kvacid vāyustadājñayā /
analyzed: nija ādhikyasya vijñaptyai kvacid vā āyuḥ tad ājñayā

original: hanti brahmatvamātmīyamaddhā jñāpayituṃ prabhuḥ / 9.36 /
analyzed: hanti brahma tvam ātmīyam addhā jñāpayitum prabhuḥ

original: nānyaḥ kaścit tadvarāṇāṃ śāpānāmapyatikramī /
analyzed: na anyaḥ kaścid tad varāṇām śāpānām api atikramī

original: ayogyeṣu tu rudrādivākyaṃ tau kuruto mṛṣā /
analyzed: ayogyeṣu tu rudra ādi vākyam tau kurutaḥ mṛṣā

original: ekadeśena satyaṃ tu yogyeṣvapi kadācana / 9.37 /
analyzed: eka deśena satyam tu yogyeṣu api kadācana

original: na viṣṇorvacanaṃ kvāpi mṛṣā bhavati kasyacit /
analyzed: na viṣṇoḥ vacanam kvāpi mṛṣā bhavati kasyacid

original: etadartho'vatāraśca viṣṇorbhavati sarvadā / 9.38 /
analyzed: etad arthaḥ uvatāraḥ ca viṣṇoḥ bhavati sarvadā

original: praviśya bhūmau sā devī lokadṛṣṭyanusārataḥ /
analyzed: praviśya bhūmau sā devī loka dṛṣṭi anusārataḥ

original: reme rāmeṇāviyuktā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā / 9.39 /
analyzed: reme rāmeṇa a viyuktā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā

original: evaṃ ramālāl . itapādapallavaḥ punaḥ sa yajñaiśca yajan svameva /
analyzed: evam ita pāda pallavaḥ punar sa yajñaiḥ ca yajan svam eva

original: varāṇsvamedhādibhirāptakāmo reme'bhirāmo nṛpatīn viśikṣayan / 9.40 /
analyzed: varān sva medhā ādibhiḥ āpta kāmaḥ nṛpatīn viśikṣayan

original: rāmasya dṛśyā tvanyeṣāmadṛśyā janakātmajā /
analyzed: rāmasya dṛśyā tu anyeṣām adṛśyā janakātmajā

original: bhūmipraveśādūrdhvaṃ sā reme saptaśataṃ samāḥ / 9.41 /
analyzed: bhūmi praveśāt ūrdhvam sā reme sapta śatam samāḥ

original: evaṃ vidhānyagaṇit āni janārdanasya rāmāvatāracaritāni tadanyapumbhiḥ /
analyzed: evam vidhāni agaṇit āni janārdanasya rāma avatāra caritāni tad anya pumbhiḥ

original: śakyāni naiva manasā'pi hi tāni kartuṃ brahmeśaśeṣapuruhūtamukhaiḥ suraiśca / 9.42 /
analyzed: śakyāni nā eva manasā api hi tāni kartum brahma īśa śeṣa puruhūta mukhaiḥ suraiḥ ca

original: tasyaivamabjabhavalokasamāmimāṃ kṣmāṃ kṛtvā'nuśāsata udīkṣya guṇān dharāyāḥ /
analyzed: tasya evam abja bhava loka samām imām kṣmām kṛtvā anuśāsataḥ udīkṣya guṇān dharāyāḥ

original: vaiśeṣyamātmasadanasya hi kāṅkṣamāṇā vṛndārakāḥ kamalajaṃ prati tacchaśaṃ suḥ / 9.43 /
analyzed: vaiśeṣyam ātma sadanasya hi kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ vṛndārakāḥ kamalajam prati tat śaśam suḥ

original: āmantrya taiḥ saha vibhurbhagavatprayāṇaṃ svīyāya sadmana iyeṣa dideśa caiva /
analyzed: āmantrya taiḥ saha vibhuḥ bhagavat prayāṇam svīyāya sadmane iyeṣa dideśa ca eva

original: rudraṃ svalokagamanāya raghūttamasya samprārthane sa ca sametya vibhuṃ yayāce / 9.44 /
analyzed: rudram sva loka gamanāya raghūttamasya samprārthane sa ca sametya vibhum yayāce  /

original: ekāntametya raghupeṇa samastakālo rudro jagāda vacanaṃ jagato vidhātuḥ /
analyzed: ekāntam etya raghupeṇa samasta kālaḥ rudraḥ jagāda vacanam jagataḥ vidhātuḥ

original: vaiśeṣyamātmabhavanasya hi kāṅkṣamāṇāstvāmarthayanti vibudhāḥ sahitā vidhātrā / 9.45 /
analyzed: vaiśeṣyam ātma bhavanasya hi kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ tvām arthayanti vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ vidhātrā

original: lxxxviii.putrastaveśa kamalaprabhavastathā'haṃ pautrastu pautrakavaco yadapi hyayogyam /
analyzed: putraḥ te īśa kamala prabhavaḥ tathā aham pautraḥ tu pautra kavacaḥ yat api hi ayogyam

original: sambhāvayanti guṇinastadahaṃ yayāce gantuṃ svasadma natipūrvamito bhavantam / 9.46 /
analyzed: sambhāvayanti guṇinaḥ tat aham yayāce gantum sva sadma nati pūrvam itas bhavantam

original: yatkāryasādhanakṛte vibudhārthitastvaṃ prāduścakartha nijarūpamaśeṣameva /
analyzed: yad kārya sādhana kṛte vibudha arthitaḥ tvam prāduścakartha nija rūpam aśeṣam eva

original: tat sādhitaṃ hi bhavatā taditaḥ svadhāma kṣipraṃ prayāhi harṣaṃ vibudheṣu kurvan / 9.47 /
analyzed: tat sādhitam hi bhavatā tat itas sva dhāma kṣipram prayāhi harṣam vibudheṣu kurvan  /

original: Oṃ ityuvāca bhagavāṃ stadaśeṣameva śrutvā rahasyatha tanustvaparā harasya /
analyzed: om iti uvāca bhagavān stat aśeṣam eva śrutvā rahasi atha tanuḥ tu aparā harasya

original: durvāsanāmayugihā'gamadāṇsu rāma māṃ bhojaya kṣudhitamityasakṛd bruvāṇā / 9.48 /
analyzed: rāma mām bhojaya kṣudhitam iti asakṛt bruvāṇā

original: siddhaṃ na deyamatha sādhyamapīti vācaṃ śrutvā'sya vāksamayajātamuru svahastāt /
analyzed: siddham na deyam atha sādhyam api iti vācam śrutvā asya vāc samaya jātam uru sva hastāt

original: annaṃ caturguṇamadādamṛtopamānaṃ rāmastadāpya bubhuje'tha muniḥ sutuṣṭaḥ / 9.49 /
analyzed: annam caturguṇam adāt amṛta upamānam rāmaḥ tat āpya bubhujetha muniḥ su tuṣṭaḥ

original: tṛpto yayau ca sakalān prati kopayānaḥ kaścinna me'rthitavaraṃ pratidātumīśaḥ /
analyzed: tṛptaḥ yayau ca sakalān prati kopayānaḥ kaścid na mā īrthita varam pratidātum īśaḥ

original: evampratijñaka ṛṣiḥ sa hi tatpratijñāṃ moghāṃ cakāra bhagavān natu kaścidanyaḥ / 9.50 /
analyzed: evampratijñakaḥ ṛṣiḥ sa hi tad pratijñām moghām cakāra bhagavān na tu kaścid anyaḥ  /

original: kuntī tu tasya hi munervarato'jayat tu rāmaḥ sa kṛṣṇatanuvā svabalājjigāya /
analyzed: kuntī tu tasya hi muneḥ varataḥ jayat tu rāmaḥ sa kṛṣṇa tanuvā sva balāt jigāya

original: tasmiñchive pratigate munirūpake ca yāhīti lakṣmaṇamuvāca ramāpatiḥ saḥ / 9.51 /
analyzed: tasmin śive pratigate muni rūpake ca yāhi iti lakṣmaṇam uvāca ramāpatiḥ saḥ

original: ekānte tu yadā rāmaścakre rudreṇa saṃ vidam /
analyzed: ekānte tu yadā rāmaḥ cakre rudreṇa sam vidam

original: dvārapālaṃ sa kṛtavāṃ stadā lakṣmaṇameva saḥ / 9.52 /
analyzed: dvārapālam sa kṛtavān stadā lakṣmaṇam eva saḥ  /

original: yadyatra praviśet kaściddhanmi tveti vaco bruvan /
analyzed: yadi atra praviśet kaścid hanmi tvā iti vacaḥ bruvan

original: tadantarā'gatamṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā'manyata lakṣmaṇaḥ / 9.53 /
analyzed: tad antara āgatam ṛṣim dṛṣṭvā amanyata lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: durvāsasaḥ pratijñā turāmaṃ prāpyaiva bhajyatām /
analyzed: durvāsasaḥ pratijñā turāmam prāpya eva bhajyatām

original: anyathā tvayaśo rāme karotyeṣa munirdhruvam / 9.54 /
analyzed: anyathā tu ayaśaḥ rāme karoti eṣa muniḥ dhruvam

original: rāghavo ghnannapi tu māṃ karotyeva dayāṃ mayi /
analyzed: rāghavaḥ ghnan api tu mām karoti eva dayām mayi

original: iti matvā dadau mārgaṃ sa tu durvāsase tadā / 9.55 /
analyzed: iti matvā dadau mārgam sa tu durvāsase tadā

original: svalokagamanākāṅkṣī svayameva tu rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: sva loka gamana ākāṅkṣī svayam eva tu rāghavaḥ

original: iyaṃ pratijñā hetuḥ syāditi hanmīti so'karot / 9.56 /

original: athā'ha vāyunandanaṃ sa rāghavaḥ samāṇsliṣan /

j ñānaṃ netrābjayugmānmukhavarakamalāt sarvavedārthasārāṃ
