original: senāpatirdhaneśasya kalpamāvīt sa rākṣasān / 9.111 /
analyzed: senāpatiḥ dhaneśasya kalpam āvīt sa rākṣasān

original: rāmājñayā jāmbavāṃ śca nyavasat pṛthivītal . e /
analyzed: rāma ājñayā jāmbavān śca nyavasat

original: utpattyarthaṃ j āmbavatyāstadarthaṃ sutapaścaran / 9.112 /
analyzed: utpatti artham ā ambavatyāḥ tad artham su tapaḥ caran

original: atho raghūṇāṃ pravaraḥ surārcitaḥ svayaikatanvā nyavasat surālaye /
analyzed: atho raghūṇām pravaraḥ sura arcitaḥ svayā eka tanvā nyavasat surālaye

original: dvitīyayā brahmasadasyadhīśvarastenārcito'thāparayā nijālaye / 9.113 /
analyzed: dvitīyayā brahma sadasi adhīśvaraḥ tena arcitaḥ utha aparayā nija ālaye

original: tṛtīyarūpeṇa nijaṃ padaṃ prabhuṃ vrajantamuccairanugamya devatāḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīya rūpeṇa nijam padam prabhum vrajantam uccais anugamya devatāḥ

original: agamyamaryādamupetya ca kramād vilokayanto'tividūrato'stuvan / 9.114 /
analyzed: agamya maryādam upetya ca kramāt

original: brahmā marunmārutasūnurīśaḥ śeṣo garutmān harijaḥ śakrakādyāḥ /
analyzed: brahmā marut māruta sūnuḥ īśaḥ śeṣaḥ garutmān hari jaḥ śakraka ādyāḥ

original: kramādanuvrajya tu rāghavasya śirasyathā'jñāṃ praṇidhāya niryayuḥ / 9.115 /
analyzed: kramāt anuvrajya tu rāghavasya śirasi atha ājñām praṇidhāya niryayuḥ  /

original: svaṃ svaṃ ca sarve sadanaṃ surā yayuḥ purandarādyāṇsca viriñcapūrvakāḥ /
analyzed: svam svam ca sarve sadanam surāḥ yayuḥ purandara ādyān ca viriñca pūrvakāḥ

original: marutsuto'tho badarīmavāpya nārāyaṇasyaiva padaṃ siṣeve / 9.116 /
analyzed: marut sutaḥ uthaḥ badarīm avāpya nārāyaṇasya eva padam siṣeve  /

original: samastaśāstrodbharitaṃ harervaco mudā tadā ṇsrotrapuṭena sambharan /
analyzed: samasta śāstra udbharitam hareḥ vacaḥ mudā tadā srotra puṭena sambharan

original: vadaṃ śca tattvaṃ vibudharṣabhāṇāṃ sadā munīnāṃ ca sukhaṃ hyuvāsa / 9.117 /
analyzed: vadan śca tattvam vibudha ṛṣabhāṇām sadā munīnām ca sukham hi uvāsa

original: rāmājñayā kimpuruṣeṣu rājyaṃ cakāra rūpeṇa tathā'pareṇa /
analyzed: rāma ājñayā kimpuruṣeṣu rājyam cakāra rūpeṇa tathā apareṇa

original: rūpaistathā'nyaiśca samastasadmanyuvāsa viṣṇoḥ satataṃ yatheṣṭam / 9.118 /
analyzed: rūpaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ ca samasta sadmani uvāsa viṣṇoḥ satatam yatheṣṭam

original: itthaṃ sa gāyañchatakoṭivistaraṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ bhāratapañcarātram /
analyzed: ittham sa gāyan śata koṭi vistaram rāmāyaṇam bhāratapañcarātram

original: vedāṃ śca sarvān sahitabrahmasūtrān vyācakṣāṇo nityasukhodbharo'bhūt / 9.119 /
analyzed: vedān śca sarvān sahita brahmasūtrān vyācakṣāṇaḥ nitya sukha udbharaḥ bhūt

original: rāmo'pi sārddhaṃ pavamānātmajena sa sītayā lakṣmaṇapūrvakaiśca /
analyzed: rāmaḥ upi sārddham pavamāna ātmajena sa sītayā lakṣmaṇa pūrvakaiḥ ca

original: tathā garutmatpramukhaiśca pārṣadaiḥ saṃ sevyamāno nyavasat payobdhau / 9.120 /
analyzed: tathā garutmat pramukhaiḥ ca pārṣadaiḥ sam sevyamānaḥ nyavasat payobdhau

original: kadācidīśaḥ sakalāvatārānekaṃ vidhāyāhipatau ca śete /
analyzed: kadācid īśaḥ sakala avatārān ekam vidhāya ahi patau ca śete

original: pṛthak ca saṃ vyūhya kadācidicchayā reme rameśo'mitasadguṇārṇavaḥ / 9.121 /
analyzed: pṛthak ca sam vyūhya kadācid icchayā reme rameśa umita sat guṇa arṇavaḥ

original: ityaśeṣapurāṇebhyaḥ pañcarātrebhya eva ca /
analyzed: iti aśeṣa purāṇebhyaḥ pañcarātrebhyaḥ eva ca

original: xcv.bhāratāccaiva vedebhyo mahārāmāyaṇādapi / 9.122 /
analyzed: bhāratāt ca eva vedebhyaḥ mahārāmāyaṇāt api

original: parasparavirodhasya hānānnirṇīya tattvataḥ /
analyzed: paraspara virodhasya hānāt nirṇīya tattvataḥ

original: yuktyā buddhibalāccaiva viṣṇoreva prasādataḥ / 9.123 /
analyzed: yuktyā buddhi balāt ca eva viṣṇoḥ eva prasādataḥ

original: bahukalpānusāreṇa mayeyaṃ satkathoditā /
analyzed: bahu kalpa anusāreṇa mayā iyam sat kathā uditā

original: naikagranthāṇsrayāt tasmānnā'śaṅkyā'tra viruddhatā / 9.124 /
analyzed: na eka grantha āṇsrayāt tasmāt na āśaṅkyā atra viruddha tā

original: kvacinmohāyāsurāṇāṃ vyatyāsaḥ pratilomatā /
analyzed: kvacid mohāya asurāṇām vyatyāsaḥ pratiloma tā

original: uktā grantheṣu tasmāddhi nirṇayo'yaṃ kṛto mayā / 9.125 /
analyzed: uktāḥ grantheṣu tasmāt hi nirṇayaḥ ayam kṛtaḥ mayā

original: evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇeṣu naivā'śaṅkyā viruddhatā /
analyzed: evam ca vakṣyamāṇeṣu na eva āśaṅkyā viruddha tā

original: sarvakalpasamaścāyaṃ pārāvaryakramaḥ sadā / 9.126 /
analyzed: sarva kalpa samaḥ ca ayam pārāvarya kramaḥ sadā

original: puṃ vyatyāsena coktiḥ syāt purāṇādiṣu kutracit /
analyzed: vyatyāsena ca uktiḥ syāt purāṇa ādiṣu kutracid

original: kṛṣṇāmāha yathā kṛṣṇo dhanañjayaśarairhatān /
analyzed: kṛṣṇām āha yathā kṛṣṇaḥ dhanañjaya śaraiḥ hatān

original: śataṃ duryodhanādīṃ ste darśayiṣya iti prabhuḥ / 9.127 /
analyzed: śatam ste darśayiṣye iti prabhuḥ

original: bhīmasenahatāste hi jñāyante bahuvākyataḥ /
analyzed: bhīmasena hatāḥ te hi jñāyante bahu vākyataḥ

original: vistāre bhīmanihatāḥ saṅkṣepe'rjunapātitāḥ /
analyzed: vistāre bhīma nihatāḥ saṅkṣepeḥ juna pātitāḥ

original: ucyante bahavaścānye puṃ vyatyāsasamāṇsrayāt / 9.128 /
analyzed: ucyante bahavaḥ ca anye pum vyatyāsa samāṇsrayāt

original: vistāre kṛṣṇanihatā balabhadrahatā iti /
analyzed: vistāre kṛṣṇa nihatāḥ balabhadra hatāḥ iti

original: ucyante ca kvacit kālavyatyāso'pi kvacid bhavet / 9.129 /
analyzed: ucyante ca kvacid kāla vyatyāsaḥ api kvacid bhavet

original: yathā suyodhanaṃ bhīmaḥ prāhasat kṛṣṇasannidhau /
analyzed: yathā suyodhanam bhīmaḥ prāhasat kṛṣṇa sannidhau

original: iti vākyeṣu bahuṣu jñāyate nirṇayādapi /
analyzed: iti vākyeṣu bahuṣu jñāyate nirṇayāt api

original: anirṇaye tu kṛṣṇasya pūrvamuktā gatistataḥ / 9.130 /
analyzed: anirṇaye tu kṛṣṇasya pūrvam uktā gatiḥ tatas

original: vyatyāsāstvevamādyāṇsca prātilomyādayastathā /
analyzed: vyatyāsāḥ tu evamādyān ca prātilomya ādayaḥ tathā

original: dṛśyante bhāratādyeṣu lakṣaṇagranthataśca te /
analyzed: dṛśyante bhārata ādyeṣu lakṣaṇa granthataḥ ca te

original: j ñāyante bahubhirvākyairnirṇayagranthatastathā / 9.131 /
analyzed: jñāyante bahubhiḥ vākyaiḥ nirṇaya granthataḥ tathā

original: tasmād vinirṇayagranthānāṇsrityaiva ca lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt ca lakṣaṇam

original: bahuvākyānusāreṇa nirṇayo'yaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ / 9.132 /
analyzed: bahu vākya anusāreṇa nirṇayaḥ ayam mayā kṛtaḥ

original: xcvi.uktaṃ lakṣaṇaṇsāstre ca kṛṣṇadvaipāyanodite /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa ṇ sa astre ca kṛṣṇadvaipāyana udite

original: “tribhāṣā yona jānāti rītīnāṃ śatameva ca / 9.133 /
analyzed: jānāti rītīnām śatam eva ca

original: vyatyāsādīn sapta bhedān vedādyarthaṃ tathā vadet /
analyzed: vyatyāsa ādīn sapta bhedān veda ādi artham tathā vadet

original: sa yāti nirayaṃ ghoramanyathājñānasambhavam” / 9.134 /
analyzed: sa yāti nirayam ghoram anyathā jñāna sambhavam

original: ityanyeṣu caśāstreṣu tatratatroditaṃ bahu /
analyzed: iti anyeṣu ca śāstreṣu tatra tatra uditam bahu

original: “vyatyāsaḥ prātilomyaṃ ca gomūtrī praghasastathā /
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ prātilomyam ca gomūtrī praghasaḥ tathā

original: ukṣaṇaḥ sudhuraḥ sādhu sapta bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ” / 9.135 /
analyzed: ukṣaṇaḥ sudhuraḥ sādhu sapta bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: ityādilakṣaṇānyatra nocyante'nyaprasaṅgataḥ / 67
analyzed: ityādi lakṣaṇāni atra na ucyante inyaprasaṅgataḥ

original: 67 “vyatyāsaḥ prātilomyaṃ ca gomūtrī praghasastathā /
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ prātilomyam ca gomūtrī praghasaḥ tathā

original: ukṣaṇaḥ sudhuraḥ sādhuḥ saptabhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / (9.135.1)/
analyzed: ukṣaṇaḥ sudhuraḥ sādhuḥ sapta bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: śraddadhānāya śiṣyḸaya pṛcchate me sutāya ca /
analyzed: śraddadhānāya pṛcchate me sutāya ca

original: vidhivadvada he (bho)
analyzed: vidhivat vada he bho

original: tāta vyatyāsādyarthanirṇayam / (9.135.2 /
analyzed: tāta vyatyāsa ādi artha nirṇayam

original: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyḸami yāvatte matigocaram /
analyzed: śṛṇu nārada yāvat te mati gocaram

original: vyatyāsādiprabhedānāṃ saṅkocādarthanirṇayam / (9.135.3)/
analyzed: vyatyāsa ādi prabhedānām saṅkocāt artha nirṇayam

original: eṣvekaikaprabhedastu pṛthagbhinnaḥ sahasradhā /
analyzed: eṣu ekaika prabhedaḥ tu pṛthak bhinnaḥ sahasradhā

original: tallakṣaṇaṃ tadarthāṃ śca tadudāharaṇāni ca / (9.135.4)/
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇam tad arthān ca tad udāharaṇāni ca

original: mḸularāmāyaṇe proktaṃ pañcarātrāgameṣu ca/
analyzed: mḹularāmāyaṇe proktam pañcarātra āgameṣu ca

original: vistarād vyāsarūpeṇa hariṇaivāmitātmanā / (9.135.5)/
analyzed: vistarāt vyāsa rūpeṇa hariṇā eva amita ātmanā

original: te sarve'nantavedārthanirṇayāyaiva kīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: te sarva inanta veda artha nirṇayāya eva kīrtitāḥ

original: tataḥ kalibalānmartyāḥ mandāyurmatiśālinaḥ / (9.135.6)/
analyzed: tatas kali balāt martyāḥ manda āyuḥ mati śālinaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvḸa vedān vibhajyaiva tadarthajñḸapanāya ca /
analyzed: vedān vibhajya eva ca

original: kṛtvā lakṣaṇaṇsāstraṃ ca tasminnapi ca īritāḥ / (9.135.7)/
analyzed: kṛtvā ca tasmin api ca īritāḥ

original: vyatyāsenaiva saṅkocāt svoktavādārthanirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: vyatyāsena eva saṅkocāt sva ukta vāda artha nirṇayaḥ

original: yḸavadbhiḥ syāt prabhedānāṃ prabhedaiste ca no'khilāḥ / (9.135.8)/
analyzed: syāt prabhedānām prabhedaiḥ te ca na ukhilāḥ

original: idānīṃ tatsamāloḍya niścityaiva pravacmi ca /
analyzed: idānīm tat samāloḍya niścitya eva pravacmi ca

original: bhāratasya purāṇānāṃ yḸavadbhiḥ syādvinirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: bhāratasya purāṇānām yḹavadbhiḥ syāt vinirṇayaḥ

original: xcvii.tatra bhedān tadarthāṃ śca śṛṇuṣvaikāgramānasaḥ / (9.135.9)/
analyzed: tatra bhedān tad arthān śca śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ

original: vyatyāso vyatyayaḥ proktaḥ puṃ vyatyāsastadādimaḥ /
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ vyatyayaḥ proktaḥ pum vyatyāsaḥ tad ādimaḥ

original: yathā'raṇye parvaṇi tu keśavaḥ prāha pārṣatīm / (9.135.10)/
analyzed: yathā araṇye parvaṇi tu keśavaḥ prāha pārṣatīm

original: sāntvayan dhārtarāṣṭrāṃ śca śatamarjunasāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: sāntvayan dhārtarāṣṭrān śca śatam arjuna sāyakaiḥ

original: mṛtān sandarśayiṣye'haṃ iti puṃ vyatyayaḥ smṛtaḥ / (9.135.11)/
analyzed: mṛtān iti pum vyatyayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: harivaṃ śe hariḥ kṛṣṇo gopagojanasaṃ vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: harivat śe hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ gopa go janasam vṛtaḥ

original: cikrīḍe jāhnavītīre vyatyāso daiśikaḥ smṛtaḥ / (9.135.12)/
analyzed: cikrīḍe jāhnavī tīre vyatyāsaḥ daiśikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: mḸarkaṇḍeye tathā pūrvaṃ rāmaḥ kṛtayuge'hanat /
analyzed: mḹarkaṇḍeye tathā pūrvam rāmaḥ

original: daśakaṇṭhaṃ kathetyādau vyatyāsaḥ kḸalikaḥ smṛtaḥ / (9.135.13)/
analyzed: daśa kaṇṭham kathā ityādau vyatyāsaḥ kḥalikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: hiṃ sākarmaratatvāttu hiṃ sāra iti kesarīm /
analyzed: hiṃ sā karma rata tvāt tu him sāre iti kesarīm

original: vyatyāsaḥ siṃ ha ityādāvakṣaravyatyayaḥ smṛtaḥ / (9.135.14)/
analyzed: vyatyāsaḥ siṃ ha ityādau akṣara vyatyayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kvacidrāmo dāṇsarathirhatvā kaṃ samapīpalat /
analyzed: kvacid rāmaḥ dāṇsarathiḥ hatvā kam samapīpalat

original: madhurāṃ puramityādau kathāvyatyaya īritaḥ / (9.135.15)/
analyzed: madhurām puram ityādau kathā vyatyayaḥ īritaḥ

original: viparītakramaṃ yatra pratilomaṃ tadīritam /
analyzed: viparīta kramam yatra pratilomam tat īritam

original: tadbhāvaḥ prātilomyaṃ ca tatprabhedaḥ kvacidbhavet / (9.135.16)/
analyzed: tad bhāvaḥ prātilomyam ca tad prabhedaḥ kvacid bhavet

original: vidhiprāṇau tayorbhārye gurutmaccheṣaṇsaṅkarāḥ /
analyzed: vidhi prāṇau tayoḥ bhārye guru tmad śeṣaṇa saṅkarāḥ

original: ṣaṇmahiṣya harestadvat sauparṇī vāruṇī umā / (9.135.17)/
analyzed: ṣaṣ mahiṣya hareḥ tadvat sauparṇī vāruṇī umā

original: indrakāmau tayoḥ patnyau kramācchataguṇādhikāḥ /
analyzed: indra kāmau tayoḥ patnyau kramāt śataguṇa adhikāḥ

original: ityāgneyapurāṇoktaṃ tāratamyaprakāṇsanam /
analyzed: iti āgneyapurāṇa uktam tāratamya prakāṇsanam

original: ityādāvarthanirvāhaḥ prātilomyaprabhedataḥ / (9.135.18)/
analyzed: ityādau artha nirvāhaḥ prātilomya prabhedataḥ

original: kaliśca dvāparastretā kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ purā yugāḥ /
analyzed: kaliḥ ca dvāparaḥ tretā kṛtam puṇyam purā yugāḥ

original: kramādityādiṣu prātilomyādukto vinirṇayaḥ / (9.135.19)/
analyzed: kramāt ityādiṣu prātilomyāt uktaḥ vinirṇayaḥ

original: vatso gostanamakṣīraṃ yadā'dau pibati sphuṭam /
analyzed: vatsaḥ gostanam akṣīram yadā ādau pibati sphuṭam

original: tadā gomūtrodayaḥ syāt kṣīrasyādhikyasiddhaye / (9.135.20)/
analyzed: tadā go mūtra udayaḥ syāt kṣīrasya ādhikya siddhaye

original: yadā gopo duhatyenāṃ tadā mūtro na vidyate /
analyzed: yadā gopaḥ duhati enām tadā mūtraḥ na vidyate

original: paścāt pibati vatse tu punarmūtrodayo bhavet / (9.135.21)/
analyzed: paścāt pibati vatse tu punar mūtra udayaḥ bhavet

original: evaṃ kvacit kathāsu syādādāvante ca saṅgatiḥ /
analyzed: evam kvacid kathāsu syāt ādau ante ca saṅgatiḥ

original: madhye saṅgativicchedaḥ kathāntarasamāgamaḥ / (9.135.22)/
analyzed: madhye saṅgati vicchedaḥ kathā antara samāgamaḥ

original: xcviii.anusāreṇa teṣāṃ tu nirṇayaḥ kriyate mayā /
analyzed: anusāreṇa teṣām tu nirṇayaḥ kriyate mayā

original: evamādiṣu vijñeyo gomūtrībhedataḥ kramāt /
analyzed: evamādiṣu vijñeyaḥ go mūtrī bhedataḥ kramāt

original: yathā'raṇye pāṇḍavānāṃ kathāsaṅgatisammatāḥ / (9.135.23)/
analyzed: yathā araṇye pāṇḍavānām kathā saṅgati sammatāḥ

original: tān vihāyaiva tanmadhye hariścandrasya bhūbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tān vihāya eva tad madhye hariścandrasya bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: nal . asya rāghavasyāpi gomūtrībhedataḥ kramāt / (9.135.24)/
analyzed: asya rāghavasya api go mūtrī bhedataḥ kramāt

original: evaṃ sarvapurāṇeṣu madhye citrakathāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: evam sarva purāṇeṣu madhye citra kathāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ādyantayoḥ saṅgatiśca gomūtrībhedataḥ smṛtāḥ / (9.135.25)/
analyzed: ādi antayoḥ saṅgatiḥ ca gomūtrī bhedataḥ smṛtāḥ

original: praghasaḥ sarvaśāstrārthaviruddhārthānuvarṇanam /
analyzed: praghasaḥ sarva śāstra artha viruddha artha anuvarṇanam

original: kvacinmohāyāsurāṇāṃ purāṇeṣu tathocyate /
analyzed: kvacid mohāya asurāṇām purāṇeṣu tathā ucyate

original: tādṛśānāṃ tu vākyānāṃ grāhyo'rthastvavirodhataḥ / (9.135.26)/
analyzed: tādṛśānām tu vākyānām grāhyaḥ arthaḥ tu avirodhataḥ

original: mḸurkhaṃ dṛṣṭvḸa sutaṃ tāto viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣveti vakṣyati /
analyzed: sutam tātaḥ viṣam bhuṅkṣva iti vakṣyati

original: tacchrutvā tadviruddhārthamācaranna tathā'caret / (9.135.27)/
analyzed: tat śrutvā tad viruddha artham ācaran na tathā ācaret

original: evaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ pitā gururudāradhīḥ /
analyzed: evam sarvasya jagataḥ pitā guruḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: vyāso'nyathā kvacidbhakti hitāya svajanāya ca /
analyzed: vyāsaḥ anyathā hitāya sva janāya ca

original: tathā jagatsatyaṃ ca mithyābhūtaṃ nirīśvaram / (9.135.28)/
analyzed: tathā jagat satyam ca mithyā bhūtam nirīśvaram

original: apratiṣṭhamajñeyaṃ harerjīvairabhinnatām /
analyzed: apratiṣṭham ajñeyam hareḥ jīvaiḥ abhinna tām

original: nīcatāmavarebhyaśca devebhyaśca jarāmṛtḸ Ḷ / (9.135.29)/
analyzed: nīca tām avarebhyaḥ ca devebhyaḥ ca

original: janmādidoṣasamparkaḥ nirguṇatvamapūrṇatā /
analyzed: janma ādi doṣa samparkaḥ nirguṇa tvam apūrṇa tā

original: asarvajñatvamajñatvamabhedo jaḍajīvayoḥ / (9.135.30)/
analyzed: asarvajña tvam ajña tvam abhedaḥ jaḍa jīvayoḥ

original: jaḍayorjīvayorvā'pi jaḍasarveśayorapi /
analyzed: jaḍayoḥ jīvayoḥ vā api jaḍa sarva īśayoḥ api

original: anadhīnaṃ jagadviṣṇorasvātantryaṃ harestathā / (9.135.31)/
analyzed: anadhīnam jagat viṣṇoḥ asvātantryam hareḥ tathā

original: svatantratā cajīvasya sarvajñatvamaduḥkhitā /
analyzed: svatantra tā ca jīvasya sarvajña tvam aduḥkhi tā

original: viṣṇoḥ prākṛtadehādiḥ svāvatāraviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ prākṛta deha ādiḥ sva avatāra viparyayaḥ

original: ityādau praghasādbhedāt grāhyo'rthastvavirodhataḥ / (9.135.32)/
analyzed: ityādau praghasāt bhedāt grāhyaḥ arthaḥ tu avirodhataḥ

original: prāmāṇyamekadeśasyānyasyaivāpramāṇatā /
analyzed: prāmāṇyam eka deśasya anyasya eva apramāṇa tā

original: yatra tatrokṣaṇād bhedāt grāhyo'rtho na cāparaḥ / (9.135.33)/
analyzed: yatra tatra ukṣaṇāt bhedāt grāhyaḥ ūrthaḥ na ca aparaḥ

original: uktaṃ rāmāyaṇe gaṅgāpārvatyau himavatsute /
analyzed: uktam rāmāyaṇe gaṅgā pārvatyau himavat sute

original: rudrasya vallabhe'tastaṃ gaṅgādharamumāpatim / (9.135.34)/
analyzed: rudrasya gaṅgādharam umāpatim

original: prāhustatretaradgrāhyaṃ pḸurvaṃ tyājyaṃ satāṃ mate /
analyzed: prāhuḥ tatra itarat grāhyam tyājyam satām mate

original: ucchiṣṭaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ vamanaṃ mṛtakarpaṭam / (9.135.35)/
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam śiva nirmālyam vamanam mṛta karpaṭam

original: xcix.kḸakaviṣṭāsamudbhūtaṃ pañca pūtāni bhārata /
analyzed: pañca pūtāni bhārata

original: ityādau ukṣaṇād bhedāt tattvaṃ niścīyate budhaiḥ / (9.135.36)/
analyzed: ityādau ukṣaṇāt bhedāt tattvam niścīyate budhaiḥ

original: kramaṃ ca vyutkramaṃ tyaktvā yatra bodhaḥ kramodgamaḥ /
analyzed: kramam ca vyutkramam tyaktvā yatra bodhaḥ krama udgamaḥ

original: tatraiva sudhurādbhedād grāhyo'rtho bahusammataḥ / (9.135.37)/
analyzed: tatra eva su dhurāt bhedāt grāhyaḥ arthaḥ bahu sammataḥ

original: rūpaṃ śabdaśca gaṃ dhaśca sparśaścāpi tathā rasaḥ /
analyzed: rūpam śabdaḥ ca gam dhaḥ ca sparśaḥ ca api tathā rasaḥ

original: vyomādipañcabhūtānāṃ guṇā hyete viśeṣataḥ / (9.135.38)/
analyzed: vyoma ādi pañcabhūtānām guṇāḥ hi ete viśeṣataḥ

original: ityuktaṃ pañcarātre tu bhedāṇsca sudhurāt tathā /
analyzed: iti uktam pañcarātre tu sudhurāt tathā

original: tatra noktaprakāreṇa grāhyo'rthastu yathākramam / (9.135.39)/
analyzed: tatra na ukta prakāreṇa grāhyaḥ arthaḥ tu yathākramam

original: kalpabhedāt kathābhedo yatroktassatkathāsu ca /
analyzed: kalpa bhedāt kathā bhedaḥ yatra uktaḥ sat kathāsu ca

original: tatrobhayaṃ grāhyameva duṣyḸaṃ śo naiva vartate / (9.135.40)/
analyzed: tatra ubhayam grāhyam eva na eva vartate

original: tatra sādhuprabhedena saṅgrāhyastattvanirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādhu prabhedena saṅgrāhyaḥ tattva nirṇayaḥ

original: uktaṃ bhāgavate ṣaṣṭhaskandhe vyāsena tattvataḥ / (9.135.41)/
analyzed: uktam bhāgavate ṣaṣṭha skandhe vyāsena tattvataḥ

original: indro hatvā'karot tvāṣṭraṃ viśvarūpaṃ dvijottamam /
analyzed: indraḥ hatvā akarot tvāṣṭram viśvarūpam dvijottamam

original: brahmahatyāpīḍitastu brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau / (9.135.42)/
analyzed: brahmahatyā pīḍitaḥ tu brahmāṇam śaraṇam yayau

original: caturmukhaścaturdhā taṃ vibhajya prākṣipanmahān /
analyzed: catur mukhaḥ caturdhā tam vibhajya prākṣipat mahān

original: bhūmau vāriṣu vṛkṣeṣu nārī ṛtuṣu kramāt / (9.135.43)/
analyzed: bhūmau vāriṣu vṛkṣeṣu nārī ṛtuṣu kramāt

original: uṣaraṃ dḸuṣitaṃ bhūmau phenaṃ duṣṭaṃ jaleṣu ca/
analyzed: uṣaram bhūmau phenam duṣṭam jaleṣu ca

original: sravyaṃ dḸuṣyaṃ ca vṛkṣādau hyaṅganā ṛtudūṣitā /
analyzed: sravyam dḸuṣyam ca vṛkṣa ādau hi aṅganā ṛtu dūṣitā

original: hatyāmuktaḥ śacīnāthaḥ punaḥ svargamapīpalat / (9.135.44)/
analyzed: hatyā muktaḥ śacī nāthaḥ punar svargam apīpalat  /

original: śrībhaviṣyatpurāṇe tu ityartho vyāsacoditaḥ /
analyzed: śrī bhaviṣyatpurāṇe tu iti arthaḥ vyāsa coditaḥ

original: vṛtrahatyāṃ vibhajyātha kṣiptavān sa caturmukhaḥ / (9.135.45)/
analyzed: vṛtra hatyām vibhajya atha kṣiptavān sa caturmukhaḥ

original: vahnau prathamajātāsu jvālāsu ca nadīṣu ca/
analyzed: vahnau prathama jātāsu jvālāsu ca nadīṣu ca

original: parvatāgreṣu viprendra nārīṛtuṣu tāṃ kramāt / (9.135.46)/
analyzed: parvata agreṣu vipra indra nārī ṛtuṣu tām kramāt

original: ityādau sādhubhedena kīrtitaṃ kalpabhedataḥ /
analyzed: ityādau sādhu bhedena kīrtitam kalpa bhedataḥ

original: tatrobhayaṃ grāhyameva saptabhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / (9.135.47)/
analyzed: tatra ubhayam grāhyam eva sapta bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ yacchrutaṃ śrīharermukhāt /
analyzed: idam rahasyam paramam guhyam yat śrutam śrī hareḥ mukhāt

original: tatte samāsataḥ proktaṃ jñḸatvā muktiṃ gamiṣyasi /
analyzed: tat te samāsatas proktam muktim gamiṣyasi

original: taduktamavivicyaiva muktiḥ kasyāpi no bhavet / (9.135.48)/
analyzed: tat uktam a vivicya eva muktiḥ kasya api no bhavet

original: iti vyatyāsādisaptabhedapratipādakapurāṇavākyasaṅgrahaḥ ” /
analyzed: iti vyatyāsa ādi sapta bheda pratipādaka purāṇa vākya saṅgrahaḥ

original: c.tasmānnirṇayaśāstratvād grāhyametad bubhūṣubhiḥ / 9.136 /
itīritā rāmakathā parā mayā samastaśāstrānusṛterbhavāpahā /
analyzed: iti īritā rāma kathā parā mayā samasta śāstra anusṛteḥ bhava apahā

original: paṭhedimāṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyādathāpi vā vimuktabandhaścaraṇaṃ harervrajet / 9.137 /
analyzed: paṭhet imām yaḥ śṛṇuyāt atha api vā vimukta bandhaḥ caraṇam hareḥ vrajet  /

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
rāmasvadhāmapraveśo nāma navamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: rāmasvadhāmapraveśaḥ nāma navamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: mama saṅgrahe (śrījayatīrthasaṃ skṛtahastalikhitagranthālaye),
analyzed: mama saṅgrahe śrī jayatīrtha sam skṛta hasta likhita grantha ālaye

original: uttarādimaṭhīya granthasaṅgrahe ca vartante -vyāsanakere prabhañjanācāryaḥ
analyzed: grantha saṅgrahe ca vartante prabhañjana ācāryaḥ

original: ci.(vyāsāvatārānuvarṇanam)
atha daśamo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha daśamaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / dvāpare'tha yuge prāpte tvaṣṭāviṃ śatime punaḥ /
analyzed: om yuge prāpte tu aṣṭāvim śatime punar

original: svayambhuśarvaśakrādyā dugdhābdhestīramāyayuḥ / 10.1 /
analyzed: svayambhu śarva śakra ādyāḥ dugdhābdheḥ tīram āyayuḥ

original: payobdheruttaraṃ tīramāsādya vibudharṣabhāḥ /
analyzed: payobdheḥ uttaram tīram āsādya vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ

original: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣamakṣayaṃ puruṣottamam / 10.2 /
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam akṣayam puruṣottamam

original: namonamo'gaṇyaguṇaikadhāmne samastavijñānamarīcimāline /
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ gaṇya guṇa eka dhāmne samasta vijñāna marīci māline

original: anādyavijñānatamonihantre parāmṛt ānandapadapradāyine / 10.3 /
svadattamālābhuvipātakopato durvāsasaḥ śāpata āṇsu hi śriyā /
analyzed: sva datta mālā bhuvi pāta kopataḥ durvāsasaḥ śāpataḥ hi śriyā

original: śakre vihīne ditijaiḥ parājite purā vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ sma / 10.4 /
analyzed: śakre vihīne ditijaiḥ parājite purā vayam tvām śaraṇam gatāḥ sma

original: tvadājñayā balinā sandadhānā varād girīśasya parairacālyam /
analyzed: tvad ājñayā balinā sandadhānā varāt girīśasya paraiḥ acālyam

original: vṛndārakā mandarametya bāhubhirna śekuruddhartumime sametāḥ / 10.5 /
analyzed: vṛndārakāḥ mandaram etya bāhubhiḥ na śekuḥ uddhartum ime sametāḥ

original: tadā tvayā nityabalatvahetuto yo'nantanāmā garuḍastadaṃ sake /
analyzed: tadā tvayā nitya bala tva hetutaḥ garuḍaḥ sake

original: utpāṭya caikena kareṇa mandaro nidhāpitastaṃ sa saha tvayā'vahat / 10.6 /
analyzed: utpāṭya ca ekena kareṇa mandaraḥ nidhāpitaḥ tam sa saha tvayā avahat  /

original: punaḥ parīkṣadbhirasau giriḥ suraiḥ sahāsurairunnamitastadaṃ sataḥ /
analyzed: punar parīkṣadbhiḥ asau giriḥ suraiḥ saha asuraiḥ unnamitaḥ satas

original: vyacūrṇayat tānakhilān punaśca te tvadīkṣayā pūrvavadutthitāḥ prabho / 10.7 /
analyzed: vyacūrṇayat tān akhilān punar ca te tvad dīkṣayā pūrvavat utthitāḥ prabho

original: punaśca vāmena kareṇa vīśvare nidhāya taṃ skandhagatastvamasya /
analyzed: punar ca vāmena kareṇa vīśvare nidhāya tam skandha gataḥ tvam asya

original: agāḥ payobdhiṃ sahitaḥ surāsurairmathnā ca tenābdhimathāpyamathnāḥ / 10.8 /
analyzed: agāḥ payobdhim sahitaḥ sura asuraiḥ ca tena abdhim atha api amathnāḥ  /

original: kṛtaśca kadrvāstanayo'tra vāsukirnetraṃ tvayā kaśyapajaḥ sa nāgarāṭ/
analyzed: kṛtaḥ ca kadrvāḥ tanayaḥ utra vāsukiḥ netram tvayā kaśyapa jaḥ sa nāga rāj

original: mamanthurabdhiṃ sahitāstvayā surāḥ sahāsurā divyapayo ghṛt ādhikam / 10.9 /
analyzed: mamanthuḥ abdhim sahitāḥ tvayā surāḥ saha asurāḥ divya payaḥ ghṛt

original: naicchanta pucchaṃ ditijā amaṅgal . aṃ tadityathāgraṃ jagṛhurviṣolbaṇam /
analyzed: na aicchanta puccham ditijāḥ amaṅgal tat iti atha agram jagṛhuḥ viṣa ulbaṇam

original: śrāntāṇsca te'to vibudhāstu pucchaṃ tvayā sametā jagṛhustvadāṇsrayāḥ / 10.10 /
analyzed: śrāntāṇs ca vibudhāḥ tu puccham tvayā sametāḥ jagṛhuḥ tvad āṇsrayāḥ

original: athātibhārādaviśat sukāñcano giriḥ sa pātāl . amatha tvameva /
analyzed: atha ati bhārāt aviśat su kāñcanaḥ giriḥ sa pātāl amatha tvam eva

original: taṃ kacchapātmā tvabharaḥ svapṛṣṭhe hyananyadhāryaṃ purulīlayaiva / 10.11 /
analyzed: tam kacchapa ātmā tu abharaḥ sva pṛṣṭhe hi an anya dhāryam puru līlayā eva

original: cii.uparyadhaścā'tmani netragotrayostvayā pareṇā'viśatā samedhitāḥ /
analyzed: ciiu pari adhas ca ātmani netra gotrayoḥ tvayā pareṇa āviśatā samedhitāḥ

original: mamanthurabdhiṃ tarasā madotkaṭāḥ surāsurāḥ kṣobhitanakracakram / 10.12 /
analyzed: mamanthuḥ abdhim tarasā mada utkaṭāḥ sura asurāḥ kṣobhita nakra cakram

original: śrānteṣu teṣveka urukrama tvaṃ sudhārasāptyai mudito hyamathnāḥ /
analyzed: śrānteṣu teṣu ekaḥ urukrama tvam sudhā rasa āptyai muditaḥ hi amathnāḥ

original: tadā jagadgrāsi viṣaṃ samutthitaṃ tvadājñayā vāyuradhāt kare nije / 10.13 /
analyzed: tadā viṣam samutthitam tvad ājñayā vāyuḥ adhāt kare nije

original: kaleḥ svarūpaṃ tadatīva duṣṣahaṃ varād vidhātuḥ sakalaiśca duḥ spṛśam /
analyzed: kaleḥ svarūpam tat atīva duṣṣaham varāt vidhātuḥ sakalaiḥ ca duḥ spṛśam

original: kare vimathyāstabalaṃ vidhāya dadau sa kiñcid giriśāya vāyuḥ / 10.14 /
analyzed: kare vimathya asta balam vidhāya dadau sa kiñcid giriśāya vāyuḥ  /

original: sa tat pibat kaṇṭhagatena tena nipātito mūrcchita āṇsu rudraḥ /
analyzed: sa tat pibat kaṇṭha gatena tena nipātitaḥ mūrcchitaḥ rudraḥ

original: hareḥ karasparśabalāt sa sañjñāmavāpa nīlo'sya gal . astadā'sīt / 10.15 /
analyzed: hareḥ kara sparśa balāt sa sañjñām avāpa

original: atha tvadājñāṃ purato nidhāya nidhāya pātre tapanīyarūpe /
analyzed: atha tvad ājñām puratas nidhāya nidhāya pātre tapanīya rūpe

original: svayaṃ ca nirmathya balopapannaṃ papau sa vāyustadu cāsya jīrṇam / 10.16 /
analyzed: svayam ca nirmathya bala upapannam papau sa vāyuḥ tat u ca asya jīrṇam  /

original: atyalpapānācca babhūva śūlā ṇsivasya śīrṣṇaṇsca karāvaśiṣṭam /
analyzed: ati alpa pānāt ca babhūva kara avaśiṣṭam

original: abhūt kaliḥ sarvajagatsu pūrṇaṃ pītvā vikāro na babhūva vāyoḥ /
analyzed: abhūt kaliḥ sarva jagatsu pūrṇam pītvā vikāraḥ na babhūva vāyoḥ

original: kaleḥ śarīrādabhavan kunāgāḥ savṛścikāḥ śvāpadayātudhānāḥ / 10.17 /
analyzed: kaleḥ śarīrāt abhavan kunāgāḥ sa vṛścikāḥ śvāpada yātudhānāḥ

original: atha tvayā'bdhau tu vimathyamāne surā'bhavat tāmasurā avāpuḥ /
analyzed: atha tvayā abdhau tu vimathyamāne surā bhavat tām asurāḥ avāpuḥ

original: uccaiḥ śravā nāma turaṅgamo'tha karī tathairāvatanāmadheyaḥ / 10.18 /
analyzed: uccais śravāḥ nāma karī tathā airāvata nāmadheyaḥ

original: anye ca dikpālagajā babhūvurvaraṃ tathaivāpsarasāṃ sahasram /
analyzed: anye ca dikpāla gajāḥ babhūvuḥ varam tathā eva apsarasām sahasram

original: tathā'yudhānyābharaṇāni caiva divaukasāṃ pārijātastaruśca / 10.19 /
analyzed: tathā āyudhāni ābharaṇāni ca eva divaukasām pārijātaḥ taruḥ ca

original: tathaiva sākṣāt surabhirniśeśo babhūva tat kaustubhaṃ lokasāram /
analyzed: tathā eva sākṣāt surabhiḥ niśā īśaḥ babhūva tat kaustubham loka sāram

original: athendirā yadyapi nityadehā babhūva tatrāparayā svatanvā / 10.20 /
analyzed: athā indirā yadi api nitya dehā babhūva tatra aparayā sva tanvā

original: tato bhavān dakṣiṇabāhunā sudhākamaṇḍaluṃ kalaśaṃ cāpareṇa /
analyzed: tatas bhavān dakṣiṇa bāhunā sudhā kamaṇḍalum kalaśam ca apareṇa

original: pragṛhya tasmānniragāt samudrād dhanvantarirnāma harinmaṇidyutiḥ / 10.21 /
analyzed: pragṛhya tasmāt niragāt samudrāt dhanvantariḥ nāma harit maṇi dyutiḥ

original: tato bhavaddhastagataṃ diteḥ sutāḥ sudhābharaṃ kalaśaṃ cāpajahruḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhavat hasta gatam diteḥ sutāḥ sudhā bharam kalaśam ca apajahruḥ

original: muktaṃ tvayā ṇsaktimatā'pi daityān satyacyutān kārayatā vadhāya / 10.22 /
analyzed: muktam tvayā daityān satya cyutān kārayatā vadhāya

original: ciii.tato bhavānanupamamuttamaṃ vapurbabhūva divyapramadātmakaṃ tvaran /
analyzed: bhavān anupamam uttamam vapuḥ babhūva divya pramadā ātmakam tvaran

original: śyāmaṃ nitambārpitaratnamekhalaṃ j āmbūnadābhāmbarabhṛt sumadhyamam / 10.23 /
analyzed: śyāmam nitamba arpita ratna mekhalam ā ambūnada ābha ambara bhṛt su madhyamam

original: bṛhannitambaṃ kalaśopamastanaṃ satpuṇḍarīkāyatanetramujjvalam /
analyzed: bṛhat nitambam kalaśa upama stanam sat puṇḍarīka āyata netram ujjvalam

original: samastasāraṃ paripūrṇasadguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva tat sammumuhuḥ surārayaḥ / 10.24 /
analyzed: samasta sāram paripūrṇa sat guṇam dṛṣṭvā eva tat sammumuhuḥ surārayaḥ

original: parasparaṃ te'mṛtahetuto'khilā viruddhyamānāḥ pradaduḥ sma te kare /
analyzed: parasparam te mṛta hetu tā ukhilāḥ viruddhyamānāḥ pradaduḥ sma te kare

original: samaṃ sudhāyāḥ kalaśaṃ vibhajya nipāyayāsmāniti vañcitāstvayā / 10.25 /
analyzed: samam sudhāyāḥ kalaśam vibhajya nipāyaya asmān iti vañcitāḥ tvayā

original: dharmacchalaṃ pāpajaneṣu dharma iti tvayā jñāpayituṃ tadoktam /
analyzed: dharma chalam pāpa janeṣu dharmaḥ iti tvayā jñāpayitum tadā uktam

original: yadyat kṛtaṃ me bhavatāṃ yadīha saṃ vāda evodvibhaje sudhāmimām / 10.26 /
analyzed: yat yat kṛtam me bhavatām yadi iha sam vāde eva udvibhaje sudhām imām

original: yatheṣṭato'haṃ vibhajāmi sarvathā naviśvasadhvaṃ mayi kenacit kvacit /
analyzed: yathā iṣṭataḥ ham vibhajāmi sarvathā na viśvasadhvam mayi kenacid kvacid

original: iti prahasyābhihitaṃ niśamya strībhāvamugdhāstu tatheti te'vadan / 10.27 /
analyzed: iti prahasya abhihitam niśamya strī bhāva mugdhāḥ tu tathā iti

original: tataśca saṃ sthāpya pṛthak surāsurāṃ stavātirūpoccalitān suretarān /
analyzed: tatas ca sam sthāpya pṛthak sura asurām stava ati rūpa uccalitān suretarān

original: sarvān bhavaddarśina īkṣya lajjitā'smyahaṃ dṛśo mīlayatetyavocaḥ / 10.28 /
analyzed: sarvān bhavat darśinaḥ īkṣya lajjitā asmi aham dṛśaḥ mīlayata iti avocaḥ  /

original: nimīlitākṣeṣvasureṣu devatā nyapāyayaḥ sādhvamṛtaṃ tataḥ pumān /
analyzed: nimīlita akṣeṣu asureṣu devatāḥ nyapāyayaḥ sādhu amṛtam tatas pumān

original: kṣaṇena bhūtvā pibataḥ sudhāṃ śiro rāhornyakṛntaśca sudarśanena / 10.29 /
analyzed: kṣaṇena bhūtvā pibataḥ sudhām śiraḥ rāhoḥ nyakṛntaḥ ca sudarśanena

original: tenāmṛt ārthaṃ hi sahasrajanmasu pratapya bhūyastapa ārito varaḥ /
analyzed: tena amṛt ārtham hi sahasra janmasu pratapya bhūyas tapaḥ āritaḥ varaḥ

original: svayambhuvastena bhavān kare'sya binduṃ sudhāṃ prāsya śiro jahāra / 10.30 /
analyzed: svayambhuvaḥ tena bhavān bindum sudhām prāsya śiraḥ jahāra

original: śirastu tasya grahatāmavāpa suraiḥ samāviṣṭamatho sabāhu /
analyzed: śiraḥ tu tasya graha tām avāpa suraiḥ samāviṣṭam atho sa bāhu

original: kṣiptaḥ kabandho'sya śubhodasāgare tvayā sthito'dyāpi hi tatra sāmṛtaḥ / 10.31 /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ kabandhaḥ usya śubhoda sāgare tvayā hi tatra sa amṛtaḥ

original: athāsurāḥ pratyapatannudāyudhāḥ samastaśaste ca hatāstvayā raṇe /
analyzed: atha asurāḥ pratyapatan udāyudhāḥ samastaśas te ca hatāḥ tvayā raṇe

original: kalistu sa brahmavarādajeyo hyṛte bhavantaṃ puruṣeṣu saṃ sthitaḥ / 10.32 /
analyzed: kaliḥ tu sa brahma varāt ajeyaḥ hi ṛte bhavantam puruṣeṣu sam sthitaḥ

original: tasyārddhadehāt samabhūdalakṣmīstatputrakā doṣagaṇāṇsca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tasya arddha dehāt samabhūt alakṣmīḥ tad putrakāḥ doṣa gaṇān ca sarvaśas

original: athendirā vakṣasi te samāsthitā tvatkaṇṭhagaṃ kaustubhamāsa dhātā / 10.33 /
analyzed: athā indirā vakṣasi te samāsthitā tvad kaṇṭha gam kaustubham āsa dhātā

original: yathāvibhāgaṃ ca sureṣu dattāstvayā tathā'nye'pi hi tatra jātāḥ /
analyzed: yathāvibhāgam ca sureṣu dattāḥ tvayā tathā anye api hi tatra jātāḥ

original: itthaṃ tvayā sādhvamṛtaṃ sureṣu dattaṃ hi mokṣasya nidarśanāya / 10.34 /
analyzed: ittham tvayā sādhu amṛtam sureṣu dattam hi mokṣasya nidarśanāya

original: civ.bhaveddhi mokṣo niyataṃ surāṇāṃ naivāsurāṇāṃ sa kathañcana syāt /
analyzed: cit bhavet hi mokṣaḥ niyatam surāṇām na eva asurāṇām sa kathañcana syāt

original: utsāhayuktasya ca tat pratīpaṃ bhaveddhi rāhoriva duḥkharūpam / 10.35 /
analyzed: utsāha yuktasya ca tat pratīpam bhavet hi rāhoḥ iva duḥkha rūpam

original: kalistvayaṃ brahmavarādidānīṃ vibādhate'smān sakalān prajāṇsca /
analyzed: kaliḥ tu ayam brahma varāt idānīm vibādhate smān sakalān prajān ca

original: ajñānamithyāmatirūpato'sau praviśya sajjñānaviruddharūpaḥ / 10.36 /
analyzed: ajñāna mithyā mati rūpatā usau praviśya sat jñāna viruddha rūpaḥ

original: tvadājñayā tasya varo'bjajena dattaḥ sa āviśya śivaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: tvad ājñayā tasya vara ubjajena dattaḥ saḥ āviśya śivam cakāra

original: kadāgamāṃ stasya kuyuktibādhān nahi tvadanyaścarituṃ samarthaḥ / 10.37 /
analyzed: ku yukti bādhāt nahi tvad anyaḥ caritum samarthaḥ  /

original: vedāṇsca sarve sahaśāstrasaṅghā utsāditāstena na santi te'dya /
analyzed: sarve saha śāstra saṅghāḥ utsāditāḥ tena na santi

original: tat sādhu bhūmāvavatīrya vedānuddhṛtya śāstrāṇi kuruṣva samyak / 10.38 /
analyzed: tat sādhu bhūmau avatīrya vedān uddhṛtya śāstrāṇi kuruṣva samyak

original: adṛśyamajñeyamatarkyarūpaṃ kaliṃ nilīnaṃ hṛdaye'khilasya /
analyzed: adṛśyam ajñeyam atarkya rūpam kalim nilīnam hṛdaye ikhilasya

original: sacchāstraśastreṇa nihatya śīghraṃ padaṃ nijaṃ dehi mahājanasya / 10.39 /
analyzed: sat śāstra śastreṇa nihatya śīghram padam nijam dehi mahājanasya

original: ṛte bhavantaṃ nahi taṃ nihantā tvameka evākhilaśaktipūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: ṛte bhavantam nahi tam nihantā tvam ekaḥ eva akhila śakti pūrṇaḥ

original: tato bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā vayaṃ tamonihatyai nijabodhavigraham / 10.40 /
analyzed: tatas bhavantam śaraṇam gatāḥ vayam tamaḥ nihatyai nija bodha vigraham

original: itīritastairabhayaṃ pradāya sureśvarāṇāṃ paramo'prameyaḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ taiḥ abhayam pradāya sura īśvarāṇām parama uprameyaḥ

original: prādurbabhūvāmṛtabhūril . āyāṃ viśuddhavijñānaghanasvarūpaḥ / 10.41 /
analyzed: prādurbabhūva amṛta bhūril  āyām viśuddha vijñāna ghana svarūpaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhanāmā kamal . odbhavātmajaḥ suto'sya śaktistanayaḥ parāṇsaraḥ /
analyzed: vasiṣṭha nāmā kamal  ā udbhava ātmajaḥ sutaḥ asya śaktiḥ tanayaḥ parāṇsaraḥ

original: tasyottamaṃ so'pi tapo'caraddhariḥ suto mama syāditi taddharirdadau / 10.42 /
analyzed: tasya uttamam saḥ api tapaḥ carat hariḥ sutaḥ mama syāt iti tat hariḥ dadau  /

original: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān sutoṣito vasormadīyasya sutā'sti śobhanā /
analyzed: uvāca ca enam bhagavān su toṣitaḥ vasoḥ madīyasya sutā asti śobhanā

original: vane mṛgārthaṃ carato'sya vīryaṃ papāta bhāryāṃ manasā gatasya / 10.43 /
analyzed: vane mṛga artham carataḥ asya vīryam papāta bhāryām manasā gatasya  /

original: tacchyenahaste pradadau sa tasyai dātuṃ tadanyena tu yuddhyato'patat /
analyzed: tat śyena haste pradadau sa tasyai dātum tad anyena tu

original: jagrāsa tanmatsyavadhūryamasvasurjalasthamenāṃ jagṛhuśca dāṇsāḥ / 10.44 /
analyzed: jagrāsa tat matsya vadhūḥ yama svasuḥ jala stham enām jagṛhuḥ ca dāṇsāḥ

original: tadgarbhato'bhūnmithunaṃ svarājñe nyavedayan so'pi vasoḥ samarpayat /
analyzed: sva rājñe nyavedayan saḥ upi vasoḥ samarpayat

original: putraṃ samādāya sutāṃ sa tasmai dadau suto'bhūdatha matsyarājaḥ / 10.45 /
analyzed: putram samādāya sutām sa tasmai dadau sutaḥ bhūt atha matsya rājaḥ

original: kanyā tusā dāṇsarājasya sadmanyavarddhatātīva surūpayuktā /
analyzed: kanyā tusā dāṇsa rājasya sadmani avarddhata atīva surūpa yuktā

original: cv.nāmnā ca sā satyavatīti tasyāṃ tavā'tmajo'haṃ bhavitā'smyajo'pi / 10.46 /
analyzed: cu nāmnā ca sā satyavatī iti tasyām bhavitāsmi ajaḥ pi

original: itīritaścakradhareṇa tāṃ munirjagāma mārtāṇḍasutāṃ samudragām /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ cakradhareṇa tām muniḥ jagāma mārtāṇḍa sutām samudragām

original: uttārayantīmatha tatra viṣṇuḥ prādurbabhūvā'śu viśuddhacidghanaḥ / 10.47 /
analyzed: uttārayantīm atha tatra viṣṇuḥ prādurbabhūva āśu viśuddha cit ghanaḥ

original: vidoṣavijñānasukhaikarūpo'pyajo janān mohayituṃ mṛṣaiva /
analyzed: vidoṣa vijñāna sukha eka rūpaḥ upi ajaḥ janān mohayitum mṛṣā eva

original: yoṣitsu puṃ so hyajanīva dṛśyate na jāyate kvāpi balādivigrahaḥ / 10.48 /
analyzed: yoṣitsu pum saḥ hi ajanī iva dṛśyate na jāyate kvāpi bala ādi vigrahaḥ

original: yathā nṛsiṃ hākṛtirāvirāsīt stambhāt tathā nityatanutvato vibhuḥ /
analyzed: yathā ha ākṛtiḥ āvirāsīt stambhāt tathā nitya tanu tvataḥ vibhuḥ

original: āvirbhavad yoṣiti no malotthastathā'pi mohāya nidarśayet tathā / 10.49 /
analyzed: āvirbhavat yoṣiti no mala utthaḥ tathā api mohāya nidarśayet tathā

original: strīpumprasa' ngāt parato yato hariḥ prādurbhavatyeṣa vimohayan janam /
analyzed: paratas yatas hariḥ prādurbhavati eṣa vimohayan janam

original: ato malottho'yamiti sma manyate jano'śubhaḥ pūrṇaguṇaikavigraham / 10.50 /
analyzed: atas mala utthā iyam iti sma manyate pūrṇa guṇa eka vigraham

original: dvīpe bhaginyāḥ sa yamasya viśvakṛt prakāṇsate jñānamarīcimaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: dvīpe bhaginyāḥ sa yamasya viśva kṛt prakāṇsate jñāna marīci maṇḍalaḥ

original: prabhāsayannaṇḍabahistathā'ntaḥ sahasralakṣāmitasūryadīdhitiḥ / 10.51 /
analyzed: prabhāsayan aṇḍa bahis tathā antar sahasra lakṣa amita sūrya dīdhitiḥ

original: agaṇyadivyoruguṇārṇavaḥ prabhuḥ samastavidyādhipatirjagadguruḥ /
anantaśaktirjagadīśvaraḥ samastadoṣātividūravigrahaḥ / 10.52 /
śubhamaratakavarṇo raktapādābjanetrādharakaranakharasanāgraścakraśaṅkhābjarekhaḥ /
analyzed: śubha marataka varṇaḥ rakta pāda abja netra adhara kara nakha rasana agraḥ cakra śaṅkha abja rekhaḥ

original: ravikaravaragauraṃ carma caiṇaṃ vasānastaṭidamalajaṭāsandīptajūṭaṃ dadhānaḥ / 10.53 /
analyzed: ravi kara vara gauram carma ca eṇam vasānaḥ taṭit amala jaṭā sat dīpta jūṭam dadhānaḥ

original: vistīrṇavakṣāḥ kamal . āyatākṣo bṛhadbhujaḥ kambusamānakaṇṭhaḥ /
analyzed: vistīrṇa vakṣāḥ kamal āyata akṣaḥ bṛhat bhujaḥ kambu samāna kaṇṭhaḥ

original: samastavedān mukhataḥ samudgirannanantacandrādhikakāntasanmukhaḥ / 10.54 /
analyzed: samasta vedān mukhataḥ samudgiran ananta candra adhika kānta sat mukhaḥ

original: prabodhamudrābhayadordvayānvito yajñopavīt ājinamekhalollasan /
dṛśā mahājñānabhujaṅgadaṣṭamujjīvayāno jagadatyarocata / 10.55 /
analyzed: dṛśā mahā jñāna bhujaṅga daṣṭam ujjīvayānaḥ jagat atyarocata  /

original: sa lokadharmābhirirakṣayā piturdvijatvamāpyā'śu piturdadau nijam /
analyzed: sa loka dharma abhirirakṣayā pituḥ dvija tvam āpya āśu pituḥ dadau nijam

original: j ñānaṃ tayoḥ saṃ smṛtimātrataḥ sadā pratyakṣabhāvaṃ paramātmano dadau / 10.56 /
analyzed: j ñānam tayoḥ sam smṛti mātrataḥ sadā pratyakṣa bhāvam paramātmanaḥ dadau  /

original: dvaipāyanaḥ so'tha jagāma meruṃ caturmukhādyairanugamyamānaḥ /
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ saḥ utha jagāma merum caturmukha ādyaiḥ anugamyamānaḥ

original: uddhṛtya vedānakhilān surebhyo dadau munibhyaśca yathā'disṛṣṭau / 10.57 /
analyzed: uddhṛtya vedān akhilān surebhyaḥ dadau munibhyaḥ ca yathā ādi sṛṣṭau

original: cvi.sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi tathaiva kṛtvā vinirṇayaṃ brahmasūtraṃ cakāra /
analyzed: cvi sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi tathā eva kṛtvā vinirṇayam brahmasūtram cakāra

original: tacchuśruvurbrahmagirīśamukhyāḥ surā munīnāṃ pravarāṇsca tasmāt / 10.58 /
analyzed: tat śuśruvuḥ brahma girīśa mukhyāḥ surāḥ munīnām pravarān ca tasmāt

original: samastaśāstrārthanidarśanātmakaṃ cakre mahābhāratanāmadheyam /
analyzed: samasta śāstra artha nidarśana ātmakam cakre mahābhārata nāmadheyam

original: vedottamaṃ tacca vidhātṛśaṅkarapradhānakaistanmukhataḥ suraiḥ śrutam / 10.59 /
analyzed: veda uttamam tat ca vidhātṛ śaṅkara pradhānakaiḥ tad mukhataḥ suraiḥ śrutam

original: atho girīśādimanonuśāyī kalirmamārā'śu suvānmayaiḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: atho girīśa ādi manaḥ nuśāyī kaliḥ mamāra āśu suvān mayaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: nikṛttaśīrṣo bhagavanmukheritaiḥ surāṇsca sajjñānasudhārasaṃ papuḥ / 10.60 /
analyzed: nikṛtta śīrṣaḥ bhagavat mukha īritaiḥ surān ca sat jñāna sudhā rasam papuḥ

original: atho manuṣyeṣu tathā'sureṣu rūpāntaraiḥ kalirevāvaśiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: atho manuṣyeṣu tathā asureṣu rūpa antaraiḥ kaliḥ eva avaśiṣṭaḥ

original: tato manuṣyeṣu ca satsu saṃ sthito vināṇsya ityeṣa harirvyacintayat / 10.61 /
analyzed: tatas manuṣyeṣu ca satsu sam sthitaḥ iti eṣa hariḥ vyacintayat

original: tato nṛṇāṃ kālabalāt sumandamāyurmatiṃ karma ca vīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas nṛṇām kāla balāt su mandam āyuḥ matim karma ca vīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ

original: vivyāsa vedān sa vibhuścaturdhā cakre tathā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam / 10.62 /
analyzed: vivyāsa vedān sa vibhuḥ caturdhā cakre tathā bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: yeye ca santastamasā'nuviṣṭāstāṃ stān suvākyaistamaso vimuñcan /
analyzed: ye ye ca santaḥ tamasā anuviṣṭāḥ tām stān su vākyaiḥ tamasaḥ vimuñcan

original: cacāra lokān sa pathi prayāntaṃ kīṭaṃ vyapaśyat tamuvāca kṛṣṇaḥ / 10.63 /
analyzed: cacāra lokān sa pathi prayāntam kīṭam vyapaśyat tam uvāca kṛṣṇaḥ

original: bhavasva rājā kuśarīrametat tyaktveti naicchat tadasau tatastam /
analyzed: bhavasva rājā ku śarīram etat tyaktvā iti na aicchat tat asau tatas tam

original: atyaktadehaṃ nṛpatiṃ cakāra purā svabhaktaṃ vṛṣalaṃ sulubdham / 10.64 /
analyzed: atyakta deham nṛpatim cakāra purā sva bhaktam vṛṣalam su lubdham

original: lobhāt sa kīṭatvamupetya kṛṣṇaprasādataścā'śu babhūva rājā /
analyzed: lobhāt sa kīṭa tvam upetya kṛṣṇa prasādataḥ ca āśu babhūva rājā

original: tadaiva taṃ sarvanṛpāḥ praṇemurdaduḥ karaṃ cāsya yathaiva vaiśyāḥ / 10.65 /
analyzed: tadā eva tam sarva nṛpāḥ praṇemuḥ daduḥ karam ca asya yathā eva vaiśyāḥ

original: uvāca taṃ bhagavān muktimasmiṃ stava kṣaṇe dātumahaṃ samarthaḥ /
analyzed: uvāca tam bhagavān muktim asmin stava kṣaṇe dātum aham samarthaḥ

original: tathā'pi sīmārthamavāpya vipratanuṃ vimukto bhava matprasādāt / 10.66 /
analyzed: tathā api sīmā artham avāpya vipra tanum vimuktaḥ bhava mad prasādāt

original: j ñānaṃ ca tasmai vimalaṃ dadau sa mahīṃ ca sarvāṃ bubhuje tadante /
analyzed: j ñānam ca tasmai vimalam dadau sa mahīm ca sarvām bubhuje tad ante

original: tyaktvā tanuṃ vipravaratvametya padaṃ harerāpa sutattvavedī / 10.67 /
analyzed: tyaktvā tanum vipra vara tvam etya padam hareḥ āpa su tattva vedī

original: evaṃ bahūn saṃ sṛtibandhataḥ sa vyamocayad vyāsatanurjanārdanaḥ /
analyzed: evam bahūn sam sṛti bandhataḥ sa vyamocayat vyāsa tanuḥ janārdanaḥ

original: bahūnyacintyāni ca tasya karmāṇyaśeṣadeveśasadoditāni / 10.68 /
analyzed: bahūni acintyāni ca tasya karmāṇi aśeṣa deveśa sadā uditāni

original: athāsya putratvamavāptumicchaṃ ścacāra rudraḥ sutapastadīyam /
analyzed: athā asya putra tvam avāptum iccham ścacāra rudraḥ su tapaḥ tadīyam

original: dadau ca tasmai bhagavān varaṃ taṃ svayaṃ ca taptveva tapo vimohayan / 10.69 /
analyzed: dadau ca tasmai bhagavān varam tam svayam ca taptvā iva tapaḥ vimohayan  /

original: cvii.vimohanāyāsurasargiṇāṃ prabhuḥ svayaṃ karotīva tapaḥ pradarśayet /
analyzed: prabhuḥ svayam karoti iva tapaḥ pradarśayet

original: kāmādidoṣāṃ śca mṛṣaiva darśayenna tāvatā te'sya hi santi kutracit / 10.70 /
analyzed: kāma ādi doṣān śca mṛṣā eva darśayet na tāvatā hi santi kutracid

original: tatastvaraṇyoḥ sma babhūva putrakaḥ śivo'sya so'bhūcchukanāmadheyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu araṇyoḥ sma babhūva putrakaḥ śivaḥ sya saḥ ubhūt śuka nāmadheyaḥ

original: śukī hi bhūtvā'bhyagamad ghṛt ācī vyāsaṃ vimathnantamutāraṇī tam / 10.71 /
analyzed: śukī hi bhūtvā abhyagamat ghṛt ācī vyāsam vimathnantam uta araṇī tam  /

original: akāmayan kāmukavat sa bhūtvā tayā'rthitastaṃ śukanāmadheyam /
analyzed: akāmayan kāmuka vat sa bhūtvā tayā arthitaḥ tam śuka nāmadheyam

original: cakre hyaraṇyostanayaṃ ca sṛṣṭvā vimohayaṃ stattvamārgeṣvayogyān / 10.72 /
analyzed: cakre hi araṇyoḥ tanayam ca sṛṣṭvā vimohayan stattva mārgeṣu ayogyān

original: śukaṃ tamāṇsu praviveśa vāyurvyāsasya sevārthamathāsya sarvam /
analyzed: śukam praviveśa vāyuḥ vyāsasya sevā artham atha asya sarvam

original: j ñānaṃ dadau bhagavān sarvavedān sabhārataṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam / 10.73 /
analyzed: j ñānam dadau bhagavān sarva vedān sa bhāratam bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: śeṣo'tha pailaṃ munimāviśat tadā vīśaḥ sumantumapi vāruṇiṃ munim /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ utha pailam munim āviśat tadā vīśaḥ sumantum api vāruṇim munim

original: brahmā'viśat tamuta vaiśapāyanaṃ śakraśca jaiminimathā'viśad vibhuḥ / 10.74 /
analyzed: brahmā aviśat tam uta vaiśapāyanam śakraḥ ca jaiminim atha āviśat vibhuḥ

original: kṛṣṇasya pādaparisevanotsukāḥ sureśvarā viviśurāṇsu tān munīn /
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya pāda parisevana utsukāḥ sura īśvarāḥ tān munīn

original: samastavidyāḥ pratipādya teṣvasau pravartakāṃ stān vidadhe hariḥ punaḥ / 10.75 /
analyzed: samasta vidyāḥ pratipādya teṣu asau pravartakān stān vidadhe hariḥ punar

original: ṛcāṃ pravartakaṃ pailaṃ yajuṣāṃ ca pravartakam /
analyzed: ṛcām pravartakam pailam yajuṣām ca pravartakam

original: vaiśampāyanamevaikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūryameva ca / 10.76 /
analyzed: vaiśampāyanam eva ekam dvitīyam sūryam eva ca

original: cakre'tha jaiminiṃ sāmnāmatharvāṅgirasāmapi /
analyzed: cakretha jaiminim sāmnām atharva aṅgirasām api

original: sumantuṃ bhāratasyāpi vaiśampāyanamādiśat /
analyzed: sumantum bhāratasya api vaiśampāyanam ādiśat

original: pravartane mānuṣeṣu gandharvādiṣu cā'tmajam / 10.77 /
analyzed: pravartane mānuṣeṣu gandharva ādiṣu ca ātmajam

analyzed: rudreṣu patratāpa ākhyaḥ somadattaḥ asya ca ātmajaḥ

analyzed: ajaikapād ahirbudhniḥ virūpākṣaḥ iti trayaḥ
vi pu

original: cx.rudrāṇāṃ somadattasya babhūvuḥ prathitāḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: rudrāṇām somadattasya babhūvuḥ prathitāḥ sutāḥ

original: tadarthaṃ hi tapaścīrṇaṃ somadattena śambhave /

original: datto varaśca tenāsya tvatpratīpābhibhūtikṛt /
analyzed: dattaḥ varaḥ ca tena asya tvad pratīpa abhibhūti kṛt

analyzed: bala vīrya guṇa upetaḥ nāmnā bhūriśravāḥ sutaḥ

original: bhaviṣyati mayā'viṣṭo yajñaśīla iti sma ha /
analyzed: bhaviṣyati mayā āviṣṭaḥ yajña śīlaḥ iti sma ha

original: tena bhūriśravā jātaḥ somadattasuto balī / 11.13 /
analyzed: tena bhūriśravāḥ jātaḥ somadatta sutaḥ balī

analyzed: pūrva udadheḥ tīra gata ibja sambhave gaṅgā yutaḥ parvaṇi ghūrṇita abdhiḥ

original: avākṣipat tasya tanau nijodabinduṃ śaśāpainamathābjayoniḥ / 11.14 /
analyzed: avākṣipat tasya tanau nija uda bindum śaśāpa enam atha abjayoniḥ

original: janiṣyase viṣṇupadī tathaiṣā tatrāpi bhāryā bhavato bhaviṣyati / 11.15 /
analyzed: janiṣyase viṣṇupadī tathā eṣā tatra api bhāryā bhavataḥ bhaviṣyati  /

original: śānto bhavatyeva mayoditastvaṃ tanutvamāpto'si tataśca śantanuḥ /
analyzed: śāntaḥ bhavati eva mayā uditaḥ tvam tanu tvam āptaḥ asi tatas ca śantanuḥ

original: itīritaḥ so'tha nṛpo babhūva mahābhiṣaṅ nāma hareḥ padāṇsrayaḥ / 11.16 /

analyzed: sa tatra bhuktvā cira kālam urvīm tanum vihāya apa sadaḥ vidhātuḥ

analyzed: tatra api tiṣṭhan sura vṛnda sannidhau dadarśa gaṅgām ślathita ambarām svakām

analyzed: avāṅmukheṣu dyu sadassu rāgāt nirīkṣamāṇam punar ātma sambhavaḥ

original: uvāca bhūmau nṛpatirbhavā'śu śapto yathā tvaṃ hi purā mayaiva / 11.18 /
analyzed: uvāca bhūmau nṛpatiḥ bhava āśu śaptaḥ yathā tvam hi purā mayā eva

original: itīritastatkṣaṇataḥ pratīpād babhūva nāmnā nṛpatiḥ sa śantanuḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tad kṣaṇataḥ pratīpāt babhūva nāmnā nṛpatiḥ sa śantanuḥ

analyzed: avāpya gaṅgām dayitām svakīyām tayā mumoda abda gaṇān bahūn ca

analyzed: babhūva sakhī nṛpasya suvinda nāmnaḥ dayitā sa nāmnī

original: tasyā jarāmṛtividhvaṃ sahetorvasiṣṭhadhenuṃ svamṛtaṃ kṣarantīm /
analyzed: tasyāḥ sa hetoḥ vasiṣṭha dhenum sva mṛtam kṣarantīm

original: cxi.jarāpahāṃ nandinināmadheyāṃ baddhuṃ patiṃ codayāmāsa devī / 11.21 /
analyzed: cxijarā apahām nandini nāmadheyām baddhum patim codayāmāsa devī  /

original: tayā dyunāmā sa vasuḥ pracodito bhrātṛsnehāt saptabhiranvito'paraiḥ /
analyzed: tayā dyu nāmā sa vasuḥ pracoditaḥ bhrātṛ snehāt saptabhiḥ anvitā uparaiḥ

analyzed: babandha tām gām atha tān śaśāpa vasiṣṭha sam sthaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ prabhuḥ

original: adharmavṛtt āḥ pratiyāta mānuṣīṃ yoniṃ drutaṃ yatkṛte sarva eva /
analyzed: a dharma vṛt āḥ pratiyāta mānuṣīm yonim drutam yad kṛte sarve eva

original: dharmāccyutāḥ sa tathā'ṣṭāyurāpyatāmanye punaḥ kṣipramato vimokṣyatha / 11.23 /
analyzed: dharmāt cyutāḥ sa tathā aṣṭa āyuḥ āpyatām anye punar kṣipram atas vimokṣyatha  /

original: pracodayāmāsa ca yā kumārge patiṃ hi sā'mbeti nareṣu jātā /
analyzed: pracodayāmāsa ca yā kumārge patim hi sā ambā iti nareṣu jātā

original: abhartṛkā puṃ stvasamāṇsrayeṇa patyurmṛtau kāraṇatvaṃ vrajeta / 11.24 /
analyzed: abhartṛkā patyuḥ mṛtau kāraṇa tvam vrajeta

original: bhavatvasau brahmacaryaikaniṣṭho mahān virodhaśca tayorbhaveta /
analyzed: bhavatu asau brahmacarya eka niṣṭhaḥ mahān virodhaḥ ca tayoḥ bhaveta

original: sa garbhavāsāṣṭakaduḥkhameva samāpnutāṃ śaratalpe śayānaḥ / 11.25 /
analyzed: sa garbha vāsa aṣṭaka duḥkham eva samāpnutām śara talpe śayānaḥ

original: mṛtyaṣṭakotthāmapi vedanāṃ saḥ prāpnotu śastrairbahudhā nikṛttaḥ /
analyzed: mṛti aṣṭaka utthām api vedanām saḥ prāpnotu śastraiḥ bahudhā nikṛttaḥ

original: itīritāste kamalodbhavaṃ taṃ j ñātvā samutsṛjya ca gāṃ praṇemuḥ / 11.26 /
analyzed: iti īritāḥ te kamalodbhavam tam j ñātvā samutsṛjya ca gām praṇemuḥ

original: na mānuṣīṃ garbhamavāpnumo vayaṃ bhavatvayaṃ sarvavit kīrtimāṃ śca /
analyzed: na mānuṣīm garbham avāpnumaḥ vayam bhavatu ayam sarva vid kīrtimān śca

original: mahāstravettā bhavadaṃ śayuktastathā balaṃ no'khilānāmupaitu / 11.27 /
analyzed: mahā astra vettā bhava dam śa yuktaḥ tathā balam na ukhilānām upaitu

original: itīrite'stvityuditāḥ svayambhuvā vasiṣṭhasaṃ sthena surāpagāṃ yayuḥ /
analyzed: iti īriteḥ tu iti uditāḥ svayambhuvā vasiṣṭha sam sthena surāpagām yayuḥ

original: ūcustathaināmudare vayaṃ te jāyemahi kṣipramasmān hana tvam / 11.28 /
analyzed: ūcuḥ tathā enām udare vayam te jāyemahi kṣipram asmān hana tvam

original: itīritā sā varamāṇsu vavre tebhyo'pyapāpatvamatha priyatvam /
analyzed: iti īritā sā vavre tebhyaḥ api a pāpa tvam atha priya tvam

original: teṣāṃ sadaivā'tmana ekameṣāṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ t ān suṣuve'tha śantanoḥ / 11.29 /
analyzed: teṣām sadā eva ātmanaḥ ekam eṣām dīrgha āyuṣam t ān suṣuvetha śantanoḥ  /

original: avighnatastān vinihantumeva purā pratīpasya hi dakṣiṇorum /
analyzed: avighnataḥ tān vinihantum eva purā pratīpasya hi dakṣiṇa ūrum

original: samāṇsritā kāminīvattvakāmā tatputrabhāryā bhavituṃ viḍambāt / 11.30 /
analyzed: kāminīvat tva kāmā tad putra bhāryā bhavitum viḍambāt

original: tenaiva coktā bhava me sutasya bhāryā yato dakṣiṇorusthitā'si /
analyzed: tena eva ca uktā bhava me sutasya bhāryā yatas dakṣiṇa ūru sthitā asi

original: bhāgo hi dakṣo duhituḥ snuṣāyā bhāryābhāgo vāma iti prasiddhaḥ / 11.31 /
analyzed: bhāgaḥ hi dakṣaḥ duhituḥ snuṣāyāḥ bhāryā bhāgaḥ vāmaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ

original: uvāca sā taṃ natu māṃ sutaste kā'sīti pṛcchennatu māṃ nivārayet /
analyzed: uvāca sā tam na tu mām sutaḥ te kā asi iti pṛcchet na tu mām nivārayet

original: ayogyakartrīmapi kāraṇaṃ ca matkarmaṇo naiva pṛcchet kadācit / 11.32 /
analyzed: ayogya kartrīm api kāraṇam ca mad karmaṇaḥ nā eva pṛcchet kadācid

original: cxii.yadā trayāṇāmapi caikameṣa karoti gaccheyamahaṃ visṛjya /
analyzed: trayāṇām api ca ekam eṣa karoti gaccheyam aham visṛjya

original: tadā tvadīyaṃ sutamityudīrite tatheti rājā'pyavadat pratīpaḥ / 11.33 /
analyzed: tadā tvadīyam sutam iti udīrite tathā iti rājā api avadat pratīpaḥ

original: tathaiva putrāya ca tena tad vaco vadhūktamuktaṃ vacanād dyunadyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva putrāya ca tena tat vacaḥ vadhū uktam uktam vacanāt dyunadyāḥ

original: kanīyase sā hyavadat sutaste nānyaḥ patiḥ śantanureva me vṛtaḥ / 11.34 /
analyzed: kanīyase sā hi avadat sutaḥ te na anyaḥ patiḥ śantanuḥ eva me vṛtaḥ

original: tatastu sā ṇsantanuto'ṣṭa putrānavāpya sapta nyahanat tathā'ṣṭamam /
analyzed: tatas tu sā putrān avāpya sapta nyahanat tathā aṣṭamam

original: gantuṃ tato matimādhāya hantumivodyogaṃ sā himṛṣā cakāra / 11.35 /
analyzed: gantum tatas matim ādhāya hantum iva udyogam sā hi mṛṣā cakāra  /

original: avasthitirnātisukhāya mānuṣe yataḥ surāṇāmata eva gantum /
analyzed: avasthitiḥ na ati sukhāya mānuṣe yatas surāṇām atas eva gantum

original: aicchanna tasyā hi babhūva mānuṣo deho narottho hi tadā'sa śantanoḥ / 11.36 /
analyzed: aicchat na tasyāḥ hi babhūva mānuṣaḥ dehaḥ nara utthaḥ hi tadā āsa śantanoḥ  /

original: t āṃ putranidhanodyuktāṃ nyavārayata śantanuḥ /
analyzed: t ām putra nidhana udyuktām nyavārayata śantanuḥ

original: kā'si tvaṃ hetunā kena haṃ si putrān nṛśaṃ savat / 11.37 /
analyzed: kā asi tvam hetunā kena han si putrān nṛśam sa vat

original: rūpaṃ suravarastrīṇāṃ tava tena na pāpakam /
analyzed: rūpam sura vara strīṇām tava tena na pāpakam

original: bhavet karma tvadīyaṃ tanmahat kāraṇamatra hi / 11.38 /
analyzed: bhavet karma tvadīyam tat mahat kāraṇam atra hi

original: tat kāraṇaṃ vada śubhe yadi macchrotramarhati /
analyzed: tat kāraṇam vada śubhe yadi mad śrotram arhati

original: itīritā'vadat sarvaṃ prayayau ca surāpagā / 11.39 /
analyzed: iti īritā avadat sarvam prayayau ca surāpagā

original: na dharmo devatānāṃ hi jñātavāsaściraṃ nṛṣu /
analyzed: na dharmaḥ devatānām hi jñāta vāsaḥ ciram nṛṣu

original: kāraṇādeva hi surā nṛṣu vāsaṃ prakurvate /
analyzed: kāraṇāt eva hi surāḥ nṛṣu vāsam prakurvate

original: kāraṇāpagame yānti dharmo'pyeṣāṃ tathāvidhaḥ / 11.40 /
analyzed: kāraṇa apagame yānti dharmaḥ upi eṣām tathāvidhaḥ

original: adṛśyatvamasaṃ sparśo hyasambhāṣaṇameva ca /
analyzed: adṛśya tvam asam sparśaḥ hi asambhāṣaṇam eva ca

original: surairapi nṛj ātaistu guhyadharmo divaukasām / 11.41 /
analyzed: suraiḥ api guhya dharmaḥ divaukasām

original: ataḥ sā varuṇaṃ devaṃ pūrvabhartāramapyamum /
analyzed: atas sā varuṇam devam pūrva bhartāram api amum

original: nṛj ātaṃ śantanuṃ tyaktvā prayayau varuṇālayam / 11.42 /
analyzed: nṛj ātam śantanum tyaktvā prayayau varuṇālayam

original: sutamaṣṭamamādāya bharturevāpyanujñayā /
analyzed: sutam aṣṭamam ādāya bhartuḥ eva api anujñayā

original: vadhodyogānnivṛtt ā sā dadau putraṃ bṛhaspatau / 11.43 /
analyzed: vadha udyogāt nivṛtt ā sā dadau putram bṛhaspatau

original: devavrato'sāvanuśāsanāya mātrā datto devagurau śatārddham /
analyzed: devavratā usau anuśāsanāya mātrā dattaḥ devagurau śata arddham

original: cxiii.saṃ vatsarāṇāmakhilāṃ śca vedān samabhyasat tadvaśagāntarātmā / 11.44 /
analyzed: vatsarāṇām akhilām vedān tad vaśa ga antarātmā

original: tataśca mātrā jagatāṃ garīyasyanantapāre'khilasadguṇārṇave /
analyzed: tatas ca mātrā jagatām garīyasī ananta pārā ikhila sat guṇa arṇave

original: rāme bhṛgūṇāmadhipe pradattaḥ śuśrāva tattvaṃ ca śatārddhavarṣam / 11.45 /
analyzed: rāme bhṛgūṇām adhipe pradattaḥ śuśrāva tattvam ca śata arddha varṣam

original: sa pañcaviṃ śat punarabdakānāmastrāṇi cābhyasya paterbhṛgūṇām /
analyzed: sa pañcavim śat punar abdakānām astrāṇi ca abhyasya pateḥ bhṛgūṇām

original: mātrā samānīya taṭe nije tu saṃ sthāpitaḥ prārpayituṃ svapitre / 11.46 /
analyzed: mātrā samānīya taṭe nije tu sam sthāpitaḥ prārpayitum sva pitre

original: sa tatra baddhvā ṇsarapañjareṇa gaṅgāṃ vijahre'sya pitā tadaiva /
analyzed: sa tatra baddhvā ṇsara pañjareṇa gaṅgām vijahre isya pitā tadā eva

original: vrajan mṛgārthī tṛṣito vilokayan gaṅgāmatoyāmabhavat suvismitaḥ / 11.47 /
analyzed: vrajan mṛga arthī tṛṣitaḥ vilokayan gaṅgām atoyām abhavat su vismitaḥ

original: sa mārgayāmāsa tato'sya hetujñaptyai tadā svaṃ ca dadarśa sūnum /
analyzed: sa mārgayāmāsa tatas asya hetu jñaptyai tadā svam ca dadarśa sūnum

original: krīḍantamastreṇa babhūva so'pi kṣaṇādadṛśyaḥ pitṛdarśanādanu / 11.48 /
analyzed: krīḍantam astreṇa babhūva saḥ upi kṣaṇāt adṛśyaḥ pitṛ darśanāt anu

original: mīmāṃ samānaṃ tamavāpa gaṅgā sutaṃ samādāya patiṃ jagāda ca /
analyzed: samānam tam avāpa gaṅgā sutam samādāya patim jagāda ca

original: ayaṃ sutaste paramāstravettā samarpito vīryabalopapannaḥ / 11.49 /
analyzed: ayam sutaḥ te parama astra vettā samarpitaḥ vīrya bala upapannaḥ

original: asyāgrajāḥ svāṃ sthitimeva yātā hareḥ padāmbhojasupāvite jale /
analyzed: asya agrajāḥ svām sthitim eva yātāḥ hareḥ pada ambhoja su pāvite jale

original: tanūrmadīye praṇidhāya tat tvaṃ t ān mā ṇsuco'nena ca modamānaḥ / 11.50 /
analyzed: praṇidhāya tat tvam ca modamānaḥ  /

original: iti pradāyāmumadṛśyatāmagād gaṅgā tamādāya yayau svakaṃ gṛham /
analyzed: iti pradāya amum adṛśya tām agāt gaṅgā tam ādāya yayau svakam gṛham

original: rājā'bhiṣicyātha ca yauvarājye mumoda tatsadguṇatarpito bhṛśam / 11.51 /
analyzed: rājā abhiṣicya atha ca yauvarājye mumoda tad sat guṇa tarpitaḥ bhṛśam

original: punaḥ sa pitrā'numato bṛhaspateravāpa vedān puruṣāyuṣo'rddhataḥ /
analyzed: punar sa pitrā anumataḥ bṛhaspateḥ avāpa vedān puruṣa āyuṣā ūrddhataḥ

original: rāmāt tathā'strāṇi punastvavāpa tāvadbhirabdaistriśataiśca tattvam / 11.52 /
analyzed: rāmāt tathā astrāṇi punar tu avāpa tāvadbhiḥ abdaiḥ tri śataiḥ ca tattvam

original: sa sarvavittvaṃ samavāpya rāmāt samastavidyādhipaterguṇārṇavāt /
analyzed: sa sarva vid tvam samavāpya rāmāt samasta vidyā adhipateḥ guṇa arṇavāt

original: pituṃ samīpaṃ samavāpya taṃ ca śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pramumoda vīraḥ / 11.53 /
analyzed: pitum samīpam samavāpya tam ca śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pramumoda vīraḥ

original: yadaiva gaṅgā suṣuve'ṣṭamaṃ sutaṃ tadaiva yāto mṛgayāṃ sa śantanuḥ /
analyzed: yadā eva gaṅgā suṣuve iṣṭamam sutam tadā eva yātaḥ mṛgayām sa śantanuḥ

original: śaradvato jātamapaśyaduttamaṃ vane visṛṣṭaṃ mithunaṃ tvayonijam / 11.54 /
analyzed: śaradvataḥ jātam apaśyat uttamam vane visṛṣṭam mithunam tu ayoni jam

original: śaradvāṃ stu tapaḥ kurvan dadarśa sahasorvaśīm /
analyzed: śaradvān stu tapaḥ kurvan dadarśa sahasā urvaśīm

original: caskanda retastasyātha śarastambe tato'bhavat / 11.55 /
analyzed: caskanda retaḥ tasya atha śara stambe tatas bhavat  /

original: cxiv.viṣkambho nāma rudrāṇāṃ bhūbhāraharaṇe'ṅgatām /
analyzed: nāma rudrāṇām bhū bhāra haraṇa iṅga tām

original: hareḥ prāptuṃ tathā tārā bhāryā yā hibṛhaspateḥ / 11.56 /
analyzed: hareḥ prāptum tathā tārā bhāryā yā hi bṛhaspateḥ

original: t āvubhau śantanurdṛṣṭvā kṛpāviṣṭaḥ svakaṃ gṛham /
analyzed: t au ubhau śantanuḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛpā āviṣṭaḥ svakam gṛham

original: nināya nāma cakre ca kṛpāyā viṣayau yataḥ /
analyzed: nināya nāma cakre ca kṛpāyāḥ viṣayau yatas

original: kṛpaḥ kṛpīti sa kṛpastapo viṣṇoṇscakāra ha / 11.57 /
analyzed: kṛpaḥ kṛpī iti sa kṛpaḥ tapaḥ ha

original: tasya prītastadā viṣṇuḥ sarvalokeśvareśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tasya prītaḥ tadā viṣṇuḥ sarva loka īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: prādādeṣyatsaptarṣitvamāyuḥ kalpāntameva ca /
analyzed: prādādeṣyat saptarṣi tvam āyuḥ kalpa antam eva ca

original: sa śantanugṛhe tiṣṭhan devavratasakhā'bhavat / 11.58 /
analyzed: sa śantanu gṛhe tiṣṭhan devavrata sakhā bhavat  /

original: putravacchantanoścā'sīt sa ca putravadeva tat /
analyzed: putravat śantanoḥ ca āsīt sa ca putravat eva tat

original: mithunaṃ pālayāmāsa sa kṛpo'strāṇyavāpa ca / 11.59 /
analyzed: mithunam pālayāmāsa sa kṛpa ustrāṇi avāpa ca

original: sarvavedānadhijagau sarvaśāstrāṇi kauśikāt /
analyzed: sarva vedān adhijagau sarva śāstrāṇi kauśikāt

original: tattvajñānaṃ tathā vyāsādāpya sarvajñatāṃ gataḥ / 11.60 /
analyzed: tattva jñānam tathā vyāsa ādāpya sarvajña tām gataḥ

original: yadā hijātaḥ sa kṛpastadaiva bṛhaspateḥ sūnuragācca gaṅgām /
analyzed: yadā hi jātaḥ sa kṛpaḥ tadā eva bṛhaspateḥ sūnuḥ agāt ca gaṅgām

original: snātuṃ ghṛt ācīṃ sa dadarśa tatra ślathaddukūlāṃ suravaryakāminīm / 11.61 /
analyzed: snātum sa dadarśa tatra ślathat dukūlām sura varya kāminīm

original: taddarśanāt skannamathendriyaṃ sa droṇe dadhārā'śu tato'bhavat svayam /
analyzed: tad darśanāt skannam athā indriyam sa droṇe dadhāra āśu tatas bhavat svayam

original: ambhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ kartuṃ hareḥ karma bhuvo bharoddhṛtau / 11.62 /
analyzed: ambhoja ja āveśa yutaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ kartum hareḥ karma bhuvaḥ bhara uddhṛtau

original: droṇetināmāsya cakāra tāto munirbharadvāja utāsya vedān /
analyzed: droṇa iti nāmā asya cakāra tātaḥ muniḥ bharadvājaḥ uta asya vedān

original: adhyāpayāmāsa saśāstrasaṅghān sarvajñatāmāpa ca so'cireṇa / 11.63 /
analyzed: adhyāpayāmāsa sa śāstra saṅghān sarvajña tām āpa ca sa ucireṇa

original: kāle ca tasmin pṛṣato'napatyo vane tu pāñcālapatiścacāra /
analyzed: kāle ca tasmin pṛṣata ūna patyaḥ vane tu pāñcāla patiḥ cacāra

original: tapo mahat tasya tathā varāpsarāvalokanāt skanditamāṇsu retaḥ / 11.64 /
analyzed: tapaḥ mahat tasya tathā vara apsarā avalokanāt retaḥ  /

original: sa tad vilajjāvaśataḥ padena samākramat tasya babhūva sūnuḥ /
analyzed: sa tat vilajjā vaśataḥ padena samākramat tasya babhūva sūnuḥ

original: hahū tunāmnā sa viriñcagāyako nāmnā'vaho yo marutāṃ tadaṃ śayuk / 11.65 /
analyzed: sa viriñcagāyakaḥ nāmnā avahaḥ yaḥ marutām

original: sa droṇatātāt samavāpa vedānastrāṇi vidyāṇsca tathā samastāḥ /
analyzed: sa droṇatātāt samavāpa vedān astrāṇi vidyān ca tathā samastāḥ

original: droṇena yuktaḥ sa tadā guroḥ sutaṃ sahaiva nau rājyamiti hyavādīt / 11.66 /
analyzed: droṇena yuktaḥ sa tadā guroḥ sutam saha eva nau rājyam iti hi avādīt

original: cxv.pade drutatvād drupadābhidheyaḥ sa rājyamāpātha nijāṃ kṛpīṃ saḥ /
analyzed: druta tvāt drupada abhidheyaḥ sa rājyam āpa atha nijām kṛpīm saḥ

original: droṇo'pi bhāryāṃ samavāpya sarvapratigrahojjhaśca pure'vasat sukhī / 11.67 /
analyzed: droṇaḥ api bhāryām samavāpya sarva pratigraha ujjhaḥ ca purā vasat sukhī

original: siloñchavṛttyaiva hi vartayan sa dharmaṃ mahāntaṃ virajaṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: sila uñcha vṛttyā eva hi vartayan sa dharmam mahāntam virajam juṣāṇaḥ

original: uvāsa nāgākhyapure sakhā sa devavratasyātha kṛpasya caiva / 11.68 /
analyzed: uvāsa nāga ākhya pure sakhā sa devavratasya atha kṛpasya ca eva

original: teṣāṃ samāno vayasā virāṭastvabhūddhahā nāma vidhātṛgāyakaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām samānaḥ vayasā virāṭaḥ tu abhūt hahāḥ nāma vidhātṛ gāyakaḥ

original: marutsu yo vivaho nāma tasyāpyaṃ śena yukto nijadharmavartī / 11.69 /
analyzed: marutsu yaḥ vivahaḥ nāma śena yuktaḥ nija dharma vartī

original: tataḥ kadācinmṛgayāṃ gataḥ sa dadarśa kanyāpravarāṃ tu śantanuḥ /
analyzed: tatas kadācid mṛgayām gataḥ sa dadarśa kanyā pravarām tu śantanuḥ

original: yā pūrvasarge pitṛputrikā satī cacāra viṣṇostapa uttamaṃ ciram / 11.70 /
analyzed: yā pūrva sarge pitṛ putrikā satī cacāra viṣṇoḥ tapaḥ uttamam ciram

original: yasyai varaṃ viṣṇuradāt purā'haṃ sutastava syāmiti yā vasoḥ sutā /
analyzed: yasyai varam viṣṇuḥ adāt purā aham sutaḥ tava syām iti yā vasoḥ sutā

original: j ātā punardāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitā vyāsātmanā viṣṇurabhūcca yasyām / 11.71 /
analyzed: j ātā punar dāṇsa gṛhe vivarddhitā vyāsa ātmanā viṣṇuḥ abhūt ca yasyām  /

original: taddarśanānnṛpatirjātahṛcchrayo vavre pradānāya ca dāṇsarājam /
analyzed: tad darśanāt nṛpatiḥ jāta hṛd śrayaḥ vavre pradānāya ca dāṇsa rājam

original: ṛte sa tasyāstanayasya rājyaṃ naicchad dātuṃ t āmathā'yād gṛhaṃ svam / 11.72 /
analyzed: ṛte sa tasyāḥ tanayasya rājyam na aicchat dātum āmathāyāt gṛham svam  /

original: taccintayā glānamukhaṃ janitraṃ dṛṣṭvaiva devavrata āṇsvapṛcchat /
analyzed: tad cintayā glāna mukham janitram dṛṣṭvā eva devavrataḥ āṇsu apṛcchat

original: tatkāraṇaṃ sārathimasya tasmācchrutvā'khilaṃ dāṇsagṛhaṃ jagāma / 11.73 /
analyzed: tad kāraṇam sārathim asya tasmāt śrutvā akhilam dāṇsa gṛham jagāma

original: sa tasya viśvāsakṛte pratijñāṃ cakāra nāhaṃ karavāṇi rājyam /
analyzed: sa tasya viśvāsa kṛte pratijñām cakāra na aham karavāṇi rājyam

original: tathaiva me santatito bhayaṃ te vyaitūrdhvaretāḥ satataṃ bhavāni / 11.74 /
analyzed: tathā eva me santatitaḥ bhayam te vyaitu ūrdhvaretāḥ satatam bhavāni

original: bhīmavratatvāddhi tadā'sya nāma kṛtvā devā bhīṣma iti hyacīklṛpan /
analyzed: bhīma vrata tvāt hi tadā asya nāma kṛtvā devāḥ bhīṣmaḥ iti hi acīklṛpan

original: prasūnavṛṣṭiṃ sa ca dāṇsadattāṃ kāl . īṃ samādāya pituḥ samarpayat / 11.75 /
analyzed: prasūna vṛṣṭim sa ca dāṇsadattām kāl īm samādāya pituḥ samarpayat  /

original: j ñātvā tutāṃ rājaputrīṃ guṇāḍhyāṃ satyasya viṣṇormātaraṃ nāmatastat /
analyzed: ñātvā tutām rāja putrīm guṇa āḍhyām satyasya viṣṇoḥ mātaram nāmataḥ tat

original: loke prasiddhāṃ satyavatītyudārāṃ vivāhayāmāsa pituḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ / 11.76 /
analyzed: loke prasiddhām satyavatī iti udārām vivāhayāmāsa pituḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ

original: prāyaḥ satāṃ na manaḥ pāpamārge gacchediti hyātmamanaśca saktam /
analyzed: prāyas satām na manaḥ pāpa mārge gacchet iti hi ātma manaḥ ca saktam

original: j ñātvā'pi tāṃ dāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitāṃ jagrāha saddharmarataśca śantanuḥ / 11.77 /
analyzed: j ñātvā api tām dāṇsa gṛhe vivarddhitām jagrāha saddharma rataḥ ca śantanuḥ  /

original: svacchandamṛtyutvavaraṃ pradāya tathā'pyajeyatvamadhṛṣyatāṃ ca /
analyzed: svacchanda mṛtyu tva varam pradāya tathā api ajeya tvam adhṛṣya tām ca

original: yuddheṣu bhīṣmasya nṛpottamaḥ sa reme tayaivābdagaṇān bahūṃ śca / 11.78 /
analyzed: yuddheṣu bhīṣmasya nṛpa uttamaḥ sa reme tayā eva abda gaṇān bahūn śca

original: cxvi.lebhe sa citrāṅgadamatra putraṃ tathā dvitīyaṃ ca vicitravīryam /
analyzed: sa citrāṅgadam atra putram tathā dvitīyam ca vicitravīryam

original: tayośca bālye vyadhunoccharīraṃ jīrṇena dehena hi kiṃ mameti / 11.79 /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca bālye vyadhunot śarīram jīrṇena dehena hi kim mama iti

original: svecchayā varuṇatvaṃ sa prāpa nānicchayā tanuḥ /
analyzed: sva icchayā varuṇa tvam sa prāpa na anicchayā tanuḥ

original: tasmin kāle tyajyate hi balavadbhirvadhaṃ vinā / 11.80 /
analyzed: tasmin kāle tyajyate hi balavadbhiḥ vadham vinā

original: atisaktāstapohīnāḥ kathañcinmṛtimāpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: ati saktāḥ tapaḥ hīnāḥ kathañcid mṛtim āpnuyuḥ

original: anicchayā'pi hi yathā mṛtaścitrāṅgadānujaḥ / 11.81 /
analyzed: anicchayā api hi yathā mṛtaḥ citrāṅgadā anujaḥ

original: athaurdhvadaihikaṃ kṛtvā piturbhīṣmo'bhyaṣecayat /
analyzed: atha aurdhvadaihikam kṛtvā pituḥ bhīṣmaḥ abhyaṣecayat

original: rājye citrāṅgadaṃ vīraṃ yauvarājye'sya cānujam / 11.82 /
analyzed: rājye citrāṅgadam vīram yauvarājye isya ca anujam

original: citrāṅgadena nihato nāma svaṃ tvaparityajan /
analyzed: citrāṅgadena nihataḥ nāma svam tu a parityajan

original: citrāṅgado'kṛtodvāho gandharveṇa mahāraṇe /
analyzed: gandharveṇa mahā raṇe

original: vicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ kṛtvā bhīṣmo'nvapālayat / 11.83 /
analyzed: vicitravīryam rājānam kṛtvā bhīṣmaḥ nvapālayat  /

original: atha kāṇsisutāstisrastadarthaṃ bhīṣma āharat /
analyzed: atha kāṇsi sutāḥ tisraḥ tad artham bhīṣmaḥ āharat

original: ambāmapyambikānāmnīṃ tathaivāmbālikāṃ parām / 11.84 /
analyzed: ambām api ambikā nāmnīm tathā eva ambālikām parām

original: pāṇigrahaṇakāle tu brahmadattasya vīryavān /
analyzed: pāṇigrahaṇa kāle tu brahmadattasya vīryavān

original: vijitya taṃ sālvarājaṃ sametān kṣatriyānapi / 11.85 /
analyzed: vijitya tam śālva rājam sametān kṣatriyān api

original: ambikāmbālike tatra saṃ vādaṃ cakratuḥ śubhe /
analyzed: ambikā ambālike tatra sam vādam cakratuḥ śubhe

original: ambā sā bhīṣmabhāryaiva pūrvadehe tu naicchata / 11.86 /
analyzed: ambā sā bhīṣma bhāryā eva pūrva dehe tu na aicchata

original: śāpāddhiraṇyagarbhasya sālvakāmā'hamityapi /
analyzed: śāpāt hiraṇyagarbhasya sālva kāmā aham iti api

original: uvāca tāṃ sa tatyāja sā'gamat sālvameva ca / 11.87 /
analyzed: uvāca tām sa tatyāja sā agamat śālvam eva ca

original: tenāpi samparityaktā parāmṛṣṭeti sā punaḥ /
analyzed: tena api samparityaktā parāmṛṣṭā iti sā punar

original: bhīṣmamāpa sa nāgṛhṇāt prayayau sā'pi bhārgavam / 11.88 /
analyzed: bhīṣmam āpa sa na agṛhṇāt prayayau sā api bhārgavam

original: bhrāturvivāhayāmāsa so'mbikāmbālike tataḥ /
analyzed: bhrātuḥ vivāhayāmāsa sombikā ambālike tatas

original: bhīṣmāya tu yaśo dātuṃ yuyudhe tena bhārgavaḥ / 11.89 /
analyzed: bhīṣmāya tu yaśaḥ dātum yuyudhe tena bhārgavaḥ

original: cxvii.anantaśaktirapi sa na bhīṣmaṃ nijaghāna ha /
analyzed: ananta śaktiḥ api sa na bhīṣmam nijaghāna ha

original: nacāmbāṃ grāhayāmāsa bhīṣmakāruṇyayantritaḥ / 11.90 /

analyzed: bhīṣmam sva bhaktam yaśasā abhipūrayan vimohayan āsurān ca eva rāmaḥ

original: bhīṣmasya nidhanārthāya puṃ stvārthaṃ ca cakāra ha / 11.95 /

original: t āṃ na bhīṣmabhayāt ke'pi jagṛhustāṃ hi sā tataḥ /

original: udvāhayāmāsa sā tāṃ puṃ veṣeṇaiva gūhitām /

original: aparīkṣakasya te rāṣṭraṃ kathamityeva narmakṛt / 11.104 /

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ṇsikhaṇḍinī duḥkhāt mad nimittāt na naśyatu  /

analyzed: iti matvā vanāya eva yayau tatra ca tumburuḥ

original: aṃ śena puṃ svabhāvārthaṃ pūrvadehe samāsthitaḥ / 11.107 /

original: ataḥ śivavare'pyeṣāṃ jajñe yoṣaiva nānyathā /

original: paścāt pundehamapi sā praviveśaiva puṃ yutam / 11.109 /

original: śvo dehi mama dehaṃ me svaṃ ca dehaṃ samāviśa /

original: parīkṣya tāmupāyaiśca śvaśuro lajjito yayau /

original: yayau tenaiva dehena puṃ stvameva samāṇsritā /

original: cxxi.avāpa śūdratvamathāsya nāma cakre kṛṣṇaḥ sarvavittvaṃ tathā'dāt / 11.134 /

original: vidyāraterviduro nāma cāyaṃ bhaviṣyati jñānabalopapannaḥ /
analyzed: vidyārateḥ viduraḥ nāma ca ayam bhaviṣyati jñāna bala upapannaḥ

original: mahādhanurbāhubalādhikaśca sunītimānityavadat sa kṛṣṇaḥ / 11.135 /
analyzed: mahā dhanuḥ bāhu bala adhikaḥ ca su nītimān iti avadat sa kṛṣṇaḥ

original: j ñātvā'sya śūdratvamathāsya mātā punaśca kṛṣṇaṃ praṇatā yayāce /
analyzed: j ñātvā asya śūdra tvam atha asya mātā punar ca kṛṣṇam praṇatā yayāce

original: ambālikāyāṃ janayānyamityatho naicchat sa kṛṣṇo'bhavadapyadṛśyaḥ / 11.136 /

analyzed: vidyāḥ samastāḥ adadāt ca kṛṣṇaḥ teṣām pāṇḍoḥ astra śastrāṇi bhīṣmaḥ

original: te sarvavidyāpravarā babhūvurviśeṣato viduraḥ sarvavettā /
analyzed: te sarva vidyā pravarāḥ babhūvuḥ viśeṣataḥ viduraḥ sarva vettā

analyzed: gavat gaṇāt āsa tathā eva sūtāt samasta gandharva patiḥ sa tumburuḥ

original: ya udvaho nāma marut tadaṃ śayukto vaśī sañjayanāmadheyaḥ / 11.139 /
analyzed: yaḥ udvahaḥ nāma marut vaśī sañjaya nāmadheyaḥ

original: vicitravīryasya sa sūtaputraḥ sakhā ca teṣāmabhavat priyaśca /
