analyzed: hantavyaḥ iti asmarat āṇsu hi tvām tadā āvirāsīḥ tvam ananta pauruṣaḥ

original: tamastraśastrāṇi bahūni bāhubhiḥ pravarṣamāṇaṃ bhuvanāptadeham /
analyzed: tam astra śastrāṇi bahūni bāhubhiḥ pravarṣamāṇam bhuvana āpta deham

original: cakreṇa bāhūn vinikṛtya kāni ca nyavedayaścā'śu yamāya pāpam / 11.188 /
analyzed: cakreṇa bāhūn vinikṛtya kāni ca nyavedayaḥ ca āśu yamāya pāpam

original: tato'surāste nihatā aśeṣāstvayā tribhāgā nihatāṇscaturtham /
analyzed: tatas usurāḥ te nihatāḥ aśeṣāḥ tvayā tri bhāgāḥ nihatān caturtham

original: jaghāna vāyuḥ punareva jātāste bhūtal . e dharmabalopapannāḥ / 11.189 /
analyzed: jaghāna vāyuḥ punar eva jātāḥ te dharma bala upapannāḥ

original: rājñāṃ mahāvaṃ śasujanmanāṃ tu teṣāmabhūd dharmamatirvipāpā /
analyzed: rājñām śasu janmanām tu teṣām abhūt dharma matiḥ vipāpā

original: śikṣāmavāpya dvijapuṅgavānāṃ tvadbhaktirapyeṣu hikācana syāt / 11.190 /
analyzed: śikṣām avāpya dvija puṅgavānām tvad bhaktiḥ api eṣu hi kācana syāt

original: cxxvi.tvadbhaktileśābhiyutaḥ sukarmā vrajenna pāpāṃ tu gatiṃ kathañcit /
analyzed: su karmā vrajet na pāpām tu gatim kathaṃcid

original: daityeśvarāṇāṃ ca tamo'ndhameva tvayaiva klṛptaṃ nanu satyakāma / 11.191 /
analyzed: daitya īśvarāṇām ca tamaḥ ndham eva tvayā eva klṛptam nanu satyakāma

original: dharmasya mithyātvabhayād vayaṃ tvāmathāpivā daityaśubhāptibhīṣā /
analyzed: dharmasya mithyātva bhayāt vayam tvām athā api vā daitya śubha āpti bhīṣā

original: samprārthayāmo ditijān sukarmaṇastvadbhaktitaścyāvayituṃ ca śīghram / 11.192 /
analyzed: samprārthayāmaḥ ditijān sukarmaṇaḥ tvad bhaktitaḥ cyāvayitum ca śīghram

original: ya ugrasenaḥ suragāyakaḥ sa jāto yaduṣveṣa tathā'bhidheyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ugrasenaḥ sura gāyakaḥ sa jātaḥ yaduṣu eṣa tathā abhidheyaḥ

original: tavaiva sevārthamamuṣya putro jāto'suraḥ kālanemiḥ sa īśa / 11.193 /
analyzed: tava eva sevā artham amuṣya putraḥ jāta usuraḥ kālanemiḥ saḥ īśa  /

original: yastvatpriyārthaṃ na hato hi vāyunā bhavatprasādāt paramīśitā'pi /
analyzed: yaḥ tvad priya artham na hataḥ hi vāyunā bhavat prasādāt param īśitā api

original: sa eṣa bhojeṣu punaśca jāto varādumeśasya parairajeyaḥ / 11.194 /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhojeṣu punar ca jātaḥ varāt umeśasya paraiḥ ajeyaḥ

original: sa augrasene janito'sureṇa kṣetre hi tadrūpadhareṇa māyayā /
analyzed: saḥ augrasene janita usureṇa kṣetre hi tad rūpa dhareṇa māyayā

original: gandharvijena dramil . ena nāmnā kaṃ so jito yena varācchacīpatiḥ / 11.195 /
analyzed: gandharvi jena dramil ena nāmnā kam saḥ jitaḥ yena varāt śacīpatiḥ

original: jitvā jaleśaṃ ca hṛt āni yena ratnāni yakṣāṇsca jitāḥ śivasya /
analyzed: jitvā jaleśam ca hṛd āni yena ratnāni yakṣāṇs ca jitāḥ śivasya

original: kanyāvanārthaṃ magadhādhipena prayojitāste ca hṛte balena / 11.196 /
analyzed: kanyā vana artham magadha adhipena prayojitāḥ te ca hṛte balena

original: sa vipracittiśca jarāsuto'bhūd varād vidhāturgiriśasya caiva /
analyzed: sa vipracittiḥ ca jarā sutaḥ bhūt varāt vidhātuḥ giriśasya ca eva

original: sarvairajeyo balamuttamaṃ tato jñātvaiva kaṃ sasya mudā sute dadau / 11.197 /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ ajeyaḥ balam uttamam tatas jñātvā eva kam sasya mudā sute dadau

original: nivārayāmāsa na kaṃ samuddhataṃ śakto'pi yo yasya bale na kaścit /
analyzed: nivārayāmāsa na kam samuddhatam śaktaḥ upi yaḥ yasya bale na kaścid

original: tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ vivareṣu vā kvacid vaśe balād yo nṛpatīśca cakre / 11.198 /
analyzed: tulyaḥ pṛthivyām vivareṣu vā kvacid vaśe balāt yaḥ nṛpatīḥ ca cakre  /

original: hatau purā yau madhukaiṭabhākhyau tvayaiva haṃ so ḍibhakaśca jātau /
analyzed: hatau purā yau madhu kaiṭabha ākhyau tvayā eva ham saḥ ḍibhakaḥ ca jātau

original: varādajeyau giriśasya vīrau bhaktau jarāsandhamanu sma tau śive / 11.199 /
analyzed: varāt ajeyau giriśasya vīrau bhaktau jarāsandham anu sma tau śive

original: anye'pi bhūmāvasurāḥ prajātāstvayā hatā ye suradaityasaṅgare /
analyzed: anye api bhūmau asurāḥ prajātāḥ tvayā hatāḥ ye sura daitya saṅgare

original: anye tathaivāndhatamaḥ prapedire kāryā tathaiṣāṃ ca tamogatistvayā / 11.200 /
analyzed: anye tathā eva andha tamaḥ prapedire kāryā tathā eṣām ca tamaḥ gatiḥ tvayā

original: vyāsāvatāre nihatastvayāyaḥ kaliḥ suśāstroktibhireva cādya /
analyzed: vyāsa avatāre nihataḥ tvayā ayaḥ kaliḥ suśāstra uktibhiḥ eva ca adya

original: śrutvā tvaduktīḥ puruṣeṣu tiṣṭhannīṣaccakāreva manastvayīśa / 11.201 /
analyzed: śrutvā tvad uktīḥ puruṣeṣu tiṣṭhan īṣat cakāra iva manaḥ tvayi īśa

original: rāmātmanā ye nihatāṇsca rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā balaṃ te'pi tadā tavādya /
analyzed: rāma ātmanā ye nihatān ca rākṣasāḥ dṛṣṭvā balam te api tadā tava adya

original: samaṃ tavānyaṃ nahi cintayanti supāpino'pīśa tathā hanūmataḥ / 11.202 /
analyzed: samam tava anyam nahi cintayanti su pāpinā upi īśa tathā hanūmataḥ

original: cxxvii.ye keśava tvadbahumānayuktāstathaiva vāyau nahi te tamo'ndham /
analyzed: keśava tvad bahu māna yuktāḥ tathā eva vāyau nahi te tamaḥ undham

original: yogyāḥ praveṣṭuṃ tadato hi mārgāccālyāstvayā janayitvaiva bhūmau / 11.203 /
analyzed: yogyāḥ praveṣṭum tat atas hi mārgāt cālyāḥ tvayā janayitvā eva bhūmau

original: nitāntamutpādya bhavadvirodhaṃ tathāca vāyau bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ /
analyzed: nitāntam utpādya bhavat virodham tathā ca vāyau bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ

original: sarveṣu deveṣu capātanīyāstamasyathāndhe kalipūrvakāsurāḥ / 11.204 /
analyzed: sarveṣu deveṣu capātanīyāḥ tamasi atha andhe kali pūrvaka asurāḥ

original: hatau ca yau rāvaṇakumbhakarṇau tvayā tvadīyau pratihārapālau /
analyzed: hatau ca yau rāvaṇa kumbhakarṇau tvayā tvadīyau pratihāra pālau

original: mahāsurāveśayutau hi śāpāt tvayaiva tāvadya vimocanīyau / 11.205 /
analyzed: mahā asura āveśa yutau hi śāpāt tvayā eva tau adya vimocanīyau  /

original: yau tau tavārī ha tayoḥ praviṣṭau daityau tu tāvandhatamaḥ praveśyau /
analyzed: yau tau ha tayoḥ praviṣṭau daityau tu tau andhatamaḥ praveśyau

original: yau tau tvadīyau bhavadīyaveśma tvayā punaḥ prāpaṇīyau pareśa / 11.206 /
analyzed: yau tau tvadīyau bhavadīya veśma tvayā punar prāpaṇīyau pareśa  /

original: āviśya yo balimañjaścakāra pratīpamasmāsu tathā tvayīśa /
analyzed: āviśya yaḥ balim añjaḥ cakāra pratīpam asmāsu tathā tvayi īśa

original: sa cāsuro balināmaiva bhūmau sālvo nāmnā brahmadattasya jātaḥ / 11.207 /
analyzed: sa ca asuraḥ bali nāmā eva bhūmau sālvaḥ nāmnā brahmadattasya jātaḥ  /

original: māyāmayaṃ tena vimānamagryamabhedyamāptaṃ sakalairgirīśāt /
analyzed: māyā mayam tena vimānam agryam abhedyam āptam sakalaiḥ girīśāt

original: vidrāvito yo bahuśastvayaiva rāmasvarūpeṇa bhṛgūdvahena / 11.208 /
analyzed: vidrāvitaḥ yaḥ bahuśas tvayā eva rāma sva rūpeṇa bhṛgu udvahena

original: nāsau hataḥ śaktimatā'pi tatra kṛṣṇāvatāre sa mayaiva vadhyaḥ /
analyzed: na asau hataḥ śaktimatā api tatra kṛṣṇa avatāre sa mayā eva vadhyaḥ

original: ityātmasaṅkalpamṛtaṃ vidhātuṃ sa cātra vadhyo bhavatā'tipāpī / 11.209 /
analyzed: iti ātma saṅkalpa mṛtam vidhātum sa ca atra vadhyaḥ bhavatā ati pāpī

original: yadīyamāruhya vimānamasya pitā'bhavat saubhapatiśca nāmnā /
analyzed: yadi iyam āruhya vimānam asya pitā abhavat saubha patiḥ ca nāmnā

original: yadā sabhīṣmeṇa jitaḥ pitā'sya tadā sa sālvastapasi sthito'bhūt / 11.210 /
analyzed: yadā sa bhīṣmeṇa jitaḥ pitā asya tadā sa śālvaḥ tapasi sthitaḥ bhūt

original: sa cādya tasmāt tapaso nivṛtto jarāsutasyānumate sthito hi /
analyzed: sa ca adya tasmāt tapasaḥ nivṛttaḥ jarāsutasya anumate sthitaḥ hi

original: ananyavadhyo bhavatā'dya vadhyaḥ sa prāpaṇīyaśca tamasyathogre / 11.211 /
analyzed: an anya vadhyaḥ bhavatā adya vadhyaḥ sa prāpaṇīyaḥ ca tamasi atha ugre

original: yo bāṇamāviśya mahāsuro'bhūt sthitaḥ sa nāmnā prathito'pi bāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ bāṇam āviśya mahā asuraḥ bhūt sthitaḥ sa nāmnā prathitaḥ api bāṇaḥ

original: sa kīcako nāma babhūva rudravarādavadhyaḥ sa tamaḥ praveśyaḥ / 11.212 /
analyzed: sa kīcakaḥ nāma babhūva rudra varāt avadhyaḥ sa tamaḥ praveśyaḥ  /

original: atastvayā bhuvyavatīrya devakāryāṇi kāryāṇyakhilāni deva /
analyzed: atas tvayā bhuvi avatīrya deva kāryāṇi kāryāṇi akhilāni deva

original: tvameva deveśa gatiḥ surāṇāṃ brahmeśaśakrenduyamādikānām / 11.213 /
analyzed: tvam eva deveśa gatiḥ surāṇām brahma īśa śakra indu yama ādikānām

original: tvameva nityoditapūrṇaṇsaktistvameva nityoditapūrṇaciddhanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam eva nitya udita pūrṇa cit dhanaḥ

original: cxxviii.tvameva nityoditapūrṇasatsukhastvāddṛṅ nakaścit kuta eva te'dhikaḥ / 11.214 /
analyzed: tvam eva nitya udita pūrṇa sat sukhaḥ tvāt dṛś na kaścid kutas eva te adhikaḥ

original: itīrito devavarairudāraguṇārṇavo'kṣobhyatamāmṛt ākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ deva varaiḥ udāra guṇa arṇava ukṣobhyatama amṛt ākṛtiḥ

original: utthāya tasmāt prayayāvanantasomārkakāntidyutiranvito'maraiḥ / 11.215 /
analyzed: utthāya tasmāt prayayau ananta soma arka kānti dyutiḥ anvita umaraiḥ

original: sa merumāpyā'ha caturmukhaṃ prabhuryatra tvayokto'smi hi tatra sarvathā /
analyzed: sa merum āpyāha caturmukham prabhuḥ yatra tvayā uktaḥ asmi hi tatra sarvathā

original: prādurbhaviṣye bhavato hi bhaktyā vaśastvivāhaṃ svavaśo'pi cecchayā / 11.216 /
analyzed: prādurbhaviṣye bhavataḥ hi bhaktyā vaśaḥ tu iva aham sva vaśaḥ api ca icchayā

original: brahmā praṇamyā'ha tamātmakāraṇaṃ prādāṃ purā'haṃ varuṇāya gāḥ śubhāḥ /
analyzed: brahmā praṇamya āha tam ātma kāraṇam prādām purā aham varuṇāya gāḥ śubhāḥ

original: jahāra tāstasya pitā'mṛtasravāḥ sa kaśyapo drāk sahasā'tigarvitaḥ / 11.217 /
analyzed: jahāra tāḥ tasya pitā amṛta sravāḥ sa kaśyapaḥ drāk sahasā ati garvitaḥ

original: mātrā tvadityā ca tathā surabhyā pracoditenaiva hṛt āsu tāsu /
analyzed: mātrā tu adityā ca tathā surabhyā pracoditena eva hṛd āsu tāsu

original: śrutvā jaleśāt sa mayā tuśaptaḥ kṣatreṣu gojīvanako bhaveti / 11.218 /
analyzed: śrutvā jaleśāt sa mayā tuśaptaḥ kṣatreṣu go jīvanakaḥ bhava iti

original: śūrāt sa jāto bahugodhanāḍhyo bhūmau yamāhurvasudeva ityapi /
analyzed: śūrāt sa jātaḥ bahu go dhana āḍhyaḥ bhūmau yam āhuḥ vasudevaḥ iti api

original: tasyaiva bhāryā tvaditiśca devakī babhūva cānyā surabhiśca rohiṇī / 11.219 /
analyzed: tasya eva bhāryā tu aditiḥ ca devakī babhūva ca anyā surabhiḥ ca rohiṇī

original: tat tvaṃ bhavasvā'śu ca devakīsutastathaiva yo droṇanāmā vasuḥ saḥ /
analyzed: tat tvam bhavasva āśu ca devakī sutaḥ tathā eva yaḥ droṇa nāmā vasuḥ saḥ

original: svabhāryayā dharayā tvatpitṛtvaṃ prāptuṃ tapastepa udāramānasaḥ / 11.220 /
analyzed: sva bhāryayā dharayā tvad pitṛ tvam prāptum tapaḥ tepe udāra mānasaḥ

original: tasmai varaḥ sa mayā sannisṛṣṭaḥ sa cā'sa nandākhya utāsya bhāryā /
analyzed: tasmai varaḥ sa mayā sannisṛṣṭaḥ sa ca āsa nanda ākhyaḥ uta asya bhāryā

original: namnā yaśodā saca ṇsūratātasutasya vaiśyāprabhavo'tha gopaḥ / 11.221 /
analyzed: namnā yaśodā saca gopaḥ

original: tau devakīvasudevau ca tepatustapastvadīyaṃ sutamicchamānau /
analyzed: tau devakī vasudevau ca tepatuḥ tapaḥ tvadīyam sutam icchamānau

original: tvāmeva tasmāt prathamaṃ pradarśya tatra svarūpaṃ hi tato vrajaṃ vraja / 11.222 /
analyzed: tvām eva tasmāt prathamam pradarśya tatra sva rūpam hi tatas vrajam vraja

original: itīrite so'bjabhavena keśavastatheti coktvā punarāha devatāḥ /
analyzed: iti īrite sobja bhavena keśavaḥ tathā iti ca uktvā punar āha devatāḥ

original: sarve bhavanto bhavatā'śu mānuṣe kāryānusāreṇa yathānurūpataḥ / 11.223 /
analyzed: sarve bhavantaḥ bhavata āśu mānuṣe kārya anusāreṇa yathā anurūpataḥ

original: athāvatīrṇāḥ sakalāṇsca devatā yathāyathaivā'ha haristathātathā /
analyzed: atha avatīrṇāḥ sakalān ca devatāḥ yathā yathā eva āha hariḥ tathā tathā

original: vitteśvaraḥ pūrvamabhūddhi bhaumāddhareḥ sutatve'pi tadicchayā'surāt / 11.224 /
analyzed: vitteśvaraḥ pūrvam abhūt hi bhaumāt hareḥ suta tve pi tad icchayā asurāt

original: pāpena tenāpahṛto hi hastī śivapradattaḥ supratīkābhidhānaḥ /
analyzed: pāpena tena apahṛtaḥ hi hastī śiva pradattaḥ supratīka abhidhānaḥ

original: tadarthamevāsya suto'bhijāto dhaneśvaro bhagadattābhidhānaḥ / 11.225 /
analyzed: tad artham eva asya sutaḥ abhijātaḥ dhaneśvaraḥ bhagadatta abhidhānaḥ

original: cxxix.mahāsurasyāṃ śayutaḥ sa eva rudrāveśād balavānastravāṃ śca /
analyzed: saḥ eva rudra āveśāt balavān astravān śca

original: śiṣyo mahendrasya hate babhūva tāte svadharmābhirataśca nityam / 11.226 /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ mahā indrasya hate babhūva tāte svadharma abhirataḥ ca nityam

original: abhūcchinirnāma yadupravīrastasyā'tmajaḥ satyaka āsa tasmāt /
analyzed: abhūt śiniḥ nāma yadu pravīraḥ tasya ātmajaḥ satyakaḥ āsa tasmāt

original: kṛṣṇaḥ pakṣo yuyudhānābhidheyo gurutmato'ṃ śena yuto babhūva / 11.227 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ pakṣaḥ yuyudhāna abhidheyaḥ śena yutaḥ babhūva

original: yaḥ saṃ vaho nāma marut tadaṃ śaścakrasya viṣṇoṇsca babhūva tasmin /
analyzed: yaḥ sam vahaḥ nāma marut tat am śaḥ cakrasya babhūva tasmin

original: yaduṣvabhūddhṛdiko bhojavaṃ śe sitaḥ pakṣastasya suto babhūva / 11.228 /
analyzed: yaduṣu abhūt hṛdikaḥ bhojavam śe sitaḥ pakṣaḥ tasya sutaḥ babhūva

original: sa pāñcajanyāṃ śayuto marutsu tathā'ṃ śayuktaḥ pravahasya vīraḥ /
analyzed: sa pāñcajanyām śayuktaḥ marutsu tathām śayuktaḥ pravahasya vīraḥ

original: nāmāsya cābhūt kṛtavarmetyathānye ye yādavāste'pi surāḥ sagopāḥ / 11.229 /
analyzed: nāma asya ca abhūt kṛtavarmā iti atha anye ye yādavāḥ te api surāḥ sa gopāḥ

original: ye pāṇḍavānāmabhavan sahāyā devāṇsca devānucarāḥ samastāḥ /
analyzed: ye pāṇḍavānām abhavan sahāyāḥ devāṇs ca deva anucarāḥ samastāḥ

original: anye tu sarve'pyasurā hi madhyamā yemānuṣāste calabuddhipravṛttayaḥ / 11.230 /
analyzed: anye tu sarve api asurāḥ hi madhyamāḥ ye mānuṣāḥ te cala buddhi pravṛttayaḥ

original: li ṅgaṃ surāṇāṃ hi paraiva bhaktirviṣṇau tadanyeṣu ca tatpratīpatā /
analyzed: ṅgam surāṇām hi parā eva bhaktiḥ viṣṇau tad anyeṣu ca tad pratīpa tā

original: ato'tra yeye haribhaktitatparāstete surāstadbharitā viśeṣataḥ / 11.231 /
analyzed: atas tra ye ye hari bhakti tatparāḥ te te surāḥ tad bharitāḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
bhagavadavatārapratij ñḸa nāma ekādaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma ekādaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: cxxx.(pāṇḍavotpattiḥ )
analyzed: cxxx pāṇḍava utpattiḥ

original: atha dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha dvādaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / babhūva gandharvamunistu devakaḥ sa āsa sevārthamathā'hukāddhareḥ /
analyzed: om babhūva gandharva muniḥ tu devakaḥ saḥ āsa sevā artham atha āhukāt hareḥ

original: sa ugrasenāvarajastathaiva nāmāsya tasmādajani sma devakī / 12.1 /
analyzed: saḥ ugrasena avarajaḥ tathā eva nāma asya tasmāt ajani sma devakī

original: anyāṇsca yāḥ kāṇsyapasyaiva bhāryā jyeṣṭhāṃ tu tāmāhuka ātmaputrīm /
analyzed: anyāṇs ca yāḥ kāṇsyapasya eva bhāryāḥ jyeṣṭhām tu tām āhukaḥ ātma putrīm

original: cakāra tasmāddhi pitṛṣvasā sā svasā ca kaṃ sasya babhūva devakī / 12.2 /
analyzed: cakāra tasmāt hi pitṛṣvasā sā svasā ca kam sasya babhūva devakī

original: saivāditirvasudevasya dattā tasyā rathaṃ maṅgal . aṃ kaṃ sa eva /
analyzed: sā eva aditiḥ vasudevasya dattā tasyāḥ ratham aṃ kaṃ saḥ eva

original: saṃ yāpayāmāsa tadā hi vāyurjagāda vākyaṃ gaganasthito'mum / 12.3 /
analyzed: sam yāpayāmāsa tadā hi vāyuḥ jagāda vākyam gagana sthitaḥ umum

original: vinā'parādhaṃ na tato garīyaso na mātulo vadhyatāmeti viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: vinā aparādham na tatas garīyasaḥ na mātulaḥ vadhya tām eti viṣṇoḥ

original: lokasya dharmānanuvartato'taḥ pitrorvirodhārthamuvāca vāyuḥ / 12.4 /
analyzed: lokasya dharmān anuvartatā uta pitroḥ virodha artham uvāca vāyuḥ

original: mṛtyustavāsyā bhavitā'ṣṭamaḥ suto mūḍheti cokto jagṛhe kṛpāṇām /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ tava asyāḥ bhavitā aṣṭamaḥ sutaḥ mūḍha iti ca uktaḥ jagṛhe kṛpāṇām

original: putrān samarpyāsya ca śūrasūnurvimocya tāṃ tatsahito gṛhaṃ yayau / 12.5 /
analyzed: putrān samarpya asya ca śūrasūnuḥ vimocya tām tad sahitaḥ gṛham yayau

original: ṣaṭkanyakāṇscāvarajā gṛhīt āstenaiva tābhiśca mumoda śūrajaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ kanyakān ca avarajā gṛhīt tābhiḥ ca mumoda śūrajaḥ

original: bāhlīkaputrī ca purā gṛhīt ā purā'sya bhāryā surabhistu rohiṇī / 12.6 /
analyzed: vāhlīka putrī ca purā gṛhīt ā purā asya bhāryā surabhiḥ tu rohiṇī

original: rājñaśca kāṇsiprabhavasya kanyāṃ sa putrikāputrakadharmato'vahat /
analyzed: rājñaḥ ca kāṇsi prabhavasya kanyām sa putrikā putraka dharmataḥ vahat

original: kanyāṃ tathā karavīreśvarasya dharmeṇa tenaiva ditiṃ danuṃ purā / 12.7 /
analyzed: kanyām tathā karavīra īśvarasya dharmeṇa tena eva ditim danum purā

original: yo manyate viṣṇurevāhamityasau pāpo venaḥ pauṇḍrako vāsudevaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ manyate viṣṇuḥ eva aham iti asau pāpaḥ venaḥ pauṇḍrakaḥ vāsudevaḥ

original: j ātaḥ punaḥ śūrajāt kāṇsijāyāṃ nānyo matto viṣṇurastīti vādī / 12.8 /
analyzed: ātaḥ punar śūrajāt kāṇsijāyām na anyaḥ mattaḥ viṣṇuḥ asti iti vādī  /

original: dhundhurhato yo hariṇā madhoḥ suta āsīt sutāyāṃ karavīreśvarasya /
analyzed: dhundhuḥ hataḥ yaḥ hariṇā madhoḥ sutaḥ āsīt sutāyām karavīra īśvarasya

original: sṛgālanāmā vāsudevo'tha devakīmudūhya śaurirna yayāvubhe te / 12.9 /
analyzed: sṛgāla nāmā vāsudevaḥ utha devakīm udūhya śauriḥ na yayau ubhe te

original: tatastu tau vṛṣṇiśatrū babhūvaturjyeṣṭhau sutau śūrasutasya nityam /
analyzed: tatas tu tau vṛṣṇi śatrū babhūvatuḥ jyeṣṭhau sutau śūra sutasya nityam

original: anyāsu ca prāpa sutānudārān devāvatārān vasudevo'khilajñaḥ / 12.10 /
analyzed: anyāsu ca prāpa sutān udārān deva avatārān vasudeva ukhila jñaḥ

original: yeye hi devāḥ pṛthivīṃ gatāste sarve śiṣyāḥ satyavatīsutasya /
analyzed: ye iye hi devāḥ pṛthivīm gatāḥ te sarve śiṣyāḥ satyavatī sutasya

original: viṣṇujñānaṃ prāpya sarve'khilajñāstasmād yathāyogyatayā babhūvuḥ / 12.11 /
analyzed: viṣṇu jñānam prāpya sarva ikhila jñāḥ tasmāt yathā yogya tayā babhūvuḥ

original: cxxxi.marīcijāḥ ṣaṇmunayo babhūvuste devakaṃ prāhasan kārṣyahetoḥ /
analyzed: cxxxi marīci jāḥ ṣaṭ munayaḥ babhūvuḥ te devakam prāhasan kārṣya hetoḥ

original: tacchāpataḥ kālanemiprasūtā avadhyatārthaṃ tapa eva cakruḥ / 12.12 /
analyzed: tad śāpataḥ kālanemi prasūtāḥ avadhya tā artham tapaḥ eva cakruḥ

original: dhātā prādād varameṣāṃ tathaiva śaśāpa tān kṣmātal . e sambhavadhvam /
analyzed: dhātā prādāt varam eṣām tathā eva śaśāpa tān sambhavadhvam

original: tatra svatāto bhavatāṃ nihantetyātmānyato varalipsūn hiraṇyaḥ / 12.13 /
analyzed: tatra sva tātaḥ bhavatām nihantā iti ātmānyatas vara lipsūn hiraṇyaḥ

original: durgā tadā tān bhagavatpracoditā prasvāpayitvā pracakarṣa kāyāt /
analyzed: durgā tadā tān bhagavat pracoditā prasvāpayitvā pracakarṣa kāyāt

original: kramāt samāveśayadāṇsu devakīgarbhāṇsaye tān nyahanacca kaṃ saḥ / 12.14 /
analyzed: kramāt tān nyahanat ca kam saḥ  /

original: tadā munīndrasaṃ yutaḥ sado vidhāturuttamam /
analyzed: tadā muni indrasam yutaḥ sadaḥ vidhātuḥ uttamam

original: sa pāṇḍurāptumaicchata nyavārayaṃ śca te tadā / 12.15 /
analyzed: sa pāṇḍuḥ āptum aicchata nyavārayam śca te tadā

original: yadharthameva jāyate pumān hi tasya so'kṛteḥ /
analyzed: yadhartham eva jāyate pumān hi tasya sokṛteḥ

original: śubhāṃ gatiṃ natu vrajed dhruvaṃ tato nyavārayan / 12.16 /
analyzed: śubhām gatim na tu vrajet dhruvam tatas nyavārayan

original: pradhānadevatājane niyoktumātmanaḥ priyām /
analyzed: pradhāna devatā jane niyoktum ātmanaḥ priyām

original: babhūva pāṇḍureṣa tad vinā na tasya sadgatiḥ / 12.17 /
analyzed: babhūva pāṇḍuḥ eṣa tat vinā na tasya sat gatiḥ

original: ato'nyathā sutānṛte vrajanti sadgatiṃ narāḥ /
analyzed: atonyathā suta anṛte vrajanti sat gatim narāḥ

original: yathaiva dharmabhūṣaṇo jagāma sandhyakāsutaḥ / 12.18 /
analyzed: yathā eva dharmabhūṣaṇaḥ jagāma sandhyakā sutaḥ

original: tadā kaliśca rākṣasā babhūvurindrajinmukhāḥ /
analyzed: tadā kaliḥ ca rākṣasāḥ babhūvuḥ indrajit mukhāḥ

original: vicitravīryanandanapriyodare hi garbhagāḥ / 12.19 /
analyzed: vicitravīrya nandana priya udare hi garbha gāḥ  /

original: tadasya so'nujo'śṛṇonmunīndradūṣitaṃ ca tat /
analyzed: tat asya sonujaḥ śṛṇot muni indra dūṣitam ca tat

original: vicārya tu priyāmidaṃ jagāda vāsudevadhīḥ / 12.20 /
analyzed: vicārya tu priyām idam jagāda vāsudeva dhīḥ

original: ya eva madguṇādhikastataḥ sutaṃ samāpnuhi /
analyzed: yaḥ eva mad guṇa adhikaḥ tatas sutam samāpnuhi

original: sutaṃ vinā na no gatiṃ śubhāṃ vadanti sādhavaḥ / 12.21 /
analyzed: sutam vinā na naḥ gatim śubhām vadanti sādhavaḥ

original: tadasya kṛcchrato vacaḥ pṛthā'grahījjagāda ca /
analyzed: tat asya kṛcchrataḥ vacaḥ pṛthā agrahīt jagāda ca

original: mamāsti devavaśyado manūttamaḥ sutāptidaḥ / 12.22 /
analyzed: mama asti deva vaśya daḥ manu uttamaḥ suta āpti daḥ

original: na te surānṛte samaḥ sureṣu kecideva ca /
analyzed: na te sura anṛte samaḥ sureṣu kecid eva ca

original: cxxxii.atastavādhikaṃ suraṃ kamāhvaye tvadājñayā / 12.23 /
analyzed: cxxxiiatas tava adhikam suram kam āhvaye tvad ājñayā

original: varaṃ samāṇsritā patiṃ vrajeta yā tato'dhamam /
analyzed: varam patim vrajeta yā tatas adhamam

original: na kācidasti niṣkṛtirna bhartṛlokamṛcchati / 12.24 /
analyzed: na kācid asti niṣkṛtiḥ na bhartṛ lokam ṛcchati

original: kṛte purā surāstathā surāṅganāṇsca kevalam /
analyzed: kṛte purā surāḥ tathā sura aṅganān ca kevalam

original: nimittato'pi tāḥ kvacinna tān vihāya menire / 12.25 /
analyzed: nimittataḥ api tāḥ kvacid na tān vihāya menire  /

original: manovacaḥ śarīrato yato hi tāḥ pativratāḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ vacaḥ śarīrataḥ yatas hi tāḥ pativratāḥ

original: anādikālato'bhavaṃ stataḥ sabhartṛkāḥ sadā / 12.26 /
analyzed: sa bhartṛkāḥ sadā

original: svabhartṛbhirvimuktigāḥ sahaiva tā bhavanti hi /
analyzed: sva bhartṛbhiḥ vimukti gāḥ saha eva tāḥ bhavanti hi

original: kṛt āntamāpya cāpsaraḥ striyo babhūvurūrjitāḥ / 12.27 /
analyzed: kṛt ā antam āpya ca apsaraḥ striyaḥ babhūvuḥ ūrjitāḥ

original: anāvṛt āṇsca tāstathā yatheṣṭabhartṛkāḥ sadā /
analyzed: tāḥ tathā yathā iṣṭa bhartṛkāḥ sadā

original: atastu tā na bhartṛbhirvimuktimāpuruttamām / 12.28 /
analyzed: atas tu tāḥ na bhartṛbhiḥ vimuktim āpuḥ uttamām

original: surastriyo'tikāraṇairyadā'nyathā sthitāstadā /
analyzed: sura striyāḥ ūti kāraṇaiḥ yadā anyathā sthitāḥ tadā

original: duranvayāt suduḥ sahā vipat tato bhaviṣyati / 12.29 /
analyzed: duranvayāt su dus sahā vipad tatas bhaviṣyati

original: ayuktamuktavāṃ stato bhavāṃ stathā'pi te vacaḥ /
analyzed: ayuktam uktavān tatas bhavān tathā api te vacaḥ

original: alaṅghyameva me tato vadasva putradaṃ suram / 12.30 /
analyzed: a laṅghyam eva me tatas vadasva putra dam suram

original: itīrito'bravīnnṛpo na dharmato vinā bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ bravīt nṛpaḥ na dharmataḥ vinā bhuvaḥ

original: nṛpo'bhirakṣit ā bhavet tadāhvayā'śu taṃ vibhum / 12.31 /
analyzed: bhavet tadā āhvaya āśu tam vibhum

original: sa dharmajaḥ sudhārmiko bhaveddhi sūnuruttamaḥ /

original: itīrite tayā yamaḥ samāhuto'gamad drutam / 12.32 /
analyzed: iti īrite tayā yamaḥ samāhutaḥ gamat drutam

original: tataśca sadya eva sā suṣāva putramuttamam /
analyzed: tatas ca sadyas eva sā suṣāva putram uttamam

original: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ yamo hi sa prapeda ātmaputratām / 12.33 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram yamaḥ hi sa prapede ātma putra tām

original: yame sute tu kuntitaḥ prajāta eva saubalī /
analyzed: yame sute tu kuntitaḥ prajātaḥ eva saubalī

original: adaṃ hyaterṣyayā ciraṃ babhañja garbhameva ca / 12.34 /
analyzed: adam hi atas īrṣyayā ciram babhañja garbham eva ca

original: cxxxiii.svagarbhapātane kṛte tayā jagāma keśavaḥ /
analyzed: cxxxiii sva garbha pātane kṛte tayā jagāma keśavaḥ

original: parāṇsarātmajo nyadhād ghaṭeṣu tān vibhāgaśaḥ / 12.35 /
analyzed: nyadhāt ghaṭeṣu tān vibhāgaśaḥ

original: śatātmanā vibheditāḥ śataṃ suyodhanādayaḥ /
analyzed: śata ātmanā vibheditāḥ śatam suyodhana ādayaḥ

original: babhūvuranvahaṃ tataḥ śatottarā ca duḥ śal . ā / 12.36 /
analyzed: babhūvuḥ anvaham tatas śata uttarā ca

original: sa devakāryasiddhaye rarakṣa garbhamīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sa deva kārya siddhaye rarakṣa garbham īśvaraḥ

original: parāṇsarātmajaḥ prabhurvicitravīryajodbhavam / 12.37 /
analyzed: parāṇsara ātmajaḥ prabhuḥ vicitra vīrya ja udbhavam

original: kaliḥ suyodhano'jani prabhūtabāhuvīryayuk /
analyzed: kaliḥ suyodhana ujani prabhūta bāhu vīrya yuj

original: pradhānavāyusannidherbalādhikatvamasya tat / 12.38 /
analyzed: pradhāna vāyu sannidheḥ bala adhika tvam asya tat

original: purā hi merumūrdhani triviṣṭapaukasāṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: purā hi meru mūrdhani triviṣṭapa okasām vacaḥ

original: vasundharātal . odbhavonmukhaṃ śrutaṃ diteḥ sutaiḥ / 12.39 /
tatastu te trilocanaṃ tapobalādatoṣayan /
analyzed: tatas tu te trilocanam tapaḥ balāt atoṣayan

original: vṛtaśca devakaṇṭako hyavadhya eva sarvataḥ / 12.40 /
analyzed: vṛtaḥ ca deva kaṇṭakaḥ hi avadhyaḥ eva sarvatas

original: varādumāpatestataḥ kaliḥ sa devakaṇṭakaḥ /

original: babhūva vajrakāyayuk suyodhano mahābalaḥ / 12.41 /
analyzed: babhūva vajra kāya yuj suyodhanaḥ mahā balaḥ

analyzed: avadhye eva sarvatas suyodhane samutthite

original: ghṛt ābhipūrṇakumbhataḥ sa indrajit samutthitaḥ / 12.42 /
analyzed: ghṛt ā abhipūrṇa kumbhataḥ saḥ indrajit samutthitaḥ  /

original: sa duḥkhaśāsano'bhavat tato'tikāyasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: sa

original: sa vai vikarṇa ucyate tataḥ kharo'bhavad balī / 12.43 /
analyzed: sa vai vikarṇaḥ ucyate tatas kharaḥ bhavat balī

original: sa citrasenanāmakastathā'pare ca rākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: sa citrasena nāmakaḥ tathā apare ca rākṣasāḥ

original: babhūvurugrapauruṣā vicitravīryajātmajāḥ / 12.44 /
analyzed: babhūvuḥ ugra pauruṣāḥ vicitravīrya ja ātmajāḥ

original: samastadoṣarūpiṇaḥ śarīriṇo hi te'bhavan /
analyzed: samasta doṣa rūpiṇaḥ śarīriṇaḥ hi te bhavan

original: mṛṣeti nāmato hi yā babhūva duḥ śal . ā'surī / 12.45 /
analyzed: mṛṣā iti nāmataḥ hi yā babhūva āsurī  /

original: kuhūpraveśasaṃ yutā yayā'rjunervadhāya hi /
analyzed: kuhūpraveśasam yutāḥ yayā ārjuneḥ vadhāya hi

original: tapaḥ kṛtaṃ triśūline tato hi sā'tra jajñuṣī / 12.46 /
analyzed: tapaḥ kṛtam triśūline tatas hi sā atra jajñuṣī

original: cxxxiv.tayodito hi saindhavo babhūva kāraṇaṃ vadhe /
analyzed: tayā uditaḥ hi saindhavaḥ babhūva kāraṇam vadhe

original: sa kālakeyadānavastadarthamāsa bhūtal . e / 12.47 /
analyzed: sa kālakeya dānavaḥ tad artham āsa

original: tathā'sa nirṛthābhidho'nujaḥ sa nirṛterabhūt /
analyzed: tathā āsa nirṛtha abhidhaḥ nujaḥ sa nirṛteḥ abhūt

original: sa nāsikāmarudyuto yuyutsunāmakaḥ kṛtī / 12.48 /
analyzed: sa nāsikā marut yutaḥ yuyutsu nāmakaḥ kṛtī

original: sa cā'mbikeyavīryajaḥ suyodhanādanantaraḥ /
analyzed: sa ca āmbikeya vīrya jaḥ suyodhanāt anantaraḥ

original: babhūva vaiśyakanyakodarodbhavo haripriyaḥ / 12.49 /
analyzed: babhūva vaiśya kanyakā udara udbhavaḥ haripriyaḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhire jāta uvāca pāṇḍurbāhvorbalājjñānabalācca dharmaḥ /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhire jātaḥ uvāca pāṇḍuḥ bāhvoḥ balāt jñāna balāt ca dharmaḥ

original: rakṣyo'nyathā nāṇsamupaiti tasmād baladvayāḍhyaṃ prasuvā'śu putram / 12.50 /
analyzed: rakṣyaḥ anyathā tasmāt bala dvaya āḍhyam prasuva āśu putram

original: yajñādhiko hyaśvamedho manuṣyadṛśyeṣu tejassvadhiko hi bhāskaraḥ /
analyzed: yajña adhikaḥ hi aśvamedhaḥ manuṣya dṛśyeṣu tejassu adhikaḥ hi bhāskaraḥ

original: varṇeṣu vipraḥ sakalairguṇairvaro deveṣu vāyuḥ puruṣottamādṛte / 12.51 /
analyzed: varṇeṣu vipraḥ sakalaiḥ guṇaiḥ varaḥ deveṣu vāyuḥ puruṣottamāt ṛte

original: viśeṣato'pyeṣa pitaiva me prabhurvyāsātmanā viṣṇuranantapauruṣaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ upi eṣa pitā eva me prabhuḥ vyāsa ātmanā viṣṇuḥ ananta pauruṣaḥ

original: ataśca te śvaśuro naiva yogyo dātuṃ putraṃ vāyumupaihi tat prabhum / 12.52 /
analyzed: atas ca te śvaśuraḥ nā eva yogyaḥ dātum putram vāyum upaihi tat prabhum

original: itīrite pṛthayā'hūtavāyusaṃ sparśamātrādabhavad baladvaye /
analyzed: iti īrite pṛthayā āhūta vāyusam sparśa mātrāt abhavat bala dvaye

original: samo jagatyasti na yasya kaścid bhaktau ca viṣṇorbhagavadvaśaḥ sutaḥ / 12.53 /
analyzed: samaḥ jagati asti na yasya kaścid bhaktau ca viṣṇoḥ bhagavat vaśaḥ sutaḥ

original: sa vāyurevābhavadatra bhīmanāmā bhṛt ā māḥ sakalā hi yasmin /
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ eva abhavat atra bhīma nāmā bhṛt ā māḥ sakalāḥ hi yasmin

original: sa viṣṇuneśena yutaḥ sadaiva nāmnā seno bhīmasenastato'sau / 12.54 /
analyzed: sa viṣṇunā īśena yutaḥ sadā eva nāmnā senaḥ bhīmasenaḥ tatas asau

original: tajjanmamātreṇa dharā vidāritā ṇsārdūlabhīt ājjananīkarād yadā /
analyzed: tad janma mātreṇa dharā vidāritā āt jananīkarāt yadā

original: papāta sañcūrṇita eva parvatastenākhilo'sau śataśṛṅganāmā / 12.55 /
analyzed: papāta sañcūrṇitaḥ eva parvataḥ tena akhilaḥ asau śataśṛṅga nāmā

original: tasmin prajāte rudhiraṃ prasusruvurmahāsurā vāhanasainyasaṃ yutāḥ /
analyzed: tasmin prajāte rudhiram prasusruvuḥ mahā asurāḥ vāhana sainya sam yutāḥ

original: nṛpāṇsca tatpakṣabhavāḥ samastāstadā bhīt ā asurā rākṣasāṇsca / 12.56 /
analyzed: nṛpāṇs ca tad pakṣa bhavāḥ samastāḥ tadā asurāḥ rākṣasān ca  /

original: avarddhatātraiva vṛkodaro vane mudaṃ surāṇāmabhitaḥ pravarddhayan /
analyzed: avarddhata atrā eva vṛkodaraḥ vane mudam surāṇām abhitas pravarddhayan

original: tadaiva śeṣo hariṇodito'viśad garbhaṃ sutāyā api devakasya / 12.57 /
analyzed: tadā eva śeṣaḥ hariṇā uditaḥ viśat garbham sutāyāḥ api devakasya

original: sa tatra māsatrayamuṣya durgayā'pavāhito rohiṇīgarbhamāṇsu /
analyzed: sa tatra māsa traya muṣya durgayā apavāhitaḥ

original: cxxxv.niyuktayā keśavenātha tatra sthitvā māsān sapta jātaḥ pṛthivyām / 12.58 /
analyzed: cxxv niyuktayā keśavena atha tatra sthitvā māsān sapta jātaḥ pṛthivyām

original: sa nāmato baladevo balāḍhyo babhūva tasyānu janārdanaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: sa nāmataḥ baladevaḥ bala āḍhyaḥ babhūva tasya anu janārdanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: āvirbabhūvākhilasadguṇaikapūrṇaḥ sutāyāmiha devakasya / 12.59 /
analyzed: āvirbabhūva akhila sat guṇa eka pūrṇaḥ sutāyām iha devakasya  /

original: yaḥ satsukhajñānabalaikadehaḥ samastadoṣasparśojjhitaḥ sadā /
analyzed: yaḥ sat sukha jñāna bala eka dehaḥ samasta doṣa sparśa ujjhitaḥ sadā

original: avyaktatatkāryamayo na yasya dehaḥ kutaścit kvaca sa hyajo hariḥ / 12.60 /
analyzed: avyakta tad kārya mayaḥ na yasya dehaḥ kutaścid kva ca sa hi ajaḥ hariḥ

original: na śuklaraktaprabhavo'sya kāyastathā'pi tatputratayocyate mṛṣā /
analyzed: na śukla rakta prabhavaḥ sya kāyaḥ tathā api tad putra tayā ucyate mṛṣā

original: janasya mohāya śarīrato'syā yadāvirāsīdamalasvarūpaḥ / 12.61 /
analyzed: janasya mohāya śarīra tā usyāḥ yat āvirāsīt amala sva rūpaḥ

original: āviśya pūrvaṃ vasudevameva viveśa tasmādṛtukāla eva /
analyzed: āviśya pūrvam vasudevam eva viveśa tasmāt ṛtu kālaḥ eva

original: devīmuvāsātra ca sapta māsān sārdhāṃ stataścā'virabhūdajo'pi / 12.62 /
analyzed: devīm uvāsa atra ca sapta māsān sa ardhām

original: yathā purā stambhata āvirāsīdaśuklarakto'pi nṛsiṃ harūpaḥ /
analyzed: yathā purā stambhataḥ āvirāsīt aśukla raktaḥ api nṛsim ha rūpaḥ

original: tathaiva kṛṣṇo'pi tathā'pi mātāpitṛkramādeva vimohayatyajaḥ / 12.63 /
analyzed: tathā eva kṛṣṇaḥ api tathā api mātā pitṛ kramāt eva vimohayati ajaḥ

original: pitṛkramaṃ mohanārthaṃ sameti na tāvatā ṇsuklato raktataśca /
analyzed: pitṛ kramam mohana artham sameti na tāvatā

original: j āto'sya dehastviti darśanāya saśaṅkhacakrābjagadaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ / 12.64 /
analyzed: ātaḥ asya dehaḥ tu iti darśanāya sa śaṅkha cakra abja gadaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ  /

original: anekasūryābhakirīṭayukto vidyutprabhe kuṇḍale dhārayaṃ śca /
analyzed: aneka sūrya ābha kirīṭa yuktaḥ vidyut prabhe kuṇḍale dhārayan śca

original: pīt āmbaro vanamālī svanantasūryorudīptirdadṛśe sukhārṇavaḥ / 12.65 /
analyzed: āmbaraḥ vanamālī svananta sūrya uru dīptiḥ dadṛśe sukha arṇavaḥ

original: sa kañcayonipramukhaiḥ suraiḥ stutaḥ pitrā ca mātrā cajagāda śūrajam /
analyzed: sa kañcayoni pramukhaiḥ suraiḥ stutaḥ pitrā ca mātrā cajagāda śūrajam

original: nayasva māṃ nandagṛhāniti sma tato babhūva dvibhujo janārdanaḥ / 12.66 /
analyzed: nayasva mām nanda gṛhān iti sma tatas babhūva dvi bhujaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: tadaiva jātā ca hareranujñayā durgābhidhā ṇsrīranu nandapatnyām /
analyzed: tadā eva jātā ca hareḥ anujñayā durgā abhidhā ṇsrīḥ anu nanda patnyām

original: tatastamādāya hariṃ yayau sa śūrātmajo nandagṛhān niśīthe / 12.67 /
analyzed: tatas tam ādāya harim yayau sa śūra ātmajaḥ nanda gṛhāt niśīthe

original: saṃ sthāpya taṃ tatra tathaiva kanyakāmādāya tasmāt svagṛhaṃ punaryayau /
analyzed: sam sthāpya tam tatra tathā eva kanyakām ādāya tasmāt sva gṛham punar yayau

original: hatvā svasurgarbhaṣaṭkaṃ krameṇa matvā'ṣṭamaṃ tatra jagāma kaṃ saḥ / 12.68 /
analyzed: hatvā svasuḥ garbha ṣaṭkam krameṇa matvā aṣṭamam tatra jagāma kam saḥ  /

original: garbhaṃ devakyāṃ saptamaṃ menire hi lokāḥ sutaṃ tvaṣṭamaṃ t āṃ tataḥ saḥ /
analyzed: garbham devakyām saptamam menire hi lokāḥ sutam tu aṣṭamam t ām tatas saḥ

original: matvā hantuṃ pādayoḥ sampragṛhya sampothayāmāsa śilātal . e ca/ 12.69 /
analyzed: matvā hantum pādayoḥ sampragṛhya sampothayāmāsa ca

original: cxxxvi.sā taddhastāt kṣipramutpatya devī khe'dṛśyataivāṣṭabhujā samagrā /
analyzed: tad hastāt kṣipram utpatya devī khedṛśya tā eva aṣṭa bhujā samagrā

original: brahmādibhiḥ pūjyamānā samagrairatyadbhutākāravatī haripriyā / 12.70 /
analyzed: brahma ādibhiḥ pūjyamānā samagraiḥ ati adbhuta ākāravatī haripriyā

original: uvāca cā'ryā tava mṛtyuratra kvacit prajāto hi vṛthaiva pāpa /
analyzed: uvāca ca āryā tava mṛtyuḥ atra kvacid prajātaḥ hi vṛthā eva pāpa

original: anāgasīṃ māṃ vinihantumicchasyaśakyakārye tava codyamo'yam / 12.71 /
analyzed: anāgasīm mām vinihantum icchasi aśakya kārye tava ca udyamaḥ ūyam

original: uktveti kaṃ saṃ punareva devakītalpe'śayad bālarūpaiva durgā /
analyzed: uktvā iti kam sam punar eva bāla rūpā eva durgā

original: nājñāsiṣustāmatha kecanātra ṛte hi mātāpitarau guṇāḍhyām / 12.72 /
analyzed: na ajñāsiṣuḥ tām atha kecana atra ṛte hi mātā pitarau guṇāḍhyām

original: śrutvā tayoktaṃ tu tadaiva kaṃ saḥ paścāttāpād vasudevaṃ sabhāryam /
analyzed: śrutvā tayā uktam tu tadā eva kam saḥ paścāttāpāt vasudevam sa bhāryam

original: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ punaśca vihāya kopaṃ ca tamūcatustau /
analyzed: prasādayāmāsa punar punar ca vihāya kopam ca tam ūcatuḥ tau

original: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca rājasiṃ ha nānyaḥ kartā vāsudevāditi sma / 12.73 /
analyzed: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca rājasim ha na anyaḥ kartā vāsudevāt iti sma

original: ānīya kaṃ so'tha gṛhe svamantriṇaḥ provāca kanyāvacanaṃ samastam /
analyzed: ānīya kam saḥ utha gṛhe sva mantriṇaḥ provāca kanyā vacanam samastam

original: śrutvā ca te procuratyantapāpāḥ kāryaṃ bālānāṃ nidhanaṃ sarvaśo'pi / 12.74 /
analyzed: śrutvā ca te procuḥ atyanta pāpāḥ kāryam bālānām nidhanam

original: tatheti tāṃ statra niyujya kaṃ so gṛhaṃ svakīyaṃ praviveśa pāpaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti tām s tatra niyujya kam saḥ gṛham svakīyam praviveśa pāpaḥ

original: ceruśca te bālavadhe sadodyatā hiṃ sāvihārāḥ satataṃ svabhāvataḥ / 12.75 /
analyzed: ceruḥ ca te bāla vadhe sadā udyatāḥ him sā vihārāḥ satatam svabhāvataḥ

original: atha prabhāte śayane śayānamapaśyatāmabjadalāyatākṣam /
analyzed: atha prabhāte śayane śayānam apaśyatām abja dala āyata akṣam

original: kṛṣṇaṃ yaśodā ca tathaiva nanda ānandasāndrākṛtimaprameyam / 12.76 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam yaśodā ca tathā eva nandaḥ ānanda sāndra ākṛtim aprameyam

original: menāta etau nijaputramenaṃ sraṣṭāramabjaprabhavasya ceśam /
analyzed: menātaḥ etau nija putram enam sraṣṭāram abjaprabhavasya ca īśam

original: mahotsavāt pūrṇamanāṇsca nando viprebhyo'dāllakṣamitāstadā gāḥ / 12.77 /
analyzed: mahā utsavāt nandaḥ viprebhyaḥ dāt lakṣa mitāḥ tadā gāḥ

original: suvarṇaratnāmbarabhūṣaṇānāṃ bahūni gojīvigaṇādhināthaḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇa ratna ambara bhūṣaṇānām bahūni gojīvi gaṇa adhināthaḥ

original: prādādathopāyanapāṇayastaṃ gopā yaśodāṃ ca mudā striyo'gaman / 12.78 /
analyzed: prādāt atha upāyana pāṇayaḥ tam gopāḥ yaśodām ca mudā striyaḥ gaman

original: gateṣu tatraiva dineṣu keṣucijjagāma kaṃ sasya gṛhaṃ sa nandaḥ /
analyzed: gateṣu tatra eva dineṣu keṣucid jagāma kam sasya gṛham sa nandaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ hi nandaḥ sa karaṃ hi dātuṃ bṛhadvanānnissṛtaḥ prāpa kṛṣṇām / 12.79 /
analyzed: pūrvam hi nandaḥ sa karam hi dātum bṛhat vanāt nissṛtaḥ prāpa kṛṣṇām

original: sahā'gatā tena tadā yaśodā suṣāva durgāmatha tatra śauriḥ /
analyzed: saha āgatā tena tadā yaśodā suṣāva durgām atha tatra śauriḥ

original: nidhāya kṛṣṇaṃ pratigṛhya kanyakāṃ gṛhaṃ yayau nanda uvāsa tatra / 12.80 /
analyzed: nidhāya kṛṣṇam pratigṛhya kanyakām gṛham yayau nandaḥ uvāsa tatra

original: niruṣya tasmin yamunātaṭe sa māsaṃ yayau draṣṭukāmo narendram /
analyzed: niruṣya tasmin yamunā taṭe sa māsam yayau draṣṭu kāmaḥ narendram

original: cxxxvii.rājñe'tha taṃ dattakaraṃ dadarśa śūrātmajo vākyamuvāca cainam / 12.81 /
analyzed: tam datta karam dadarśa śūra ātmajaḥ vākyam uvāca ca enam

original: yāhyutpātāḥ santi tatretyudīrito jagāma śīghraṃ yamunāṃ sa nandaḥ /
analyzed: yāhi utpātāḥ santi tatra iti udīritaḥ jagāma śīghram yamunām sa nandaḥ

original: rātrāvevā'gacchamāne tu nande kaṃ sasya dhātrī tujagāma goṣṭham / 12.82 /
analyzed: rātrau eva āgacchamāne tu nande kam sasya dhātrī tujagāma goṣṭham

original: sā pūtanā nāma nijasvarūpamācchādya rātrau śubharūpavacca /
analyzed: sā pūtanā nāma nija sva rūpam ācchādya rātrau śubha rūpavat ca

original: viveśa nandasya gṛhaṃ bṛhadvanaprānte hi mārge racitaṃ prayāṇe / 12.83 /
analyzed: viveśa nandasya gṛham bṛhat vana prānte hi mārge racitam prayāṇe

original: tīre bhaginyāstu yamasya vastragṛhe śayānaṃ puruṣottamaṃ tam /
analyzed: tīre bhaginyāḥ tu yamasya vastra gṛhe śayānam puruṣottamam tam

original: jagrāha mātrā tuyaśodayā tayā nidrāyujā prekṣyamāṇā ṇsubheva / 12.84 /
analyzed: jagrāha mātrā tu yaśodayā tayā nidrā yujā prekṣyamāṇā

original: tanmāyayā dharṣit ā nidrayā ca nyavārayannaiva hi nandajāyā /
analyzed: tad māyayā ā nidrayā ca nyavārayat na eva hi nanda jāyā

original: tayā pradattaṃ stanamīśitā'subhiḥ papau sahaivā'śu janārdanaḥ prabhuḥ / 12.85 /
analyzed: tayā pradattam stanam īśitā asubhiḥ papau saha eva āśu janārdanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: mṛt ā svarūpeṇa subhīṣaṇena papāta sā vyāpya vanaṃ samastam /
analyzed: mṛd ā sva rūpeṇa su bhīṣaṇena papāta sā vyāpya vanam samastam

original: tadā'gamannandagopo'pi tatra dṛṣṭvā ca sarve'pyabhavan suvismitāḥ / 12.86 /
analyzed: tadā āgamat nanda gopaḥ api tatra dṛṣṭvā ca sarve api abhavan su vismitāḥ

original: sā tāṭakā corvaśisampraviṣṭā kṛṣṇāvadhyānānnirayaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: sā tāṭakā ca urvaśi sampraviṣṭā kṛṣṇa avadhyānāt nirayam jagāma

original: sā tūrvaśī kṛṣṇabhuktastanena pūtā svargaṃ prayayau tatkṣaṇena / 12.87 /
analyzed: sā tūrvaśī kṛṣṇa bhukta stanena pūtā svargam prayayau tad kṣaṇena

original: sā tumburoḥ saṅgata āviveśa rakṣastanuṃ śāpato vittapasya /
analyzed: sā tumburoḥ saṅgataḥ āviveśa rakṣaḥ tanum śāpataḥ vittapasya

original: kṛṣṇasparśācchuddharūpā punardivaṃ yayau tuṣṭe kimalabhyaṃ rameśe / 12.88 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sparśāt śuddha rūpā punar divam yayau tuṣṭe kim alabhyam rameśe  /

original: yadā'pa devaścaturaḥ sa māsāṃ stadopaniṣkrāmaṇamasya cā'sīt /
analyzed: yadā āpa devaḥ caturaḥ sa māsān stadā upaniṣkrāmaṇam asya ca āsīt

original: janmarkṣamasmin dina eva cā'sīt prātaḥ kiñcit tatra mahotsavo'bhavat / 12.89 /
analyzed: janma ṛkṣam asmin dine eva ca āsīt prātar kiñcid tatra mahā utsavaḥ bhavat

original: tadā ṇsayānaḥ śakaṭasya so'dhaḥ padā'kṣipat taṃ ditijaṃ nihantum /
analyzed: tadā śakaṭasya sodhaḥ padā akṣipat tam ditijam nihantum

original: anaḥ samāviśya diteḥ suto'sau sthitaḥ pratīpāya hareḥ supāpaḥ / 12.90 /
analyzed: anaḥ samāviśya diteḥ sutaḥ usau sthitaḥ pratīpāya hareḥ su pāpaḥ

original: kṣipto'nasisthaḥ śakaṭākṣanāmā sa viṣṇunetvā sahitaḥ papāta /
analyzed: śakaṭākṣa nāmā sa viṣṇunā itvā sahitaḥ papāta

original: mamāra cā'śu pratibhagnagātro vyatyastacakrākṣamabhūdanaśca / 12.91 /
analyzed: mamāra ca āśu pratibhagna gātraḥ vyatyasta cakra akṣam abhūt anaḥ ca

original: sasambhramāt taṃ pratigṛhya śaṅkyā kṛṣṇaṃ yaśodā dvijavaryasūktibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa sambhramāt tam pratigṛhya śaṅkyā kṛṣṇam yaśodā dvija varya su uktibhiḥ

original: sā snāpayāmāsa nadītaṭāt tadā samāgatā nandavaco'bhitarjitā / 12.92 /
analyzed: sā snāpayāmāsa nadī taṭāt tadā samāgatā nanda vacobhiḥ tarjitā

original: cxxxviii.hatvā tu taṃ kaṃ sabhṛtyaṃ sa kṛṣṇaḥ śiśye punaḥ śiśuvat sarvaśāstā /
analyzed: hatvā tu tam kam sa bhṛtyam sa kṛṣṇaḥ śiśye punar śiśu vat sarva śāstā

original: evaṃ gopān prīṇayan bālakel . īvinodato nyavasat tatra devaḥ / 12.93 /
analyzed: evam gopān prīṇayan bālakel nyavasat tatra devaḥ

original: vivarddhamāne lokadṛṣṭyaiva kṛṣṇe pāṇḍuḥ punaḥ prāha pṛthāmidaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: vivarddhamāne loka dṛṣṭyā eva kṛṣṇe pāṇḍuḥ punar prāha pṛthām idam vacaḥ

original: dharmiṣṭho nau sūnuragre babhūva baladvayajyeṣṭha utāparaśca / 12.94 /
analyzed: dharmiṣṭhaḥ nau sūnuḥ agre babhūva bala dvaya jyeṣṭhaḥ uta aparaḥ ca

original: yadaika evātibalopapanno bhavet tadā tena parāvamarde /
analyzed: yadā ekaḥ eva ati bala upapannaḥ bhavet tadā tena para avamarde

original: pravartyamāne svapuraṃ hareyuścauryāt pare tad dvayamatra yogyam / 12.95 /
analyzed: pravartyamāne sva puram hareyuḥ cauryāt pare tat dvayam atra yogyam  /

original: śastrāstravid vīryavān nau suto'nyo bhaved devaṃ t ādṛśamāhvayātaḥ /
analyzed: śastra astra vid vīryavān nau sutaḥ ūnyaḥ bhavet devam t ādṛśam āhvayātaḥ

original: śeṣastava bhrātṛsuto'bhijātastasmānnāsau sutadānāya yogyaḥ / 12.96 /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ tava bhrātṛ sutaḥ abhijātaḥ tasmāt na asau suta dānāya yogyaḥ  /

original: navai suparṇaḥ sutado nareṣu prajāyate vā'sya yatastathā'jñā /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ suta daḥ nareṣu prajāyate vā asya yatas tathā ājñā

original: kṛt ā purā hariṇā ṇsaṅkarastu krodhātmakaḥ pālane naiva yogyaḥ / 12.97 /
analyzed: kṛt ā purā hariṇā ṇ saṅkaraḥ tu krodha ātmakaḥ pālane na eva yogyaḥ

original: ato mahendro balavānanantarasteṣāṃ samāhvānamihārhati svarāṭ/
analyzed: atas mahendraḥ balavān anantaraḥ teṣām samāhvānam iha arhati svarāj

original: itīritā sā'hvayadāṇsu vāsavaṃ tataḥ prajajñe svayameva śakraḥ / 12.98 /
analyzed: iti īritā vāsavam tatas prajajñe svayam eva śakraḥ

original: sa cārjuno nāma narāṃ śayukto viṣṇvāveśī balavānastravettā /
analyzed: sa ca arjunaḥ nāma narām śa yuktaḥ viṣṇu āveśī balavān astra vettā

original: rūpyanyaḥ syāt sūnurityucyamānā bhartrā kuntī neti taṃ prāha dharmāt / 12.99 /
analyzed: rūpya nyaḥ syāt sūnuḥ iti ucyamānā bhartrā kuntī na iti tam prāha dharmāt

original: bṛhaspatiḥ pūrvamabhūddhareḥ padaṃ saṃ sevituṃ pavanāveśayuktaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ pūrvam abhūt hareḥ padam sam sevitum pavana āveśa yuktaḥ

original: sa uddhavo nāma yadupravīrājjāto vidvānupagavanāmadheyāt / 12.100 /
analyzed: saḥ uddhavaḥ nāma yadu pravīrāt jātaḥ vidvān upagava nāmadheyāt

original: droṇātmakaṃ nātitarāṃ svasevakaṃ kuryāddharirmāmiti bhūya eva /
analyzed: droṇa ātmakam na atitarām sva sevakam kuryāt hariḥ mām iti bhūyas eva

original: sa uddhavātmā'vatatāra yādaveṣvāsevanārthaṃ puruṣottamasya / 12.101 /
analyzed: saḥ uddhava ātmā avatatāra yādaveṣu āsevana artham puruṣottamasya

original: bṛhaspatereva sa sarvavidyā avāpa mantrī nipuṇaḥ sarvavettā /
analyzed: bṛhaspateḥ eva sa sarva vidyāḥ avāpa mantrī nipuṇaḥ sarva vettā

original: varṣatraye tatparataḥ sa sātyakirjajñe dine cekitānaśca tasmin / 12.102 /
analyzed: varṣa traye tad paratas sa sātyakiḥ jajñe dine cekitānaḥ ca tasmin

original: marutsu nāma pratibho yaduṣvabhūt sa cekitāno harisevanārtham /
analyzed: marutsu nāma pratibhaḥ yaduṣu abhūt sa cekitānaḥ hari sevana artham

original: tadaiva jāto hṛdikātmajo'pi varṣatraye tatparato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 12.103 /
analyzed: tadā eva jātaḥ hṛdika ātmajaḥ api varṣa traye tad paratas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: tato'bdato bhūbharasaṃ hṛtau hareraṅgatvamāptuṃ giriśo'janiṣṭa /
analyzed: tatas ubdataḥ bhū bharasam hṛtau hareḥ aṅga tvam āptum giriśaḥ janiṣṭa

original: aṇsvatthāmā nāmato'śvadhvaniṃ sa yasmāccakre jāyamāno mahātmā / 12.104 /
analyzed: aṇsvatthāmā nāmataḥ ūśva dhvanim sa yasmāt cakre jāyamānaḥ mahātmā

original: cxxxix.sa sarvavid balavānastravettā kṛpasvasāyāṃ droṇavīryodbhavo'bhūt /
analyzed: sarva vid balavān astra vettā kṛpa svasāyām

original: duryodhanastaccaturthe'hni jātastasyāparedyurbhīmasenaḥ sudhīraḥ / 12.105 /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tad caturthe ihni jātaḥ tasya aparedyus bhīmasenaḥ su dhīraḥ

original: yadā samāsadvitayī babhūva tadā rohiṇyāṃ baladevo'bhijātaḥ /
analyzed: yadā samāsa dvitayī babhūva tadā rohiṇyām baladevaḥ abhijātaḥ

original: balī guṇāḍhyaḥ sarvavedī ya eva sevākhinno lakṣmaṇo'gre harerbhūt / 12.106 /
analyzed: balī guṇa āḍhyaḥ sarva vedī yaḥ eva sevā khinnaḥ lakṣmaṇa ugre hareḥ bhūt  /

original: yadā hi putrān vinihantumetau sahaiva baddhau gatiśṛṅkhalāyām /
analyzed: yadā hi putrān vinihantum etau saha eva baddhau gati śṛṅkhalāyām

original: kaṃ senāpāpau devakīśūraputrau viyojitāḥ śauribhāryāḥ parāṇsca / 12.107 /
analyzed: kam senā pāpau devakī śūra putrau viyojitāḥ śauri bhāryāḥ parān ca

original: viniścayārthaṃ devakīgarbhajānāmanyā bhāryā dhṛtagarbhāḥ sa kaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: viniścaya artham devakī garbha jānām anyāḥ bhāryāḥ dhṛta garbhāḥ sa kam saḥ

original: sthānāntare prasavo yāvadāsāṃ saṃ sthāpayāmāsa supāpabuddhiḥ / 12.108 /
analyzed: sthāna antare prasavaḥ yāvat āsām sam sthāpayāmāsa su pāpa buddhiḥ

original: hetoretasmād rohiṇī nandagehe prasūtyarthaṃ sthāpitā tena devī /
analyzed: hetoḥ etasmāt rohiṇī nanda gehe prasūti artham sthāpitā tena devī

original: lebhe putraṃ gokule pūrṇacandrakāntānanaṃ balabhadraṃ suśubhram / 12.109 /
analyzed: lebhe putram gokule pūrṇa candra kānta ānanam balabhadram su śubhram

original: yadā trimāsaḥ sa babhūva devastadā'virāsīt puruṣottamo'jaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tri māsaḥ sa babhūva devaḥ tadā āvirāsīt puruṣottama ojaḥ

original: kṛṣṇaṇseṣāvāptukāmau sutau hi tapaścakrāte devakīśūraputrau / 12.110 /
analyzed: sutau hi tapaḥ cakrāte devakī śūra putrau

original: viṣṇvāveśī balavān yo guṇādhikaḥ sa me sutaḥ syāditi rohiṇī ca/
analyzed: viṣṇu āveśī balavān yaḥ guṇa adhikaḥ sa me sutaḥ syāt iti rohiṇī ca

original: tepe tapo'to hariśuklakeśayutaḥ śeṣo devakīrohiṇījaḥ / 12.111 /
analyzed: tepe tapaḥ utaḥ hari śukla keśa yutaḥ śeṣaḥ devakī rohiṇī jaḥ

original: avarddhatāsau hariśuklakeśasamāveśī gokule rauhiṇeyaḥ /
analyzed: avarddhata asau hari śukla keśa samāveśī gokule rauhiṇeyaḥ

original: kṛṣṇo'pi līl ā lal . it āḥ pradarśayan baladvitīyo ramayāmāsa goṣṭham / 12.112 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api it āḥ pradarśayan bala dvitīyaḥ ramayāmāsa goṣṭham

original: sa prākṛtaṃ śiśumātmānamuccairvijānantyā māturādarśanāya /
analyzed: sa prākṛtam śiśum ātmānam uccais vijānantyāḥ mātuḥ ādarśanāya

original: vijṛmbhamāṇo'khilamātmasaṃ sthaṃ pradarśayāmāsa kadācidīśaḥ / 12.113 /
analyzed: vijṛmbhamāṇa ukhilam ātma sam stham pradarśayāmāsa kadācid īśaḥ

original: sā'ṇḍaṃ mahābhūtamano'bhimānamahatprakṛtyāvṛtamabjajādibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa aṇḍam mahābhūta manaḥ abhimāna mahat prakṛti āvṛtam abjaja ādibhiḥ

original: suraiḥ śivetairnaradaityasaṅghairyutaṃ dadarśāsya tanau yaśodā / 12.114 /
analyzed: suraiḥ śiva itaiḥ nara daitya saṅghaiḥ yutam dadarśa asya tanau yaśodā

original: nyamīlayaccākṣiṇī bhītabhīt ā jugūha cā'tmānamatho rameśaḥ /
analyzed: nyamīlayat ca akṣiṇī ā jugūha ca ātmānam atho rameśaḥ

original: vapuḥ svakīyaṃ sukhacitsvarūpaṃ pūrṇaṃ satsu jñāpayaṃ staddhyadarśayat / 12.115 /
analyzed: vapuḥ svakīyam sukha cit svarūpam pūrṇam satsu

original: kadācit taṃ l āl . ayantī yaśodā voḍhuṃ nāṇsaknod bhūribhārādhikārtā /
analyzed: kadācid tam yaśodā voḍhum bhūri bhāra adhika ārtā

original: cxl.nidhāya taṃ bhūmital . e svakarma yadā cakre daitya āgāt sughoraḥ / 12.116 /
analyzed: nidhāya tam sva karma yadā cakre daityaḥ āgāt su ghoraḥ

original: tṛṇāvarto nāmataḥ kaṃ sabhṛtyaḥ sṛṣṭvā'tyugraṃ cakravātaḥ śiśuṃ tam /
analyzed: tṛṇāvartaḥ nāmataḥ kam sa bhṛtyaḥ sṛṣṭvā ati ugram cakravātaḥ śiśum tam

original: ādāyā'yādantarikṣaṃ sa tena śastaḥ kaṇṭhagrāhasaṃ ruddhavāyuḥ / 12.117 /
analyzed: ādāya ayāt antarikṣam sa tena śastaḥ kaṇṭhagrāhasam ruddha vāyuḥ

original: papāta kṛṣṇena hataḥ śilātal . e tṛṇāvartaḥ parvatodagradehaḥ /
analyzed: papāta kṛṣṇena hataḥ tṛṇāvartaḥ parvata udagra dehaḥ

original: suvismayaṃ cā'puratho janāste tṛṇāvartaṃ vīkṣya sañcūrṇit āṅgam / 12.118 /
analyzed: su vismayam ca apurathaḥ janāḥ te tṛṇāvartam vīkṣya

original: akruddhyatāṃ keśavo'nugrahāya śubhaṃ svayogyādadhikaṃ nihantum /
analyzed: akruddhi atām keśavaḥ anugrahāya śubham sva yogyāt adhikam nihantum

original: sa kruddhyatāṃ navanīt ādi mṛṣṇaṃ ścacāra devo nijasatsukhāmbudhiḥ / 12.119 /
analyzed: sa kruddhi atām navanīt ādi mṛṣṇam ścacāra devaḥ nija sat sukha ambudhiḥ

original: yasminnabde bhādrapade sa māse siṃ hasthayorgururavyoḥ pareśaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin abde bhādrapade sa māse siṃ ha sthayoḥ guru ravyoḥ para īśaḥ

original: udait tataḥ phālgune phalguno'bhūd gate tato mādravatī babhāṣe / 12.120 /
analyzed: udait tatas phālgune gate tatas mādravatī babhāṣe  /

original: j ātāḥ sutāste pravarāḥ pṛthāyāmekā'napatyā'hamataḥ prasādāt /
analyzed: ātāḥ sutāḥ te pravarāḥ pṛthāyām ekānapatyā aham atas prasādāt

original: tavaiva bhūyāsamahaṃ sutetā vidhatsva kuntīṃ mama mantradātrīm / 12.121 /
analyzed: tava eva bhūyāsam aham sutetā vidhatsva kuntīm mama mantra dātrīm

original: itīritaḥ prāha pṛthāṃ sa mādryai diśasva mantraṃ sutadaṃ variṣṭham /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ prāha pṛthām sa mādryai diśasva mantram suta dam variṣṭham

original: ityūcivāṃ saṃ patimāha yādavī dadyāṃ tvadarthe tu sakṛtphalāya / 12.122 /
analyzed: iti ūcivām sam patim āha yādavī dadyām tvad arthe tu sakṛt phalāya

original: uvāca mādryai sutadaṃ manuṃ ca punaḥ phalaṃ te na bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: uvāca mādryai suta dam manum ca punar phalam te na bhaviṣyati iti

original: mantraṃ samādāya ca madraputrī vyacintayat syāṃ nu kathaṃ dviputrā / 12.123 /
analyzed: mantram samādāya ca madra putrī vyacintayat syām nu katham dvi putrā

original: sadā'viyogau divijeṣu dasrau nacaitayornāmabhedaḥ kvaciddhi /
analyzed: sadā aviyogau divijeṣu dasrau na ca etayoḥ nāma bhedaḥ kvacid hi

original: ekā bhāryā saitayorapyuṣā hi tadāyātaḥ sakṛdāvartanād dvau / 12.124 /
analyzed: ekā bhāryā sā etayoḥ api uṣāḥ hi tadā āyātaḥ sakṛt āvartanāt dvau

original: itīkṣantyā'kāritāvaśvinau tau śīghraprāptau putrakau tatprasūtau /
analyzed: iti īkṣantyā ākāritau aśvinau tau śīghra prāptau putrakau tad prasūtau

original: t āveva devau nakulaḥ pūrvajātaḥ sahadevo'bhūt paścimastau yamau ca / 12.125 /
analyzed: t au eva devau nakulaḥ pūrva jātaḥ paścimaḥ tau yamau ca  /

original: punarmanoḥ phalavattvāya mādrī samprārthayāmāsa patiṃ taduktā /
analyzed: punar manoḥ phalavat tvāya mādrī samprārthayāmāsa patim tad uktā

original: pṛthā'vādīt kuṭilaiṣā madājñāmṛte devāvāhvayāmāsa dasrau / 12.126 /
analyzed: pṛthā avādīt kuṭilā eṣā mad ājñām ṛte devau āhvayāmāsa dasrau

original: ato virodhaṃ ca madātmajānāṃ kuryādeṣetyeva bhīt āṃ na māṃ tvam /
analyzed: atas virodham ca mad ātmajānām kuryāt eṣā iti eva bhīt ām na mām tvam

original: niyoktumarhaḥ punareva rājannitīrito'sau virarāma kṣitīśaḥ / 12.127 /
analyzed: niyoktum arhaḥ punar eva rājan iti īrita usau virarāma kṣitīśaḥ

original: cxli.viśeṣanāmnaiva samāhutaḥ sutān dadyuḥ surā ityaviśeṣitaṃ yayoḥ /
analyzed: sutān dadyuḥ surāḥ iti aviśeṣitam yayoḥ

original: viśeṣanāmāpi samāhvayat tau mantrāvṛttirnāmabhede'sya coktā / 12.128 /
analyzed: viśeṣa nāma api samāhvayat tau mantra āvṛttiḥ nāma bheda isya ca uktā

original: yudhiṣṭhirādyeṣu caturṣu vāyuḥ samāviṣṭaḥ phalgune'tho viśeṣāt /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira ādyeṣu caturṣu vāyuḥ samāviṣṭaḥ phalguna ithaḥ viśeṣāt

original: yudhiṣṭhire saumyarūpeṇa viṣṭo vīreṇa rūpeṇa dhanañjaye'sau / 12.129 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhire saumya rūpeṇa viṣṭaḥ vīreṇa rūpeṇa dhanañjaya isau

original: śṛṅgārarūpaṃ kevalaṃ darśayāno viveśa vāyuryamajau pradhānaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra rūpam kevalam darśayānaḥ viveśa vāyuḥ yama jau pradhānaḥ

original: śṛṅgārakaivalyamabhīpsamānaḥ pāṇḍurhi putraṃ cakame caturtham / 12.130 /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra kaivalyam abhīpsamānaḥ pāṇḍuḥ hi putram cakame caturtham

original: śṛṅgārarūpo nakule viśeṣāt sunītirūpaḥ sahadevaṃ viveśa /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra rūpaḥ nakule viśeṣāt sunīti rūpaḥ sahadevam viveśa

original: guṇaiḥ samastaiḥ svayameva vāyurbabhūva bhīmo jagadāntarātmā / 12.131 /
analyzed: guṇaiḥ samastaiḥ svayam eva vāyuḥ babhūva bhīmaḥ

original: supullavākāratanurhi komal . aḥ prāyo janaiḥ procyate rūpaśālī /
analyzed: su pullava ākāra tanuḥ hi komal prāyas janaiḥ procyate rūpa śālī

original: tataḥ sujātaṃ varavajrakāyau bhīmārjunāvapyṛte pāṇḍuraicchat / 12.132 /
analyzed: tatas sujātam vara vajra kāyau bhīma arjunau api ṛte pāṇḍuḥ aicchat  /

original: aprākṛt ānāṃ tu manoharaṃ yad rūpaṃ dvātriṃ śallakṣaṇopetamagryam /
analyzed: aprākṛt ānām tu manoharam yat rūpam dvātrim śat lakṣaṇa upetam agryam

original: tanmāruto nakule komal . ābha evaṃ vāyuḥ pañcarūpo'tra cā'sīt / 12.133 /
analyzed: tat mārutaḥ nakule komal ābhaḥ evam vāyuḥ pañca rūpā utra ca āsīt  /

original: atītendrā eva te viṣṇuṣaṣṭhāḥ pūrvendro'sau yajñanāmā rameśaḥ /
analyzed: atīta indrāḥ eva te viṣṇu ṣaṣṭhāḥ pūrva indraḥ usau yajña nāmā rama īśaḥ

original: sa vai kṛṣṇo vāyuratha dvitīyaḥ sa bhīmaseno dharma āsīt tṛtīyaḥ / 12.134 /
analyzed: sa vai kṛṣṇaḥ vāyuḥ atha dvitīyaḥ sa bhīmasenaḥ dharmaḥ āsīt tṛtīyaḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiro'sāvatha nāsatyadasrau kramāt tāvetau mādravatīsutau ca /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ usau atha nāsatya dasrau kramāt tau etau mādravatī sutau ca

original: purandaraḥ ṣaṣṭha utātra saptamaḥ sa evaikaḥ phalguno hyeta indrāḥ / 12.135 /
analyzed: purandaraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ uta atra saptamaḥ saḥ eva ekaḥ phalgunaḥ hi ete indrāḥ  /

original: kramāt saṃ skārān kṣatriyāṇāmavāpya te'varddhanta svatavaso mahitvanā /
analyzed: kramāt sam skārān kṣatriyāṇām avāpya te iva arddhanta svatavasaḥ mahitvanā

original: sarve sarvajñāḥ sarvadharmopapannāḥ sarve bhaktāḥ keśave'tyantayuktāḥ / 12.136 /
analyzed: sarve sarva jñāḥ sarva dharma upapannāḥ sarve bhaktāḥ keśava ityanta yuktāḥ

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
pḸaṇḍavotpattirnāma dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: pḸaṇḍavotpattiḥ nāma dvādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: cxlii.(kaṃ savadhaḥ )
analyzed: cxliikam sa vadhaḥ

original: atha trayodaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha trayodaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / gargaḥ śūrasutoktyā vrajamāyāt sāttvatāṃ purodhāḥ saḥ /
analyzed: om gargaḥ śūra suta uktyā vraja māyāt sāttvatām purodhāḥ saḥ

original: cakre kṣatriyayogyān saṃ skārān kṛṣṇarohiṇīsūnvoḥ / 13.1 /
analyzed: cakre kṣatriya yogyān sam skārān kṛṣṇa rohiṇī sūnvoḥ  /

original: ūce nanda suto'yaṃ tava viṣṇornāvamo guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ /
analyzed: ūce nanda su toyam tava viṣṇoḥ na avamaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ

original: sarve caitattrātāḥ sukhamāpsyantyunnataṃ bhavatpūrvāḥ / 13.2 /
analyzed: sarve ca etad trātāḥ sukham āpsyanti unnatam bhavat pūrvāḥ

original: ityuktaḥ sa mumoda prayayau gargo'pi keśavo'thā'dyaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa mumoda prayayau gargaḥ upi keśavaḥ utha ādyaḥ

original: svapadairagrajayuktaścakre puṇyaṃ vrajan vrajoddeśam / 13.3 /
analyzed: sva padaiḥ agraja yuktaḥ cakre puṇyam vrajan vraja uddeśam

original: sa kadācicchiśubhāvaṃ kurvantyā māturātmano bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: sa kadācid śiśu bhāvam kurvantyāḥ mātuḥ ātmanaḥ bhūyas

original: apanetuṃ parameśo mṛdaṃ jaghāsekṣatāṃ vayasyānām / 13.4 /
analyzed: apanetum parameśaḥ mṛdam jaghāsa īkṣatām vayasyānām  /

original: mātropālabdha īśo mukhavivṛtimakarnāmba mṛdbhakṣit ā'haṃ /
analyzed: mātrā upālabdhaḥ īśaḥ mukha vivṛti makar nāmba mṛd bhakṣit ā aham

original: paśyetyāsyāntare tu prakṛtivikṛtiyuk sā jagat paryapaśyat /
analyzed: paśya iti āsya antare tu prakṛti vikṛti yuj sā jagat paryapaśyat

original: itthaṃ devo'tyacintyāmaparaduradhigāṃ śaktimuccāṃ pradarśya
analyzed: ittham deva iti acintyām apara duradhigām śaktim uccām pradarśya

original: prāyo jñātātmatattvāṃ punarapi bhagavānāvṛṇodātmaśaktyā / 13.5 /
analyzed: prāyas jñāta ātma tattvām punar api bhagavān āvṛṇot ātma śaktyā

original: iti prabhuḥ sa līlayā harirjagad viḍambayan /
analyzed: iti prabhuḥ sa līlayā hariḥ jagat viḍambayan

original: cacāra goṣṭhamaṇḍale'pyanantasaukhyaciddhanaḥ / 13.6 /
analyzed: cacāra goṣṭha maṇḍale pi ananta saukhya ciddhanaḥ

original: kadācidīśvaraḥ stanaṃ piban yaśodayā payaḥ /
analyzed: kadācid īśvaraḥ stanam piban yaśodayā payaḥ

original: śṛtaṃ nidhātumujjhito babhañja dadhyamatrakam / 13.7 /
analyzed: śṛtam nidhātum ujjhitaḥ babhañja dadhi amatrakam

original: sa mathyamānadadhyuruprajātamindusannibham /
analyzed: sa mathyamāna dadhi uru prajātam indu sannibham

original: navaṃ hi nītamādade raho jaghāsa ceśitā / 13.8 /
analyzed: navam hi nītam ādade rahaḥ jaghāsa ca īśitā

original: prajāyate hi yatkule yathā yugaṃ yathā vayaḥ /
analyzed: prajāyate hi yat kule yathā yugam yathā vayaḥ

original: tathā pravartanaṃ bhaved divaukasāṃ samudbhave / 13.9 /
analyzed: tathā pravartanam bhavet divaukasām samudbhave  /

original: iti svadharmamuttamaṃ divaukasāṃ pradarśayan /
analyzed: iti svadharmam uttamam divaukasām pradarśayan

original: adharmapāvako'pi san viḍambate janārdanaḥ / 13.10 /
analyzed: adharma pāvakaḥ api san viḍambate janārdanaḥ

original: cxliii.nṛtiryagādirūpakaḥ sa bālyayauvanādi yat /
analyzed: sa bālya yauvana ādi yat

original: kriyāṇsca tattadudbhavāḥ karoti śāṇsvato'pi san / 13.11 /
analyzed: kriyāṇs ca tad tad udbhavāḥ karoti san

original: sa viprarājagopakasvarūpakastadudbhavāḥ /
analyzed: sa vipra rāja gopaka svarūpakaḥ tad udbhavāḥ

original: tadātadā viceṣṭate kriyāḥ surān viśikṣayan / 13.12 /
analyzed: tadā tadā viceṣṭate kriyāḥ surān viśikṣayan

original: tathā'pyananyadevatāsamaṃ nijaṃ balaṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tathā api an anya devatā samam nijam balam prabhuḥ

original: prakāṇsayan punaḥ punaḥ pradarśayatyajo guṇān / 13.13 /
analyzed: prakāṇsayan punar punar pradarśayati ajaḥ guṇān

original: athā'ttayaṣṭimīkṣya tāṃ svamātaraṃ jagadguruḥ /
analyzed: athā ātta yaṣṭim īkṣya tām sva mātaram jagadguruḥ

original: prapupluve tamanvayānmanovidūramaṅganā / 13.14 /
analyzed: prapupluve tam anvayāt manaḥ vidūram aṅganā

original: punaḥ samīkṣya tacchramaṃ jagāma tatkaragraham /
analyzed: punar samīkṣya tad śramam jagāma tad kara graham

original: prabhuḥ svabhaktavaśyatāṃ prakāṇsayannurukramaḥ / 13.15 /
analyzed: prabhuḥ sva bhakta vaśyatām prakāṇsayan urukramaḥ

original: sadā vimuktamīśvaraṃ nibaddhumañjasā'dade /
analyzed: sadā vimuktam īśvaram nibaddhum añjasā ādade

original: yadaiva dāma gopikā na tat pupūra taṃ prati / 13.16 /
analyzed: yadā eva dāma gopikāḥ na tat pupūra tam prati

original: samastadāmasañcayaḥ susandhito'pyapūrṇatām /
analyzed: samasta dāma sañcayaḥ

original: yayāvanantavigrahe śiśutvasampradarśake / 13.17 /
analyzed: yayau ananta vigrahe śiśu tva sampradarśake

original: abandhayogyatāṃ prabhuḥ pradarśya līlayā punaḥ /
analyzed: a bandha yogya tām prabhuḥ pradarśya līlayā punar

original: sa ekavatsapāṇsakāntaraṃ gato'khilambharaḥ / 13.18 /
analyzed: saḥ eka vatsa pāṇsaka antaram gata ukhilambharaḥ

original: sutasya mātṛvaśyatāṃ pradarśya dharmamīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sutasya mātṛ vaśya tām pradarśya dharmam īśvaraḥ

original: babhañja tau divispṛśau yamārjunau surātmajau / 13.19 /
analyzed: babhañja tau divispṛśau yama arjunau sura ātmajau

original: purā dhuniścumustathā'pi pūtanāsamanvitau /
analyzed: purā dhuniḥ cumuḥ tathā api pūtanā samanvitau

original: anokṣasaṃ yutau tapaḥ pracakratuḥ śivāṃ prati /
analyzed: anokṣasam yutau tapaḥ pracakratuḥ śivām prati

original: tayā varo'pyavadhyatā caturṣu ca prayojitaḥ / 13.20 /
analyzed: tayā varaḥ upya vadhya tā caturṣu ca prayojitaḥ

original: anantaraṃ tṛṇodbhṛmistapo'carad varaṃ ca tam /
analyzed: anantaram tṛṇot bhṛmiḥ tapaḥ carat varam ca tam

original: avāpa te trayo hatāḥ śiśusvarūpaviṣṇunā / 13.21 /
analyzed: avāpa te trayaḥ hatāḥ śiśu sva rūpa viṣṇunā

original: dhuniścumuśca tau tarū samāṇsritau nisūditau /
