analyzed: ādiṣṭam api uru balam bhagavān sa tena sarvam nihatya sa balaḥ prayayau punar ca

original: nandādigopasamitiṃ hariratra rātrau bhuktvā payo'nvitaśubhānnamuvāsa kāmam / 13.106 /
analyzed: nanda ādi gopa samitim hariḥ atra rātrau bhuktvā payaḥ nvita śubha annam uvāsa kāmam

original: kaṃ so'pyatīva bhayakampitahṛtsarojaḥ prātarnarendragaṇamadhyagato'dhikoccam /
analyzed: kam saḥ api atīva bhaya kampita hṛd sarojaḥ prātar narendra gaṇa madhya gataḥ adhika uccam

original: mañcaṃ viveśa saha jānapadaiśca paurairnānā'numañcakagatairyuvatīsametaiḥ / 13.107 /
analyzed: mañcam viveśa saha jānapadaiḥ ca pauraiḥ nānā anumañcaka gataiḥ yuvatī sametaiḥ

original: saṃ sthāpya nāgamururaṅgamukhe kuvalyāpīḍaṃ girīndrasadṛśaṃ karisādiyuktam /
analyzed: sam sthāpya nāgam ururaṅga mukhe kuvalyāpīḍam giri indra sadṛśam kari sādi yuktam

original: cāṇūramuṣṭikamukhānapi mallavīrān raṅge nidhāya harisaṃ yamanaṃ kilaicchat / 13.108 /
analyzed: cāṇūra muṣṭika mukhān api malla vīrān raṅge nidhāya harisam yamanam kila aicchat  /

original: akṣohiṇī gaṇitamasya balaṃ ca viṃ śadāsīdasaṃ hyamuruvīryamananyavadhyam /
analyzed: akṣohiṇī gaṇitam asya balam ca vim hyam uru vīryam ananya vadhyam

original: śambhorvarādapi ca tasya sunīthanāmā yaḥ pūrvamāsa vṛk ityasuro'nujo'bhūt / 13.109 /
analyzed: śambhoḥ varāt api ca tasya sunītha nāmā yaḥ pūrvam āsa vṛj iti asuraḥ nujaḥ bhūt

original: saptānujā api hi tasya purātanā ye sarve'pi kaṃ sapṛtanāsahitāḥ sma raṅge /
analyzed: sapta anujāḥ api hi tasya purātanāḥ ye sarve api kam sa pṛtanā sahitāḥ sma raṅge

original: tasthuḥ sarāmamabhiyāntamudīkṣya kṛṣṇamāttāyudhā yudhi vijetumajaṃ supāpāḥ / 13.110 /
analyzed: tasthuḥ sa rāmam abhiyāntam udīkṣya kṛṣṇam ātta āyudhāḥ yudhi vijetum ajam su pāpāḥ

original: kṛṣṇo'pi sūra udite sabalo vayasyaiḥ sārddhaṃ jagāma vararaṅgamukhaṃ sureśaiḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api sūre udite sa balaḥ vayasyaiḥ sārddham jagāma vararaṅga mukham sureśaiḥ

original: saṃ stūyamāna uruvikrama āsurāṇāṃ nirmūlanāya sakal . ācalitoruśaktiḥ / 13.111 /
analyzed: sam stūyamānaḥ uru vikramaḥ āsurāṇām nirmūlanāya sakal ācalita uru śaktiḥ

original: āyan jagadgurutamo balinaṃ gajendraṃ rudraprasādaparirakṣitamāṇsvapaśyat /
analyzed: āyan jagadgurutamaḥ balinam gaja indram rudra prasāda parirakṣita māṇsu apaśyat

original: duṣṭoruraṅgamukhasaṃ sthitamīkṣya caibhyaṃ pāpāpayāhi nacirāditi vācamūde / 13.112 /
analyzed: sthitam īkṣya ca ebhyam pāpa apayāhi nacirāt iti vācam ūde

original: kṣiptaḥ sa īśvaratamena girīśalabdhād dṛpto varājjagati sarvajanairavadhyaḥ /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ saḥ īśvaratamena girīśa labdhāt dṛptaḥ varāt jagati sarva janaiḥ avadhyaḥ

original: nāgaṃ tvavadhyamabhiyāpayate tato'gre pāpo durantamahimaṃ prati vāsudevam / 13.113 /
analyzed: nāgam tu avadhyam abhiyāpayate tatas ugre pāpaḥ duranta mahimam prati vāsudevam

original: vikrīḍya tena kariṇā bhagavān sa kiñciddhaste pragṛhya vinikṛṣya nipātya bhūmau /
analyzed: vikrīḍya tena kariṇā bhagavān sa kiñcid haste pragṛhya vinikṛṣya nipātya bhūmau

original: kumbhe padaṃ pratinidhāya viṣāṇayugmamutkṛṣya hastipamahan nipapāta so'pi / 13.114 /
analyzed: kumbhe padam pratinidhāya viṣāṇa yugmam utkṛṣya hastipam ahan nipapāta saḥ upi

original: clii.nāgaṃ sasādinamavadhyamasau nihatya skandhe viṣāṇamavasajjya sahāgrajena /
analyzed: cliināgam sa sādinam avadhyam asau nihatya skandhe viṣāṇam avasajjya saha agrajena

original: nāgendrasāndramadabindubhirañcitāṅgaḥ pūrṇātmaśaktiramalaḥ praviveśa raṅgam / 13.115 /
analyzed: nāga indra sāndra mada bindubhiḥ añcita aṅgaḥ pūrṇa ātma śaktiḥ amalaḥ praviveśa raṅgam

original: viṣṭe jagadgurutame balavīryamūrtau raṅgaṃ mumoda ca śuśoṣa jano'khilo'tra /
analyzed: viṣṭe jagadgurutame bala vīrya mūrtau raṅgam mumoda ca śuśoṣa

original: kañjaṃ tathā'pi kumudaṃ ca yathaiva sūrya udyatyaje'nubhavino viparītakāṇsca / 13.116 /
analyzed: kañjam tathā api kumudam ca yathā eva sūryaḥ  /

original: raṅgapraviṣṭamabhivīkṣya jagāda mallaḥ kaṃ sapriyārthamabhibhāṣya jagannivāsam /
analyzed: raṅga praviṣṭam abhivīkṣya jagāda mallaḥ kam sa priya artham abhibhāṣya jagannivāsam

original: cāṇūra ityabhihito jagatāmavadhyaḥ śambhuprasādata idaṃ śṛṇu mādhaveti / 13.117 /
analyzed: cāṇūraḥ iti abhihitaḥ jagatām avadhyaḥ śambhu prasādataḥ idam śṛṇu mādhava iti

original: rājaiva daivatamiti pravadanti viprā rājñaḥ priyaṃ kṛtavataḥ paramā hi siddhiḥ /
analyzed: rājā eva daivatam iti pravadanti viprāḥ rājñaḥ priyam kṛtavataḥ paramā hi siddhiḥ

original: yotsyāva tena nṛpatipriyakāmyayā vāṃ rāmo'bhiyuddhyatu balī saha muṣṭikena / 13.118 /
analyzed: yotsyāva tena nṛpati priya kāmyayā vām balī saha muṣṭikena

original: ityukta āha bhagavān parihāsapūrvamevaṃ bhavatviti sa tena tadā'bhiyātaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ āha bhagavān parihāsa pūrvam evam bhavatu iti sa tena tadā abhiyātaḥ

original: sandarśya daivatapatiryudhi mallalīl āṃ mauhūrtikīmatha padorjagṛhe svaśatrum / 13.119 /
analyzed: sandarśya daivatapatiḥ yudhi ām mauhūrtikīm atha pada ūrjagṛhe sva śatrum

original: utkṣipya taṃ gaganagaṃ girisannikāṇsamudbhrāmya cātha śataśaḥ kuliśākṣatāṅgam /
analyzed: utkṣipya tam gagana gam giri sannikāṇsam udbhrāmya ca atha śataśas kuliśa akṣata aṅgam

original: āviddhya durdharabalo bhuvi niṣpipeṣa cūrṇīkṛtaḥ sa nipapāta yathā girīndraḥ / 13.120 /
analyzed: āviddhya durdhara balaḥ bhuvi niṣpipeṣa cūrṇīkṛtaḥ sa nipapāta yathā giri indraḥ

original: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tuṣṭuvuratho divi devasaṅghā martyā bhuvi pravaramuttamapūruṣāṇām /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca tuṣṭuvuḥ atho divi deva saṅghāḥ martyāḥ bhuvi pravaram uttama pūruṣāṇām

original: tadvad balasya dṛḍhamuṣṭinipiṣṭamūrdhā bhraṣṭastadaiva nipapāta sa muṣṭiko'pi / 13.121 /
analyzed: tadvat balasya dṛḍha muṣṭi nipiṣṭa mūrdhā bhraṣṭaḥ tadā eva nipapāta sa muṣṭikaḥ upi  /

original: kūṭaṇsca kosala uta cchalanāmadheyo dvau tatra kṛṣṇanihatāvaparo balena /
analyzed: kosalaḥ uta chala nāmadheyaḥ dvau tatra kṛṣṇa nihatau aparaḥ balena

original: kaṃ sasya ye tvavarajāṇsca sunīthamukhyāḥ sarve balena nihatāḥ parigheṇa vīrāḥ / 13.122 /
analyzed: kam sasya ye tu avarajān ca sunītha mukhyāḥ sarve balena nihatāḥ parigheṇa vīrāḥ  /

original: t ābhyāṃ hatānabhisamīkṣya nijān samastān kaṃ so dideśa balamakṣayamugravīryam /
analyzed: ābhyām hatān abhisamīkṣya nijān samastān kam saḥ dideśa balam akṣayam ugra vīryam

original: rudraprasādakṛtarakṣamavadhyamenau nissārya daṇḍamadhikaṃ kuruteti pāpaḥ / 13.123 /
analyzed: rudra prasāda kṛta rakṣam avadhyam enau nissārya daṇḍam adhikam kuruta iti pāpaḥ  /

original: śrutvaiva rājavacanaṃ balamakṣayaṃ tadakṣohiṇīdaśakayugmamanantavīryam /
analyzed: śrutvā eva rāja vacanam balam akṣayam tat akṣohiṇī daśaka yugmam ananta vīryam

original: kṛṣṇaṃ cakāra vividhāstradharaṃ svakoṣṭhe siṃ haṃ yathā kila sṛgālabalaṃ sametam / 13.124 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam cakāra vividha astra dharam sva koṣṭhe siṃ haṃ yathā kila sṛgāla balam sametam

original: j ānannapīśvaramanantabalaṃ mahendraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rathaṃ nijamayāpayadāyudhāḍhyam /
analyzed: ānan api īśvaram ananta balam mahā indraḥ kṛṣṇam ratham nijam ayāpayat āyudha āḍhyam

original: śuśrūṣaṇāya paramasya yathā samudramarghyeṇa pūrayati pūrṇajalaṃ jano'yam / 13.125 /
analyzed: śuśrūṣaṇāya paramasya yathā samudram arghyeṇa pūrayati pūrṇa jalam

original: svasyandanaṃ tu bhagavān sa mahendradattamāruhya sūtavaramātalisaṅgṛhītam /
analyzed: sva syandanam tu bhagavān sa mahā indradattam āruhya sūta vara mātali saṅgṛhītam

original: cliii.nānāyudhograkiraṇastaraṇiryathaiva dhvāntaṃ vyanāṇsayadaśeṣata āṇsu sainyam / 13.126 /
analyzed: dhvāntam vyanāṇsayat aśeṣatas sainyam  /

original: niḥ śeṣato vinihate svabale sa kaṃ saścarmāsipāṇirabhiyātumiyeṣa kṛṣṇam /
analyzed: niḥ śeṣatas vinihate sva bale sa kam saḥ carma asi pāṇiḥ abhiyātum iyeṣa kṛṣṇam

original: t āvat tameva bhagavantamabhiprayātamuttuṅgamañcaśirasi pradadarśa vīram / 13.127 /
analyzed: t āvat tam eva bhagavantam abhiprayātam uttuṅga mañca śirasi pradadarśa vīram  /

original: taṃ śyenavegamabhitaḥ pratisañcarantaṃ niśchidramāṇsu jagṛhe bhagavān prasahya /
analyzed: tam śyena vegam abhitas pratisañcarantam niśchidra māṇsu jagṛhe bhagavān prasahya

original: keśeṣu cainamabhibhṛśya kareṇa vāmenoddhṛtya dakṣiṇakareṇa jaghāna ke'sya / 13.128 /
analyzed: keśeṣu ca enam abhibhṛśya kareṇa vāmena uddhṛtya dakṣiṇa kareṇa jaghāna  /

original: sañcālitena mukuṭena vikuṇḍalena karṇadvayena vigatābharaṇorasā ca/
analyzed: sañcālitena mukuṭena vikuṇḍalena karṇa dvayena vigata ābharaṇa urasā ca

original: srastāmbareṇa jaghanena suśocyarūpaḥ kaṃ so babhūva narasiṃ hakarāgrasaṃ sthaḥ / 13.129 /
analyzed: srasta ambareṇa jaghanena su śocya rūpaḥ kam saḥ babhūva nara sim sthaḥ

original: utkṛṣya taṃ surapatiḥ paramoccamañcādanyairajeyamativīryabalopapannam /
analyzed: utkṛṣya tam surapatiḥ parama ucca mañcāt anyaiḥ ajeya mati vīrya bala upapannam

original: abjodbhaveśavaraguptamanantaśaktirbhūmau nipātya sa dadau padayoḥ prahāram / 13.130 /
analyzed: abja udbhava īśa varaguptam anantaśaktiḥ bhūmau nipātya sa dadau padayoḥ prahāram

original: dehe tu yo'bhavadamuṣya rameśabandhurvāyuḥ sa kṛṣṇatanumāṇsrayadanyapāpam /
analyzed: dehe tu yaḥ bhavat amuṣya rameśa bandhuḥ vāyuḥ sa

original: daityaṃ cakarṣa hariratra śarīrasaṃ sthaṃ paśyatsu kañjajamukheṣu sureṣvanantaḥ / 13.131 /
analyzed: daityam cakarṣa hariḥ atra stham paśyatsu kañja ja mukheṣu sureṣu anantaḥ  /

original: dveṣāt sa sarvajagadekaguroḥ svakīyaiḥ pūrvapramāpitajanaiḥ sahitaḥ samastaiḥ /
analyzed: dveṣāt sa sarva jagat eka guroḥ svakīyaiḥ pūrva pramāpita janaiḥ sahitaḥ samastaiḥ

original: dhātryādibhiḥ pratiyayau kumatistamo'ndhamanye'pi caivamupayānti harāvabhaktāḥ / 13.132 /
analyzed: dhātrī ādibhiḥ pratiyayau kumatiḥ tamaḥ ndham anye api ca evam upayānti hara avabhaktāḥ

original: nityātiduḥkhamanivṛtti sukhavyapetamandhaṃ tamo niyatameti harāvabhaktaḥ /
analyzed: nitya ati duḥkham anivṛtti sukha vyapetam andham tamaḥ niyatam eti hara avabhaktaḥ

original: bhakto'pi kañjajagirīśamukheṣu sarvadharmārṇavo'pi nikhilāgamanirṇayena / 13.133 /
analyzed: bhaktaḥ api kañja ja girīśa mukheṣu sarva dharma arṇavaḥ api nikhila āgama nirṇayena

original: yo vetti niścitamatirharimabjajeśapūrvākhilasya jagataḥ sakale'pi kāle /
analyzed: yaḥ vetti niścita matiḥ harim abja ja īśa pūrva akhilasya jagataḥ sakale api kāle

original: sṛṣṭisthitipral . ayamokṣadamātmatantraṃ lakṣmyā apīśamatibhaktiyutaḥ sa mucyet / 13.134 /
tasmādanantaguṇapūrṇamamuṃ rameśaṃ niścitya doṣarahitaṃ parayaiva bhaktyā /
analyzed: tasmāt ananta guṇa pūrṇam amum rameśam niścitya doṣa rahitam parayā eva bhaktyā

original: vijñāya daivatagaṇāṃ śca yathākrameṇa bhaktā hareriti sadaiva bhajeta dhīraḥ / 13.135 /
analyzed: vijñāya daivata gaṇān śca yathākrameṇa bhaktāḥ hareḥ iti sadā eva bhajeta dhīraḥ

original: nihatya kaṃ samojasā vidhātṛśambhupūrvakaiḥ /
analyzed: nihatya kam samojasā vidhātṛ śambhu pūrvakaiḥ

original: stutaḥ prasūnavarṣibhirmumoda keśavo'dhikam / 13.136 /
analyzed: stutaḥ prasūnava ṛṣibhiḥ mumoda keśava udhikam

original: sadaiva modarūpiṇo mudoktirasya laukikī /
analyzed: sadā eva moda rūpiṇaḥ mudā uktiḥ asya laukikī

original: yathodayo raverbhavet sadoditasya lokataḥ / 13.137 /
analyzed: yathā udayaḥ raveḥ bhavet sadā uditasya lokataḥ

original: cliv.anantacitsukhārṇavaḥ sadoditaikarūpakaḥ /
samastadoṣavarjito harirguṇātmakaḥ sadā / 13.138 /
analyzed: samasta doṣa varjitaḥ hariḥ guṇa ātmakaḥ sadā

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
kaṃ savadho nāma trayodaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: kam savadhaḥ nāma trayodaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: clv.(uddhavapratiyānam)
analyzed: clu uddhava pratiyānam

original: atha caturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha caturdaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / kṛṣṇo vimocya pitarāvabhivandya sarvavandyo'pi rāmasahitaḥ pratipālanāya /
analyzed: om kṛṣṇaḥ vimocya pitarā abhivandya sarva vandyaḥ api rāma sahitaḥ pratipālanāya

original: dharmasya rājyapadavīṃ praṇidhāya cograsene dvijatvamupagamya mumoca nandam / 14.1 /
analyzed: dharmasya rājya padavīm praṇidhāya ca ugrasene dvija tvam upagamya mumoca nandam  /

original: nando'pi sāntvavacanairanunīya muktaḥ kṛṣṇena taccaraṇapaṅkajamātmasaṃ stham /
analyzed: nandaḥ upi sāntva vacanaiḥ anunīya muktaḥ kṛṣṇena tad caraṇa paṅkajam ātmasam stham

original: kṛtvā jagāma saha gopagaṇena kṛcchrād dhyāyan janārdanamuvāsa vane sabhāryaḥ / 14.2 /
analyzed: kṛtvā jagāma saha gopa gaṇena kṛcchrāt dhyāyan janārdanam uvāsa vane sa bhāryaḥ

original: kṛṣṇo'pyavantipuravāsinametya vipraṃ sāndīpaniṃ saha balena tato'dhyagīṣṭa /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api avanti pura vāsinam etya vipram sāndīpanim saha balena

original: vedān sakṛnnigaditān nikhilāṇsca vidyāḥ sampūrṇasaṃ vidapi daivataśikṣaṇāya / 14.3 /
analyzed: vedān sakṛt nigaditān vidyāḥ sampūrṇa sam vid api daivata śikṣaṇāya

original: dharmo hi sarvaviduṣāmapi daivatānāṃ prāpte nareṣu janane naravat pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi sarva viduṣām api daivatānām prāpte nareṣu janane nara vat pravṛttiḥ

original: j ñānādigūhanamutādhyayanādiratra tajjñāpanārthamavasad bhagavān gurau ca / 14.4 /
analyzed: ñāna ādi gūhanam uta adhyayana ādiḥ atra tad jñāpana artham avasat bhagavān gurau ca

original: gurvarthameṣa mṛtaputramadāt punaśca rāmeṇa sārddhamagamanmadhurāṃ rameśaḥ /
analyzed: guru artham eṣa mṛta putram adāt punar ca rāmeṇa sārddham agamat madhurām rameśaḥ

original: pauraiḥ sajānapadabandhujanairajasramabhyarcito nyavasadiṣṭakṛdātmapitroḥ / 14.5 /
analyzed: pauraiḥ sa jānapada bandhu janaiḥ ajasram abhyarcitaḥ nyavasat iṣṭakṛt ātma pitroḥ  /

original: sarve'pi te patimavāpya hariṃ purā'bhitaptā hi bhojapatinā mumurdunitāntam /
analyzed: sarve api te patim avāpya harim purā abhitaptāḥ hi bhoja patinā

original: kiṃ vācyamatra sutamāpya hariṃ svapitroryatrākhilasya sujanasya babhūva modaḥ / 14.6 /
analyzed: kim vācyam atra sutam āpya harim sva pitroḥ yatra akhilasya su janasya babhūva modaḥ  /

original: kṛṣṇāṇsrayo vasati yatra jano'pi tatra vṛddhirbhavet kimu ramādhipaternivāse /
analyzed: vasati yatra janaḥ api tatra vṛddhiḥ bhavet kimu ramādhipateḥ nivāse

original: vṛndāvanaṃ yadadhivāsata āsa sadhryaṅ māhendrasadmasadṛśaṃ kimu tatra puryāḥ / 14.7 /
analyzed: vṛndāvanam yat adhivāsataḥ āsa sadhryak māhendra sadma sadṛśam kimu tatra puryāḥ

original: yenādhivāsamṛṣabho jagatāṃ vidhatte viṣṇustato hi varatā sadane vidhātuḥ /
analyzed: yena adhivāsam ṛṣabhaḥ jagatām vidhatte viṣṇuḥ tatas hi vara tā sadane vidhātuḥ

original: tasmāt prabhornivasanānmadhurā purī sā ṇsaśvat samṛddhajanasaṅkulitā babhūva / 14.8 /
analyzed: tasmāt prabhoḥ nivasanāt madhurā purī sā ṇsaśvat samṛddha jana saṅkulitā babhūva  /

original: rakṣatyaje trijagatāṃ parirakṣake'smin sarvān yadūn magadharājasute svabhartuḥ /
analyzed: rakṣati aje trijagatām parirakṣake ismin sarvān yadūn magadha rāja sute sva bhartuḥ

original: kṛṣṇānmṛtiṃ pituravāpya samīpamastiprāstī śaśaṃ saturatīva ca duḥkhite'smai / 14.9 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇāt mṛtim pituḥ avāpya samīpam asti prāstī śaśam ca duḥkhitā ismai

original: śrutvaiva tanmagadharāja uruprarūḍhabāhvorbalena najito yudhi sarvalokaiḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā eva tat magadha rājaḥ uru prarūḍha bāhvoḥ balena najitaḥ yudhi sarva lokaiḥ

original: brahmeśacaṇḍamunidattavarairajeyo mṛtyūjjhitaśca vijayī jagataścukopa / 14.10 /
analyzed: brahma īśa caṇḍa muni datta varaiḥ ajeyaḥ mṛtyu ujjhitaḥ ca vijayī jagataḥ cukopa  /

original: kṣubdho'tikopavaśataḥ svagadāmamoghāṃ dattāṃ śivena jagṛhe śivabhaktavandyaḥ /
analyzed: kṣubdha uti kopa vaśataḥ sva gadām amoghām dattām śivena jagṛhe śiva bhakta vandyaḥ

original: śaivāgamākhilavidatra ca susthiro'sau cikṣepa yojanaśataṃ sa tu tāṃ parasmai / 14.11 /
analyzed: śaiva āgama akhila vid atra ca susthiraḥ asau cikṣepa yojana śatam sa tu tām parasmai

original: clvi.arvāk papāta ca gadā madhurāpradeśāt sā yojanena yadimaṃ prajagāda pṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: clvi arvāk papāta ca gadā madhurā pradeśāt sā yojanena yat imam prajagāda pṛṣṭaḥ

original: ekottarāmapi śatācchatayojaneti devarṣiratra madhurāṃ bhagavatpriyārthe / 14.12 /
analyzed: eka uttarām api śatāt śata yojana iti devarṣiḥ atra madhurām bhagavat priya arthe

original: śaktasya cāpi hi gadāpravighātane tu śuśrūṣaṇaṃ maducitaṃ tviti cintayānaḥ /
analyzed: śaktasya ca api hi gadā pravighātane tu śuśrūṣaṇam mad ucitam tu iti cintayānaḥ

original: viṣṇormuniḥ sa nijagāda ha yojanonaṃ mārgaṃ puro bhagavato magadheśapṛṣṭaḥ / 14.13 /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ muniḥ sa nijagāda ha yojana ūnam mārgam puras bhagavataḥ magadha īśa pṛṣṭaḥ  /

original: kṣiptā tu sā bhagavato'tha gadā jarākhyāṃ tatsandhinīmasubhirāṇsu viyojya pāpām /
analyzed: kṣiptā tu sā bhagavatā utha gadā jarā ākhyām tad sandhinīm asubhiḥ āṇsu viyojya pāpām

original: martyāṇsinīṃ bhagavataḥ punarājñayaiva yātā girīśasadanaṃ magadhaṃ visṛjya / 14.14 /
analyzed: martyāṇsinīm bhagavataḥ punar ājñayā eva yātāḥ girīśa sadanam magadham visṛjya

original: rājā svamātṛta uto gadayā cahīnaḥ krodhāt samastanṛpatīnabhisannipātya /
analyzed: rājā sva mātṛtaḥ uta u gadayā ca hīnaḥ krodhāt samasta nṛpatīn abhisannipātya

original: akṣohiṇītryadhikaviṃ śayuto'tiveladarpoddhataḥ sapadi kṛṣṇapurīṃ jagāma / 14.15 /
analyzed: akṣohiṇī tri adhi kavim sapadi kṛṣṇa purīm jagāma  /

original: sarvāṃ purīṃ pratiniruddhya dideśa vindavindānujau bhagavataḥ kumatiḥ sa dūtau /
analyzed: sarvām purīm pratiniruddhya dideśa vinda vindānujau bhagavataḥ kumatiḥ sa dūtau

original: t āvūcaturbhagavate'sya vaco'tidarpapūrṇaṃ tathā bhagavato'pyapahāsayuktam / 14.16 /
analyzed: t au ūcatuḥ bhagavatā isya vacaḥ uti darpa pūrṇam tathā bhagavatā api apahāsa yuktam

original: loke'pratītabalapauruṣasārarūpastvaṃ hyeka eṣyabhavato balavīryasāram /
analyzed: loke pratīta bala pauruṣa sāra rūpaḥ tvam hi ekaḥ eṣya bhavataḥ bala vīrya sāram

original: j ñātvā sute natu mayā pratipādite hi kaṃ sasya vīryarahitena hatastvayā saḥ / 14.17 /
analyzed: j ñātvā sute na tu mayā pratipādite hi kam sasya vīrya rahitena hataḥ tvayā saḥ  /

original: so'haṃ hi durbalatamo balināṃ variṣṭhaṃ kṛtvaiva dṛṣṭiviṣayaṃ vigatapratāpaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ aham hi durbalatamaḥ balinām variṣṭham kṛtvā eva dṛṣṭi viṣayam vigata pratāpaḥ

original: yāsye tapovanamatho sahitaḥ sutābhyāṃ kṣipraṃ mamādya viṣaye bhava cakṣuṣo'taḥ / 14.18 /
analyzed: yāsye tapaḥ vanam atho sahitaḥ sutābhyām kṣipram mama adya viṣaye bhava cakṣuṣā uta

original: sākṣepamīritamidaṃ baladarpapūrṇamātmāpahāsasahitaṃ bhagavān niśamya /
analyzed: sa ākṣepam īritam idam bala darpa pūrṇam ātma apahāsa sahitam bhagavān niśamya

original: satyaṃ tadityuru vaco'rthavadabhyudīrya mandaṃ prahasya niragāt sahito balena / 14.19 /
analyzed: satyam tat iti uru vacaḥ ūrthavat abhyudīrya mandam prahasya niragāt sahitaḥ balena

original: dvāreṣu sātyakipurassaramātmasainyaṃ triṣvabhyudīrya bhagavān svayamuttareṇa /
analyzed: dvāreṣu sātyaki purassaram ātma sainyam triṣu abhyudīrya bhagavān svayam uttareṇa

original: rāmadvitīya udagānmagadhādhirājaṃ yoddhuṃ nṛpendrakaṭakena yutaṃ pareśaḥ / 14.20 /
analyzed: rāma dvitīyaḥ udagāt magadha adhirājam yoddhum nṛpa indra kaṭakena yutam para īśaḥ  /

original: tasyecchayaiva pṛthivīmavaterurāṇsu tasyā'yudhāni sabalasya subhāsvarāṇi /
analyzed: tasya icchayā eva tasya āyudhāni sa balasya su bhāsvarāṇi

original: śārṅgāsicakradaratūṇagadāḥ svakīyā jagrāha dārukagṛhītarathe sthitaḥ saḥ / 14.21 /
analyzed: śārṅga asi cakra dara tūṇa gadāḥ svakīyāḥ jagrāha dāruka gṛhīta rathe sthitaḥ saḥ

original: āruhya bhūmayarathaṃ pratiyuktamaśvairvedātmakairdhanuradhijyamatha pragṛhya /
analyzed: āruhya bhūmaya ratham pratiyuktam aśvaiḥ veda ātmakaiḥ dhanuḥ adhijyam atha pragṛhya

original: śārṅgaṃ śarāṃ śca niśitān magadhādhirājamugraṃ nṛpendrasahitaṃ prayayau javena / 14.22 /
analyzed: śārṅgam śarān śca niśitān magadha adhirājam ugram nṛpa indra sahitam prayayau javena

original: rāmaḥ pragṛhya musalaṃ sa halaṃ ca yānamāsthāya sāyakaśarāsanatūṇayuktaḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ pragṛhya musalam sa halam ca yānam āsthāya sāyaka śarāsana tūṇa yuktaḥ

original: clvii.sainyaṃ jarāsutasurakṣitamabhyadhāvaddharṣānnadannurubalo'ribalairadhṛṣyaḥ / 14.23 /
analyzed: clvii sainyam jarāsuta su rakṣitam abhyadhāvat harṣāt nadan uru bala uri balaiḥ adhṛṣyaḥ

original: udvīkṣya kṛṣṇamabhiyāntamanantaśaktiṃ rājendravṛndasahito magadhādhirājaḥ /
analyzed: udvīkṣya kṛṣṇam abhiyāntam anantaśaktim rāja indra vṛnda sahitaḥ magadha adhirājaḥ

original: udvelasāgaravadāṇsvabhiyāya kopānnānāvidhāyudhavarairabhivarṣamāṇaḥ / 14.24 /
analyzed: udvela sāgara vat āṇsu abhiyāya kopāt nānāvidha āyudha varaiḥ abhivarṣamāṇaḥ

original: taṃ vai cukopayiṣuragrata ugrasenaṃ kṛṣṇo nidhāya samagāt svayamasya paścāt /
analyzed: tam vai cukopayiṣuḥ agratas ugrasenam kṛṣṇaḥ nidhāya samagāt svayam asya paścāt

original: dṛṣṭvā'grato magadharāṭsthitamugrasenaṃ kopāccalattanuridaṃ vacanaṃ babhāṣe / 14.25 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā agratas magadha rāj sthitam ugrasenam kopāt calat tanuḥ idam vacanam babhāṣe  /

original: pāpāpayāhi purato mama rājyakāma nirlajja putravadhakāraṇa ṇsatrupakṣa /
analyzed: pāpa apayāhi puratas mama rājya kāma nirlajja putra vadha kāraṇa

original: tvaṃ jīrṇabastasadṛśo na mayeha vadhyaḥ siṃ ho hi siṃ hamabhiyāti na vai sṛgālam / 14.26 /
analyzed: tvam jīrṇa basta sadṛśaḥ na mayā iha vadhyaḥ siṃ ho hi siṃ ham abhiyāti na vai sṛgālam

original: ākṣipta itthamamunā'tha sa bhojarājastūṇāt pragṛhya niśitaṃ śaramāṇsu tena /
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ ittham amunā atha sa bhojarājaḥ tūṇāt pragṛhya niśitam tena

original: chitvā jarāsutadhanurbalavannanāda vivyādha sāyakagaṇaiśca punastamugraiḥ / 14.27 /
analyzed: chitvā jarāsuta dhanuḥ balavat nanāda vivyādha sāyaka gaṇaiḥ ca punar tam ugraiḥ

original: anyaccharāsanavaraṃ pratigṛhya kopasaṃ raktanetramabhiyāntamudīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: anyat śarāsana varam pratigṛhya kopasam rakta netram abhiyāntam udīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ

original: bhojādhirājavadhakāṅkṣiṇamugravegaṃ bārhadrathaṃ pratiyayau paramo rathena / 14.28 /
analyzed: bhoja adhirāja vadha kāṅkṣiṇam ugra vegam bārhadratham pratiyayau paramaḥ rathena

original: āyāntamīkṣya bhagavantamanantavīryaṃ cedīśapauṇḍramukharājagaṇaiḥ sametaḥ /
analyzed: āyāntam īkṣya bhagavantam ananta vīryam cedi īśa pauṇḍra mukha rāja gaṇaiḥ sametaḥ

original: nānāvidhāstravaraśastragaṇairvavarṣa meruṃ yathā ghana udīrṇaravo jalaughaiḥ / 14.29 /
analyzed: nānāvidha astra vara śastra gaṇaiḥ vavarṣa merum yathā ghanaḥ udīrṇa ravaḥ jala oghaiḥ

original: śastrāstravṛṣṭimabhito bhagavān vivṛścya śārṅgotthasāyakagaṇairvirathāṇsvasūtam /
analyzed: śastra astra vṛṣṭim abhitas bhagavān vivṛścya śārṅga uttha sāyaka gaṇaiḥ

original: cakre nirāyudhamasau magadhendramāṇsu cchinnātapatravaraketumacintyaśaktiḥ / 14.30 /
analyzed: cakre nirāyudham asau magadha indra māṇsu chinna ātapatra vara ketum acintya śaktiḥ

original: nainaṃ jaghāna bhagavān suśakaṃ ca bhīme bhaktiṃ nijāṃ prathayituṃ yaśa uccadharmam /
analyzed: na enam jaghāna bhagavān su śakam ca bhīme bhaktim nijām prathayitum yaśaḥ ucca dharmam

original: cedīśapauṇḍrakasakīcakamadrarājasālvaikalavyakamukhān virathāṃ ścakāra / 14.31 /
analyzed: cedi īśa pauṇḍraka sakīcaka madra rāja sālva ekalavyaka mukhān

original: ye cāpi haṃ saḍibhakadrumarugmimukhyā bāhlīkabhaumasutamaindapurassarāṇsca /
analyzed: ye ca api ham saḍibhaka druma rugmi mukhyāḥ vāhlīka bhauma suta mainda purassarān ca

original: sarve pradudruvurajasya śarairvibhinnā anye ca bhūmipatayo ya ihā'sururvyām / 14.32 /
analyzed: sarve pradudruvuḥ ajasya śaraiḥ vibhinnāḥ anye ca bhūmipatayaḥ ye iha āsuḥ urvyām

original: chinnāyudhadhvajapatākarathāṇsvasūtavarmāṇa ugraśaratāḍitabhinnagātrāḥ /
analyzed: chinna āyudha dhvaja patāka rathāṇsva sūta varmāṇaḥ ugra śara tāḍita bhinna gātrāḥ

original: srastāmbarābharaṇamūrdhajamālyadīnā raktaṃ vamanta uru dudruvurāṇsu bhīt āḥ / 14.33 /
analyzed: srasta ambara ābharaṇa mūrdhaja mālya dīnāḥ raktam vamantaḥ uru dudruvuḥ āṇsu bhīt āḥ

original: śocyāṃ daśāmupagateṣu nṛpeṣu sarveṣvastāyudheṣu hariṇā yudhi vidravatsu /
analyzed: śocyām daśām upagateṣu nṛpeṣu sarveṣu asta āyudheṣu hariṇāḥ yudhi vidravatsu

original: nānāyudhāḍhyamaparaṃ rathamugravīrya āsthāya māgadhapatiḥ prasasāra rāmam / 14.34 /
analyzed: nānā āyudha āḍhyam aparam ratham ugra vīryaḥ āsthāya māgadha patiḥ prasasāra rāmam  /

original: clviii.ādhāvato'sya musalena rathaṃ babhañja rāmo gadāmurutarorasi so'pi tasya /
analyzed: ādhāvataḥ usya musalena ratham babhañja rāmaḥ gadām urutara urasi saḥ upi tasya

original: cikṣepa taṃ ca musalena tatāḍa rāmastāvuttamau balavatāṃ yuyudhāta ugram / 14.35 /
analyzed: cikṣepa tam ca musalena tatāḍa rāmaḥ tau uttamau balavatām yuyudhātaḥ ugram

original: tau cakratuḥ puru niyuddhamapi sma tatra sañcūrṇya sarvagirivṛkṣaṇsilāsamūhān /
analyzed: tau cakratuḥ puru niyuddham api sma tatra sañcūrṇya sarva giri vṛkṣaṇ silā samūhān

original: dīrghaṃ niyuddhamabhavat samametayostad vajrād dṛḍhāṅgatamayorbalinornitāntam / 14.36 /
analyzed: dīrgham niyuddham abhavat samam etayoḥ tat vajrāt dṛḍha aṅga tamayoḥ balinoḥ nitāntam

original: śrutvā'tha śaṅkharavamambujalocanasya vidrāvitānapi nṛpānabhivīkṣya rāmaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā atha śaṅkha ravam ambuja locanasya vidrāvitān api nṛpān abhivīkṣya rāmaḥ

original: yuddhyantamīkṣya ca ripuṃ vavṛdhe balena tyaktvā ripuṃ musalamādada āṇsvamogham / 14.37 /
analyzed: yuddhi antam īkṣya ca ripum vavṛdhe balena tyaktvā ripum musalam ādade

original: tenā'hataḥ śirasi sammumuhe'tivelaṃ bārhadratho jagṛha enamatho halī saḥ /
analyzed: tena āhataḥ śirasi sammumuhe itivelam bārhadrathaḥ jagṛhe enam atho halī saḥ

original: tatraikalavya uta kṛṣṇaṇsaraiḥ palāyannastrāṇi rāmaśirasi pramumoca śīghram / 14.38 /
analyzed: tatra ekalavyaḥ uta kṛṣṇaṇsaraiḥ palāyan astrāṇi rāma śirasi pramumoca śīghram

original: bhītena tena samaraṃ bhagavānanicchan pradyumnamāṇsvasṛjadātmasutaṃ manojam /
analyzed: bhītena tena samaram bhagavān an icchan

original: pradyumna enamabhiyāya mahāstrajālai rāmastu māgadhamathā'tmarathaṃ nināya / 14.39 /
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ enam abhiyāya mahā astra jālaiḥ rāmaḥ tu māgadham atha ātma ratham nināya  /

original: yuddhvā ciraṃ raṇamukhe bhagavatsuto'sau cakre nirāyudhamamuṃ sthiramekalavyam /
analyzed: yuddhvā ciram raṇa mukhe bhagavat sutaḥ usau cakre nirāyudham amum sthiram ekalavyam

original: aṃ śena yo bhuvamagānmaṇimāniti sma sa krodhatantrakagaṇeṣvadhipo niṣādaḥ / 14.40 /
analyzed: aṃ śena yaḥ bhuvam agāt maṇimān iti sma sa krodha tantraka gaṇeṣu adhipaḥ niṣādaḥ  /

original: pradyumnamātmani nidhāya punaḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ saṃ hṛtya māgadhabalaṃ nikhilaṃ śaraughaiḥ /
analyzed: pradyumnam ātmani nidhāya punar sa kṛṣṇaḥ sam hṛtya māgadha balam nikhilam śara oghaiḥ

original: bhūyaścamūmabhivinetumudārakarmā bārhadrathaṃ tvamucadakṣayapauruṣo'jaḥ / 14.41 /
analyzed: bhūyas camūm abhivinetum udāra karmā bārhadratham tu amucat akṣaya pauruṣa ojaḥ

original: vrīl . ānatācchavimukhaḥ sahito nṛpaistairbārhadrathaḥ pratiyayau svapurīṃ sa pāpaḥ /
analyzed: ānata acchavi mukhaḥ sahitaḥ nṛpaiḥ taiḥ bārhadrathaḥ pratiyayau sva purīm sa pāpaḥ

original: ātmābhiṣiktamapi bhojavarādhipatye dauhitramagrata uta praṇidhāya mandaḥ / 14.42 /
analyzed: ātma abhiṣiktam api bhoja vara ādhipatye dauhitram agratas uta praṇidhāya mandaḥ  /

original: jitvā tamūrjitabalaṃ bhagavānajeśaśakrādibhiḥ kusumavarṣibhirīḍyamānaḥ /
analyzed: jitvā tam ūrjita balam bhagavān aja īśa śakra ādibhiḥ kusuma varṣibhiḥ īḍyamānaḥ

original: rāmādibhiḥ sahita āṇsu purīṃ praviśya reme'bhivanditapado mahatāṃ samūhaiḥ / 14.43 /
analyzed: rāma ādibhiḥ sahitaḥ purīm praviśya mahatām samūhaiḥ

original: varddhatsu pāṇḍutanayeṣu caturdaśaṃ tu janmarkṣamāsa tanayasya sahasradṛṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: varddhatsu pāṇḍu tanayeṣu caturdaśam tu janma ṛkṣam āsa tanayasya sahasradṛṣṭeḥ

original: pratyābdikaṃ munigaṇān pariveṣayantī kuntī tadā'sa bahukāryaparā nayajñā / 14.44 /
analyzed: pratyābdikam muni gaṇān pariveṣayantī kuntī tadā āsa bahu kārya parā naya jñā

original: tatkāla eva nṛpatiḥ saha mādravatyā puṃ skokilākulitaphullavanaṃ dadarśa /
analyzed: tad kāle eva nṛpatiḥ saha mādravatyā pum skokila ākulita phulla vanam dadarśa

original: tasmin vasantapavanasparśedhitaḥ sa kandarpamārgaṇavaśaṃ sahasā jagāma / 14.45 /
analyzed: tasmin vasanta pavana sparśa īdhitaḥ sa kandarpa mārgaṇa vaśam sahasā jagāma

original: jagrāha tāmatha tayā ramamāṇa eva yāto yamasya sadanaṃ haripādasaṅgī /
analyzed: jagrāha tām atha tayā ramamāṇaḥ eva yātaḥ yamasya sadanam hari pāda saṅgī

original: pūrvaṃ śacīramaṇamicchata eva vighnaṃ śakrasya taddarśanopagato hi cakre / 14.46 /
analyzed: pūrvam śacī ramaṇam icchataḥ eva vighnam śakrasya tad darśana upagataḥ hi cakre

original: clix.tenaiva mānuṣamavāpya ratistha eva pañcatvamāpa rativighnamaputratāṃ ca /
analyzed: clixtena eva mānuṣam avāpya rati sthaḥ eva pañcatvam āpa rati vighnam a putra tām ca

original: svātmottameṣvatha sureṣu viśeṣataśca svalpo'pi doṣa urutāmabhiyāti yasmāt / 14.47 /
analyzed: sva ātma uttameṣu atha sureṣu viśeṣataḥ ca su alpaḥ api doṣaḥ uru tām abhiyāti yasmāt

original: mādrī patiṃ mṛtamavekṣya rurāva dūrāt tacchuśruvuśca pṛthayā saha pāṇḍuputrāḥ /
analyzed: mādrī patim mṛtam avekṣya rurāva dūrāt tat śuśruvuḥ ca pṛthayā saha pāṇḍu putrāḥ

original: teṣvāgateṣu vacanādapi mādravatyāḥ putrān nivārya tu pṛthā svayamatra cā'gāt / 14.48 /
analyzed: teṣu āgateṣu vacanāt api mādravatyāḥ putrān nivārya tu pṛthā svayam atra ca āgāt  /

original: patyuḥ kal . evaramavekṣya niśamya mādryāḥ kuntī bhṛśaṃ vyathitahṛtkamal . aiva mādrīm /
analyzed: patyuḥ evaram avekṣya niśamya mādryāḥ kuntī bhṛśam vyathita hṛd kamal mādrīm

original: dhikkṛtya cānumaraṇāya matiṃ cakāra tasyāḥ svano ruditajaḥ śruta āṇsu pārthaiḥ / 14.49 /
analyzed: dhikkṛtya ca anumaraṇāya matim cakāra tasyāḥ svanaḥ rudita jaḥ śrutaḥ pārthaiḥ  /

original: teṣvāgateṣvadhika āsa virāva etaṃ sarve'pi śuśruvurṛṣipravarā athātra /
analyzed: teṣu āgateṣu adhikaḥ āsa virāvaḥ etam sarve api śuśruvuḥ ṛṣi pravarāḥ atha atra

original: ājagmuruttamakṛpā ṛṣilokamadhye patnī nṛpānugamanāya ca paspṛdhāte / 14.50 /
analyzed: ājagmuḥ uttama kṛpāḥ ṛṣi loka madhye patnī nṛpa anugamanāya ca paspṛdhāte  /

original: te sannivārya tu pṛthāmatha mādravatyā bhartuḥ sahānugamanaṃ bahu cārthayantyāḥ /
analyzed: te san nivārya tu pṛthām atha mā ādravatyāḥ bhartuḥ saha anugamanam bahu ca arthayantyāḥ

original: saṃ vādameva nijadoṣamavekṣya tasyāṇscakruḥ sadā'vagatabhāgavatoccadharmāḥ / 14.51 /
analyzed: sam vādam eva nija doṣam avekṣya sadā avagata bhāgavata ucca dharmāḥ

original: bharturguṇairanadhikau tanayārthameva mādryā kṛtau suravarāvadhikau svato'pi /
analyzed: bhartuḥ guṇaiḥ anadhikau tanaya artham eva mādryā kṛtau sura varau adhikau svatas pi

original: tenaiva bhartṛmṛtiheturabhūt samastalokaiśca nātimahitā suguṇā'pi mādrī / 14.52 /
analyzed: tena eva bhartṛ mṛti hetuḥ abhūt samasta lokaiḥ ca na ati mahitā su guṇā api mādrī

original: pāṇḍoḥ sutā munigaṇaiḥ pitṛmedhamatra cakruryathāvadatha tena sahaiva mādrī /
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ sutāḥ muni gaṇaiḥ pitṛ medham atra cakruḥ yathāvat atha tena saha eva mādrī

original: hutvā'tmadehamuru pāpamadaḥ kṛtaṃ ca sammārjya lokamagamannijabhartureva / 14.53 /
analyzed: hutvā ātma deham uru pāpa madaḥ kṛtam ca sammārjya lokam agamat nija bhartuḥ eva

original: pāṇḍuṇsca putrakaguṇaiḥ svaguṇaiśca sākṣāt kṛṣṇātmajaḥ satatamasya padaikabhaktaḥ /
analyzed: putraka guṇaiḥ sva guṇaiḥ ca sākṣāt kṛṣṇa ātmajaḥ satatam asya pada eka bhaktaḥ

original: lokānavāpa vimalān mahitān mahadbhiḥ kiṃ citramatra haripādavinamracitte / 14.54 /
analyzed: lokān avāpa vimalān mahitān mahadbhiḥ kim citram atra hari pāda vinamra citte

original: pāṇḍoḥ sutāṇsca pṛthayā sahitā munīndrairnārāyaṇāṇsramata āṇsu puraṃ svakīyam /
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ sutān ca pṛthayā sahitāḥ muni indraiḥ nārāyaṇa atas puram svakīyam

original: jagmustathaiva dhṛtarāṣṭrapuro munīndrāḥ vṛttaṃ samastamavadannanujaṃ mṛtaṃ ca / 14.55 /
analyzed: jagmuḥ tathā eva dhṛtarāṣṭra puras muni indrāḥ vṛttam samastam avadan anujam mṛtam ca

original: t ūṣṇīṃ sthite tu nṛpatau tanuje ca nadyāḥ kṣattaryutā'pta urumodamatīva pāpāḥ /
analyzed: t ūṣṇīm sthite tu nṛpatau tanuje ca nadyāḥ kṣattar yuta āpte urumodam atīva pāpāḥ

original: ūcuḥ suyodhanamukhāḥ saha saubalena pāṇḍormṛtiḥ kila purā tanayāḥ kva tasya / 14.56 /
analyzed: ūcuḥ suyodhana mukhāḥ saha saubalena pāṇḍoḥ mṛtiḥ kila purā tanayāḥ kva tasya  /

original: na kṣetrajā api mṛte pitari svakīyaiḥ samyaṅ niyogamanavāpya bhavāya yogyāḥ /
analyzed: na kṣetrajāḥ api mṛte pitari svakīyaiḥ samyak niyogam an avāpya bhavāya yogyāḥ

original: teṣāmitīritavaco'nu jagāda vāyurābhāṣya kauravagaṇān gaganastha eva / 14.57 /
analyzed: teṣām iti īrita vacaḥ nu jagāda vāyuḥ ābhāṣya kaurava gaṇān gagana sthaḥ eva

original: ete hi dharmamarudindrabhiṣagvarebhyo jātāḥ prajīvati pitaryurudhāmasārāḥ /
analyzed: ete hi dharma marut indra bhiṣaj varebhyaḥ jātāḥ prajīvati pitari uru dhāma sārāḥ

original: clx.śakyāṇsca naiva bhavatāṃ kvacidagrahāya nārāyaṇena satataṃ parirakṣit ā yat / 14.58 /
analyzed: na eva bhavatām kvacid agrahāya nārāyaṇena satatam parirakṣit ā yat

original: vāyoradṛśyavacanaṃ pariśaṅkamāneṣvāvirbabhūva bhagavān svayamabjanābhaḥ /
analyzed: vāyoḥ adṛśya vacanam pariśaṅkamāneṣu āvirbabhūva bhagavān svayam abjanābhaḥ

original: vyāsasvarūpa urusarvaguṇaikadeha ādāya tānagamadāṇsu ca pāṇḍugeham / 14.59 /
analyzed: vyāsa svarūpaḥ uru sarva guṇa eka dehaḥ ādāya ca pāṇḍu geham

original: tatsvīkṛteṣu sakalā api bhīṣmamukhyā vaicitravīryasahitāḥ paripūjya sarvān /
analyzed: tad svīkṛteṣu sakalāḥ api bhīṣma mukhyāḥ vaicitravīrya sahitāḥ paripūjya sarvān

original: kuntyā sahaiva jagṛhuḥ subhṛśaṃ tadā'rtā vaicitravīryatanayāḥ saha saubalena / 14.60 /
analyzed: kuntyā saha eva jagṛhuḥ su bhṛśam tadā ārtāḥ vaicitravīrya tanayāḥ saha saubalena

original: vaicitravīryatanayāḥ kṛpato mahāstrāṇyāpuśca pāṇḍutanayaiḥ saha sarvarājñām /
analyzed: vaicitravīrya tanayāḥ kṛpataḥ mahā astrāṇi āpuḥ ca pāṇḍu tanayaiḥ saha sarva rājñām

original: putrāṇsca tatra vividhā api bālaceṣṭāḥ kurvatsu vāyutanayena jitāḥ samastāḥ / 14.61 /
analyzed: putrān ca tatra vividhāḥ api bāla ceṣṭāḥ kurvatsu vāyu tanayena jitāḥ samastāḥ

original: pakvorubhojyaphalasannayanāya vṛkṣeṣvārūḍharājatanayānabhivīkṣya bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: pakva ūru bhojya phala sat nayanāya vṛkṣeṣu ārūḍha rāja tanayān abhivīkṣya bhīmaḥ

original: pādaprahāramuruvṛkṣatal . e pradāya sākaṃ phalairvinipatatsu phalānyabhuṅkta / 14.62 /
analyzed: pāda prahāram uruvṛkṣa tal pradāya sākam phalaiḥ vinipatatsu phalāni abhuṅkta  /

original: yuddhe niyuddha uta dhāvana utplave ca vāriplave ca sahitān nikhilān kumārān /
analyzed: yuddhe niyuddhe uta dhāvane utplave ca vāriplave ca sahitān nikhilān kumārān

original: eko jigāya tarasā paramāryakarmā viṣṇoḥ supūrṇasadanugrahataḥ sunityāt / 14.63 /
analyzed: ekaḥ jigāya tarasā parama ārya karmā viṣṇoḥ su pūrṇa sat anugrahataḥ su nityāt  /

original: sarvān pragṛhya vinimajjati vārimadhye śrāntān visṛjya hasati sma sa viṣṇupadyām /
analyzed: sarvān pragṛhya vinimajjati vāri madhye śrāntān visṛjya hasati sma sa viṣṇupadyām

original: sarvānudūhya ca kadācidurupravāhāṃ gaṅgāṃ sutārayati sārasupūrṇapauṃ syaḥ / 14.64 /
analyzed: sarvān udūhya ca kadācid uru pravāhām gaṅgām sutārayati sāra su pūrṇa paum syaḥ

original: dveṣaṃ hyṛte nahi harau tamasi praveśaḥ prāṇe ca tena jagatīmanu tau prapannau /
analyzed: dveṣam hi ṛte nahi harau tamasi praveśaḥ prāṇe ca tena jagatīm anu tau prapannau

original: tatkāraṇānyakurutāṃ paramau karāṃ si devadviṣāṃ satatavistṛtasādhupauṃ syau / 14.65 /
analyzed: tad kāraṇāni akurutām paramau karām deva dviṣām satata vistṛta sādhu paum

original: dṛṣṭvā'mitānyatha karāṃ si marutsutena nityaṃ kṛt āni tanayā nikhilāṇsca rājñām /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā amitāni atha marut sutena nityam tanayā rājñām

original: tasyāmitaṃ balamudīkṣya sadoruvṛddhadveṣā babhūvuratha mantramamantrayaṃ śca / 14.66 /
analyzed: tasya amitam balam udīkṣya sadā uru vṛddha dveṣāḥ babhūvuḥ atha mantram amantrayan śca

original: yeye hi tatra naradevasutāḥ surāṃ śāḥ prītiṃ parāṃ pavanaje nikhilā akurvan /
analyzed: ye ye hi tatra naradeva sutāḥ surām śāḥ prītim parām pavana je nikhilāḥ akurvan

original: t āṃ stān vihāya ditijā naradevavaṃ śajātā vicārya vadhaniścayamasya cakruḥ / 14.67 /
analyzed: vihāya ditijāḥ naradeva vam vicārya vadha niścayam asya cakruḥ  /

original: asmin hate vinihatā akhilāṇsca pārthāḥ śakyo balācca na nihantumayaṃ balāḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: asmin hate vinihatāḥ akhilān ca pārthāḥ śakyaḥ balāt ca na nihantum ayam bala āḍhyaḥ

original: chadmaprayogata imaṃ vinihatya vīryāt pārthaṃ nihatya nigal . e ca vidadhmahe'nyān / 14.68 /
analyzed: chadma prayogataḥ imam vinihatya vīryāt pārtham nihatya ca vidadhma henyān

original: evaṃ kṛte nihatakaṇṭakamasya rājyaṃ duryodhanasya hi bhavenna tato'nyathā syāt /
analyzed: evam kṛte nihata kaṇṭakam asya rājyam duryodhanasya hi bhavet na tatas nyathā syāt

original: asmin hate nipatite ca surendrasūnau śeṣā bhaveyurapi saubaliputradāsāḥ / 14.69 /
analyzed: asmin hate nipatite ca sura indra sūnau śeṣāḥ bhaveyuḥ api saubali putra dāsāḥ

original: clxi.evaṃ vicārya viṣamulbaṇamantakābhaṃ kṣīrodadhermathanajaṃ tapasā girīśāt /
analyzed: evam vicārya viṣam ulbaṇam antaka ābham kṣīrodadheḥ mathana jam tapasā girīśāt

original: śukreṇa labdhamamutaḥ subalātmajena prāptaṃ pratoṣya marutastanayāya cāduḥ / 14.70 /
analyzed: śukreṇa labdham amutas subala ātmajena prāptam pratoṣya marutaḥ tanayāya ca āduḥ  /

original: sammantrya rājatanayairdhṛtarāṣṭrajaistad dattaṃ svasūdamukhato'khilabhakṣyabhojye /
analyzed: sammantrya rāja tanayaiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra jaiḥ tat dattam sva sūda mukhataḥ khila bhakṣya bhojye

original: j ñātvā yuyutsugaditaṃ balavān sa bhīmo viṣṇoranugrahabalājjarayāñcakāra / 14.71 /
analyzed: ñātvā yuyutsu gaditam balavān sa bhīmaḥ viṣṇoḥ anugraha balāt jarayāñcakāra  /

original: jīrṇe viṣe kumatayaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ prāsādamāṇsu vidadhurharipādatoye /
analyzed: jīrṇe viṣe kumatayaḥ parama abhitaptāḥ vidadhuḥ hari pāda toye

original: j ñātvā yuyutsumukhataḥ svayamatra cānte suṣvāpa mārutiramā dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ / 14.72 /
analyzed: ñātvā yuyutsu mukhataḥ svayam atra ca ante suṣvāpa mārutiḥ ramā dhṛtarāṣṭra putraiḥ

original: doṣān prakāṇsayitumeva vicitravīryaputrātmajeṣu nṛvaraṃ pratisuptamīkṣya /
analyzed: doṣān prakāṇsayitum eva vicitravīrya putra ātmajeṣu nṛvaram pratisuptam īkṣya

original: baddhvā'bhimantraṇadṛḍhairayasā kṛtaistaṃ pāṇsairvicikṣipurude haripādajāyāḥ / 14.73 /
analyzed: baddhvā abhimantraṇa dṛḍhaiḥ ayasā kṛtaiḥ tam pāṇsaiḥ vicikṣipuḥ ude hari pāda jāyāḥ

original: tat koṭiyojanagabhīramudaṃ vigāhya bhīmo vijṛmbhaṇata eva vivṛścya pāṇsān /
analyzed: tat koṭi yojana gabhīra mudam vigāhya bhīmaḥ vijṛmbhaṇataḥ eva vivṛścya pāṇsān

original: uttīrya sajjanagaṇasya vidhāya harṣaṃ tasthāvanantaguṇaviṣṇusadātihārdaḥ / 14.74 /
analyzed: uttīrya sat jana gaṇasya vidhāya harṣam tasthau ananta guṇa viṣṇu sadā ati hārdaḥ

original: taṃ vīkṣya duṣṭamanaso'tivipannacittāḥ sammantrya bhūya urunāgagaṇānathāṣṭau /
analyzed: tam vīkṣya duṣṭa manasā uti vipanna cittāḥ sammantrya bhūyas uru nāga gaṇān atha aṣṭau

original: śukroktamantrabalataḥ pura āhvayitvā paścāt supañjaragatān pradaduḥ svasūte / 14.75 /
analyzed: śukra ukta mantra balataḥ puras āhvayitvā paścāt su pañjara gatān pradaduḥ sva sūte

original: duryodhanena pṛthumantrabalopahūtāṃ statsārathiḥ phaṇigaṇān pavanātmajasya /
analyzed: duryodhanena pṛthu mantra bala upahūtām stad sārathiḥ phaṇi gaṇān pavanātmajasya

original: suptasya vistṛta urasyamucad viśīrṇadantā babhūvuramumāṇsu vidaśya nāgāḥ / 14.76 /
analyzed: suptasya vistṛte urasi amucat viśīrṇa dantāḥ vidaśya nāgāḥ

original: kṣiptvā sudūramurunāgavarānathāṣṭau tadvaṃ śajān sa vinihatya pipīlikāvat /
analyzed: kṣiptvā su dūram uru nāga varān atha aṣṭau sa vinihatya pipīlikā vat

original: jaghne ca sūtamapahastata eva bhīmaḥ suṣvāpa pūrvavadanutthita eva talpāt / 14.77 /
analyzed: jaghne ca sūtam apahastataḥ eva bhīmaḥ suṣvāpa pūrvavat an utthitaḥ eva talpāt  /

original: tat tasya naijabalamapramayaṃ nirīkṣya sarve kṣitīśatanayā adhikaṃ viṣeduḥ /
analyzed: tat tasya naija balam apramayam nirīkṣya sarve kṣitīśa tanayāḥ adhikam viṣeduḥ

original: niśvāsato darśanādapi bhasma yeṣāṃ bhūyāsureva bhuvanāni ca te mṛṣā'san / 14.78 /
analyzed: niśvāsataḥ darśanāt api bhasma yeṣām bhūyāsuḥ eva bhuvanāni ca te mṛṣā āsan

original: dadbhirvidaśya na vikāramamuṣya kartuṃ śekurbhujaṅgamavarā api suprayatnāḥ /
analyzed: dadbhiḥ vidaśya na vikāram amuṣya kartum śekuḥ bhujaṅgama varāḥ api su prayatnāḥ

original: kasyāpi nedṛśabalaṃ śrutapūrvamāsīd dṛṣṭaṃ kimu sma tanaye'pi hiraṇyakasya / 14.79 /
analyzed: kasya api nā īdṛśa balam śruta pūrvam āsīt dṛṣṭam kimu sma tanaye pi hiraṇyakasya  /

original: svātmāvanārthamadhikāṃ stutimeva kṛtvā viṣṇoḥ sa daityatanayo hariṇā'vito'bhūt /
analyzed: sva ātma avana artham adhikām stutim eva kṛtvā viṣṇoḥ sa daitya tanayaḥ

original: natvaurasaṃ balamamuṣya sa kṛṣyate hi bhṛtyairbalāt sa pituraurasamasya vīryam / 14.80 /
analyzed: natvā aurasam balam amuṣya sa kṛṣyate hi bhṛtyaiḥ balāt sa pituḥ aurasam asya vīryam  /

original: naisargikapriyamimaṃ pravadanti viprā viṣṇornitāntamapi satyamidaṃ dhruvaṃ hi /
analyzed: naisargika priyam imam pravadanti viprāḥ viṣṇoḥ nitāntam api satyam idam dhruvam hi

original: naivānyathaurasabalaṃ bhavatīdṛśaṃ tadutsādya eṣa hariṇaiva sahaiṣa no'rthaḥ / 14.81 /
analyzed: na eva anyathā aurasa balam bhavati īdṛśam tat utsādyaḥ eṣa hariṇā eva saha eṣa nā ūrthaḥ  /

original: clxii.kṛṣṇaḥ kilaiṣa ca hariryaduṣu prajātaḥ so'syā'śrayaḥ kuruta tasya bahu pratīpam /
analyzed: kila eṣa ca hariḥ yaduṣu prajātaḥ saḥ usya āśrayaḥ kuruta tasya bahu pratīpam

original: sammantrya caivamatipāpatamā narendraputrā hareśca bahu cakruratha pratīpam / 14.82 /
analyzed: sammantrya ca evam atipāpatamāḥ narendra putrāḥ hareḥ ca bahu cakruḥ atha pratīpam

original: taiḥ preritā nṛpatayaḥ pitaraśca teṣāṃ sākaṃ bṛhadrathasutena hareḥ sakāṇsam /
analyzed: taiḥ preritāḥ nṛpatayaḥ pitaraḥ ca teṣām sākam bṛhadratha sutena hareḥ sa kāṇsam

original: yuddhāya jagmuramunā'ṣṭadaśeṣu yuddheṣvatyantabhagnabaladarpamadā nivṛtt āḥ / 14.83 /
analyzed: yuddhāya jagmuḥ amunā aṣṭadaśeṣu yuddheṣu atyanta bhagna bala darpa madāḥ

original: tenā'gṛhītagajavājirathā nitāntaṃ śastraiḥ parikṣatatanūbhiralaṃ vamantaḥ /
analyzed: tena āgṛhīta gaja vāji rathāḥ nitāntam śastraiḥ parikṣata tanūbhiḥ alam vamantaḥ

original: raktaṃ viśastrakavacadhvajavājisūtāḥ srastāmbarāḥ ślathitamūrddhajino nivṛtt āḥ / 14.84 /
analyzed: raktam viśastra kavaca dhvaja vāji sūtāḥ srasta ambarāḥ ślathita mūrddha jinaḥ

original: evaṃ bṛhadrathasuto'pi suśocyarūpa ārto yayau bahuśa eva puraṃ svakīyam /
analyzed: evam bṛhadratha sutaḥ upi su śocya rūpaḥ ārtaḥ yayau bahuśas eva puram svakīyam

original: kṛṣṇena pūrṇabalavīryaguṇena mukto jīvetyatīva vijitaḥ śvasitāvaśeṣaḥ / 14.85 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇena pūrṇa bala vīrya guṇena muktaḥ jīva iti atīva vijitaḥ śvasita avaśeṣaḥ  /

original: evaṃ gateṣu bahuśo natakandhareṣu rājasvajo'pi madhurāṃ svapurīṃ praviśya /
analyzed: evam gateṣu bahuśas nata kandhareṣu rāja sva jopi madhurām sva purīm praviśya

original: rāmeṇa sārdhamakhilairyadubhiḥ sameto reme ramāpatiracintyabalo jayaśrīḥ / 14.86 /
analyzed: rāmeṇa sārdham akhilaiḥ yadubhiḥ sametaḥ reme ramāpatiḥ acintya balaḥ jaya śrīḥ

original: vyarthodyamāḥ punarapi sma sadhārtarāṣṭrā bhīmaṃ nihantumuruyatnamakurvatājñāḥ /
analyzed: vyartha udyamāḥ punar api sma sa dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ bhīmam nihantum uru yatnam akurvata ājñāḥ

original: rājñāṃ sutāstamakhilaṃ sa mṛṣaiva kṛtvā cakre jayāya ca diśāṃ balavān prayatnam / 14.87 /
analyzed: rājñām sutāḥ tam akhilam sa mṛṣā eva kṛtvā cakre jayāya ca diśām balavān prayatnam

original: prācīṃ diśaṃ prathamameva jigāya paścād yāmyāṃ jaleśaparipālitayā sahānyām /
analyzed: prācīm diśam prathamam eva jigāya paścāt yāmyām jaleśa paripālitayā saha anyām

original: yau tau purātanadaśānanakumbhakarṇau mātṛṣvasātanayatāṃ ca gatau jigāya / 14.88 /
analyzed: yau tau purātana daśānana kumbhakarṇau mātṛṣvasā tanaya tām ca gatau jigāya  /

original: pūrvastayorhi damaghoṣasutaḥ prajātaḥ prāhuśca yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ śiśupālanāmnā /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ tayoḥ hi damaghoṣa sutaḥ prajātaḥ prāhuḥ ca yam nṛpatayaḥ śiśupāla nāmnā

original: anyaṃ vadanti ca karūṇsanṛpaṃ tathā'nyamātṛṣvasātanayameva ca dantavakram / 14.89 /
analyzed: anyam vadanti ca karūṇsa nṛpam tathā anya mātṛṣvasā tanayam eva ca dantavakram

original: jitvaiva tāvapi jigāya ca pauṇḍrakākhyaṃ śauraiḥ sutaṃ sutamajaidatha bhīṣmakasya /
analyzed: jitvā eva tau api jigāya ca pauṇḍraka ākhyam śauraiḥ sutam sutam ajait atha bhīṣmakasya

original: yaḥ pūrvamāsa ditijo narahelvalākhyo rugmīti nāma ca babhūva sa kuṇḍineśaḥ / 14.90 /
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvam āsa ditijaḥ narahelvala ākhyaḥ rugmī iti nāma ca babhūva sa kuṇḍineśaḥ

original: bhāgeta eva tanayasya sa eva vahnernāmnā ṇsuceḥ sa tu pitā'sya hi mitrabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: bhāgetaḥ eva tanayasya saḥ eva vahneḥ nāmnā ṇsuceḥ sa tu pitā asya hi mitra bhāgaḥ

original: rāhvaṃ śayuk tadanujau krathakaiśikākhyau bhāgau tathā'gnisutayoḥ pavamānaśundhyoḥ / 14.91 /
analyzed: rāhvam tad anujau kratha kaiśika ākhyau bhāgau tathā agni sutayoḥ pavamāna śundhyoḥ  /

original: bandhornijasya tu balaṃ suparīkṣamāṇaḥ śalyo'pi tena yuyudhe vijitastathaiva /
analyzed: bandhoḥ nijasya tu balam su parīkṣamāṇaḥ śalyaḥ upi tena yuyudhe vijitaḥ tathā eva

original: bhīmo jigāya yudhi vīramathaikalavyaṃ sarve nṛpāṇsca vijitā amunaivameva / 14.92 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ jigāya yudhi vīram atha ekalavyam sarve nṛpān ca vijitāḥ amunā evam eva

original: tadbāhuvīryaparipālita indrasūnuḥ śeṣān nṛpāṃ śca samajaid balavānayatnāt /
analyzed: tad bāhu vīrya paripālitaḥ indrasūnuḥ śeṣān nṛpān śca samajait balavān ayatnāt

original: clxiii.sālvaṃ ca haṃ saḍibhakau ca vijitya bhīmo nāgāhvayaṃ puramagāt sahito'rjunena / 14.93 /
analyzed: clxiiisālvam ca haṃ sa ḍibhakau ca vijitya bhīmaḥ nāgāhvayam puram agāt sahita urjunena  /

original: tadbāhuvīryamatha vīkṣya mumoda dharmasūnuḥ samātṛyamajo viduraḥ sabhīṣmaḥ /
analyzed: tad bāhu vīryam atha vīkṣya mumoda dharmasūnuḥ sa mātṛ yamajaḥ viduraḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ

original: anye ca sajjanagaṇāḥ sahapaurarāṣṭrāḥ śrutvaiva sarvayadavo jahṛṣurnitāntam / 14.94 /
analyzed: anye ca sat jana gaṇāḥ saha paura rāṣṭrāḥ śrutvā eva sarva yadavaḥ jahṛṣuḥ nitāntam

original: kṛṣṇaḥ suyodhanamukhākramamāmbikeyaṃ j ānan svaputravaśavartinameva gatvā /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ suyodhana mukha ākramam āmbikeyam ānan sva putra vaśa vartinam eva gatvā

original: śvāphalkino gṛhamamuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraśāntyai gantuṃ dideśa gajanāma puraṃ pareśaḥ / 14.95 /
analyzed: śvāphalkinaḥ gṛham amum dhṛtarāṣṭra śāntyai gantum dideśa gaja nāma puram para īśaḥ  /

original: so'yād gajāhvayamamutra vicitravīryaputreṇa bhīṣmasahitaiḥ kurubhiḥ samastaiḥ /
analyzed: gajāhvayam amutra vicitravīrya putreṇa bhīṣma sahitaiḥ kurubhiḥ samastaiḥ

original: sampūjitaḥ katipayānavasacca māsān jñātuṃ hi pāṇḍuṣu manaḥ prasṛtiṃ kurūṇām / 14.96 /
analyzed: sampūjitaḥ katipayān avasat ca māsān jñātum hi pāṇḍuṣu manaḥ prasṛtim kurūṇām  /

original: j ñātvā sa kuntividuroktita ātmanā ca mitrārimadhyamajanāṃ stanayeṣu pāṇḍoḥ /
analyzed: j ñātvā sa kunti vidura uktitaḥ ātmanā ca mitra ari madhyama janām stanayeṣu pāṇḍoḥ

original: vijñāya putravaśagaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭramañjaḥ sāmnaiva bhedasahitena jagāda vidvān / 14.97 /
analyzed: vijñāya putra vaśagam dhṛtarāṣṭram añjas sāmnā eva bheda sahitena jagāda vidvān

original: putreṣu pāṇḍutanayeṣu casāmyavṛttiḥ kīrtiṃ ca dharmamurumeṣi tathā'rthakāmau /
analyzed: putreṣu pāṇḍu tanayeṣu ca sāmya vṛttiḥ kīrtim ca dharmam urumeṣi tathā artha kāmau

original: prītiṃ parāṃ tvayi kariṣyati vāsudevaḥ sākaṃ samastayadubhiḥ sahitaḥ surādyaiḥ / 14.98 /

original: dharmārthakāmasahitāṃ ca vimuktimeṣi tatprītitaḥ suniyataṃ viparītavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: dharma artha kāma sahitām ca vimuktim eṣi tad prītitaḥ su niyatam viparīta vṛttiḥ

original: yāsyeva rājavara tatphalavaiparītyamitthaṃ vaco nigaditaṃ tava kārṣṇamadya / 14.99 /
analyzed: yā asi eva rāja vara tad phala vaiparītyam ittham vacaḥ nigaditam tava kārṣṇam adya

original: itthaṃ samastakurumadhya upāttavākyo rājā'pi putravaśago vacanaṃ jagāda /
analyzed: ittham samasta kuru madhye upātta vākyaḥ rājā api putra vaśagaḥ vacanam jagāda

original: sarvaṃ vaśe bhagavato na vayaṃ svatantrā bhūbhārasaṃ hṛtikṛte sa ihāvatīrṇaḥ / 14.100 /
analyzed: sarvam vaśe bhagavataḥ na vayam svatantrāḥ bhū bhārasam hṛti kṛte saḥ iha avatīrṇaḥ

original: etanniśamya vacanaṃ sa tu yādavo'sya jñātvā mano'sya kaluṣaṃ tava naiva putrāḥ /
analyzed: etat niśamya vacanam sa tu yādavaḥ sya jñātvā manaḥ sya kaluṣam tava nā eva putrāḥ

original: ityūcivān saha maruttanayārjunābhyāṃ prāyāt purīṃ ca sahadevayutaḥ svakīyām / 14.101 /
analyzed: iti ūcivān saha marut tanaya arjunābhyām prāyāt purīm ca sahadeva yutaḥ svakīyām

original: j ñānaṃ tu bhāgavatamuttamamātmayogyaṃ bhīmārjunau bhagavataḥ samavāpya kṛṣṇāt /
analyzed: j ñānam tu bhāgavatam uttamam ātma yogyam bhīma arjunau bhagavataḥ samavāpya kṛṣṇāt

original: tatroṣaturbhagavatā saha yuktaceṣṭau sampūjitau yadubhiruttamakarmasārau / 14.102 /
analyzed: tatra ūṣatuḥ bhagavatā saha yukta ceṣṭau sampūjitau yadubhiḥ uttama karma sārau

analyzed: pratyudyamaḥ bhagavatā api bhavet gadāyāḥ śikṣā yadā bhagavatā kriyate na ca imam

original: kuryāditi sma bhagavatsamanujñayaiva rāmādaśikṣadurugāyapuraḥ sa bhīmaḥ / 14.103 /
analyzed: kuryāt iti sma bhagavat samanujñayā eva rāmāt aśikṣat urugāya puraḥ sa bhīmaḥ  /

original: rāmo'pi śikṣitamarīndradharāt puro'sya bhīme dadāvatha varāṇi hareravāpa /
analyzed: rāmaḥ upi śikṣita marīndra dharāt puras usya bhīme dadau atha varāṇi hareḥ avāpa

original: astrāṇi śakratanayaḥ sahadeva āra nītiṃ tathoddhavamukhāt sakalāmudārām / 14.104 /
analyzed: astrāṇi śakratanayaḥ sahadevaḥ āra nītim tathā uddhava mukhāt sakalām udārām

original: clxiv.kṛṣṇo'tha caupagavimuttamanītiyuktaṃ sampreṣayannidamuvāca ha gokulāya /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ utha ca aupagavim uttama nīti yuktam sampreṣayan idam uvāca ha gokulāya

original: duḥkhaṃ vināṇsaya vacobhirare madīyairnandādināṃ virahajaṃ mama cā'śu yāhi / 14.105 /
analyzed: duḥkham vacobhiḥ are madīyaiḥ nanda ādinām viraha jam mama ca āśu yāhi  /

original: matto viyoga iha kasyacidasti naiva yasmādahaṃ tanubhṛt āṃ nihato'ntareva /
analyzed: mattaḥ viyogaḥ iha kasyacid asti nā eva yasmāt aham tanubhṛt ām

original: nāhaṃ manuṣya iti kutraca vo'stu buddhirbrahmaiva nirmalatamaṃ pravadanti māṃ hi / 14.106 /
analyzed: na aham manuṣyaḥ iti kutra ca voḥ tu buddhiḥ brahma eva nirmalatamam pravadanti mām hi

original: pūrvaṃ yadā hyajagaro nijagāra nandaṃ sarve na śekuratha tatpravimokṣaṇāya /
analyzed: pūrvam yadā hi ajagaraḥ nijagāra nandam sarve na śekuḥ atha tad pravimokṣaṇāya

analyzed: mad pādasam sparśataḥ sa tadā ati divyaḥ vidyādharaḥ tat uditam nikhilam smarantu

analyzed: pūrvam sa rūpa madataḥ prajahāsa viprān nityam tapaḥ kṛśatara āṅgirasaḥ virūpān

original: taiḥ prāpitaḥ sapadi so'jagaratvameva matto nijāṃ tanumavāpya jagāda nandam / 14.108 /
analyzed: taiḥ prāpitaḥ sapadi saḥ ujagara tvam eva mattaḥ nijām tanum avāpya jagāda nandam  /

original: nāyaṃ naro harirayaṃ paramaḥ parebhyo viśveśvaraḥ sakalakāraṇa ātmatantraḥ /
analyzed: na ayam naraḥ hariḥ ayam paramaḥ parebhyaḥ viśveśvaraḥ sakala kāraṇaḥ ātmatantraḥ

analyzed: vijñāya ca enam urusam sṛtitaḥ vimuktāḥ yānti asya munayaḥ virāgāḥ

analyzed: nandam yadā ca jagṛhe varuṇasya dūtaḥ tatra api mām jalapateḥ gṛham yātam

analyzed: sampūjya vāripatiḥ āha vimucya nandam na ayam sutaḥ tava pumān paramaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ  /

original: sandarśito nanu mayaiva vikuṇṭhaloko gojīvināṃ sthitirapi pravarā madīyā /
analyzed: sandarśitaḥ nanu mayā eva vikuṇṭha lokaḥ go jīvinām sthitiḥ api pravarā madīyā

analyzed: mānuṣya buddhim apanetum aje mayi sma tasmāt mayi sthitim avāpya śamam prayāntu

analyzed: śrutvā uddhavaḥ nigaditam paramasya pum saḥ vṛndāvanam prati yayau vacanaiḥ ca tasya

original: duḥkhaṃ vyapohya nikhilaṃ paśujīvanānāmāyāt punaścaraṇasannidhimeva viṣṇoḥ / 14.112 /
analyzed: duḥkham vyapohya nikhilam paśu jīvanānām āyāt punar caraṇa sannidhim eva viṣṇoḥ  /

analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

uddhavapratiyānaṃ nḸama caturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: uddhava pratiyānam caturdaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: clxv.(pāṇḍavaśāstrābhyāsaḥ )
analyzed: clxv pāṇḍava śāstra abhyāsaḥ

original: atha pañcadaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha pañcadaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

analyzed: om evam praśāsati jagant puruṣottame smin bhīma arjunau tu sahadeva yutau anujñām

original: kṛṣṇādavāpya varṣatritayāt puraṃ svamājagmaturharisutena viśokanāmnā / 15.1 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇāt avāpya varṣa tritayāt puram svam ājagmatuḥ hari sutena viśoka nāmnā

analyzed: sairandhrikodara bhavaḥ sa tu nāradasya śiṣyaḥ vṛkodara rathasya babhūva yantā

analyzed: tam pañcarātra vidam āpya suṣārathim sa bhīmaḥ mumoda punar āpa para ātma vidyām

analyzed: vyāsāt parātmataḥ uvāca ca phalguna ādi daiveṣu sarva vijayī para vidyayā eṣaḥ

analyzed: sarvān abhāgavata śāstra pathān vidhūya mārgam cakāra sa tu vaiṣṇavam eva śubhram

original: krīḍārthameva vijigāya tathobhayātmayuddhe balaṃ ca karavākprabhave'mitātmā / 15.4 /
analyzed: krīḍā artham eva vijigāya tathā ubhaya ātma yuddhe balam ca kara vāc prabhava imita ātmā

original: nityaprabhūtasuśubhapratibho'pi viṣṇoḥ śrutvā parāṃ punarapi pratibhāmavāpa /
analyzed: nitya prabhūta su śubha pratibhaḥ upi viṣṇoḥ śrutvā parām punar api pratibhām avāpa

original: ko nāma viṣṇvanupajīvaka āsa yasya nityāṇsrayādabhihitā'pi ramā sadā ṇsrīḥ / 15.5 /
analyzed: kaḥ nāma viṣṇu anupajīvakaḥ āsa yasya ramā sadā
