analyzed: vyāsāt avāpa paramātma sa tattva vidyām dharmātmajaḥ api satatam bhagavat prapannāḥ

original: te pañca pāṇḍutanayā mumudurnitāntaṃ saddharmacāriṇa urukramaśikṣit ārthāḥ / 15.6 /
analyzed: te pañca pāṇḍu tanayāḥ mumuduḥ nitāntam saddharma cāriṇaḥ urukrama śikṣit ārthāḥ

original: yadā bharadvājasutastvasañcayī pratigrahojjho nijadharmavartī /
analyzed: yadā bharadvāja sutaḥ tu asañcayī pratigraha ujjhaḥ nija dharma vartī

original: drauṇistadā dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sametya krīḍan payaḥ pātumupaiti sadma / 15.7 /
analyzed: drauṇiḥ tadā dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sametya krīḍan payaḥ pātum upaiti sadma

original: tasmai mātā piṣṭamāloḍya pātuṃ dadāti pītvaiti tadeṣa nityam /
analyzed: tasmai mātā piṣṭam āloḍya pātum dadāti pītvā eti tat eṣa nityam

original: pītakṣīrān dhārtarāṣṭrān sa caitya mayā pītaṃ kṣīramityāha nityam / 15.8 /
analyzed: pīta kṣīrān dhārtarāṣṭrān sa ca etya mayā pītam kṣīram iti āha nityam

original: nṛtyantamenaṃ pāyayāmāsurete payaḥ kadācid rasamasya so'vet /
analyzed: nṛtyantam enam pāyayāmāsuḥ ete payaḥ kadācid rasam asya saḥ uvet

original: punaḥ kadācit sa tu mātṛdatte piṣṭe nedaṃ kṣīramityārurāva / 15.9 /
analyzed: punar kadācid sa tu mātṛ datte piṣṭe na idam kṣīram iti ārurāva

original: dṛṣṭvā ruvantaṃ sutamātmajasya snehānniyatyaiva janārdanasya /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ruvantam sutam ātmajasya snehāt niyatyā eva janārdanasya

original: sampreritaḥ kṛpayā cā'rtarūpo droṇo yayāvārjayituṃ tadā gām / 15.10 /
analyzed: sampreritaḥ kṛpayā ca ārta rūpaḥ droṇaḥ yayau ārjayitum tadā gām

original: pratigrahāt sannivṛttaḥ sa rāmaṃ yayau na viṣṇorhi bhavet pratigrahaḥ /
analyzed: pratigrahāt san nivṛttaḥ sa rāmam yayau na viṣṇoḥ hi bhavet pratigrahaḥ

original: doṣāya yasmāt sa pitā'khilasya svāmī guruḥ paramaṃ daivataṃ ca / 15.11 /
analyzed: doṣāya yasmāt sa pitā akhilasya svāmī guruḥ paramam daivatam ca

original: clxvi.dṛṣṭvaivainaṃ j āmadagnyo'pyacintayad droṇaṃ kartuṃ kṣitibhārāpanode /
analyzed: clxvi dṛṣṭvā eva enam āmadagnyaḥ api acintayat droṇam kartum kṣiti bhāra apanode

original: hetuṃ surāṇāṃ narayonijānāṃ hantā cāyaṃ syāt saha putreṇa ceti / 15.12 /
analyzed: hetum surāṇām nara yoni jānām hantā ca ayam syāt saha putreṇa ca iti

original: teṣāṃ vṛddhiḥ syāt pāṇḍavārthe hatānāṃ mokṣe'pi saukhyasya na santatiśca /
analyzed: teṣām vṛddhiḥ syāt pāṇḍava arthe hatānām mokṣe api saukhyasya na santatiḥ ca

original: yogyā surāṇāṃ kalijā supāpāḥ prāyo yasmāt kalijāḥ sambhavanti / 15.13 /
analyzed: yogyā surāṇām kali jā su pāpāḥ prāyas yasmāt kali jāḥ sambhavanti  /

original: na devānāmāṇsataṃ pūruṣā hi santānajāḥ prāyaśaḥ pāpayogyāḥ /
analyzed: na devānām āṇsatam pūruṣāḥ hi santāna jāḥ prāyaśas pāpa yogyāḥ

original: nākāraṇāt santaterapyabhāvo yogyaḥ surāṇāṃ sadamogharetasām / 15.14 /
analyzed: na akāraṇāt santateḥ api abhāvaḥ yogyaḥ surāṇām sat amogha retasām

original: avyucchinne sakalānāṃ surāṇāṃ tantau kalirno bhavitā kathañcit /
analyzed: avyucchinne sakalānām surāṇām tantau kaliḥ naḥ bhavitā kathañcid

original: tasmādutsādyāḥ sarva ete surāṃ śā etena sākaṃ tanayena vīrāḥ / 15.15 /
analyzed: tasmāt utsādyāḥ sarve ete surām śāḥ etena sākam tanayena vīrāḥ

original: evaṃ vicintyāpratimaḥ sa bhārgavo babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśociṣā girā /
analyzed: evam vicintya apratimaḥ sa bhārgavaḥ babhāṣa īṣat smita śociṣā girā

original: anantaśaktiḥ sakaleśvaro'pi tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ nādya vittaṃ mamāsti / 15.16 /
analyzed: ananta śaktiḥ sakala īśvaraḥ upi tyaktam sarvam na adya vittam mama asti

original: ātmā vidyā ṇsastrametāvadasti teṣāṃ madhye rucitaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa /
analyzed: ātmā vidyā ṇsastram etāvat asti teṣām madhye rucitam tvam gṛhāṇa

original: uktaḥ sa itthaṃ pravicintya vipro jagāda kastvadgrahaṇe samarthaḥ / 15.17 /
analyzed: uktaḥ saḥ ittham pravicintya vipraḥ jagāda kaḥ tvad grahaṇe samarthaḥ  /

original: sarveśitā sarvaparaḥ svatantrastvameva ko'nyaḥ sadṛśastaveśa /
analyzed: sarva īśitā sarva paraḥ svatantraḥ tvam eva kaḥ nyaḥ sadṛśaḥ tava īśa

original: svāmyaṃ tavecchan pratiyātyadho hi yasmānnacotthātumalaṃ kadācit / 15.18 /
analyzed: svāmyam tava icchan pratiyāti adhas hi yasmāt na ca utthātum alam kadācid

original: sarvottamasyeśa tavoccaśastraiḥ kāryaṃ kimasmākamanudbalānām /
analyzed: sarva uttamasya īśa tava ucca śastraiḥ kāryam kim asmākam anudbalānām

original: vidyaiva deyā bhavatā tato'ja sarvaprakāṇsinyacalā susūkṣmā / 15.19 /
analyzed: vidyā eva deyā bhavatā tatoja sarva prakāṇsinī acalā su sūkṣmā

original: itīritastattvavidyādikāḥ sa vidyāḥ sarvāḥ pradadau sāstraśastrāḥ /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ tattva vidyā ādikāḥ sa vidyāḥ sarvāḥ pradadau sa astra śastrāḥ

original: abdadviṣaṭkena samāpya tāḥ sa yayau sakhāyaṃ drupadaṃ mahātmā / 15.20 /
analyzed: abda dvi ṣaṭkena samāpya tāḥ sa yayau sakhāyam drupadam mahātmā

original: dāne'rddharājyasya hi tatpratijñāṃ saṃ smṛtya pūrvāmupayātaṃ sakhāyam /
analyzed: dāna īrddha rājyasya hi tat pratijñām sam smṛtya pūrvām upayātam sakhāyam

original: sakhā tavāsmīti tadodito'pi jagāda vākyaṃ drupado'tidarpāt / 15.21 /
analyzed: sakhā tava asmi iti tadā uditaḥ upi jagāda vākyam drupada uti darpāt

original: na nirdhano rājasakho bhaveta yatheṣṭato gaccha vipreti daivāt /
analyzed: na nirdhanaḥ rāja sakhaḥ bhaveta yatheṣṭataḥ gaccha vipra iti daivāt

original: itīritasyā'śu babhūva kopo jitendriyasyāpi munerharīcchayā / 15.22 /
analyzed: iti īritasya āśu babhūva kopaḥ jita indriyasya api muneḥ hari icchayā

original: pratigrahāt sannivṛttena so'yaṃ mayā prāpto matpituḥ śiṣyakatvāt /
analyzed: pratigrahāt sannivṛttena saḥ uyam mayā prāptaḥ mad pituḥ śiṣyaka tvāt

original: clxvii.pituḥ śiṣyo hyātmaśiṣyo bhaveta śiṣyasyārthaḥ svīya eveti matvā / 15.23 /
analyzed: clxvii pituḥ śiṣyaḥ hi ātma śiṣyaḥ bhaveta śiṣyasya arthaḥ svīyaḥ eva iti matvā

original: so'yaṃ pāpo māmavajñāya mūḍho duṣṭaṃ vaco'śrāvayadasya darpam /
analyzed: saḥ yam pāpaḥ mām avajñāya mūḍhaḥ duṣṭam vacaḥ śrāvayat asya darpam

original: haniṣya ityeva matiṃ nidhāya yayau kurūñchiṣyatāṃ netumetān / 15.24 /
analyzed: haniṣye iti eva matim nidhāya yayau kurūn śiṣya tām netum etān

original: pratigrahād vinivṛttasya cārthaḥ syācchiṣyebhyaḥ kauravebhyo mamātra /
analyzed: pratigrahāt vinivṛttasya ca arthaḥ syāt śiṣyebhyaḥ kauravebhyaḥ mama atra

original: evaṃ manvānaḥ krīḍataḥ pāṇḍaveyān sadhārtarāṣṭrān purabāhyato'khyat / 15.25 /
analyzed: evam manvānaḥ krīḍataḥ pāṇḍaveyān sa dhārtarāṣṭrān

original: vikrīḍato dharmasūnostadaiva sahāṅgulīyena ca kanduko'patat /
analyzed: vikrīḍataḥ dharmasūnoḥ tadā eva saha aṅgulīyena ca

original: kūpe na śekuḥ sahitāḥ kumārā uddhartumetaṃ pavanātmajo'vadat / 15.26 /
analyzed: kūpe na śekuḥ sahitāḥ kumārāḥ uddhartum etam pavanātmajaḥ vadat

original: niṣpatya coddhṛtya samutpatiṣye kūpādamuṣmād bhṛśanīcādapi sma /
analyzed: niṣpatya ca uddhṛtya samutpatiṣye kūpāt amuṣmāt bhṛśa nīcāt api sma

original: sakandukāṃ mudrikāṃ paśyatādya sarve kumārā iti vīryasaṃ śrayāt / 15.27 /
analyzed: sa kandukām mudrikām paśyata adya sarve kumārāḥ iti vīrya sam śrayāt

original: tadā kumārānavadat sa vipro dhigastrabāhyāṃ bhavatāṃ pravṛttim /
analyzed: tadā kumārān avadat sa vipraḥ dhik astra bāhyām bhavatām pravṛttim

original: j ātāḥ kule bharatānāṃ na vittha divyāni cāstrāṇi surārcitāni / 15.28 /
analyzed: j ātāḥ kule bharatānām na vittha divyāni ca astrāṇi sura arcitāni

original: itīritā astravidaṃ kumārā vijñāya vipraṃ surapūjyapautram /
analyzed: iti īritāḥ astra vidam kumārāḥ vijñāya vipram sura pūjya pautram

original: samprārthayāmāsurathoddhṛtiṃ prati pradhānamudrāyutakandukasya / 15.29 /
analyzed: samprārthayāmāsuḥ atha uddhṛtim prati pradhāna mudrā ayuta kandukasya

original: sa cā'śviṣīkābhirathottarottaraṃ samprāsya divyāstrabalena kandukam /
analyzed: sa ca aśva iṣīkābhiḥ atha uttarottaram samprāsya divya astra balena kandukam

original: uddhṛtya mudroddharaṇārthinaḥ punarjagāda bhuktirmama kalpyatāmiti / 15.30 /
analyzed: uddhṛtya mudrā uddharaṇa arthinaḥ punar jagāda bhuktiḥ mama kalpyatām iti

original: yatheṣṭavittāṇsanapānamasya dharmātmajaḥ pratijajñe suśīghram /
analyzed: yathā iṣṭa vittāṇsana pānam asya dharmātmajaḥ pratijajñe su śīghram

original: tathaiva tenoddhṛtamaṅgulīyaṃ trivargamukhyātmajavākyato'nu / 15.31 /
analyzed: tathā eva tena uddhṛtam aṅgulīyam trivarga mukhya ātmaja vākyataḥ nu

original: papracchurenaṃ sahitāḥ kumārāḥ ko'sīti so'pyāha pitāmaho vaḥ /
analyzed: papracchuḥ enam sahitāḥ kumārāḥ kaḥ asi iti saḥ upi āha pitāmahaḥ vaḥ

original: vakteti te dudruvurāṇsu bhīṣmaṃ droṇo'yamityeva sa tāṃ stadoce / 15.32 /
analyzed: vaktā iti te dudruvuḥ āṇsu bhīṣmam droṇaḥ yam iti eva sa tām

original: na rājagehaṃ sa kadācideti tenādṛṣṭaḥ sa kumāraiḥ purā'taḥ /
analyzed: na rāja geham sa kadācid eti tena adṛṣṭaḥ sa kumāraiḥ purā atas

original: bhīṣmo vidyāstena sahaiva cintayannastraprāptiṃ tasya śuśrāva rāmāt / 15.33 /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ vidyāḥ tena saha eva cintayan astra prāptim tasya śuśrāva rāmāt

original: śrutvā vṛddhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ dvijaṃ taṃ mahāstravidyāmapi tāṃ mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā vṛddham kṛṣṇa varṇam dvijam tam mahā astra vidyām api tām mahāmatiḥ

original: droṇaṃ j ñātvā tasya śiṣyatva etān dadau kumārāṃ statra gatvā svayaṃ ca / 15.34 /
analyzed: droṇam j ñātvā tasya śiṣya tve etān dadau kumārān tatra gatvā svayam ca

original: clxviii.droṇo'tha tānavadad yo madiṣṭaṃ kartuṃ pratijñāṃ prathamaṃ karoti /
analyzed: droṇa utha tān avadat yaḥ mad iṣṭam kartum pratijñām prathamam karoti

original: taṃ dhanvināṃ pravaraṃ sādhayiṣya ityarjunastāmakarot pratijñām / 15.35 /
analyzed: tam dhanvinām pravaram sādhayiṣye iti arjunaḥ tām akarot pratijñām

original: unmādanādīni sa veda kṛṣṇādastrāṇyanāpatsu na tāni muñcet /
analyzed: unmādana ādīni sa veda kṛṣṇāt astrāṇi anāpatsu na tāni muñcet

original: ityājñayā keśavasyāparāṇi prayogayogyāni sadecchati sma / 15.36 /
analyzed: iti ājñayā keśavasya aparāṇi prayoga yogyāni sadā icchati sma

original: bhīṣmādibhirbhavitā saṅgaro nastadā nāhaṃ gurubhirnityayoddhā /
analyzed: bhīṣma ādibhiḥ bhavitā saṅgaraḥ naḥ tadā na aham gurubhiḥ nitya yoddhā

original: bhaveyamekaḥ phalguno'strajña eṣāṃ nivārakaścenmama dharmalābhaḥ / 15.37 /
analyzed: bhaveyam ekaḥ phalguna ustra jñaḥ eṣām nivārakaḥ ced mama dharma lābhaḥ

original: na buddhipūrvaṃ vara indirāpateranyatra me grāhya itaśca jiṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: na buddhi pūrvam varaḥ indirā pateḥ anyatra me grāhyaḥ itas ca jiṣṇuḥ

original: karotu gurvarthamiti sma cintayan bhīmaḥ pratijñāṃ na cakāra tatra / 15.38 /
analyzed: karotu guru artham iti sma cintayan bhīmaḥ pratijñām na cakāra tatra

original: tatpreritenārjunena pratijñā kṛt ā yadā vipravarastataḥ param /
analyzed: tad preritena arjunena pratijñā ā yadā vipra varaḥ tatas param

original: snehaṃ nitāntaṃ surarājasūnau kṛtvā mahāstrāṇi dadau sa tasya / 15.39 /
analyzed: sneham nitāntam surarāja sūnau kṛtvā mahā astrāṇi dadau sa tasya

original: sa pakṣapātaṃ ca cakāra tasmin karoti cāsyorutarāṃ praśaṃ sām /
analyzed: sa pakṣapātam ca cakāra tasmin karoti ca asya urutarām praśam sām

original: rahasyavidyāṇsca dadāti tasya nānyasya kasyāpi tathā kathañcit / 15.40 /
analyzed: rahasya vidyān ca dadāti tasya na anyasya kasya api tathā kathaṃcid  /

original: bhīmaḥ samastaṃ pratibhābalena jānan snehaṃ tvadvitīyaṃ kaniṣṭhe /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ samastam pratibhā balena jānan sneham tu advitīyam kaniṣṭhe

original: droṇasya kṛtvā sakalāstravedinaṃ kartuṃ pārthaṃ nārjunavaccakāra / 15.41 /
analyzed: droṇasya kṛtvā sakala astra vedinam kartum pārtham na arjuna vat cakāra

original: naivātiyatnena dadarśa lakṣaṃ śuśrūṣāyāṃ pārthamagre karoti /
analyzed: na eva ati yatnena dadarśa lakṣam śuśrūṣāyām pārtham agre karoti

original: svabāhuvīryād bhagavatprasādānnihanmi śatrūn kimanena ceti / 15.42 /
analyzed: sva bāhu vīryāt bhagavat prasādāt nihanmi śatrūn kim anena ca iti

original: tadā samīyuḥ sakalāḥ kṣitīśaputrā droṇāt sakalāstrāṇyavāptum /
analyzed: tadā samīyuḥ sakalāḥ kṣitīśa putrāḥ droṇāt sakala astrāṇi avāptum

original: dadau sa teṣāṃ paramāstrāṇi vipro rāmādavāptānyagatāni cānyaiḥ / 15.43 /
analyzed: dadau sa teṣām parama astrāṇi vipraḥ rāmāt avāptāni agatāni ca anyaiḥ

original: astrāṇi citrāṇi mahānti divyānyanyairnṛpairmanasā'pyasmṛt āni /
analyzed: astrāṇi citrāṇi mahānti divyāni anyaiḥ nṛpaiḥ manasā api asmṛt āni

original: avāpya sarve tanayā nṛpāṇāṃ śaktā babhūvurna yathaiva pūrve / 15.44 /
analyzed: avāpya sarve tanayāḥ nṛpāṇām śaktāḥ babhūvuḥ na yathā eva pūrve

original: naitādṛśāḥ pūrvamāsan narendrā astre bale sarvavidyāsu caiva /
analyzed: na etādṛśāḥ pūrvam āsan narendrāḥ astre bale sarva vidyāsu ca eva

original: dauṣṣantimāndhātṛmaruttapūrvāṇscaitatsamānāḥ suradāravīryāḥ / 15.45 /
analyzed: dauṣṣanti māndhātṛ marutta pūrvāṇ ca etad samānāḥ sura dāra vīryāḥ

original: tadā karṇo'thaikalavyaśca divyānyastrāṇyāptuṃ droṇasamīpamīyatuḥ /
analyzed: tadā karṇaḥ utha ekalavyaḥ ca divyāni astrāṇi āptum droṇa samīpam īyatuḥ

original: sūto niṣāda iti naitayoradādastrāṇi vipraḥ sa tu rāmaśiṣyaḥ / 15.46 /
analyzed: sūtaḥ niṣādaḥ iti na etayoḥ adāt astrāṇi vipraḥ sa tu rāma śiṣyaḥ

original: clxix.karṇo'navāpya nijamīpsitamuccamāno yasmādavāpa puruṣottamato'stravṛndam /
analyzed: nijam īpsitam ucca mānaḥ yasmāt avāpa puruṣottamataḥ ustra vṛndam

original: vipro'pyayaṃ tamajamemi bhṛgoḥ kulotthamitthaṃ vicintya sa yayau bhṛgupāṇsramāya / 15.47 /
analyzed: vipraḥ upi ayam tam ajam emi bhṛgoḥ kula uttham ittham vicintya sa yayau bhṛgupāṇsramāya

original: sa sarvavettuśca vibhorbhayena vipro'hamityavadadastravarātilobhāt /
analyzed: sa sarva vettuḥ ca vibhoḥ bhayena vipra ūham iti avadat astra vara ati lobhāt

original: j ānannapi pradadāvasya rāmo divyānyastrāṇyakhilānyavyayātmā / 15.48 /
analyzed: ānan api pradadau asya rāmaḥ divyāni astrāṇi akhilāni avyaya ātmā

original: astrajñacūl . āmaṇimindrasūnuṃ viśvasya hantuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraputraḥ /
analyzed: āmaṇim indra sūnum viśvasya hantum dhṛtarāṣṭra putraḥ

original: enaṃ samāṇsritya dṛḍho bhavetetyadājjñātvaivāstramasmai rameśaḥ / 15.49 /
analyzed: enam dṛḍhaḥ bhaveta iti adāt jñātvā eva astram asmai rameśaḥ

original: j ñānaṃ ca bhāgavatamapyaparāṇsca vidyā rāmādavāpya vijayaṃ dhanuragryayānam /
analyzed: ñānam ca bhāgavatam api aparāṇs ca vidyāḥ rāmāt avāpya vijayam dhanuḥ agrya yānam

original: abdaiścaturbhiratha ca nyavasat tadante hātuṃ na śakta urugāyamimaṃ sa karṇaḥ / 15.50 /
analyzed: abdaiḥ caturbhiḥ atha ca nyavasat tad ante hātum na śaktaḥ uru gāyam imam sa karṇaḥ

original: aṅke nidhāya sa kadācidamuṣya rāmaḥ śiśye śiro vigatanidra udārabodhaḥ /
analyzed: aṅke nidhāya sa kadācid amuṣya rāmaḥ śiśye śiraḥ vigata nidraḥ udāra bodhaḥ

original: saṃ suptavat suravaraḥ surakāryahetordātuṃ ca vālinidhanasya phalaṃ tadasya / 15.51 /
analyzed: sam supta vat suravaraḥ sura kārya hetoḥ dātum ca vāli nidhanasya phalam tat asya

original: tatrā'sa rākṣasavaraḥ sa tu hetināmā kāle mahendramanupāsya hi śāpato'sya /
analyzed: tatra āsa rākṣasa varaḥ sa tu heti nāmā kāle mahā indram an upāsya hi śāpataḥ usya

original: kīṭastamindra uta tatra samāviveśa karṇasya śāpamupapādayituṃ sutārthe / 15.52 /
analyzed: kīṭaḥ tam indraḥ uta tatra samāviveśa karṇasya śāpam upapādayitum suta arthe  /

original: karṇaḥ sa kīṭatanugena kirīṭinaiva hyūroradhastanata oparigātvacaśca /
analyzed: karṇaḥ sa kīṭa tanu gena kirīṭinā eva hi ūroḥ adhastanataḥ

original: viddhaḥ śareṇa sa yathā rudhirasya dhārāṃ susrāva taṃ vigatanidra ivā'ha rāmaḥ / 15.53 /
analyzed: viddhaḥ śareṇa sa yathā rudhirasya dhārām susrāva tam vigata nidraḥ iva āha rāmaḥ  /

original: kiṃ tvaṃ na cālayasi māṃ rudhirapraseke prāpte'pi pāvanavirodhini ko'si ceti /
analyzed: kim tvam na cālayasi mām rudhira praseke prāpte api pāvana virodhini kaḥ asi ca iti

original: taṃ prāha karṇa iha naiva mayā vidheyo nidrāvirodha iti kīṭa upekṣito me / 15.54 /
analyzed: tam prāha karṇaḥ iha nā eva mayā vidheyaḥ nidrā virodhaḥ iti kīṭaḥ upekṣitaḥ me  /

original: j ātyā'smi sūta uta te tanayo'smi satyaṃ tenāsmi vipra iti bhārgavavaṃ śajo'ham /
analyzed: ātyā asmi sūtaḥ uta te tanayā asmi satyam tena asmi vipraḥ iti bhārgavavam śajoham

original: agre'bruvaṃ bhavata īśa nahi tvadanyo mātā pitā gurutaro jagato'pi mukhyaḥ / 15.55 /
analyzed: agrebruvam bhavataḥ īśa nahi tvad anyaḥ mātā pitā gurutaraḥ jagataḥ api mukhyaḥ

original: ityuktamātravacane sa tu kīṭako'sya rāmasya dṛṣṭiviṣayatvata eva rūpam /
analyzed: iti ukta mātra vacane sa tu kīṭakaḥ usya rāmasya dṛṣṭi viṣaya tvataḥ eva rūpam

original: samprāpya naijamatipūrṇaguṇasya tasya viṣṇoranugrahata āpa vimānagaḥ svaḥ / 15.56 /
analyzed: samprāpya naija mati pūrṇa guṇasya tasya viṣṇoḥ anugrahataḥ āpa vimāna gaḥ svaḥ  /

original: athā'ha rāmastamasatyavāco na te sakāṇse mama vāsayogyatā /
analyzed: atha āha rāmaḥ tam asatya vācaḥ na te sakāṇse mama vāsa yogyatā

original: tathā'pi te naiva vṛthā madīyā bhaktirbhavejjeṣyasi sarvaśatrūn / 15.57 /
analyzed: tathā api te nā eva vṛthā madīyā bhaktiḥ bhavet jeṣyasi sarva śatrūn

original: aspardhamānaṃ na kathañcana tvāṃ jetā kaścit spardhamānastu yāsi /
analyzed: a spardhamānam na kathañcana tvām jetā kaścid spardhamānaḥ tu yāsi

original: clxx.parābhūtiṃ nātra vicāryamasti pramādī tvaṃ bhavitā cāstrasaṅghe / 15.58 /
analyzed: clxx parābhūtim na atra vicāryam asti pramādī tvam bhavitā ca astra saṅghe

original: yāhīti tenokta udārakarmaṇā karṇo yayau taṃ praṇamyeśitāram /
analyzed: yāhi iti tena uktaḥ udāra karmaṇā karṇaḥ yayau tam praṇamya īśitāram

original: tathaikalavyo'pi nirākṛto'munā droṇena tasya pratimāṃ vane'rcayat / 15.59 /
analyzed: tathā ekalavyaḥ api nirākṛtaḥ umunā droṇena tasya pratimām vanā īrcayat  /

original: tataḥ kadācid dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ pāṇḍoḥ sutā mṛgayāṃ samprayātāḥ /
analyzed: tatas kadācid dhṛtarāṣṭra putraiḥ pāṇḍoḥ sutāḥ mṛgayām samprayātāḥ

original: agre gacchan sārameyo rurāva dharmātmajasyātra vane mṛgārthī / 15.60 /
analyzed: agre gacchan sārameyaḥ rurāva dharmātmajasya atra vane mṛga arthī   /

original: śrutvā rāvaṃ sārameyasya dūrāccharairmukhaṃ śabdavedhī pupūre /
analyzed: śrutvā rāvam sārameyasya dūrāt śaraiḥ mukham śabdavedhī pupūre

original: sa ekalavyo vraṇamasya nākarocchvā pūritāsyaḥ pāṇḍavānabhyayāt saḥ / 15.61 /
analyzed: saḥ ekalavyaḥ vraṇam asya na akarot śvā pūrita āsyaḥ pāṇḍavān abhyayāt saḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā citraṃ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāṇsca draṣṭuṃ kartāraṃ mārgayāmāsuratra /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā citram kuravaḥ pāṇḍavān ca draṣṭum kartāram mārgayāmāsuḥ atra

original: droṇākṛtiṃ mārttikīṃ pūjayantaṃ dadṛśuścainaṃ dhanurevābhyasantam / 15.62 /
analyzed: droṇa ākṛtim mārttikīm pūjayantam dadṛśuḥ ca enam dhanuḥ eva abhyasantam

original: paiśācamevaiṣa piśācakebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vivedāstravṛndaṃ niṣādaḥ /
analyzed: paiśācam eva eṣa piśācakebhyaḥ pūrvam viveda astra vṛndam niṣādaḥ

original: divyānyastrāṇyāptumetāṃ ca śikṣāṃ droṇaṃ sadā pūjayati sma bhaktyā / 15.63 /
analyzed: divyāni astrāṇi āptum etām ca śikṣām droṇam sadā pūjayati sma bhaktyā

original: dṛṣṭvā viśeṣaṃ tamamuṣya pārtho droṇāyoce tvadvaro me mṛṣā'sīt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā viśeṣam tam amuṣya pārthaḥ droṇāya ūce tvad varaḥ me mṛṣā āsīt

original: ityukta enaṃ tvabhigamya dakṣiṇāṃ vipro yayāce dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhameva / 15.64 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ enam tu abhigamya dakṣiṇām vipraḥ yayāce dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭham eva

original: tasya prasādopacitoruśikṣo niṣādo'dād dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhamasmai /
analyzed: tasya prasāda upacita ūru śikṣaḥ dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭham asmai

original: tataḥ paraṃ nāsya babhūva śikṣā sanmuṣṭihīnasya samā'rjunena / 15.65 /
analyzed: tatas param nā asya babhūva śikṣā sat muṣṭi hīnasya

original: punaḥ kṛpāl . ūraivataparvate taṃ droṇaḥ prāpyā'dādastravarāṇi tasmai /
analyzed: punar kṛpāl ūraivata parvate tam droṇaḥ prāpya adāt astra varāṇi tasmai

original: ekānta evāsya bhaktyā sutuṣṭo dhanviśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtavānarjunaṃ ca / 15.66 /
analyzed: ekānte eva asya bhaktyā su tuṣṭaḥ dhanvi śreṣṭham kṛtavān arjunam ca

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
(pāṇḍavaśāstrābhyāso nāma)
analyzed: pāṇḍavaśāstra abhyāsaḥ nāma

original: pañcadaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: pañcadaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: clxxi.(sṛgḸalavadhaḥ )
analyzed: clxxi sṛj ḍala vadhaḥ

original: atha ṣoḍaṇso'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha ṣoḍaṇsaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: kāle tvetasmin bhūya evākhilaiśca nṛpairyukto māgadho yoddhukāmaḥ /
analyzed: kāle tu etasmin bhūyas eva akhilaiḥ ca nṛpaiḥ yuktaḥ māgadhaḥ yoddhu kāmaḥ

original: prāyād yadūṃ statra nityāvyayātibalaiśvaryo'pīcchayā'gāt sa kṛṣṇaḥ / 16.1 /
analyzed: prāyāt yadūm tatra nitya avyaya ati bala aiśvarya upi icchayā āgāt sa kṛṣṇaḥ

original: sandarśayan balināmalpasenādyupaskarāṇāṃ bahal . opaskaraiśca /
analyzed: sandarśayan balinām alpa senā ādi upaskarāṇām bahal ā upaskaraiḥ ca

original: prāpte virodhe balibhirnītimagryāṃ yayau sarāmo dakṣiṇāṇsāṃ rameśaḥ / 16.2 /
analyzed: prāpte virodhe balibhiḥ nītim agryām yayau sarāmaḥ rameśaḥ

original: so'nantavīryaḥ paramo'bhayo'pi nītyai gacchan jāmadagnyaṃ dadarśa /
analyzed: saḥ unanta vīryaḥ nītyai gacchan jāmadagnyam dadarśa

original: krīḍārthameko'pi tato'tidurgaṃ śrutvā gomantaṃ tatra yayau sahāgrajaḥ / 16.3 /
analyzed: krīḍā artham ekaḥ api śrutvā gomantam tatra yayau saha agrajaḥ

original: tadā dugdhābdhau saṃ sṛtisthaiḥ surādyaiḥ pūjāṃ prāptuṃ sthānameṣāṃ ca yogyam /
analyzed: tadā dugdha abdhau sam sṛti sthaiḥ sura ādyaiḥ pūjām prāptum sthānam eṣām ca yogyam

original: muktasthānādāpa nārāyaṇo'jo baliścā'gāt tatra sandraṣṭumīśam / 16.4 /
analyzed: mukta sthānāt āpa nārāyaṇa ojaḥ baliḥ ca agāt tatra sandraṣṭum īśam

original: tatrāsurāveśamamuṣya viṣṇuḥ sandarśayan suptihīno'pi nityam /
analyzed: tatra asura āveśam amuṣya viṣṇuḥ sandarśayan supti hīnaḥ api nityam

original: saṃ suptavicchaśya udārakarmā sañjñāyai devānāṃ mukhamīkṣyāprameyaḥ / 16.5 /
analyzed: sam supta vid śaśyaḥ udāra karmā sañjñāyai devānām mukham īkṣya aprameyaḥ

original: devāṇsca tadbhāvavido'khilāṇsca nimīlitākṣāḥ śayaneṣu ṇsiśyare /
analyzed: devāṇs ca nimīlita akṣāḥ śayaneṣu ṇsiśyare

original: tadā balistasya viṣṇoḥ kirīṭamādāyāgājjahasuḥ sarvadevāḥ / 16.6 /
analyzed: tadā baliḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ kirīṭam ādāya āgāt jahasuḥ sarva devāḥ

original: nārāyaṇe sarvadevaiḥ samete brahmādibhirhāsamāne suparṇaḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇe sarva devaiḥ samete brahma ādibhiḥ ha āsamāne suparṇaḥ

original: gatvā pātāl . aṃ yudhi jitvā baliṃ ca kirīṭamādāyābhyayād yatra kṛṣṇaḥ / 16.7 /
analyzed: gatvā yudhi jitvā balim ca kirīṭam ādāya abhyayāt yatra kṛṣṇaḥ

original: tat tasya śīrṣṇi pratimucya natvā khagaḥ stutvā devadevaṃ rameśam /
analyzed: tat tasya śīrṣṇi pratimucya natvā khagaḥ stutvā devadevam rameśam

original: smṛta āgacchetyeva visarjito'munā yayau dugdhābdhiṃ yatra nārāyaṇo'sau / 16.8 /
analyzed: smṛtaḥ āgaccha iti eva visarjitaḥ umunā yayau dugdha abdhim yatra nārāyaṇā usau

original: kirīṭaṃ tat kṛṣṇamūrdhni praviṣṭaṃ tattulyamāsīt tasya rūpeṣvabhedāt /
analyzed: kirīṭam tat kṛṣṇa mūrdhni praviṣṭam tat tulyam āsīt tasya rūpeṣu abhedāt

original: tadicchayā caiva nārāyaṇasya śīrṣṇyapyāsīd yugapad dugdhavārdhau / 16.9 /
analyzed: tad icchayā ca eva nārāyaṇasya śīrṣṇi api āsīt yugapad

original: pūrvaṃ prāptānyeva divyāyudhāni punarvaikuṇṭhaṃ lokamitāni bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam prāptāni eva divya āyudhāni punar vaikuṇṭham loka mitāni bhūyas

original: tadā'vaterū rauhiṇeyasya caivaṃ bhāryā'pyāyād vāruṇī nāma pūrvā / 16.10 /
analyzed: tadā avateruḥ rauhiṇeyasya ca evam bhāryā api āyāt vāruṇī nāma pūrvā

original: saivāparaṃ rūpamāsthāya cā'gācchrīrityākhyaṃ sendirāveśamagryam /
analyzed: sā eva aparam rūpam āsthāya ca agāt śrīḥ iti ākhyam sa indirā veśam agryam

original: kāntiścā'gāt tasya somasya cānyā bhāryā dvayoḥ pūrvatanā surūpā / 16.11 /
analyzed: kāntiḥ ca agāt tasya somasya ca anyā bhāryā dvayoḥ pūrvatanā surūpā

original: clxxii.t ābhī rāmo mumude tatra tiṣṭhañchaśāṅkapūgodriktakāntiḥ sudhāmā /
analyzed: ābhiḥ rāmaḥ mumude tatra tiṣṭhan śaśāṅka pūga udrikta kāntiḥ sudhāmā

original: tasyā vāruṇyāḥ pratimā peyarūpā kādambarī vāruṇī tāṃ papau saḥ / 16.12 /
analyzed: tasyāḥ vāruṇyāḥ pratimā peya rūpā kādambarī vāruṇī tām papau saḥ

original: evaṃ tayoḥ krīḍatoḥ svairamatra rājanyavṛndānugato jarāsutaḥ /
analyzed: evam tayoḥ krīḍatoḥ svairam atra rājanya vṛnda anugataḥ jarāsutaḥ

original: giriṃ gomantaṃ parivāryādahat taṃ dṛṣṭvā devau pupluvaturbalābdhau / 16.13 /
analyzed: girim gomantam parivārya adahat tam dṛṣṭvā devau pupluvatuḥ bala abdhau

original: giristābhyāṃ pīḍitaḥ san nimagno bhūmau padbhyāṃ yojanaikādaśaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: giriḥ tābhyām pīḍitaḥ san nimagnaḥ bhūmau padbhyām yojana ekādaśam saḥ

original: niṣpīḍit ājjaladhārodgatā'smād vahniṃ vyāptaṃ śamayāmāsa sarvam / 16.14 /
analyzed: niṣpīḍit āt jala dhārā udgatā asmāt vahnim vyāptam śamayāmāsa sarvam

original: senāṃ praviṣṭau sarvarājanyavṛndaṃ vyamathnātāṃ devavarau svaśastraiḥ /
analyzed: senām praviṣṭau sarva rājanya vṛndam vyamathnātām deva varau sva śastraiḥ

original: tatra haṃ so ḍibhakaścaikalavyaḥ sakīcakastau śiśupālapauṇḍrakau / 16.15 /
analyzed: tatra ham saḥ ḍibhakaḥ ca ekalavyaḥ sa kīcakaḥ tau śiśupāla pauṇḍrakau

original: bhaumātmajo dantavakraśca rugmī saubhādhipo maindamaindānujau ca /
analyzed: bhauma ātmajaḥ dantavakraḥ ca rugmī saubha adhipaḥ mainda mainda anujau ca

original: anye ca ye pārthivāḥ sarva eva krodhāt kṛṣṇaṃ parivāryābhyavarṣan / 16.16 /
analyzed: anye ca ye pārthivāḥ sarve eva krodhāt kṛṣṇam parivārya abhyavarṣan  /

original: śastrairastrairdrumapūgaiḥ śilābhirbhaktāṇsca ye śalyabāhlīkamukhyāḥ /
analyzed: śastraiḥ astraiḥ druma pūgaiḥ śilābhiḥ bhaktān ca ye śalya bāhlīka mukhyāḥ

original: sasomadattāḥ saumadattirvirāṭaḥ pāñcālarājaśca jarāsutasya /
analyzed: sa somadattāḥ saumadattiḥ virāṭaḥ pāñcāla rājaḥ ca jarāsutasya

original: bhayāt kṛṣṇaṃ śastravarṣairavarṣan kārāgṛhe vāsitā māgadhena / 16.17 /
analyzed: bhayāt kṛṣṇam śastra varṣaiḥ avarṣan kārā gṛhe vāsitāḥ māgadhena

original: sarvānetāñcharavarṣeṇa kṛṣṇo visūtavājidhvajaśastravarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sarvān etān śara varṣeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ visūta vāji dhvaja śastravarmaṇaḥ

original: kṛtvā vamacchoṇit ānārtarūpān vidrāvayāmāsa hariryathā mṛgān / 16.18 /
analyzed: kṛtvā vamat śoṇit ān ārta rūpān vidrāvayāmāsa hariḥ yathā mṛgān

original: hatvā senāṃ viṃ śadakṣohiṇīṃ t āṃ tribhiryuktāṃ rugmiṇaṃ naiva kṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: hatvā senām vim śada kṣohiṇīm t ām tribhiḥ yuktām rugmiṇam na eva kṛṣṇaḥ

original: rugmiṇyarthe pīḍayāmāsa śastrāṇyasya cchitvā virathaṃ drāvayānaḥ / 16.19 /
analyzed: rugmiṇi arthe pīḍayāmāsa śastrāṇi asya chitvā viratham drāvayānaḥ

original: jarāsuto rauhiṇeyena yuddhaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā tanmusalena pothitaḥ /
analyzed: jarāsutaḥ rauhiṇeyena yuddham ciram kṛtvā tad musalena pothitaḥ

original: vimohitaḥ prāptasañjñaścireṇa kruddho gadāṃ tadurasyabhyapātayat / 16.20 /
analyzed: vimohitaḥ prāpta sañjñaḥ cireṇa kruddhaḥ gadām tad urasi abhyapātayat  /

original: tenā'hataḥ subhṛśaṃ rauhiṇeyaḥ papāta mūrcchābhigataḥ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: tena āhataḥ su bhṛśam rauhiṇeyaḥ papāta mūrcchā abhigataḥ kṣaṇena

original: ajeyatvaṃ tasya dattaṃ hi dhātrā pūrvaṃ gṛhīto viṣṇunā rāmagena / 16.21 /
analyzed: ajeya tvam tasya dattam hi dhātrā pūrvam gṛhītaḥ viṣṇunā rāma gena

original: tathākṛte balabhadre tu kṛṣṇo gadāmādāya svāmagānmāgadheśam /
analyzed: tathā kṛte balabhadre tu kṛṣṇaḥ gadām ādāya svām agāt māgadha īśam

original: tatāḍa jatrau sa tayā'bhitāḍito jagāma gāṃ mūrcchayā'bhiplutāṅgaḥ / 16.22 /
analyzed: tatāḍa jatrau sa tayā abhitāḍitaḥ jagāma gām mūrcchayā abhipluta aṅgaḥ

original: clxxiii.athottasthau rauhiṇeyaḥ sahaiva samuttasthau māgadho'pyagryavīryaḥ /
analyzed: atha uttasthau rauhiṇeyaḥ saha eva samuttasthau māgadhaḥ upi agrya vīryaḥ

original: kruddho gṛhītvā maulimasyā'śu rāmo vadhāyodyacchanmusalaṃ bāhuṣāl . ī / 16.23 /
analyzed: kruddhaḥ gṛhītvā maulim asya āśu rāmaḥ vadhāya udyacchan musalam

original: athābravīd vāyurenaṃ na rāma tvayā hantuṃ śakyate māgadho'yam /
analyzed: athā bravīt vāyuḥ enam na rāma tvayā hantum śakyate māgadhaḥ uyam

original: vṛthā nate bāhubalaṃ prayojyamamoghaṃ te yad balaṃ tadvadastram / 16.24 /
analyzed: vṛthā nate bāhu balam prayojyam amogham te yat balam tadvat astram

original: anyo hantā balavānasya ceti śrutvā yayau balabhadro vimucya /
analyzed: anyaḥ hantā balavān asya ca iti śrutvā yayau balabhadraḥ vimucya

original: jarāsutaṃ punarudyacchamānaṃ jaghāna kṛṣṇo gadayā svayaiva / 16.25 /
analyzed: jarāsutam punar udyacchamānam jaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ gadayā svayā eva

original: tenā'hataḥ srastasamastagātraḥ papāta mūrchābhigataḥ sa rājā /
analyzed: tena āhataḥ srasta samasta gātraḥ papāta mūrchā abhigataḥ sa rājā

original: cirāt sañjñāṃ prāpya cāntarhito'sau samprādravad bhītabhītaḥ salajjaḥ / 16.26 /
analyzed: cirāt sañjñām prāpya ca antarhitaḥ usau samprādravat bhīta bhītaḥ sa lajjaḥ

original: yayau śiṣṭai rājabhiḥ saṃ yutaśca puraṃ jīvetyeva kṛṣṇena muktaḥ /
analyzed: yayau śiṣṭaiḥ rājabhiḥ sam yutaḥ ca puram jīva iti eva kṛṣṇena muktaḥ

original: punaryuddhaṃ bahuśaḥ keśavena kṛtvā jito rājagaṇaiḥ sametaḥ / 16.27 /
analyzed: punar yuddham bahuśas keśavena kṛtvā jitaḥ rāja gaṇaiḥ sametaḥ

original: kṛṣṇo jitvā māgadhaṃ rauhiṇeyayukto yayau damaghoṣeṇa sārddham /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ jitvā māgadham rauhiṇeya yuktaḥ yayau damaghoṣeṇa sārddham

original: pitṛṣvasāyāḥ patinā tena coktaḥ pūrvaṃ jitenāpi yudhi sma bāndhavāt / 16.28 /
analyzed: pitṛṣvasāyāḥ patinā tena ca uktaḥ pūrvam jitena api yudhi sma bāndhavāt  /

original: yāmaḥ puraṃ karivīrākhyameva mahālakṣmyāḥ kṣetrasandarśanāya /
analyzed: yāmaḥ puram karivīra ākhyam eva mahā lakṣmyāḥ kṣetra sandarśanāya

original: śrutvā vākyaṃ tasya yuddhe jitasya bhītyā yuktasyā'tmanā tadyuto'gāt / 16.29 /
analyzed: śrutvā vākyam tasya yuddhe jitasya bhītyā yuktasya ātmanā tat yuta ugāt

original: gandharvo'sau danunāmā naro'bhūt tasmāt kṛṣṇe bhaktimāṃ ścā'sa rājā /
analyzed: gandharvaḥ asau danu nāmā tasmāt kṛṣṇe bhaktimān śca āsa rājā

original: puraprāptāṃ stān sa vijñāya pāpaḥ sṛgālākhyo vāsudevaḥ krudhā'gāt / 16.30 /
analyzed: pura prāptām stān sa vijñāya pāpaḥ sṛgāla ākhyaḥ vāsudevaḥ krudhā agāt

original: sūryapradattaṃ rathamāruhya divyaṃ varādavadhyastigmaruceḥ sa kṛṣṇam /
analyzed: sūrya pradattam ratham āruhya divyam varāt avadhyaḥ tigmaruceḥ sa kṛṣṇam

original: yoddhuṃ yayāvamucaccāstrasaṅghāñchirastasyāthā'śu jahāra kṛṣṇaḥ / 16.31 /
analyzed: yoddhum yayau amucat ca astra saṅghān śiraḥ tasya atha āśu jahāra kṛṣṇaḥ

original: dvidhā kṛtvā dehamasyāriṇā ca putraṃ bhaktaṃ tasya rājye'bhiṣicya /
analyzed: dvidhā kṛtvā deham asya ariṇā ca putram bhaktam tasya rājye abhiṣicya

original: sa śakradevaṃ māṇibhadraḥ purā yo yayau purīṃ svāṃ sahito'grajena / 16.32 /
analyzed: sa śakra devam māṇibhadraḥ purā yaḥ yayau purīm svām sahita ugrajena

original: clxxiv.nītiṃ baliṣṭhasya vihāya senāṃ dūrād yuddhaṃ yuddhaṃ darśayitvaiva guptyai /
analyzed: clxiv nītim baliṣṭhasya vihāya senām dūrāt yuddham yuddham darśayitvā eva guptyai

original: svasenāyāḥ sarvapūrṇātmaśaktiḥ punaḥ purīṃ prāpya sa pūjito'vasat / 16.33 /
analyzed: sva senāyāḥ sarva pūrṇa ātma śaktiḥ punar purīm prāpya sa pūjitaḥ avasat  /

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
sṛgḸalavadho nāma ṣoḍaṇso'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: sṛgḍalavadhaḥ nāma ṣoḍaṇsaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: clxxv.(haṃ saḍibhakavadhaḥ )
analyzed: clxvham saḍibhaka vadhaḥ

original: atha saptadaśo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha saptadaśaḥ udhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / gate'tha cedipe svakaṃ puraṃ janārdano'śṛṇot /
analyzed: om cedipe svakam puram

original: ramaiva rugmiṇīti yodyatāṃ svayambarāya tām / 17.1 /
analyzed: ramā eva rugmiṇī iti yā udyatām svayambarāya tām

original: sa rugmināmako'grajaḥ śriyo dviṣan ramāpatim /
analyzed: sa rugmi nāmaka ugrajaḥ śriyaḥ dviṣan ramāpatim

original: hareḥ pradātumudyatāṃ nyavārayaddharipriyām / 17.2 /
analyzed: hareḥ pradātum udyatām nyavārayat haripriyām

original: praghoṣite svayambare'tha tena māgadhādayaḥ /
analyzed: praghoṣite tena māgadha ādayaḥ

original: samīyurugrapauruṣāḥ sasālvapauṇḍracedipāḥ / 17.3 /
analyzed: samīyuḥ ugra pauruṣāḥ sa śālva pauṇḍra cedipāḥ

original: tadā jagāma keśavo javena kuṇḍinaṃ puram /
analyzed: tadā jagāma keśavaḥ javena kuṇḍinam puram

original: smṛto'tha tena pakṣirāṭsamājagāma keśavam / 17.4 /
analyzed: smṛtā utha tena pakṣirāj samājagāma keśavam

original: patatravāyunā'sya te nareśvarāḥ prapātitāḥ /
analyzed: patatra vāyunā asya te nareśvarāḥ prapātitāḥ

original: yadedṛśaṃ patatriṇo balaṃ hareḥ kimucyate / 17.5 /
analyzed: yadā īdṛśam patatriṇaḥ balam hareḥ kim ucyate

original: kimatra naḥ kṛtaṃ bhavet sukhāya hīti te'bruvan /
analyzed: kim atra naḥ kṛtam bhavet sukhāya hi iti te bruvan

original: athābravījjarāsuto jayī payobdhimandiraḥ /
analyzed: athā bravīt jarā sutaḥ jayī payaḥ abdhi mandiraḥ

original: kilaiṣa pakṣivāhano yataśca nānyathā bhavet / 17.6 /
analyzed: kila eṣa pakṣi vāhanaḥ yatas ca na anyathā bhavet

original: jitā vayaṃ ca sarvaśo'munaikalena saṃ yuge /
analyzed: jitāḥ vayam ca sarva śomunā ekalena sam yuge

original: anekaśo na saṅgatairjitaḥ kadācideṣa hi/ 17.7 /
analyzed: anekaśas na saṅga taiḥ jitaḥ kadācid eṣa hi

original: amuṣya cāgrajaḥ purā nihantumudyato hi mām /
analyzed: amuṣya ca agrajaḥ purā nihantum udyataḥ hi mām

original: adṛśyavākyato'tyajat pratāḍanāt supīḍitam / 17.8 /
analyzed: pratāḍanāt su pīḍitam

original: kimasya tūcyate balaṃ vayaṃ tṛṇopamāḥ kṛt āḥ /
analyzed: kim asya tu ucyate balam vayam tṛṇa upamāḥ

original: samastaśo mṛdhemṛdhe hi yena cākṣatena hā / 17.9 /
analyzed: samastaśas mṛdhemṛdhe hi yena ca akṣatena hā

original: kimatra kurvatāṃ sukhaṃ bhavedudīrṇasaṅkaṭe /
analyzed: kim atra kurvatām sukham bhavet udīrṇa saṅkaṭe

original: iti bruvannavāṅ mukhaṃ nṛpaścakāra vicchavi / 17.10 /
analyzed: iti bruvan avāk mukham nṛpaḥ cakāra vicchavi

original: athā'ha cedibhūpatiḥ sadantavakrako vacaḥ /
analyzed: athā āha cedi bhūpatiḥ sa dantavakrakaḥ vacaḥ

original: clxxvi.purā harerhi pārṣadaḥ prasannabuddhirekadā / 17.11 /
analyzed: hareḥ hi pārṣadaḥ prasanna buddhiḥ ekadā

original: śṛṇuṣva rājasattama prabhuṃ śivasvayambhuvoḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva rāja sattama prabhum śiva svayambhuvoḥ

original: hariṃ vadanti kecidapyado bhavenna vai mṛṣā / 17.12 /
analyzed: harim vadanti kecid api adaḥ bhavet na vai mṛṣā

original: tathā'vayośca darśane bhavet kadācidūrjitā /
analyzed: tathā āvayoḥ ca darśane bhavet kadācid ūrjitā

original: amuṣya bhaktiranyathā punaśca jāyate krudhā / 17.13 /
analyzed: amuṣya bhaktiḥ anyathā punar ca jāyate krudhā

original: na kāraṇaṃ na vidmahe na saṃ śayaḥ paro hariḥ /
analyzed: na kāraṇam na vidmahe na sam śayaḥ paraḥ hariḥ

original: vrajāma taṃ sukhārthino vayaṃ vihāya śatrutām / 17.14 /
analyzed: vrajāma tam sukha arthinaḥ vayam vihāya śatru tām

original: idaṃ hi naḥ śubhapradaṃ nacānyathā ṇsubhaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: idam hi naḥ śubha pradam na ca anyathā kvacid

original: itīrito jarāsuto dadarśa tau dahanniva / 17.15 /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ jarāsutaḥ dadarśa tau dahan iva

original: atha prahasya saubharāḍvaco jagāda māgadham /
analyzed: atha prahasya saubha rāj vacaḥ jagāda māgadham

original: vinindya tau krudhā sphuran krudhā sphurantamīkṣya ca / 17.16 /
analyzed: vinindya tau krudhā sphuran krudhā sphurantam īkṣya ca

original: na tanmṛṣā hariḥ svayaṃ janārdano vadhāya naḥ /
analyzed: na tat mṛṣā hariḥ svayam janārdanaḥ vadhāya naḥ

original: prajāta eṣa yādavo vayaṃ ca dānaveśvarāḥ / 17.17 /
analyzed: prajātaḥ eṣa yādavaḥ vayam ca dānava īśvarāḥ

original: svadharma eṣa naḥ sadā dṛḍhapratīpatā harau /
analyzed: svadharmaḥ eṣa naḥ sadā dṛḍha pratīpa tā harau

original: svadharmiṇo hatā api prayāma sadgatiṃ dhruvam / 17.18 /
analyzed: svadharmiṇaḥ hatāḥ api prayāma sat gatim dhruvam

original: śivaśca naḥ parā gatirgururbhavānarirhareḥ /
analyzed: śivaḥ ca naḥ parā gatiḥ guruḥ bhavān ariḥ hareḥ

original: itīritaḥ sa māgadho jagāda sādhusādhviti / 17.19 /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ sa māgadhaḥ jagāda sādhu sādhu iti

original: tathaiva rugmipūrvakāḥ karūṇsacedipau ca tau /
analyzed: tathā eva rugmi pūrvakāḥ karūṇsa cedipau ca tau

original: viniścayaṃ kubuddhayo yudhe ca cakrurūrjitam / 17.20 /
analyzed: viniścayam kubuddhayaḥ yudhe ca cakruḥ ūrjitam

original: sadā pratīpakāriṇau bhavāva kṛṣṇa ityapi /
analyzed: sadā pratīpa kāriṇau bhavāva kṛṣṇaḥ iti api

original: guroḥ prasādamāpnutāṃ karūṇsacedibhūbhṛtau / 17.21 /
analyzed: guroḥ prasādam āpnutām karūn sa cedi bhūbhṛtau

original: punaśca te tvamantrayan sahaiva pāpabuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: punar ca te tu amantrayan saha eva pāpa buddhayaḥ

original: dhruvaṃ samāgato harirlabheta rugmiṇīmimām / 17.22 /
analyzed: dhruvam samāgataḥ hariḥ labheta rugmiṇīm imām

original: clxxvii.ayaṃ trilokasundaro'nurūpiṇī ca rugmiṇī /
mukhena bāhunā'pyayaṃ samastalokajid vaśī / 17.23 /
analyzed: mukhena bāhunā api ayam samasta loka jit vaśī

original: samastavedināṃ varaṃ jitārimagryarūpiṇam /
analyzed: samasta vedinām varam jita arim agrya rūpiṇam

original: samastayoṣit āṃ varā vrajeta rugmiṇī dhruvam / 17.24 /
analyzed: samasta yoṣit āṃ varā vrajeta rugmiṇī dhruvam

original: vayaṃ ca mānasaṅkṣayaṃ nitāntamāpnumastadā /
analyzed: vayam ca māna saṅkṣayam nitāntam āpnumaḥ tadā

original: na śaknumo nivārituṃ śarairamuṃ kathañcana / 17.25 /
analyzed: na śaknumaḥ nivāritum śaraiḥ amum kathañcana

original: ataḥ svayambare yathā nasaṅgamo harerbhavet /
analyzed: atas svayambare yathā na saṅgamaḥ hareḥ bhavet

original: tathā vidhānameva naḥ sunītirūrjitā dhruvam / 17.26 /
analyzed: tathā vidhānam eva naḥ sunītiḥ ūrjitā dhruvam

original: ato na deyamasya naḥ subhūbhujāṃ samāgame /
analyzed: atas na deyam asya naḥ su bhūbhujām samāgame

original: kvacit kadācidāsanaṃ nacārghyapūrvako vidhiḥ / 17.27 /
analyzed: kvacid kadācid āsanam na ca arghya pūrvakaḥ vidhiḥ

original: nacā'syati kṣitau kvacid vimānitaḥ puro hi naḥ /
analyzed: na ca asyati kṣitau kvacid vimānitaḥ puras hi naḥ

original: varāsanasthabhūbhujāṃ sa mānito hi daivataiḥ / 17.28 /
analyzed: varāsana stha bhūbhujām sa mānitaḥ hi daivataiḥ

original: sa darpamānasaṃ yutaḥ krudhā prayāsyati dhruvam /
analyzed: sa darpa mānasam yutaḥ krudhā prayāsyati dhruvam

original: purīṃ svakāṃ tatau vayaṃ vidhema ca svayambaram / 17.29 /
analyzed: purīm svakām tatau vayam vidhema ca svayambaram

original: iti sma sarvabhūbhṛt āṃ viniścayaṃ sakaiśikaḥ /
analyzed: iti sma sarva bhūbhṛt ām viniścayam sa kaiśikaḥ

original: kratho'vagamya bhīṣmakānujo'bhyayāddhariṃ drutam / 17.30 /
analyzed: krathaḥ uvagamya bhīṣmaka anujaḥ abhyayāt harim drutam

original: praṇamya pādapadmayornijaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśya ca /
analyzed: praṇamya pāda padmayoḥ nijam gṛham praveśya ca

original: mahāsanaṃ pradāya tau pracakraturvarārcanam / 17.31 /
analyzed: mahā āsanam pradāya tau pracakratuḥ vara arcanam

original: athā'gamacchatakratorvacaḥ pragṛhya bhūbhujaḥ /
analyzed: athā agamat śatakratoḥ vacaḥ pragṛhya bhūbhujaḥ

original: jarāsutādikān pumānuvāca cārthavad vacaḥ / 17.32 /
analyzed: jarā suta ādikān pumān uvāca ca arthavat vacaḥ

original: ahaṃ priyaḥ śacīpateḥ sadā'sya cākṣigocaraḥ /
analyzed: aham priyaḥ śacīpateḥ sadā asya ca akṣi gocaraḥ

original: surendra ājñayā'vadannṛpān va īśvaro hi saḥ / 17.33 /
analyzed: sura indraḥ ājñayā avadat nṛpān vaḥ īśvaraḥ hi saḥ

original: samastarājasatpatirharirnacānya ityapi /
analyzed: samasta rāja sat patiḥ hariḥ na ca anyaḥ iti api

original: varābhiṣekamīśituḥ kurudhvamāṇsvasaṃ śayam / 17.34 /
analyzed: vara abhiṣekam īśituḥ kurudhvam āṇsvasam śayam  /

original: clxxviii.ato'nyathā ṇsirasyahaṃ nipātayāmi vo'śanim /
analyzed: clxviii a taḥ nyathā ṇ si rasi aham nipātayāmi vā uśanim

original: itīdamindraśāsanaṃ kurudhvamityasau yayau / 17.35 /
analyzed: iti idam indra śāsanam kurudhvam iti asau yayau

original: tadīritaṃ niśamya te punaḥ sutaptacetasaḥ /
analyzed: tad īritam niśamya te punar su tapta cetasaḥ

original: babhūvurūcire vacaḥ sugarvito hi vāsavaḥ / 17.36 /
analyzed: babhūvuḥ ūcire vacaḥ su garvitaḥ hi vāsavaḥ

original: purā bibheti naḥ sadā pratiprati sma vāsavaḥ /
analyzed: purā bibheti naḥ sadā prati prati sma vāsavaḥ

original: utādya kṛṣṇasaṃ śrayād dṛḍhaṃ vibhīṣayatyasau / 17.37 /
analyzed: uta adya kṛṣṇa sam śrayāt dṛḍham vibhīṣayati asau

original: adṛśya eva devarāḍyadi sma vajramutsṛjet /
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ eva devarāj yadi sma vajram utsṛjet

original: bhavema pīḍit ā vayaṃ varādamṛtyavo'pi hi / 17.38 /
analyzed: bhavema ā vayam hi

original: purā divisthitasya ca pramardane vayaṃ kṣamāḥ /
analyzed: purā divisthitasya ca pramardane vayam kṣamāḥ

original: utādya yadyamuṃ vayaṃ vrajema kṛṣṇa eṣyati / 17.39 /
analyzed: uta adya yadi amum vayam vrajema kṛṣṇaḥ eṣyati  /

original: ato'bhiṣecanād yadīha śārṅgiṇaḥ śacīpatiḥ /
analyzed: atobhiṣecanāt yadi iha śārṅgiṇaḥ śacīpatiḥ

original: na vajramutsṛjet tadā'bhiṣecayāma taṃ vayam / 17.40 /
analyzed: na vajram utsṛjet tadā abhiṣecayāma tam vayam

original: ato'nyathā danuryathā varādamṛtyuko'pi san /
analyzed: atonyathā danuḥ yathā varāt amṛtyukaḥ api san

original: surendravajratāḍito babhūva kukṣigāsyayuk / 17.41 /
analyzed: sura indra vajra tāḍitaḥ babhūva kukṣi gāsya yuj

original: tathaiva kṛṣṇasaṃ śrayāt sa naḥ śacīpatirnayet /
analyzed: tathā eva kṛṣṇasam śrayāt sa naḥ śacīpatiḥ nayet

original: iti sma niścitā nṛpānayātayanta śauraye / 17.42 /
analyzed: iti sma niścitāḥ nṛpān ayātayanta śauraye  /

original: samastaśo jarāsutādibhiḥ kṛte'bhiṣecane /
analyzed: samastaśas jarāsuta ādibhiḥ kṛte abhiṣecane

original: atīva bhagnamānakān nacānuyāti kaścana / 17.43 /
analyzed: atīva bhagna mānakāt na ca anuyāti kaścana

original: samāṇsrayaṃ ca keśavaṃ tadaiva jīvanārthinaḥ /
analyzed: sa māṇsrayam ca keśavam tadā eva jīvana arthinaḥ

original: prakuryurāsurā apīti devakāryasaṅkṣayaḥ / 17.44 /
analyzed: prakuryuḥ āsurāḥ api iti deva kārya saṅkṣayaḥ

original: itīkṣya pākaśāsano'vadajjarāsutādikān /
analyzed: iti īkṣya pākaśāsanaḥ uvadat jarāsuta ādikān

original: sarugmicedisālvapo na yātu māgadho harim / 17.45 /
analyzed: na yātu māgadhaḥ harim

original: tatastu tān vinā'pare'dhirājarāja ityamum /
analyzed: tatas tu tān vinā aparedhi rājarājaḥ iti amum

original: clxxix.tadā'bhiṣektumudyatā nṛpāḥ sureśaśāsanāt / 17.46 /
analyzed: clxix tadā abhiṣektum udyatāḥ nṛpāḥ sureśa śāsanāt   /

original: ataḥ śacīpatirnijaṃ varāsanaṃ hareradāt /
analyzed: atas śacīpatiḥ nijam varāsanam hareḥ adāt

original: viveśa tatra keśavo nabhastal . āvatārite / 17.47 /
analyzed: viveśa tatra keśavaḥ nabhastal āvatārite

original: kare pragṛhya keśavo nyaveśayat sahā'sane /
analyzed: kare pragṛhya keśavaḥ nyaveśayat sahāsane

original: patatripuṅgavaṃ ca tau sa bhīṣmakānujau prabhuḥ / 17.48 /
analyzed: patatri puṅgavam ca tau sa bhīṣmaka anujau prabhuḥ

original: athākhilā nareśvarā munīndrasaṃ yutā harim /
analyzed: atha akhilāḥ nareśvarāḥ muni indrasam yutāḥ harim

original: suśātakaumbhakumbhakaiḥ pracakrurābhiṣekiṇam / 17.49 /
analyzed: su śāta kaumbha kumbhakaiḥ pracakruḥ ābhiṣekiṇam

original: viriñcaśarvapūrvakairabhiṣṭutaḥ surādibhiḥ /
analyzed: viriñca śarva pūrvakaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ sura ādibhiḥ

original: samastadevagāyakaiḥ pragīta āsa keśavaḥ / 17.50 /
analyzed: samasta deva gāyakaiḥ pragītaḥ āsa keśavaḥ

original: athā'ha bhīṣmakaṃ prabhuḥ svayaṃ varaḥ kila tvayā /
analyzed: athā āha bhīṣmakam prabhuḥ svayam varaḥ kila tvayā

original: abhīpsitaḥ sutākṛte śubhāya te bhavenna saḥ / 17.51 /
analyzed: abhīpsitaḥ sutā kṛte śubhāya te bhavet na saḥ

original: iyaṃ ramā tavā'tmajā babhūva tāṃ harernaca /
analyzed: iyam ramā tava ātmajā babhūva tām hareḥ na ca

original: dadāti cet tadā pitā nirindiro vrajedadhaḥ / 17.52 /
analyzed: dadāti ced tadā pitā nirindiraḥ vrajet adhas

original: hitāya caitadīritaṃ tavānyathā na cintaya /
analyzed: hitāya ca etat īritam tava anyathā na cintaya

original: na yoṣidicchayā tvahaṃ bravīmi paśya yādṛśaḥ / 17.53 /
analyzed: na yoṣit icchayā tu aham bravīmi paśya yādṛśaḥ

original: udīrya caivamīśvaraścakāra hā'virātmanaḥ /
analyzed: udīrya ca evam īśvaraḥ cakāra hāvirātmanaḥ

original: sa viśvarūpamuttamaṃ visaṅkhyaśīrṣabāhukam / 17.54 /
analyzed: sa viśva rūpam uttamam visaṅkhya śīrṣa bāhukam

original: anantateja ātataṃ visaṅkhyarūpasaṃ yutam /
analyzed: ananta tejaḥ ātatam visaṅkhya rūpasam yutam

original: vicitramaulikuṇḍalāṅgadoruhāranūpuram / 17.55 /
analyzed: vicitra mauli kuṇḍala aṅgada ūru hāra nūpuram

original: jvalatsukaustubhaprabhā'bhibhāsakaṃ śubhāmbaram /
analyzed: jvalat su kaustubha prabhā abhibhāsakam śubha ambaram

original: prapaśya yādṛśāḥ striyo mametyadarśayacchriyam / 17.56 /
analyzed: prapaśya yādṛśāḥ striyaḥ mama iti adarśayat śriyam

original: anantarūpiṇīṃ parāṃ manuṣyadṛṣṭito'dhikām /
analyzed: ananta rūpiṇīm parām manuṣya dṛṣṭitaḥ adhikām

original: svarugmiṇītanorapi vyadarśayacca devatāḥ / 17.57 /
analyzed: sva rugmiṇī tanoḥ api vyadarśayat ca devatāḥ

original: clxxx.tadadbhutaṃ samīkṣya tu prabhīta āṇsu bhīṣmakaḥ /
analyzed: clxxx tat adbhutam samīkṣya tu prabhītaḥ bhīṣmakaḥ

original: papāta pādayorvibhoḥ karomi tat tatheti ca / 17.58 /
analyzed: papāta pādayoḥ vibhoḥ karomi tat tathā iti ca

original: punaśca viśvarūpatāṃ pidhāya padmalocanaḥ /
analyzed: punar ca viśva rūpa tām pidhāya padma locanaḥ

original: jagāma pakṣivāhanaḥ purīṃ svabāhupālitām / 17.59 /
analyzed: jagāma pakṣivāhanaḥ purīm sva bāhu pālitām

original: apāmpatiśca maithilaḥ svayaṃ varaṅkṛt āvapi /
analyzed: apāmpatiḥ ca maithilaḥ svayam varaṅkṛt

original: hariṃ viniścayādiyaṃ vrajediti sma cakratuḥ / 17.60 /
analyzed: harim viniścayāt iyam vrajet iti sma cakratuḥ

original: svayaṃ varaḥ kṣiterbhujāṃ svadharma ityato dvayoḥ /
analyzed: svayam varaḥ kṣiteḥ bhujām svadharmaḥ iti atas dvayoḥ

original: na doṣa āsa bhīṣmako na keśavārthamaicchata / 17.61 /
analyzed: na doṣaḥ āsa bhīṣmakaḥ na keśava artham aicchata  /

original: ato harau prabodhya taṃ gate kṛpālusattame /
analyzed: atas harau prabodhya tam gate kṛpālu sattame

original: vaśīkṛte ca bhīṣmake nṛpāstvamantrayan punaḥ / 17.62 /
analyzed: vaśīkṛte ca bhīṣmake nṛpāḥ tu amantrayan punar

original: yaśaśca dharmamuttamaṃ vidhitsatā vṛkodare /
analyzed: yaśaḥ ca dharmam uttamam vidhitsatā vṛkodare

original: na keśavena sūdito jarāsuto hi manyate / 17.63 /
analyzed: na keśavena sūditaḥ jarāsutaḥ hi manyate

original: varācchivasya māmayaṃ na hantumīṣṭa uttamāt /
analyzed: varāt śivasya mām ayam na hantum īṣṭe uttamāt

original: ataḥ śivaprasādato jito'pi jeṣya uttaram / 17.64 /
analyzed: atas śiva prasādataḥ jitaḥ api jeṣye uttaram

original: mṛdhemṛdhe jito'pi san dṛḍhāṇsayā punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: mṛdhemṛdhe jitaḥ upi san dṛḍhāṇsayā punar punar

original: samīhate yudhe śivaṃ nacāvamanyate kvacit / 17.65 /
analyzed: samīhate yudhe śivam na ca avamanyate kvacid

original: ataḥ punaśca bhūmipānuvāca bārhadrathaḥ /
analyzed: atas punar ca bhūmipān uvāca bārhadrathaḥ

original: dhigeva pauruṣaṃ hi no yadeṣa no'jayat sadā / 17.66 /
analyzed: dhik eva pauruṣam hi naḥ yat eṣa nojayat sadā

original: abhūpaternacā'sanaṃ pradeyamityudāhṛtam /
analyzed: a bhūpateḥ na ca āsanam pradeyam iti udāhṛtam

original: amuṣya nastadanyathā babhūva cintitaṃ nṛpāḥ / 17.67 /
analyzed: amuṣya naḥ tat anyathā babhūva cintitam nṛpāḥ

original: ayaṃ nṛpottamāṅgaṇe mahendrapīṭhamāruhat /
analyzed: ayam nṛpa uttama aṅgaṇe mahā indra pīṭham āruhat

original: samastarājarājatāmavāpa no'pyanicchatām / 17.68 /
analyzed: samasta rāja rājatām avāpa na upi an icchatām

original: ataḥ punaḥ kathaṃ hariṃ vayaṃ jayema cintyatām /
analyzed: atas punar katham harim vayam jayema cintyatām

original: yathā cabhīṣmakātmajāmavāpnuyācca cedirāṭ/ 17.69 /
analyzed: yathā ca bhīṣmaka ātmajām avāpnuyāt ca cedi rāj

original: clxxxi.ayaṃ hi dattaputrako ma aurasād viśiṣyate /
analyzed: clxxiii ayam hi datta putrakaḥ me aurasāt viśiṣyate

original: ato niveśya eṣa me surūpiṇī ca rugmiṇī / 17.70 /
analyzed: atas niveśyaḥ eṣa me surūpiṇī ca rugmiṇī

original: śivāgameṣu ṇsiṣyakāḥ sarugmisālvapauṇḍrakāḥ /
analyzed: śiva āgameṣu sarugmisālva pauṇḍrakāḥ

original: mamākhilā nṛpāstataḥ kurudhvametadeva me / 17.71 /
analyzed: mama akhilāḥ nṛpāḥ tatas kurudhvam etat eva me  /

original: itīrite tu saubharāḍjagāda rugmisaṃ vidā /
analyzed: iti īrite tu saubha rāj jagāda rugmisam vidā

original: svayaṃ varo nivartitaḥ svasārameṣa dāsyati / 17.72 /
analyzed: svayam varaḥ nivartitaḥ svasāram eṣa dāsyati  /

original: nacātivartituṃ kṣamaḥ pitā'sya cedipāya tām /
analyzed: na ca ativartitum kṣamaḥ pitā asya cedipāya tām

original: pradātukāmamātmajaṃ vayogatastathā'balaḥ / 17.73 /
analyzed: pradātu kāmam ātmajam vayaḥ gataḥ tathā abalaḥ

original: svayaṃ tu kṛṣṇa etya no vijitya kanyakāṃ haret /
analyzed: svayam tu kṛṣṇaḥ etya naḥ vijitya kanyakām haret

original: tato'sya pūrvameva no hyabhāvatā kṛt ā ṇsubhā / 17.74 /
analyzed: tatas asya pūrvam eva na u hi abhāvatā kṛt ā

original: upāya eṣa cintito mayā'tra māgadheśvara /
analyzed: upāyaḥ eṣa cintitaḥ mayā atra māgadha īśvara

original: muniṃ hi garganāmakaṃ hyamuṣya sāla ākṣipat / 17.75 /

original: kṣaṇena keśavena tadbhayādapeyatuśca tau / 17.272 /

original: uvāsa tāṃ niśāṃ prabhuḥ sayādavo'mitaprabhaḥ / 17.273 /

haṃ saḍibhakavadho nāma saptadaśo'dhyāyaḥ

atha aṣṭādaśo'dhyāyaḥ

original: nijapratibhayā jānan sarvāstrāṇi tato'dhikam /

original: nānyadevā natāstena vāsudevānna pūjitāḥ / 18.6 /

original: na kṣatriyo hi bhavati yathā vrātyo dvijottamaḥ / 18.37 /

original: niruttare kṛte karṇe bhīmenaiva suyodhanaḥ /

analyzed: nītim sa kutsitatamām dhṛtarāṣṭra putreṣu ādhāt rahaḥ vacanataḥ śakuneḥ samastām

original: teṣāṃ svabhāvabalato rucitā ca saiva vistāritā ca nijabuddhibalādato'pi / 19.4 /
analyzed: teṣām svabhāva balataḥ rucitā ca sā eva vistāritā ca nija buddhi balāt atas api

original: dṛṣṭvā ṇsriyaṃ paramikāṃ vijayaṃ ca pārtheṣvāhedametya pitaraṃ saha saubalena / 19.5 /

analyzed: rājyam mahat ca samavāpsyati dharmasūnuḥ tvattaḥ thavā anuja balāt prasabham vayam tu

original: dāsā bhavema nijatantubhireva sākaṃ kuntīsutasya parato'pi tadanvayasya / 19.7 /
analyzed: dāsāḥ bhavema nija tantubhiḥ eva sākam kuntī sutasya paratas api tad anvayasya

original: nā'tmārthamasti mama duḥkhamathātiśuddhalokaprasiddhayaśasastava kīrtināṇsaḥ /
analyzed: na ātma artham asti mama duḥkham atha ati śuddha loka prasiddha yaśasaḥ tava

analyzed: asmad nimitte iti duḥkham atas hi sarve pi icchāma martum atha naḥ kuru ca api anujñām

original: evaṃ svaputravacanaṃ sa niśamya rājā provāca nānuguṇametadaho manaste /
analyzed: evam sva putra vacanam sa niśamya rājā provāca na anuguṇam etat aho manaḥ te

original: ko nāma pāṇḍutanayeṣu guṇottameṣu prītiṃ na yāti nijavīryabhavoccayeṣu / 19.9 /

analyzed: te hi sva bāhu bala tā ukhila bhūpa bhūtim mayi ākṛṣanti na ca vaḥ pratiṣedhakāḥ te

analyzed: tasmāt śamam vraja śubhāya kulasya tāta kṣemāya naḥ bhavati vaḥ balavat virodhaḥ  /

original: evaṃ bruvatyapi nṛpe punarāha pāpa āṇsritya saubalamataṃ yadi naiva pārthān /

analyzed: anyatra yāpayasi nāgapurāt paretān dṛṣṭvā akhilān api hi naḥ mudam ehi pārthaiḥ  /

original: ccxvii.evaṃ niśamya gaditaṃ sutahārdapāṇsairākṛṣyatā'śu sa nṛpo'ridharecchayaiva /
analyzed: evam niśamya gaditam suta hārda pāṇsaiḥ ākṛṣyata āśu sa nṛpa uridhara icchayā eva

original: ityukta āha pitaraṃ śakuniṃ nirīkṣya sṛṣṭo mayā vidhirihādya śṛṇuṣva taṃ ca /

original: āsaṃ strayodaśa samā nagaraṃ praviṣṭeṣveteṣu tāvadayameva vidhirmayeṣṭaḥ / 19.13 /
analyzed: āsam s trayodaśa samāḥ nagaram praviṣṭeṣu eteṣu tāvat ayam eva vidhiḥ mayā iṣṭaḥ  /

original: drauṇerhi nāsti sadṛśo balavān pratāpī so'yaṃ mayā bahuvidhaiḥ paramairupāyaiḥ /
analyzed: drauṇeḥ hi nā asti sadṛśaḥ balavān pratāpī saḥ uyam mayā bahuvidhaiḥ paramaiḥ upāyaiḥ

original: nīto vaśaṃ vaśagato'sya ca mātulena sākaṃ pitā tamanu caiṣa nadīprasūtaḥ / 19.14 /
analyzed: nītaḥ vaśam vaśa gataḥ asya ca mātulena sākam pitā tam anu ca eṣa nadī prasūtaḥ  /

original: evaṃ hi sainikagaṇā api dānamānaiḥ prāyo vaśaṃ mama gatā api caiṣa karṇaḥ /
analyzed: evam hi sainika gaṇāḥ api dāna mānaiḥ prāyas vaśam mama gatāḥ api ca eṣa karṇaḥ

original: astre bale'pyadhika eva surendrasūnorjeṣye ca mantrabalatastvahameva bhīmam / 19.15 /
analyzed: astre bale pi adhikaḥ eva sura indra sūnoḥ jeṣye ca mantra balataḥ tu aham eva bhīmam

original: triṃ śacchataṃ paramakāḥ suradurlabhāṇsca durvāsaso hi manavo'dya mayā gṛhīt āḥ /
analyzed: trim śat śatam paramakāḥ sura durlabhān ca durvāsasaḥ hi manavā udya mayā

original: anyatra te pravihitā nahi vīryavantaḥ syurbhīma ityahamamūn na niyojayāmi / 19.16 /
analyzed: anyatra te pravihitāḥ nahi vīryavantaḥ syuḥ bhīmaḥ iti aham amūn na niyojayāmi  /

original: te vīryadā vijayadā api vahnivāristambhādidāḥ sakaladevanikāyarodhāḥ /
analyzed: te vīrya dāḥ vijaya dāḥ api vahni vāri stambha ādi dāḥ sakala deva nikāya rodhāḥ

original: vṛṣṭyādyabhīpsitasamastakarā amūbhirjeṣyāmi bhīmamamumekamayātayāmaiḥ / 19.17 /
analyzed: vṛṣṭi ādi abhīpsita samasta karāḥ amūbhiḥ jeṣyāmi bhīmam amum ekam ayātayāmaiḥ

original: sauhārdameṣu yadivā'titarāṃ karoṣi tatrāpi naiva hi mayā kriyate virodhaḥ /
analyzed: sauhārdam eṣu yat iva atitarām karoṣi tatra api nā eva hi mayā kriyate virodhaḥ

original: vatsyantu vāraṇavate bhavatu sma rāṣṭraṃ teṣāṃ tadeva mama nāgapuraṃ tvadarthe / 19.18 /

original: evaṃ svaputraparipālanato yaśaste bhūyād vinaśyati paraprasavātipuṣṭau /
analyzed: evam sva putra paripālanataḥ yaśaḥ te bhūyāt vinaśyati para prasava atipuṣṭau

analyzed: kṣattā ekaḥ eva satatam paripoṣa kolam teṣām mama dviṣ atha mantra balāt amuṣya

original: te teṣu dūragamiteṣu nirāṇsrayatvānmāmeva durbalatayā paritaḥ śrayante /
analyzed: te teṣu dūra gamiteṣu nirāṇsraya tvāt mām eva durbala tayā paritas śrayante

original: bhīṣmādayaśca nahi tannikaṭe virodhaṃ kuryurvinaśyati gateṣu hi sauhṛdaṃ tat / 19.21 /
analyzed: bhīṣma ādayaḥ ca nahi tad nikaṭe virodham kuryuḥ vinaśyati gateṣu hi sauhṛdam tat

original: bhedaḥ kulasya bhavitā kulanāṇsaheturasmābhireṣu sahiteṣu pure vasatsu /
analyzed: bhedaḥ kulasya bhavitā kula nāṇsa hetuḥ asmābhiḥ eṣu sahiteṣu pure vasatsu

original: tasmādupāyabalataḥ pratiyātanīyāste vāraṇāvatamito vihito'pyupāyaḥ / 19.22 /
analyzed: tasmāt upāya balataḥ pratiyātanīyāḥ te vāraṇāvatam itaḥ vihitaḥ api upāyaḥ

original: ccxviii.bhaktāṇsca te hi nitarāmariśaṅkhapāṇau tvaccoditāḥ samupayānti tamutsavaṃ drāk / 19.23 /
analyzed: te hi nitarām ari śaṅkha pāṇau tvad coditāḥ samupayānti tam utsavam drāk

original: ajñāpya matpuruṣatāṃ puruṣairmadīyairmadhyasthavad bahuguṇā uditāṇsca tatra /
analyzed: a jñāpya mad puruṣa tām puruṣaiḥ madīyaiḥ madhyastha vat bahu guṇāḥ tatra

original: teṣāṃ puro'tra gamanābhiruciśca jātā draṣṭuṃ puraṃ bahuguṇaṃ nanu pāṇḍavānām / 19.24 /
analyzed: teṣām puras utra gamana abhiruciḥ ca jātā draṣṭum puram bahu guṇam nanu pāṇḍavānām  /

original: ityuktavatyatha sute sa tathetyuvāca prāpteṣu pāṇḍutanayeṣu tathaiva coce /
analyzed: iti uktavati atha sute sa tathā iti uvāca prāpteṣu pāṇḍu tanayeṣu tathā eva ca ūce

original: j ñātvaiva te'pi nṛpaterhṛdayaṃ samastaṃ jagmuḥ piteti pṛthayā saha nītihetoḥ / 19.25 /
analyzed: j ñātvā eva te api nṛpateḥ hṛdayam samastam jagmuḥ pitā iti pṛthayā saha nīti hetoḥ

original: bhīmastadā ha bhavitā'tra hi bhaikṣacāra ityeva samyaganuvidya nijaṃ na karma /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tadā ha bhavitā atra hi bhaikṣa cāraḥ iti eva samyak anuvidya nijam na karma

original: tyājyaṃ tviti pratijagāda nijāgrajāya yāmo vayaṃ natu gṛhāt sa hi naḥ svadharmaḥ / 19.26 /
analyzed: tyājyam tu iti pratijagāda nija agrajāya yāmaḥ vayam na tu gṛhāt sa hi naḥ svadharmaḥ

original: niṣkāl . ayanti yadi no nijadharmasaṃ sthān yotsyāmahe'tra nahi dasyuvadho'pyadharmaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkāl sthān yotsyāmahe itra nahi dasyu vadhaḥ upi adharmaḥ

original: ityūcivāṃ samamumāha ca dharmasūnuḥ kīrtirvinaśyati hi no gurubhirvirodhe / 19.27 /
analyzed: iti ūcivām sam amum āha ca dharmasūnuḥ kīrtiḥ vinaśyati hi naḥ gurubhiḥ virodhe

original: ityuktavākyamamumagrajamanvagāt sa bhīmaḥ pradarśya nijadharmamathānuvṛttyai /
analyzed: iti ukta vākyam amum agrajam anvagāt sa bhīmaḥ pradarśya nija dharmam atha anuvṛttyai

original: doṣo bhavedubhayato yata eva tena vācyaḥ svadharma uta na sthitiratra kāryā / 19.28 /
analyzed: doṣaḥ bhavet ubhayatas yatas eva tena vācyaḥ svadharmaḥ uta na sthitiḥ atra kāryā  /

original: kīrtyarthameva nijadharmapariprahāṇe prāpte'grajasya vacanāt pravihātumeva /
analyzed: kīrti artham eva nija dharma pariprahāṇe prāpta igrajasya vacanāt pravihātum eva

original: bhīmasya doṣamubhayaṃ pratihantumīśo jyeṣṭhaṃ cakāra hariratra sutaṃ vṛṣasya / 19.29 /
analyzed: bhīmasya doṣam ubhayam pratihantum īśaḥ jyeṣṭham cakāra hariḥ atra sutam vṛṣasya  /

original: hantavyatāmupagateṣu suyodhanādiṣvanyopadhānnahi bhavennijadharma eva /
analyzed: hantavya tām upagateṣu suyodhana ādiṣu anya upadhāt nahi bhavet nija dharmaḥ eva

original: pūrvaṃ vadhe nahi samastaśa eva doṣāsteṣāṃ prayānti vivṛtiṃ ca tadarthato'pi / 19.30 /
analyzed: pūrvam vadhe nahi samastaśas eva doṣāḥ teṣām prayānti vivṛtim ca

original: kṣattā'tha cā'ha suvaco'ntyajabhāṣayaiva dharmātmajaṃ viṣahutāṇsabhayāt pratīt āḥ /
analyzed: kṣattā atha ca āha suvacaḥ untyaja bhāṣayā eva dharmātmajam viṣa huta aṇsa bhayāt

original: ādhvaṃ tviti sma sa tatheti vaco'pyudīrya prāyācca vāraṇavataṃ pṛthayā'nujaiśca / 19.31 /
analyzed: ādhvam tu iti sma sa tathā iti vacaḥ api udīrya prāyāt ca vāraṇavatam pṛthayā anujaiḥ ca

original: t ān hantumeva ca tadā dhṛtarāṣṭrasūnurlākṣāgṛhaṃ sapadi kāñcanaratnagūḍham /
analyzed: t ān hantum eva ca tadā dhṛtarāṣṭra sūnuḥ lākṣā gṛham sapadi kāñcana ratna gūḍham

original: kṛtvā'bhyayātayadamutra hi viṣṇupadyā svāmātyameva ca purocananāmadheyam / 19.32 /
analyzed: kṛtvā abhyayātayat amutra hi viṣṇupadyā sva amātyam eva ca purocana nāmadheyam

original: pūrvaṃ prahasta iti yastvabhavat supāpaḥ so'bhyetya pāṇḍutanayānabhavacca mantrī /
analyzed: pūrvam prahastaḥ iti yaḥ tu abhavat su pāpaḥ saḥ abhyetya pāṇḍu tanayān abhavat ca mantrī

original: duryodhanaṃ prativihāya bhavatsakāṇsamāyāta ityavadadeṣu sakūṭavākyam / 19.33 /
analyzed: duryodhanam prativihāya bhavat sakāṇsamāyātaḥ iti avadat eṣu sa kūṭa vākyam

original: divyaṃ gṛhaṃ ca bhavatāṃ hi mayopanītaṃ prītyaiva pāpamanuyātumahaṃ na śaktaḥ /
analyzed: divyam gṛham ca bhavatām hi mayā upanītam prītyā eva pāpam anuyātum aham na śaktaḥ

original: yuṣmāsu dharmadhṛtimatsu sadā nivatsya ityūcivāṃ samamumāhuraho subhadram / 19.34 /
analyzed: yuṣmāsu dharma dhṛtimatsu sadā nivatsye iti ūcivām sam amum āhuḥ aho su bhadram

original: ccxix.dṛṣṭvaiva jātuṣagṛhaṃ vasayā sametaṃ tadgandhato vṛṣasutaḥ pavamānajātam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva jātuṣa gṛham vasayā sametam tad gandhataḥ vṛṣa sutaḥ pavamāna jātam

original: taṃ cātipāpamavadat sumukhaiṣa pāpo hantuṃ na icchati sadā bhava ca pratītaḥ / 19.35 /
analyzed: tam ca ati pāpam avadat su mukha eṣa pāpaḥ hantum naḥ icchati sadā bhava ca pratītaḥ  /

original: kṣattā'tha nītibalato'khilalokavṛttaṃ j ānan svacāramukhataḥ khanakāya coce /
analyzed: kṣattā atha nīti balataḥ khila loka vṛttam ānan sva cāra mukhataḥ khanakāya coce

original: uktvaiva dharmatanayāya madīyavākyaṃ pūrvoktamāṇsu kuru tatra bilaṃ sudūram / 19.36 /
analyzed: uktvā eva dharmatanayāya madīya vākyam kuru tatra bilam su dūram

original: cakre sa caivamatha vartma vṛticchalena dvāraṃ ca tasya sa pidhāya yayau gṛhaṃ svam /
analyzed: cakre sa ca evam atha vartma vṛti chalena dvāram ca tasya sa pidhāya yayau gṛham svam

original: bhīmaḥ purocana ubhāvapi tau vadhāya cchidrārthinau mitha utoṣaturabdakārddham / 19.37 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ purocanaḥ ubhau api tau vadhāya chidra arthinau mithas

analyzed: bhīma ubhayaḥ api gurubhiḥ sva mukhena yuddham a prīyamāṇaḥ uta dharmaja vākya hetoḥ

analyzed: ūhya eva tān api yayau dyunadīm ca tīrtvā kṣattra atisṛṣṭam adhiruhya jala prayāṇam

analyzed: viśvāsitāḥ vidura pūrva vacobhiḥ eva dāṇsa uditābhiḥ adhiruhya ca bhīma pṛṣṭham

original: hā pāṇḍavānadahadeṣa hi dhārtarāṣṭro dharmasthitān kumatireva purocanena /

original: paurebhya eva nikhilena ca bhīṣmamukhyā vaicitravīryasahitāstu niśamya heti /
analyzed: paurebhyaḥ eva nikhilena ca bhīṣma mukhyāḥ vaicitravīrya sahitāḥ tu niśamya ha iti

analyzed: ūcuḥ su duḥkhita dhiyaḥ atha suyodhana ādyāḥ kṣattā mṛṣā eva ruruduḥ yuyujuḥ ca karma

original: rakṣārthameva parijāgrati bhīmasene rakṣaḥ svasāramabhiyāpayate hiḍimbīm /

original: sā rūpametya śubhameva dadarśa bhīmaṃ sākṣāt samastaśubhalakṣaṇasārabhūtam / 19.48 /
analyzed: sā rūpam etya śubham eva dadarśa bhīmam sākṣāt samasta śubha lakṣaṇa sāra bhūtam  /

original: sā rākṣasītanumavāpa surendralokaśrīreva śakradayitā tvaparaiva śacyāḥ /
analyzed: sā rākṣasī tanum avāpa sura indra loka śrīḥ eva śakra dayitā tu aparā eva śacyāḥ

original: śāpāt spṛdhā patimavāpya ca mārutaṃ sā prāptuṃ nijāṃ tanumayācata bhīmasenam / 19.49 /
analyzed: śāpāt spṛdhā patim avāpya ca mārutam sā prāptum nijām tanum ayācata bhīmasenam  /

original: t āṃ bhīma āha kamanīyatanuṃ na pūrvaṃ jyeṣṭhādupaimi vanitāṃ nahi dharma eṣaḥ /
analyzed: t ām bhīmaḥ āha kamanīya tanum na pūrvam jyeṣṭhāt upaimi vanitām nahi dharmaḥ eṣaḥ

original: sā cā'ha kāmavaśagā punaretadeva svāveśayugdhi marudagryaparigrahasya / 19.50 /
analyzed: sā ca āha kāma vaśagā punar etat eva sva āveśa yuj hi marut agrya parigrahasya

original: sā bhāratī varamimaṃ pradadāvamuṣyai svāveśamātmadayitasya ca saṅgamena /
analyzed: sā bhāratī varam imam pradadau amuṣyai sva āveśam ātma dayitasya ca saṅgamena

original: śāpād vimuktimatitīvratapaḥ prasannā tenā'ha sā nijatanuṃ pavamānasūnoḥ / 19.51 /
analyzed: śāpāt vimukti mati tīvra tapaḥ prasannā tena āha sā nija tanum pavamāna sūnoḥ  /

original: j ñānaṃ ca naijamabhidarśayituṃ punaśca prāheśvaro'khilajagadgururindireśaḥ /
analyzed: ñānam ca naijam abhidarśayitum punar ca prāha īśvara ukhila jagadguruḥ indirā īśaḥ

original: vyāsasvarūpa iha cetya paraśva eva māṃ te pradāsyati tadā prakaroṣi me'rthyam / 19.52 /
analyzed: vyāsa svarūpaḥ iha cetya paraśvas eva mām te pradāsyati tadā prakaroṣi merthyam

original: kāle tadaiva kupitaḥ prayayau hiḍimbo bhīmaṃ nihantumapi tāṃ ca nijasvasāram /
analyzed: kāle tadā eva kupitaḥ prayayau hiḍimbaḥ bhīmam nihantum api tām ca nija svasāram

original: bhakṣārthameva hi purā sa tutāṃ nyayuṅkta netuṃ ca tānatha samāsadadāṇsu bhīmam / 19.53 /
analyzed: bhakṣa artham eva hi purā sa tu tām nyayuṅkta netum ca tān atha bhīmam

analyzed: sā bhīmam eva śaraṇam prajagāma tām ca bhrātṛm śca mātaram atha avitum abhyayāt tam

analyzed: bhīmaḥ su dūram apakṛṣya sahodarāṇām nidrā prabhaṅga bhayataḥ yuyudhe imunā ca

analyzed: tau muṣṭibhiḥ tarubhiḥ aśmabhiḥ adribhiḥ ca yuddhvā nitānta ravataḥ

original: sañcakratustadanu sodarasambhramaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mārutirahannurasi sma rakṣaḥ / 19.55 /

original: vaktrasravadbahulaśoṇitamāpa mṛtyuṃ prāyāt tamo'ndhamapi nityamatha krameṇa / 19.56 /
analyzed: vaktra sravat bahula śoṇitam āpa mṛtyum prāyāt tamaḥ ndham api nityam atha krameṇa

analyzed: hatvā eva śarvara rakṣita rākṣasam tam sarvaiḥ avadhyam api sodara mātṛ yuktaḥ

original: bhīmo yayau tamanu sā prayayau hiḍimbī kuntīṃ yudhiṣṭhiramathāsya kṛte yayāce / 19.57 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ yayau tam anu sā prayayau hiḍimbī kuntīm yudhiṣṭhiram atha asya kṛte yayāce  /

original: t ābhyāmanūktamapi yanna karoti bhīmaḥ prādurbabhūva nikhiloruguṇābhipūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: t ābhyām anūktam api yat na karoti bhīmaḥ prādurbabhūva nikhila uru guṇa abhipūrṇaḥ

original: ccxxi.vyāsātmako hariranantasukhāmburāṇsirvidyāmarīcivitataḥ sakalottamo'lam / 19.58 /
dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ paramamodina āṇsu pārthā mātrā sahaiva paripūjya guruṃ viriñceḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tam parama modinaḥ pārthāḥ mātrā saha eva paripūjya gurum viriñceḥ

analyzed: hariṇā parama ati hārda protphulla padma nayanena tadā upaviṣṭāḥ

analyzed: bhakti namra śirasaḥ samudīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ bhīmam jagāda nataḥ hiḍimbayā ca

analyzed: etām gṛhāṇa yuvatīm sura sadma śobhām ā āte sute saha sutā pratiyātu ca eṣā  /

original: evaṃ bruvatyagaṇitoruguṇe rameśa Oṃ ityudīrya kṛtavāṃ śca tathaiva bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: evam bruvati agaṇita uru guṇe rameśaḥ om iti udīrya kṛtavān ca tathā eva bhīmaḥ

analyzed: skandhena ca ūhya vibudha ācarita pradeśān bhīmam prayāti udaye eva raveḥ hiḍimbī  /

analyzed: sā nandana ādiṣu vaneṣu vihṛtya tena sāyam prayāti pṛthayā sahitān śca pārthān

analyzed: evam yayau api tayoḥ iha vatsara arddhaḥ jātaḥ ca sūnuḥ ati vīrya bala upapannaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ ghaṭopamamamuṣya śiro babhūva keśā nimeṣata udāsurato hi nāma / 19.63 /
analyzed: pūrvam ghaṭa upamam amuṣya śiraḥ babhūva keśāḥ nimeṣataḥ udāsuḥ atas hi nāma

analyzed: smṛtyā abhiyāne ubhayoḥ api sā pratijñām teṣām vidhāya ca yayau sura lokam eva

analyzed: yātaḥ vadhāya parama agaṇita uru dhāmā pūrṇa akṣaya uru sukhaḥ tadā eka cakrām

analyzed: āyāmi kālaḥ iti tān anuśāsya ca ayāt te tatra vāsam atha cakruḥ anūcya vedān

analyzed: bhikṣām aṭatsu satatam pratihuṅkṛtena bhīme viśām sadane eva gṛha pramāṇam

analyzed: bhāṇḍam kulāla vihitam pratigṛhya gacchati āṇ saṅkayā avagamanasya tam āha dhārmaḥ

analyzed: sthūlam hi sadma pṛthivī sahitam tu arakṣaḥ uddhṛtya vahni mukhataḥ tat u ca ekadoṣṇā

analyzed: bhāṇḍam tad artham uru kumbhakareṇa dattam bhikṣām ca tena carasi pratihuṅkṛtena

original: dharmasya te suniyaterbalataśca bodho bhūyāt suyodhanajanasya tato bhayaṃ me /
analyzed: dharmasya te su niyateḥ balataḥ ca bodhaḥ bhūyāt suyodhana janasya tatas bhayam me

original: mātrā sahaiva vasa phalgunapūrvakaistvamānītameva paribhuṅkṣva natu vrajethāḥ / 19.69 /
analyzed: mātrā saha eva vasa phalguna pūrvakaiḥ tvam ānītam eva paribhuṅkṣva na tu vrajethāḥ

original: ccxxii.ityukta āṇsu sa cakāra tathaiva bhīmaste'pi svadharmaparirakṣaṇahetumaunāḥ /
analyzed: sa cakāra tathā eva bhīmaḥ te pi svadharma parirakṣaṇa hetu maunāḥ

original: bhikṣāṃ carantyatha caturṣvapi teṣu yāteṣvekatra mātṛsahitaḥ sa kadācidāste / 19.70 /
analyzed: bhikṣām caranti atha caturṣu api teṣu yāteṣu ekatra mātṛ sahitaḥ sa kadācid āste  /

original: tatkāla eva ruditaṃ nijavāsahetorviprasya dārasahitasya niśamya bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: tad kāle eva ruditam nija vāsa hetoḥ viprasya dāra sahitasya niśamya bhīmaḥ

original: strībālasaṃ yutagṛhe śiśulāl . anādau lajjediti sma jananīmavadannacāgāt / 19.71 /
analyzed: strī bāla sam yuta gṛhe anādau lajjet iti sma jananīm avadat na ca āgāt

original: j ānīhi vipraruditaṃ kuta ityataśca yogyaṃ vidhāsya iti sā prayayau ca śīghram /
analyzed: ānīhi vipraruditam kutas iti atas ca yogyam vidhāsye iti sā prayayau ca śīghram

original: sā saṃ vṛtaiva sakalaṃ vacanaṃ gṛhe'sya śuśrāva vipravara āha tadā priyāṃ saḥ / 19.72 /
analyzed: sā sam vṛtā eva sakalam vacanam gṛhesya śuśrāva vipra varaḥ āha tadā priyām saḥ

original: dātavya eva hi karo'dya ca rakṣaso'sya sākṣād bakasya girisannibhabhakṣyabhojyaḥ /
analyzed: dātavyaḥ eva hi kara udya ca rakṣasaḥ usya sākṣāt bakasya giri sannibha bhakṣya bhojyaḥ

original: puṃ sā'nasā ca sahitānaḍuhā pumāṃ stu naivāsti no'pradadatāṃ ca samastanāṇsaḥ / 19.73 /
analyzed: pumān sa anasā ca sahitā anaḍuhā pumān stu na eva asti na upradadatām ca

original: anyatra yāma iti pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ me naitat priye tava manogatamāsa tena /
analyzed: anyatra yāmaḥ iti pūrvam udāhṛtam me na etat priye tava manogatam āsa tena

original: yāsyāmi rākṣasamukhaṃ svayameva martuṃ bhāryainamāha na bhavānahamatra yāmi / 19.74 /
analyzed: yāsyāmi rākṣasa mukham svayam eva martum bhāryā enam āha na bhavān aham atra yāmi  /

original: arthe tavādya tanusantyajanādahaṃ syāṃ loke satīpracarite tadṛte tvadhaśca /
analyzed: arthe tava adya tanu santyajanāt aham syām loke satī pracarite tat ṛte tu adhas ca

original: kanyā'ha cainamahameva na kanyayā'rtha ityukta āha dhigiti sma sa vipravaryaḥ / 19.75 /
analyzed: kanyā āha ca enam aham eva na kanyayā arthaḥ iti uktaḥ āha dhik iti sma sa vipra varyaḥ

original: kanyoditā bata kuladvayatāriṇīti jāyā sakheti vacanaṃ śrutigaṃ sutaśca /
analyzed: kanyā uditā bata kula dvaya tāriṇī iti jāyā sakhā iti vacanam śruti gam sutaḥ ca

original: ātmaiva tena natu jīvanahetuto'haṃ dhīpūrvakaṃ nṛśanake pratipādayāmi / 19.76 /
analyzed: ātmā eva tena na tu jīvana hetutaḥ uham dhī pūrvakam nṛśanake pratipādayāmi

original: evaṃ rudatsu sahiteṣu kumārako'sya prāha svahastagatṛṇaṃ pratidarśya caiṣām /
analyzed: evam rudatsu sahiteṣu kumārakaḥ usya prāha sva hastaga tṛṇam pratidarśya ca eṣām

original: etena rākṣasamahaṃ nihaniṣya evetyukte suvākyamanu sā praviveśa kuntī / 19.77 /
analyzed: etena rākṣasam aham nihaniṣye eva iti ukte su vākyam anu sā praviveśa kuntī

original: pṛṣṭastayā'ha sa tu vipravaro bakasya vīryaṃ balaṃ ca ditijāribhirapyasahyam /

analyzed: bāhvoḥ balāt abhihṛtam hi mayā aṅga rājyam tat tvam gṛhāṇa yudhi karmakaraḥ ca me syāḥ  /

original: tayaivānyāḥ sarvadā'nupraviṣṭāstāsāṃ madhye jāmbavatī pradhānā / 20.60 /

original: rāmeṇa tulyā jāmbavatī priyatve kṛṣṇasyānyāḥ kiñcidūnāṇsca tasyāḥ /
analyzed: rāmeṇa tulyā jāmbavatī priya tve kṛṣṇasya anyāḥ tasyāḥ

original: yadā'veśo bahulaḥ syād ramāyāstadā tāsu prīyate keśavo'lam / 20.61 /
analyzed: yadā āveśaḥ bahulaḥ syāt ramāyāḥ tadā tāsu prīyate

original: yadā'veśo hrāsamupaiti tatra pradyumnato viṃ śaguṇādhikāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: yadā āveśaḥ hrāsam upaiti tatra pradyumnataḥ viṃ śa guṇa adhikāḥ syuḥ

original: anāditastāḥ keśavānnānyasaṃ sthā reme tābhiḥ keśavo dvāravatyām / 20.62 /
analyzed: anāditaḥ tāḥ sthāḥ reme tābhiḥ keśavaḥ dvāravatyām

original: evaṃ kṛṣṇe dvārakāmadhyasaṃ sthe giriṃ bhūpā raivatakaṃ samāyayuḥ /
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇe dvārakā madhya sam sthe girim bhūpāḥ raivatakam samāyayuḥ

original: duryodhanādyāḥ pāṇḍavāṇscaiva sarve nānādeśyā yecabhūpālasaṅghāḥ / 20.63 /
analyzed: duryodhana ādyāḥ sarve nānādeśyāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ t ān draṣṭumabhyāgatān sa kṛṣṇo girau raivatake dadarśa /
analyzed: ātmānam t ān draṣṭum abhyāgatān sa kṛṣṇaḥ girau raivatake dadarśa

original: namaskṛte sarvanarendramukhyaiḥ kṛṣṇe vaidarbhyā saha divyāsanasthe / 20.64 /
analyzed: namaskṛte sarva narendra mukhyaiḥ kṛṣṇe vaidarbhyā saha divya āsana sthe

original: etyā'kāṇsānnāradaḥ kṛṣṇamāha sarvottamastvaṃ tvādṛśo nāsti kaścit /
analyzed: eti ākāṇsāt nāradaḥ kṛṣṇam āha sarva uttamaḥ tvam tvādṛśaḥ nā asti kaścid

original: ityāṇscaryo dhanya ityeva śabdadvaye tūkte vāsudevastamāha / 20.65 /
analyzed: iti āṇscaryaḥ dhanyaḥ iti eva śabda dvaye tu ukte vāsudevaḥ tam āha

original: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sākamityeva kṛṣṇaṃ papracchuretat kimiti sma bhūpāḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sākam iti eva kṛṣṇam papracchuḥ etat kim iti sma bhūpāḥ

original: nārāyaṇo munimūce vadeti śṛṇudhvamityāha sa nārado'pi / 20.66 /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ munim ūce vada iti śṛṇudhvam iti āha sa nāradaḥ api

original: kūrmo dṛṣṭo viṣṇupadyāṃ mayoktastvamuttamo nāsti samastaveti /
analyzed: kūrmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ viṣṇupadyām mayā uktaḥ tvam uttamaḥ na asti samaḥ tava iti

original: ūce gaṅgāmuttamāṃ sā jaleśamumāmūce pṛthivīnāmikāṃ saḥ / 20.67 /
analyzed: ūce gaṅgām uttamām sā jaleśam umām ūce pṛthivī nāmikām saḥ

original: yā mādṛśā devatāḥ sarvaśastā dhṛt āstayā prathitatvāt pṛthivyā /
analyzed: yāḥ mādṛśāḥ devatāḥ sarvaśas tāḥ dhṛt āstayā prathita tvāt pṛthivyā

original: śivaṃ śeṣaṃ garuḍaṃ cā'ha sā'pi paravānāt parvatanāmadheyān / 20.68 /
analyzed: śivam śeṣam garuḍam ca āha sā api para vānāt parvata nāmadheyān

original: tairevāhaṃ matsamāṇscaiva devyo dhriyanta ityeva ta ūcire'tha /
analyzed: taiḥ eva aham mad samān ca eva devyaḥ dhriyante iti eva te ūciretha

original: brahmāṇamevottamamāha so'pi vedātmikāṃ prakṛtiṃ viṣṇupatnīm / 20.69 /
analyzed: brahmāṇam evā uttamam āha saḥ upi veda ātmikām prakṛtim viṣṇu patnīm

original: ccxlii.saikā devī bahurūpā babhāṣe yuktā yadā'haṃ j ñena nārāyaṇena /
analyzed: devī bahu rūpā babhāṣe yuktā yadā aham j ñena nārāyaṇena

original: yajñakriyāmāninī yajñanāmnī tadottamā tatpraveśāt tadākhyā / 20.70 /
analyzed: yajña kriyā māninī yajña nāmnī tadā uttamā tad praveśāt tad ākhyā

original: viṣṇvāviṣṭā yajñanāmnī tadaṅkasthitā soce keśavo hyuttamo'lam /
analyzed: viṣṇu āviṣṭā yajña nāmnī tad aṅka sthitā soce keśavaḥ

original: na tatsamaścādhiko'taḥ kutaḥ syādṛṣe satyaṃ nānyatheti sma bhūyaḥ / 20.71 /
analyzed: na tad samaḥ ca adhika utas kutas syāt ṛṣe satyam na anyathā iti sma bhūyas

original: tayokto'haṃ nāvatāreṣu kaścid viśeṣa ityeva yadupravīram /
analyzed: tayā uktā uham na avatāreṣu kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti eva yadu pravīram

original: sarvottamo'sītyavadaṃ sa cā'ha na kevalaṃ me'ṅkagāyāḥ śriyo'ham / 20.72 /
analyzed: sarva uttamaḥ asi iti avadam sa ca āha na kevalam meṅkagāyāḥ śriyāḥ ham

original: sadottamaḥ kintu yadā tu sā me vāmārddharūpā dakṣiṇānāmadheyā /
analyzed: sadā uttamaḥ kintu yadā tu sā me vāma arddha rūpā dakṣiṇā nāmadheyā

original: yasmāt tasyā dakṣiṇataḥ sthito'haṃ tasmānnāmnā dakṣiṇetyeva sā syāt / 20.73 /
analyzed: yasmāt tasyāḥ dakṣiṇatas sthitaḥ uham tasmāt nāmnā dakṣiṇā iti eva sā syāt  /

original: sā dakṣiṇāmāninī devatā casā ca sthitā bahurūpā madarddhā /
analyzed: sā dakṣiṇā māninī devatā ca sā ca sthitā bahu rūpā mad arddhā

original: vāmārddho me tatpraviṣṭo yato hi tato'haṃ syāmarddhanārāyaṇākhyaḥ / 20.74 /
analyzed: vāma arddhaḥ me tad praviṣṭaḥ yatas hi tatas ham syām arddhanārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ

original: tadā'pyasyā uttamo'haṃ supūrṇo namādṛśaḥ kaścidastyuttamo vā /
analyzed: tadā api asyāḥ uttamaḥ ūham su pūrṇaḥ na mādṛśaḥ kaścid asti uttamaḥ vā

original: ityevāvādīd dakṣiṇābhiḥ saheti sarvottamatvaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ smarantsaḥ / 20.75 /
analyzed: iti eva avādīt dakṣiṇābhiḥ saha iti sarva uttama tvam dakṣiṇānām smaran saḥ

original: t ābhiścaitābhirdakṣiṇābhiḥ sametād variṣṭho'haṃ jagataḥ sarvadaiva /
analyzed: ābhiḥ ca etābhiḥ dakṣiṇābhiḥ sametāt variṣṭhaḥ ūham jagataḥ sarvadā eva

original: matsāmarthyānnaiva cānantabhāgo dakṣiṇānāṃ vidyate nāradeti / 20.76 /
analyzed: mad sāmarthyāt nā eva ca ananta bhāgaḥ dakṣiṇānām vidyate nārada iti

original: uktaṃ kṛṣṇenāpratimena bhūpā anyottamatvaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ ca śaśvat /
analyzed: uktam kṛṣṇena apratimena bhūpāḥ anya uttama tvam dakṣiṇānām ca śaśvat

original: seyaṃ bhaiṣmī dakṣiṇā keśavo'yaṃ tasyāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ paśyata rājasaṅghāḥ / 20.77 /
analyzed: sā iyam bhaiṣmī dakṣiṇā keśavoyam tasyāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ paśyata rāja saṅghāḥ

original: pratyakṣaṃ vo vīryamasyāpi kuntyā yudhe'rthitaḥ keśavo vīryamasyai /
analyzed: pratyakṣam vaḥ vīryam asya api kuntyā yudhā īrthitaḥ keśavaḥ vīryam asyai

original: adarśayat pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrān bhīṣmadroṇadrauṇikṛpān sakarṇān /
analyzed: adarśayat pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrān bhīṣma droṇa drauṇi kṛpān sa karṇān

original: nirāyudhāṃ ścakra ekaḥ kṣaṇena lokaśreṣṭhān daivatairapyajeyān / 20.78 /
analyzed: nirāyudhām ekaḥ kṣaṇena loka śreṣṭhān daivataiḥ api ajeyān

original: vrataṃ bhīmasyāsti naivābhi kṛṣṇamiyāmiti smā'jñayā tasya viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: vratam bhīmasya asti na eva abhi kṛṣṇam iyām iti sma ājñayā tasya viṣṇoḥ

original: cakraṃ rathasyāgrahīt sa praṇamya kṛṣṇaṃ sa taṃ keśavo'pāharacca / 20.79 /
analyzed: cakram rathasya agrahīt sa praṇamya kṛṣṇam sa tam keśava upāharat ca

original: evaṃ krīḍanto'pyātmaśaktyā prayatnaṃ kurvantaste vijitāḥ keśavena /
analyzed: evam krīḍantaḥ api ātma śaktyā prayatnam kurvantaḥ te vijitāḥ keśavena

original: tataḥ sarve nemurasmai pṛthā ca savismayā vāsudevaṃ nanāma / 20.80 /
analyzed: tatas sarve nemuḥ asmai pṛthā ca sa vismayā vāsudevam nanāma

original: evaṃ vidhānyadbhutānīha kṛṣṇe dṛṣṭāni vaḥ śatasāhasraśaśca /
analyzed: evaṃvidhāni adbhutāni iha kṛṣṇe dṛṣṭāni vaḥ śata sāhasraśas ca

original: ccxliii.tasmādeṣa hyadbhuto'tyuttamaścetyuktā nemuste'khilā vāsudevam / 20.81 /
analyzed: tasmāt eṣa hi adbhuta utyuttamaḥ ca iti uktāḥ nemuḥ te khilāḥ vāsudevam

original: vāyvājñayā vāyuśiṣyaḥ sa satyamityādyuktvā nārado rugmiṇīṃ ca /
analyzed: vāyu ājñayā vāyu śiṣyaḥ sa satyam ityādi uktvā nāradaḥ rugmiṇīm ca

original: stutvā puṣpaṃ pārijātasya datvā yayau lokaṃ kṣipramabjodbhavasya / 20.82 /
analyzed: stutvā puṣpam pārijātasya da tvā yayau lokam kṣipram abja udbhavasya

analyzed: sākṣāt satyā rugmiṇī iti ekasam vid dvidhā bhūtā na atra bhedaḥ usti kaścid

original: tathā'pi sā pramadānāṃ svabhāvaprakāṇsanārthaṃ kupitevā'sa satyā / 20.83 /
analyzed: tathā api sā pramadānām svabhāva prakāṇsana artham kupitā iva āsa satyā

original: sākaṃ rugmiṇyā rājamadhye praveśāt stavādṛṣeḥ puṣpadānācca devīm /
analyzed: sākam rugmiṇyāḥ rāja madhye praveśāt stavāt ṛṣeḥ puṣpa dānāt ca devīm

original: kopānanaṃ darśayantīmuvāca viḍambārthaṃ kāmijanasya kṛṣṇaḥ / 20.84 /
analyzed: kopa ānanam darśayantīm uvāca viḍamba artham kāmi janasya kṛṣṇaḥ

original: dātāsmyahaṃ pārijātaṃ taruṃ ta ityeva tatrāthā'gamad vāsavo'pi /
analyzed: dātāsmi aham pārijātam tarum te iti eva tatra atha agamat vāsavaḥ pi

original: sarvairdevairbhaumajito'pyadityāstenaivātho kuṇḍalābhyāṃ hṛt ābhyām / 20.85 /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ devaiḥ bhaumajitā upi adityāḥ tena eva atho kuṇḍalābhyām hṛd ābhyām

original: tadaivā'gurmunayastena tunnā badaryāste sarva evā'śu kṛṣṇam /
analyzed: tadā eva aguḥ munayaḥ tena tunnāḥ badaryāḥ te sarve eva āśu kṛṣṇam

original: yayācire bhaumavadhāya natvā stutvā stotrairvaidikaistāntrikaiśca / 20.86 /
analyzed: yayācire bhauma vadhāya natvā stutvā stotraiḥ vaidikaiḥ tāntrikaiḥ ca

analyzed: indreṇa devaiḥ sahitena yācitaḥ vipraiḥ ca sasmāra vihaṅga rājam

original: āgamya natvā purataḥ sthitaṃ tamāruhya satyāsahito yayau hariḥ / 20.87 /
analyzed: āgamya natvā puratas sthitam tam āruhya satyā sahitaḥ yayau hariḥ

original: nityaiva yā prakṛtiḥ svecchayaiva jagacchikṣārthaṃ dvādaśīṃ bhīmasañjñām /
analyzed: nityā eva yā prakṛtiḥ sva icchayā eva jagat śikṣā artham dvādaśīm bhīma sañjñām
