analyzed: upoṣya babhre koṭi dhārā jalasya viṣṇoḥ prīti artham sā eva hi satyabhāmā

original: tayā yukto garuḍaskandhasaṃ stho dūrānuyāto vajrabhṛt ā'pyanujñām /
analyzed: tayā yuktaḥ dūra anuyātaḥ vajrabhṛt

original: datvā'muṣmai prayayau vāyujuṣṭāmāṇsāṃ kṛṣṇo bhaumavadhe dhṛt ātmā / 20.89 /
analyzed: da tvā amuṣmai prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ bhauma vadhe dhṛt ātmā

original: bhaumo hyāsīd brahmavarādavadhyo na śastrabhṛjjīyasa ityamuṣmai /
analyzed: bhaumaḥ hi āsīt brahma varāt avadhyaḥ na śastrabhṛt jīyase iti amuṣmai

original: datto varo brahmaṇā tadvadeva tasyāmātyānāṃ tadvadavadhyatā ca/ 20.90 /
analyzed: dattaḥ varaḥ brahmaṇā tadvat eva tasya amātyānām tadvat avadhya tā ca

original: bhaumena jayyatvamapi hyamīṣāṃ dattaṃ bhaumāya brahmaṇā kroḍarūpāt /
analyzed: bhaumena jayya tvam api hi amīṣām dattam bhaumāya brahmaṇā kroḍa rūpāt

original: viṣṇorjātāyāsya durgaṃ ca dattaṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma puraṃ samastaiḥ / 20.91 /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ jātāya asya durgam ca dattam prāgjyotiṣam nāma puram samastaiḥ

original: āsīd bāhye giridurgaṃ tadantaḥ pānīyadurgaṃ mauravaṃ pāṇsadurgam /
analyzed: āsīt bāhye giri durgam tad antar pānīya durgam mauravam pāṇsa durgam

original: tasyāpyantaḥ kṣuradhāropamaṃ tat pāṇsāṇsca te ṣaṭsahasrāṇsca ghorāḥ /
analyzed: tasya api antar kṣura dhārā upamam tat pāṇsāṇs ca te ṣaṣ sahasrāṇs ca ghorāḥ

original: abhedyatvamaribhiratāryatā ca dattā durgāṇāṃ brahmaṇā'rādhitena / 20.92 /
analyzed: abhedya tvam aribhiḥ a tārya tā ca dattā durgāṇām brahmaṇā ārādhitena

original: ccxliv.tasyāmātyāḥ pīṭhamurau nisumbhahayagrīvau pañcajanaśca śūrāḥ /
analyzed: ccxlivtasya amātyāḥ pīṭha murau nisumbha hayagrīvau pañcajanaḥ ca śūrāḥ

original: saṅkalpya tān lokapālānahaṃ ca brahmetyaddhā bhāṣamāṇaḥ sa āste / 20.93 /
analyzed: saṅkalpya tān lokapālān aham ca brahmā iti addhā bhāṣamāṇaḥ saḥ āste  /

original: hantuṃ kṛṣṇo narakaṃ tatra gatvā giridurgaṃ gadayā nirbibheda /
analyzed: hantum kṛṣṇaḥ narakam tatra gatvā giri durgam gadayā nirbibheda

original: vāyavyāstreṇodakaṃ śoṣayitvā cakarta khaḍgena murasya pāṇsān / 20.94 /
analyzed: vāyavya astreṇa udakam śoṣayitvā cakarta khaḍgena murasya pāṇsān

original: athābhipeturmurapīṭhau nisumbhahayagrīvau pañcajanaśca daityāḥ /
analyzed: athā abhipetuḥ mura pīṭhau nisumbha hayagrīvau pañcajanaḥ ca daityāḥ

original: t āñchailaśastrāstraśilābhivarṣiṇaṇscakre vyasūṃ ścakranikṛttakandharān / 20.95 /
analyzed: t ān śaila śastra astra śilā abhivarṣiṇaṇ cakre vyasūm ścakra nikṛtta kandharān

original: teṣāṃ sutāḥ saptasaptoruvīryā varādavadhyā giriśasyābhipetuḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sutāḥ saptasapta uru vīryāḥ varāt avadhyāḥ giriśasya abhipetuḥ

original: t ānastraśastrābhimucaḥ śarottamaiḥ samarpayāmāsa sa mṛtyave'cyutaḥ / 20.96 /
analyzed: t ānastra śastra abhimucaḥ śara uttamaiḥ samarpayāmāsa sa mṛtyave cyutaḥ  /

original: hatvā pañcatriṃ śato mantriputrān jagāma bhaumasya sakāṇsamāṇsu /
analyzed: hatvā pañcatrim śataḥ mantri putrān jagāma bhaumasya

original: śrutvā bhaumaḥ kṛṣṇamāyātamārādakṣohiṇītriṃ śakenābhyayāt tam / 20.97 /
analyzed: śrutvā bhaumaḥ kṛṣṇam āyātam ārāt akṣohiṇī trim śakena abhyayāt tam

original: jaghne senāṃ garuḍaḥ pakṣapātaiḥ pādaṃ śeṣāṃ keśavaḥ sāyakaughaiḥ /
analyzed: jaghne senām garuḍaḥ pakṣapātaiḥ pādam śeṣām keśavaḥ sāyaka oghaiḥ

original: athā'sasādā'śu bhaumo'cyutaṃ taṃ muñcañcharānastrasammantritān drāk /
analyzed: athā āsasāda āśu bhauma ucyutam tam muñcan śarān astra sammantritān drāk

original: vivyādha taṃ keśavaḥ sāyakaughairbhaumaḥ śataghnīṃ brahmadattāmamuñcat / 20.98 /
analyzed: vivyādha tam keśavaḥ sāyaka oghaiḥ bhaumaḥ śataghnīm brahma dattām amuñcat  /

original: acchedyo'bhedyo nityasaṃ vitsukhātmā nityāvyayaḥ pūrṇaṇsaktiḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: acchedyaḥ ubhedyaḥ nitya sam vid sukha ātmā nitya avyayaḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ

original: nigīrya tāṃ devavaraḥ śataghnīṃ nityāṇsrānto'darśayacchrāntavacca / 20.99 /
analyzed: nigīrya tām deva varaḥ śataghnīm

original: bahūn varān brahmaṇo'nyeṣvamoghān moghīkṛt ān vīkṣya parātpareśaḥ /
analyzed: bahūn varān brahmaṇaḥ nyeṣu amoghān moghīkṛt ān vīkṣya parātpara īśaḥ

original: bhavet kathañcid bahumānena yukta ityeva kṛṣṇo'darśayacchrāntavat svam / 20.100 /
analyzed: bhavet kathañcid bahu mānena yuktaḥ iti eva kṛṣṇaḥ adarśayat śrānta vat svam

original: tadā dṛptaṃ narakaṃ vīkṣya devī satyā'dade kārmukaṃ śārṅgasañjñam /
analyzed: tadā dṛptam narakam vīkṣya devī satī ādade kārmukam śārṅga sañjñam

original: cakāra taṃ yatamānaṃ ca bhaumaṃ nirāyudhaṃ virathaṃ ca kṣaṇena / 20.101 /
analyzed: cakāra tam yatamānam ca bhaumam nirāyudham viratham ca kṣaṇena

original: āliṅgya kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmāṃ punaśca rathāntare saṃ sthitaṃ bhaumamugram /
analyzed: āliṅgya kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām punar ca ratha antare sam sthitam bhaumam ugram

original: sṛjantamastrāṇyariṇā nikṛttakandhaṃ mṛtyorarpayāmāsa śīghram / 20.102 /
analyzed: sṛjantam astrāṇi ariṇā nikṛtta kandham mṛtyoḥ arpayāmāsa śīghram

original: sa mantribhirmantriputraiḥ sameto jagāma kṛṣṇāvajñayā'ndhaṃ tamaśca /
analyzed: sa mantribhiḥ mantri putraiḥ sametaḥ jagāma kṛṣṇa avajñayā andham tamaḥ ca

original: tadāviṣṭo vāyuragācca kṛṣṇamantaḥ puraṃ prāviśat satyayeśaḥ / 20.103 /

virocamānasya sadā jagatprabhornavai viśeṣaḥ kvacidacyutasya /

analyzed: anyāḥ devīḥ svāpayitvā tasyāḥ bhāratyāḥ pūrṇa bhoga artham eva

original: tilottamārthe nihatau parasparaṃ tayorvadhārthe sṛṣṭayā tena daityau / 20.150 /
analyzed: tilottamā arthe nihatau parasparam tayoḥ vadha arthe sṛṣṭayā tena daityau

original: ccxlix.ataḥ pṛthag vatsarato bhavatsu kramāt kṛṣṇā tiṣṭhatāṃ yo'nyayuktām /
analyzed: pṛthak vatsarataḥ bhavatsu kramāt kṛṣṇā tiṣṭhatām yoni a yuktām

original: paśyed vo'sau vatsaraṃ tīrthayātrāṃ kuryāditi smātha cakrustathā te/ 20.151 /
analyzed: paśyet vaḥ asau vatsaram tīrtha yātrām kuryāt iti sma atha cakruḥ tathā te

original: tataḥ kadācid dharmarājena yuktāṃ śastrāgāre vipragorakṣaṇārtham /
analyzed: tatas kadācid dharmarājena yuktām śastrāgāre vipra go rakṣaṇa artham

original: śastrāditsuḥ phalguno'drāk sa śastrairdasyūn hatvā tīrthayātronmukho'bhūt / 20.152 /
analyzed: śastra āditsuḥ phalguna udrāk sa śastraiḥ dasyūn hatvā tīrtha yātrā unmukhaḥ bhūt

original: yudhiṣṭhirādyaiḥ sauhṛdād vārito'pi yayau satyārthaṃ sa kadācid dyunadyām /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira ādyaiḥ sauhṛdāt vāritaḥ upi yayau satya artham sa kadācid dyunadyām

original: kurvan snānaṃ māyayā nāgavadhvā hṛto lokaṃ bhujagānāṃ kṣaṇena / 20.153 /
analyzed: kurvan snānam māyayā nāga vadhvā hṛtaḥ lokam bhujagānām kṣaṇena

original: tasyāḥ pitā garuḍenā'ttapatyuḥ putrākāṅkṣī codayāmāsa pārtham /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pitā garuḍena ātta patyuḥ putra ākāṅkṣī codayāmāsa pārtham

original: saṃ vatsarabrahmacarye tu pārthaiḥ kṛṣṇāhetoḥ samaye sādhu baddham / 20.154 /
analyzed: sam vatsara brahmacarye tu pārthaiḥ kṛṣṇā hetoḥ samaye sādhu baddham

original: punaḥ punaryācyamānaḥ sa pārthaḥ putrārthamasyā bhujagena tasyām /
analyzed: punar punar yācyamānaḥ sa pārthaḥ putra artham asyāḥ bhujagena tasyām

original: utpādayāmāsa sutaṃ kujāṃ śaṃ nāmnairāvantaṃ varuṇāveśayuktam / 20.155 /
analyzed: utpādayāmāsa sutam kujām śam nāmnā airāvantam varuṇa āveśa yuktam

original: guṇāḥ piturmātṛj ātiḥ sutānāṃ yasmāt satāṃ prāyaśastena nāgaḥ /
analyzed: guṇāḥ pituḥ mātṛ j ātiḥ sutānām yasmāt satām prāyaśas tena nāgaḥ

original: balī ca pārthaprathamodbhavatvānmāyāvidastrī ca sudhārmikaśca / 20.156 /
analyzed: balī ca pārtha prathama udbhava tvāt māyā vid astrī ca su dhārmikaḥ ca

original: tato yayāvarjunastīrthayātrākrameṇa pāṇḍyāṃ stanayo'sya mātrā /
analyzed: tatas yayau arjunaḥ tīrtha yātrā krameṇa pāṇḍyām stanayoḥ sya mātrā

original: saha tyakto bhujagairdevaloke sampūjito nyavasad daivataiśca / 20.157 /
analyzed: saha tyaktaḥ bhujagaiḥ deva loke sampūjitaḥ nyavasat daivataiḥ ca

original: satyātyayānnaiva doṣo'rjunasya tejīyasaścintanīyaḥ kathañcit /
analyzed: satya atyayāt nā eva doṣaḥ urjunasya tejīyasaḥ cintanīyaḥ kathañcid

original: śreṣṭhāparādhānnānyadoṣasya lepastejīyasāṃ nirṇayo'yaṃ hi śāstre / 20.158 /
analyzed: śreṣṭha aparādhāt na anya doṣasya lepaḥ tejīyasām nirṇayaḥ yam hi śāstre

original: atisnehāccāgrajābhyāṃ tadasya kṣāntaṃ sutā pāṇḍyarājena dattā /
analyzed: ati snehāt ca agrajābhyām tat asya kṣāntam sutā pāṇḍya rājena dattā

original: saṃ vatsarānte phalgunasyābhirūpā citrāṅgadā vīrasenena toṣāt / 20.159 /
analyzed: sam vatsara ante phalgunasya abhirūpā citra aṅgadā vīrasenena toṣāt  /

original: sa vīrasenastvaṣṭuraṃ śo yamasyāpyāveśayuk sā ca kanyā ṇsacī hi/
analyzed: sa vīrasenaḥ tvaṣṭuḥ am śaḥ yamasya api āveśa yuj sā ca kanyā hi

original: t ārādehe sūryajasyāṅgasaṅgāt svargaṃ nāgādantarikṣādihā'sīt / 20.160 /
analyzed: ārā dehe sūryajasya aṅga saṅgāt svargam nāgāt antarikṣāt iha āsīt

original: tenaiva hetornātisāmīpyamāsīt tasyāḥ pārthe putrikāputradharmā /
analyzed: tena eva hetoḥ na ati sāmīpyam āsīt tasyāḥ pārthe putrikā putra dharmā

original: tasyāṃ j āto babhruvāho'rjunena pūrvaṃ jayantaḥ kāmadevāṃ śayuktaḥ / 20.161 /
analyzed: tasyām j ātaḥ babhruvāhaḥ ūrjunena pūrvam jayantaḥ kāmadevām

original: putraṃ vīraṃ janayitvā'rjuno'to gacchan prabhāsaṃ śāpato grāhadehāḥ /
analyzed: putram vīram janayitvā arjuna utas gacchan prabhāsam śāpataḥ grāha dehāḥ

original: ccl.amūmucaccāpsarasaḥ sa pañca tābhirgṛhītaḥ pravikṛṣya tīram / 20.162 /
analyzed: cclamūmucat ca apsarasaḥ sa pañca tābhiḥ gṛhītaḥ pravikṛṣya tīram

original: evaṃ hi tāsāṃ śāpamokṣaḥ pradatto yadā'khilā vo yugapat samprakarṣet /
analyzed: evam hi tāsām śāpa mokṣaḥ pradattaḥ yadā akhilāḥ vaḥ yugapad samprakarṣet

original: ekastadā nijarūpāptirevetyalaṃ tuṣṭena brāhmaṇenā'natānām / 20.163 /
analyzed: ekaḥ tadā nija rūpa āptiḥ evā iti alam tuṣṭena brāhmaṇena ānatānām

original: viprāpahāsāt kutsitayonitastāḥ kanyātīrthe pāṇḍavaḥ sampramucya /
analyzed: vipra apahāsāt kutsita yonitaḥ tāḥ kanyātīrthe pāṇḍavaḥ sampramucya

original: prāptaḥ prabhāsaṃ vāsudevānujātāṃ śuśrāva rāmeṇa suyodhanodyatām / 20.164 /
analyzed: prāptaḥ prabhāsam vāsudeva anujātām śuśrāva rāmeṇa suyodhana udyatām

original: vicintya kāryaṃ yatirūpaṃ gṛhītvā kuśasthalīṃ prayayau taṃ samīpe /
analyzed: vicintya kāryam yati rūpam gṛhītvā kuśasthalīm prayayau tam samīpe

original: prāptaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prāhasat saṃ vijānan satyāsahāyaḥ śayanīyādhirūḍhaḥ / 20.165 /
analyzed: prāptam kṛṣṇaḥ prāhasat sam vijānan satyā sahāyaḥ śayanīya adhirūḍhaḥ  /

original: sarvajñā sā līlayā hāsahetumapṛcchat taṃ so'pi tasyai babhāṣe /
analyzed: sarva jñā sā līlayā hāsa hetum apṛcchat tam saḥ upi tasyai babhāṣe

original: līl ābhājau darśanārthaṃ punastāvagacchatāṃ raivataṃ śailarājam / 20.166 /
analyzed: darśana artham punar tau agacchatām raivatam śailarājam  /

original: ākrīḍo'sau vṛṣṇibhojāndhakānāṃ tatrāpaśyat keśavaḥ phalgunaṃ tam /
analyzed: ākrīḍā usau vṛṣṇi bhoja andhakānām tatra apaśyat keśavaḥ phalgunam tam

original: svasurdāne sa pratijñāṃ raho'smai cakre kṛṣṇo'thā'sadat sarvavṛṣṇīn / 20.167 /
analyzed: svasuḥ dāne sa pratijñām rahaḥ asmai cakre kṛṣṇā utha asadat sarva vṛṣṇīn

original: dṛṣṭvā girau rauhiṇeyo yatīndraveṣaṃ pārthaṃ j ñātiyuktaḥ praṇamya /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā girau rauhiṇeyaḥ yati indra veṣam pārtham j ñāti yuktaḥ praṇamya

original: cakre pūjāṃ phalguno'pi praṇāmaṃ guṇajyeṣṭho'sīti cakre balāya / 20.168 /
analyzed: cakre pūjām phalgunaḥ upi praṇāmam guṇa jyeṣṭhaḥ asi iti cakre balāya

original: sarvajñaṃ taṃ vāgminaṃ vīkṣya rāmaḥ kanyāgāre varṣakāle nivāsam /
analyzed: sarva jñam tam vāgminam vīkṣya rāmaḥ kanyāgāre varṣa kāle nivāsam

original: satkārapūrvaṃ kārayetyāha kṛṣṇaṃ naivetyūce keśavo doṣavādī / 20.169 /
analyzed: satkāra pūrvam kāraya iti āha kṛṣṇam na eva iti ūce keśavaḥ doṣa vādī

original: yuvā balī darśanīyo'tivāgmī nāyaṃ yogyaḥ kanyakāgāravāsam /
analyzed: yuvā balī na ayam yogyaḥ kanyakāgāra vāsam

original: ityuktavantaṃ rāma āhā'ptavidye nāsmiñchaṅketyeva lokādhinātham / 20.170 /
analyzed: iti uktavantam rāmaḥ āha āpta vidye na asmin śaṅkā iti eva loka adhinātham

original: nāsmanmate rocate tvanmataṃ tu sarveṣāṃ naḥ pūjyamevāstu tena /
analyzed: na asmad mate rocate tvad matam tu sarveṣām naḥ pūjyam evā astu tena

original: ityuktvā taṃ keśavaḥ sodarāyai śuśrūṣasvetyāha santaṃ yatīndram / 20.171 /
analyzed: iti uktvā tam keśavaḥ sodarāyai śuśrūṣasva iti āha santam yati indram

original: nityāpramattā sādhu santoṣayeti proktā tathā sā'karot so'pi tatra /
analyzed: nitya apramattā sādhu santoṣaya iti proktā tathā sā akarot saḥ api tatra

original: cakre māsān vārṣikān satkathābhirvāsaṃ vākyaṃ śraddadhāno harestat / 20.172 /
analyzed: cakre māsān vārṣikān sat kathābhiḥ vāsam vākyam śraddadhānaḥ hareḥ tat

original: saṃ yācitaḥ phalgunenā'ha vākyaṃ yad vāsudevastanna jānāti kaścit /
analyzed: sam yācitaḥ phalgunena āha vākyam yat vāsudevaḥ tat na jānāti kaścid

original: ṛte pitrorvipṛthoḥ sātyakervā subhadrāṃ te pradadānīti satyam / 20.173 /
analyzed: ṛte pitroḥ vipṛthoḥ sātyakeḥ vā su bhadrām te pradadāni iti satyam

original: ccli.astre śastre tattvavidyāsu caiva śiṣyaḥ śaineyo vāsudevendrasūnvoḥ /
analyzed: śastre tattva vidyāsu ca eva śiṣyaḥ śaineyaḥ vāsudeva indra sūnvoḥ

original: tasmādasmai kathayāmāsa kṛṣṇaḥ svaśiṣyatvād vipṛthoścāpi sarvam / 20.174 /
analyzed: tasmāt asmai kathayāmāsa kṛṣṇaḥ sva śiṣya tvāt vipṛthoḥ ca api sarvam

original: anye sarve vāsudevasya pārthān priyān nityaṃ j ānamānā api sma /
analyzed: anye sarve vāsudevasya pārthān priyān nityam ā ānamānāḥ api sma

original: rāmeṇā'diṣṭā uddhavo'thā'hukādyā hārdikyādyā naiva ditsanti jiṣṇoḥ / 20.175 /
analyzed: rāmeṇa ādiṣṭāḥ uddhava uthāhuka ādyāḥ hārdikya ādyāḥ na eva ditsanti jiṣṇoḥ

original: duryodhane dātumicchanti sarve rāmapriyārthaṃ j ānamānā harestat /
analyzed: duryodhane dātum icchanti sarve rāma priya artham ānamānāḥ hareḥ tat

original: apyapriyaṃ rākṣasāveśayuktāstasmāt sarvān vañcayāmāsa kṛṣṇaḥ / 20.176 /
analyzed: api apriyam rākṣasa āveśa yuktāḥ tasmāt sarvān vañcayāmāsa kṛṣṇaḥ

original: pradyumnasāmbapramukhāṇsca vañcitā yayustīrthārthaṃ rāmayuktāḥ samagrāḥ /
analyzed: pradyumna sāmba pramukhān ca vañcitāḥ yayuḥ tīrtha artham rāma yuktāḥ samagrāḥ

original: piṇḍoddhāraṃ tatra mahotsaveṣvāvartatsu kvacidūce subhadrā / 20.177 /
analyzed: piṇḍa uddhāram tatra mahā utsaveṣu āvartatsu kvacid ūce subhadrā

original: yate tīrthānācaran bāndhavāṃ stvamadrākṣīrnaḥ kaccidiṣṭān sma pārthān /
analyzed: yate tīrthān ācaran bāndhavān stvam adrākṣīḥ naḥ kaccit iṣṭān sma pārthān

original: kuntīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ cetyāha pṛṣṭaḥ sa pārtha Oṃ ityeteṣāmāha cānāmayaṃ saḥ / 20.178 /
analyzed: kuntīm kṛṣṇām ca iti āha pṛṣṭaḥ sa pārthaḥ om iti eteṣām āha ca anāmayam saḥ

original: bhūyaḥ sā'vādīd bhagavannindrasūnurgatastīrthārthaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śruto me /
analyzed: bhūyas sā avādīt bhagavan indra sūnuḥ gataḥ tīrtha artham brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śrutaḥ me

original: kaccid dṛṣṭo bhavatetyomiti sma pārtho'pyūce kveti sā'pṛcchadenam / 20.179 /
analyzed: kaccit dṛṣṭaḥ bhavatā iti om iti sma pārthaḥ upi ūce kva iti sā apṛcchat enam

original: atraiveti smayamānaṃ ca pārthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ paryapṛcchacchubhāṅgī /
analyzed: atrā evā iti smayamānam ca pārtham punar punar paryapṛcchat śubha aṅgī

original: so'pyāhonmatte so'smi hīti smayaṃ stāṃ phullākṣī taṃ sā dadarśātihṛṣṭā / 20.180 /
analyzed: sā upi āha unmatte sā asmi hi iti smayam stām phulla akṣī tam sā dadarśa ati hṛṣṭā

original: tato harṣāllajjayā cotpalākṣī kiñcinnoce pārtha enāmuvāca /
analyzed: tatas harṣāt lajjayā ca utpala akṣī kiñcid noce pārthaḥ enām uvāca

original: kāmāviṣṭo mukhyakālo hyayaṃ nāvudvāhārthoktastviti sā cainamāha / 20.181 /
analyzed: kāma āviṣṭaḥ mukhya kālaḥ hi ayam nau udvāha artha uktaḥ tu iti sā ca enam āha

original: nātikramo vāsudevasya yuktastasmāt tena svapitṛbhyāṃ ca dattām /
analyzed: na atikramaḥ vāsudevasya yuktaḥ tasmāt tena sva pitṛbhyām ca dattām

original: yukto nijairbandhubhiścotsave māṃ samudvahetyatha kṛṣṇaṃ sa dadhyau / 20.182 /
analyzed: yuktaḥ nijaiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca utsave mām samudvaha iti atha kṛṣṇam sa dadhyau

original: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sahito'tha kṛṣṇastatraivā'yād vāsavaścātha śacyā /
analyzed: mātā pitṛbhyām sahitaḥ utha kṛṣṇaḥ tatra evā ayāt vāsavaḥ ca atha śacyā

original: samaṃ munīndraiḥ phalgunena smṛtaḥ saṃ statraivā'gāt prītiyukto niśāyām / 20.183 /
analyzed: samam muni indraiḥ phalgunena smṛtaḥ sam s tatra eva āgāt prīti yuktaḥ niśāyām

original: kṛṣṇastataḥ puruhūtena sākaṃ tayorvivāhaṃ kārāyāmāsa samyak /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tatas puruhūtena sākam tayoḥ vivāham kārāyāmāsa samyak

original: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ satyakinā'pi yukto mahotsave'nyāvidito munīndraiḥ / 20.184 /
analyzed: mātā pitṛbhyām satyakinā api yuktaḥ muni indraiḥ

original: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ syandanaṃ phalgunārthe nidhāya svaṃ prayayau tadrajanyām /
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇaḥ syandanam phalguna arthe nidhāya svam prayayau tat rajanyām

original: gate ca śakre rathamāruroha prātaḥ pārthaḥ sahito bhāryayaiva / 20.185 /
analyzed: gate ca śakre ratham āruroha prātar pārthaḥ sahitaḥ bhāryayā eva

original: cclii.sarvāyudhairyuktarathaṃ samāsthite gṛhītacāpe phalgune dvāravatyām /
analyzed: cclii sarva āyudhaiḥ yukta ratham samāsthite gṛhīta cāpe phalgune dvāravatyām

original: āsīd rāvaḥ kiṅkimetat tridaṇḍī kanyāṃ haratyeṣa kodaṇḍapāṇiḥ / 20.186 /
analyzed: āsīt rāvaḥ kiṅkim etat tridaṇḍī kanyām harati eṣa kodaṇḍa pāṇiḥ

original: tatastu taṃ satanutraṃ mahendradatte divye kuṇḍale vāsasī ca/
analyzed: tatas tu tam sa tanutram mahā indra datte divye kuṇḍale vāsasī ca

original: divyāni ratnāni ca bhūṣaṇāni dṛṣṭvā bibhrāṇaṃ rakṣiṇo'vārayan sma / 20.187 /
analyzed: divyāni ratnāni ca bhūṣaṇāni dṛṣṭvā bibhrāṇam rakṣiṇaḥ avārayan sma

original: tataḥ sa ābaddhatal . āṅgulitraḥ satūṇīraścāpamāyamya bāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas saḥ ābaddha tal āṅgulitraḥ sa tūṇīraḥ cāpam āyamya bāṇaiḥ

original: cakre'ntarikṣaṃ pradiśo diśaśca nirantaraṃ śikṣayā vidyayā ca/ 20.188 /
analyzed: cakre intarikṣam pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca nirantaram śikṣayā vidyayā ca

original: cakre sārathyaṃ keśavenaitadarthe suśikṣit ā tasya samyak subhadrā /
analyzed: cakre sārathyam keśavena etad arthe su śikṣit ā tasya samyak su bhadrā

original: tayā pārtho vārito naiva kañcit bhinnatvacaṃ kṛtavān krīḍamānaḥ / 20.189 /
analyzed: tayā pārthaḥ vāritaḥ nā eva kañcid bhinna tvacam kṛtavān krīḍamānaḥ  /

original: sa śikṣayā tvadbhutayā ṇsaraughairvidrāpya tān bhīṣayitvaiva sarvān /
analyzed: sa śikṣayā tu adbhutayā ṇsara oghaiḥ vidrāpya tān bhīṣayitvā eva sarvān

original: nirgatya puryā vipṛthuṃ dadarśa rāmeṇa puryā rakṣaṇe sanniyuktam / 20.190 /
analyzed: nirgatya puryāḥ vipṛthum dadarśa rāmeṇa puryāḥ rakṣaṇe san niyuktam

original: priyaṃ kurvanniva rāmasya so'pi vyājena pārthaṃ senayaivā'vṛṇot tam /
analyzed: priyam kurvan iva rāmasya saḥ upi vyājena pārtham senayā evā avṛṇot tam

original: kṛṣṇādeśānnaiva pārthasya cakre samyagrodhaṃ yuyudhe ca cchalena / 20.191 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā ādeśāt nā eva pārthasya cakre samyak rodham yuyudhe ca chalena

original: eko hyasau marutāṃ saumyanāmā ṇsuśrūṣārthaṃ vāsudevasya jātaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi asau marutām saumya nāmā ṇ suśrūṣā artham vāsudevasya jātaḥ

original: taṃ yādavaṃ śaravarṣairvavarṣa yathā kṣataṃ na bhavet savyasācī / 20.192 /
analyzed: tam yādavam śara varṣaiḥ vavarṣa yathā kṣatam na bhavet savyasācī

original: nirāyudhaṃ virathaṃ caiva cakre pārthaḥ senāṃ tasya naivāhanacca /
analyzed: nirāyudham viratham ca eva cakre pārthaḥ senām tasya na eva ahanat ca

original: dṛṣṭvā ṇsarāṃ stasya tīkṣṇāṃ stvaco'pi nacchedakān vipṛthuḥ santutoṣa / 20.193 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tīkṣṇām s tvacaḥ upi na chedakān vipṛthuḥ

original: śikṣāṃ pārthasyādhikaṃ mānayāna upetya pārthaṃ ca śaśaṃ sa sarvam /
analyzed: śikṣām pārthasya adhikam mānayānaḥ upetya pārtham ca śaśam sa sarvam

original: ājñāṃ viṣṇoḥ sanniyuddhyannivāsmai kṛtt āyudhaḥ phalgunenaiva pūrvam / 20.194 /
analyzed: ājñām viṣṇoḥ san niyudh hyan iva asmai āyudhaḥ phalgunena eva pūrvam

original: tataḥ parājitavacchīghrametya śaśaṃ sa sarvaṃ haline'tha so'pi /
analyzed: tatas parājita vat śīghram etya śaśam sa sarvam saḥ upi

original: pradyumnasāmbādiyuto'tha kopādāyāt purīṃ hantukāmo'rjunaṃ ca / 20.195 /
analyzed: pradyumna sāmba ādi yutā utha kopāt āyāt purīm hantu kāmā ūrjunam ca

original: kṛṣṇo'pi sarvaṃ vipṛthorniśamya prāptaḥ sudharmāṃ vimanā ivā'sīt /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api sarvam vipṛthoḥ niśamya prāptaḥ sudharmām vimanāḥ iva āsīt

original: avāṅmukhastatra yadupravīrāḥ pradyumnādyā āhuruccairnadantaḥ / 20.196 /
analyzed: avāṅmukhaḥ tatra yadu pravīrāḥ pradyumna ādyāḥ āhuḥ uccais nadantaḥ

original: māyāvrataṃ taṃ vinihatya śīghraṃ vayaṃ subhadrāmānayāmaḥ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: māyā vratam tam vinihatya śīghram vayam subhadrām ānayāmaḥ kṣaṇena

original: ccliii.ityuktavākyānavadad balastān kṛṣṇājñayā yāntu na svecchayaiva / 20.197 /
analyzed: balaḥ tān kṛṣṇa ājñayā yāntu na sva icchayā eva

original: j ñātavyametasya mataṃ purastāddharervirodhe na jayo bhaved vaḥ /
analyzed: j ñātavyam etasya matam purastāt hareḥ virodhe na jayaḥ bhavet vaḥ

original: ityuktavākye halini sma sarve papracchurānamya janārdanaṃ tam / 20.198 /
analyzed: iti ukta vākye halini sma sarve papracchuḥ ānamya janārdanam tam

original: athābravīd vāsudevo'mitaujāḥ śṛṇvantu sarve vacanaṃ madīyam /
analyzed: athā abravīt vāsudeva umita ojāḥ śṛṇvantu sarve vacanam madīyam

original: puraivoktaṃ tanmayā kanyakāyā māyāvrato nārhati sannidhisthitim / 20.199 /
analyzed: purā eva uktam tat mayā kanyakāyāḥ māyā vrataḥ nā arhati sannidhi sthitim

original: t āṃ me vācaṃ nāgrahīdagrajo'yaṃ bahūn doṣān vyāharato'pyato mayā /
analyzed: ām me vācam na agrahīt agrajaḥ yam bahūn doṣān vyāharatā upi atas mayā

original: anullaṅghyatvādagrajo'nupravṛttaḥ kanyāgṛhe vāsane kūṭabuddheḥ / 20.200 /
analyzed: an ullaṅghya tvāt agrajaḥ anupravṛttaḥ kanyā gṛhe vā āsane kūṭa buddheḥ

original: atītaścāyaṃ kāryayogo'samakṣaṃ hṛt ā kanyā'to no'tra kā mānahāniḥ /
analyzed: atītaḥ ca ayam kārya yoga usamakṣam hṛd ā kanyā atas na utra kā māna hāniḥ

original: bhūyastarāṃ māninastasya sā syājjñātā ca vo vipṛthoḥ pārthatā'sya / 20.201 /
analyzed: bhūyastarām māninaḥ tasya sā syāt jñātā ca vaḥ vipṛthoḥ pārtha tā asya

original: deyā ca kanyā nāsti pārthena tulyo varo'smākaṃ kauraveyaśca pārthaḥ /
analyzed: deyā ca kanyā nā asti pārthena tulyaḥ varaḥ usmākam kauraveyaḥ ca pārthaḥ

original: pautraśca kṛṣṇasya supūrṇaṇsakteḥ paitṛṣvaseyo vīratamo guṇāḍhyaḥ / 20.202 /
analyzed: pautraḥ ca kṛṣṇasya paitṛṣvaseyaḥ vīratamaḥ guṇa āḍhyaḥ

original: arthyo'smābhiḥ svayamevāharat sa śakrātmajo nātra naḥ kāryahāniḥ /
analyzed: arthyaḥ smābhiḥ svayam eva aharat sa śakrātmajaḥ na atra naḥ kārya hāniḥ

original: anudrutyainaṃ yadi ca syāt parājayo hānirdṛḍhaṃ yaśaso vo bhaveta / 20.203 /
analyzed: anudrutya enam yadi ca syāt parājayaḥ hāniḥ dṛḍham yaśasaḥ vaḥ bhaveta  /

original: jitvā yadyenaṃ kanyakā cā'hṛt ā cet parāmṛṣṭāṃ naiva kaściddhi lipset /
analyzed: jitvā yadi enam kanyakā ca ahṛt ā ced parāmṛṣṭām na eva kaścid hi lipset

original: ato na me rocate vo'nuyānamityūcivānāsa tūṣṇīṃ pareśaḥ / 20.204 /
analyzed: atas na me rocate vonuyānam iti ūcivān āsa tūṣṇīm pareśaḥ

original: śrutvā halī kṛṣṇavākyaṃ babhāṣe mā yāta cittaṃ viditaṃ mamāsya /
analyzed: śrutvā halī kṛṣṇa vākyam babhāṣe mā yāta cittam viditam mama asya

original: asyānuvṛttirvijayāya naḥ syācchubhāya śāntyai parataśca muktyai / 20.205 /
analyzed: asya anuvṛttiḥ vijayāya naḥ syāt śubhāya śāntyai paratas ca muktyai

analyzed: tatas ūrjunaḥ yatra tiṣṭhan na kaścid parājayam yāti kṛṣṇa ājñayā eva

analyzed: rathena tena eva yayau sa bhāryaḥ śakraprastham ca aviśat bhrātṛ guptam

analyzed: sambhāvitaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca ati tuṣṭaiḥ ūcetha sarvam teṣu yat ca ātma vṛttam

original: śānteṣu vākyādātmano yādaveṣu kṛṣṇo yukto halinā'gācca pārthān / 20.207 /
analyzed: śānteṣu vākyāt ātmanaḥ yādaveṣu kṛṣṇaḥ yuktaḥ halinā agāt ca pārthān

original: sārddhaṃ yayau śakaṭai ratnapūrṇaiḥ śakraprasthaṃ pūjitastatra pārthaiḥ /
analyzed: sārddham yayau śakaṭaiḥ ratna pūrṇaiḥ śakraprastham pūjitaḥ tatra pārthaiḥ

original: dadau teṣāṃ t āni rāmeṇa yuktastathā kṛṣṇāyai bhūṣaṇāni svasuśca / 20.208 /
analyzed: dadau teṣām rāmeṇa yuktaḥ tathā kṛṣṇāyai bhūṣaṇāni svasuḥ ca

analyzed: bahūn varṣān pāṇḍavaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ prītim teṣām ādadhāna udhikām ca

original: āsan kṛṣṇāyāḥ pañca sutā guṇāḍhyā viśvedevāḥ pañcagandharvamukhyaiḥ /
analyzed: āsan kṛṣṇāyāḥ pañca sutāḥ guṇa āḍhyāḥ viśvedevāḥ pañca gandharva mukhyaiḥ

original: āviṣṭāste citrarathābhitāmrakiśoragopālabalaiḥ krameṇa / 20.210 /

analyzed: prativindhyaḥ suta somaḥ śruta ākhya kīrtiḥ śatānīkaḥ uta śruta kriyaḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhirādyaiḥ kramaśaḥ prajātāsteṣāṃ dvayoścāvarajo'bhimanyuḥ / 20.211 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira ādyaiḥ kramaśas prajātāḥ teṣām dvayoḥ ca avara jobhimanyuḥ

original: candrāṃ śayukto'titarāṃ budho'sau jātaḥ subhadrājaṭhare'rjunena /
analyzed: budhaḥ usau jātaḥ subhadrā jaṭhareḥ junena

original: dharmeraśakrāṃ śayuto'śvinośca tathaiva kṛṣṇasya sa sannidhānayuk / 20.212 /
analyzed: dharmera śakrām śayutā uśvinoḥ ca tathā eva kṛṣṇasya sa sannidhāna yuj

original: sarve'pi te vīryavantaḥ surūpā bhaktā viṣṇoḥ sarvaśāstreṣvabhijñāḥ /

analyzed: modam yayuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ taiḥ sutaiḥ ca viśeṣataḥ sāttvatī nandanena

original: ādāya yātau paricārakaiśca rathena gandharvarānugītau / 20.214 /
analyzed: ādāya yātau paricārakaiḥ ca rathena gandharvara anugītau

analyzed: svairam tayoḥ tatra vikrīḍatoḥ ca strī ratnābhyām manda vāta anujuṣṭe

analyzed: vane prasūna stabaka uru rājite jale ca tigmadyuti kanyakāyāḥ

original: bhūtvā viprastau yayāce'nnametya kuśānurūce ca mate rameśituḥ /
analyzed: bhūtvā vipraḥ tau yayācet nama itya kuśānuḥ ūce ca mate rama īśituḥ

original: pārthaḥ kīdṛk te'nnamiṣṭaṃ vadeti sa cāvādīd vahnirahaṃ vanārthī / 20.216 /
analyzed: pārthaḥ kīdṛś tena iṣṭam vada iti sa ca avādīt vahniḥ aham vana arthī

original: prayājān devānanuyājāṃ śca śulkaṃ havirdāne devatānāmayāciṣam /
analyzed: prayājān devān anuyājān śca śulkam haviḥ dāne devatānām ayāciṣam

original: balahrāsastava bhūyāditi sma śaptvaiva te tāṃ śca daduḥ purā mama / 20.217 /
analyzed: bala hrāsaḥ tava bhūyāt iti sma śaptvā eva te tām śca daduḥ purā mama

original: punaḥ pūrtiḥ kena me syād balasyetyabjodbhavaṃ pṛṣṭavānasmi natvā /
analyzed: punar pūrtiḥ kena me syāt balasya iti abjodbhavam pṛṣṭavān asmi natvā

original: yadā vanaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ hi tvamatsi tadā balaṃ te bhavatīti so'bravīt / 20.218 /
analyzed: yadā vanam khāṇḍavam hi tvam atsi tadā balam te bhavati iti sā ubravīt

original: śakrasyedaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ tena vighnaṃ karotyasau tena vāṃ prārthayāmi /
analyzed: śakrasya idam khāṇḍavam tena vighnam karoti asau tena vām prārthayāmi

original: ityukte taṃ pārtha ūce yadi syād ratho dhanuścātha śakraṃ nirotsye / 20.219 /
analyzed: iti ukte tam pārthaḥ ūce yadi syāt rathaḥ dhanuḥ ca atha śakram nirotsye

analyzed: nara āveśāt anna dāna pratiśravāt svasya api śakrasya virodham aicchat

analyzed: pārthaḥ kṛṣṇasya preraṇāt ca eva vahniḥ pārtham yayāce śakra virodha śāntyai

analyzed: sva dattasya punar sa vairam śakraḥ kuryāt svayam indraḥ hi pārthaḥ

original: nāprerito viṣṇunā tasya rodhaṃ pārthaḥ kuryāditi kṛṣṇaṃ yayāce / 20.221 /
analyzed: na a preritaḥ viṣṇunā tasya rodham pārthaḥ kuryāt iti kṛṣṇam yayāce  /

original: nacāyuktaḥ keśavenaiṣa ṇsakta iti kṛṣṇādāpa bhūyo'pyanujñām /
analyzed: na ca ayuktaḥ keśavena eṣa iti kṛṣṇāt āpa bhūyas upi anujñām

analyzed: yayau samīpam ca hareḥ badaryām ādāya cakram ca amutas keśa vedāt

analyzed: cakram gomante kṛṣṇam āpa api pūrvam bhaktyā vahniḥ keśa vedāt punar tat

original: cakraṃ ca viṣṇorbahudhā vyavasthitaṃ tadagnidattaṃ prāktanaṃ caikadhā'sīt / 20.223 /
analyzed: cakram ca viṣṇoḥ bahudhā vyavasthitam tat agni dattam prāktanam ca ekadhā āsīt

analyzed: dhanuḥ ca gāṇḍīvam atha abjajasya karoti yena akhilasam hṛtim saḥ

analyzed: aṃ śena dattam tat umāpateḥ ca śakrasya somasya jaleśituḥ ca

analyzed: tena eva te jigyuḥ atho jagattrayam prasādataḥ te krama śobjayoneḥ

analyzed: an anya dhāryam vijaya āvaham ca bhāreṇa lakṣasya samam śubha āvaham

analyzed: ratham ca śubhra ansva yutam jaya āvaham ūṇau tathā ca akṣaya sāyakau śubhau

original: dhvajaṃ ca rāmasya hanūmadaṅkamādāya sarvaṃ varuṇādarjune'dāt / 20.226 /
analyzed: dhvajam ca rāmasya hanūmat aṅkam ādāya sarvam varuṇāt arjuna idāt

analyzed: viśeṣataḥ sthe hanūmati ajeyatā syāt jaya rūpaḥ yatas asau

original: sarvaṃ ca tad divyamabhedyameva vidyutprabhā jyā cagāṇḍīvasaṃ sthā / 20.227 /
analyzed: sarvam ca tat divyam abhedyam eva vidyut prabhā jyā

analyzed: devaiḥ ca taiḥ brahma varāt dhṛtam tat brahmā eva sākṣāt prabhuḥ asya dhāraṇe

analyzed: indrasya dattaḥ ca varaḥ svayambhuvā tena api pārthasya babhūva dhāryam

analyzed: indraḥ hi asau phalguna tvena jātaḥ tatas sa ustraiḥ śara śālām cakāra  /

analyzed: sa yojana dvādaśaka abhivistṛtam puram cakāra āśu purandara ātmajaḥ

analyzed: vanam pragṛhya prabhakṣayāmāsa samuddhata arciḥ  /

original: prabhakṣyamāṇaṃ nijakakṣamīkṣya sandhukṣayāmāsa tadā'śuśukṣaṇim /
analyzed: prabhakṣyamāṇam nija kakṣam īkṣya sandhukṣayāmāsa tadā āśuśukṣaṇim

analyzed: akṣa upamābhiḥ bahula īkṣaṇa umbhasām dhārābhiḥ ākṣubdha manāḥ kṣayāya

analyzed: astraiḥ tu vṛṣṭim vinivārya kṛṣṇaḥ pārthaḥ ca śakram sura pūga yuktam

analyzed: saḥ api parājitaḥ bhūt prītaḥ ca dṛṣṭvā balam ātmanaḥ tat   /

original: snehaṃ ca kṛṣṇasya tadarjune dhṛtaṃ vilokya pārthasya balaṃ ca tādṛśam /
analyzed: sneham ca kṛṣṇasya tat arjune dhṛtam vilokya pārthasya balam ca tādṛśam

analyzed: nivartya meghān ati tuṣṭa cittaḥ praṇamya kṛṣṇam tanayam

original: viṣṇuṇsca śakreṇa sahetya keśavaṃ samāṇsliṣannirviśeṣo'pyanantam /

analyzed: brahmā ca śarvaḥ ca sametya kṛṣṇam praṇamya pārthasya ca kṛṣṇa nāma

original: sañcakratuścāpi śikṣāprakarṣāccakruśca sarve svāstradāne pratijñām / 20.235 /
analyzed: sañcakratuḥ ca api śikṣā prakarṣāt cakruḥ ca sarve sva astra dāne pratijñām

analyzed: anujñātāḥ te prayayuḥ keśavena krīḍā artham indraḥ yuyudhe hi tatra

original: prītyā kīrtiṃ dātumapyarjunasya tatastuṣṭaḥ saha devaistayoḥ saḥ / 20.236 /
analyzed: prītyā kīrtim dātum api arjunasya tatas tuṣṭaḥ saha devaiḥ tayoḥ saḥ

original: daityāṇsca nāgāṇsca piśācayakṣā hatāḥ sarve tadvanasthā hitābhyām /
analyzed: daityān ca nāgān ca piśāca yakṣāḥ hatāḥ sarve tad vana sthāḥ hitābhyām

analyzed: ayam agne jaritā ityādi mantraiḥ stutvā vahnim pakṣiṇaḥ na upadagdhāḥ

analyzed: aṇsvasenaḥ putrakaḥ takṣakasya mātrā grastaḥ prātilomyena kaṇṭhe  /

original: chinne'rjunenāntarikṣe patantyāstasyāḥ śakreṇāvitaśchinnapucchaḥ /
analyzed: chinneḥ rjunena antarikṣe patantyāḥ tasyāḥ śakreṇa avitaḥ chinna pucchaḥ

original: vadhānmātuḥ pucchabhaṅgācca roṣāddhantuṃ pārthaṃ karṇatūṇīrago'bhūt / 20.239 /

original: haniṣyati sphuṭaṃ raṇe vṛkodaro jarāsutam / 21.111 /

original: bhayaṃ na kāryameva te mayā hataḥ sa neti ha /
analyzed: bhayam na kāryam eva te mayā hataḥ sa na iti ha

original: mayā hinītihetutaḥ svayaṃ na hanyate ripuḥ / 21.112 /
analyzed: mayā hi nīti hetutaḥ svayam na hanyate ripuḥ

original: sa śarvasaṃ śrayāgraṇīrmadāṇsrayottamena tu /
analyzed: sa śarvasam śraya agraṇīḥ madāṇsrayā uttamena tu

original: nihanyate yadā tadā prakāṇsitaṃ hi me balam / 21.113 /
analyzed: nihanyate yadā tadā prakāṇsitam hi me balam  /

original: ato na śaṅkitaṃ manaḥ kuruṣva bhūpate kvacit /
analyzed: atas na śaṅkitam manaḥ kuruṣva bhūpate kvacid

original: pradarśayāmi te'nujau nihatya māgadheśvaram / 21.114 /
analyzed: pradarśayāmi tenujau nihatya māgadha īśvaram

original: itīritaḥ sa viṣṇunā vicārya tadguṇān parān /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ sa viṣṇunā vicārya tad guṇān parān

original: tatheti cā'ha te trayaḥ pratasthurāṇsu māgadhān / 21.115 /
analyzed: tathā iti ca āha te trayaḥ pratasthuḥ āṇsu māgadhān

original: sametya māgadhāṃ stu te śivoruliṅgamityalam /
analyzed: sametya stu te śiva ūru liṅgam iti alam

original: sumālyavastrabhūṣaṇaiḥ samarcitaṃ giriṃ yayuḥ / 21.116 /
analyzed: su mālya vastra bhūṣaṇaiḥ samarcitam girim yayuḥ

original: svaśīrṣato'pi cā'dṛtaṃ jarāsutena te girim /
analyzed: sva śīrṣataḥ upi ca ādṛtam jarāsutena te girim

original: nyapātayanta bāhubhistamasya cottamāṅgavat / 21.117 /
analyzed: nyapātayanta bāhubhiḥ tam asya ca uttamāṅga vat

original: advārataste nagaraṃ praviśya māṣasya nāl . ena kṛt āstribherīḥ /
analyzed: advārataḥ te nagaram praviśya māṣasya

original: puṣṭipradā bibhidustasya kīrtiśāstropamā nyakkṛtamāgadheśāḥ / 21.118 /
analyzed: puṣṭi pradāḥ bibhiduḥ tasya kīrti śāstra upamāḥ nyakkṛta māgadha īśāḥ

original: tathā'paṇebhyo bahumālyagandhān prasahya saṅgṛhya śubhāṃ śca dadhruḥ /
analyzed: tathā āpaṇebhyaḥ bahu mālya gandhān prasahya saṅgṛhya śubhām ca dadhruḥ

original: advāratastasya gṛhaṃ ca sasrurbhośabdatastaṃ ca nṛpaḥ prasasruḥ / 21.119 /
analyzed: advārataḥ tasya gṛham ca sasruḥ bho śabdataḥ tam ca nṛpaḥ prasasruḥ

original: t ān vipraveṣān sa niśāmya rājā mahābhujān snātakaveṣayuktān /
analyzed: t ān vipra veṣān sa niśāmya rājā mahā bhujān snātaka veṣa yuktān

original: dvitīyavarṇān pravicintya bāhūn jyākarkaśān vīkṣya babhāṣa etān / 21.120 /
analyzed: dvitīya varṇān pravicintya bāhūn jyā karkaśān vīkṣya babhāṣa etān

original: ke ṣṭhātha kiṃ hetuta āgatāṇsca kṛtaśca me parvataliṅgabhedanam /
analyzed: ke ṣṭha atha kim hetutaḥ āgatān ca kṛtaḥ ca me parvata liṅga bhedanam

original: kṛtaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kuta eva durnayāḥ kṛt āstathā'nye dvijavaryaveṣaiḥ / 21.121 /
analyzed: kṛtam bhavadbhiḥ kutas eva durnayāḥ dvija varya veṣaiḥ

original: cclxix.iti bruvāṇaṃ bhagavānuvāca kāryaṃ hi śatrorakhilaṃ pratīpam /
analyzed: bruvāṇam bhagavān uvāca kāryam hi śatroḥ akhilam pratīpam

original: ityukta ūce nahi vipraśatrurahaṃ kuto vo mama śatrutā bhavet / 21.122 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ ūce nahi vipra śatruḥ aham kutas vaḥ mama śatru tā bhavet

original: ityuktavākyaṃ nṛpatiṃ jagāda janārdano naiva hi tādṛśā dvijāḥ /
analyzed: iti ukta vākyam nṛpatim jagāda janārdanaḥ nā eva hi tādṛśāḥ dvijāḥ

original: vayaṃ ripuste'smi hi vāsudeva imau ca bhīmārjunanāmadheyau / 21.123 /
analyzed: vayam ripuḥ te smi hi vāsudevaḥ imau ca bhīma arjuna nāmadheyau

original: yad bāndhavān naḥ piśitāṇsidharmato raudre makhe kalpayituṃ paśutve /
analyzed: yat bāndhavān naḥ raudre makhe kalpayitum paśu tve

original: icchasyare vedapathaṃ vihāya taṃ tvāṃ balācchāstumihā'gatā vayam / 21.124 /
analyzed: icchasi are veda patham vihāya tam tvām balāt śāstum iha āgatāḥ vayam

original: vimokṣayāmaḥ svajanān yadi tvaṃ na mocayasyadya nigṛhya ca tvām /
analyzed: vimokṣayāmaḥ sva janān yadi tvam na mocayasi adya nigṛhya ca tvām

original: muñcāthavā tānabhiyāhi vā'smān raṇāya martuṃ kṛtaniścayo'tra / 21.125 /
analyzed: muñca athavā tān abhiyāhi vā asmān raṇāya martum kṛta niścayaḥ utra

original: itīrito'sau magadhādhipo ruṣā jagāda nāhaṃ śiva yāgayuktān /
analyzed: iti īritā usau magadha adhipaḥ ruṣā jagāda na aham śiva yāga yuktān

original: mokṣye paśūn yugapad vā krameṇa yotsye ca vo'thāpi camūsahāyān / 21.126 /
analyzed: mokṣye paśūn yugapad vā krameṇa yotsye ca camū sahāyān

original: nirāyudhaḥ sāyudho vā yuṣmadiṣṭāyudhena vā /
analyzed: nirāyudhaḥ sa āyudhaḥ vā yuṣmad iṣṭa āyudhena vā

original: eko'pi sakalairyotsye saseno vā sasainikān / 21.127 /
analyzed: ekaḥ api sakalaiḥ yotsye sa senaḥ vā sa sainikān

original: ityuktavantamavadadajitorubalo hariḥ /
analyzed: iti uktavantam avadat ajita uru balaḥ hariḥ

original: ehyekameko vā'smāsu sasainyo vā raṇe nṛpa / 21.128 /
analyzed: ehi ekam ekaḥ vā asmāsu sa sainyaḥ vā raṇe nṛpa

original: yena kāmayase yoddhuṃ taṃ na āsādaya drutam /
analyzed: yena kāmayase yoddhum tam naḥ āsādaya drutam

original: nirāyudhaḥ sāyudho vā tvadabhīṣṭāyudhena vā /
analyzed: nirāyudhaḥ sa āyudhaḥ vā tvad abhīṣṭa āyudhena vā

original: ityā'ha bhagavāñchatruṃ yaśo bhīme vivarddhayan / 21.129 /
analyzed: iti āha bhagavān śatrum yaśaḥ bhīme vivarddhayan  /

original: ghātayitvā svaśatruṃ ca bhīmasenānugrahaṃ param /
analyzed: ghātayitvā sva śatrum ca bhīmasena anugraham param

original: bhīmasya kartumicchaṃ śca bhaktijñānādivarddhanam / 21.130 /
analyzed: bhīmasya kartum iccham ca bhakti jñāna ādi varddhanam

original: tṛṇīkartuṃ ripuṃ caiva nirāyudhatayā'gaman /
analyzed: tṛṇīkartum ripum ca eva nirāyudha tayā agaman

original: kṛṣṇabhīmārjunāstena vipraveṣāṇsca te'bhavan / 21.131 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa bhīma arjunāḥ tena vipra veṣāṇ ca te bhavan

original: nirāyudhaḥ kṣatraveṣo naiva yogyaḥ kathañcana /
analyzed: nirāyudhaḥ kṣatra veṣaḥ na eva yogyaḥ kathañcana

original: tato jagmurvipraveṣāstṛṇīkartuṃ hi māgadham / 21.132 /
analyzed: tatas jagmuḥ vipra veṣāḥ tṛṇīkartum hi māgadham

original: māgadhasya sasainyasya svagṛhe saṃ sthitasya ca /
analyzed: māgadhasya sa sainyasya sva gṛhe sam sthitasya ca

original: cclxx.nirāyudhena bhīmena samāhvāne kṛte'mitam /
analyzed: nirāyudhena bhīmena samāhvāne kṛta īmitam

original: dharmaṃ yaśaśca bhīmasya varddhayāmāsa keśavaḥ / 21.133 /
analyzed: dharmam yaśaḥ ca bhīmasya varddhayāmāsa keśavaḥ

original: tṛtīyamarjunaṃ caiva samādāya yayau ripum /
analyzed: tṛtīyam arjunam ca eva samādāya yayau ripum

original: haristasmācca bhīmasya mahādhikyaṃ prakāṇsayan /
analyzed: hariḥ tasmāt ca bhīmasya mahā ādhikyam prakāṇsayan

original: mukhena māgadhasyaiva vṛṇvekaṃ na iti bruvan / 21.134 /
analyzed: mukhena māgadhasya eva vṛṇu ekam naḥ iti bruvan

original: vṛṇvekamasmāsviti sa prokta āha jarāsutaḥ /

original: kuryāṃ naivārjunenāhamabalenaiva saṅgaram / 21.135 /
analyzed: kuryām na eva arjunena aham abalena eva saṅgaram

original: pañcapañcāṇsadabdo'dya hyayamevaṃ ca bālavat /
analyzed: hi ayam evam ca bāla vat

original: abalatvād yuvā'pyeṣa bāla eva mato mama / 21.136 /
analyzed: abala tvāt yuvā api eṣa bālaḥ eva mataḥ mama  /

original: ityukto'pyarjuno nā'ha kuru tarhi parīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ api arjunaḥ na āha kuru tarhi parīkṣaṇam

original: bāhubhyāṃ dhanuṣā veti śaṅkamānaḥ parājayam / 21.137 /
analyzed: bāhubhyām dhanuṣā vā iti śaṅkamānaḥ parājayam

original: ato bhīme balādhikyaṃ suprasiddhamabhūnmahat /

original: etadarthaṃ hi kṛṣṇena sahā'nītaḥ sa phalgunaḥ / 21.138 /
analyzed: etad artham hi kṛṣṇena saha ānītaḥ sa phalgunaḥ

original: j ānan kṛṣṇe balaṃ ghoramaviṣahyaṃ sa māgadhaḥ /
analyzed: ānan kṛṣṇe balam ghoram aviṣahyam sa māgadhaḥ

original: kutsayan gopa iti taṃ bhayānnaivā'hvayat prabhum / 21.139 /
analyzed: kutsayan gopaḥ iti tam bhayāt na eva āhvayat prabhum

original: āhvayāmāsa bhīmaṃ tu syād vā me jīvanaṃ tviti /
analyzed: āhvayāmāsa bhīmam tu syāt vā me jīvanam tu iti

original: haniṣyatyeva māṃ kṛṣṇa ityāsīnnṛpaterbhayam /
analyzed: haniṣyati eva mām kṛṣṇaḥ iti āsīt nṛpateḥ bhayam

analyzed: tasmāt tam na āhvayāmāsa vāsudevam sa māgadhaḥ

original: arjune tu jite kṛṣṇabhīmau māṃ nihaniṣyataḥ /
analyzed: arjune tu jite kṛṣṇa bhīmau mām nihaniṣyataḥ

original: trayāṇāṃ durbalāhvānānnaśyet kīrtiśca me dhruvā / 21.141 /
analyzed: trayāṇām durbala āhvānāt naśyet kīrtiḥ ca me dhruvā

original: iti matvā'hvayāmāsa bhīmasenaṃ sa māgadhaḥ /
analyzed: iti matvā āhvayāmāsa bhīmasenam sa māgadhaḥ

original: kathañcijjīvitaṃ vā syānnatu naśyati me yaśaḥ / 21.142 /
analyzed: kathañcid jīvitam vā syāt na tu naśyati me yaśaḥ

original: iti sma bhīmaṃ pratiyodhanāya saṅgṛhya rājā sa jarāsuto balī /
analyzed: iti sma bhīmam pratiyodhanāya saṅgṛhya rājā sa jarāsutaḥ balī

analyzed: rājye nijam ca ātmajam abhyaṣi ñcat purā khyātam patratāpa ākhya rudram

analyzed: bhīme manyamāna udhikam tu gadāṇsikṣām ātmani ca adhikām nṛpaḥ

analyzed: bhītaḥ dadau gadām sa bhīmāya ca anyām svayam agrahīt balī

analyzed: tad artham evā āśu gadām pragṛhya bhīmaḥ yayau māgadhasam yutaḥ bahis

analyzed: purāt sa kṛṣṇa arjunaḥ eva tatra tu ayuddhyatām keśava pārthayoḥ puras

analyzed: vācā ajayat tam prathamam vṛkodaraḥ śiva āṇsrayam viṣṇu guṇa prakāṇsayā

original: tato gadābhyāmabhipetatustau vicitramārgānapi darśayantau / 21.146 /
analyzed: tatas gadābhyām abhipetatuḥ tau vicitra mārgān api darśayantau

original: tayorgade te'śanisannikāṇse cūrṇikṛte dehamahādṛḍhimnā /
analyzed: tayoḥ gade cūrṇi kṛte deha mahā dṛḍhimnā

original: anyonyayorvakṣasi pātite ruṣā yathā'śmanoḥ pāṃ supiṇḍau sumuktau / 21.147 /
analyzed: anyonyayoḥ vakṣasi pātite ruṣā yathā aśmanoḥ su piṇḍau su muktau

original: sañcūrṇitagadau vīrau jaghnuturmuṣṭibhirmithaḥ /
analyzed: sañcūrṇita gadau vīrau jaghnutuḥ muṣṭibhiḥ mithas

original: brahmaṇḍasphoṭasaṅkāṇsairyathā keśavakaiṭabhau / 21.148 /
analyzed: brahmaṇḍa sphoṭa saṅkāṇsaiḥ yathā keśava kaiṭabhau  /

analyzed: cacāla pṛthvī girayaḥ ca cūrṇit vicakṣubhuḥ

original: samastavārāmpatayaḥ surāsurā viriñcaśarvādaya āsadannabhaḥ / 21.149 /
analyzed: sura asurāḥ viriñca śarva ādayaḥ āsadan nabhaḥ

original: surāstu bhīmasya jayābhikāṅkṣiṇastathā'surādyā magadhādhipasya /
analyzed: surāḥ tu bhīmasya jaya abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ tathā asura ādyāḥ magadha adhipasya

original: paśyanti sarve kramaśo balaṃ svaṃ samādade mārutanandano'pi / 21.150 /
analyzed: paśyanti sarve kramaśas balam svam samādade mārutanandanaḥ api

original: mānayitvā varaṃ dhāturdivasān daśa pañca ca /
analyzed: mānayitvā varam dhātuḥ divasān daśa pañca ca

original: vāsudevājñayā bhīmaḥ śatruṃ hantuṃ nao dadhe / 21.151 /
analyzed: vāsudeva ājñayā bhīmaḥ śatrum hantum dadhe

original: sa praṇamya hṛṣīkeśaṃ harṣādāṇsliṣya phalgunam /
analyzed: sa praṇamya hṛṣīkeśam phalgunam

original: ripuṃ jagrāha makuṭe vāraṇaṃ mṛgarāḍiva / 21.152 /
analyzed: ripum jagrāha makuṭe vāraṇam mṛgarāj iva

original: pṛṣṭhe'sya jānumādhāya kūrmadeśaṃ babhañja ha /
analyzed: jānum ādhāya kūrma deśam babhañja ha

original: mṛtikāle punardehaṃ vidadāra yathā purā / 21.153 /
analyzed: mṛti kāle punar deham vidadāra yathā purā

original: marmaṇyeva na hantavyo mayā'yamiti mārutiḥ /
analyzed: marmaṇi eva na hantavyaḥ mayā ayam iti mārutiḥ

original: svapuruṣaprakāṇsāya babhañjainamamarmaṇi / 21.154 /
analyzed: sva puruṣa prakāṇsāya babhañja enam amarmaṇi

analyzed: bhajyamāne śarīresya brahmāṇḍa sphoṭa sannibhaḥ

original: babhūva rāvo yenaiva trastametajjagattrayam / 21.155 /
analyzed: babhūva rāvaḥ yena eva trastam etat jagattrayam

original: cclxxii.nihatya kṛṣṇasya ripuṃ sa bhīmaḥ samarpayāmāsa tadarcanaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: nihatya kṛṣṇasya ripum sa bhīmaḥ samarpayāmāsa tat arcanam hareḥ

original: kṛt āṃ hi bhīmena samarcanāṃ t āṃ samakṣamādātumihā'gato hyajaḥ / 21.156 /
analyzed: kṛt ām hi bhīmena samarcanām t ām samakṣam ādātum iha āgataḥ hi ajaḥ

original: svīkṛtya pūjāṃ ca vṛkodarasya dṛḍhaṃ samāṇsliṣya ca taṃ janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: svīkṛtya pūjām ca vṛkodarasya dṛḍham ca tam janārdanaḥ

original: prīto nitāntaṃ punareva kṛṣṇaṃ nanāma bhīmaḥ praṇato'rjunena / 21.157 /
analyzed: prītaḥ nitāntam punar eva kṛṣṇam nanāma bhīmaḥ praṇata ūrjunena

original: jagmuḥ surāṇscātitarāṃ prahṛṣṭā brahmādayo dīnatarāṇsca daityāḥ /
analyzed: jagmuḥ surān ca atitarām prahṛṣṭāḥ brahma ādayaḥ dīnatarān ca daityāḥ

original: balādumeśasya vare prabhagne vṛkodareṇācyutasaṃ śrayeṇa / 21.158 /
analyzed: balāt umeśasya vare prabhagne vṛkodareṇa acyuta sam śrayeṇa

original: suto yayau śaraṇaṃ t ān rameśabhīmārjunān sahadevo'sya dhīmān /
analyzed: sutaḥ yayau śaraṇam ān rama īśa bhīma arjunān sahadevaḥ usya dhīmān

original: rathaṃ svasāraṃ ca dadau sa māruternanāma kṛṣṇaṃ parayā ca bhaktyā / 21.159 /
analyzed: ratham svasāram ca dadau sa māruteḥ nanāma kṛṣṇam parayā ca bhaktyā

original: ratho hyasau vasunā vāsudevācchakrāntarā'pto vasuvaṃ śajatvāt /
analyzed: rathaḥ hi asau vasunā vāsudevāt śakra antara āptaḥ

original: jarāsutasyā'sa vṛkodarastaṃ hare rathaṃ prārpayāmāsa tasmai / 21.160 /
analyzed: jarāsutasya āsa vṛkodaraḥ tam hare ratham prārpayāmāsa tasmai

original: kṛṣṇo'smarad garuḍaṃ sa dhvaje'bhūd rathaṃ kṛṣṇo'thā'ruhat pāṇḍavābhyām /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ asmarat garuḍam sa dhvaja ibhūt ratham kṛṣṇaḥ utha āruhat pāṇḍavābhyām

original: bhīmaḥ kanyāṃ sahadevasya hetoḥ samagrahīdanujasyā'tmanaḥ saḥ / 21.161 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ kanyām sahadevasya hetoḥ samagrahīt anujasya ātmanaḥ saḥ

original: nakulasyā'dānmadrarājo hi pūrvaṃ svīyāṃ kanyāṃ sā tathaiṣā'pyuṣā hi/
analyzed: nakulasya adāt madra rājaḥ hi pūrvam svīyām kanyām sā tathā eṣā api uṣāḥ hi

original: ekā pūrvaṃ te aśvinoścaiva bhāryā yamau remāte yaduṣā aśvibhāryā /
analyzed: ekā pūrvam te aśvinoḥ ca eva bhāryā yamau remāte yaduṣāḥ aśvi bhāryā

original: tataḥ kṛṣṇāyāmagrajabhrātṛbhāryāvṛttiṃ hi tau cakraturmādriputrau / 21.162 /
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇāyām agraja bhrātṛ bhāryā vṛttim hi tau cakratuḥ mādri putrau

original: jarāsutasyā'tmajaḥ keśavādīn ratnaiḥ samabhyarcya yayāvanujñayā /
analyzed: jarā sutasya ātmajaḥ keśava ādīn ratnaiḥ samabhyarcya yayau anujñayā

analyzed: agra pūjām ca kṛṣṇasya vilumpeyam na sam śayaḥ

original: īdṛśaṃ pāṇḍavaiśvaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā konāma jīvitam /

original: itīrito'tisaṃ vṛddhakopa āha suyodhanaḥ / 21.276 /

original: itīritaḥ pāpatama āha gāndhārako nṛpaḥ /

analyzed: truṭyate yena śatruḥ ca tat śastram nā eva ca itarat

original: putrasnehācca viduramādiśat pāṇḍavān prati / 21.290 /

analyzed: nyavārayat tam viduraḥ mahat te pāpam kulasya api

analyzed: tasmin sahadevam atha arjunam ca bhīmam ca somaka sutām svam api krameṇa

analyzed: sūtaḥ gatvā tad antam samakathayat imām dyūta madhye jitā asi

original: puraḥ svamāturānayat sabhāmayugmavāsasīm / 21.314 /

analyzed: ye dharmam na vadanti iha na te vṛddhāḥ iti īritāḥ

analyzed: katham dyūte jitā ca aham ajite sva patau sthite

original: ityuktā api bhīṣmādyāḥ kalyāveśena mohitāḥ /

original: duryodhanapratīpaṃ hi na kaścidaśakat tadā /

original: ūrdhvabāhuḥ sa cukrośa devānāṃ khyāpayaṃ stadā / 21.322 /

original: svāṇsaktiṃ draupadīṃ cā'ha jitā naivāsi dharmataḥ /

original: adharmo hi mahānetāṃ sabhāmākramya tiṣṭhati / 21.323 /

original: evaṃ tu vidureṇokte vikarṇaḥ pāpako'pi san /

original: āha ḍambhārthamevātra dharmavittvaṃ prakāṇsayan /

original: adharma evāyamiti karṇo'thainamabhartsayat / 21.324 /
analyzed: adharmaḥ eva ayam iti karṇa utha enam abhartsayat  /

original: cclxxxvii.dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ kliśyamānāṃ tu kṛṣṇāṃ dharmātyayaṃ dharmarāje ca dṛṣṭvā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ kliśyamānām tu kṛṣṇām dharma atyayam dharmarāje ca dṛṣṭvā

analyzed: rājā yuvarājena dharmāt calan yasmāt vākyam idam babhāṣe  /

original: imāṃ nyastavato dyūte dhakṣaṇīyau hi te bhujau /
analyzed: imām nyastavataḥ dyūte dhakṣaṇīyau hi te bhujau

original: naivamityarjuno'vādīt tamāhātha vṛkodaraḥ / 21.326 /
analyzed: na evam iti arjunaḥ uvādīt tam āha atha vṛkodaraḥ

original: vaktavyaṃ natu kartavyaṃ tasmānnahi mayā kṛtam /
analyzed: vaktavyam na tu kartavyam tasmāt nahi mayā kṛtam

original: uttame vacasā ṇsikṣā madhyame'rthāpahāraṇam /

analyzed: apatiḥ hi asi kalyāṇi gaccha duryodhana ālayam

original: ete'khilāḥ ṣaṇḍhatilāstamo'ndhamāptā nacaiṣāṃ punarutthitiḥ syāt /
analyzed: ete khilāḥ ṣaṇḍhatilāḥ tamaḥ ndha māptāḥ na ca eṣām punar utthitiḥ syāt

original: iti bruvāṇo'nucakāra bhīmaṃ tadā'hasan dhārtarāṣṭrāṇsca sarve / 21.383 /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ unucakāra bhīmam tadā ahasan dhārtarāṣṭrān ca sarve

original: tadā'karod bhīmasenaḥ pratijñāṃ hantā'smi vo nikhilān saṅgare'ham /
analyzed: tadā akarot bhīmasenaḥ pratijñām hantāsmi vaḥ nikhilān saṅgara iham

original: itīrite śaraṇaṃ droṇameva jagmuḥ samastā dhṛtarāṣṭraputrāḥ / 21.384 /
analyzed: iti īrite śaraṇam droṇam eva jagmuḥ samastāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra putrāḥ

original: yatra droṇastatra putrastatra bhīṣmaḥ kṛpastathā /
analyzed: yatra droṇaḥ tatra putraḥ tatra bhīṣmaḥ kṛpaḥ tathā

original: nacātyeti gurūn bhīma iti taṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ / 21.385 /
analyzed: na ca atyeti gurūn bhīmaḥ iti tam śaraṇam yayuḥ  /

original: abravīd dhārtarāṣṭrāṃ śca droṇo vipro'pi sannaham /
analyzed: abravīt dhārtarāṣṭrān śca droṇaḥ san aham

original: saputraḥ sakṛpaḥ śastraṃ grahīṣye bhavatāṃ kṛte / 21.386 /
analyzed: sa putraḥ sa kṛpaḥ śastram grahīṣye bhavatām kṛte

original: rakṣaṇe bhavatāṃ caiva kuryāṃ yatnaṃ svaśaktitaḥ /
analyzed: rakṣaṇe bhavatām ca eva kuryām yatnam sva śaktitaḥ

original: natu bhīmād rakṣituṃ vaḥ śaktaḥ satyaṃ bravīmyaham / 21.387 /
analyzed: na tu bhīmāt rakṣitum vaḥ śaktaḥ satyam bravīmi aham

original: tato yayuḥ pāṇḍavāste sabhāyā vanāya kṛṣṇāsahitāḥ suśūrāḥ /
analyzed: tatas yayuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ te sabhāyāḥ vanāya kṛṣṇā sahitāḥ su śūrāḥ

original: gatyā'nucakre yuvasiṃ hakhelagatiṃ bhīmaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro'pahasya / 21.388 /
analyzed: gatyā anucakre yuvasim hakhela gatim bhīmam dhārtarāṣṭra upahasya

original: dṛṣṭvā sabhāyā arddhaniṣkrāntadeho vyāvṛtya bhīmaḥ prāha saṃ raktanetraḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sabhāyāḥ arddha niṣkrānta dehaḥ vyāvṛtya bhīmaḥ prāha sam rakta netraḥ

original: ūruṃ tavānyaṃ ca raṇe vibhetsya ityuktvā'sau nirgato'satsabhāyāḥ / 21.389 /
analyzed: ūrum tava anyam ca raṇe vibhetsye iti uktvā asau nirgata usat sabhāyāḥ

original: prayātānanu tān kuntī prayayau putragṛddhinī /
analyzed: prayātā an anu tān kuntī prayayau putra gṛddhinī

original: rorudyamānāṃ viduraḥ sthāpayāmāsa tāṃ gṛhe /
analyzed: rorudyamānām viduraḥ sthāpayāmāsa tām gṛhe

original: praṇamya tāṃ yayuḥ pārthāḥ sakṛṣṇāḥ śīghragāminaḥ / 21.390 /
analyzed: praṇamya tām yayuḥ pārthāḥ sa kṛṣṇāḥ śīghra gāminaḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiro'vāgvadano yayau na krodhacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vāc vadanaḥ yayau na krodha cakṣuṣā

original: daheyaṃ kauravān sarvāniti kāruṇiko nṛpaḥ / 21.391 /
analyzed: daheyam kauravān sarvān iti kāruṇikaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: ccxciii.uddhṛtya bāhū prayayau bāhuṣāl . ī vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: uddhṛtya bāhū prayayau vṛkodaraḥ

original: ābhyāmevākhilāñchatrūñchakto hantumahaṃ tviti / 21.392 /
analyzed: ābhyām eva akhilān śatrūn śaktaḥ hantum aham tu iti

original: abaddhakeśā prayayau draupadī sā sabhātal . āt /
analyzed: a baddha keśā prayayau draupadī sā sabhātal
