analyzed: mukta keśāḥ bhaviṣyanti dhārtarāṣṭra striyaḥ tu iti

original: varṣan pāṃ sūn yayau pārtha itthaṃ śatruṣu sāyakān /
analyzed: varṣan pām sūn yayau pārthaḥ ittham śatruṣu sāyakān

original: varṣayānītyabhiprāyaḥ paramāstravidāṃ varaḥ / 21.394 /
analyzed: varṣayāni iti abhiprāyaḥ parama astra vidām varaḥ

original: yamāvavāṅmukhau yātau nāvayoḥ śatravo mukham /
analyzed: yamau avāṅmukhau yātau na āvayoḥ śatravaḥ mukham

original: paśyantvasyāmavasthāyāmityeva dhṛtacetasau / 21.395 /
analyzed: paśyantu asyām avasthāyām iti eva dhṛta cetasau

original: pretasaṃ skārasūktāni paṭhan dhaumyo'grato yayau /
analyzed: pretasam skāra sūktāni paṭhan dhaumya ugrataḥ yayau

original: hateṣu dhārtarāṣṭreṣu mayā kāryāḥ kriyā iti / 21.396 /
analyzed: hateṣu dhārtarāṣṭreṣu mayā kāryāḥ kriyāḥ iti

original: t ānathānuyayuḥ sūtā rathaiḥ paricaturdaśaiḥ /
analyzed: t ānatha anuyayuḥ sūtāḥ rathaiḥ pari caturdaśaiḥ

original: sūdāḥ paurogavāṇscaiva bhṛtyā ye tvāptakāriṇaḥ / 21.397 /
analyzed: sūdāḥ paurogavān ca eva bhṛtyāḥ ye tu āpta kāriṇaḥ  /

original: tataste jāhnavītīre vane vaṭamupāṇsritāḥ /
analyzed: tatas te jāhnavī tīre vane vaṭam upāṇsritāḥ

original: nyaṣīdannāgatān dṛṣṭvā samastān puravāsinaḥ / 21.398 /
analyzed: nyaṣīdan āgatān dṛṣṭvā samastān pura vāsinaḥ

original: tatastu te sarvajagannivāsaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nityasamastasadguṇam /
analyzed: tatas tu te sarva jagat nivāsam nārāyaṇam nitya samasta sat guṇam

original: svayambhuśarvādibhirarcitaṃ sadā bhaktyā'smaran bhaktabhavāpahaṃ prabhum / 21.399 /
analyzed: svayambhu śarva ādibhiḥ arcitam sadā bhaktyā a smaran bhakta bhava apaham prabhum

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
pḸaṇḍavavanapraveśo nāma ekaviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: pḹaṇḍavavanapraveśaḥ nāma ekavim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: ccxciv.(araṇīprāptiḥ )
analyzed: ccxcivaraṇī prāptiḥ

original: atha dvāviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha dvāvim śodhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / āgantukāmān puravāsinaste saṃ sthāpya kṛcchreṇa kurupravīrāḥ /
analyzed: om āgantu kāmān pura vāsinaḥ te sam sthāpya kṛcchreṇa kuru pravīrāḥ

original: rātrau praviṣṭā gahanaṃ vanaṃ ca kirmīramāseduratho narāṇsam / 22.1 /
analyzed: rātrau praviṣṭāḥ gahanam vanam ca kirmīram āseduḥ atho narāṇsam

original: bakānujo'sau nikhilairajeyo varād girīśasya nihantukāmaḥ /
analyzed: baka anujā usau nikhilaiḥ ajeyaḥ varāt girīśasya nihantu kāmaḥ

original: sadārasodaryamabhiprasasre bhīmaṃ mahāvṛkṣagirīn pramuñcan / 22.2 /
analyzed: sa dāra sodaryam abhiprasasre bhīmam mahā vṛkṣa girīn pramuñcan

original: sa samprahāraṃ saha tena kṛtvā bhīmo nipātyā'śu dharātal . e tam /
analyzed: sa samprahāram saha tena kṛtvā bhīmaḥ nipātya āśu tam

original: cakre makhe saṅgaranāmadheye prasaṃ hya nārāyaṇadaivate paśum / 22.3 /
analyzed: cakre makhe saṅgara nāmadheye prasam nārāyaṇa daivate paśum

original: nihatya rakṣo vanamadhyasaṃ sthāstadā yatīnāmayutaiḥ sametāḥ /
analyzed: nihatya rakṣaḥ vana madhya sam sthāḥ tadā yatīnām ayutaiḥ sametāḥ

original: aṇsītisāhasramunipravīrairdaśāṃ śayuktaiḥ sahitā vyacintayan / 22.4 /
analyzed: aṇ sīti sāhasra muni pravīraiḥ daśām śa yuktaiḥ sahitāḥ vyacintayan

original: vicintya teṣāṃ bharaṇāya dharmajaḥ sampūjya sūryasthitamacyutaṃ prabhum /
analyzed: vicintya teṣām bharaṇāya dharmajaḥ sampūjya sūrya sthitam acyutam prabhum

original: dine'kṣayānnaṃ piṭharaṃ tadāpa ratnādidaṃ kāmavarānnadaṃ ca / 22.5 /
analyzed: dina īkṣayā annam piṭharam tadā āpa ratnāt idam kāma vara anna dam ca

original: babhāra tenaiva yudhiṣṭhirastān pratyekaśastriṃ śatadāsidāsakān /
analyzed: babhāra tena eva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tān pratyekaśaḥ trim śata dāsi dāsakān

original: suvarṇapātreṣu hi bhuñjate ye gṛhe tadīye bahukoṭidāsike / 22.6 /
analyzed: suvarṇa pātreṣu hi bhuñjate ye gṛhe tadīye bahu koṭi dāsike

original: satsaṅgamākāṅkṣiṇa eva te'vasan pārthaiḥ sahānye ca munīndravṛndāḥ /
analyzed: sat saṅgam ākāṅkṣiṇaḥ eva tevasan pārthaiḥ saha anye ca muni indra vṛndāḥ

original: śṛṇvanta ebhyaḥ paramārthasārāḥ kathā vadantaśca purātanāstathā / 22.7 /
analyzed: śṛṇvantaḥ ebhyaḥ parama artha sārāḥ kathāḥ vadantaḥ ca purātanāḥ tathā

original: evaṃ gajānāṃ bahukoṭivṛndāṃ stathā rathānāṃ ca hayāṃ śca vṛndaśaḥ /
analyzed: evam gajānām bahu koṭi vṛndān stathā rathānām ca hayān śca vṛndaśas

original: visṛjya ratnāni narāṃ śca vṛndaśo vane vijahrurdivi devavat sukham / 22.8 /
analyzed: visṛjya ratnāni narām śca vṛndaśas vane vijahruḥ divi deva vat sukham

original: gavāṃ ca lakṣaṃ pradadāti nityaśaḥ suvarṇabhārāṃ śca śataṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: gavām ca lakṣam pradadāti nityaśas suvarṇa bhārān śca śatam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: sabhrātṛko'sau vanamāpya śakravanmumoda vipraiḥ sahito yathāsukham / 22.9 /
analyzed: sa bhrātṛkaḥ usau vanam āpya śakra vat mumoda vipraiḥ sahitaḥ yathāsukham

original: pārtheṣu yāteṣu kimatra kāryamiti sma pṛṣṭo viduro'grajena /
analyzed: pārtheṣu yāteṣu kim atra kāryam iti sma pṛṣṭaḥ vidura ugrajena

original: āhūya rājyaṃ pratipādayeti prāhainamāhātha ruṣā'mbikeyaḥ / 22.10 /
analyzed: āhūya rājyam pratipādaya iti prāha enam āha atha ruṣā ambikeyaḥ

original: j ñātaṃ pratīpo'si mamā'tmajānāṃ na me tvayā kāryamihāsti kiñcit /
analyzed: j ñātam pratīpaḥ asi mama ātmajānām na me tvayā kāryam iha asti kiñcid

original: yatheṣṭastiṣṭha vā gaccha veti prokto yayau viduraḥ pāṇḍuputrān / 22.11 /
analyzed: yathā iṣṭaḥ tiṣṭha vā gaccha vā iti proktaḥ yayau viduraḥ pāṇḍu putrān

original: ccxcv.tasmin gate bhrātṛviyogakarśitaḥ papāta bhūmau sahasaiva rājā /
analyzed: tasmin gate bhrātṛ viyoga karśitaḥ papāta bhūmau sahasā eva rājā

original: sañjñāmavāpyā'diśadāṇsu sañjayaṃ jīvāmi cedāṇsu mamā'nayānujam / 22.12 /
analyzed: sañjñām avāpya ādiśat āṇsu sañjayam jīvāmi ced āṇsu mama ānaya anujam

original: itīritaḥ sañjayaḥ pāṇḍaveyān prāpyā'nayad viduraṃ śīghrameva /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ sañjayaḥ pāṇḍaveyān prāpya anayat viduram śīghram eva

original: so'pyāgataḥ kṣipramapāstadoṣo jyeṣṭhaṃ vavande'tha sa cainamāṇsliṣat / 22.13 /
analyzed: saḥ upi āgataḥ kṣipram apāsta doṣaḥ jyeṣṭham vavandetha sa ca enam āṇsliṣat

original: aṅkaṃ samāropya sa mūrdhni cainamāghrāya lebhe paramāṃ mudaṃ tadā /
analyzed: aṅkam samāropya sa mūrdhni ca enam āghrāya lebhe paramām mudam tadā

original: kṣattāramāyāntamudīkṣya sarve sasaubalā dhārtarāṣṭrā amarṣāt /
analyzed: kṣattāram āyāntam udīkṣya sarve sa saubalāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ amarṣāt

original: sammantrya hantuṃ pāṇḍavānāmutaikaṃ channopadhenaiva sasūtajā yayuḥ / 22.14 /
analyzed: sammantrya hantum pāṇḍavānām uta ekam channa upadhena eva sa sūtajāḥ yayuḥ  /

original: vijñāya teṣāṃ gamanaṃ samastalokāntarātmā parameśvareśvaraḥ /
analyzed: vijñāya teṣām gamanam samasta loka antarātmā parameśvara īśvaraḥ

original: vyāso'bhigamyāvadadāmbikeyaṃ nivārayā'śveva sutaṃ taveti / 22.15 /
analyzed: vyāsaḥ abhigamya avadat ambikā iyam nivāraya āśu eva sutam tava iti

original: avāpya pārthānayamadya mṛtyuṃ sahānubandho gamitā hyasaṃ śayam /
analyzed: avāpya pārtha anayam adya mṛtyum saha anubandhaḥ gamitā hi a sam śayam

original: itīrite tena nivārayeti prokto hariḥ prāha na saṃ vade taiḥ / 22.16 /
analyzed: iti īrite tena nivāraya iti proktaḥ hariḥ prāha na sam vade taiḥ

original: maitreya āyāsyati so'pi vācaṃ śikṣārthameteṣvabhidhāsyatīha /
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āyāsyati saḥ upi vācam śikṣā artham eteṣu abhidhāsyati iha

original: t āṃ cet karotyeṣa sutastavāsya bhadraṃ tadā syācchapsyati tvanyathā saḥ / 22.17 /
analyzed: ced karoti eṣa sutaḥ tava asya bhadram tadā syāt śapsyati tu anyathā saḥ  /

original: uktveti rājānamanantaśaktirvyāso yayau tatra gateṣu teṣu /
analyzed: uktvā iti rājānam anantaśaktiḥ vyāsaḥ yayau tatra gateṣu teṣu

original: suyodhanādyeṣu hateṣu pārthairbhūbhārahānirna bhavediti prabhuḥ / 22.18 /
analyzed: suyodhana ādyeṣu hateṣu pārthaiḥ bhū bhāra hāniḥ na bhavet iti prabhuḥ

original: sarvāṇsca ceṣṭā bhagavanniyuktāḥ sadā samastasya cito'citaśca /
analyzed: sarvāṇs ca ceṣṭāḥ bhagavat niyuktāḥ sadā samastasya citā ucitaḥ ca

original: tathā'pi viṣṇurvinivārayet kvacid vācā vidhatte ca janān viḍambayan / 22.19 /
analyzed: tathā api viṣṇuḥ vinivārayet kvacid vācā vidhatte ca janān viḍambayan  /

original: maitreya āgādatha bhūpatiśca putrān samāhūya sakarṇasaubalān /
analyzed: maitreyaḥ āgāt atha bhūpatiḥ ca putrān samāhūya sa karṇa saubalān

original: sampūjayāmāsa muniṃ sa cā'ha dātuṃ rājyaṃ pāṇḍavān sampraśaṃ san / 22.20 /
analyzed: sampūjayāmāsa munim sa ca āha dātum rājyam pāṇḍavān san

original: viśeṣato bhīmabalaṃ śaśaṃ sa kirmīranāṇsādi vadan munīndraḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ bhīma balam śaśam sa kirmīra nāṇsādi vadan muni indraḥ

original: śrutvā'sahaṃ stad dhṛtarāṣṭraputra āsphālayāmāsa nijorumugraḥ / 22.21 /
analyzed: śrutvā asaham dhṛtarāṣṭra putraḥ āsphālayāmāsa nija ūrum ugraḥ  /

original: śaśāpa cainaṃ munirugratejāstavorubhedāya bhavet suyuddham /
analyzed: śaśāpa ca enam muniḥ ugra tejāḥ tava ūru bhedāya bhavet su yuddham

original: ityūcivān dhṛtarāṣṭrānato'pi yayau na ced rājyadastvaṃ tatheti /
analyzed: iti ūcivān dhṛtarāṣṭra ānataḥ upi yayau na ced rājya daḥ tvam tathā iti

original: śrutvā tu kirmīravadhaṃ svapitrā pṛṣṭakṣatroktaṃ so'trasad dhārtarāṣṭraḥ / 22.22 /
analyzed: śrutvā tu kirmīra vadham sva pitrā pṛṣṭa kṣatra uktam saḥ utrasat dhārtarāṣṭraḥ

original: ccxcvi.vane vasanto'tha pṛthāsutāste vārtāṃ svakīyāṃ prāpayāmāsurāṇsu /
analyzed: vasantaḥ utha pṛthāsutāḥ te vārtām svakīyām prāpayāmāsuḥ āṇsu

original: kṛṣṇe so'pi drutamāyāt sasatyaḥ sambandhino ye ca pāñcālamukhyāḥ / 22.23 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇe saḥ api drutam āyāt sa satyaḥ sambandhinaḥ ye ca pāñcāla mukhyāḥ

original: kruddhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāya pārthāḥ kṣamāpayāmāsuruccairgṛṇantaḥ /
analyzed: kruddham kṛṣṇam dhārtarāṣṭrāya pārthāḥ kṣamāpayāmāsuḥ uccais gṛṇantaḥ

original: guṇāṃ stadīyānamitān praṇamya tadā rudantī draupadī cā'pa pādau /
analyzed: guṇān stadīyān amitān praṇamya tadā rudantī draupadī ca āpa pādau

original: sā pādayoḥ patitā vāsudevamastaut samastaprabhumātmatantram / 22.24 /
analyzed: sā pādayoḥ patitā vāsudevam astaut samasta prabhum ātmatantram

original: acintya nityāvyaya pūrṇasadguṇārṇavaikadehākhiladoṣadūra /
analyzed: acintya nitya avyaya pūrṇa sat guṇa arṇava eka deha akhila doṣa dūra

original: ramābjajeśerasurendrapūrvavṛndārakāṇāṃ satatābhivandya /
analyzed: ramā abja ja īśeḥ asura indra pūrva vṛndārakāṇām satata abhivandya

original: samastaceṣṭāprada sarvajīvaprabho vimuktāṇsraya sarvasāra / 22.25 /
iti bruvantī sakalānubhūtaṃ jagāda sarveśituracyutasya /
analyzed: iti bruvantī sakala anubhūtam jagāda sarva īśituḥ acyutasya

original: yasyādhikānugrahapātrabhūtā svayaṃ hi śeṣeṇsavipādikebhyaḥ / 22.26 /
analyzed: yasya adhikā anugraha pātra bhūtā svayam hi

original: śrutvā samastaṃ bhagavān pratijñāṃ cakāra teṣāmakhilāṇsca yoṣāḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā samastam bhagavān pratijñām cakāra teṣām akhilān ca yoṣāḥ

original: patīn samāliṅgya vimuktakeśyān bhīmāhatān darśaye nānyatheti /
analyzed: patīn samāliṅgya vimukta keśyān bhīma āhatān darśaye na anyathā iti

original: t āṃ sāntvayitvā madhuraiḥ suvākyairnārāyaṇo vācamimāṃ jagāda / 22.27 /
analyzed: t ām sāntvayitvā madhuraiḥ su vākyaiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ vācam imām jagāda  /

original: yadīhāhaṃ sthito naivaṃ bhavitā'haṃ tvayodhayam /
analyzed: yadi iha aham sthitaḥ na evam bhavitā aham tu ayodhayam

original: sālvarājaṃ durātmānaṃ hataścāsau supāpakṛt / 22.28 /
analyzed: sālva rājam durātmānam hataḥ ca asau su pāpa kṛt

original: sannidhāne'tha dūre vā kālavyavahite'pi vā /
analyzed: dūre vā kāla vyavahite api vā

original: svabhāvād vā vyavahite vastuvyavahite'pi vā /
analyzed: svabhāvāt vā vyavahite vastu vyavahite pi vā

original: nāṇsaktirvidyate viṣṇornityāvyavahitatvataḥ / 22.29 /
analyzed: na aṇ saktiḥ vidyate viṣṇoḥ nitya avyavahita tvataḥ

original: tathā'pi naralokasya karotyanukṛtiṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tathā api nara lokasya karoti anukṛtim prabhuḥ

original: duṣṭānāṃ doṣavṛddhyarthaṃ bhīmādīnāṃ guṇonnateḥ / 22.30 /
analyzed: duṣṭānām doṣa vṛddhi artham bhīma ādīnām guṇa unnateḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhire'tivṛddhaṃ tu rājasūyādisambhavam /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira iti vṛddham tu rājasūya ādi sambhavam

original: dharmaṃ ca saṅkrāmayituṃ kṛṣṇāyāmanujeṣu ca/ 22.31 /
analyzed: dharmam ca saṅkrāmayitum kṛṣṇāyām anujeṣu ca

original: yogyatākramato viṣṇuricchayetthamacīklṛpat /
analyzed: yogyatā kramataḥ viṣṇuḥ icchayā ittham acīklṛpat

original: edhamānadvil . ityeva viṣṇornāma hi vaidikam / 22.32 /
analyzed: iti eva viṣṇoḥ nāma hi vaidikam  /

original: ccxcvii.svayogyatāyā adhikadharmajñānādijaṃ phalam /
bhīṣmadroṇāmbikeyādeḥ pārtheṣveva nidhāpitum / 22.33 /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ambikeya ādeḥ pārtheṣu eva nidhāpitum

original: punaśca pāpavṛddhyarthamajo duryodhanādiṣu /
analyzed: punar ca pāpa vṛddhi artham ajaḥ duryodhana ādiṣu

original: vyāso'mbikāsutaṃ prāha pārthā me'bhyadhikaṃ priyāḥ /
analyzed: vyāsa umbikāsutam prāha pārthāḥ mā ibhyadhikam priyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ pravāsanaṃ caiva priyaṃ na mama sarvathā / 22.34 /
analyzed: teṣām pravāsanam ca eva priyam na mama sarvathā

original: iti duryodhanādīnāṃ pāpavṛddhyarthameva saḥ /
analyzed: iti duryodhana ādīnām pāpa vṛddhi artham eva saḥ

original: priyā ityeva kathanāt pāṇḍavānāṃ śubhonnateḥ / 22.35 /
analyzed: priyāḥ iti eva kathanāt pāṇḍavānām śubha unnateḥ

original: gurutvād bhīmasenasya kṣamā dyūte'rjunādinām /
analyzed: guru tvāt bhīmasenasya kṣamā

original: nātidharmasvarūpo'tra dharmo bhīme niraupadhaḥ / 22.36 /
analyzed: na ati dharma svarūpā utra dharmaḥ bhīme niraupadhaḥ

original: draupadyā apyatikleśāt kṣamā dharmo mahānabhūt /
analyzed: draupadyāḥ api ati kleśāt kṣamā dharmaḥ mahān abhūt

original: sā hibhīmamano veda na kāryaḥ śāpa ityalam / 22.37 /
analyzed: sā hi bhīma manaḥ veda na kāryaḥ śāpaḥ iti alam

original: tasmād yathāyogyatayā hariṇā dharmavarddhanam /
analyzed: tasmāt yathāyogya tayā hariṇā dharma varddhanam

original: kṛtaṃ tatrāsannidhānakāraṇaṃ keśavo'bravīt / 22.38 /
analyzed: kṛtam tatra asannidhāna kāraṇam keśavaḥ bravīt

original: sālvaṃ śrutvā samāyātaṃ raugmiṇeyādayo mayā /
analyzed: sālvam śrutvā samāyātam raugmiṇeya ādayaḥ mayā

original: prasthāpitā hi bhavatāṃ sakāṇsāt te yayuḥ purīm /
analyzed: prasthāpitāḥ hi bhavatām sa kāṇsāt te yayuḥ purīm

original: tadā sālvo'pi saubhena dvārakāmardayad bhṛśam / 22.39 /
analyzed: tadā śālvaḥ api saubhena dvārakām ardayat bhṛśam

original: pradyumna āṇsu niragādatha sarvasainyairanyaiśca yādavagaṇaiḥ sahito'nujaiśca /
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ niragāt atha sarva sainyaiḥ anyaiḥ ca yādava gaṇaiḥ sahita unujaiḥ ca

original: sālvo'vagamya tanayaṃ mama tadvimānāt pāpo'varuhya rathamāruhadatra yoddhum / 22.40 /
analyzed: śālvaḥ uvagamya tanayam mama tad vimānāt pāpā uvaruhya ratham āruhat atra yoddhum

original: kṛtvā suyuddhamamunā mama putrako'sāvastrāṇi tasya vinivārya mahāstrajālaiḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā su yuddham amunā mama putra kosā vastrāṇi tasya vinivārya mahā astra jālaiḥ

original: dattaṃ mayā ṇsaramamoghamathā'dade taṃ hantuṃ nṛpaṃ kṛtamatistvaśṛṇod vacaḥ khe / 22.41 /
analyzed: dattam mayā ṇsaram amogham atha ādade tam hantum nṛpam kṛta matiḥ tu aśṛṇot vacaḥ khe

original: nārāyaṇena hi purā manasā'bhiklṛptaṃ kṛṣṇāvatāramupagamya nihanmi sālvam /
analyzed: nārāyaṇena hi purā manasā abhiklṛptam kṛṣṇa avatāram upagamya nihanmi sālvam

original: ityeva tena hariṇā'pi sa bhārgaveṇa vidrāvito na nihataḥ svamanonusārāt / 22.42 /
analyzed: iti eva tena hariṇā api sa bhārgaveṇa vidrāvitaḥ na nihataḥ sva manaḥ nusārāt

original: vadhyastvayā nahi tato'yamayaṃ ca bāṇaṇscakrāyudhasya dayito nitarāmamoghaḥ /
analyzed: vadhyaḥ tvayā nahi ca cakrāyudhasya dayitaḥ nitarām amoghaḥ

original: mā muñca tena tamimaṃ vinivartaye'haṃ sālvaṃ hṛdi sthita itīritamīraṇena / 22.43 /
analyzed: mā muñca tena tam imam vinivartaya iham śālvam hṛdi sthitaḥ iti īritam īraṇena

original: ccxcviii.śrutvā vacaḥ sa pavanasya śaraṃ tvamoghaṃ sañjahra āṇsu sa ca sālvapatiḥ svasaubham /
analyzed: śrutvā vacaḥ sa pavanasya śaram tu amogham sañjahre sa ca śālva patiḥ sva saubham

original: āruhya bālakalahena kimatra kāryaṃ kṛṣṇena saṅgara iti prayayau svadeśam / 22.44 /
analyzed: āruhya bāla kalahena kim atra kāryam kṛṣṇena saṅgaraḥ iti prayayau sva deśam

original: pradyumnasāmbagadasāraṇacārudeṣṇāḥ senāṃ nihatya saha mantrigaṇaistadīyām /
analyzed: pradyumna sāmba gada sāraṇa cārudeṣṇāḥ senām nihatya saha mantri gaṇaiḥ tadīyām

original: āhlādinaḥ svapuramāyayurapyahaṃ ca tatrāgamaṃ sapadi taiḥ śrutavānaśeṣam / 22.45 /
analyzed: āhlādinaḥ sva puram āyayuḥ api aham ca tatra agamam sapadi taiḥ śrutavān aśeṣam

original: yasmiñchare karagate vijayo dhruvaḥ syānmattejasā tadanusaṅgrahaṇāt sutānme /
analyzed: yasmin śare kara gate vijayaḥ dhruvaḥ syāt mad tejasā tad anusaṅgrahaṇāt sutān me

original: yātaṃ niśamya ripumātmapurīṃ ca bhagnāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva tena tadanubrajanaṃ kṛtaṃ me / 22.46 /
analyzed: yātam niśamya ripum ātma purīm ca bhagnām dṛṣṭvā eva tena tad anubrajanam kṛtam me  /

original: taṃ sāgaroparigasaubhagataṃ niśāmya mukte ca tena mayi śastramahāstravarṣe /
analyzed: tam sāgara upariga saubha gatam niśāmya mukte ca tena mayi śastra mahā astra varṣe

original: taṃ sannivārya tu mayā ṇsarapūgaviddho māyā yuyoja mayi pāpatamaḥ sa sālvaḥ / 22.47 /
analyzed: tam san nivārya tu mayā ṇsarapūga viddhaḥ māyāḥ yuyoja mayi pāpatamaḥ sa sālvaḥ  /

original: t āḥ krīḍayā kṣaṇamahaṃ samare niśāmya jñānāstrataḥ pratividhūya bahūṃ śca daityān /
analyzed: t āḥ krīḍayā kṣaṇam aham samare niśāmya jñāna astrataḥ pratividhūya bahūn ca daityān

original: hatvā'śu taṃ ca girivarṣiṇamāṇsu saubhaṃ vārdhau nyapātayamarīndravibhinnabandham / 22.48 /
analyzed: hatvā āśu tam ca giri varṣiṇam āṇsu saubham vārdhau nyapātayam ari indra vibhinna bandham  /

original: taṃ syandanasthitamatho vibhujaṃ vidhāya bāṇena tadrathavaraṃ gadayā vibhidya /
analyzed: tam syandana sthitam atho vibhujam vidhāya bāṇena tad ratha varam gadayā vibhidya

original: cakreṇa tasya ca śiro vinikṛtya dhātṛśarvādibhiḥ pratinutaḥ svapurīmagāṃ ca / 22.49 /
analyzed: cakreṇa tasya ca śiraḥ vinikṛtya dhātṛ śarva ādibhiḥ pratinutaḥ sva purīm agām ca  /

original: tasmādidaṃ vyasanamāsa hi viprakarṣānme kāryatastviti nigadya punaśca pārthān /
analyzed: tasmāt idam vyasanam āsa hi viprakarṣāt me kāryataḥ tu iti nigadya punar ca pārthān

original: kṛṣṇāṃ ca sāntvayitumatra dinānyuvāsa satyā ca somakasutāmanusāntvayantī / 22.50 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇām ca sāntvayitum atra dināni uvāsa satyā ca somaka sutām anusāntvayantī  /

original: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yā bhāryāḥ putrā api hi sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: pāṇḍavānām ca yāḥ bhāryāḥ putrāḥ api hi sarvaśas

original: anveva pāṇḍavān yātā vanamatraiva ca sthitāḥ / 22.51 /
analyzed: anu eva pāṇḍavān yātāḥ vanam atra eva ca sthitāḥ

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnastataḥ kṛṣṇāṃ sāntvayitvaiva keśavam /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatas kṛṣṇām sāntvayitvā eva keśavam

original: praṇamya samanujñāto bhāgineyaiḥ puraṃ yayau / 22.52 /
analyzed: praṇamya samanujñātaḥ bhāgineyaiḥ puram yayau

original: dhṛṣṭaketuśca bhāginīṃ kāṇsirājaḥ sutāmapi /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca bhāginīm kāṇsi rājaḥ sutām api

original: puraṃ yayaturādāya kuntyaivānyāḥ saha sthitāḥ / 22.53 /
analyzed: puram yayatuḥ ādāya kuntyā eva anyāḥ saha sthitāḥ

original: pārvatī nakulasyā'sīd bhāryā pūrvaṃ tilottamā /
analyzed: pārvatī nakulasya āsīt bhāryā pūrvam tilottamā

original: pūrvokte caiva yamayorbhārye kuntyā hivāritāḥ / 22.54 /
analyzed: pūrva ukte ca eva yamayoḥ bhārye kuntyāḥ hi vāritāḥ

original: subhadrāmabhimanyuṃ ca rathamāropya keśavaḥ /
analyzed: subhadrām abhimanyum ca ratham āropya keśavaḥ

original: pāṇḍavānabhyanujñāya sabhāryaḥ svapurīṃ yayau / 22.55 /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān abhyanujñāya sa bhāryaḥ sva purīm yayau

original: ccxcix.kañcit kālaṃ draupadeyā uṣya pāñcālake pure /
analyzed: ccxcixkañcid kālam draupadeyāḥ uṣya pāñcālake pure

original: yayurdvāravatīmeva tatroṣuḥ kṛṣṇalāl . it āḥ / 22.56 /
analyzed: yayuḥ dvāravatīm eva tatra ūṣuḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ dharmarājo nirviṇṇaḥ svakṛtena ha /
analyzed: tatas param dharmarājaḥ nirviṇṇaḥ sva kṛtena ha

original: bhrātṛbhāryāpade kṛṣṇāṃ sthāpayāmāsa sarvadā / 22.57 /
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhāryā pade kṛṣṇām sthāpayāmāsa sarvadā

original: ūṣurvane ca te pārthā muniśeṣānnabhojinaḥ /
analyzed: ūṣuḥ vane ca te pārthāḥ muni śeṣa anna bhojinaḥ

original: bhuktavatsvevānujeṣu bhuṅkte rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 22.58 /
analyzed: bhuktavatsu eva anujeṣu bhuṅkte rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: alaṅghyatvāt tadājñāyā anujāḥ pūrvabhojinaḥ /
analyzed: a laṅghya tvāt tad ājñāyāḥ anujāḥ pūrva bhojinaḥ

original: tasyānantaramevaikā bhuṅkte sā pārṣatātmajā / 22.59 /
analyzed: tasya anantaram eva ekā bhuṅkte sā pārṣata ātmajā

original: evaṃ sadā viṣṇuparāyaṇānāṃ tatprāpaṇānnaikabhujāṃ prayātaḥ /
analyzed: evam sadā viṣṇu parāyaṇānām tad prāpaṇāt na eka bhujām prayātaḥ

original: saṃ vatsarastatra jagāda kṛṣṇā bhīmājñayā dharmarājaṃ suvettrī / 22.60 /
analyzed: sam vatsaraḥ tatra jagāda kṛṣṇā bhīma ājñayā dharmarājam su vettrī  /

original: atimārdavayuktatvād dharmarājaścaturdaśe /
analyzed: ati mārdava yukta tvāt dharmarājaḥ caturdaśe

original: api varṣe gurubhayād rājyaṃ necchediti prabhuḥ /
analyzed: api varṣe guru bhayāt rājyam na icchet iti prabhuḥ

original: mārutiḥ preṣayāmāsa kṛṣṇāṃ prastāvahetave / 22.61 /
analyzed: mārutiḥ preṣayāmāsa kṛṣṇām prastāva hetave

original: kṣamā sarvatra dharmo na pāpahetuśca durjane /
analyzed: kṣamā sarvatra dharmaḥ na pāpa hetuḥ ca durjane

original: rājñāṃ sāmarthyayuktānāmiti saṃ sthāpya śāstrataḥ / 22.62 /
analyzed: rājñām sāmarthya yuktānām iti sam sthāpya śāstrataḥ

original: hatvā caturdaśe varṣe dhārtarāṣṭrānarājyadān /
analyzed: hatvā caturdaśe varṣe dhārtarāṣṭrān arājya dān

original: kartuṃ rājyaṃ puro gantā bhavānītyagrajena ha / 22.63 /
analyzed: kartum rājyam puras gantā bhavāni iti agrajena ha

original: kārayan satyaśapathaṃ vivādasya kramecchayā /
analyzed: kārayan satya śapatham vivādasya krama icchayā

original: ādiśat prathamaṃ kṛṣṇāṃ bhīmaḥ sā nṛpamabravīt / 22.64 /
analyzed: ādiśat prathamam kṛṣṇām bhīmaḥ sā nṛpam abravīt

original: naiva kṣamā kujanatāsu nṛpasya dharmastāṃ tvaṃ vṛthaiva dhṛtavānasi sarvakālam /
analyzed: nā eva kṣamā ku janatāsu nṛpasya dharmaḥ tām tvam vṛthā eva dhṛtavān asi sarvakālam

original: ityukta āha nṛpatiḥ paramā kṣamaiva sarvatra tadvidhṛtameva jagat samastam / 22.65 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ āha nṛpatiḥ paramā kṣamā eva sarvatra tat vidhṛtam eva jagat samastam

original: kartā ca sarvajagataḥ sukhaduḥkhayorhi nārāyaṇastadanudattamihāsya sarvam /
analyzed: kartā ca sarva jagataḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ hi nārāyaṇaḥ tat anudattam iha asya sarvam

original: tasmānna kopaviṣayo'sti kutaśca kaścit tasmāt kṣamaiva sakaleṣu paro'sya dharmaḥ / 22.66 /
analyzed: tasmāt na kopa viṣayaḥ usti kutas ca kaścid tasmāt kṣamā eva sakaleṣu paraḥ sya dharmaḥ  /

original: ccc.ityuktavantaṃ nṛpamāha pārṣatī yadi kṣamā sarvanareṣu dharmaḥ /
analyzed: ccciti uktavantam nṛpam āha pārṣatī yadi kṣamā sarva nareṣu dharmaḥ

original: rājñā nakṛtyaṃ naca lokayātrā bhavejjagat kāpuruṣairvinaśyet / 22.67 /
analyzed: rājñā na kṛtyam na ca lokayātrā bhavet jagat kāpuruṣaiḥ vinaśyet

original: satyaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakalapravartako ramāviriñceśapurassarāṇsca /
analyzed: satyam ca viṣṇuḥ sakala pravartakaḥ ramā viriñca īśa purassarān ca

original: kāṣṭhādivat tadvaśagāḥ samastāstathā'pi na vyarthatā pauruṣasya / 22.68 /
analyzed: kāṣṭha ādi vat tad vaśa gāḥ samastāḥ tathā api na vyartha tā pauruṣasya

original: tadājñayā puruṣaṇsceṣṭamānaśceṣṭānusāreṇa ṇsubhāṇsubhasya /
analyzed: tad ājñayā

original: bhoktā na tacceṣṭitamanyathā bhavet kartā tasmāt puruṣo'pyasya vaśyaḥ / 22.69 /
analyzed: bhoktā na tat ceṣṭitam anyathā bhavet kartā tasmāt puruṣaḥ upi asya vaśyaḥ

original: vṛthā yadi syāt pauruṣaṃ kasya hetorvidhirniṣedhaśca samastavedagaḥ /
analyzed: vṛthā yadi syāt pauruṣam kasya hetoḥ vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ ca samasta veda gaḥ

original: vidherniṣedhasya ca naiva gocaraḥ pumān yadi syād bhavato hi tau hareḥ / 22.70 /
analyzed: vidheḥ niṣedhasya ca nā eva gocaraḥ pumān yadi syāt bhavataḥ hi tau hareḥ

original: tenaiva lepaśca bhavedamuṣya puṇyena pāpena ca naiva cāsau /
analyzed: tena eva lepaḥ ca bhavet amuṣya puṇyena pāpena ca nā eva ca asau

original: lipyeta tābhyāṃ paramasvatantraḥ kartā tataḥ puruṣo'pyasya vaśyaḥ / 22.71 /
analyzed: lipyeta tābhyām parama svatantraḥ kartā tatas puruṣaḥ upyasya vaśyaḥ  /

original: itīrito dharmajaḥ kṛṣṇayaiva niruttaratvaṃ gamitastvabhartsayat /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ dharmajaḥ kṛṣṇayā eva niruttara tvam gamitaḥ tu abhartsayat

original: kutarkamāṇsritya harerapi tvamasvātantryaṃ sādhayasīti coktvā / 22.72 /
analyzed: kutarkam āṇsritya hareḥ api tvam asvātantryam sādhayasi iti ca uktvā

original: chalena tena pratibhartsitā sā kṣamāpayāmāsa nṛpaṃ yataḥ strī /
analyzed: chalena tena pratibhartsitā sā kṣamāpayāmāsa nṛpam yatas strī

original: vācāl . atā nātitarāṃ hi śobhate strīṇāṃ tataḥ prāha vṛkodarastam / 22.73 /
analyzed: vācāl na atitarām hi śobhate strīṇām tatas prāha vṛkodaraḥ tam

original: rājan viṣṇuḥ sarvakartā nacānyastattantramevānyadasau svatantraḥ /
analyzed: rājan viṣṇuḥ sarva kartā na ca anyaḥ tad tantram eva anyat asau svatantraḥ

original: tathā'pi puṃ sā vihitaṃ svakarma kāryaṃ tyājyaṃ cānyadatyantayatnāt / 22.74 /
analyzed: tathā api pum sā vihitam sva karma kāryam tyājyam ca anyat atyanta yatnāt

original: pratyakṣametat puruṣasya karma tenānumeyā preraṇā keśavasya /
analyzed: pratyakṣam etat puruṣasya karma tena anumeyā preraṇā keśavasya

original: svakarma kṛtvā vihitaṃ hi viṣṇunā tatpreraṇetyeva budho'numanyate / 22.75 /
analyzed: sva karma kṛtvā vihitam hi viṣṇunā tad preraṇā iti eva budhaḥ unumanyate

original: tenaiti samyaggatimasya viṣṇorjano'śubho daivamityeva matvā /
analyzed: tena eti samyak gatim asya viṣṇoḥ jana ūśubhaḥ daivam iti eva matvā

original: hitvā svakaṃ karma gatiṃ ca tāmasīṃ prayāti tasmāt kāryameva svakarma / 22.76 /
analyzed: hitvā svakam karma gatim ca tāmasīm prayāti tasmāt kāryam eva sva karma

original: j ñātavyaṃ caivāsya viṣṇorvaśatvaṃ kartavyaṃ caivā'tmanaḥ kāryakarma /
analyzed: j ñātavyam ca eva asya viṣṇoḥ vaśa tvam kartavyam ca eva ātmanaḥ kārya karma

original: pratyakṣaiṣā kartṛt ā jīvasaṃ sthā tathā'gamādanumānācca sarvam / 22.77 /
analyzed: pratyakṣā eṣā ā jīvasam sthā tathā āgamāt anumānāt ca sarvam  /

original: viṣṇorvaśe tanna heyaṃ dvayaṃ ca jānan vidvān kurute kāryakarma /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vaśe tat na heyam dvayam ca jānan vidvān kurute kārya karma

original: tatprerakaṃ viṣṇumevābhijānan bhavet pramāṇatritayānugāmī / 22.78 /
analyzed: tad prerakam viṣṇum eva abhijānan bhavet pramāṇa tritaya anugāmī

original: ccci.pūrṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ tattrayaṃ cāvirodhenaikatrasthaṃ tattrayaṃ cāvirodhi /
analyzed: pramāṇam tat trayam ca avirodhena ekatra stham tat trayam ca avirodhi

original: pṛthaṅ madhyaṃ cāpramāṇaṃ virodhi syāt tat tasmāt trayamekatra kāryam / 22.79 /
analyzed: pṛthak madhyam ca apramāṇam virodhi syāt tat tasmāt trayam ekatra kāryam

original: ajñaḥ pratyakṣaṃ tvapahāyaiva daivaṃ matvā kartṛsvātmakarma prajahyāt /
analyzed: ajñaḥ pratyakṣam tu apahāya eva daivam matvā kartṛ sva ātma karma prajahyāt

original: vidvān jīvaṃ viṣṇuvaśaṃ viditvā karoti kartavyamajasrameva / 22.80 /
analyzed: vidvān jīvam viṣṇu vaśam viditvā karoti kartavyam ajasram eva

original: svabhāvākhyā yogyatā yā haṭhākhyā yā'nādisiddhā sarvajīveṣu nityā /
analyzed: svabhāva ākhyā yogyatā yā haṭha ākhyā yā anādi siddhā sarva jīveṣu nityā

original: sā kāraṇaṃ tat prathamaṃ tu dvitīyamanādi karmaiva tathā tṛtīyaḥ /
analyzed: sā kāraṇam tat prathamam tu dvitīyam anādi karma eva tathā tṛtīyaḥ

original: jīvaprayatnaḥ pauruṣākhyastadetat trayaṃ viṣṇorvaśagaṃ sarvadaiva / 22.81 /
analyzed: jīva prayatnaḥ pauruṣa ākhyaḥ tat etat trayam viṣṇoḥ vaśa gam sarvadā eva

original: sa kasyacinna vaśe vāsudevaḥ parāt paraḥ paramo'sau svatantraḥ /
analyzed: sa kasyacid na vaśe vāsudevaḥ parāt paraḥ paramaḥ asau svatantraḥ

original: haṭhaścāsau tāratamyasthito hi brahmāṇamārabhya kaliśca yāvat /
analyzed: haṭhaḥ ca asau tāratamya sthitaḥ hi brahmāṇam ārabhya kaliḥ ca yāvat

original: haṭhācca karmāṇi bhavanti karmajo yatno yatno haṭhakarmaprayoktā / 22.82 /
analyzed: haṭhāt ca karmāṇi bhavanti karma jaḥ yatnaḥ yatnaḥ haṭha karma prayoktā

original: vinā yatnaṃ na haṭho nāpi karma phalapradau vāsudevo'khilasya /
analyzed: vinā yatnam na haṭhaḥ nā api karma phala pradau vāsudeva ukhilasya

original: svātantryaśakterviniyāmako hi tathā'pyetān so'pyapekṣyaiva yuñjet / 22.83 /
analyzed: svātantrya śakteḥ viniyāmakaḥ hi tathā api etān saḥ api apekṣya eva yuñjet

original: etānapekṣyaiva phalaṃ dadānītyasyaiva saṅkalpa iti svatantratā /
analyzed: etān apekṣya eva phalam dadāni iti asya eva saṅkalpaḥ iti svatantra tā

original: nāsyāpagacchet sa hi sarvaśaktirnāṇsaktatā kvacidasya prabhutvāt / 22.84 /
analyzed: na asya apagacchet sa hi sarva śaktiḥ na aṇ sakta tā kvacid asya prabhu tvāt

original: tasmāt kāryaṃ tena klṛptaṃ svakarma tatpūjārthaṃ tena tatprāptireva /
analyzed: tasmāt kāryam tena klṛptam sva karma tad pūjā artham tena tad prāptiḥ eva

original: ato'nyathā nirayaḥ sarvathā syāt svakarma viprasya japopadeśau /
analyzed: atonyathā nirayaḥ sarvathā syāt sva karma viprasya japa upadeśau

original: viṣṇormukhād viprajātiḥ pravṛtt ā mukhotthitaṃ karma tenāsya so'dāt / 22.85 /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ mukhāt vipra jātiḥ pravṛtt ā mukha utthitam karma tena asya saḥ udāt  /

original: bāhvorjātaḥ kṣatriyastena bāhvoḥ karmāsya pāpaprativāraṇaṃ hi /
analyzed: bāhvoḥ jātaḥ kṣatriyaḥ tena bāhvoḥ karma asya pāpa prativāraṇam hi

original: pravartanaṃ sādhudharmasya caiva mukhasya bāhvoścātisāmīpyato'sya /
analyzed: pravartanam sādhu dharmasya ca eva mukhasya bāhvoḥ ca ati sāmīpyataḥ sya

original: japopadeśau kṣatriyasyāpi viṣṇuṇscakre dharmau yajñakarmāpi vipre / 22.86 /
analyzed: japa upadeśau kṣatriyasya api dharmau yajña karma api vipre

original: vaiśyo yasmādūrujastena tasya prajāvṛddhistajjakarmaiva dharmaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ yasmāt ūru jaḥ tena tasya prajā vṛddhiḥ tad ja karmā eva dharmaḥ

original: tatsādṛśyāt sthāvarāṇāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ karorūrvoḥ sannikṛṣṭatvahetoḥ /
analyzed: tad sādṛśyāt sthāvarāṇām ca vṛddhiḥ kara ūru ūrvoḥ sannikṛṣṭa tva hetoḥ

original: vārtātmakaṃ karma dharmaṃ cakāra viṣṇustasyaivāṅghrijaḥ śūdra uktaḥ / 22.87 /
analyzed: vārtā ātmakam karma dharmam cakāra viṣṇuḥ tasya eva aṅghri jaḥ śūdraḥ uktaḥ  /

original: gatipradhānaṃ karma śuśrūṣaṇākhyaṃ sādṛśyato hastapadostathaiva /
analyzed: gati pradhānam karma śuśrūṣaṇa ākhyam sādṛśyataḥ hasta padoḥ tathā eva

original: hastodbhavaṃ karma tasyāpi dharmaḥ santānavṛddhiśca samīpagatvāt / 22.88 /
analyzed: hasta udbhavam karma tasya api dharmaḥ santāna vṛddhiḥ ca samīpa ga tvāt

original: cccii.bhujāvuro hṛdayaṃ yad balasya jñānasya ca sthānamato nṛpāṇām /
analyzed: hṛdayam yat balasya jñānasya ca sthānam atas nṛpāṇām

original: balaṃ j ñānaṃ cobhayaṃ dharma uktaḥ pāṇau kṛtīnāṃ kauśalaṃ kevalaṃ hi /
analyzed: balam j ñānam ca ubhayam dharmaḥ uktaḥ pāṇau kṛtīnām kauśalam kevalam hi

original: tasmāt pāṇyorūrupadorupasthiterviṭchūdrakau karmaṇāṃ kauśaletau / 22.89 /
analyzed: tasmāt pāṇyoḥ ūru padoḥ upasthiteḥ viś śūdrakau karmaṇām kauśala itau

original: prādhānyato dharmaviśeṣa eṣa sāmānyataḥ sarvamevākhilānām /
analyzed: prādhānyataḥ dharma viśeṣaḥ eṣa sāmānyatas sarvam eva akhilānām

original: vayaṃ hi devāstena sarvaṃ hi karma prāyeṇa no dharmatāmeti śaśvat / 22.90 /
analyzed: vayam hi devāḥ tena sarvam hi karma prāyeṇa naḥ dharma tām eti śaśvat

original: etairdharmairviṣṇunā pūrvaklṛptaiḥ sarvairvarṇairviṣṇurevābhipūjyaḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ dharmaiḥ viṣṇunā pūrva klṛptaiḥ sarvaiḥ varṇaiḥ viṣṇuḥ eva abhipūjyaḥ

original: tadbhaktirevākhilānāṃ ca dharmo yathāyogyaṃ j ñānamasyāpi pūjā / 22.91 /
analyzed: tad bhaktiḥ eva akhilānām ca dharmaḥ yathāyogyam ñānam asya api pūjā

original: pitā guruḥ paramaṃ daivataṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sarveṣāṃ tena pūjyaḥ sa eva /
analyzed: pitā guruḥ paramam daivatam ca viṣṇuḥ sarveṣām tena pūjyaḥ saḥ eva

original: tadbhaktatvād devatāṇscābhipūjyā viśeṣatasteṣu ye'tyantabhaktāḥ / 22.92 /
analyzed: tad bhakta tvāt viśeṣataḥ teṣu yā iti anta bhaktāḥ

original: sampūjito vāsudevaḥ sa muktiṃ dadyādevāpūjito duḥkhameva /
analyzed: sampūjitaḥ vāsudevaḥ sa muktim dadyāt eva a pūjitaḥ duḥkham eva

original: svatantratvāt sukhaduḥkhaprado'sau nānyaḥ svatastadvaśā yat samastāḥ / 22.93 /
analyzed: svatantra tvāt sukha duḥkha pradosau na anyaḥ svatas tad vaśāḥ yat samastāḥ

original: svatantratvāt sukhasajjñānaśaktipūrvairguṇaiḥ pūrṇa eṣo'khilaiśca /
analyzed: svatantra tvāt sukha sat jñāna śakti pūrvaiḥ guṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ eṣa ukhilaiḥ ca

original: svatantratvāt sarvadoṣojjhitaśca nissīmaśaktirhi yataḥ svatantraḥ / 22.94 /
analyzed: svatantra tvāt sarva doṣa ujjhitaḥ ca nissīma śaktiḥ hi yatas svatantraḥ

original: doṣāspṛṣṭau guṇapūrtau ca śaktirnissīmatvād vidyate tasya yasmāt /
analyzed: doṣa a spṛṣṭau guṇa pūrtau ca śaktiḥ nissīma tvāt vidyate tasya yasmāt

original: evaṃ guṇairakhilaiścāpi pūrṇo nārāyaṇaḥ pūjyatamaḥ svadharmaiḥ /
analyzed: evam guṇaiḥ akhilaiḥ ca api pūrṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pūjyatamaḥ svadharmaiḥ

original: asmākaṃ yat tena nātikṣamaiva dharmo duṣṭānāṃ vāraṇaṃ hyeva kāryam / 22.95 /
analyzed: asmākam yat tena na ati kṣamā eva dharmaḥ duṣṭānām vāraṇam hi eva kāryam  /

original: hanyād duṣṭān yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyāṃ śca viśeṣato yuddhagatān smaran harim /
analyzed: hanyāt duṣṭān yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyām śca viśeṣataḥ yuddha gatān smaran harim

original: svabāhuvīryeṇa ca tasya bāhū caitanyamātrau bhavataḥ sadehau / 22.96 /
analyzed: sva bāhu vīryeṇa ca tasya bāhū caitanya mātrau bhavataḥ sa dehau

original: pāpādhikāṃ ścaiva balādhikāṃ śca hatvā muktāvadhikānandavṛddhiḥ /
analyzed: pāpa adhikām śca eva bala adhikām śca hatvā mukta avadhika ānanda vṛddhiḥ

original: prītiśca viṣṇoḥ paramaiva tatra tasmāddhantavyāḥ pāpinaḥ sarvathaiva / 22.97 /
analyzed: prītiḥ ca viṣṇoḥ paramā eva tatra tasmāt hantavyāḥ pāpinaḥ sarvathā eva

original: ye tvakṣadhūrtā grahaṇaṃ gatā vā pāpāste'nyairghātanīyāḥ svadorbhyām /
analyzed: ye tu akṣa dhūrtāḥ grahaṇam gatāḥ vā pāpa āstenyaiḥ ghātanīyāḥ sva dorbhyām

original: rājānaṃ vā rājaputraṃ tathaiva rājānujaṃ vā'bhiyātaṃ nihanyāt / 22.98 /
analyzed: rājānam vā rāja putram tathā eva rāja anujam vā abhiyātam nihanyāt

original: rājñaḥ putro'pyakṛtodvāhako yaḥ sa ghātanīyo na svayaṃ vadhya eva /
analyzed: rājñaḥ putraḥ api a kṛta udvāhakaḥ yaḥ sa ghātanīyaḥ na svayam vadhyaḥ eva

original: krūraṃ cānyad dharmayuktaṃ paraistat prasādhanīyaṃ kṣatriyairna svakāryam /
analyzed: krūram ca anyat dharma yuktam paraiḥ tat prasādhanīyam kṣatriyaiḥ na sva kāryam

original: ccciii.evaṃ dharmo vihito veda eva vākyaṃ viṣṇoḥ pañcarātreṣu tādṛk / 22.99 /
analyzed: evam dharmaḥ vihitaḥ vedaḥ eva vākyam viṣṇoḥ pañcarātreṣu tādṛś

original: akṣadyūtaṃ nikṛtiḥ pāpameva kṛtaṃ tvayā garhitaṃ saubalena /
analyzed: akṣa dyūtam nikṛtiḥ pāpam eva kṛtam tvayā garhitam saubalena

original: na kutracid vidhirasyāsti tena na tad dattaṃ dyūtahṛtaṃ vadanti / 22.100 /
analyzed: na kutracid vidhiḥ asya asti tena na tat dattam dyūta hṛtam vadanti

original: bhītena dattaṃ dyūtadattaṃ tathaiva dattaṃ kāminyai punarāhāryameva /
analyzed: bhītena dattam dyūta dattam tathā eva dattam kāminyai punar āhāryam eva

original: evaṃ dharmaḥ śāṇsvato vaidiko hi dyūte striyāṃ nālpamāhāryamāhuḥ / 22.101 /
analyzed: evam dharmaḥ śāṇsvataḥ vaidikaḥ hi dyūte striyām na alpam āhāryam āhuḥ

original: yadyeṣāṃ vai bhogyamalpaṃ tadīyaṃ bhogena tadbandhubhistacca hāryam /
analyzed: yadi eṣām vai bhogyam alpam tadīyam bhogena tad bandhubhiḥ tat ca hāryam

original: nivāraṇe puruṣasya tvaśaktaistad rājyaṃ na punarāhāryameva / 22.102 /
analyzed: nivāraṇe puruṣasya tu aśaktaiḥ tat rājyam na punar āhāryam eva

original: tvaṃ dharmanityaścāgrajaśceti rājan ṛte'nujñāṃ na mayā tat kṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: tvam dharma nityaḥ ca agrajaḥ ca iti rājan ṛtenujñām na mayā tat kṛtam ca

original: dātāsyanujñāṃ yadi tān nihatya tvayyeva rājyaṃ sthāpayāmyadya samyak / 22.103 /
analyzed: dātāsi anujñām yadi tān nihatya tvayi eva rājyam sthāpayāmi adya samyak

original: satyaṃ pāpeṣvapi kartuṃ yadīcchā tathā'pi māsā dvādaśaḥ naḥ prayātāḥ /
analyzed: satyam pāpeṣu api kartum yadi icchā tathā api māsāḥ dvādaśaḥ naḥ prayātāḥ

original: vedaprāmāṇyād vatsarāste hi māsaiḥ sahasrābdaṃ satramuktaṃ narāṇām /
analyzed: veda prāmāṇyāt vatsarāḥ te hi māsaiḥ sahasra abdam satram uktam narāṇām

original: ajñātamekaṃ māsamuṣyā'tha śatrūn nihatya rājyaṃ pratipālayāmaḥ / 22.104 /
analyzed: ajñātam ekam mā asamuṣya atha śatrūn nihatya rājyam pratipālayāmaḥ  /

original: mā mitrāṇāṃ t āpakastvaṃ bhavethāstathā'mitrāṇāṃ nandakaścaiva rājan /
analyzed: mā mitrāṇām t āpakaḥ tvam bhavethāḥ tathā amitrāṇām nandakaḥ ca eva rājan

original: jvalasvārīṇāṃ mūrdhni mitrāṇi nityamāhlādayan vāsudevaṃ bhajasva / 22.105 /
analyzed: jvalasva arīṇām mūrdhni mitrāṇi nityam āhlādayan vāsudevam bhajasva

original: svatantratvaṃ vāsudevasya samyak pratyakṣato dṛśyate hyadya rājan /
analyzed: svatantra tvam vāsudevasya samyak pratyakṣataḥ dṛśyate hi adya rājan

original: yasmāt kṛṣṇo vyajayacchaṅkarādīn jarāsutādīn kādivarairajeyān / 22.106 /
analyzed: yasmāt kṛṣṇaḥ vyajayat śaṅkara ādīn jarāsuta ādīn ka ādi varaiḥ ajeyān

original: brahmādīnāṃ prakṛtestadvaśatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi no bahuśo vyāsadehe /
analyzed: brahma ādīnām prakṛteḥ tad vaśa tvam dṛṣṭam hi naḥ bahuśas vyāsa dehe

original: pārāṇsaryo divyadṛṣṭiṃ pradāya svātantryaṃ no'darśayat sarvaloke / 22.107 /
analyzed: pārāṇsaryaḥ divya dṛṣṭim pradāya svātantryam na udarśayat sarva loke

original: tasmād rājannabhiniryāhi śatrūn hantuṃ sarvān bhoktumevādhirājyam /
analyzed: tasmāt rājan abhiniryāhi śatrūn hantum sarvān bhoktum eva adhirājyam

original: evañca te kīrtidharmau mahāntau prāpyau rājan vāsudevaprasādāt / 22.108 /
analyzed: evañca te kīrti dharmau mahāntau prāpyau rājan vāsudeva prasādāt

original: evamukto'bravīd bhīmaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ bravīt bhīmam dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: trayodaśābdasyānte'haṃ kuryāmeva tvadīritam / 22.109 /
analyzed: trayodaśa abdasya antā iham kuryām eva tvad īritam

original: satyametanna sandehaḥ satyenā'tmānamālabhe /
analyzed: satyam etat na sandehaḥ satyena ātmānam ālabhe

original: lokāpavādabhīruṃ māṃ nāto'nyad vaktumarhasi / 22.110 /
analyzed: loka apavāda bhīrum mām na atas nyat vaktum arhasi

original: ccciv.tudase cātivācā māṃ yadyevaṃ bhīma māṃ vadeḥ /
analyzed: ccciu tudase ca ati vācā mām yadi evam bhīma mām vadeḥ

original: tadaiva me'tyayaḥ kāryo hantavyāṇscaiva śatravaḥ /
analyzed: tadā eva mā ityayaḥ kāryaḥ hantavyān ca eva śatravaḥ

original: naitādṛśairidānīṃ tu vākyairbādhitumarhasi / 22.111 /
analyzed: na etādṛśaiḥ idānīm tu vākyaiḥ bādhitum arhasi

original: bhīṣmadroṇādayo'strajñā nivāryāṇsca kathaṃ yudhi /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ādayaḥ ustra jñāḥ nivāryān ca katham yudhi

original: pūjyāste bāhuyuddhena na nivāryāḥ kathañcana / 22.112 /
analyzed: pūjyāḥ te bāhu yuddhena na nivāryāḥ kathañcana

original: astrāṇi jānannapi hi na prayojayasi kvacit /
analyzed: astrāṇi jānan api hi na prayojayasi kvacid

original: tasmād tadaiva gantavyaṃ vijñātāstre dhanañjaye / 22.113 /
analyzed: tasmāt tadā eva gantavyam vijñāta astre dhanañjaye

original: ityukto bhīmasenastu snehabhaṅgabhayāt tataḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bhīmasenaḥ tu sneha bhaṅga bhayāt tatas

original: novāca kiñcid vacanaṃ svābhipretamavāpya ca / 22.114 /
analyzed: na uvāca kiñcid vacanam sva abhipretam avāpya ca

original: abhiprāyo hi bhīmasya niścayena trayodaśe /
analyzed: abhiprāyaḥ hi bhīmasya niścayena trayodaśe

original: yudhiṣṭhirasya rājyārthaṃ gamanārthe pratiśravaḥ /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya rājya artham gamana arthe pratiśravaḥ

original: anyathā'timṛdutvāt sa na gacched bhinnadhīḥ paraiḥ / 22.115 /
analyzed: anyathā ati mṛdu tvāt sa na gacchet bhinna dhīḥ paraiḥ

original: kṛtakṛtye tathā bhīme sthite dharmātmajo hi saḥ /
analyzed: kṛtakṛtye tathā bhīme sthite dharmātmajaḥ hi saḥ

original: bhīṣmadroṇādivijayaḥ kathaṃ syādityacintayat / 22.116 /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ādi vijayaḥ katham syāt iti acintayat

original: nivāraṇaṃ gurūṇāṃ hi bhīma icchati na kvacit /
analyzed: nivāraṇam gurūṇām hi bhīmaḥ icchati na kvacid

original: tasmāt te hyarjunenaiva nivāryā ityacintayat / 22.117 /
analyzed: tasmāt te hi arjunena eva nivāryāḥ iti acintayat

original: āpadyeva hi bhīmastān nivārayati nānyathā /
analyzed: āpadi eva hi bhīmaḥ tān nivārayati na anyathā

original: evaṃ cintāsamāviṣṭaṃ vijñāyaiva yudhiṣṭhiram / 22.118 /
analyzed: evam cintā samāviṣṭam vijñāya eva yudhiṣṭhiram

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiśca kṛṣṇadvaipāyano'gamat /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ ca kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ gamat

original: nṛpatiṃ bodhayāmāsa cintāvyākulamānasam / 22.119 /
analyzed: nṛpatim bodhayāmāsa cintā vyākula mānasam

original: imaṃ mantraṃ vadiṣyāmi yena jeṣyati phalgunaḥ /
analyzed: imam mantram vadiṣyāmi yena jeṣyati phalgunaḥ

original: bhīṣmadroṇādikān sarvān taṃ tvaṃ vada dhanañjaye / 22.120 /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ādikān sarvān tam tvam vada dhanañjaye

original: ityuktvaivāvadanmantraṃ sarvadaivatadṛṣṭidam /
analyzed: iti uktvā eva avadat mantram sarva daivata dṛṣṭi dam

original: na svayaṃ hyavadat pārthe phalādhikyaṃ yato bhavet / 22.121 /

analyzed: uktaiḥ anyaiḥ ca giriśa vākyaiḥ tattva vinirṇayaiḥ

original: kṛṣṇasyaiva guṇākhyānaiḥ punarindrādidevatāḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya eva guṇa ākhyānaiḥ punar indra ādi devatāḥ

original: yaduktavāñchivaṃ pūrvaṃ satyaṃ kartuṃ tadabravīt / 22.176 /

analyzed: iti uktvā abhipraṇamya enam punar āha surān haraḥ

original: yadarthameṣa āyātaḥ keśavaḥ śṛṇutāmarāḥ /

analyzed: yaḥ usuraḥ vakra nāmā āsīt avadhyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ varāt

original: taṃ hantumeva putraṃ svaṃ pradyumnamudare'rpya ca /

analyzed: pūrvavat kṣaṇa mātreṇa yuvā ca sa bhaviṣyati  /

original: cccxi.dṛṣṭametannāradādyairmunibhiḥ sarvameva ca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam etat nārada ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ sarvam eva ca

analyzed: tad astra śastraiḥ sahasā viṣaṇṇāḥ yadu pravīrāḥ vihata pradīpāḥ

analyzed: saha eva rāmeṇa ṇsineḥ ca naptrā samāviśan svām puram eva sarve

original: punaḥ samādāya tathorudīpikā agre samādhāya ca rauhiṇeyam /

analyzed: atha āsasāda ekalavyam rathena rāmaḥ śaineyaḥ pauṇḍrakam vāsudevam

analyzed: ayuddhyatām tau sātyakiḥ pauṇḍrakaḥ ca tathā anyonyam viratham cakratuḥ ca

analyzed: kṛtvā anyonyam viratham gadābhyām ayuddhyatām āta darpau bala agryau

original: tasmin kāle keśavo vainateyamāruṃ hyā'yād yatra te yuddasaṃ sthāḥ /
analyzed: tasmin kāle keśavaḥ vainateyam ārum hi āyāt yatra te yuddasam sthāḥ

original: 75 Harivaṃ śe Bhaviṣyatparvaṇi A. 102
analyzed: harivan śe bhaviṣyat parvaṇi a

analyzed: su bhītaḥ rāmam matvā eva anuyātam punar ca

original: rāmo vijityātibalaṃ raṇe ripuṃ mudaiva dāmodaramāsasāda /
analyzed: rāmaḥ vijitya atibalam raṇe ripum mudā eva dāmodaram āsasāda

original: pauṇḍrastvavajñāya śinipravīraṃ nivāryamāṇo'pi yayau janārdanam / 22.197 /
analyzed: pauṇḍraḥ tu avajñāya śini pravīram nivāryamāṇaḥ api yayau janārdanam

original: taṃ keśavo virathaṃ vyāyudhaṃ ca kṣaṇena cakre sa yayau nijāṃ purīm /
analyzed: tam keśavaḥ viratham vyāyudham ca kṣaṇena cakre sa yayau nijām purīm

original: prasthāpayāmāsa punaśca dūtaṃ kṛṣṇāyaiko vāsudevo'hamasmi / 22.198 /
analyzed: prasthāpayāmāsa punar ca dūtam kṛṣṇāya ekaḥ vāsudevaḥ ham asmi

original: madīyali' ngāni visṛjya cā'śu samāgacchethāḥ śaraṇaṃ māmanantam /
analyzed: visṛjya ca āśu samāgacchethāḥ śaraṇam mām anantam

original: taddūtoktaṃ vākyametanniśamya yadupravīrā uccakaiḥ prāhasan sma / 22.199 /
analyzed: tat dūta uktam vākyam etat niśamya yadu pravīrāḥ uccakais prāhasan sma

analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ prahasya āha tava āyudhāni dāsyāmi aham ca ājau

analyzed: iti uktā asau dūtaḥ etya āha tasmai sa ca abhyāgāt yoddhu kāmaḥ hariḥ ca

analyzed: tam śātakaumbhe garuḍe ratha sthe sthitam cakra ādīn kṛtrimān sandadhānam

analyzed: śrīvatsa arthe dagdha vakṣa sthalam ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaḥ prāhasat pāpa buddhim  /

analyzed: tatas ustra śastrāṇi abhivarṣamāṇam vijitya tam vāsudeva ūriṇā eva

original: cakarta tatkandharaṃ tasya cānu mātāmahasyācchinat sāyakena / 22.202 /
analyzed: cakarta tat kandharam tasya ca anu mātāmahasya ācchinat sāyakena

analyzed: apātayat ca āśu śiraḥ sa tena kāṇsīśvarasya īśvaraḥ vāraṇāsyām

analyzed: sa ca brahmā aham vāsudevaḥ asmi nityam iti jñānāt agamat tat tamaḥ undham

original: sāhāyyakṛccāsya ca kāṇsirājo yathaiva kirmīrahiḍimbasālvāḥ /
analyzed: sāhāyya kṛt ca asya ca kāṇsi rājaḥ yathā eva kirmīra hiḍimba sālvāḥ

analyzed: anye ca daityāḥ apatam stamaḥ ndhe tathā eva saḥ api apatat pāpa buddhiḥ

analyzed: nihatya tau keśavaḥ raugmiṇeyam punar vaidarbhyām janayāmāsa sadyas

analyzed: sa ca ekalavyaḥ rāmajitaḥ śivāya cakre tapaḥ jeya tām ca āpa tasmāt

analyzed: sa śarvadattena vareṇa dṛptaḥ punar yoddhum kṛṣṇam eva āsasāda

original: tasyāstraśastrāṇi nivārya keśavaścakreṇa cakre tamapāstakandharam /
analyzed: tasya astra śastrāṇi nivārya keśavaḥ cakreṇa cakre tam apāsta kandharam

analyzed: sa ca āpa pāpaḥ tamaḥ eva ghoram kṛṣṇa dveṣāt nitya duḥkha ātmakam tat

analyzed: evam yadūnām ṛṣabheṇa sūdite pauṇḍre tathā kāṇsi nṛpe ca pāpe

original: kāṇsīśaputrastu sudakṣiṇākhyastapo'caracchaṅkarāyorubhaktyā / 22.207 /
analyzed: kāṇsīśa putraḥ tu sudakṣiṇa ākhyaḥ tapaḥ carat śaṅkarāya uru bhaktyā

analyzed: pratyakṣa gam tam śivam pāpa buddhiḥ kṛṣṇa abhāvam yācate duṣṭa cetāḥ

analyzed: sa dakṣiṇa agniḥ ca asura āveśa yuktaḥ sampūjitaḥ kāṇsi rāja ātmajena

original: varādumeśasya vivṛddhaśaktiryayau kṛṣṇo yatra sampūrṇaṇsaktiḥ / 22.209 /
analyzed: varāt umeśasya vivṛddha śaktiḥ yayau kṛṣṇaḥ yatra

original: kṛṣṇastasya pratighātārthamugraṃ samādiśaccakramanantavīryaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tasya pratighāta artham ugram samādiśat cakram ananta vīryaḥ

analyzed: ājvalyamānam tat amogha vīryam vyadrāvayat vahnim imam su dūram

original: kṛtyātmako vahnirasau pradhānavahneḥ putraścakravidrāvito'tha /
analyzed: kṛtyā ātmakaḥ vahniḥ asau pradhāna vahneḥ putraḥ cakra vidrāvitaḥ utha

analyzed: saha anubandham ca sudakṣiṇam tam bhasmīcakāra āśu sa putra bhāryām

analyzed: dagdhvā purīm vāraṇasīm sudarśanaḥ punar pārśvam vāsudevasya ca āgāt

analyzed: su dakṣiṇā usau tamaḥ eva jagmivān kṛṣṇa dveṣāt sa anubandhaḥ su pāpaḥ

analyzed: viḍambayan gṛhiṇām eva ceṣṭāḥ nitya avirodhaḥ api tayā vidoṣayā

analyzed: striyā bhetavyam bhartuḥ iti eva dharmam vijñāpayantī duḥkhitā iva āsa devī

analyzed: t ām sāntvayāmāsa gṛhastha dharmam vijñāpayan devadeva upi aduḥkhām

analyzed: evam krīḍati abjanābhe ramāyām kṛṣṇa ādiṣṭaḥ gokulam rauhiṇeyaḥ

original: prāyād dṛṣṭvā tatra nandaṃ yaśodāṃ tatpūjitaḥ kṛṣṇavārtāṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ / 22.216 /
analyzed: prāyāt dṛṣṭvā tatra nandam yaśodām tad pūjitaḥ kṛṣṇa vārtām ca pṛṣṭaḥ

original: māsau tatra nyavasad gopikābhī reme kṣībo yamunāmāhvayacca /
analyzed: mā asau tatra nyavasat gopikābhiḥ reme kṣībaḥ yamunām āhvayat ca

original: matto'yamityeva nadīmanāgatāṃ cakarṣa rāmo lāṅgalenāgryavīryaḥ / 22.217 /
analyzed: mat toyam iti eva nadīm anāgatām cakarṣa rāmaḥ lāṅgalena agrya vīryaḥ

original: punastayā praṇataḥ saṃ stutaśca vyasarjayat tāmatha nandagopam /
analyzed: punar tayā praṇataḥ sam stutaḥ ca vyasarjayat tām atha nanda gopam

original: āpṛcchya jagāda dvārakāṃ keśavāya nyavedayannandagopādibhaktim / 22.218 /

sarāmaḥ sasuto vīndramāruhya dvārakāṃ gataḥ /

original: atītya śarvaśvaśuraṃ giriṃ te suvarṇakūṭaṃ niṣadhaṃ giriṃ ca /

original: yāvannaivārjunaṃ hanyāṃ pādau prakṣāl . aye svayam / 22.411 /
