original: ityukto'varajaiścaiva sarvaiḥ śakuninā tathā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ uvara jaiḥ ca eva sarvaiḥ śakuninā tathā

original: yācito rathamāruhya yayau nāgapuraṃ drutam / 22.412 /
analyzed: yācitaḥ ratham āruhya yayau nāgapuram drutam

original: sakuṇḍalaṃ sakavacamavadhyaṃ sūryanandanam /
analyzed: sa kuṇḍalam sa kavacam avadhyam sūrya nandanam

original: j ñātvendra ubhayaṃ tasmādaicchadādātumuttamam / 22.413 /
analyzed: j ñātvā indraḥ ubhayam tasmāt aicchat ādātum uttamam

original: tad vijñāya raviḥ karṇaṃ svapna uktvā nyavārayat /
analyzed: tat vijñāya raviḥ karṇam svapne uktvā nyavārayat

original: sarvathā dāsya ityukte prāhā'deyaṃ varāyudham / 22.414 /
analyzed: sarvathā dāsye iti ukte prāha ādeyam vara āyudham

original: dadau cotkṛtya kavacaṃ kuṇḍale ca śacīpateḥ /
analyzed: dadau ca utkṛtya kavacam kuṇḍale ca śacīpateḥ

original: amoghāṃ śaktimādāya jñātvaiva dvijarūpiṇam / 22.415 /
analyzed: amoghām śaktim ādāya jñātvā eva dvija rūpiṇam

original: ṛte'rjunādekameva vadhiṣyasyanayeti saḥ /
analyzed: ṛteḥ junāt ekam eva vadhiṣyasi anayā iti saḥ

original: datvā ṇsaktiṃ yayau śakraḥ sārddhaṃ kavacakuṇḍalaiḥ / 22.416 /
analyzed: da tvā yayau śakraḥ sārddham kavaca kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: pārthā vimucyaiva suyodhanaṃ taṃ vane vasanto muditāḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: pārthāḥ vimucya eva suyodhanam tam vane vasantaḥ muditāḥ sadā eva

original: sahāraṇībhāṇḍamatho mṛgeṇa hṛtaṃ dvijasyā'śu niśamya cānvayuḥ / 22.417 /
analyzed: saha araṇī bhāṇḍam atho mṛgeṇa hṛtam dvijasya āśu niśamya ca anvayuḥ

original: cccxxxii.tasminnadṛśye tṛṣit ā ekaika udakārthinaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin adṛśye tṛṣit ā ekaikaḥ udaka arthinaḥ

original: yayuryudhiṣṭhiramṛte suptāste dharmamāyayā / 22.418 /
analyzed: yayuḥ yudhiṣṭhiram ṛte suptāḥ te dharma māyayā

original: adṛśyenaiva dharmeṇa vāritā vāripāyinaḥ /
analyzed: adṛśyena eva dharmeṇa vāritāḥ vāri pāyinaḥ

original: kṣatradharmasya rakṣārthaṃ na tatpraśnān vidāṃ varāḥ /
analyzed: kṣatra dharmasya rakṣā artham na tad praśnān vidām varāḥ

original: vyācakruḥ śaktimanto'pi pānīyārthamarindamāḥ / 22.419 /
analyzed: vyācakruḥ śaktimantaḥ api pānīya artham arindamāḥ

original: na viprāṇāṃ ca dharmo'yaṃ vidyāyā upajīvanam /
analyzed: na viprāṇām ca dharmaḥ yam vidyāyāḥ upajīvanam

original: kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu kimuta prasabhaṃ tena te papuḥ / 22.420 /
analyzed: kṣatriyāṇām tu kim uta prasabham tena te papuḥ

original: devā api manuṣyeṣu jātāḥ subalino'pi hi /
analyzed: devāḥ api manuṣyeṣu jātāḥ su balinaḥ api hi

original: mānuṣeṇaiva bhāvena yuktāḥ syuḥ keśavādṛte /
analyzed: mānuṣeṇa eva bhāvena yuktāḥ syuḥ keśavāt ṛte

original: kāryeṣveṣāṃ krameṇaiva vyaktimāyānti sadguṇāḥ / 22.421 /
analyzed: kāryeṣu eṣām krameṇa eva vyaktim āyānti sat guṇāḥ

original: ato bhīmārjunau dharmādatyuttamabalāvapi /
analyzed: atas bhīma arjunau dharmāt atyuttama balau api

original: devamāyāṃ samāṇsritya dharmeṇa svāpitau kṣaṇāt / 22.422 /
analyzed: deva māyām samāṇsritya dharmeṇa svāpitau kṣaṇāt

original: muhūrtameva sā māyā tayorācchādanakṣamā /
analyzed: muhūrtam eva sā māyā tayoḥ ācchādana kṣamā

original: tataḥ prabuddhayordharmo naiva śaktiśatāṃ śabhāk / 22.423 /
analyzed: tatas prabuddhayoḥ dharmaḥ na eva śakti śatām śa bhāj

original: uktaṃ pādmapurāṇe ca tadetat sarvamañjasā /
analyzed: uktam pādmapurāṇe ca tat etat sarvam añjasā

original: tasmānnāṇsaktiranayoḥ sambhāvyā bhīmapārthayoḥ / 22.424 /
analyzed: tasmāt na aṇ saktiḥ anayoḥ sambhāvyā bhīma pārthayoḥ

original: dharmātmajo'thā'jagāmodakāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātḸṛṃ statra duḥkhābhitaptaḥ /
analyzed: dharmātmajā utha ājagāma udaka antam dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝn statra duḥkha abhitaptaḥ

original: icchan pātuṃ vāri saṃ vāritaśca pitrā bakākāramitena nāpāt / 22.425 /
analyzed: icchan pātum vāri sam vāritaḥ ca pitrā baka ākāra mitena na apāt  /

original: arthe bhrātḸṛṇāmaicchadasau tadīyapraśnaprativyāharaṇaṃ dayāl . uḥ /
analyzed: arthe bhrātṛṇām aicchat asau tadīya praśna prativyāharaṇam

original: tato dharmo yakṣatanuḥ sa bhūtvā praśnāṃ ścakre vyākarot tān sa pārthaḥ / 22.426 /
analyzed: tatas dharmaḥ yakṣa tanuḥ sa bhūtvā praśnān ścakre vyākarot tān sa pārthaḥ  /

original: tatastuṣṭo varamasmai dadau sa ekotthānaṃ bhrātṛmadhye sa vavre /
analyzed: tatas tuṣṭaḥ varam asmai dadau saḥ eka utthānam bhrātṛ madhye sa vavre

original: yadyekaḥ syānnakulo'stvityathā'ha tuṣṭo dharmaḥ kathametat kṛtaṃ te /
analyzed: yadi ekaḥ syāt nakulaḥ tu iti atha āha tuṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ katham etat kṛtam te

original: atiprītirbhīmasene tavāsti balī cāsau rājyahetustava syāt / 22.427 /
analyzed: ati prītiḥ bhīmasene tava asti balī ca asau rājya hetuḥ tava syāt  /

original: ityukta ūce mādriputraṃ vihāya kuntīputro na mayotthāpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ ūce mādri putram vihāya kuntī putraḥ na mayā utthāpanīyaḥ

original: cccxxxiii.sa evamukto nitarāṃ prīyamāṇa utthāpayāmāsa ca tān samastān / 22.428 /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ nitarām prīyamāṇaḥ utthāpayāmāsa ca tān samastān

original: yatheṣṭarūpaprāptimeṣāṃ punaśca svakāmatonijarūpāptimādāt /
analyzed: yathā iṣṭa rūpa prāptim eṣām punar ca sva kāmataḥ nija rūpa āptim ādāt

original: ajñātavāse'jñātatāṃ sarvadaiva dadau teṣāṃ prīta ivā'nṛśaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sarvadā eva dadau teṣām prītaḥ iva anṛśam syāt

original: evaṃ krīḍan putra ityātmanaiva yaśodharmāvātmano varddhayan saḥ / 22.429 /
analyzed: evam krīḍan putraḥ iti ātmanā eva yaśaḥ dharmau ātmanaḥ varddhayan saḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhirātmanastasya yaśodharmavivṛddhaye /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira ātmanaḥ tasya yaśaḥ dharma vivṛddhaye

original: kṛtvā'raṇyapahārādi punardatvā ca tat svayam /
analyzed: kṛtvā araṇi apahāra ādi punar da tvā ca tat svayam

original: dātuṃ viprāya taddhaste yayau dharmo divaṃ punaḥ / 22.430 /
analyzed: dātum viprāya tad haste yayau dharmaḥ divam punar

original: tato rājā bhīmasenārjunau ca sārddhaṃ yamābhyāmaraṇīṃ pradāya /
analyzed: tatas rājā bhīmasena arjunau ca sārddham yamābhyām araṇīm pradāya

original: mudā yutāḥ kṛṣṇayā sārddhameva santuṣṭuvuḥ kṛṣṇamanantamacyutam / 22.431 /
analyzed: mudā yutāḥ kṛṣṇayā sārddham eva santuṣṭuvuḥ kṛṣṇam anantam acyutam

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
araṇīprāptirnāma dvāviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: araṇīprāptiḥ nāma dvāvim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: cccxxxiv.(aj ñḸatavāsasamāptiḥ )
analyzed: cccxxxivat ñ ḍa ta vāsa samāptiḥ

original: atha trayoviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha trayovim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / nārāyaṇānugrahato yathāvannistīrya tān dvādaśābdān vane te /
analyzed: om nārāyaṇa anugrahataḥ yathāvat nistīrya tān dvādaśa abdān vane te

original: visṛjya ca brāhmaṇādīn sadhaumyānajñātavāsāya tato mano dadhuḥ / 23.1 /
analyzed: visṛjya ca brāhmaṇa ādīn sa dhaumyān ajñāta vāsāya tatas manaḥ

original: gatvā virāṭasya purīṃ nidhāya hetīḥ śamyāṃ channarūpā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: gatvā virāṭasya purīm nidhāya hetīḥ śamyām channa rūpāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: yatiḥ sūdaḥ ṣaṇḍhaveṣo'śvasūtaveṣo gopo gandhakartrī cajātāḥ / 23.2 /
analyzed: yatiḥ sūdaḥ ṣaṇḍhaveṣa uśva sūtaveṣaḥ gopaḥ gandhakartrī ca jātāḥ

original: sarve virāṭaṃ yayuratra devavat sambhāvitāstena śubhorulakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarve virāṭam yayuḥ atra deva vat sambhāvitāḥ tena śubha ūru lakṣaṇāḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhirasyaiva śuśrūṣaṇaṃ te cakrurhṛdā vāsudevasya nānyat / 23.3 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya eva śuśrūṣaṇam te cakruḥ hṛdā vāsudevasya nā anyat

original: parapāko gṛhasthasya kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: para pākaḥ gṛhasthasya kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥ

original: na yogya iti sūdasya babhre veṣaṃ vṛkodaraḥ / 23.4 /
analyzed: na yogyaḥ iti sūdasya babhre veṣam vṛkodaraḥ

original: vaidikavyavahāreṣu jñānādhikyaprasiddhitaḥ /
analyzed: vaidika vyavahāreṣu jñāna ādhikya prasiddhitaḥ

original: j ānīyurbhīma ityeva śūdraveṣastato'bhavat / 23.5 /
analyzed: ānīyuḥ bhīmaḥ iti eva śūdra veṣaḥ tatas bhavat  /

original: svīyaṃ vedavidāṃ sarvaṃ deveśānāṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: svīyam veda vidām sarvam deva īśānām ca kim punar

original: ataste'nyāṇsrayaṃ naiva cakruḥ svabalasaṃ śrayāt / 23.6 /
analyzed: na eva cakruḥ sva balasam śrayāt

original: śāpādevārjunaḥ ṣaṇḍhaveṣo'bhūnnakulastathā /
analyzed: śāpāt eva arjunaḥ

original: kṣatriyānantaratvāttu sūtajātestathā'bhavat / 23.7 /
analyzed: kṣatriya anantara tvāt tu sūta jāteḥ tathā bhavat

original: sūtasyānantaratvāttu vaiśyajātestathā'bhavat /
analyzed: sūtasya anantara tvāt tu vaiśya jāteḥ tathā bhavat

original: sahadevo vaiśyajātirgopālasteṣu cottamaḥ /
analyzed: sahadevaḥ vaiśya jātiḥ gopālaḥ teṣu ca uttamaḥ

original: tato gopālatāmāpa yatiḥ pūjyo'khilairyataḥ / 23.8 /
analyzed: tatas gopāla tām āpa yatiḥ pūjya ukhilaiḥ yatas

original: yatirāsīd dharmajo'taḥ so'bhyāsārthaṃ sadaiva ca /
analyzed: yatiḥ āsīt saḥ bhyāsa artham sadā eva ca

original: akṣāsakto'bhavat paścād darśayiṣyan svaśiṣṭatām / 23.9 /
analyzed: akṣa āsaktaḥ bhavat paścāt darśayiṣyan sva śiṣṭa tām

original: bhīmasenasadharmārthaṃ śūdrā sairandhrikā'bhavat /
analyzed: bhīmasena sadharma artham śūdrā sairandhrikā bhavat

original: draupadī bhartṛsādharmyaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmo yataḥ sadā / 23.10 /
analyzed: draupadī bhartṛ sādharmyam strīṇām dharmaḥ yatas sadā

original: athā'jagāma mallakaḥ samastabhūmimaṇḍale /
analyzed: atha ājagāma mallakaḥ samasta bhūmi maṇḍale

original: cccxxxv.vareṇa yo'jito jayī śivasya sañjagarja ca / 23.11 /
analyzed: yojitaḥ jayī śivasya sañjagarja ca

original: tamīkṣya sarvamallakā virāṭarājasaṃ śrayāḥ /
analyzed: tam īkṣya sarva mallakāḥ virāṭa rājasam śrayāḥ

original: pradudruvurbhayārditāstadā'vadad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 23.12 /
analyzed: pradudruvuḥ bhaya arditāḥ tadā avadat yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: ya eṣa sūda āṇsu taṃ nihatya mallamojasā /
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa sūdaḥ tam nihatya mallam ojasā

original: yaśastavābhivarddhayet samāhvayādya taṃ nṛpa / 23.13 /
analyzed: yaśaḥ tava abhivarddhayet samāhvaya adya tam nṛpa

original: itīrite samāhuto jagāda mārutirvacaḥ /
analyzed: iti īrite samāhutaḥ jagāda mārutiḥ vacaḥ

original: prasādato harerahaṃ nisūdaye'dya mallakam / 23.14 /
analyzed: prasādataḥ hareḥ aham mallakam

original: samastadevavṛndato mahān ya eva keśavaḥ /
analyzed: samasta deva vṛndataḥ mahān yaḥ eva keśavaḥ

original: samastadevanāmavāṃ stadīyabhaktito balam / 23.15 /
analyzed: samasta deva nāmavān balam

original: ya eva devanāmadhā iti śrutirjagāda hi /
analyzed: yaḥ eva deva nāmadhāḥ iti śrutiḥ jagāda hi

original: mahāṃ śca deva eṣa tat sa me jayaṃ vidhāsyati / 23.16 /
analyzed: mahān śca devaḥ eṣa tat sa me jayam vidhāsyati  /

original: yudhiṣṭhirābhidhaśca yo yudhiṣṭhire sthitaḥ sadā /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira abhidhaḥ ca yaḥ yudhiṣṭhire sthitaḥ sadā

original: tvayi sthitastvamityasau sadā'bhidhīyate hariḥ / 23.17 /
analyzed: tvayi sthitaḥ tvam iti asau sadā abhidhīyate hariḥ

original: iti bruvāṇo mallaṃ tamabhiyāto vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ mallam tam abhiyātaḥ vṛkodaraḥ

original: anayanmṛtyulokāya balāḍhyairapi durjayam / 23.18 /
analyzed: anayat mṛtyu lokāya bala āḍhyaiḥ api durjayam

original: evaṃ nivasatāṃ tatra pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām /
analyzed: evam nivasatām tatra pāṇḍavānām mahātmanām

original: saṃ vatsare dvimāsone vijitya diśa āgataḥ /
analyzed: sam vatsare dvi māsa ūne vijitya diśaḥ āgataḥ

original: kīcako matsyanṛpateḥ syālo balavatāṃ varaḥ / 23.19 /
analyzed: kīcakaḥ matsya nṛpateḥ syālaḥ balavatām varaḥ

original: sa draupadīmīkṣya manobhavārtaḥ samprārthayāmāsa tayā nirastaḥ /
analyzed: sa draupadīm īkṣya manobhava ārtaḥ samprārthayāmāsa tayā nirastaḥ

original: māse gate bhaginīṃ svāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ samprārthayāmāsa tadarthameva / 23.20 /
analyzed: māse gate bhaginīm svām sudeṣṇām samprārthayāmāsa tad artham eva

original: tayā niṣiddho'pi punaḥ punastāṃ yadā yayāce'tha ca sā'ha kṛṣṇām /
analyzed: tayā niṣiddhaḥ upi punar punar tām yadā yayācetha ca sā āha kṛṣṇām

original: samānayā'śveva surāṃ madarthamitīritā neti bhīt ā'vadat sā / 23.21 /
analyzed: samānaya āśu eva surām mad artham iti īritā na iti āvadat sā

original: balāt tayā preṣit ā tadgṛhāya yadā'gamat tena haste gṛhīt ā /
analyzed: balāt tayā preṣit ā tad gṛhāya yat āgamat tena haste gṛhīt ā

original: vidhūya taṃ prādravat sā sabhāyai smṛtvā'dityasthaṃ vāsudevaṃ pareśam / 23.22 /
analyzed: vidhūya tam prādravat sā sabhāyai smṛtvā āditya stham vāsudevam para īśam

original: cccxxxvi.anudrutyaitāṃ pātayitvā padā sa santāḍayāmāsa tadā ravisthitaḥ /
analyzed: anudrutya etām pātayitvā padā sa santāḍayāmāsa tadā ravi sthitaḥ

original: nārāyaṇo hetināmaiva rakṣo nyayojayat tadadṛśyaṃ samāgāt / 23.23 /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ heti nāma eva rakṣaḥ nyayojayat tat adṛśyam samāgāt

original: vāyustamāviśya tu kīcakaṃ taṃ nyapātayat tāṃ samīkṣyaiva bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: vāyuḥ tam āviśya tu kīcakam tam nyapātayat tām samīkṣya eva bhīmaḥ

original: cukopa vṛkṣaṃ ca samīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ vārayāmāsa yudhiṣṭhiro'grajaḥ / 23.24 /
analyzed: cukopa vṛkṣam ca samīkṣamāṇam tam vārayāmāsa yudhiṣṭhira ugrajaḥ

original: kṛṣṇā rātrau bhīmasakāṇsametya hantuṃ pāpaṃ kīcakaṃ prairayat tam /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā rātrau bhīma sakāṇsam etya hantum pāpam kīcakam prairayat tam

original: bhīmasya buddhyā niśi sā kīcakaṃ ca jagāda gantuṃ śūnyagṛhaṃ sa cāgāt / 23.25 /
analyzed: bhīmasya buddhyā niśi sā kīcakam ca jagāda gantum śūnya gṛham sa ca āgāt

original: tatrainamāsādya tu bhīmaseno vijitya taṃ bāhuyuddhe nihatya /
analyzed: tatra enam āsādya tu bhīmasenaḥ vijitya tam bāhu yuddhe nihatya

original: śiro gude pāṇipādau ca tasya praveśayāmāsa vimṛdya vīraḥ / 23.26 /
analyzed: śiraḥ gude pāṇi pādau ca tasya praveśayāmāsa vimṛdya vīraḥ

original: avadhyaṃ taṃ nihataṃ vīkṣya tasya pañcottaraṃ śatamevānujānām /
analyzed: avadhyam tam nihatam vīkṣya tasya pañca uttaram śatam eva anujānām

original: sarvaṃ varācchaṅkarasya hyavadhyaṃ sahaiva kṛṣṇāṃ tena dagdhuṃ babandha / 23.27 /
analyzed: sarvam varāt śaṅkarasya hi avadhyam saha eva kṛṣṇām tena dagdhum babandha  /

original: sā nīyamānā kīcakaiḥ saṃ rurāva śrutvaiva taṃ bhīmaseno mahāntam /
analyzed: sā nīyamānā kīcakaiḥ sam rurāva śrutvā eva tam bhīmasenaḥ mahāntam

original: uddhṛtya vṛkṣaṃ tena jaghāna sarvānādāya kṛṣṇāṃ punarāgāt puraṃ ca / 23.28 /
analyzed: uddhṛtya vṛkṣam tena jaghāna sarvān ādāya kṛṣṇām punar āgāt puram ca

original: evaṃ yatnāt tapasā tairavāpto varaḥ śivādajayatvaṃ raṇeṣu /
analyzed: evam yatnāt tapasā taiḥ avāptaḥ varaḥ śivāt ajaya tvam raṇeṣu

original: avadhyatā caiva ṣaḍuttarāste śataṃ hatā bhīmasenena saṅkhe / 23.29 /
analyzed: avadhya tā ca eva ṣaṣ uttarāḥ te śatam hatāḥ bhīmasenena saṅkhe

original: gandharva ityeva nihatya sarvān mumoda bhīmo draupadī cā'tha kṛṣṇām /
analyzed: gandharvaḥ iti eva nihatya sarvān mumoda bhīmaḥ draupadī ca atha kṛṣṇām

original: yāhītyūce tāṃ sudeṣṇā bhayena trayodaśāhaṃ pālayetyāha tāṃ sā /
analyzed: yāhi iti ūce tām sudeṣṇā bhayena trayodaśa aham pālaya iti āha tām sā

original: astvityenāmāha bhayāt sudeṣṇā tathā'vasan pūrṇamabdaṃ ca te'tra / 23.30 /
analyzed: astu iti enām āha bhayāt sudeṣṇā tathā avasan pūrṇam abdam ca

original: tadā pārthān pravicintyākhilāyāṃ pṛthvyāṃ channān dhārtarāṣṭrasya dūtāḥ /
analyzed: tadā pārthān pravicintya akhilāyām pṛthvyām channān dhārtarāṣṭrasya dūtāḥ

original: avijñāya prayayurdhārtarāṣṭramūcurhataṃ kīcakaṃ yoṣidarthe / 23.31 /
analyzed: a vijñāya prayayuḥ dhārtarāṣṭram ūcuḥ hatam kīcakam yoṣit arthe

original: tenāvadad draupadīkāraṇena duryodhano nihataṃ kīcakaṃ tam /
analyzed: tena avadat draupadī kāraṇena duryodhanaḥ nihatam kīcakam tam

original: bhīmenāgustatra duryodhanādyā bhīṣmādibhiḥ saha karṇena caiva / 23.32 /
analyzed: bhīmena āguḥ tatra duryodhana ādyāḥ bhīṣma ādibhiḥ saha karṇena ca eva

original: agre yayau tatra yoddhuṃ suśarmā sagā virāṭasya samājahāra /
analyzed: agre yayau tatra yoddhum suśarmā sagāḥ virāṭasya samājahāra

original: śrutvā virāṭo'nuyayau sasenastaṃ pāṇḍavāṇscānuyayurvinā'rjunam / 23.33 /
analyzed: śrutvā virāṭaḥ anuyayau sa senaḥ tam pāṇḍavān ca anuyayuḥ vinā arjunam

original: cccxxxvii.vijitya saṅkhe jagṛhe virāṭaṃ tadā suśarmā tamayād vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: vijitya saṅkhe jagṛhe virāṭam tadā suśarmā vṛkodaraḥ

original: sa tasya senāṃ vinihatya mātsyaṃ vimocya jagrāha suśarmarājam /
analyzed: sa tasya senām vinihatya mātsyam vimocya jagrāha suśarma rājam

original: yudhiṣṭhiro mocayāmāsa taṃ ca tato rātrau nyavasan bāhyataste / 23.34 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ mocayāmāsa tam ca tatas rātrau nyavasan bāhyatas te

original: tato'paradine sarve bhīṣmadroṇapurassarāḥ /
analyzed: tatas upara dine sarve bhīṣma droṇa purassarāḥ

original: rahitaṃ kīcakairmātsyaṃ śakyaṃ matvā'bhiniryayuḥ / 23.35 /
analyzed: rahitam kīcakaiḥ mātsyam śakyam matvā abhiniryayuḥ

original: kīcakasya hiḍimbasya bakakirmīrayorapi /
analyzed: kīcakasya hiḍimbasya baka kirmīrayoḥ api

original: jarāsandhasya nṛpateḥ kaṃ sādīnāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / 23.36 /
analyzed: jarāsandhasya nṛpateḥ kam sa ādīnām ca sarvaśas

original: na bādhanāya bhīṣmādyā api śekuḥ kathañcana /
analyzed: na bādhanāya bhīṣma ādyāḥ api śekuḥ kathañcana

original: tasmāt te kīcakaṃ śāntaṃ śrutvā mātsyaṃ yayuryudhe / 23.37 /
analyzed: tasmāt te kīcakam śāntam śrutvā mātsyam yayuḥ yudhe

original: yatiṣye rakṣituṃ bhīmād dhārtarāṣṭrāniti svakām /
analyzed: yatiṣye rakṣitum bhīmāt dhārtarāṣṭrān iti svakām

original: satyāṃ kartuṃ pratijñāṃ tu yayau droṇaḥ saputrakaḥ / 23.38 /
analyzed: satyām kartum pratijñām tu yayau droṇaḥ sa putrakaḥ

original: yadi yuddhāya niryānti jñātāḥ syuḥ pāṇḍavāstadā /
analyzed: yadi yuddhāya niryānti jñātāḥ syuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ tadā

original: na ced virāṭamanataṃ namayiṣyāmahe vayam /
analyzed: na ced virāṭam anatam namayiṣyāmahe vayam

original: iti matvā virāṭasya jagṛhurgāḥ samantataḥ / 23.39 /
analyzed: iti matvā virāṭasya jagṛhuḥ gāḥ samantataḥ

original: tadottaraḥ sārathitve prakalpya pārthaṃ yayau tān niśāmyaiva bhītaḥ /
analyzed: tadā uttaraḥ sārathi tve prakalpya pārtham yayau tān niśāmya eva bhītaḥ

original: tato'rjunaḥ sārathiṃ taṃ vidhāya kṛcchreṇa saṃ sthāpya ca taṃ yayau kurūn / 23.40 /
analyzed: tatas ūrjunaḥ sārathim tam vidhāya kṛcchreṇa sam sthāpya ca tam yayau kurūn

original: ādāya gāṇḍīvamatha dhvajaṃ ca hanūmadaṅkaṃ sadaro'grato gāḥ /
analyzed: ādāya gāṇḍīvam atha dhvajam ca hanūmat aṅkam sa dara ugratas gāḥ

original: nivartya yuddhāya yayau kurūṃ stān jigye sarvān dvairathenaiva saktān / 23.41 /
analyzed: nivartya yuddhāya yayau kurūm stān jigye sarvān dvairathena eva saktān  /

original: ekībhūtān punarevānuyātān sammohanāstreṇa vimohayitvā /
analyzed: ekībhūtān punar eva anuyātān sammohana astreṇa vimohayitvā

original: jagrāha teṣāmuttarīyāṇyṛte tu bhīṣmasya vedāstraghātaṃ sa eva / 23.42 /
analyzed: jagrāha teṣām uttarīyāṇi ṛte tu bhīṣmasya veda astra ghātam saḥ eva

original: vidhāya bhīṣmaṃ virathaṃ jagāma tadā ṇsrutvā matsyapatirjitān kurūn /
analyzed: vidhāya bhīṣmam viratham jagāma tadā matsya patiḥ jitān kurūn

original: mumoda putreṇa jitā iti sma tadā'ha ṣaṇḍhena jitān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 23.43 /
analyzed: mumoda putreṇa jitāḥ iti sma tat āha ṣaṇḍhena jitān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: tadā kruddhaḥ prāharat taṃ virāṭaḥ so'kṣeṇa tad bhīmadhanañjayābhyām /
analyzed: tadā kruddhaḥ prāharat tam virāṭaḥ sa ukṣeṇa tat bhīma dhanañjayābhyām

original: śrutaṃ tadā kupitau tau niśāmya nyavārayat tāvapi dharmasūnuḥ / 23.44 /
analyzed: śrutam tadā kupitau tau niśāmya nyavārayat tau api dharmasūnuḥ

original: cccxxxviii.nijasvarūpeṇa samāsthitān no yadi sma nāsau praṇipātapūrvakam /
analyzed: samāsthitān naḥ yadi sma na asau praṇipāta pūrvakam

original: kṣamāpayed vadhya ityātmarūpaṃ samāsthitāstasthurathāpare dine / 23.45 /
analyzed: kṣamāpayet vadhyaḥ iti ātma rūpam samāsthitāḥ tasthuḥ atha apare dine

original: tadā virāṭāsanamāsthitaṃ nṛpaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīkṣya virāṭa āha /
analyzed: tadā virāṭa āsanam āsthitam nṛpam yudhiṣṭhiram vīkṣya virāṭaḥ āha

original: kimetadityūcivānuttaro'smai tān pāṇḍavān gograhaṇe cavṛttam / 23.46 /
analyzed: kim etat iti ūcivān uttaraḥ usmai tān pāṇḍavān go grahaṇe

original: tato virāṭo bhayakampitāṅgaḥ praṇamya pārthāñcharaṇaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: tatas virāṭaḥ bhaya kampita aṅgaḥ praṇamya pārthān śaraṇam jagāma

original: dadau ca kanyāmuttarāṃ phalgunāya putrārthameva pratijagrāha so'pi / 23.47 /
analyzed: dadau ca kanyām uttarām phalgunāya putra artham eva pratijagrāha saḥ upi

original: evaṃ virāṭaṃ mocayitvaiva gāṇsca tamasyandhe kīcakān pātayitvā /
analyzed: evam virāṭam mocayitvā eva tamasi andhe kīcakān pātayitvā

original: prāpto dharmaḥ sumahān vāyujena tasyānu pārthena ca govimokṣaṇāt / 23.48 /
analyzed: prāptaḥ dharmaḥ su mahān vāyujena tasya anu pārthena ca go vimokṣaṇāt

original: ayātayan keśavāyātha dūtān sahābhimanyuḥ so'pi rāmeṇa sārddham /
analyzed: ayātayan keśavāya atha dūtān saha abhimanyuḥ saḥ upi rāmeṇa sārddham

original: āgādanantānandacid vāsudevo vivāhayāmāsurathābhimanyum / 23.49 /
analyzed: āgāt ananta ānanda cit vāsudevaḥ vivāhayāmāsuḥ atha abhimanyum

original: āsīnmahānutsavastatra teṣāṃ daśārhavīraiḥ saha pāṇḍavānām /
analyzed: āsīt mahān utsavaḥ tatra teṣām daśārha vīraiḥ saha pāṇḍavānām

original: sa pāñcālānāṃ vāsudevena sārddhamajñātavāsaṃ samatītya modatām / 23.50 /
analyzed: sa pāñcālānām vāsudevena sārddham ajñāta vāsam samatītya modatām

original: duryodhanādyāḥ sūtaputreṇa sārddhaṃ sasaubaleyā yudhi pārthapīḍit āḥ /
analyzed: duryodhana ādyāḥ sūtaputreṇa sārddham sa saubaleyāḥ yudhi

original: bhīṣmādibhiḥ sārddhamupetya nāgapuraṃ mantraṃ mantrayāmāsuratra / 23.51 /
analyzed: bhīṣma ādibhiḥ sārddham upetya nāgapuram mantram mantrayāmāsuḥ atra

original: ajñātavāse phalguno no'dya dṛṣṭastasmāt punaryāntu pārthā vanāya /
analyzed: ajñāta vāse phalgunaḥ na udya dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt punar yāntu pārthāḥ vanāya

original: iti bruvāṇānāha bhīṣmo'bhyatītamajñātavāsaṃ droṇa āhaivameva / 23.52 /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇān āha bhīṣmaḥ abhyatītam ajñāta vāsam droṇaḥ āha evam eva

original: tayorvākyaṃ te tvanādṛtya pāpā vanaṃ pārthāḥ punareva prayāntu /
analyzed: tayoḥ vākyam te tu an ādṛtya pāpāḥ vanam pārthāḥ punar eva prayāntu

original: iti dūtaṃ preṣayāmāsuratra jānanti viprā iti dharmajo'vadat / 23.53 /
analyzed: iti dūtam preṣayāmāsuḥ atra jānanti viprāḥ iti dharmajaḥ vadat  /

original: sauramāsānusāreṇa dhārtarāṣṭrā apūrṇatām /
analyzed: saura māsa anusāreṇa dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ a pūrṇa tām

original: āhuścāndreṇa māsena pūrṇaḥ kālo'khilo'pyasau / 23.54 /
analyzed: āhuḥ cāndreṇa māsena pūrṇaḥ kālaḥ khilaḥ api asau

original: dinānāmadhipaḥ sūryaḥ pakṣamāsābdapaḥ śaśī /
analyzed: dinānām adhipaḥ sūryaḥ pakṣa māsa abdapaḥ śaśī

original: tasmāt saumyābdamevātra mukhyamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt saumya abdam eva atra mukhyam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: saumyaṃ kālaṃ tato yajñe gṛhṇanti natu sūryajam / 23.55 /
analyzed: saumyam kālam tatas yajñe gṛhṇanti na tu sūrya jam

original: tadetadavicāryaiva lobhācca dhṛtarāṣṭrajaiḥ /
analyzed: tat etat a vicārya eva lobhāt ca dhṛtarāṣṭra jaiḥ

original: cccxxxix.rājyaṃ na dattaṃ pārthebhyaḥ pārthāḥ kālasya pūrṇatām /
analyzed: rājyam na dattam pārthebhyaḥ pārthāḥ kālasya pūrṇa tām

original: khyāpayanto vipravarairupaplāvyamupāyayuḥ / 23.56 /
analyzed: khyāpayantaḥ vipra varaiḥ upaplāvyam upāyayuḥ

original: suvāsudevā akhilaiśca yādavaiḥ pāñcālamatsyaiśca yutāḥ sabhāryāḥ /
analyzed: su vāsudevāḥ akhilaiḥ ca yādavaiḥ pāñcāla matsyaiḥ ca yutāḥ sa bhāryāḥ

original: upaplāvye te katicid dināni vāsaṃ cakruḥ kṛṣṇasaṃ śikṣit ārthāḥ / 23.57 /
analyzed: upaplāvye te katicid dināni vāsam cakruḥ ārthāḥ

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
ajñḸatavāsasamāptirnāma trayoviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: ajñḍatavāsasamāptiḥ nāma trayovim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: cccxl.(yuddhodyogaḥ )
analyzed: cccxli uddha udyogaḥ

original: atha caturviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha caturvim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / tataḥ sammantryānumate kṛṣṇasya svapurohitam /
analyzed: om tatas sammantrya anumate kṛṣṇasya sva purohitam

original: drupadaḥ preṣayāmāsa dhṛtarāṣṭrāya śāntaye / 24.1 /
analyzed: drupadaḥ preṣayāmāsa dhṛtarāṣṭrāya śāntaye

original: sa gatvā dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ taṃ bhīṣmadroṇādibhiryutam /
analyzed: sa gatvā dhṛtarāṣṭram tam bhīṣma droṇa ādibhiḥ yutam

original: uvāca na virodhasta utpādyo dharmasūnunā /
analyzed: uvāca na virodhaḥ te utpādyaḥ dharmasūnunā

original: yasya bhīmārjunau yaudhau netā yasya janārdanaḥ / 24.2 /
analyzed: yasya bhīma arjunau yaudhau netā yasya janārdanaḥ

original: śrutāste bhīmanihatā jarāsandhādayo'khilāḥ /
analyzed: śrutāḥ te bhīma nihatāḥ jarāsandha ādayaḥ ukhilāḥ

original: yathā ca rudravacanādavadhyā rākṣasādhipāḥ / 24.3 /
analyzed: yathā ca rudra vacanāt avadhyāḥ rākṣasa adhipāḥ

original: tīrthavighnakarāḥ sarvatīrthānyācchādya saṃ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tīrtha vighna karāḥ sarva tīrthāni ācchādya sam sthitāḥ

original: tisraḥ koṭyo mahāvīryā bhīmenaiva nisūditāḥ / 24.4 /
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ mahā vīryāḥ bhīmena eva nisūditāḥ

original: bhrātḸṛṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca hitaiṣiṇā /
analyzed: bhrātḹṛṇām brāhmaṇānām ca lokānām ca hita eṣiṇā

original: tato hi sarvatīrthāni gamyānyāsan nṛṇāṃ kṣitau / 24.5 /
analyzed: tatas hi sarva tīrthāni gamyāni āsan nṛṇām kṣitau

original: yathā jaṭāsuraḥ pāpaḥ śarvāṇīvarasaṃ śrayāt /
analyzed: yathā jaṭāsuraḥ pāpaḥ śarvāṇī varasam śrayāt

original: avadhyo viprarūpeṇa vañcayanneva pāṇḍavān / 24.6 /
analyzed: avadhyaḥ vipra rūpeṇa vañcayan eva pāṇḍavān

original: j ñātvā'pi bhīmasenena viprarūpasya no vadhaḥ /
analyzed: j ñātvā api bhīmasenena vipra rūpasya no vadhaḥ

original: yogya ityahato bhīme mṛgayārthaṃ gate kvacit / 24.7 /
analyzed: yogyaḥ iti ahataḥ bhīme mṛgayā artham gate kvacid

original: yamau yudhiṣṭhiraṃ kṛṣṇāṃ cā'dāyaiva parādravat /
analyzed: yamau yudhiṣṭhiram kṛṣṇām ca ādāya eva parādravat

original: dṛṣṭo bhīmena tāṃ styaktvā saṃ saktastena saṅgare / 24.8 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ bhīmena tām s tyaktvā sam saktaḥ tena saṅgare  /

original: nipātya bhūmau pādena sañcūrṇitaśirāstamaḥ /
analyzed: nipātya bhūmau pādena sañcūrṇita śirāḥ tamaḥ

original: jagāma kimu te putrāḥ śakyā hantumiti sma ha / 24.9 /
analyzed: jagāma kimu te putrāḥ śakyāḥ hantum iti sma ha

original: nivātakavacāṇscaiva hatāḥ pārthena te śrutāḥ /
analyzed: nivāta kavacān ca eva hatāḥ pārthena te śrutāḥ

original: j ānāsi ca harervīryaṃ yasyedamakhilaṃ vaśe /
analyzed: ānāsi ca hareḥ vīryam yasya idam akhilam vaśe

original: sabrahmarudraśakrādyaṃ cetanācetanātmakam / 24.10 /
analyzed: sa brahma rudra śakra ādyam cetana acetana ātmakam

original: cccxli.tasmādetaiḥ pālitasya dharmajasya svakaṃ vasu /
analyzed: cccxlitasmāt etaiḥ pālitasya dharmajasya svakam vasu

original: dīyatāmiti tenokto dhṛtarāṣṭro nacākarot / 24.11 /
analyzed: dīyatām iti tena uktaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ na ca akarot

original: tataḥ sahaiva yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ dvāravatīṃ gatam /
analyzed: tatas saha eva yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇam dvāravatīm gatam

original: yuddhasāhāyyamicchantau dhārtarāṣṭradhanañjayau / 24.12 /
analyzed: yuddha sāhāyyam icchantau dhārtarāṣṭra dhanañjayau

original: yugapad yayatustatra vegenājayadarjunam /
analyzed: yugapad yayatuḥ tatra vegena ajayat arjunam

original: duryodhanaḥ śirasthāna āsīno'bhūddharestadā / 24.13 /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ śira sthāne āsīnaḥ bhūt hareḥ tadā

original: darpānnāhaṃ rājarāja upāsye pādayoriti /
analyzed: darpāt na aham rājarājaḥ upāsye pādayoḥ iti

original: tayorāgamanaṃ pūrvaṃ j ñātvaiva hi hariḥ prabhuḥ / 24.14 /
analyzed: tayoḥ āgamanam pūrvam j ñātvā eva hi hariḥ prabhuḥ

original: asuptaḥ suptavacchiśye tatrātiṣṭhad dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: a suptaḥ supta vat śiśye tatra atiṣṭhat dhanañjayaḥ

original: praṇamya pādayoḥ prahvo bhaktyudrekāt kṛt āñjaliḥ / 24.15 /
analyzed: praṇamya pādayoḥ prahvaḥ bhakti udrekāt kṛt

original: tamaikṣat prathamaṃ devo jānannapi suyodhanam /
analyzed: tam aikṣat prathamam devaḥ jānan api suyodhanam

original: svāgataṃ phalgunetyukte pūrvamāgāmahaṃ tviti /
analyzed: svāgatam phalguna iti ukte pūrvam āgām aham tu iti

original: āha duryodhanastaṃ ca svāgatenābhyapūjayat / 24.16 /
analyzed: āha duryodhanaḥ tam ca svāgatena abhyapūjayat  /

original: tayorāgamane hetuṃ śrutvā prāha janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ āgamane hetum śrutvā prāha janārdanaḥ

original: ekaḥ pūrvāgato'trānyaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭo mayā yataḥ / 24.17 /
analyzed: ekaḥ pūrva āgataḥ utra anyaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭaḥ mayā yatas

original: samaṃ kariṣye yuvayorekatrāhaṃ nirāyudhaḥ /
analyzed: samam kariṣye yuvayoḥ ekatra aham nirāyudhaḥ

original: anyatra daśalakṣaṃ me putrāḥ śūrāḥ padātayaḥ / 24.18 /
analyzed: anyatra daśa lakṣam me putrāḥ śūrāḥ padātayaḥ

original: ityukte phalgunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vavre tadbhaktimān yataḥ /
analyzed: iti ukte phalgunaḥ kṛṣṇam vavre tat bhaktimān yatas

original: anyastatrābhaktimattvād vavre gopān prayuddhyataḥ / 24.19 /
analyzed: anyaḥ tatra abhaktimat tvāt vavre gopān prayuddhi atas

original: pārthānāmeva sāhāyyaṃ kariṣyannapi keśavaḥ /
analyzed: pārthānām eva sāhāyyam kariṣyan api keśavaḥ

original: tasyābhaktiṃ darśayituṃ cakre samavadīśvaraḥ / 24.20 /
analyzed: tasya abhaktim darśayitum cakre samavat īśvaraḥ

original: tataḥ pārthena sahitaḥ pāṇḍavān keśavo yayau /
analyzed: tatas pārthena sahitaḥ pāṇḍavān keśavaḥ yayau

original: duryodhano yayau rāmaṃ sa bhayāt keśavasya ca /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ yayau rāmam sa bhayāt keśavasya ca

original: na sāhāyyaṃ karomīti prāha tatsnehavānapi / 24.21 /
analyzed: na sāhāyyam karomi iti prāha tat snehavān api

original: cccxlii.upaplāvye sabhāyāṃ hi tatpakṣīyaṃ vaco bruvan /
analyzed: upaplāvye sabhāyām hi tad pakṣīyam vacaḥ bruvan

original: nirākṛtaḥ sātyakinā samakṣaṃ keśavasya ca / 24.22 /
analyzed: nirākṛtaḥ sātyakinā samakṣam keśavasya ca

original: tato duryodhanaṃ nāyāt sa ca hārdikyasaṃ yutaḥ /
analyzed: tatas duryodhanam na ayāt sa ca hārdikyasam yutaḥ

original: jagāma hastinapuramakṣohiṇyo daśābhavan /
analyzed: jagāma hastinapuram akṣohiṇyaḥ daśa abhavan

original: ekā ca dhārtarāṣṭrasya nānādeśyairnṛpairyutāḥ / 24.23 /
analyzed: ekā ca dhārtarāṣṭrasya nānādeśyaiḥ nṛpaiḥ yutāḥ

original: sapta pāṇḍusutānāṃ ca mātsyadrupadakekayaiḥ /
analyzed: sapta pāṇḍu sutānām ca mātsya drupada kekayaiḥ

original: dhṛṣṭaketujarāsandhasutakāṇsīnṛpairyutāḥ / 24.24 /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketu jarāsandha suta kāṇsī nṛpaiḥ yutāḥ

original: purujit kuntibhojaśca cekitānaśca sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: purujit kuntibhojaḥ ca cekitānaḥ ca sātyakiḥ

original: pāṇḍavān senayā yuktāḥ samīyurdevapakṣiṇaḥ / 24.25 /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān senayā yuktāḥ samīyuḥ deva pakṣiṇaḥ

original: vindānuvindāvāvantyau jayatseno'nyakekayāḥ /
analyzed: vinda anuvindau āvantyau jayatsenaḥ nya kekayāḥ

original: kṣemadhūrtirdaṇḍadhāraḥ kaliṅgo'mbaṣṭha eva ca / 24.26 /
analyzed: kṣemadhūrtiḥ daṇḍadhāraḥ kaliṅga umbaṣṭhaḥ eva ca

original: śrutāyuracyutāyuśca bṛhadbalasudakṣiṇau /
analyzed: śrutāyuḥ acyutāyuḥ ca bṛhadbala sudakṣiṇau

original: śrutāyudhaḥ saindhavaśca rākṣaso'lambusastathā / 24.27 /
analyzed: śrutāyudhaḥ saindhavaḥ ca rākṣasa ulambuṣaḥ tathā

original: alāyudho'lambalaśca daityā duryodhanaṃ yayuḥ /
analyzed: alāyudha ulambalaḥ ca daityāḥ duryodhanam yayuḥ

original: gatvā duryodhanāhūto bhagadatto'pi taṃ yayau / 24.28 /
analyzed: gatvā duryodhana āhūtaḥ bhagadattaḥ api tam yayau

original: saputrapautro bāhlīko bhīṣmadroṇakṛpā api /
analyzed: sa putra pautraḥ vāhlīkaḥ bhīṣma droṇa kṛpāḥ api

original: prītyarthaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya babhūvustatsutānugāḥ / 24.29 /
analyzed: prīti artham dhṛtarāṣṭrasya babhūvuḥ tad suta anugāḥ

original: pāṇḍyaśca vīrasenākhyaḥ pāṇḍavāneva saṃ śritaḥ /
analyzed: pāṇḍyaḥ ca vīrasena ākhyaḥ pāṇḍavān eva sam śritaḥ

original: śalyaṃ ca pāṇḍavāneva yāntaṃ j ñātvā suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: śalyam ca pāṇḍavān eva yāntam j ñātvā suyodhanaḥ

original: susabhāḥ kārayāmāsa sarvabhogasamanvitāḥ / 24.30 /
analyzed: su sabhāḥ kārayāmāsa sarva bhoga samanvitāḥ

original: t ā yudhiṣṭhiraklṛptāḥ sa matvā ṇsalyo'bravīdidam /
analyzed: ā yudhiṣṭhira klṛptāḥ sa matvā ṇsalyaḥ bravīt idam

original: ya etāḥ kārayāmāsa tadabhīṣṭaṃ karomyaham / 24.31 /
analyzed: yaḥ etāḥ kārayāmāsa tad abhīṣṭam karomi aham

original: līnaḥ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ satyaṃ kurvityabhāṣata /
analyzed: līnaḥ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ satyam kuru iti abhāṣata

original: dehi me yuddhasāhāyyamiti so'pi yaśo'rthayan /
analyzed: dehi me yuddha sāhāyyam iti saḥ upi yaśorthayan

original: rakṣārthamātmavākyasya tathetyevābhyabhāṣata / 24.32 /
analyzed: rakṣā artham ātma vākyasya tathā iti eva abhyabhāṣata

original: cccxliii.sa pāṇḍavāṃ stato gatvā tairanujñāta eva ca /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān gatvā taiḥ anujñātaḥ eva ca

original: tejovadhārthaṃ karṇasya dhanañjayakṛte'rthitaḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ vadha artham karṇasya dhanañjaya kṛtā īrthitaḥ

original: tathetyuktvā yayau dharmanandanaṃ kauravān prati / 24.33 /
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā yayau dharmanandanam kauravān prati

original: sañjayaṃ preṣayāmāsa dhṛtarāṣṭro'tha śāntaye /
analyzed: sañjayam preṣayāmāsa dhṛtarāṣṭrā utha śāntaye

original: pāṇḍavān pratyadharmaṃ ca yuddhaṃ sa pratyapādayat / 24.34 /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān prati adharmam ca yuddham sa pratyapādayat

original: haṭhavāde'vadad bhīmo yaṃ dharmaṃ draupadī tathā /
analyzed: haṭha vāde vadat bhīmaḥ yam dharmam draupadī tathā

original: tamevoktvā dharmajastu cakāra ca niruttaram /
analyzed: tam evā uktvā dharmajaḥ tu cakāra ca niruttaram

original: kṛṣṇo'pi tasya dharmasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratyapādayat / 24.35 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api tasya dharmasya prāmāṇyam pratyapādayat

original: tato niruttaraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ pāṇḍavāṃ śca praṇamya saḥ /
analyzed: tatas niruttaraḥ kṛṣṇam pāṇḍavān śca praṇamya saḥ

original: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ yayau taṃ ca vinindya prayayau gṛham / 24.36 /
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭram yayau tam ca vinindya prayayau gṛham

original: ninditaḥ sañjayenāsāvāhūya viduraṃ niśi /
analyzed: ninditaḥ sañjayena asau āhūya viduram niśi

original: papraccha so'vadad dharmaṃ pārthānāṃ rājyadāpanam / 24.37 /
analyzed: papraccha sā uvadat dharmam pārthānām rājya dāpanam

original: aihikasya sukhasyāpi kāraṇaṃ tadaninditam /
analyzed: aihikasya sukhasya api kāraṇam tat aninditam

original: anyathā sarvaputrāṇāṃ nāṇsaṃ dharmātilaṅghanam / 24.38 /
analyzed: anyathā sarva putrāṇām nāṇsam dharma atilaṅghanam

original: tatra bhāvamakṛtvā sa jñānādicchannaghakṣayam /
analyzed: tatra bhāvam a kṛtvā sa jñānāt icchan agha kṣayam

original: viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ papraccha so'smaracca sanātanam / 24.39 /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ svarūpam papraccha sā usmarat ca sanātanam

original: sa āgatyāvadat tattvaṃ viṣṇormāyāvinaḥ śubhā /
analyzed: saḥ āgatya avadat tattvam viṣṇoḥ māyāvinaḥ śubhā

original: na gatiścetyatha prātaḥ sañjayaḥ pāṇḍavoditam /
analyzed: na gatiḥ ca iti atha prātar sañjayaḥ pāṇḍava uditam

original: avadad dhṛtarāṣṭrāya sabhāyāṃ kurusannidhau / 24.40 /
analyzed: avadat dhṛtarāṣṭrāya sabhāyām kuru sannidhau

original: tacchrutvā satubhīto'pi putrasnehānugo nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: tat śrutvā sa tu bhītaḥ api putra sneha anugaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: rājyaṃ nādāt pāṇḍavānāṃ tato dharmasuto nṛpaḥ / 24.41 /
analyzed: rājyam na adāt pāṇḍavānām tatas dharmasutaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: yaduktavān sañjayāya yadi ditsatiḥ naḥ pitā /
analyzed: yat uktavān sañjayāya yadi ditsatiḥ naḥ pitā

original: rājyaṃ tadā tvamāgaccha viduro vā na cennaca /
analyzed: rājyam tadā tvam āgaccha viduraḥ vā na ced na ca

original: t āvathānāgatau jñātvā mantrayāmāsa śauriṇā / 24.42 /
analyzed: t au atha anāgatau jñātvā mantrayāmāsa śauriṇā

original: cccxliv.so'pyāhāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi sabhāyāmṛṣisannidhau /
analyzed: cccxliv sā upi āha aham gamiṣyāmi sabhāyām ṛṣi sannidhau

original: vakṣye pathyāni yuktāni yadi nāsau grahīṣyati /
analyzed: vakṣye pathyāni yuktāni yadi nā asau grahīṣyati

original: vadhyaḥ sarvasya lokasya sa bhavet sarvadharmahā / 24.43 /
analyzed: vadhyaḥ sarvasya lokasya sa bhavet sarva dharma hā  /

original: ityukte vairamātmotthaṃ lokamadhye prahāpayan /
analyzed: iti ukte vairam ātma uttham loka madhye prahāpayan

original: lokasaṅgrahaṇārthāya bhīmaseno'bravīd vacaḥ / 24.44 /
analyzed: loka saṅgrahaṇa arthāya bhīmasenaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: nāsmannimittanāṇsaḥ syāt kulasyāpi vayaṃ kulam /
analyzed: syāt kulasya api vayam kulam

original: rakṣituṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhavemādhaścarā iti / 24.45 /
analyzed: rakṣitum dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhavema adhas carāḥ iti

original: icchatā'pyakhilān hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān dṛḍhātmanā /
analyzed: icchatā api akhilān hantum dhārtarāṣṭrān dṛḍha ātmanā

original: bhīmenokto vāsudevo lokasaṅgrahaṇecchayā / 24.46 /
analyzed: bhīmena uktaḥ vāsudevaḥ loka saṅgrahaṇa icchayā

original: vadhaṃ teṣāṃ dharmameva loke jñāpayituṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: vadham teṣām dharmam eva loke jñāpayitum hariḥ

original: ākṣipanniva bhīmaṃ taṃ yuddhāya prerayad dṛḍham / 24.47 /
analyzed: ākṣipan iva bhīmam tam yuddhāya prerayat dṛḍham

original: abhiprāyaṃ keśavasya jānan bhīmo nijaṃ balam /
analyzed: abhiprāyam keśavasya jānan bhīmaḥ nijam balam

original: rājñāṃ madhye'vadat tacca kṛṣṇo'bhyadhikameva hi / 24.48 /
analyzed: rājñām madhye vadat tat ca kṛṣṇa ubhyadhikam eva hi

original: śaśaṃ sa satyaiḥ sadvākyai rājñāṃ madhye prakāṇsayan /
analyzed: sa satyaiḥ sat vākyaiḥ rājñām madhye prakāṇsayan

original: vadhaṃ kurūṇāṃ saddharmaṃ guṇān bhīmasya cāmitān / 24.49 /
analyzed: vadham kurūṇām saddharmam guṇān bhīmasya ca amitān

original: nityamekamanaskau tāvapi keśavamārutī /
analyzed: nityam eka manaskau tau api keśava mārutī

original: evaṃ lokasya saṃ vādahetoḥ saṃ vādamakratām / 24.50 /
analyzed: evam lokasya sam vāda hetoḥ sam vāda makratām

original: tataḥ kṛṣṇo'rjunaṃ caiva kṛpāluṃ sandhikāmukam /
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇa ūrjunam ca eva kṛpālum sandhi kāmukam

original: hetumadbhiḥ śubhairvākyairanunīya jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: hetumadbhiḥ śubhaiḥ vākyaiḥ anunīya jagatpatiḥ

original: ukto mānuṣayā buddhyā nakulena sunītivat / 24.51 /
analyzed: uktaḥ mānuṣayā buddhyā nakulena sunīti vat

original: śauryaprakāṇsanāyaiva yuddhaṃ yojayatāṃ bhavān /
analyzed: śaurya prakāṇsanāya eva yuddham yojayatām bhavān

original: ityuktaḥ sahadevena yuyudhānena cācyutaḥ / 24.52 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sahadevena yuyudhānena ca acyutaḥ

original: dasyūnāṃ nigraho dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ yataḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: dasyūnām nigrahaḥ dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇām yatas paraḥ

original: ato na dhārtarāṣṭrairnaḥ sandhiḥ syāditi pārṣatī /
analyzed: atas na dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ naḥ sandhiḥ syāt iti pārṣatī

original: jagāda kṛṣṇaṃ so'pyenāṃ Oṃ ityuktvā viniryayau / 24.53 /
analyzed: jagāda kṛṣṇam saḥ upi enām om iti uktvā viniryayau

original: cccxlv.sasātyakiḥ syandanavaryasaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthātanūjairakhilaiḥ sa bhūmipaiḥ /
analyzed: syandana varya sam sthitaḥ pṛthā tanūjaiḥ akhilaiḥ sa bhūmipaiḥ

original: anvāgato dūrataraṃ girā tān saṃ sthāpya viprapravaraiḥ kurūn yayau / 24.54 /
analyzed: anvāgataḥ dūrataram girā tān sam sthāpya vipra pravaraiḥ kurūn yayau  /

original: eko'pi viṣṇuḥ sa tu bhārgavātmā vyāsaḥ saśiṣyastadananyadṛśyaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ upi viṣṇuḥ sa tu bhārgava ātmā vyāsaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ tad ananya dṛśyaḥ

original: yayau tadukterhi guṇān pravettuṃ nānyo hi śaktastamṛte yataḥ prabhum / 24.55 /
analyzed: yayau tad ukteḥ hi guṇān pravettum na anyaḥ hi śaktaḥ tam ṛte yatas prabhum

original: sa vandyamāno'khilarāṣṭravāsibhiḥ prasūnavarṣairabhivarṣitaḥ suraiḥ /
analyzed: sa vandyamāna ukhila rāṣṭra vāsibhiḥ prasūna varṣaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ suraiḥ

original: saṃ stūyamānaḥ praṇato'bjajādibhirgajāhvayaṃ prāpa paro'prameyaḥ / 24.56 /
analyzed: sam stūyamānaḥ praṇata ubjaja ādibhiḥ gajāhvayam prāpa para uprameyaḥ

original: sa bhīṣmamukhyaiḥ sarasābhiyātaḥ sahaiva taiḥ prayayau rājamārge /
analyzed: sa bhīṣma mukhyaiḥ sarasā abhiyātaḥ saha eva taiḥ prayayau rājamārge

original: didṛkṣavastaṃ jagadekasundaraṃ guṇārṇavaṃ prāyayuratra sarve / 24.57 /
analyzed: didṛkṣavaḥ tam jagat eka sundaram guṇa arṇavam prāyayuḥ atra sarve

original: sabhājitastaiḥ paramādareṇa viveśa gehaṃ nṛpateranantaḥ /
analyzed: sabhājitaḥ taiḥ parama ādareṇa viveśa geham nṛpateḥ anantaḥ

original: sa bhīṣmamukhyān purato nidhāya vaicitravīryeṇa samarcito'jaḥ /
analyzed: sa bhīṣma mukhyān puratas nidhāya vaicitravīryeṇa samarcita ojaḥ

original: raugme niṣaṇṇaḥ paramāsane prabhurbabhau svabhāsā kakubho'vabhāsayan / 24.58 /
analyzed: raugme niṣaṇṇaḥ parama āsane prabhuḥ babhau sva bhāsā kakubhā uvabhāsayan  /

original: yathocitaṃ teṣu vidhāya keśavo dauryodhanaṃ prāpya gṛhaṃ ca pūjitaḥ /
analyzed: yathocitam teṣu vidhāya keśavaḥ dauryodhanam prāpya gṛham ca pūjitaḥ

original: pūjāṃ tadīyāṃ guṇavaddviḍityasau jagrāha no viduraṃ cā'jagāma / 24.59 /
analyzed: pūjām tadīyām guṇavat dviṣ iti asau jagrāha no viduram ca ājagāma

original: sa bhīṣmapūrvairabhiyācito'pi jagāma naiṣāṃ gṛhamādidevaḥ /
analyzed: sa bhīṣma pūrvaiḥ abhiyācitaḥ upi jagāma na eṣām gṛham ādidevaḥ

original: upekṣit ā draupadīyaprameyo jagāma gehaṃ vidurasya śīghram / 24.60 /
analyzed: upekṣit ā draupadīya prameyaḥ jagāma geham vidurasya śīghram

original: sa tena bhaktyā'bhigataḥ prasannaḥ praviśya cāntargṛhamīśvaro'jaḥ /
analyzed: sa tena bhaktyā abhigataḥ prasannaḥ praviśya ca antargṛham īśvara ujaḥ

original: bhaktyā'bhipūrṇena sasambhrameṇa sampūjitaḥ sarvasamarpaṇena / 24.61 /
analyzed: bhaktyā abhipūrṇena sa sambhrameṇa sampūjitaḥ sarva samarpaṇena

original: pare dine'sau dhṛtarāṣṭrasūnunā samānītaḥ saṃ sadi kauravāṇām /
analyzed: pare dine asau dhṛtarāṣṭra sūnunā samānītaḥ sam sadi kauravāṇām

original: viveśa divye maṇikāñcanāsane sārddhaṃ munīndraiḥ paramārthavedibhiḥ / 24.62 /
analyzed: viveśa divye maṇi kāñcana āsane sārddham muni indraiḥ parama artha vedibhiḥ

original: sampūjito bhīṣmamukhyaiḥ samastai rarāja rājīvasamānanetraḥ /
analyzed: sampūjitaḥ bhīṣma mukhyaiḥ samastaiḥ rarāja rājīva samāna netraḥ

original: yathocitāstatra vidhāya vārtā jagāda kāle kalikalmaṣāpahaḥ / 24.63 /
analyzed: yathā ucitāḥ tatra vidhāya vārtāḥ jagāda kāle kali kalmaṣa apahaḥ

original: vaicitravīrya svakulasya vṛddhyai pradehi rājyaṃ tava satsutāya /
analyzed: vaicitravīrya sva kulasya vṛddhyai pradehi rājyam tava sat sutāya

original: yaśaśca dharmaṃ paramaṃ prasādaṃ mama tvamāpnoṣi tadaiva rājan /
analyzed: yaśaḥ ca dharmam paramam prasādam mama tvam āpnoṣi tadā eva rājan

original: ato'nyathā yaśaso dharmataśca hīnaḥ pratīpatvamupaiṣi me'taḥ / 24.64 /
analyzed: atonyathā yaśasaḥ dharmataḥ ca hīnaḥ pratīpa tvam upaiṣi mā itas

original: cccxlvi.itīritaḥ prāha mamātivartinaḥ sutaṃ svayaṃ me pratibodhayeti /
analyzed: prāha mama ativartinaḥ sutam svayam me pratibodhaya iti

original: sa vāsudevena vibodhito'pi pāpābhisandhirdhṛtarāṣṭrasūnuḥ /
analyzed: sa vāsudevena vibodhitaḥ api pāpa abhisandhiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra sūnuḥ

original: utthāya tasmādanujairamātyairniyantumīśaṃ kumatirvyadhānmatim / 24.65 /
analyzed: utthāya tasmāt anujaiḥ amātyaiḥ niyantum īśam kumatiḥ vyadhāt matim

original: yeye tadā keśavasaṃ yamāya nyamantrayaṃ ste vibudhapratīpāḥ /
analyzed: tadā keśavasam yamāya nyamantrayam ste vibudha pratīpāḥ

original: ato vikarṇapramukhā api sma vadhyatvamāyannaśubhāṃ gatiṃ ca / 24.66 /
analyzed: atas vikarṇa pramukhāḥ api sma vadhya tvam āyan aśubhām gatim ca

original: karṇaḥ surāgryo'pi suyodhanārthe nyamantrayad bhāvato naiva duṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: karṇaḥ sura agryaḥ api suyodhana arthe nyamantrayat bhāvataḥ nā eva duṣṭaḥ

original: ato gatiścāsya suśobhanā'bhūd ye'trānukūlāḥ paramasya te śubhāḥ / 24.67 /
analyzed: atas gatiḥ ca asya su śobhanā abhūt yetrā anukūlāḥ paramasya te śubhāḥ

original: ṛṣibhirjāmadagnyena vyāsenāpyamitaujasā /
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ jāmadagnyena vyāsena api amita ojasā

original: vāsudevātmanā caiva trirūpeṇaiva viṣṇunā / 24.68 /
analyzed: vāsudeva ātmanā ca eva tri rūpeṇa eva viṣṇunā

original: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhīṣmādyairanuśiṣṭo'pi durmatiḥ /
analyzed: mātā pitṛbhyām bhīṣma ādyaiḥ anuśiṣṭaḥ api durmatiḥ

original: duryodhano mantrayate mukundasyā'śu bandhanam / 24.69 /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ mantrayate mukundasya āśu bandhanam  /

original: sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmā ca tacchuśruvaturañjasā /
analyzed: sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmā ca tat śuśruvatuḥ añjasā

original: saṃ sthāpya kṛtavarmāṇaṃ rahaḥ sātyakiratra ca /
analyzed: sam sthāpya kṛtavarmāṇam rahaḥ sātyakiḥ atra ca

original: abhyetya keśavaṃ prāha duryodhanaviniścayam / 24.70 /
analyzed: abhyetya keśavam prāha duryodhana viniścayam

original: j ānannapyakhilaṃ kṛṣṇastacchrutvā sātyakermukhāt /

original: pīḍito bhīmabāṇaiśca kṣaradgātro nanāma tam / 25.44 /
analyzed: pīḍitaḥ bhīma bāṇaiḥ ca kṣarat gātraḥ nanāma tam

original: uvāca hetunā kena vayaṃ kṣīyāma sarvadā /
analyzed: uvāca hetunā kena vayam kṣīyāma sarvadā

original: pāṇḍavāṇsca jayaṃ nityaṃ labdhvā harṣamavāpnuvan / 25.45 /
analyzed: pāṇḍavān ca jayam nityam labdhvā harṣam avāpnuvan

original: tamāha bhīṣmaste'jeyā devāste dharaṇīṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tam āha bhīṣmaḥ tejeyāḥ devāḥ te dharaṇīm gatāḥ

original: viśeṣataḥ keśavena pālitāstatpriyāḥ sadā / 25.46 /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ keśavena pālitāḥ tad priyāḥ sadā

original: stutvā sampūjya bhūmeḥ sa bhārāvataraṇāya tam /
analyzed: stutvā sampūjya bhūmeḥ sa bhāra avataraṇāya tam

original: prārthayāmāsa tenoktaṃ devānāmavadad vibhuḥ / 25.48 /
analyzed: prārthayāmāsa tena uktam devānām avadat vibhuḥ

original: ayaṃ nārāyaṇo devaḥ purṇānantaguṇārṇavaḥ /

original: ājñāpayati vaḥ sarvān prādurbhāvāya bhūtal . e /
analyzed: ājñāpayati vaḥ sarvān prādurbhāvāya bhūtal

original: svayaṃ ca devakīputro bhaviṣyati jagatpatiḥ / 25.49 /
analyzed: svayam ca devakīputraḥ bhaviṣyati jagatpatiḥ

original: evaṃ tena samādiṣṭā dharmavāyvādayo'khilāḥ /
analyzed: evam tena samādiṣṭāḥ dharma vāyu ādayaḥ ukhilāḥ

original: abhavan pāṇḍavādyāste sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ / 25.50 /
analyzed: abhavan pāṇḍava ādyāḥ te sa indrāḥ saha marut gaṇāḥ

original: sa ca nārāyaṇo devo devakīnandano'bhavat /

original: tenaite pālitāḥ pārthā ajeyā devasargiṇaḥ /
analyzed: tena ete pālitāḥ pārthāḥ ajeyāḥ deva sargiṇaḥ

original: tasmāt taiḥ sandhimanviccha yadīcchasyaparābhavam / 25.51 /
analyzed: tasmāt taiḥ sandhim anviccha yadi icchasi aparābhavam

original: ityukto ḍambhabuddhyaiva natvā viṣṇuṃ tato yayau /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ ḍambha buddhyā eva natvā viṣṇum tatas yayau

original: prātarniryātayāmāsa senāṃ yuddhāya durmatiḥ / 25.52 /
analyzed: prātar niryātayāmāsa senām yuddhāya durmatiḥ

original: divyauṣadhena bhīṣmasya bhūtvā ca nirujastataḥ /
analyzed: divyauṣadhena bhīṣmasya bhūtvā ca nirujaḥ tatas

original: cccliii.bhīṣmamagre nidhāyaiva yayau yuddhāya daṃ sitaḥ / 25.53 /
analyzed: bhīṣmam agre nidhāya eva yayau yuddhāya dam sitaḥ

original: tatrā'sīd yuddhamatulaṃ bhīmabhīṣmānuyāyinām /

original: pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca śūrāṇāmanivartinām / 25.54 /
analyzed: pāṇḍavānām kurūṇām ca śūrāṇām anivartinām

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnastatra bhīmānuyāyī duryodhanasyāvarajaiḥ prayuddhyan /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatra bhīma anuyāyī duryodhanasya avarajaiḥ

original: sammohanāstreṇa vimohayitvā vikarṇapūrvānahanacca senām / 25.55 /
analyzed: sammohana astreṇa vimohayitvā vikarṇa pūrvān ahanat ca senām

original: tato droṇastān samutthāpya sarvān vijñānāstreṇā'sadat pārṣataṃ ca /
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ tān samutthāpya sarvān vijñāna astreṇa asadat pārṣatam ca

original: taṃ bhīmasenaḥ sūtahīnaṃ vidhāya vyadrāvayacchatrugaṇāñcharaughaiḥ / 25.56 /
analyzed: tam bhīmasenaḥ sūta hīnam vidhāya vyadrāvayat śatru gaṇān śara oghaiḥ

original: athā'sadat kṛtavarmā rathena dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ so'bhyayāt tāvubhau ca /
analyzed: athā asadat kṛtavarmā rathena dhṛṣṭadyumnam tau ubhau ca

original: vavarṣatuḥ śaravarṣairathograistatrākarod virathaṃ draupadistam / 25.57 /
analyzed: vavarṣatuḥ śara varṣaiḥ atha ugraiḥ tatra akarot viratham draupadiḥ tam

original: tasmin jite rathavīre svayaṃ taṃ duryodhanaḥ pārṣatamāsasāda /
analyzed: tasmin jite ratha vīre svayam tam duryodhanaḥ pārṣatam āsasāda

original: taṃ bhīmaseno virathāyudhaṃ ca kṛtvā bāṇenāhanajjatrudeśe / 25.58 /
analyzed: tam bhīmasenaḥ viratha āyudham ca kṛtvā bāṇena ahanat jatru deśe

original: vimūrcchitaṃ taṃ rudhiraughamuccairvamantamāṇsu svarathe nidhāya /
analyzed: vimūrcchitam tam rudhira ogham uccais sva rathe nidhāya

original: kṛpo yayau mārutirdhārtarāṣṭrīṃ vyadrāvayat pṛtanāṃ bāṇapūgaiḥ / 25.59 /
analyzed: kṛpaḥ yayau mārutiḥ dhārtarāṣṭrīm vyadrāvayat pṛtanām bāṇa pūgaiḥ

original: athendrasūnuḥ keśavapreritena rathena śatrūn vidhamañcharaughaiḥ /
analyzed: athā indrasūnuḥ keśava preritena rathena śatrūn vidhaman śara oghaiḥ

original: rathān raṇe pañcaviṃ śatsahasrān nināya vaivasvatasādanāya / 25.60 /
analyzed: rathān raṇe śat sahasrān nināya vaivasvata sādanāya

original: tamanvayād yuyudhānaḥ sudhanvā vidrāvayan dhārtarāṣṭrasya senām /
analyzed: tam anvayāt yuyudhānaḥ sudhanvā vidrāvayan dhārtarāṣṭrasya senām

original: tamabhyayāt saumadattistayośca suyuddhamāsīdatibhairavāstram / 25.61 /
analyzed: tam abhyayāt saumadattiḥ tayoḥ ca su yuddham āsīt ati bhairava astram

original: putrān daśāsyā'śu nihatya vīraḥ sa sātyakeḥ saumadattiḥ sakāṇse /
analyzed: putrān daśa asya āśu nihatya vīraḥ sa sātyakeḥ saumadattiḥ sa kāṇse

original: samarpayāmāsa śarīradāraṇaiḥ śarairubhau tau virathau ca cakratuḥ / 25.62 /
analyzed: samarpayāmāsa śarīra dāraṇaiḥ śaraiḥ ubhau tau virathau ca cakratuḥ  /

original: athāsipāṇiṃ yuyudhānamāṇsu mahāsihastena ca saumadattinā /
analyzed: atha asi pāṇim yuyudhānam āṇsu mahā asi hastena ca saumadattinā

original: āsāditaṃ vīkṣya rathaṃ svakīyamāropayāmāsa suto'nilasya / 25.63 /
analyzed: āsāditam vīkṣya ratham svakīyam āropayāmāsa sutonilasya

original: suyodhanaḥ saumadattiṃ svakīyarathe vyavasthāpya ca bhīmasenāt /
analyzed: suyodhanaḥ saumadattim svakīya rathe vyavasthāpya ca bhīmasenāt

original: apādravad vāsavirbhīṣmamājau samāsasādā'śu mahendrakalpaḥ / 25.64 /
analyzed: apādravat vāsaviḥ bhīṣmam ājau samāsasāda āśu mahā indra kalpaḥ

original: cccliv.ubhau ca tāvastravidāṃ prabarhau śarairmahāṇsīviṣasannikāṇsaiḥ /
analyzed: cccliu ubhau ca tau astra vidām prabarhau śaraiḥ mahāṇsī viṣa sannikāṇsaiḥ

original: tatakṣaturnākasadāṃ samakṣaṃ mahābalau saṃ yati jātadarpau / 25.65 /
analyzed: tatakṣatuḥ nākasadām samakṣam mahā balau sam yati jāta darpau  /

original: svabāhuvīryeṇa jitaḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ kirīṭinā lokamahārathena /
analyzed: sva bāhu vīryeṇa jitaḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ kirīṭinā loka mahā rathena

original: senāmapāhṛtya yayau niśāyāmāsāditāyāmatha pāṇḍavāṇsca / 25.66 /
analyzed: senām apāhṛtya yayau niśāyām āsāditāyām atha

original: tataḥ paredyuḥ punareva bhīmabhīṣmau puraskṛtya samīyatuste /
analyzed: tatas paredyus punar eva bhīma bhīṣmau puraskṛtya samīyatuḥ te

original: sene tadā sārathihīnamāṇsu bhīṣmaṃ kṛtvā mārutirabhyagāt parān /
analyzed: sene tadā sārathi hīnam āṇsu bhīṣmam kṛtvā mārutiḥ abhyagāt parān

original: nipātitāstena rathebhavājinaḥ pradudruvuścāvaśiṣṭāḥ samastāḥ / 25.67 /
analyzed: nipātitāḥ tena rathebha vājinaḥ pradudruvuḥ ca avaśiṣṭāḥ samastāḥ

original: duryodhanādyeṣu parājiteṣu bhīṣmadroṇadrauṇipurassareṣu /
analyzed: duryodhana ādyeṣu parājiteṣu bhīṣma droṇa drauṇi purassareṣu

original: mahāgajastho bhagadatta āgādāyan bāṇaṃ bhīmasene'mucacca / 25.68 /
analyzed: mahāgaja sthaḥ bhagadattaḥ āgāt āyan bāṇam

original: tenātividdhe bhīmasene'sya putra udyacchamānaṃ pitaraṃ nivārya /
analyzed: tena atividdhe bhīmasena isya putraḥ udyacchamānam pitaram nivārya

original: ghaṭotkaco'bhyadravadāṇsu vīraḥ svamāyayā hasticatuṣṭayasthaḥ / 25.69 /
analyzed: vīraḥ sva māyayā hasti catuṣṭaya sthaḥ  /

original: sa vaiṣṇavāstraṃ bhagadattasaṃ sthaṃ vijñāya viṣṇorvarato viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: sa vaiṣṇava astram bhagadatta sam stham vijñāya viṣṇoḥ varataḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: amoghamanyatra harermarutsutaḥ putre yāte na svayamabhyadhāvat / 25.70 /
analyzed: amogham anyatra hareḥ marut sutaḥ putre yāte na svayam abhyadhāvat  /

original: anugrahādabhyadhikādavadhyaṃ j ānannapi svaṃ vāsudevasya nityam /
analyzed: anugrahāt abhyadhikāt avadhyam ānan api svam vāsudevasya nityam

original: tadbhaktivaiśeṣyata eva tasya satyaṃ vākyaṃ kartumariṃ nacāyāt /
analyzed: tad bhakti vaiśeṣyataḥ eva tasya satyam vākyam kartum arim na ca ayāt

original: yadā svaputreṇa jito bhavet sa kimvātmanetyeva tadā pravettum / 25.71 /
analyzed: yadā sva putreṇa jitaḥ bhavet sa kim vā ātmanā iti eva tadā pravettum

original: sa vismṛt āstrastu yadā bhavet tadā bhīmo bhagadattaṃ prayāti /
analyzed: sa vismṛt āstraḥ tu yadā bhavet tadā bhīmaḥ bhagadattam prayāti

original: ṛte bhīmaṃ vā'rjunaṃ nāstrameṣa pramuñcatītyeva hi veda bhīmaḥ / 25.72 /
analyzed: ṛte bhīmam vā arjunam na astram eṣa pramuñcati iti eva hi veda bhīmaḥ

original: caturgajātmoparigātmakaśca ghaṭotkacaḥ supratīkaṃ ca taṃ ca /
analyzed: catur gaja ātmā upariga ātmakaḥ ca ghaṭotkacaḥ supratīkam ca tam ca

original: nānāprahārairvitudaṃ ścakāra sandigdhajīvau jagatāṃ samakṣam / 25.73 /
analyzed: nānā prahāraiḥ vitudam ścakāra sandigdha jīvau jagatām samakṣam

original: gajārtanādaṃ tu niśamya bhīṣmamukhāḥ samāpeturamuṃ ca dṛṣṭvā /
analyzed: gaja ārta nādam tu niśamya bhīṣma mukhāḥ samāpetuḥ amum ca dṛṣṭvā

original: mahākāyaṃ bhīmamamuṣya pṛṣṭhagopaṃ ca vāyvātmajamatrasan bhṛśam /
analyzed: mahā kāyam bhīmam amuṣya pṛṣṭhagopam ca vāyvātmajam atrasan bhṛśam

original: te bhītabhīt āḥ pṛtanāpahāraṃ kṛtvā'pajagmuḥ śibirāya śīghram / 25.74 /
analyzed: te pṛtanā apahāram kṛtvā apajagmuḥ śibirāya śīghram

original: dine pare caiva punaḥ sametāḥ parasparaṃ pāṇḍavakauravāste /
analyzed: dine pare ca eva punar sametāḥ parasparam pāṇḍava kauravāḥ te

original: tatrā'sadannāgasutāsamudbhavaḥ pārthātmajaḥ śākuneyān ṣal . ekaḥ / 25.75 /
analyzed: tatra asadat nāga sutā samudbhavaḥ pārtha ātmajaḥ śākuneyān ekaḥ  /
