analyzed: prāsa hastaiḥ kṣata kāya utirūḍha kopaḥ sa khaḍgena cakarta teṣām

original: śirāṃ si vīro balavānirāvān bhayaṃ dadhad dhārtarāṣṭreṣu cogram / 25.76 /
analyzed: śirām si vīraḥ balavān irāvān bhayam dadhat dhārtarāṣṭreṣu ca ugram

original: dṛṣṭvā tamugraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraputro dideśa rakṣo'lambusanāmadheyam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ugram dhṛtarāṣṭra putraḥ dideśa rakṣolambusa nāmadheyam

original: jahyārjuniṃ kṣipramiti sma tacca samāsadannāgasutātanūjam / 25.77 /
analyzed: jahya ārjunim kṣipram iti sma tat ca samāsadat nāga sutā tanūjam

original: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva dāruṇaṃ māyāyujorvīryavatormahādbhutam /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhūt yuddham atīva dāruṇam māyā yujoḥ vīryavatoḥ mahā adbhutam

original: sasādino'śvān sa tu rākṣaso'sṛjat te pārthaputrasya ca sādino'hanan /
analyzed: sa sādinā uśvān sa tu rākṣasaḥ usṛjat te pārtha putrasya ca sādinā uhanan

original: tatastvanantākṛtimāptamārjuniṃ suparṇarūpo'hanadāṇsu rākṣasaḥ / 25.78 /
analyzed: tatas tu ananta ākṛtim āptam ārjunim rākṣasaḥ

original: hataṃ niśamyā'rjunimugrapauruṣo nanāda kopena vṛkodarātmajaḥ /
analyzed: hatam niśamya ārjunim ugra pauruṣaḥ nanāda kopena vṛkodara ātmajaḥ

original: cacāla bhūrnānadato'sya rāvataḥ sasāgarāgendranagā bhṛśaṃ tadā / 25.79 /
analyzed: cacāla bhūḥ nānadataḥ asya rāvataḥ sa sāga rāga indra nagā bhṛśam tadā

original: alambusastaṃ prasamīkṣya māruteḥ sutaṃ balāḍhyaṃ bhayataḥ parādravat /
analyzed: alambusaḥ tam prasamīkṣya māruteḥ sutam bala āḍhyam bhayataḥ parādravat

original: parādravan dhārtarāṣṭrasya senāḥ sarvāstamārātha suyodhano nṛpaḥ / 25.80 /
analyzed: parādravan dhārtarāṣṭrasya senāḥ sarvāḥ tam ārātha suyodhanaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: sa bhīmaputrasya jaghāna mantriṇo mahābalāṃ ścaturo'nyāṃ stathaiva /
analyzed: sa bhīma putrasya jaghāna mantriṇaḥ mahā balām ścaturaḥ nyām s tathā eva

original: hatāvaśeṣeṣu ca vidravatsu ghaṭotkaco'bhyāhanadāṇsu taṃ nṛpam / 25.81 /
analyzed: hata avaśeṣeṣu ca vidravatsu tam nṛpam

original: sa pīḍyamāno yudhi tena rakṣasā praveśayāmāsa śaraṃ ghaṭotkace /
analyzed: sa pīḍyamānaḥ yudhi tena rakṣasā praveśayāmāsa śaram ghaṭotkace

original: dṛḍhāhatastena tadā valīyasā ghaṭotkacaḥ pravyathitendriyo bhṛśam /
analyzed: dṛḍha āhataḥ tena tadā valīyasā ghaṭotkacaḥ pravyathita indriyaḥ bhṛśam

original: tasthau kathañcid bhuvi pātyamānaḥ punaḥ śarānapyasṛjat suyodhane / 25.82 /
analyzed: tasthau kathañcid bhuvi pātyamānaḥ punar śarān api asṛjat suyodhane

original: ciraprayuddhau nṛparākṣasādhipau parasparājeyatamau raṇājire /
analyzed: cira prayuddhau nṛpa rākṣasa adhipau paraspara ajeyatamau raṇa ajire

original: droṇādayo vīkṣya rirakṣiṣantaḥ suyodhanaṃ prāpuramitrasāhāḥ / 25.83 /
analyzed: droṇa ādayaḥ vīkṣya rirakṣiṣantaḥ suyodhanam prāpuḥ amitra sāhāḥ

original: sa droṇaṇsalyau guruputragautamau bhūriśravaḥ kṛtavarmādikāṃ śca /
analyzed: sa droṇaṇsalyau guru putra gautamau bhūriśravaḥ kṛtavarma ādikān śca

original: vavarṣa bāṇairgaganaṃ samāṇsrito ghaṭotkacaḥ sthūlatamai suvegaiḥ / 25.84 /
analyzed: vavarṣa bāṇaiḥ gaganam samāṇsritaḥ ghaṭotkacaḥ sthūlatamaiḥ su vegaiḥ

original: tamekagryai rathibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaṃ nirīkṣya bhīmo'bhyagamat samastān /
analyzed: tam ekagryaiḥ rathibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam nirīkṣya bhīmaḥ abhyagamat samastān

original: droṇo'tra bhīmaprahitaiḥ śarottamaiḥ supīḍitaḥ prāptamūrcchaḥ papāta / 25.85 /
analyzed: droṇaḥ utra bhīma prahitaiḥ śara uttamaiḥ su pīḍitaḥ prāpta mūrcchaḥ papāta  /

original: drauṇiṃ kṛpādyān sasuyodhanāṃ śca cakāra bhīmo virathān kṣaṇena /
analyzed: drauṇim kṛpa ādyān sa suyodhanān ca cakāra bhīmaḥ virathān kṣaṇena

original: nivāryamāṇāṃ stu vṛkodareṇa ghaṭotkacastān pravavarṣa sāyakaiḥ / 25.86 /
analyzed: nivāryamāṇām stu vṛkodareṇa ghaṭotkacaḥ tān pravavarṣa sāyakaiḥ

original: ccclvi.tenāmbarasthena tarupramāṇairabhyarditāḥ kuravaḥ sāyakaughaiḥ /
analyzed: ccclvitena ambara sthena taru pramāṇaiḥ abhyarditāḥ kuravaḥ sāyaka oghaiḥ

original: bhūmau ca bhīmena śaraughapīḍit āḥ peturneduḥ prādravaṃ ścātibhīt āḥ / 25.87 /
analyzed: bhūmau ca bhīmena śara ogha pīḍit āḥ petuḥ neduḥ prādravam

original: sarvāṃ śca tāñchibiraṃ prāpayitvā vinā bhīṣmaṃ kauravān bhīmasenaḥ /
analyzed: sarvān śca tān śibiram prāpayitvā vinā bhīṣmam kauravān bhīmasenaḥ

original: ghaṭotkacaścānadatāṃ mahāsvanau nādena lokānabhipūrayantau / 25.88 /
analyzed: ghaṭotkacaḥ ca anadatām mahā svanau nādena lokān abhipūrayantau  /

original: duryodhano'tha svajanaiḥ sametaḥ punaḥ prāyād raṇabhūmiṃ sa bhīṣmam /
analyzed: duryodhana utha sva janaiḥ sametaḥ punar prāyāt raṇa bhūmim sa bhīṣmam

original: jayopāyaṃ bhaimasenerapṛcchat svasyaiva sa prāha na taṃ vrajeti / 25.89 /
analyzed: jaya upāyam bhaimaseneḥ apṛcchat svasya eva sa prāha na tam vraja iti

original: prāgjyotiṣaṃ caiva ghaṭotkacāya sampreṣayāmāsa surāpagāsutaḥ /
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣam ca eva ghaṭotkacāya sampreṣayāmāsa surāpagāsutaḥ

original: sa prāpya haiḍimbamayodhayad balī sacārdayāmāsa sakuñjaraṃ tam / 25.90 /
analyzed: sa prāpya haiḍimbam ayodhayat balī sacā ardayāmāsa sa kuñjaram tam

original: tenārditaḥ prāhiṇocchūlamasmai viyatyabhiplutya tadā ghaṭotkacaḥ /
analyzed: tena arditaḥ prāhiṇot śūlam asmai viyati abhiplutya tadā ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: pragṛhya śūlaṃ prababhañja jānumāropya devā jahṛṣustadīkṣya / 25.91 /
analyzed: pragṛhya śūlam prababhañja jānum āropya devāḥ jahṛṣuḥ tat īkṣya

original: tadā sa tasyaiva padānugān nṛpo jaghāna taṃ mārutirabhyayād raṇe /
analyzed: tadā sa tasya eva padānugān nṛpaḥ jaghāna tam mārutiḥ abhyayāt raṇe

original: sa prāhiṇod bhīmasenāya vīro gajaṃ tamastambhayadāṇsu sāyakaiḥ / 25.92 /
analyzed: sa prāhiṇot bhīmasenāya vīraḥ gajam tam astambhayat āṇsu sāyakaiḥ

original: saṃ stambhite bāṇavaraistu nāge bhīmasyāṇsvān sāyakairārdayat saḥ /
analyzed: sam stambhite bāṇa varaiḥ tu nāge sāyakaiḥ ārdayat saḥ

original: so'bhyarditāṇsvo'tha gadāṃ pragṛhya hantuṃ nṛpaṃ taṃ sagajaṃ samāsadat / 25.93 /
analyzed: gadām pragṛhya hantum nṛpam tam sa gajam samāsadat  /

original: sa hantukāmena ruṣā'bhipanno bhīmena rājā purataḥ pṛṣṭhataśca /
analyzed: sa hantu kāmena ruṣā abhipannaḥ bhīmena rājā puratas pṛṣṭhatas ca

original: kṛṣṇenāstraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad gṛhītuṃ sahārjunenāpayayau subhītaḥ / 25.94 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇena astram vaiṣṇavam tat gṛhītum saha arjunena apayayau su bhītaḥ

original: tasmin gate bhīmasenārjunābhyāṃ vidrāvite rājasaṅghe samaste /
analyzed: tasmin gate bhīmasena arjunābhyām vidrāvite rāja saṅghe samaste

original: bhīṣmaḥ senāmapahṛtyāpayāto duryodhanastaṃ niśi copajagmivān / 25.95 /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ senām apahṛtya apayātaḥ duryodhanaḥ tam niśi ca upajagmivān

original: saṃ śrāvitaḥ krūravacaḥ sa tena cakre satyaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ vihāya /
analyzed: sam śrāvitaḥ krūra vacaḥ sa tena cakre satyam mṛtyu bhayam vihāya

original: śaktyā haniṣyāmi parāniti sma cakre ca tat karma tathā paredyuḥ / 25.96 /
analyzed: śaktyā haniṣyāmi parān iti sma cakre ca tat karma tathā paredyus

original: taṃ śaktito jugupurdhārtarāṣṭrāstenārditāṇscedipāñcālamatsyāḥ /
analyzed: tam śaktitaḥ jugupuḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ tena arditāḥ āṇ cedi pāñcāla matsyāḥ

original: parādravan bhīṣmabāṇorubhīt āḥ siṃ hārditāḥ kṣudramṛgā ivā'rtāḥ / 25.97 /
analyzed: parādravan bhīṣma bāṇa uru bhīt āḥ sim ha arditāḥ kṣudra mṛgāḥ iva ārtāḥ

original: saṃ sthāpya tān bhīṣmamabhiprayāntamalambuso'vārayat pārthasūnum /
analyzed: sam sthāpya tān bhīṣmam abhiprayāntam alambusā vārayat pārtha sūnum

original: ccclvii.vijitya taṃ keśavabhāgineyo yayau bhīṣmaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro'mumāra / 25.98 /
analyzed: vijitya tam keśava bhāgineyaḥ yayau bhīṣmam

original: tad yuddhamāsīnnṛpapārthaputrayorvicitramatyadbhutamugrarūpam /
analyzed: tat yuddham āsīt nṛpa pārtha putrayoḥ vicitram ati adbhutam ugra rūpam

original: samaṃ ciraṃ tatra dhanuścakarta dhvajaṃ ca rājā sahasā'bhimanyoḥ / 25.99 /
analyzed: samam ciram tatra dhanuḥ cakarta dhvajam ca rājā sahasā abhimanyoḥ  /

original: athainamugraiśca śarairvavarṣa sūtaṃ ca tasyā'śu jaghāna vīraḥ /
analyzed: athā enam ugraiḥ ca śaraiḥ vavarṣa sūtam ca tasya āśu jaghāna vīraḥ

original: tadā'sadad bhīmaseno nṛpaṃ taṃ jaghāna cāṇsvān dhṛtarāṣṭrajasya / 25.100 /
analyzed: tadā asadat bhīmasenaḥ nṛpam tam jaghāna cāṇsvān dhṛtarāṣṭra jasya

original: droṇo drauṇirbhagadattaḥ kṛpaśca sacitrasenā abhyayurbhīmasenam /
analyzed: droṇaḥ drauṇiḥ bhagadattaḥ kṛpaḥ ca sa citrasenāḥ abhyayus bhīmasenam

original: sarvāṃ śca tān vimukhīkṛtya bhīmaḥ sa citrasenāya gadāṃ samādade / 25.101 /
analyzed: sarvān śca tān vimukhīkṛtya bhīmaḥ sa citrasenāya gadām samādade  /

original: t āmudyatāṃ vīkṣya parādravaṃ ste sa citrasenaśca rathādavaplutaḥ /
analyzed: t ām udyatām vīkṣya parādravam ste sa citrasenaḥ ca rathāt avaplutaḥ

original: sañcūrṇito gadayā tadrathaśca tajjīvanenoddhṛṣit āṇsca kauravāḥ / 25.102 /
analyzed: sañcūrṇitaḥ gadayā tad rathaḥ ca tad jīvanena uddhṛṣit kauravāḥ

original: bhīṣmastu pāñcālakarūṇsacediṣvahan sahasrāṇi caturdaśograḥ /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ tu pāñcāla karūṇsa cediṣu ahan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa ugraḥ

original: rathaprabarhānatitigmatejā vidrāvayāmāsa parānavīniva / 25.103 /
analyzed: ratha prabarhān ati tigma tejāḥ vidrāvayāmāsa parān avīn iva

original: vidrāpya sarvāmapi pāṇḍusenāṃ viśrāvya lokeṣu ca kīrtimātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vidrāpya sarvām api pāṇḍu senām viśrāvya lokeṣu ca kīrtim ātmanaḥ

original: senāṃ samāhṛtya yayau niśāgame sampūjyamāno dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ / 25.104 /
analyzed: senām samāhṛtya yayau niśā āgame sampūjyamānaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra putraiḥ

original: droṇo virāṭasya puro nihatya śaṅkhaṃ sutaṃ tasya vijitya taṃ ca /
analyzed: droṇaḥ virāṭasya puras nihatya śaṅkham sutam tasya vijitya tam ca

original: vidrāpya senāmapi pāṇḍavānāṃ yayau nadījena sahaiva hṛṣṭaḥ / 25.105 /
analyzed: vidrāpya senām api pāṇḍavānām yayau nadījena saha eva hṛṣṭaḥ  /

original: bhīmārjunāvapi śatrūn nihatya vidrāpya sarvāṃ śca yudhi pravīrān /
analyzed: bhīma arjunau api śatrūn nihatya vidrāpya sarvān śca yudhi pravīrān

original: yudhiṣṭhireṇāpahṛte svasainye bhītena bhīṣmācchibiraṃ prajagmatuḥ / 25.106 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhireṇa apahṛte sva sainye bhītena bhīṣmāt śibiram prajagmatuḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiro bhīṣmaparākrameṇa bhīto bhīṣmaṃ svavadhopāyameva /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīṣma parākrameṇa bhītaḥ bhīṣmam sva vadha upāyam eva

original: praṣṭuṃ yayau niśi kṛṣṇo'nujāṇsca tasyānvayustaṃ sa pitāmaho yat / 25.107 /
analyzed: praṣṭum yayau niśi tasya anvayuḥ tam sa pitāmahaḥ yat

original: bhīmārjunau śaknuvantāvapi sma narte'nujñāṃ hantumimaṃ tadaicchatām /
analyzed: bhīma arjunau śaknuvantau api sma na ṛte nujñām hantum imam tadā aicchatām

original: pūjyo yato bhīṣma udārakarmā kṛṣṇo'pyayāt tena hi pāṇḍavārthe / 25.108 /
analyzed: pūjyaḥ yatas bhīṣmaḥ udāra karmā kṛṣṇaḥ upyayāt tena hi pāṇḍava arthe

original: prāpyānujñāṃ bhīṣmataste vadhāya śikhaṇḍinaṃ tadvacasā'grayāyinam /
analyzed: prāpya anujñām bhīṣmataḥ te vadhāya śikhaṇḍinam tad vacasā agra yāyinam

original: kṛtvā paredyuryudhaye vinirgatā bhiṣmaṃ puraskṛtya tathā pare'pi / 25.109 /
analyzed: kṛtvā paredyus yudhaye vinirgatāḥ bhiṣmam puraskṛtya tathā pare pi

original: ccclviii.śikhaṇḍino rakṣakaḥ phalguno'bhūd bhīṣmasya duḥ śāsana āsa cāgre /
analyzed: rakṣakaḥ bhīṣmasya duḥ śāsanaḥ āsa ca agre

original: anye ca sarve jugupurbhīṣmameva nyavārayan bhīmasenādayastān / 25.110 /
analyzed: anye ca sarve jugupuḥ bhīṣmam eva nyavārayan bhīmasena ādayaḥ tān

original: bhīṣmāya yāntaṃ yuyudhānamājau nyavārayad rākṣaso'lambuso'tha /
analyzed: bhīṣmāya yāntam yuyudhānam ājau nyavārayat rākṣasā ulambusā utha

original: taṃ vajrakalpairatudad vṛṣṇivīraḥ śaraiḥ sa māyāmasṛjat tadogrām / 25.111 /
analyzed: tam vajra kalpaiḥ atudat vṛṣṇi vīraḥ śaraiḥ sa māyām asṛjat tadā ugrām

original: astreṇa māyāmapanudya vīro vyadrāvayad rākṣasaṃ sātyakistam /
analyzed: astreṇa māyām apanudya vīraḥ vyadrāvayat rākṣasam sātyakiḥ tam

original: tasmin gate yuyudhāno rathena yayau bhīṣmaṃ pārthamanveva dhanvī / 25.112 /
analyzed: tasmin gate yuyudhānaḥ rathena yayau bhīṣmam pārtham anu eva dhanvī

original: droṇo drauṇirdhārtarāṣṭraśca rājā bhūriśravā bhagadattaḥ kṛpaśca /
analyzed: droṇaḥ drauṇiḥ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ ca rājā bhūriśravāḥ bhagadattaḥ kṛpaḥ ca

original: śalyo bāhlīkaḥ kṛtavarmā suśarmā sarvāṇsca senā vāritā vāyujena / 25.113 /
analyzed: śalyaḥ vāhlīkaḥ kṛtavarmā suśarmā sarvān ca senā vāritā vāyujena  /

original: sa tān muhurvirathīkṛtya vīraḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ sagajaṃ drāvayitvā /
analyzed: sa tān muhur virathīkṛtya vīraḥ prāgjyotiṣam sa gajam drāvayitvā

original: nyavārayat phalgunaṃ roddhukāmaṃ pārthaśca devavratamāsasāda / 25.114 /
analyzed: nyavārayat phalgunam roddhu kāmam pārthaḥ ca devavratam āsasāda

original: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīṣmamabhiprayāntaṃ mādrīsutābhyāṃ sahitaṃ nṛvīram /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram bhīṣmam abhiprayāntam mādrī sutābhyām sahitam nṛ vīram

original: nyavārayacchakuniḥ sādināṃ ca yuto'yutenaiva varāṇsvagena / 25.115 /
analyzed: nyavārayat śakuniḥ sādinām ca yutaḥ yutena eva

original: t ān sādino'śvāṃ śca nihatya sarvān vijitya taṃ śakuniṃ pāṇḍavāste /
analyzed: t ān sādinā uśvān śca nihatya sarvān vijitya tam śakunim pāṇḍavāḥ te

original: prāpurbhīṣmaṃ draupadeyāṇsca sarve tathā virāṭadrupadau kuntibhojaḥ / 25.116 /
analyzed: prāpuḥ bhīṣmam draupadeyān ca sarve tathā virāṭa drupadau kuntibhojaḥ

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ bhīṣmamabhiprayāntaṃ nyavārayat saindhavastaṃ sa bāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam bhīṣmam abhiprayāntam nyavārayat saindhavaḥ tam sa bāṇaiḥ

original: hatāṇsvasūtaṃ sagaṇaṃ drāvayitvā samāsadad bhīṣmamevā'śu vīraḥ / 25.117 /
analyzed: sa gaṇam drāvayitvā samāsadat bhīṣmam eva āśu vīraḥ  /

original: gupto'tha pārthena raṇe ṇsikhaṇḍī bhīṣmaṃ samāsādya śarairatāḍayat /
analyzed: guptā utha pārthena raṇe ṇsikhaṇḍī bhīṣmam samāsādya śaraiḥ atāḍayat

original: bhīṣmaḥ strītvaṃ tasya jānan na tasmai mumoca bāṇān sa tu taṃ tutoda / 25.118 /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ strī tvam tasya jānan na tasmai mumoca bāṇān sa tu tam tutoda  /

original: śikhaṇḍinaṃ vārayāmāsa bāṇairdurmarṣaṇo'marṣaṇavihvalekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinam vārayāmāsa bāṇaiḥ durmarṣaṇa umarṣaṇa vihvala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: nātyetumenamaśakacchikhaṇḍī duḥ śāsanaḥ pārthamavārayat tadā / 25.119 /
analyzed: na atyetum enam aśakat śikhaṇḍī duḥ śāsanaḥ pārtham avārayat tadā

original: sa lokavīro'pi durātmanā'munā ruddho'śakannainamatītya yātum /
analyzed: sa loka vīraḥ upi durātmanā amunā ruddhaḥ śakat na enam atītya yātum

original: bhīṣmaṃ pārthaḥ sāyakāṇscāsya tasmin sasajjire parvateṣvapyasaktāḥ / 25.120 /
analyzed: bhīṣmam pārthaḥ sāyakān ca asya tasmin sasajjire parvateṣu api asaktāḥ

original: amarṣayuktau cirameva vīrāvayuddhyatāmarjunadhārtarāṣṭrau /
analyzed: amarṣa yuktau ciram eva vīrau ayuddhyatām arjuna dhārtarāṣṭrau

original: samaṃ tadāsīnmahadadbhutaṃ ca divaukasāṃ paśyatāṃ bhūbhṛt āṃ ca / 25.121 /
analyzed: samam tat āsīt mahat adbhutam ca divaukasām paśyatām bhūbhṛt āṃ ca

original: ccclix.tadā virāṭadrupadau kuntibhojaṃ kṛṣṇāsutān kekayāṃ ścekitānam /
analyzed: virāṭa drupadau kuntibhojam kṛṣṇā sutān kekayām ścekitānam

original: bhūriḥ śalaḥ somadatto vikarṇaḥ sakekayā vārayāmāsuruccaiḥ / 25.122 /
analyzed: bhūriḥ śalaḥ somadattaḥ vikarṇaḥ sa kekayāḥ vārayāmāsuḥ uccais

original: jitvaiva tāṃ ste'bhiyayuśca bhīṣmaṃ tato'rjuno'tītya duḥ śāsanaṃ ca /
analyzed: jitvā eva tām duḥ śāsanam ca

original: bhīṣmaṃ śarairārcchadaripramāthibhiḥ śikhaṇḍinaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrād vimucya / 25.123 /
analyzed: bhīṣmam śaraiḥ ārcchat ari pramāthibhiḥ śikhaṇḍinam dhārtarāṣṭrāt vimucya

original: sa taiḥ samastairbahuśastrapūgairbhṛśaṃ marmasvarditaścāpamuktaiḥ /
analyzed: sa taiḥ samastaiḥ bahu śastra pūgaiḥ bhṛśam marmasu arditaḥ cāpa muktaiḥ

original: śaraiḥ samastān virathāṃ ścakāra śainaiyapāñcālyayudhiṣṭhirādyān / 25.124 /
analyzed: śaraiḥ samastān ścakāra śainaiya pāñcālya yudhiṣṭhira ādyān

original: sa cedipāñcālakarūṇsamukhyān rathottamān pañcaviṃ śatsahasrān /
analyzed: sa cedi pāñcāla karūṣ sa mukhyān ratha uttamān pañcavim śat sahasrān

original: sampreṣayāmāsa yamāya bāṇairyugāntakāle'gniriva pravṛddhaḥ / 25.125 /
analyzed: sampreṣayāmāsa yamāya bāṇaiḥ yugānta kāla agniḥ iva pravṛddhaḥ

original: nirīkṣya taṃ sūryamivā'tapantaṃ sañcodito vāsudevena pārthaḥ /
analyzed: nirīkṣya tam sūryam iva ātapantam sañcoditaḥ vāsudevena pārthaḥ

original: ciccheda tatkārmukaṃ lokavīro raṇe'rddhacandreṇa sacānyadādade / 25.126 /
analyzed: ciccheda tat kārmukam loka vīraḥ raṇa īrddhacandreṇa sacā anyat ādade

original: ciccheda taccaivamaṣṭau dhanūṃ ṣi śaktiṃ ca carmāsivaraṃ parāṇi ca/
analyzed: ciccheda tat ca evam aṣṭau dhanūm śaktim ca carma asi varam parāṇi ca

original: dhanūṃ ṣi dattāni nṛbhirnṛpasya sarvāṇi ciccheda sa pākaśāsaniḥ / 25.127 /
analyzed: dhanūm si dattāni nṛbhiḥ nṛpasya sarvāṇi ciccheda sa pākaśāsanaḥ

original: tataḥ śaraiḥ sūryakaraprakāṇsairvivyādha sarve ca yudhiṣṭhirādyāḥ /
analyzed: tatas śaraiḥ sūrya kara prakāṇsaiḥ vivyādha sarve ca yudhiṣṭhira ādyāḥ

original: tairardito nyapatad bhūtel . e saprāṇān dadhārāpi tathottarāyaṇāt / 25.128 /
analyzed: taiḥ arditaḥ nyapatat sa prāṇān dadhāra api tathā uttarāyaṇāt

original: nipātite'smin mārutidroṇamukhyān vidrāpya tatrā'gamadāṇsu te'pi /
analyzed: nipātite ismin māruti droṇa mukhyān vidrāpya tatra agamat te pi

original: tadāyudhāni praṇidhāya vīrāḥ pārthāḥ pare cainamupāsadan sma / 25.129 /
analyzed: tadā āyudhāni praṇidhāya vīrāḥ pārthāḥ pare ca enam upāsadan sma

original: praṇamyataṃ tadvacanāt samīyustasmin dine śibirāṇyeva sarve /
analyzed: tad vacanāt samīyuḥ tasmin dine śibirāṇi eva sarve

original: pare dine sarva evopatasthurbhīṣmaṃ yadūnāmpatinā sahaiva / 25.130 /
analyzed: pare dine sarve eva upatasthuḥ bhīṣmam yadūnām patinā saha eva

original: sa pūrvadivase pārthadattabāṇopabarhaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa pūrva divase pārtha datta bāṇa upabarhaṇaḥ

original: tadā'pi tṛṭparīt ātmā yogyaṃ peyamayācata / 25.131 /
analyzed: tadā api tṛṣ parīt ātmā yogyam peyam ayācata  /

original: dhārtarāṣṭrairavijñātaṃ tadabhijñāya vāsaviḥ /
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ avijñātam tat abhijñāya vāsaviḥ

original: vāruṇāstreṇa bhittvā sabhūmiṃ vāri sugandhi ca /
analyzed: vāruṇa astreṇa bhittvā sa bhūmim vāri sugandhi ca

original: ūrdhvadhāramadādāsye tarpito'nena so'vadat / 25.132 /
analyzed: ūrdhva dhāram adādāsye tarpita ūnena sā uvadat

original: ccclx.yādṛśyastrajñatā pārthe dṛṣṭā'tra kurunandanāḥ /
analyzed: pārthe dṛṣṭā atra kuru nandanāḥ

original: yādṛg bāhvorbalaṃ bhīme saṃ yugeṣu punaḥ punaḥ / 25.133 /
analyzed: yādṛś bāhvoḥ balam bhīme sam yugeṣu punar punar

original: yādṛśaṃ caiva māhātmyamanantamajaraṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: yādṛśam ca eva māhātmyam anantam ajaram hareḥ

original: vijñātaṃ sarvalokasya sabhāyāṃ dṛṣṭameva ca / 25.134 /
analyzed: vijñātam sarva lokasya sabhāyām dṛṣṭam eva ca

original: upāramata tad yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ santu bhūmipāḥ /
analyzed: upāramata tat yuddham sukhinaḥ santu bhūmipāḥ

original: yathocitavibhaktāṃ ca bhuṅgdhvaṃ bhūpāḥ sadā bhuvam /
analyzed: yathā ucita vibhaktām ca bhuṅgdhvam bhūpāḥ sadā bhuvam

original: ityuktaḥ prayayau tūṣṇīṃ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ svakaṃ gṛham / 25.135 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prayayau tūṣṇīm dhārtarāṣṭraḥ svakam gṛham

original: vyāsadattoruvijñānāt sañjayādakhilaṃ pitā /
analyzed: vyāsadatta uru vijñānāt sañjayāt akhilam pitā

original: śrutvā tadā paryatapyat pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇadevatāḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā tadā paryatapyat pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ

original: mumuduḥ śibiraṃ prāpya sarve kṛṣṇānumoditāḥ / 25.136 /
analyzed: mumuduḥ śibiram prāpya sarve kṛṣṇa anumoditāḥ

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
bhīṣmapāto nāma pañcaviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmapātaḥ nāma pañcavim śaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: ccclxi.(nārāyaṇāstropaśamanam)
atha ṣaḍviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha ṣaḍvim śaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / athākhilānāṃ pṛthivīpatīnāmācāryamagryaṃ rathināṃ suvidyam /
analyzed: om atha akhilānām pṛthivīpatīnām ācāryam agryam rathinām su vidyam

original: rāmasya viśvādhipateḥ suśiṣyaṃ cakre camūpaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraputraḥ / 26.1 /
analyzed: rāmasya viśva adhipateḥ su śiṣyam cakre camūpam dhṛtarāṣṭra putraḥ

original: karṇo'pi bhīṣmānumato dhanuṣmān yuddhodyato'bhūt tadasatkṛtaḥ purā /
analyzed: karṇaḥ api bhīṣma anumataḥ dhanuṣmān yuddha udyataḥ bhūt tad asatkṛtaḥ purā

original: tasmin sthite'nāttadhanustadaiva rathaṃ samāsthāya guruṃ samanvayāt / 26.2 /
analyzed: tasmin sthitena ātta dhanuḥ tadā eva ratham samāsthāya gurum samanvayāt

original: droṇo vṛto dhārtarāṣṭreṇa dharmasutagrahe tena kṛte pratiśrave /
analyzed: droṇaḥ vṛtaḥ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa dharmasuta grahe tena kṛte pratiśrave

original: j ñātvā yattāḥ pāṇḍavāstaṃ samīyuryuddhāya tatrābhavadugrayuddham / 26.3 /
analyzed: ñātvā yattāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ tam samīyuḥ yuddhāya tatra abhavat ugra yuddham  /

original: patatribhistatra dudhāva śātravān droṇo dhanurmaṇḍalamantranissṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: patatribhiḥ tatra dudhāva śātravān droṇaḥ dhanuḥ maṇḍala mantra nissṛtaiḥ

original: tamāsasādā'śu vṛkodaro nadaṃ stamāsadan drauṇikṛpau ca madrarāṭ/ 26.4 /
analyzed: tam āsasāda āśu vṛkodaraḥ nadam stam āsadan drauṇi kṛpau ca madra rāj

original: sa tān vidhūyābhyapatad raṇe'graṇīrdroṇaṃ tamanvārjunirabhyayāt parān /
analyzed: sa tān vidhūya abhyapatat raṇegraṇīḥ droṇam tam anu ārjuniḥ abhyayāt parān

original: vavāra taṃ madrapatistayorabhūd raṇo mahāṃ statra gadāṃ samādade /
analyzed: vavāra tam madra patiḥ tayoḥ abhūt raṇaḥ mahān statra gadām samādade

original: śalyo'tha bhīmo'bhiyayau gadādharastametayoratra babhūva saṅgaraḥ / 26.5 /
analyzed: śalyaḥ atha bhīmaḥ abhiyayau gadā dharaḥ tam etayoḥ atra babhūva saṅgaraḥ

original: ubhāvajeyau gadināmanuttamāvatulyavīryau pravarau balīyasām /
analyzed: ubhau ajeyau gadinām anuttamau atulya vīryau pravarau balīyasām

original: viceratuścitratamaṃ prapaśyatāṃ manoharaṃ t āvabhinardamānau /
analyzed: viceratuḥ citratamam prapaśyatām manoharam

original: gadāprapātāṅkitavajragātrau dadarśa loko'khila eva tau raṇe / 26.6 /
analyzed: gadā prapāta aṅkita vajra gātrau dadarśa loka ukhilaḥ eva tau raṇe  /

original: gadābhighātena vṛkodarasya vicetanaḥ prāpatadatra madrarāṭ/
analyzed: gadā abhighātena vṛkodarasya vicetanaḥ prāpatat atra madra rāj

original: bhīmo'pi kopāt pracalatpadaḥ kṣitau nidhāya jānuṃ sahasotthitaḥ kṣaṇāt / 26.7 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ upi kopāt pracalat padaḥ kṣitau nidhāya jānum sahasā utthitaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: vicetanaṃ patitaṃ madrarājaṃ vilokya bhīmaṃ ca tamāhvayantam /
analyzed: vicetanam patitam madra rājam vilokya bhīmam ca tam āhvayantam

original: rathaṃ samāropya janasya paśyataḥ puraśca bhīmasya kṛpo'pajagmivān / 26.8 /
analyzed: ratham samāropya janasya paśyataḥ puras ca bhīmasya kṛpa upajagmivān

original: vijitya madrādhipamojasā'rihā nadan rathaṃ prāpya nijaṃ sa mārutiḥ /
analyzed: vijitya madra adhipam ojasā ari hā nadan ratham prāpya nijam sa mārutiḥ

original: vyadrāvayad bāṇagaṇaiḥ pareṣāmanīkinīṃ droṇasamakṣameva / 26.9 /
analyzed: vyadrāvayat bāṇa gaṇaiḥ pareṣām anīkinīm droṇa samakṣam eva

original: vidrāvayatyāṇsu kurūn vṛkodare vidhūya saubhadramukhān sasātyakīn /
analyzed: vidrāvayati āṇsu kurūn vṛkodare vidhūya saubhadra mukhān sa sātyakīn

original: droṇo'bhipede nṛpatiṃ gṛhītuṃ tamāsasādā'śu dhanañjayo rathī / 26.10 /
analyzed: droṇaḥ abhipede nṛpatim gṛhītum tam āsasāda āśu dhanañjayaḥ rathī

original: ccclxii.sa vāsudevaprayate rathe sthitaḥ śaraiḥ śarīrāntakaraiḥ samantataḥ /
analyzed: vāsudeva prayate rathe sthitaḥ śaraiḥ śarīra anta karaiḥ samantataḥ

original: nihatya nāgāṇsvanarān pravartayannadṛśyatā'śveva ca śoṇit āpagāḥ / 26.11 /
analyzed: nihatya pravartayan adṛśyata aśvā iva ca śoṇit āpagāḥ

original: nihanyamānāsu kirīṭinā camūṣvārakṣite dharmasute tathā'padaḥ /
analyzed: nihanyamānāsu kirīṭinā camūṣu ārakṣite dharmasute tathā āpadaḥ

original: camūṃ ca bhīmārjunabāṇabhagnāṃ droṇo'pahṛtyāpayayau niśāgame / 26.12 /
analyzed: camūm ca bhīma arjuna bāṇa bhagnām droṇa upahṛtya apayayau niśā āgame

original: sa dhārtarāṣṭreṇa yudhiṣṭhirāgrahāt saṃ śrāvitaḥ krūravaco niśāyām /
analyzed: sa dhārtarāṣṭreṇa yudhiṣṭhira āgrahāt sam śrāvitaḥ krūra vacaḥ niśāyām

original: jagāda dūraṃ samarād vinīyatāṃ pārthastato dharmasutaṃ grahīṣye / 26.13 /
analyzed: jagāda dūram samarāt vinīyatām pārthaḥ tatas dharmasutam grahīṣye

original: tataḥ suśarmā sahito mahārathaiḥ saṃ śaptakairdūrataraṃ praṇetum /
analyzed: tatas suśarmā sahitaḥ mahā rathaiḥ sam śaptakaiḥ dūrataram praṇetum

original: yuddhāya bhīmānujamāṇsu klṛpto duryodhanenomiti so'pyavādīt / 26.14 /
analyzed: yuddhāya klṛptaḥ duryodhanena ūm iti saḥ upi avādīt  /

original: samāhvayāmāsurathārjunaṃ te prātarhutāṇsasya diśaṃ raṇāya /
analyzed: samāhvayāmāsuḥ atha arjunam te prātarhutāṇsasya diśam raṇāya

original: ayodhayat tān sa ca tatra gatvā bhīmo gajānīkamathātra cāvadhīt / 26.15 /
analyzed: ayodhayat tān sa ca tatra gatvā bhīmaḥ gaja anīkam atha atra ca avadhīt

original: nihanyamāneṣu gajeṣu sarvaśo vidrāpyamāṇeṣvakhileṣu rājasu /
analyzed: nihanyamāneṣu gajeṣu sarvaśas vidrāpyamāṇeṣu akhileṣu rājasu

original: prāgjyotiṣo dhārtarāṣṭrārthitastaṃ samāsadat supratīkena dhanvī / 26.16 /
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣaḥ dhārtarāṣṭra arthitaḥ tam samāsadat supratīkena dhanvī

original: vibhīṣit āḥ supratīkena bhīmahayā na tasthustadanu sma sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: vibhīṣit āḥ supratīkena bhīma hayāḥ na tasthuḥ tadanu sma sātyakiḥ

original: saubhadramukhyāṇsca gajaṃ tamabhyayuścikṣepa teṣāṃ sa rathānathāmbare / 26.17 /
analyzed: saubhadra mukhyān ca gajam tam abhyayus cikṣepa teṣām sa rathān atha ambare

original: śaineyapūrveṣu rathojjhiteṣu bhūmāvavaplutya kathañcideva /
analyzed: śaineya pūrveṣu ratha ujjhiteṣu bhūmau avaplutya kathañcid eva

original: sthiteṣu bhīme ca vibhīṣit āṇsvān saṃ yamya yuddhyatyapi kṛṣṇa aikṣat / 26.18 /
analyzed: sthiteṣu bhīme ca vibhīṣit āṇsvān sam yamya yuddhyati api kṛṣṇaḥ aikṣat

original: saṅkleśito vaiṣṇavāstraṃ pramuñcet prāgjyotiṣo bhīmasene tato'ham /
analyzed: saṅkleśitaḥ vaiṣṇava astram pramuñcet prāgjyotiṣaḥ bhīmasene tatas ham

original: yāmyārjunenaiva tadastramātmanaḥ svīkartumanyena varādadhāryam / 26.19 /
analyzed: yāmya arjunena eva tat astram ātmanaḥ svīkartum anyena varāt adhāryam

original: iti sma sañcintya sahārjunena tatrā'yayāvatha pārthaṃ trigartāḥ /
analyzed: iti sma sañcintya saha arjunena tatra āyayau atha pārtham trigartāḥ

original: nyavārayaṃ stvāṣṭramastraṃ sa teṣu vyavāsṛjanmohanāyā'śu vīraḥ / 26.20 /
analyzed: nyavārayam stvāṣṭram astram sa teṣu vyavāsṛjat mohanāya āśu vīraḥ

original: tadastravīryeṇa vimohitāste parasparaṃ kṛṣṇapārthāviti sma /
analyzed: tad astra vīryeṇa vimohitāḥ te parasparam kṛṣṇa pārthau iti sma

original: jaghnustadā vāsavistān visṛjya prāgjyotiṣaṃ hantumihābhyagād drutam / 26.21 /
analyzed: jaghnuḥ tadā vāsaviḥ tān visṛjya prāgjyotiṣam hantum iha abhyagāt drutam

original: visṛjya bhīmaṃ sa ca pārthameva yayau gajaskandhagato gajaṃ tam /
analyzed: visṛjya bhīmam sa ca pārtham eva yayau gaja skandha gataḥ gajam tam

original: pracodayāmāsa rathāya tasya cakre'pasavyaṃ harirenamāṇsu / 26.22 /
analyzed: pracodayāmāsa rathāya tasya cakre pasavyam

original: ccclxiii.manojavenaiva rathe pareṇa sambhrāmyamāṇe natu taṃ gajaḥ saḥ /
analyzed: manojavena eva rathe pareṇa sambhrāmyamāṇe na tu tam gajaḥ saḥ

original: prāptuṃ śaśākātha śaraiḥ sutīkṣṇairabhyarddayāmāsa nṛpaṃ sa vāsaviḥ / 26.23 /
analyzed: prāptum śaśāka atha śaraiḥ su tīkṣṇaiḥ abhyarddayāmāsa nṛpam sa vāsaviḥ

original: astraiśca śastraiḥ suciraṃ nṛvīrāvayuddhyatāṃ tau balināṃ prabarhau /
analyzed: astraiḥ ca śastraiḥ su ciram nṛ vīrau ayuddhyatām tau balinām prabarhau

original: atho cakartāsya dhanuḥ sa pārthaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāstraṃ ca tadā'ṅkuśe'karot / 26.24 /
analyzed: atho cakarta asya dhanuḥ sa pārthaḥ sa vaiṣṇava astram ca tadā aṅkuśekarot

original: tasminnastre tena tadā pramukte dadhāra tad vāsudevo'mitaujāḥ /
analyzed: tasmin astre tena tadā pramukte dadhāra tat vāsudeva umita ojāḥ

original: tadaṃ sadeśasya tu vaijayantī babhūva mālā'khilalokabhartuḥ / 26.25 /
analyzed: sa deśasya tu vaijayantī babhūva mālā akhila loka bhartuḥ

original: dṛṣṭvaiva tad dhāritamacyutena pārthaḥ kimarthaṃ vidhṛtaṃ tvayeti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tat dhāritam acyutena pārthaḥ kimartham vidhṛtam tvayā iti

original: ūce tamāhā'śu jagannivāso mayā'khilaṃ dhāryate sarvadaiva / 26.26 /
analyzed: ūce tam āha āśu jagannivāsaḥ mayā akhilam dhāryate sarvadā eva

original: na mādṛśo'nyo'sti kutaḥ paro mat so'haṃ caturdhā jagato hitāya /
analyzed: na mādṛśaḥ ūnyaḥ asti kutas paraḥ mat sā uham caturdhā jagataḥ hitāya

original: sthito'smi mokṣapral . ayasthitīnāṃ sṛṣṭeṇsca kartā kramaśaḥ svamūrtibhiḥ /
analyzed: sthitaḥ asmi aya sthitīnām kartā kramaśas sva mūrtibhiḥ

original: sa vāsudevādicatuḥ svarūpaḥ sthito'niruddho hṛdi cākhilasya / 26.27 /
analyzed: sa vāsudeva ādi catuḥ svarūpaḥ sthitaḥ niruddhaḥ hṛdi ca akhilasya  /

original: sa eva ca kroḍatanuḥ parā'haṃ bhūmipriyārthaṃ narakāya cādām /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca kroḍa tanuḥ parā aham bhūmi priya artham narakāya ca adām

original: astraṃ madīyaṃ varamasya cādāmavadhyatāṃ yāvadastraṃ sasūnoḥ / 26.28 /
analyzed: astram madīyam varam asya ca adām avadhya tām yāvat astram sa sūnoḥ

original: astrasya cānyo natu kaścidasti yo'vadhya etasya kutaśca mattaḥ /
analyzed: astrasya ca anyaḥ na tu kaścid asti yaḥ vadhyaḥ etasya kutas ca mattaḥ

original: iti sma tenaiva mayā dhṛtaṃ tadastraṃ tadenaṃ jahi cāstrahīnam / 26.29 /
analyzed: iti sma tena eva mayā dhṛtam tat astram tat enam jahi ca astra hīnam

original: ityuktamākarṇya sa keśavena sammantrya bāṇaṃ hṛdaye mumoca /
analyzed: iti uktam ākarṇya sa keśavena sammantrya bāṇam hṛdaye mumoca

original: prāgjyotiṣasyāparamuttamaṃ śaraṃ gajendrakumbhasthala āṇsvamajjayat / 26.30 /
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣasya aparam uttamam śaram gaja indra kumbha sthale āṇsvamajjayat  /

original: ubhau ca tau petaturadrisannibhau mahendravajrābhihatāvivā'śu /
analyzed: ubhau ca tau petatuḥ adri sannibhau mahā indra vajra abhihatau iva āśu

original: nihatya tau vāsavirugrapauruṣo mumoda sādhu svajanābhipūjitaḥ / 26.31 /
analyzed: nihatya tau vāsaviḥ ugra pauruṣaḥ mumoda sādhu sva jana abhipūjitaḥ

original: athācalaṃ vṛṣakaṃ caiva hatvā kanīyasau śakunestaṃ ca bāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: athā acalam vṛṣakam ca eva hatvā kanīyasau śakuneḥ tam ca bāṇaiḥ

original: vivyādha māyāmasṛjat sa tāṃ ca vijñānāstreṇā'śu nāṇsāya cakre / 26.32 /
analyzed: vivyādha māyām asṛjat sa tām ca vijñāna astreṇa āśu cakre  /

original: sa naṣṭamāyaḥ prādravat pāpakarmā tataḥ pārthaḥ śarapūgaiścamūṃ t ām /
analyzed: sa naṣṭa māyaḥ prādravat pāpa karmā tatas pārthaḥ śara pūgaiḥ camūm

original: vidrāvayāmāsa tadā guroḥ suto māhiṣmatīpatimājau jaghāna / 26.33 /
analyzed: vidrāvayāmāsa tadā guroḥ sutaḥ māhiṣmatī patim ājau jaghāna  /

original: ccclxiv.tadā bhīmastasya nihatya vāhān vyadrāvayad dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ ca /
analyzed: tadā bhīmaḥ tasya nihatya vāhān vyadrāvayat dhārtarāṣṭrīm camūm ca

original: bhīmārjunābhyāṃ hanyamānāṃ camūṃ t āṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ kṣipramapājahāra / 26.34 /
analyzed: bhīma arjunābhyām hanyamānām camūm dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ kṣipram apājahāra  /

original: prāgjyotiṣe nihate'thāgrahācca yudhiṣṭhirasyātiviṣaṇṇarūpaḥ /
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣe nihata ithāgrahāt ca yudhiṣṭhirasya ati viṣaṇṇa rūpaḥ

original: duryodhano'śrāvayad dīnavākyānyatra droṇaṃ so'pi nṛpaṃ jagāda / 26.35 /
analyzed: dīna vākyāni atra droṇam saḥ api nṛpam jagāda  /

original: pārthe gate śvo nṛpatiṃ grahīṣye nihanmi vā tatsadṛśaṃ tadīyam /
analyzed: pārthe gate śvas nṛpatim grahīṣye nihanmi vā tad sadṛśam tadīyam

original: iti pratijñāṃ sa vidhāya bhūyaḥ prātaryayau yuddhamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ / 26.36 /
analyzed: iti pratijñām sa vidhāya bhūyas prātar yayau yuddham ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ

original: padmavyūhaṃ vyūhya parairabhedyaṃ varād viṣṇostasya mantraṃ hyajaptvā /
analyzed: padma vyūham vyūhya paraiḥ abhedyam varāt viṣṇoḥ tasya mantram hi a japtvā

original: pārthāṇsca taṃ prāpurṛte'rjunena saṃ śaptakairyuyudhe so'pi vīraḥ / 26.37 /
analyzed: pārthān ca tam prāpuḥ ṛteḥ junena sam śaptakaiḥ yuyudhe saḥ upi vīraḥ

original: pārthā vyūhaṃ tu taṃ prāpya nāṇsakan bhettumudyatāḥ /
analyzed: pārthāḥ vyūham tu tam prāpya bhettum udyatāḥ

original: j ānaṃ śca pratibhāyogāt kāmyaṃ naivājapanmanum / 26.38 /
analyzed: pratibhā yogāt kāmyam na eva ajapat manum  /

original: bhīmo yudhiṣṭhirastatra tajjñaṃ saubhadramabravīt /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tatra tajjñam saubhadram abravīt

original: bhindhi vyūhamimaṃ t āta vayaṃ tvāmanuyāmahe / 26.39 /
analyzed: bhindhi vyūham imam t āta vayam tvām anuyāmahe

original: sa evamukto rathināṃ prabarho viveśa bhittvā dviṣatāṃ camūṃ t ām /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ rathinām prabarhaḥ viveśa bhittvā dviṣatām camūm

original: anveva taṃ vāyusutādayaśca vivikṣavaḥ saindhavenaiva ruddhāḥ / 26.40 /
analyzed: anu eva tam vāyusuta ādayaḥ ca vivikṣavaḥ saindhavena eva ruddhāḥ

original: vareṇa rudrasya niruddhyamāno jayadrathenātra vṛkodarastu /
analyzed: vareṇa rudrasya niruddhyamānaḥ jayadrathena atra vṛkodaraḥ tu

original: viṣṇorabhīṣṭaṃ vadhamārjunestadā vijñāya śakto'pi nacātyavartata / 26.41 /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ abhīṣṭam vadham ārjuneḥ tadā vijñāya śaktaḥ api na ca atyavartata

original: jayadrathasthena vṛṣadhvajena prayuddhyamāneṣu vṛkodarādiṣu /
analyzed: jayadratha sthena vṛṣadhvajena prayuddhyamāneṣu vṛkodara ādiṣu

original: praviśya vīraḥ sa dhanañjayātmajo vilol . ayāmāsa parorusenām / 26.42 /
analyzed: praviśya vīraḥ sa dhanañjaya ātmajaḥ para ūru senām

original: sa droṇaduryodhanakarṇaṇsalyairdroṇyagraṇībhiḥ kṛtavarmayuktaiḥ /
analyzed: sa droṇa duryodhana karṇaṇsalyaiḥ droṇī agraṇībhiḥ kṛta varma yuktaiḥ

original: ruddhaścacārāribaleṣvabhītaḥ śirāṃ si kṛntaṃ stadanubratānām / 26.43 /
analyzed: ruddhaḥ cacāra ari baleṣu abhītaḥ śirām si kṛntan stad anubratānām

original: sa lakṣaṇaṃ rājasutaṃ prasahya pituḥ samīpe'nayadāṇsu mṛtyave /
analyzed: sa lakṣaṇam rāja sutam prasahya pituḥ samīpena ayat āṇsu mṛtyave

original: bṛhadbalaṃ cottamavīryakarmā varaṃ rathānāmayutaṃ ca patribhiḥ / 26.44 /
analyzed: bṛhat balam ca uttama vīrya karmā varam rathānām ayutam ca patribhiḥ

original: droṇādayastaṃ harikopabhīt āḥ pratyakṣato hantumaśaknuvantaḥ /
analyzed: droṇa ādayaḥ tam hari kopa bhīt āḥ pratyakṣataḥ hantum aśaknuvantaḥ

original: sammantrya karṇaṃ purato nidhāya cakrurvicāpāṇsvarathaṃ kṣaṇena / 26.45 /
analyzed: sammantrya karṇam puratas nidhāya cakruḥ vicāpān sva ratham kṣaṇena

original: ccclxv.karṇo dhanustasya kṛpaśca sārathī droṇo hayānāṇsu vidhamya sāyakaiḥ /
analyzed: karṇaḥ dhanuḥ tasya kṛpaḥ ca sārathī droṇaḥ hayān āṇsu vidhamya sāyakaiḥ

original: sacarmakhaḍgaṃ rathacakramasya praṇudya hastasthitameva tasthuḥ / 26.46 /
analyzed: sa carma khaḍgam ratha cakram asya praṇudya hasta sthitam eva tasthuḥ  /

original: bhīteṣu kṛṣṇādatha tadvadhāya teṣvāsasādā'śu gadāyudhaṃ gadī /
analyzed: bhīteṣu kṛṣṇāt atha tad vadhāya teṣu āsasāda āśu gadā āyudham gadī

original: dauḥ śāsanistau yugapacca mamraturgadābhighātena mitho'tipauruṣau / 26.47 /
analyzed: dauḥ śāsaniḥ tau yugapad ca mamratuḥ gadā abhighātena mithas uti pauruṣau

original: tasmin hate śatruravaṃ niśamya harṣodbhavaṃ mārutirugravikramaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin hate śatru ravam niśamya harṣa udbhavam mārutiḥ ugra vikramaḥ

original: vijitya sarvānapi saindhavādīn yudhiṣṭhirasyānumate nyaṣīdat / 26.48 /
analyzed: vijitya sarvān api saindhava ādīn yudhiṣṭhirasya anumate nyaṣīdat  /

original: vyāsastadā tānamitātmavaibhavo yudhiṣṭhirādīn glapitānabodhayat /
analyzed: vyāsaḥ tadā tān amita ātma vaibhavaḥ yudhiṣṭhira ādīn glapitān abodhayat

original: vijitya saṃ śaptakapūgamugro niśāgame vāsavirāpa sācyutaḥ / 26.49 /
analyzed: vijitya sam śaptaka pūgam ugraḥ niśā āgame vāsaviḥ āpa sa acyutaḥ

original: niśamya putrasya vadhaṃ bhṛśārtaḥ pratiśravaṃ so'tha cakāra vīraḥ /
analyzed: niśamya putrasya vadham bhṛśa ārtaḥ pratiśravam saḥ utha cakāra vīraḥ

original: jayadrathasyaiva vadhe niśāyāṃ svapne'nayat taṃ giriśāntikaṃ hariḥ / 26.50 /
analyzed: jayadrathasya eva vadhe niśāyām svapnena ayat tam giriśa antikam hariḥ

original: svayamevākhilajagadrakṣādyamitaśaktimān /
analyzed: svayam eva akhila jagat rakṣā ādi amita śaktimān

original: apyacyuto gurudvārā prasādakṛdahaṃ tviti / 26.51 /
analyzed: api acyutaḥ guru dvārā prasāda kṛt aham tu iti

original: j ñāpayan phalgunasyāstraguruṃ giriśamañjasā /
analyzed: ñāpayan phalgunasya astra gurum giriśam añjasā

original: prāpayitvainamevaitatprasādādastramudbaṇam /
analyzed: prāpayitvā enam eva etat prasādāt astram udbaṇam

original: cakre tadarthamevāsya rakṣāṃ cakre tadātmikām / 26.52 /
analyzed: cakre tad artham eva asya rakṣām cakre tad ātmikām

original: sāntvayitvā subhadrāṃ ca gatvopaplāvyamacyutaḥ /
analyzed: sāntvayitvā subhadrām ca gatvā upaplāvyam acyutaḥ

original: yojayitvā rathaṃ prātaḥ sārjuno yuddhamabhyayāt / 26.53 /
analyzed: yojayitvā ratham prātar sa arjunaḥ yuddham abhyayāt

original: śrutvā pratijñāṃ puruhūtasūnorduryodhanenārthitaḥ sindhurājam /
analyzed: śrutvā pratijñām puruhūta sūnoḥ duryodhanena arthitaḥ sindhurājam

original: trātāsmyahaṃ sarvatheti pratijñāṃ kṛtvā droṇo vyūhamabhedyamātanot / 26.54 /
analyzed: trātāsmi aham sarvathā iti pratijñām kṛtvā droṇaḥ vyūham abhedyam ātanot

original: sa divyamagryaṃ śakaṭābjacakraṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ vyūhamukhe vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: sa divyam agryam śakaṭa abja cakram kṛtvā svayam vyūha mukhe vyavasthitaḥ

original: pṛṣṭhe karṇadrauṇikṛpaiḥ saśalyairjayadrathaṃ guptamadhāt paraiśca / 26.55 /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe karṇa drauṇi kṛpaiḥ sa śalyaiḥ jayadratham guptam adhāt paraiḥ ca

original: athārjuno divyarathoparisthitaḥ surakṣitaḥ keśavenāvyayena /
analyzed: atha arjunaḥ divya ratha upari sthitaḥ su rakṣitaḥ keśavena avyayena

original: vijitya durmarṣaṇamagrato'bhyayād droṇaṃ sudhanvā gurumugrapauruṣaḥ / 26.56 /
analyzed: vijitya durmarṣaṇam agratas abhyayāt droṇam sudhanvā gurum ugra pauruṣaḥ

original: ccclxvi.pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tamāṇsvagāt tataḥ kālātyayaṃ tveva viśaṅkamānaḥ /
analyzed: vipradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatas kāla atyayam tu eva viśaṅkamānaḥ

original: rathaṃ manovegamathānayaddhariryathā ṇsarāḥ peturamuṣya pṛṣṭhataḥ / 26.57 /
analyzed: ratham manaḥ vegam atha anayat hariḥ yathā ṇsarāḥ petuḥ amuṣya pṛṣṭhatas

original: vijitya hārdikyamathāprayatnaḥ sa indrasūnuḥ praviveśa tad balam /
analyzed: vijitya hārdikyam atha aprayatnaḥ saḥ indra sūnuḥ praviveśa tat balam

original: vilol . ayāmāsa ca sāyakottamairyathā gajendro nal . inīṃ baloddhataḥ / 26.58 /
analyzed: ca sāyaka uttamaiḥ yathā gaja indraḥ inīm bala uddhataḥ  /

original: sa uccakāṇse'tiratho rathottame savāsudevo hariṇā yathendraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ uccakān seti rathaḥ ratha uttame sa vāsudevaḥ hariṇā yathā indraḥ

original: cakarta cogro dviṣatāṃ śirāṃ si śaraiḥ śarīrāntakaraiḥ samantataḥ / 26.59 /
analyzed: cakarta ca ugraḥ dviṣatām si śaraiḥ śarīra anta karaiḥ samantataḥ

original: dṛḍhāyumacyutāyuṃ ca hatvā vindānuvindakau /
analyzed: dṛḍhāyum acyutāyum ca hatvā vinda anuvindakau

original: śarābhyāṃ preṣayāmāsa yamāya vijayo yudhi / 26.60 /
analyzed: śarābhyām preṣayāmāsa yamāya vijayaḥ yudhi  /

original: sudakṣiṇaṃ ca kāmbojaṃ nihatyāmbaṣṭhameva ca /
analyzed: sudakṣiṇam ca kāmbojam nihatya ambaṣṭham eva ca

original: śrutāyudhaṃ nadīj ātaṃ varuṇādāsasāda ha /
analyzed: śrutāyudham varuṇāt āsasāda ha

original: yasyādād varuṇo divyāmamoghāṃ mahatīṃ gadām / 26.61 /
analyzed: yasya adāt varuṇaḥ divyām amoghām mahatīm gadām

original: sa tu tena śaraistīkṣṇairarpito virathaṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: sa tu tena śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ arpitaḥ viratham kṣaṇāt

original: cakāra pārthasya rathamāruhyāridharāya tām / 26.62 /
analyzed: cakāra pārthasya ratham āruhya ari dharāya tām

original: gadāṃ cikṣepa sā tasya vāruṇeḥ śira eva tu /
analyzed: gadām cikṣepa sā tasya vāruṇeḥ śiraḥ eva tu

original: bibheda śatadhā ṇsīrṇamastiṣkaḥ so'patad bhuvi / 26.63 /
analyzed: bibheda śatadhā saḥ upatat bhuvi  /

original: ayuddhyantaṃ svagadayā yadi tāḍayasi svayam /
analyzed: ayuddhi antam sva gadayā yadi tāḍayasi svayam

original: tayā viśīrṇamastiṣko mariṣyasi na saṃ śayaḥ /
analyzed: tayā viśīrṇa mastiṣkaḥ mariṣyasi na sam śayaḥ

original: amoghā cānyathā seyaṃ gadā tava bhaviṣyati / 26.64 /
analyzed: amoghā ca anyathā sā iyam gadā tava bhaviṣyati

original: ityabravīt taṃ varuṇaḥ purā tena sa keśave /
analyzed: iti abravīt tam varuṇaḥ purā tena sa keśave

original: ayuddhyati gadākṣepāt tayā ṇsīrṇaṇsirā abhūt / 26.65 /
analyzed: ayuddhi ati gadā ākṣepāt tayā abhūt

original: hateṣu vīreṣu nijeṣu saṅghaśo vidrāviteṣvālul . ite ca sainye /
analyzed: hateṣu vīreṣu nijeṣu saṅghaśas vidrāviteṣu ālul ite ca sainye

original: duryodhano droṇamupetya dīnamuvāca hā pārtha upekṣitastvayā / 26.66 /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ droṇam upetya dīnam uvāca hā pārtha upekṣitaḥ tvayā  /

original: itīrite'bhedyamamuṣya varma baddhvā mahāmantrabalāt sa vipraḥ /
analyzed: iti īrita ibhedyam amuṣya varma baddhvā mahā mantra balāt sa vipraḥ

original: jagāda yenaiva balena pārthairviruddhyase tena hi yāhi phalgunam / 26.67 /
analyzed: jagāda yena eva balena pārthaiḥ viruddhyase tena hi yāhi phalgunam

original: ccclxvii.itīrito dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sa cāpamādāya sauvarṇarathoparisthaḥ /
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sa cāpam ādāya sauvarṇa ratha upari sthaḥ

original: jagāma pārthaṃ tamavārayacca śarairanekairanalaprakāṇsaiḥ / 26.68 /
analyzed: jagāma pārtham tam avārayat ca śaraiḥ anekaiḥ anala prakāṇsaiḥ

original: vivyādha pārtho'pi tamugravegaiḥ śarairna te tasya ca varmabhedam /
analyzed: vivyādha pārthaḥ upi tam ugra vegaiḥ śaraiḥ na te tasya ca varma bhedam

original: cakrustato vāsavirdivyamastraṃ tadvarmabhedāya samādade ruṣā / 26.69 /
analyzed: cakruḥ tatas vāsaviḥ divyam astram tat varma bhedāya samādade ruṣā

original: sandhīyamānaṃ tu guroḥ sutastacciccheda pārtho'tha suyodhanāṇsvān /
analyzed: sandhīyamānam tu guroḥ sutaḥ tat ciccheda pārthaḥ utha

original: hatvā tal . e'viddhyadathainamugrairdrauṇiḥ śaraiḥ pārthamavārayad yudhi / 26.70 /
analyzed: hatvā tat

original: sa drauṇikarṇapramukhairdhanañjayo yuyodha te cainamavārayañcharaiḥ /
analyzed: sa drauṇi karṇa pramukhaiḥ dhanañjayaḥ yuyodha te ca enam avārayan śaraiḥ

original: babhūva yuddhaṃ tadatulyamadbhutaṃ jayadrathārthe'dbhutavīryakarmaṇām / 26.71 /
analyzed: babhūva yuddham tat atulyam adbhutam jayadratha artha idbhuta vīrya karmaṇām

original: pārthe praviṣṭe kurusainyamadhyaṃ droṇo'viśat pāṇḍavasainyamāṇsu /
analyzed: pārthe praviṣṭe kuru sainya madhyam pāṇḍava sainyam āṇsu

original: sa tadrathānīkamudagravegaiḥ śarairvidhūya nyahanacca vīrān / 26.72 /
analyzed: sa tad ratha anīkam udagra vegaiḥ śaraiḥ vidhūya nyahanat ca vīrān

original: sa vīravaryaḥ sthaviro'pi yūnāṃ yuveva madhye pracacāra dhanvinām /
analyzed: sa vīra varyaḥ sthaviraḥ upi yūnām yuvā iva madhye pracacāra dhanvinām

original: prapātayan vīraśirāṃ si bāṇairyudhiṣṭhiraṃ cā'sadadugravīryaḥ / 26.73 /
analyzed: prapātayan vīra śirām si bāṇaiḥ yudhiṣṭhiram ca asadat ugra vīryaḥ

original: nṛpagrahecchuṃ tamavetya satyajinnyavārayad draupadirāṇsu vīryavān /
analyzed: nṛpa graha icchum tam avetya satyajit nyavārayat draupadi rāṇsu vīryavān

original: nivāritastena śiraḥ śareṇa cakarta pāñcālasutasya vipraḥ / 26.74 /
analyzed: nivāritaḥ tena śiraḥ śareṇa cakarta pāñcāla sutasya vipraḥ  /

original: nihatya taṃ vīratamaṃ raṇotkaṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bāṇagaṇaiḥ samārdayat /
analyzed: nihatya tam vīratamam raṇa utkaṭam yudhiṣṭhiram bāṇa gaṇaiḥ samārdayat

original: sa śaktistena vidhāya saṅgaraṃ nirāyudho vyaśvarathaḥ kṛtaḥ kṣaṇāt / 26.75 /
analyzed: sa śaktiḥ tena vidhāya saṅgaram nirāyudhaḥ vyaśva rathaḥ kṛtaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: sa ūrdhvabāhurbhuvi saṃ sthito'pi gṛhītumājau guruṇā'bhipannaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ūrdhvabāhuḥ bhuvi sam sthitaḥ api gṛhītum ājau guruṇā abhipannaḥ

original: mādrīsutasyāvarajasya yānamāruhya vegādapajagmivāṃ stataḥ / 26.76 /
analyzed: mādrī sutasya avarajasya yānam āruhya vegāt apajagmivān

original: droṇaṃ tataḥ śaiśupāliḥ saputro jārāsandhiḥ kāṇsirājaḥ saśaivyaḥ /
analyzed: droṇam tatas śaiśupāliḥ sa putraḥ jārāsandhiḥ kāṇsi rājaḥ sa śaivyaḥ

original: samāsadan kekayāṇscaiva pañca samārdayan bāṇagaṇaiśca sarvaśaḥ / 26.77 /
analyzed: samāsadan kekayān ca eva pañca samārdayan bāṇa gaṇaiḥ ca sarvaśas

original: sa tān krameṇaiva nikṛttakandharāñcharottamairatra vidhāya vipraḥ /
analyzed: sa tān krameṇa eva nikṛtta kandharān śara uttamaiḥ atra vidhāya vipraḥ

original: nināya lokaṃ paramarkamaṇḍalaṃ vrajanti nirbhidya yamūrdhvaretasaḥ / 26.78 /
analyzed: nināya lokam param arka maṇḍalam vrajanti nirbhidya yam ūrdhvaretasaḥ

original: vidhūyamāne guruṇorusainye pṛthāsutānāṃ pṛtanāḥ pareṣām /
analyzed: vidhūyamāne guruṇā uru sainye pṛthā sutānām pṛtanāḥ pareṣām

original: prāyo raṇe mārutasūnunaiva hatapravīrā mṛditāḥ parādravan / 26.79 /
analyzed: prāyas raṇe mārutasūnunā eva hata pravīrāḥ mṛditāḥ parādravan

original: ccclxviii.alambuso nāma tadaiva rākṣasaḥ samāsadanmārutimugrapauruṣam /
analyzed: alambuṣaḥ nāma tadā eva rākṣasaḥ samāsadat mārutim ugra pauruṣam

original: sa pīḍitastena śaraiḥ sutejanaiḥ kṣaṇādadṛśyatvamavāpa māyayā / 26.80 /
analyzed: sa pīḍitaḥ tena śaraiḥ su tejanaiḥ kṣaṇāt adṛśya tvam avāpa māyayā  /

original: so'dṛśyarūpo'nucarānapīḍayad bhīmasya tad vīkṣya cukopa mārutiḥ /
analyzed: sodṛśya rūpa unucarān apīḍayat bhīmasya tat vīkṣya cukopa mārutiḥ

original: astrajñatāmātmanikeśavājñayā sandarśayannāgatadharmasaṅkaṭaḥ / 26.81 /
analyzed: astra jña tām ātma nikeśava ājñayā sandarśayan āgata dharma saṅkaṭaḥ

original: tvāṣṭrāstramādatta sa kāmyakarmahīno'pi bhīmastata utthitāḥ śarāḥ /
analyzed: tvāṣṭra astram ādatta sa kāmya karma hīnaḥ api bhīmaḥ tatas utthitāḥ śarāḥ

original: te bāṇavaryāstadadṛśyavedhino rakṣo vidāryā'viviśurdharātal . am / 26.82 /
analyzed: te bāṇa varyāḥ tad adṛśya vedhinaḥ rakṣaḥ vidārya āviviśuḥ dharā tal

original: taddhanyamānaṃ pravihāya bhīmamapādravad dūrataraṃ subhītam /
analyzed: tat hanyamānam pravihāya bhīmam apādravat dūrataram subhītam

original: tatastu bhīmo dviṣatāṃ varūthinīṃ vidrāvayāmāsa śaraiḥ sumuktaiḥ / 26.83 /
analyzed: tatas tu bhīmaḥ dviṣatām varūthinīm vidrāvayāmāsa śaraiḥ su muktaiḥ

original: tadaiva kṛṣṇātanayāḥ sametā jaghnuḥ śalaṃ saṃ yati saumadattim /
analyzed: tadā eva kṛṣṇā tanayāḥ sametāḥ jaghnuḥ śalam sam yati saumadattim

original: alambusaṃ prāpa tadā ghaṭotkacaḥ parasparaṃ tau rathināvayuddhyatām / 26.84 /
analyzed: alambusam prāpa tadā ghaṭotkacaḥ parasparam tau rathinau ayuddhyatām

original: ghaṭotkacastaṃ virathaṃ vidhāya khasthaṃ kha evābhiyuyodha saṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭotkacaḥ tam viratham vidhāya kha stham khe eva abhiyuyodha sam sthitaḥ

original: tatastu taṃ bhīmasuto nigṛhya nipātya bhūmau pradadau prahāram / 26.85 /
analyzed: tatas tu tam bhīma sutaḥ nigṛhya nipātya bhūmau pradadau prahāram

original: padā ṇsirasyeva sa piṣṭamastako mamāra madhye pṛthivīpatīnām /
analyzed: padā sa piṣṭa mastakaḥ mamāra madhye pṛthivīpatīnām

original: tasmin hate bhaimaseniḥ kurūṇāṃ vyadrāvayad rathavṛndaṃ samantāt / 26.86 /
analyzed: tasmin hate bhaimaseniḥ kurūṇām vyadrāvayat ratha vṛndam samantāt

original: tadā'sadat kṛtavarmā rathena senāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ śaravarṣaṃ pramuñcan /
analyzed: tadā asadat kṛtavarmā rathena senām pāṇḍūnām śara varṣam pramuñcan

original: dadau varaṃ tasya hi pūrvamacyutaḥ prītaḥ stutyā sarvajayaṃ muhūrte / 26.87 /
analyzed: dadau varam tasya hi pūrvam acyutaḥ prītaḥ stutyā sarva jayam muhūrte

original: sa tena pāñcālagaṇān vijigye yamau ca bhīmasya puro'tha taṃ ca /
analyzed: sa tena pāñcāla gaṇān vijigye yamau ca bhīmasya tam ca

original: vivyādha bāṇena sa vāsudevavaraṃ vijānan na tadā samabhyayāt / 26.88 /
analyzed: vivyādha bāṇena sa vāsudeva varam vijānan na tadā samabhyayāt

original: vinaiva vṛṣṇīn vijaye varo yadamuṣya tenāsya hayān sa sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: vinā eva vṛṣṇīn vijaye varaḥ yat amuṣya tena asya hayān sa sātyakiḥ

original: nihatya bāṇairatudat sa yānamanyat samāsthāya tato'pajagmivān / 26.89 /
analyzed: nihatya bāṇaiḥ atudat sa yānam anyat samāsthāya tatas upajagmivān

original: tadā hariḥ pāñcajanyaṃ sughoṣamāpūrayāmāsa jaye'bhiyuddhyati /
analyzed: tadā hariḥ pāñcajanyam su ghoṣam āpūrayāmāsa jayebhiḥ yuddhi ati

original: karṇādibhirdrauṇimukhai ripūṇāṃ balaprahāṇāya paraḥ parebhyaḥ / 26.90 /
analyzed: karṇa ādibhiḥ drauṇi mukhaiḥ ripūṇām bala prahāṇāya paraḥ parebhyaḥ

original: sa pāñcajanyo'cyutavaktravāyunā bhṛśaṃ supūrṇodaranissṛtadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: sa pāñcajanya ucyuta vaktra vāyunā bhṛśam su pūrṇa udara nissṛta dhvaniḥ

original: ccclxix.jagad viriñceśasurendrapūrvakaṃ prakampayāmāsa yugātyaye yathā / 26.91 /
analyzed: jagat viriñca īśa sura indra pūrvakam prakampayāmāsa yuga atyaye yathā

original: gāṇḍīvaghoṣe ca tadā'bhibhūte yudhiṣṭhiro bhītabhītastadetya /
analyzed: gāṇḍīva ghoṣe ca tadā abhibhūte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīta bhītaḥ tadā etya

original: śaineyamūce parasainyamagne pārthe svayaṃ yuddhyati keśavaḥ sma / 26.92 /
analyzed: śaineyam ūce para sainya magne pārthe svayam yuddhyati keśavaḥ sma

original: na śrūyate gāṇḍīvasyādya ghoṣaḥ saṃ śrūyate pāñcajanyasya ghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: na śrūyate gāṇḍīvasya adya ghoṣaḥ sam śrūyate pāñcajanyasya ghoṣaḥ

original: tad yāhi jānīhi tamadya pārthaṃ yadi sma jīvatyasahāya eṣaḥ / 26.93 /
analyzed: tat yāhi jānīhi tam adya pārtham yadi sma jīvati asahāyaḥ eṣaḥ  /

original: itīritaḥ sātyakiratra viprān sampūjya vittaiḥ paramāṇsiṣaṇsca /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ sātyakiḥ atra viprān sampūjya vittaiḥ

original: jayāya tebhyaḥ pratigṛhya senāmukhaṃ yayau bhīmasenānuyātaḥ / 26.94 /
analyzed: jayāya tebhyaḥ pratigṛhya senā mukham yayau bhīmasena anuyātaḥ

original: bhīmastu senāmukhamāṇsu bhittvā prāveśayad yuyudhānaṃ camūṃ t ām /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tu senā mukham āṇsu bhittvā prāveśayat yuyudhānam camūm

original: sa yuddhyamāno guruṇā'bhyupekṣitaḥ sūtaṃ nihatya drāvayāmāsa cāṇsvān / 26.95 /
analyzed: sa yuddhyamānaḥ guruṇā abhyupekṣitaḥ sūtam nihatya drāvayāmāsa ca āṇsvān

original: balaṃ vivṛddhaṃ ca tadā'sya sātyakerviprāṇsīrbhiḥ kṛṣṇavarādapi sma /
analyzed: balam vivṛddham ca tadā asya sātyakeḥ kṛṣṇa varāt api sma

original: balasya vṛddhirhi purā'sya dattā kṛṣṇena tuṣṭena dine hi tasmin / 26.96 /
analyzed: balasya vṛddhiḥ hi purā asya dattā kṛṣṇena tuṣṭena dine hi tasmin

original: tato vivṛddhorubalāt sa sātyakiḥ saṃ sthāpya bhīmaṃ prayayau rathena /
analyzed: tatas vivṛddha ūru balāt sa sātyakiḥ sam sthāpya bhīmam prayayau rathena

original: taṃ bāṇavarṣaiḥ pṛtanāṃ samantānnighnantamājau hṛdikātmajo'bhyayāt / 26.97 /
analyzed: tam bāṇa varṣaiḥ pṛtanām samantāt nighnantam ājau hṛdika ātmajaḥ ubhyayāt

original: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva dāruṇaṃ tatrākarot taṃ virathaṃ sa sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhūt yuddham atīva dāruṇam tatra akarot tam viratham sa sātyakiḥ

original: vijitya taṃ sātyakirugradhanvā yayāvatītyaiva śirāṃ si yūnām /
analyzed: vijitya tam sātyakiḥ ugra dhanvā yayau atītya eva śirām si yūnām

original: kṛntan śaraistaṃ jalasandha āgamad raṇe gajaskandhagato'bhiyoddhum / 26.98 /
analyzed: kṛntan śaraiḥ tam jalasandhaḥ āgamat raṇe gaja skandha gataḥ abhiyoddhum

original: nivārayantaṃ tamasaṃ hyavikramaṃ nihatya bāṇaiḥ samare sa sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: nivārayantam tamasam hi avikramam nihatya bāṇaiḥ samare sa sātyakiḥ

original: vilol . ayāmāsa balaṃ kurūṇāṃ nighnan gajasyandanavājipattinaḥ / 26.99 /
analyzed: vilol balam kurūṇām nighnan gaja syandana vāji pattinaḥ

original: sa pārvatīyāṃ śca śilāpravarṣiṇo nihatya vidrāpya ca sarvasainikān /
analyzed: sa pārvatīyān śca śilā pravarṣiṇaḥ nihatya vidrāpya ca sarva sainikān

original: samāsadat keśavaphalgunau ca balī tamārā'śu ca yūpaketuḥ / 26.100 /
analyzed: samāsadat keśava phalgunau ca balī tam ārā āśu ca yūpaketuḥ

original: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva ghoraṃ ciraṃ vicitraṃ ca mahad vibhīṣaṇam /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhūt yuddham atīva ghoram ciram vicitram ca mahat vibhīṣaṇam

original: parasparaṃ tau turagān nihatya nipātya sūtau dhanuṣī nikṛtya /
analyzed: parasparam tau turagān nihatya nipātya sūtau dhanuṣī nikṛtya

original: samīyatuścarmamahāsidhāriṇau vicitramārgān yudhi sañcarantau / 26.101 /
analyzed: samīyatuḥ carma mahā asi dhāriṇau vicitra mārgān yudhi sañcarantau

original: sa saumadattirbhuvi sātyakiṃ raṇe nipātya keśeṣu ca sampragṛhya /
analyzed: sa saumadattiḥ bhuvi sātyakim raṇe nipātya keśeṣu ca sampragṛhya

original: ccclxx.padā'sya vakṣasyadhiruhya khaḍgamudagrahīdāṇsu śiro'pahartum / 26.102 /
analyzed: vakṣasi adhiruhya khaḍgam udagrahīt āṇsu śirā upahartum

original: tad vāsudevastu nirīkṣya viśvataścakṣurjagādā'śu dhanañjayaṃ raṇe /
analyzed: tat vāsudevaḥ tu nirīkṣya viśvatas cakṣuḥ jagāda āśu dhanañjayam raṇe

original: trāyasva śaineyamiti sma so'pi bhallena ciccheda bhujaṃ parasya / 26.103 /
analyzed: trāyasva śaineyam iti sma saḥ upi bhallena ciccheda bhujam parasya

original: sa tena cotkṛttasakhaḍgabāhurvinindya pārthaṃ niṣasāda bhūmau /
analyzed: sa tena ca utkṛtta sa khaḍga bāhuḥ vinindya pārtham niṣasāda bhūmau

original: prāyopaviṣṭaḥ śarasaṃ stare hariṃ ddhyāyan vinindannasurapraveśāt / 26.104 /
analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭaḥ śarasam stare harim ddhyāyan vinindan asura praveśāt

original: gate'surāveśa utātibhaktyā dhyāyatyamuṣmin garuḍadhvajaṃ tam /
analyzed: gata isura āveśe uta atibhaktyā dhyāyati amuṣmin garuḍadhvajam tam

original: śaineya utthāya nivāryamāṇaḥ kṛṣṇārjunādyairaharacchiro'sya / 26.105 /
analyzed: śaineyaḥ utthāya nivāryamāṇaḥ kṛṣṇa arjuna ādyaiḥ aharat śiraḥ sya

original: tadā svakīyaṃ rathametadarthaṃ klṛptaṃ dadau sātyakaye sasūtam /
analyzed: tadā svakīyam ratham etad artham klṛptam dadau sātyakaye sa sūtam

original: kṛṣṇo'tha pārthasya hayāstṛṣā'rditāstadā'sṛjad vāruṇāstraṃ sa pārthaḥ / 26.106 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ utha pārthasya hayāḥ tṛṣā arditāḥ tadā sṛjat vāruṇa astram sa pārthaḥ

original: tenaiva tīrthaṃ paramaṃ cakāra tathā'śvaśālāmapi bāṇarūpām /
analyzed: tena eva tīrtham paramam cakāra tathā aśvaśālām api bāṇa rūpām

original: tato vimucyātra hayānapāyayaddharistadā vāsavirārdayat parān / 26.107 /
analyzed: tatas vimucya atra hayān apāyayat hariḥ tadā vāsaviḥ ārdayat parān

original: yuyoja kṛṣṇasturagān rathe punargataśramānuddhṛtasāyakān prabhuḥ /
analyzed: yuyoja kṛṣṇaḥ turagān rathe punar gata śramān uddhṛta sāyakān prabhuḥ

original: pracodite tena rathe sthitaḥ punastathaiva bībhatsurarīnayodhayat / 26.108 /
analyzed: pracodite tena rathe sthitaḥ punar tathā eva bībhatsuḥ arīn ayodhayat

original: śinipravīre tu gate yudhiṣṭhiraḥ punaśca cintākulito babhūva ha /
analyzed: śini pravīre tu gate yudhiṣṭhiraḥ punar ca cintā ākulitaḥ babhūva ha

original: jagāda bhīmaṃ ca na gāṇḍivadhvaniḥ saṃ śrūyate pāñcajanyasya rāvaḥ / 26.109 /
analyzed: jagāda bhīmam ca na gāṇḍiva dhvaniḥ sam śrūyate pāñcajanyasya rāvaḥ  /

original: mayā niyuktaśca gataḥ sa sātyakirbhāraṃ ca tasyādhikameva manye /
analyzed: mayā niyuktaḥ ca gataḥ sa sātyakiḥ bhāram ca tasya adhikam eva manye

original: tat pāhi pārthaṃ yuyudhānameva ca tvaṃ bhīma gatvā yadi jīvatastau / 26.110 /
analyzed: tat pāhi pārtham yuyudhānam eva ca tvam bhīma gatvā yadi jīvataḥ tau  /

original: itīritaḥ prāha vṛkodarastaṃ na rakṣitaṃ vāsudevena pārtham /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ prāha vṛkodaraḥ tam na rakṣitam vāsudevena pārtham

original: brahmeśānāvapi jetuṃ samarthau kiṃ drauṇikarṇādidhanurbhṛto'tra / 26.111 /
analyzed: brahma īśānau api jetum samarthau kim drauṇi karṇa ādi dhanuḥ bhṛtaḥ utra

original: ato bhayaṃ nāsti dhanañjayasya na sātyakeścaiva hareḥ prasādāt /
analyzed: atas bhayam nā asti dhanañjayasya na sātyakeḥ ca eva hareḥ prasādāt

original: rakṣyastvamevātra mato mamādya droṇo hyayaṃ yatate tvāṃ gṛhītum / 26.112 /
analyzed: rakṣyaḥ tvam eva atra mataḥ mama adya droṇaḥ hi ayam yatate tvām gṛhītum

original: itīritaḥ prāha yudhiṣṭhirastaṃ na jīvamāne yudhi māṃ ghaṭotkace /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ prāha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tam na jīvamāne yudhi mām ghaṭotkace

original: dhṛṣṭadyumne cāstravidāṃ variṣṭhe droṇo vaśaṃ netumiha prabhuḥ kvacit / 26.113 /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumne ca astra vidām variṣṭhe droṇaḥ vaśam netum iha prabhuḥ kvacid

original: ccclxxi.yadi priyaṃ kartumihecchasi tvaṃ mama prayāhyāṇsu ca pārthasātyakī /
analyzed: priyam kartum iha icchasi tvam mama prayāhi āṇsu ca pārtha sātyakī

original: rakṣasva sañjñāmapi siṃ hanādāt kuruṣva me pārthaśaineyadṛṣṭau / 26.114 /
analyzed: rakṣasva sañjñām api sim hanādāt kuruṣva me pārtha śaineya dṛṣṭau

original: tathā hate caiva jayadrathe me kuruṣva sañjñāmiti tena bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hate ca eva jayadrathe me kuruṣva sañjñām iti tena bhīmaḥ

original: uktastu haiḍimbamamuṣya rakṣaṇe vyadhācca senāpatimeva samyak / 26.115 /
analyzed: uktaḥ tu haiḍimbam amuṣya rakṣaṇe vyadhāt ca senāpatim eva samyak

original: sa cā'ha senāpatiratra bhīmaṃ prayāhi tau yatra ca keśavārjunau /
analyzed: sa ca āha senāpatiḥ atra bhīmam prayāhi tau yatra ca keśava arjunau

original: na jīvamāne mayi dharṣituṃ kṣamo droṇo nṛpaṃ mṛtyurahaṃ ca tasya / 26.116 /
analyzed: na jīvamāne mayi dharṣitum kṣamaḥ droṇaḥ nṛpam mṛtyuḥ aham ca tasya  /

original: iti bruvāṇe praṇidhāya bhīmaḥ punaḥ punastaṃ nṛpatiṃ gadādharaḥ /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇe praṇidhāya bhīmaḥ punar punar tam nṛpatim gadā dharaḥ

original: yayau parānīkamadhijyadhanvā nirantaraṃ pravapan bāṇapūgān / 26.117 /
analyzed: yayau para anīkam adhijya dhanvā nirantaram pravapan bāṇa pūgān

original: nyavārayat taṃ śaravarṣadhāro droṇo vacaścedamuvāca bhīmam /
analyzed: nyavārayat tam śara varṣa dhāraḥ droṇaḥ vacaḥ ca idam uvāca bhīmam

original: śiṣyasnehād vāsaviḥ sātyakiśca mayā pramukto bhṛśamānatau mayi / 26.118 /
analyzed: śiṣya snehāt vāsaviḥ sātyakiḥ ca mayā pramuktaḥ bhṛśam ānatau mayi

original: svīyā pratijñā'pi hi saindhavasya guptau mayā pārthakṛte visṛṣṭā /
analyzed: svīyā pratijñā api hi saindhavasya guptau mayā pārtha kṛte visṛṣṭā

original: dāsye na te mārgamahaṃ kathañcit paśyāstravīryaṃ mama divyamadbhutam / 26.119 /
analyzed: dāsye na te mārgam aham kathañcid paśya astra vīryam mama divyam adbhutam

original: ityuktavākyaḥ sa gadāṃ samādade cikṣepa tāṃ droṇarathāya bhīmaḥ /
analyzed: iti ukta vākyaḥ sa gadām samādade cikṣepa tām droṇa rathāya bhīmaḥ

original: uvāca cāhaṃ pitṛvanmānaye tvāṃ sadā mṛdustvāṃ prati nānyathā kvacit / 26.120 /
analyzed: uvāca ca aham pitṛ vat mānaye tvām sadā mṛduḥ tvām prati na anyathā kvacid

original: amārdave paśya ca yādṛśaṃ balaṃ mameti tasyā'śu vicūrṇito rathaḥ /
analyzed: amārdave paśya ca yādṛśam balam mama iti tasya āśu vicūrṇitaḥ rathaḥ

original: gadābhipātena vṛkodarasya sasūtavājidhvajayantrakūbaraḥ / 26.121 /
analyzed: gadā abhipātena vṛkodarasya sa sūta vāji dhvaja yantra kūbaraḥ

original: droṇo gadāmāpatatīṃ nirīkṣya tvavapluto lāghavato dharātal . e /
analyzed: droṇaḥ gadām āpatatīm nirīkṣya tu avaplutaḥ lāghavataḥ

original: tadaiva duryodhanayāpitaṃ rathaṃ paraṃ samāsthāya śarān vavarṣa ha/ 26.122 /
analyzed: tadā eva duryodhana yāpitam ratham param samāsthāya śarān vavarṣa ha

original: śaraistadīyaiḥ paramāstramantritaiḥ pravṛṣyamāṇo jagadīraṇātmajaḥ /
analyzed: śaraiḥ tadīyaiḥ parama astra mantritaiḥ pravṛṣyamāṇaḥ jagat īraṇa ātmajaḥ

original: śiro nidhāyā'śu puro vṛṣo yathā tamabhyayādeva rathādavaplutaḥ / 26.123 /
analyzed: śiraḥ nidhāya āśu puras vṛṣaḥ yathā tam abhyayāt eva rathāt avaplutaḥ  /

original: manojavādeva tamāpya bhīmo rathaṃ gṛhītvā'mbara ākṣipat kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: manaḥ javāt eva tam āpya bhīmaḥ ratham gṛhītvā ambare ākṣipat kṣaṇāt

original: śakto'pyahaṃ tvāṃ na nihanmi gauravādityeva sujñāpayituṃ tadasya / 26.124 /
analyzed: śaktaḥ api aham tvām na nihanmi gauravāt iti eva su jñāpayitum tat asya

original: suvājisūtaḥ sa rathaḥ kṣitau patan vicūrṇito'smād gururapyavaplutaḥ /
analyzed: su vāji sūtaḥ sa rathaḥ kṣitau patan vicūrṇitaḥ usmāt guruḥ api avaplutaḥ

original: tadā viśoko'sya rathaṃ samānayat tamāruhad bhīma udāravikramaḥ / 26.125 /
analyzed: tadā viśokaḥ asya ratham samānayat tam āruhat bhīmaḥ udāra vikramaḥ

original: ccclxxii.droṇo'pi duryodhanadattamanyaṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya yudhiṣṭhiraṃ yayau /
analyzed: droṇaḥ api duryodhana dattam anyam ratham samāsthāya yudhiṣṭhiram yayau

original: gṛhītukāmaṃ nṛpatiṃ prayāntaṃ nyavārayat saṃ yati vāhinīpatiḥ / 26.126 /
analyzed: gṛhītu kāmam nṛpatim prayāntam nyavārayat sam yati vāhinīpatiḥ

original: vidāritāṃ droṇaṇsaraiḥ svasenāṃ saṃ sthāpya bhūyo drupadātmajaḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: vidāritām droṇaṇsaraiḥ sva senām sam sthāpya bhūyas drupada ātmajaḥ śaraiḥ

original: droṇaṃ nivāryaiva camūṃ pareṣāṃ vidrāvayāmāsa ca tasya paśyataḥ / 26.127 /
analyzed: droṇam nivārya eva camūm pareṣām vidrāvayāmāsa ca tasya paśyataḥ  /

original: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva raudraṃ jayaiṣiṇoḥ pāṇḍavadhārtarāṣṭrayoḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhūt yuddham atīva raudram jaya eṣiṇoḥ pāṇḍava dhārtarāṣṭrayoḥ

original: atyadbhutaṃ santatabāṇavarṣamanārataṃ suciraṃ nirviśeṣam / 26.128 /
analyzed: ati adbhutam santata bāṇa varṣam anāratam su ciram nirviśeṣam

original: tataḥ prāyād bhīmaseno'mitaujā mṛdgañcharaiḥ kauravarājasenām /
analyzed: tatas prāyāt bhīmasena umita ojāḥ mṛdgan śaraiḥ kaurava rāja senām

original: vindānuvindapramukhā dhārtarāṣṭrāstamāsedurdvādaśa vīramukhyāḥ /
analyzed: vinda anuvinda pramukhāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ tam āseduḥ dvādaśa vīra mukhyāḥ

original: viddhaḥ śaraistairbahubhirvṛkodaraḥ śirāṃ si teṣāṃ yugapaccakarta / 26.129 /
analyzed: viddhaḥ śaraiḥ taiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛkodaraḥ śirām si teṣām yugapad cakarta  /

original: hateṣu teṣu pravareṣu dhanvināṃ satyavrataḥ puramitro jayaśca /
analyzed: hateṣu teṣu pravareṣu dhanvinām satyavrataḥ puramitraḥ jayaḥ ca

original: vṛndārakaḥ pauravaścetyamātyāḥ samāsedurdhārtarāṣṭrasya bhīmam / 26.130 /
analyzed: vṛndārakaḥ pauravaḥ ca iti amātyāḥ samāseduḥ dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhīmam

original: sa taiḥ pṛṣatkairavakīryamāṇaḥ śitān vipāṭhān yugapat samādade /
analyzed: sa taiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ avakīryamāṇaḥ śitān vipāṭhān yugapad samādade

original: jahāra taireva śirāṃ si teṣāṃ hateṣu teṣveva pare pradudruvuḥ / 26.131 /
analyzed: jahāra taiḥ eva śirām si teṣām hateṣu teṣu eva pare pradudruvuḥ  /

original: sa siṃ havat kṣudramṛgān samantato vidrāpya śatrūn hṛdikātmajaṃ raṇe /
analyzed: sa sim havat kṣudra mṛgān samantataḥ vidrāpya śatrūn hṛdika ātmajam raṇe

original: abhyāgamat tena nivāritaḥ śaraiḥ kṣaṇena cakre virathāṇsvasūtam /
analyzed: abhyāgamat tena nivāritaḥ śaraiḥ kṣaṇena cakre

original: sa gāḍhaviddhastu vṛkodareṇa raṇaṃ visṛjyāpayayau kṣaṇena / 26.132 /
analyzed: sa gāḍha viddhaḥ tu vṛkodareṇa raṇam visṛjya apayayau kṣaṇena

original: vijitya hārdikyamathā'śu bhīmo vidrāvayāmāsa varūthinīṃ t ām /
analyzed: vijitya hārdikyam atha āśu bhīmaḥ vidrāvayāmāsa varūthinīm

original: sampreṣayan sarvanarāṇsvakuñjarān yamāya yāto haripārthapārśvam / 26.133 /
analyzed: sampreṣayan sarva narān sva kuñjarān yamāya yātaḥ hari pārtha pārśvam

original: dṛṣṭvaiva kṛṣṇavijayau paramaprahṛṣṭastābhyāṃ nirīkṣita uta pratibhāṣitaśca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva kṛṣṇa vijayau parama prahṛṣṭaḥ tābhyām nirīkṣitaḥ uta pratibhāṣitaḥ ca

original: sañjñāṃ nṛpasya sa dadāvapi siṃ hanādān śrutvā parāṃ mudamavāpa sa cāgryabuddhiḥ / 26.134 /
analyzed: sañjñām nṛpasya sa dadau api sim ha nādān śrutvā parām mudam avāpa sa ca agrya buddhiḥ

original: bhīmasya nānadata eva mahāsvanena viṇmūtraśoṇitamatho mṛtimāpureke /
analyzed: bhīmasya nānadataḥ eva mahā svanena viṣ mūtra śoṇitam atho mṛtim āpuḥ eke

original: bhīteṣu sarvanṛpatiṣvamumāpa tūrṇaṃ karṇo vikarṇamukharā api dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ / 26.135 /
analyzed: bhīteṣu sarva nṛpatiṣu amum āpa tūrṇam karṇaḥ vikarṇa mukharāḥ api dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ

original: hatvā vikarṇamuta tatra ca citrasenaṃ sañcūrṇitaṃ ca vidadhe rathamarkasūnoḥ /
analyzed: hatvā vikarṇam uta tatra ca citrasenam sañcūrṇitam ca vidadhe ratham arka sūnoḥ

original: ghoraiḥ śaraiḥ punarapi sma samardyamānaḥ karṇo'payānamakarod drutameva bhīmāt / 26.136 /
analyzed: ghoraiḥ śaraiḥ punar api sma samardyamānaḥ karṇa upayānam akarot drutam eva bhīmāt  /

original: ccclxxiii.āṇsvāsya caiva suciraṃ punareva bhīmaṃ yuddhāya yāti dhṛtarāṣṭrasutaistathā'nyaiḥ /
analyzed: ca eva su ciram punar eva bhīmam yuddhāya yāti dhṛtarāṣṭra sutaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ

original: t āṃ ścaiva tatra vinihatya tathaiva karṇo vyaśvāyudhaḥ kṛta utāpayayau kṣaṇena / 26.137 /
analyzed: t ca eva tatra vinihatya tathā eva karṇaḥ vyaśva āyudhaḥ kṛtaḥ uta apayayau kṣaṇena

original: vikarṇacitrasenādyā evaṃ vīratamāḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: vikarṇa citrasena ādyāḥ evam vīratamāḥ sutāḥ

original: karṇasya paśyato bhīmabāṇakṛttaśirodharāḥ / 26.138 /
analyzed: karṇasya paśyataḥ bhīma bāṇa kṛtta śirodharāḥ

original: nipeturdhṛtarāṣṭrasya rathebhyaḥ pṛthivītal . e /
analyzed: nipetuḥ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rathebhyaḥ pṛthivī tat

original: trayoviṃ śatirevātra karṇasāhāyyakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / 26.139 /
analyzed: trayovim śatiḥ eva atra karṇa sāhāyya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: ekavīṃ śativāraṃ ca vyaśvasūtarathadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: śati vāram ca vyaśva sūta ratha dhvajaḥ

original: gāḍhamabhyardditastīkṣṇaiḥ śarairbhīmena saṃ yuge / 26.140 /
analyzed: gāḍham abhyardditaḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ bhīmena sam yuge

original: prāṇasaṃ śayamāpannaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa sam śayam āpannaḥ sarva lokasya paśyataḥ

original: raṇaṃ tyaktvā pradudrāva rudan duḥkhāt punaḥ punaḥ / 26.141 /
analyzed: raṇam tyaktvā pradudrāva rudan duḥkhāt punar punar

original: dvāviṃ śatimayuddhe tu rāmadattaṃ subhāsvaram /
analyzed: śatima yuddhe tu rāma dattam su bhāsvaram

original: abhedyaṃ rathamāruhya vijayaṃ dhanureva ca / 26.142 /
analyzed: abhedyam ratham āruhya vijayam dhanuḥ eva ca

original: taddattameva saṅgṛhya tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau /
analyzed: tad dattam eva saṅgṛhya tūṇī ca akṣaya sāyakau

original: āsasāda raṇe bhīmaṃ karṇo vaikartano vṛṣā / 26.143 /
analyzed: āsasāda raṇe bhīmam karṇaḥ vaikartanaḥ vṛṣā

original: sughora āsīt sa tayorvimardo bhīmasya karṇasya ca dīrghakālam /
analyzed: su ghoraḥ āsīt sa tayoḥ vimardaḥ bhīmasya karṇasya ca dīrgha kālam

original: ākāṇsamācchādayatoḥ śaraughaiḥ parasparaṃ caiva suraktanetrayoḥ / 26.144 /
analyzed: ākāṇsam ācchādayatoḥ śara oghaiḥ parasparam ca eva su rakta netrayoḥ  /

original: tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ sahajābhyāṃ ca saṃ yutam /
analyzed: tatas bhīmaḥ mahā bāhuḥ sahajābhyām ca sam yutam

original: tvāṃ tu kuṇḍalavarmabhyāṃ śaknuyāṃ hantumañjasā / 26.145 /
analyzed: tvām tu kuṇḍala varmabhyām śaknuyām hantum añjasā

original: iti jñāpayituṃ tasya kuṇḍale kavacaṃ tathā /
analyzed: iti jñāpayitum tasya kuṇḍale kavacam tathā

original: śarairutkṛtya samare pātayāmāsa bhūtal . e / 26.146 /
analyzed: śaraiḥ utkṛtya samare pātayāmāsa

original: evaṃ t ānyapakṛṣyāhaṃ hanyāṃ tvāmiti vedayan /
analyzed: evam t āni apakṛṣya aham hanyām tvām iti vedayan

original: punaśca bahubhistīkṣṇaiḥ śarairenaṃ samārdayat / 26.147 /
analyzed: punar ca bahubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ enam samārdayat  /

original: tatastu bhīmasya babhūva buddhiraspardhinaḥ sarvajayo hi dattaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu bhīmasya babhūva buddhiḥ aspardhinaḥ sarva jayaḥ hi dattaḥ

original: ccclxxiv.amuṣya rāmeṇa naca spṛdhā'yaṃ karṇo mayā yuddhyati kṛcchrago hyayam / 26.148 /
analyzed: amuṣya rāmeṇa na ca spṛdhā ayam karṇaḥ mayā yuddhi ati kṛcchra gaḥ hi ayam   /

original: tathā'pi me bhagavānatyanugrahājjayaṃ dadātyātmavaco'pahāya /
analyzed: tathā api me bhagavān ati anugrahāt jayam dadāti ātma vacaḥ upahāya

original: mayā tumānyaṃ vacanaṃ hareḥ sadā tasmād dāsye vivaraṃ tvadya śatroḥ / 26.149 /
analyzed: mayā vacanam hareḥ sadā tasmāt dāsye vivaram tu adya śatroḥ  /

original: evaṃ smṛtvā tena randhre pradatte karṇo'stravīryeṇa dhanurnyakṛntat /
analyzed: evam smṛtvā tena randhre pradatte karṇa ustra vīryeṇa dhanuḥ nyakṛntat

original: raśmīn hayānāṃ ca tato rathaṃ sa tatyāja naijaṃ balameva vedayan / 26.150 /
analyzed: raśmīn hayānām ca tatas ratham sa tatyāja naijam balam eva vedayan  /

original: na me rathādyairdhanuṣā'pi kāryamityeva sa khyāpayituṃ vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: na me ratha ādyaiḥ dhanuṣā api kāryam iti eva sa khyāpayitum vṛkodaraḥ

original: khamutpapātottamavīryatejā rathaṃ ca karṇasya samāsthitaḥ kṣaṇāt / 26.151 /
analyzed: kham utpapāta uttama vīrya tejāḥ ratham ca karṇasya samāsthitaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: bhītastu karṇo rathakūbare tadā vyalīyatātaḥ sa vṛkodaro rathāt /
analyzed: bhītaḥ tu karṇaḥ ratha kūbare tadā vyalīyata atas sa vṛkodaraḥ rathāt

original: avapluto jñāpayituṃ svaśaktiṃ nirāyudhatve'pyarinigrahādau / 26.152 /
analyzed: avaplutaḥ jñāpayitum sva śaktim nirāyudha tve pi ari nigraha ādau

original: naicchad gṛhītuṃ vinihantumeva vā rathaṃ dhanurvā'sya raṇe'pahartum /
analyzed: na aicchat gṛhītum vinihantum eva vā ratham dhanuḥ vā asya raṇe apahartum

original: droṇasya yadvat pūrvamatīva śakto'pyamānayad rāmavaco'sya bhaktyā / 26.153 /
analyzed: droṇasya yadvat pūrvam atīva śaktā upyam ānayat rāma vacaḥ usya bhaktyā

original: satyāṃ kartuṃ vāsaveśca pratijñāṃ sammānayan vaiṣṇavatvācca karṇam /
analyzed: satyām kartum vāsaveḥ ca pratijñām sammānayan vaiṣṇava tvāt ca karṇam

original: dātuṃ randhraṃ sūryajasya prayātaḥ śarakṣepārthaṃ duramatiṣṭhadatra / 26.154 /
analyzed: dātum randhram sūryajasya prayātaḥ śara kṣepa artham duram atiṣṭhat atra

original: tataḥ karṇo dūragataṃ vṛkodaraṃ sammānayantaṃ rāmavākyaṃ vijānan /
analyzed: tatas karṇaḥ dūra gatam vṛkodaram sammānayantam rāma vākyam vijānan

original: śarairavidhyat sa ca tānavārayad gajairmṛtaistāṃ śca cakarta karṇaḥ / 26.155 /
analyzed: śaraiḥ avidhyat sa ca tān avārayat gajaiḥ mṛtaiḥ tām ca cakarta karṇaḥ

original: vyasūn gajān prakṣipantaṃ sametya saṃ spṛśya cāpena vacaśca duṣṭam /
analyzed: vyasūn gajān prakṣipantam sametya sam spṛśya cāpena vacaḥ ca duṣṭam

original: saṃ śrāvayāmāsa suyodhanasya prītyai prajānannapi tasya vīryam / 26.156 /
analyzed: sam śrāvayāmāsa suyodhanasya prītyai prajānan api tasya vīryam

original: saṃ śrāvayantaṃ vacanāni rūkṣāṇyapāhanad bāṇavaraistadā'rjunaḥ /
analyzed: sam śrāvayantam vacanāni rūkṣāṇi apāhanat bāṇa varaiḥ tadā arjunaḥ

original: sa varmahīnaḥ pārthabāṇābhitapto vyapāgamad bhīma āpā'tmayānam / 26.157 /
analyzed: sa varma hīnaḥ pārtha bāṇa abhitaptaḥ vyapāgamat bhīmaḥ āpa ātma yānam

original: karṇo bhīme vāsavīṃ naiva śaktiṃ vimoktumaicchannaiva bībhatsuto'nyān /
analyzed: karṇaḥ bhīme vāsavīm nā eva śaktim vimoktum aicchat nā eva bībhatsutaḥ anyān

original: hanyāmiti prāha yataḥ sa kuntyai yadyapyavadhyaḥ sa tayā'pi bhīmaḥ / 26.158 /
analyzed: hanyām iti prāha yatas sa kuntyai yadi api avadhyaḥ sa tayā api bhīmaḥ

original: nārāyaṇāstraṃ śirasi prapātitaṃ na yasya lomāpyadahaccirasthitam /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa astram śirasi prapātitam na yasya loma api adahat cira sthitam

original: kiṃ tasya śaktiḥ prakaroti vāsavī tathā'nyadapyastraśastraṃ mahacca / 26.159 /
analyzed: kim tasya śaktiḥ prakaroti vāsavī tathā anyat api astra śastram mahat ca

original: ccclxxv.bhīmaḥ karṇarathaṃ prāptaḥ śaktiṃ nā'dātumaicchata /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ karṇa ratham prāptaḥ śaktim na ādātum aicchata

original: abhiprāyaṃ keśavasya jānan haiḍimbamṛtyave /
analyzed: abhiprāyam keśavasya jānan haiḍimba mṛtyave

original: tataḥ karṇo'nyamāsthāya rathamarjunamabhyayāt / 26.160 /
analyzed: tatas karṇaḥ ūnyam āsthāya ratham arjunam abhyayāt

original: divyaṃ rathaṃ dhanuścaiva kṛṣṇabuddhyo'rjuno haret /
analyzed: divyam ratham dhanuḥ ca eva kṛṣṇa buddhyā ūrjunaḥ haret

original: iti bhītastu tāṃ śaktimādāyārjunamṛtyave /
analyzed: iti bhītaḥ tu tām śaktim ādāya arjuna mṛtyave

original: yuddhāyāyād rathaṃ cāpaṃ śaktiṃ caikatra nākarot / 26.161 /
analyzed: yuddhāya ayāt ratham cāpam śaktim ca ekatra na akarot

original: ekaṃ hṛtaṃ cedanyat syāditi matvā bhayākulaḥ /
analyzed: ekam hṛtam ced anyat syāt iti matvā bhaya ākulaḥ

original: bibheti sarvadā nīteḥ kṛṣṇasyāmitatejasaḥ / 26.162 /
analyzed: bibheti sarvadā nīteḥ kṛṣṇasya amita tejasaḥ

original: niścito maraṇāyaiva mṛtikāle tu taṃ ratham /
analyzed: niścitaḥ maraṇāya eva mṛti kāle tu tam ratham

original: āruhyāgāddhi pūrvaṃ tu na kālaṃ manyate mṛteḥ / 26.163 /
analyzed: āruhya agāt hi pūrvam tu na kālam manyate mṛteḥ

original: śaktiṃ tu tadrathagatāṃ prasamīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ saṃ sthāpya pārthamapi sātyakimeva yoddhum /
analyzed: śaktim tu tad ratha gatām prasamīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ sam sthāpya pārtham api sātyakim eva yoddhum

original: dattvā svakīyarathameva virocanasya putreṇa so'diśadamuṣya balaṃ pradāya / 26.164 /
analyzed: dattvā svakīya ratham eva virocanasya putreṇa sā udiśat amuṣya balam pradāya

original: śiṣyaṃ tvaśaktamiha me pratiyodhanāya pārtho hyadāditi sa sātyakimīkṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣyam tu aśaktam iha me pratiyodhanāya pārthaḥ hi adāt iti sa sātyakim īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: saṃ spardhayaiva yuyudhe virathaṃ cakāra tenaiva sātyakiramuṃ hariyānasaṃ sthaḥ / 26.165 /
analyzed: sam spardhayā eva yuyudhe viratham cakāra tena eva sātyakiḥ amum hari yānasam sthaḥ  /

original: na keśavarathe kaścit sthito yāti parājayam /
analyzed: na keśava rathe kaścid sthitaḥ yāti parājayam

original: ataśca sātyakirnāpa karṇenātra parājayam / 26.166 /
analyzed: atas ca sātyakiḥ na āpa karṇena atra parājayam

original: śastrasaṅgrahakāle tu kumārāṇāṃ vrataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śastra saṅgraha kāle tu kumārāṇām vratam bhavet

original: ityuktaṃ j āmadagnyena dhanurvidyāpurākṛt ā / 26.167 /
analyzed: iti uktam ā amadagnyena

original: tacchatruvadharūpaṃ ca pūrvāsiddhaṃ ca gūhitam /
analyzed: tat śatru vadha rūpam ca pūrva asiddham ca gūhitam

original: aviruddhaṃ ca dharmasya kāryaṃ rāmasya tuṣṭidam / 26.168 /
analyzed: a viruddham ca dharmasya kāryam rāmasya tuṣṭi dam

original: anupadravaṃ ca lokasyetyato bhīmo vrataṃ tvidam /
analyzed: anupadravam ca lokasya iti atas bhīmaḥ vratam tu idam

original: cakāra tūbaretyukte hanyāmiti rahaḥ prabhuḥ / 26.169 /
analyzed: cakāra tūbara iti ukte hanyām iti rahaḥ prabhuḥ

original: anupadravāya lokasya suvyañjacśmaśrumaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: an upadravāya lokasya su vyañjat śmaśru maṇḍalaḥ

original: suśmaśruṃ māṃ na kaściddhi tathā brūyāditi sphuṭam /
analyzed: su śmaśrum mām na kaścid hi tathā brūyāt iti sphuṭam

original: tadarjuno vijānāti snehād bhīmoditaṃ rahaḥ / 26.170 /
analyzed: tat arjunaḥ vijānāti snehāt bhīma uditam rahaḥ

original: ccclxxvi.arjunasyāpi gāṇḍīvaṃ dehītyukto nihanmyaham /
analyzed: arjunasya api gāṇḍīvam dehi iti uktaḥ nihanmi aham

original: iti tacca vijānāti bhīma eko nacāparaḥ /
analyzed: iti tat ca vijānāti bhīmaḥ ekaḥ na ca aparaḥ

original: gāṇḍīvasyā'gamaṃ pūrvaṃ j ānātyeva hi nāradāt / 26.171 /
analyzed: gāṇḍīvasya āgamam pūrvam j ānāti eva hi nāradāt

original: pratijñāṃ bhīmasenasya bruvataḥ phalgune rahaḥ /
analyzed: pratijñām bhīmasenasya bruvataḥ phalgune rahaḥ

original: duryodhanastu śuśrāva tāṃ ca karṇāya so'bravīt / 26.172 /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tu śuśrāva tām ca karṇāya saḥ bravīt

original: atūbaro'pi tenāsau tasmāt tūbara ityalam /
analyzed: a tūbaraḥ upi tena asau tasmāt tūbaraḥ iti alam

original: uktaḥ prakopanāyaiva tasmādarjunamabravīt / 26.173 /
analyzed: uktaḥ prakopanāya eva tasmāt arjunam abravīt

original: j ānāsi matpratijñāṃ tvaṃ tvatpratijñāmahaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ānāsi mad pratijñām tvam tvad pratijñām aham tathā

original: tatra hantavyatāṃ prāpto mama vaikartano'trahi / 26.174 /
analyzed: tatra hantavya tām prāptaḥ mama vaikartano trahi

original: pratijñāto vadhaścāsya tvayā'pi madanujñayā /
analyzed: pratijñātaḥ vadhaḥ ca asya tvayā api mad anujñayā

original: atastvayā mayā vā'yaṃ hantavyaḥ sūtanandanaḥ / 26.175 /
analyzed: atas tvayā mayā vā ayam hantavyaḥ sūtanandanaḥ

original: ityukto vāsaviḥ prāha hantavyo'yaṃ mayaiva hi /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ vāsaviḥ prāha hantavyaḥ yam mayā eva hi

original: tvadīyo'haṃ yatastena matkṛtaṃ tvatkṛtaṃ bhavet / 26.176 /
analyzed: tvadīyā uham yatas tena mad kṛtam tvad kṛtam bhavet

original: na tvatkṛtaṃ matkṛtaṃ syād gururmama yato bhavān /
analyzed: na tvad kṛtam mad kṛtam syāt guruḥ mama yatas bhavān

original: ato mayaiva hantavya ityuktvā karṇamabravīt / 26.177 /
analyzed: atas mayā eva hantavyaḥ iti uktvā karṇam abravīt

original: rūkṣā vācaḥ śrāvito'yaṃ bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇasya śṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: rūkṣāḥ vācaḥ śrāvitaḥ iyam bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇasya śṛṇvataḥ

original: yaccābhimanyuryuṣmābhirekaḥ sambhūya pātitaḥ / 26.178 /
analyzed: yat ca abhimanyuḥ yuṣmābhiḥ ekaḥ sambhūya pātitaḥ

original: atastvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi tvatputraṃ ca tavāgrataḥ /
analyzed: atas tvām nihaniṣyāmi tvad putram ca tava agratas

original: ityukto'nyarathaṃ prāpya karṇa āvījjayadratham / 26.179 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ nyaratham prāpya karṇaḥ āvīt jayadratham

original: drauṇikarṇābhiguptaṃ taṃ nāṇsakaddhantumarjunaḥ /
analyzed: drauṇi karṇa abhiguptam tam na aṇsakat hantum arjunaḥ

original: tatra vegaṃ paraṃ cakre drauṇiḥ pārthanivāraṇe / 26.180 /
analyzed: tatra vegam param cakre drauṇiḥ pārtha nivāraṇe

original: nacainamaśakat tartuṃ yatnavānapi phalgunaḥ /
analyzed: na ca enam aśakat tartum yatnavān api phalgunaḥ

original: tayorāsīcciraṃ yuddhaṃ citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca / 26.181 /
analyzed: tayoḥ āsīt ciram yuddham citram laghu ca suṣṭhu ca

original: ccclxxvii.tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇo lohitāyati bhāskare /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ lohitāyati bhāskare

original: ajite droṇatanaye tvahate ca jayadrathe /
analyzed: ajite droṇa tanaye tu ahate ca jayadrathe

original: arjunasya jayākāṅkṣī sasarja tama ūrjitam / 26.182 /
analyzed: arjunasya jaya ākāṅkṣī sasarja tamaḥ ūrjitam

original: tamovyāpte gagane sūryamastaṃ gataṃ matvā drauṇipūrvāḥ samastāḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ vyāpte gagane sūryam astam gatam matvā drauṇi pūrvāḥ samastāḥ

original: viśaśramuḥ saindhavaścārjunasya hatapratijñasya mukhaṃ samaikṣata / 26.183 /
analyzed: viśaśramuḥ saindhavaḥ ca arjunasya hata pratijñasya mukham samaikṣata  /

original: tadā harerājñayā ṇsakrasūnuścakarta bāṇena jayadrathasya /
analyzed: tadā hareḥ ājñayā ṇsakra sūnuḥ cakarta bāṇena jayadrathasya

original: agniṃ vivikṣanniva darśitaḥ śirastadā vacaḥ prāha janārdanastam / 26.184 /
analyzed: agnim vivikṣan iva darśitaḥ śiraḥ tadā vacaḥ prāha janārdanaḥ tam

original: naitacchiraḥ pātaya bhūtal . e tvamitīritaḥ pāṇsupatāstratejasā /
analyzed: na etat śiraḥ pātaya tvam iti īritaḥ

original: dadhāra bāṇairanupuṅkhapuṅkhaiḥ punastamūce garuḍadhvajo vacaḥ / 26.185 /
analyzed: dadhāra bāṇaiḥ anu puṅkha puṅkhaiḥ punar tam ūce garuḍadhvajaḥ vacaḥ

original: idaṃ pitustasya kare nipātyatāṃ varo'sya datto hi purā'munā'yam /
analyzed: idam pituḥ tasya kare nipātyatām varaḥ usya dattaḥ hi purā amunā ayam

original: śiro nikṛttaṃ bhuvi pātayed yastavāsya bhūyācca śiraḥ sahasradhā / 26.186 /
analyzed: śiraḥ nikṛttam bhuvi pātayet yaḥ tava asya bhūyāt ca śiraḥ sahasradhā

original: iti sma vadhyaḥ sa pitā'pi tenetyudīrite tasya sandhyākriyasya /
analyzed: iti sma vadhyaḥ sa pitā api tena iti udīrite tasya sandhyā kriyasya

original: aṅke vyadhāt tacchira āṇsu vāsaviḥ sa sambhramāt tad bhuvi ca nyapātayat / 26.187 /
analyzed: aṅke vyadhāt tat śiraḥ vāsaviḥ sa sambhramāt tat bhuvi ca nyapātayat  /

original: tato'bhavat tasya śiraḥ sahasradhā hariśca cakre tamaso layaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhavat tasya śiraḥ sahasradhā hariḥ ca cakre tamasaḥ layam punar

original: tadaiva sūrye sakalaiśca dṛṣṭe hāheti vādaḥ sumahānathā'sīt / 26.188 /
analyzed: tadā eva sūrye sakalaiḥ ca dṛṣṭe hāhā iti vādaḥ su mahān atha āsīt

original: bhīmastadā ṇsalyasuyodhanādīn kṛpaṃ ca jitvā vyanadat subhairavam /
