analyzed: sa karṇam āhūya yuyodha tena tasya anu duryodhana pūrvakān ca ye

original: droṇena caitān samare sa eko nivārayāmāsa mamarda cādhikam / 26.239 /
analyzed: droṇena ca etān samare saḥ ekaḥ nivārayāmāsa mamarda ca adhikam

original: te bādhyamānā bahuśo balīyasā karṇaṃ purodhāya tamabhyayodhayan /
analyzed: te bādhyamānāḥ bahuśas balīyasā karṇam purodhāya tam abhyayodhayan

original: na vivyathe tatra raṇe sa karṇaḥ svavīryamāsthāya mahāstravettā / 26.240 /
analyzed: na vivyathe tatra raṇe sa karṇaḥ sva vīryam āsthāya mahā astra vettā

original: nivārayāmāsa guroḥ sutaṃ tadā bhīmastrigartāñchatamanyunandanaḥ /
analyzed: nivārayāmāsa guroḥ sutam tadā bhīmaḥ trigartān śatamanyu nandanaḥ

original: alambalo nāma tadaiva rākṣasaḥ samāgamad bhīmasutaṃ nihantum / 26.241 /
analyzed: alambalaḥ nāma tadā eva rākṣasaḥ samāgamat bhīma sutam nihantum

original: yuddhvā pragṛhyainamatho nipātya ghaṭotkaco bhūmital . e'sinā'sya /
analyzed: yuddhvā pragṛhya enam atho nipātya ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: utkṛtya śīrṣaṃ tu suyodhane'kṣipad viṣeduratrākhilabhūmipālāḥ / 26.242 /
analyzed: utkṛtya śīrṣam tu suyodhana īkṣipat viṣeduḥ atra akhila bhūmipālāḥ

original: alāyudho'thā'gamadugravīryo narāṇsanastaṃ sa ghaṭotkaco'bhyayāt /
analyzed: alāyudhā utha agamat ugra vīryaḥ narāṇsanaḥ tam sa

original: yuddhvā muhūrtaṃ sa tu tena bhūmau nipātya taṃ yajñapaśuṃ cakāra / 26.243 /
analyzed: yuddhvā muhūrtam sa tu tena bhūmau nipātya tam yajña paśum cakāra  /

original: athāsya śira uddhṛtya krodhād duryodhanorasi /
analyzed: atha asya śiraḥ uddhṛtya krodhāt duryodhana urasi

original: cikṣepa tena sambhrāntāḥ sarve duryodhanādayaḥ / 26.244 /
analyzed: cikṣepa tena sambhrāntāḥ sarve duryodhana ādayaḥ

original: ghaṭotkacabalakhyātyai samarthenāpi yo raṇe /
analyzed: ghaṭotkaca bala khyātyai samarthena api yaḥ raṇe

original: na hato bhīmasenena hato'smin bhaimaseninā / 26.245 /
analyzed: na hataḥ bhīmasenena hataḥ asmin bhaimaseninā

original: sarve sañcodayāmāsuḥ karṇaṃ śaktivimokṣaṇe /
analyzed: sarve sañcodayāmāsuḥ karṇam śakti vimokṣaṇe

original: asmin hate hataṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ naḥ pārthaḥ kariṣyati / 26.246 /
analyzed: asmin hate hatam sarvam kim naḥ pārthaḥ kariṣyati  /

original: evaṃ sañcodyamānaḥ sa dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: evam sañcodyamānaḥ sa dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ punar punar

original: haiḍimbenārdyamānaistu svayaṃ ca bhṛśapīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: haiḍimbena ardyamānaiḥ tu svayam ca bhṛśa pīḍitaḥ

original: ādatta śaktiṃ vipulāṃ pākaśāsanasammatām / 26.247 /
analyzed: ādatta śaktim vipulām pākaśāsana sammatām

original: t āmambarasthāya ghaṭotkacāya śailopamāyātulavikramāya /
analyzed: t ām ambara sthāya ghaṭotkacāya śaila upamāya atula vikramāya

original: cikṣepa mṛtyo rasanopamāmalaṃ prakāṇsayantīṃ pradiśo diśaśca / 26.248 /
analyzed: cikṣepa mṛtyoḥ rasanā upamām alam prakāṇsayantīm pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca

original: ccclxxxiii.nirbhiṇṇavakṣāḥ sa tayā papāta vicūrṇayañchatrubalaṃ hato'pi /
analyzed: sa tayā papāta vicūrṇayan śatru balam hataḥ api

original: tasmin hate jahṛṣurdhārtarāṣṭrā uccukruśurdudhuvuścāmbarāṇi / 26.249 /
analyzed: tasmin hate jahṛṣuḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ uccukruśuḥ dudhuvuḥ ca ambarāṇi

original: tadā nanarta keśavaḥ samāṇsliṣacca phalgunam /
analyzed: tadā nanarta keśavaḥ samāṇsliṣat ca phalgunam

original: nanāda śaṅkhamādhamajjahāsa corunisvanaḥ / 26.250 /
analyzed: nanāda śaṅkham ādhamat jahāsa ca ūru nisvanaḥ

original: tamapṛcchad guḍākeśaḥ kimetaditi durmanāḥ /
analyzed: tam apṛcchat guḍākeśaḥ kim etat iti durmanāḥ

original: hate sute'graje'smākaṃ vīre kiṃ nandasi prabho / 26.251 /
analyzed: hate sute igraje smākam vīre kim nandasi prabho

original: tamāha bhagavān kṛṣṇo diṣṭyā jīvasi phalguna /
analyzed: tam āha bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ diṣṭyā jīvasi phalguna

original: tvadarthaṃ nihitā ṇsaktirvimuktā'smin hi rākṣase / 26.252 /
analyzed: tvad artham nihitā ṇsaktiḥ vimuktā asmin hi rākṣase

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro duḥkhādamarṣāccābhyavartata /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ duḥkhāt amarṣāt ca abhyavartata

original: karṇaṃ prati tamāhātha kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ / 26.253 /
analyzed: karṇam prati tam āha atha kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: yayā'rjuno nihantavyastayā'sau rākṣaso hataḥ /
analyzed: yayā arjunaḥ nihantavyaḥ tayā asau rākṣasaḥ hataḥ

original: tanmā ṇsucastvaṃ rājendra diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥ /
analyzed: tat mā ṇsucaḥ tvam rāja indra diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥ

original: ityuktvā prayayau vyāsastato yuddhamavartata / 26.254 /
analyzed: iti uktvā prayayau vyāsaḥ tatas yuddham avartata

original: bhīmārjunābhyāmiha hanyamāne bale kurūṇāmitaraiśca pāṇḍave /
analyzed: bhīma arjunābhyām iha hanyamāne bale kurūṇām itaraiḥ ca pāṇḍave

original: pradīpahastā atha yodhakāṇsca sarve'pi nidrāvaśagā babhūvuḥ / 26.255 /
analyzed: pradīpa hastāḥ atha sarve api nidrā vaśa gāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: dṛṣṭvaiva tānāha dhanañjayastadā svapsyantu yāvacchaśinaḥ prakāṇsaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tān āha dhanañjayaḥ tadā svapsyantu yāvat śaśinaḥ

original: itīritā āṇsiṣaḥ phalgunāya prayujya sarve suṣupuryathāsthitāḥ / 26.256 /
analyzed: iti īritāḥ phalgunāya prayujya sarve suṣupuḥ yathāsthitāḥ

original: punaśca candre'bhyudite yudhe te samāyayuḥ śastramahāstravarṣāḥ /
analyzed: punar ca candrebhyaḥ udite yudhe te samāyayuḥ śastra mahā astra varṣāḥ

original: tatrā'yātaḥ sātyakiṃ somadatto bhūriśca tābhyāṃ yuyudhe sa ekaḥ / 26.257 /
analyzed: tatra āyātaḥ sātyakim somadattaḥ bhūriḥ ca tābhyām yuyudhe saḥ ekaḥ

original: hatau ca tau petatustena bhūmau bāhlīka enaṃ samare tvayodhayat /
analyzed: hatau ca tau petatuḥ tena bhūmau vāhlīkaḥ enam samare tu ayodhayat

original: sa sātyakiṃ virathīkṛtya bāṇaṃ vadhāya tasyā'śu mumoca vīraḥ / 26.258 /
analyzed: sa sātyakim virathīkṛtya bāṇam vadhāya tasya āśu mumoca vīraḥ

original: ciccheda taṃ bhīmasenastridhaiva tasmai śataghnīṃ prajahāra bāhlikaḥ /
analyzed: ciccheda tam bhīmasenaḥ tridhā eva tasmai śataghnīm prajahāra bāhlikaḥ

original: tayā hato vihvalito vṛkodaro jaghāna taṃ gadayā so'patacca / 26.259 /
analyzed: tayā hataḥ vihvalitaḥ vṛkodaraḥ jaghāna tam gadayā saḥ upatat ca

original: bāhlīkaḥ prārthayāmāsa pūrvaṃ snehapurassaram /
analyzed: vāhlīkaḥ prārthayāmāsa pūrvam sneha purassaram

original: ccclxxxiv.bhīmaṃ tvayaiva hantavyo raṇe'haṃ prītimicchatā /
analyzed: tvayā eva hantavyaḥ raṇa iham prītim icchatā

original: tadā yaśaśca dharmaṃ ca lokaṃ ca prāpnuyāmaham / 26.260 /
analyzed: tadā yaśaḥ ca dharmam ca lokam ca prāpnuyām aham

original: ityukta āha taṃ bhīmo nitarāṃ vyathitastadā /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ āha tam bhīmaḥ nitarām vyathitaḥ tadā

original: hanyāṃ naivānyathā yuddhe tat te śuśrūṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: hanyām na eva anyathā yuddhe tat te śuśrūṣaṇam bhavet

original: iti tena hatastatra bhīmasenena bāhlikaḥ / 26.261 /
analyzed: iti tena hataḥ tatra bhīmasenena bāhlikaḥ

original: hate bāhlīke kauravā bhīmasenamabhyājagmuḥ karṇaduryodhanādyāḥ /
analyzed: hate vāhlīke kauravāḥ bhīmasenam abhyājagmuḥ karṇa duryodhana ādyāḥ

original: drauṇiṃ puraskṛtya guruṃ ca pārṣataḥ sabhrātṛkaḥ sātyakinā samabhyayāt / 26.262 /
analyzed: drauṇim puraskṛtya gurum ca pārṣataḥ sa bhrātṛkaḥ sātyakinā samabhyayāt

original: saṃ śaptakaireva pārtho yuyodha tad yuddhamāsīdati raudramadbhutam /
analyzed: sam śaptakaiḥ eva pārthaḥ yuyodha tat yuddham āsīt ati raudram adbhutam

original: akṣohiṇī tatra bhīmārjunābhyāṃ nisūditā rātriyuddhe samastā / 26.263 /
analyzed: akṣohiṇī tatra bhīma arjunābhyām nisūditā rātri yuddhe samastā

original: tataḥ sūryaścābhyuditastadā'tighoraṃ droṇaḥ karma yuddhe cakāra /
analyzed: tatas sūryaḥ ca abhyuditaḥ tadā ati ghoram droṇaḥ karma yuddhe cakāra

original: sa pāñcālānāṃ rathavṛndaṃ praviśya jaghāna hastyaśvarathān narāṃ śca / 26.264 /
analyzed: sa pāñcālānām ratha vṛndam praviśya jaghāna hasti aśva rathān narān ca

original: vidrāvitāstena mahārathāṇsca naivāvindañcharma bāṇāndhakāre /
analyzed: vidrāvitāḥ tena mahā rathān ca na eva avindan śarma bāṇa andhakāre

original: yuveva vṛddho'pi cacāra yuddhe sa ugradhanvā paramāstravettā / 26.265 /
analyzed: yuvā iva vṛddhaḥ api cacāra yuddhe saḥ ugra dhanvā parama astra vettā

original: rathārbudaṃ tena hataṃ ca tatra tataḥ sahasraṃ guṇitaṃ narāṇām /
analyzed: ratha arbudam tena hatam ca tatra tatas sahasram guṇitam narāṇām

original: tato daśāṃ śo nihato hayānāṃ gajārbudaṃ caiva raṇotkaṭena / 26.266 /
analyzed: tatas daśām śaḥ nihataḥ hayānām gaja arbudam ca eva raṇa utkaṭena

original: tathā virāṭadrupadau śarābhyāṃ nināya lokaṃ paramājimadhye /
analyzed: tathā virāṭa drupadau śarābhyām nināya lokam parama āji madhye

original: tato vijityaiva guroḥ sutādīn dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ bhīmaseno jugopa / 26.267 /
analyzed: tatas vijitya eva guroḥ suta ādīn dhṛṣṭadyumnam bhīmasenaḥ jugopa  /

original: dhṛṣṭadyumno bhīmasenābhigupto droṇaṃ hantuṃ yatnamuccaiścakāra /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ bhīmasena abhiguptaḥ droṇam hantum yatnam uccais cakāra

original: nivārayāmāsa guruḥ śaraughairdhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ so'pi taṃ sāyakena /
analyzed: nivārayāmāsa guruḥ śara oghaiḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam saḥ upi tam sāyakena

original: vivyādha tenābhihataḥ sa mūrcchāmavāpa vipro niṣasāda cā'śu / 26.268 /
analyzed: vivyādha tena abhihataḥ sa mūrcchām avāpa vipraḥ niṣasāda ca āśu

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ satvaraṃ khaḍgacarmaṇī ādāya tasyā'ruruhe rathottamam /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sa tvaram khaḍga carmaṇī ādāya tasya āruruhe ratha uttamam

original: sañjñāmavāpyātha guruḥ śaraughaiḥ prādeśamātrairvyathayāmāsa taṃ ca / 26.269 /
analyzed: sañjñām avāpya atha guruḥ śara oghaiḥ prādeśa mātraiḥ vyathayāmāsa tam ca

original: sa tairativyathitastadrathācca parāvṛttaḥ svaṃ rathamāruroha /
analyzed: sa taiḥ ativyathitaḥ tad rathāt ca parāvṛttaḥ svam ratham āruroha

original: susaṃ rabdhau tau punareva yuddhaṃ sañcakraturvṛṣṭaṇsarāmbudhārau / 26.270 /
analyzed: su sam rabdhau tau punar eva yuddham sañcakratuḥ vṛṣṭaṇsara ambu dhārau

original: ccclxxxv.nivārya śatruṃ sa śarairbrahmāstramasṛjad dvijaḥ /
analyzed: nivārya śatrum sa śaraiḥ brahmāstram asṛjat dvijaḥ

original: tena sandāhayāmāsa pāñcālān subahūn raṇe /
analyzed: tena sandāhayāmāsa pāñcālān su bahūn raṇe

original: purujit kuntibhojaśca tenānye ca hatāstadā / 26.271 /
analyzed: purujit kuntibhojaḥ ca tena anye ca hatāḥ tadā

original: bhīmo'rjunaḥ sātyakiśca paryāyeṇa guroḥ sutam /
analyzed: bhīma ūrjunaḥ sātyakiḥ ca paryāyeṇa guroḥ sutam

original: dūrato vārayāmāsurmahatyā senayā saha / 26.272 /
analyzed: dūratas vārayāmāsuḥ mahatyā senayā saha

original: karṇaduryodhanādīṃ śca śalyaṃ bhojaṃ kṛpaṃ tathā /
analyzed: karṇa duryodhana ādīn śca śalyam bhojam kṛpam tathā

original: bhīmārjunau śaraugheṇa vārayāmāsatū raṇe / 26.273 /
analyzed: bhīma arjunau śara ogheṇa vārayāmāsatuḥ raṇe

original: tatra bhīmo gajānīkaṃ jayatsenaṃ ca māgadham /
analyzed: tatra bhīmaḥ gaja anīkam jayatsenam ca māgadham

original: jaghāna subahūṃ ścaiva māgadhānāṃ rathavrajān / 26.274 /
analyzed: jaghāna su bahūm śca eva māgadhānām ratha vrajān

original: atha māl . avarājasya tvaśvatthāmābhidhaṃ gajam /
analyzed: atha mās avarājasya tu aśvatthāma abhidham gajam

original: bhīmasenahataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevapracoditaḥ /
analyzed: bhīmasena hatam dṛṣṭvā vāsudeva pracoditaḥ

original: aṇsvatthāmā hata iti prāha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 26.275 /
analyzed: aṇsvatthāmā hataḥ iti prāha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: aṇsvatthāmavadhaṃ śrutvā nāhaṃ yotsya iti svayam /
analyzed: aṇsvatthāma vadham śrutvā na aham yotsye iti svayam

original: puroktaṃ dharmajāyaiva tena droṇo yudhiṣṭhiram / 26.276 /
analyzed: purā uktam dharmajāyā eva tena droṇaḥ yudhiṣṭhiram

original: brūhi satyamiti prāha satyamityeva so'bravīt /
analyzed: brūhi satyam iti prāha satyam iti eva sā ubravīt

original: upāṃ śu kuñjaraśceti droṇo'to vyathito'bhavat / 26.277 /
analyzed: upām śu kuñjaraḥ ca iti vyathitaḥ bhavat

original: tasya bhīmo ratheṣāṃ ca gṛhītvā na tavedṛśam /
analyzed: tasya bhīmaḥ ratha īṣām ca gṛhītvā na tava īdṛśam

original: yogyaṃ guṇavato nityaṃ paradharmopajīvanam / 26.278 /
analyzed: yogyam guṇavataḥ nityam para dharma upajīvanam

original: ityāha khasthā munayaścālamehīti taṃ tadā /
analyzed: iti āha kha sthāḥ munayaḥ ca alam ehi iti tam tadā

original: ūcustadakhilaṃ j ñātvā droṇaḥ śastramavāsṛjat / 26.279 /
analyzed: ūcuḥ tat akhilam j ñātvā droṇaḥ śastram avāsṛjat  /

original: sa nyasya karmāṇi tadā'khilāni yogārūḍhaḥ paramaṃ vāsudevam /
analyzed: sa nyasya karmāṇi tadā akhilāni yoga ārūḍhaḥ paramam vāsudevam

original: sarveśvaraṃ nityanirastadoṣaṃ dhyāyan muktvā dehamagāt svadhāma /
analyzed: sarveśvaram nitya nirasta doṣam dhyāyan muktvā deham agāt sva dhāma

original: taṃ keśavaḥ pāṇḍavā gautamaśca yāntaṃ svalokaṃ daddaśurvihāyasā / 26.280 /
analyzed: tam keśavaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ gautamaḥ ca yāntam sva lokam daddaśuḥ vihāyasā

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pāṇḍavairvāryamāṇo'pyagāt khaḍgaṃ carma cā'dāya tatra /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ vāryamāṇaḥ upi agāt khaḍgam carma ca ādāya tatra

original: chitvā'sinā tasya śiraḥ punaśca rathaṃ svakīyaṃ tvarayā samāsthitaḥ /
analyzed: chitvā asinā tasya śiraḥ punar ca ratham svakīyam tvarayā samāsthitaḥ

original: ccclxxxvi.dṛṣṭvā kṛpastaṃ subhṛśaṃ bhayārditaḥ samprādravad vājinamekamāsthitaḥ / 26.281 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kṛpaḥ tam su bhṛśam bhaya arditaḥ samprādravat vājinam ekam āsthitaḥ

original: sañchinne droṇaṇsirasi garhayāmāsa vāsaviḥ /
analyzed: sañchinne droṇaṇ sirasi garhayāmāsa vāsaviḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ sātyakiścāpi kopitaḥ / 26.282 /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram ca pāñcālyam sātyakiḥ ca api kopitaḥ

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnastu tāvāha kathaṃ bhūriśravā hataḥ /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tu tau āha katham bhūriśravāḥ hataḥ

original: iti taṃ sātyakiḥ kruddho gadāpāṇiḥ samabhyayāt /
analyzed: iti tam sātyakiḥ kruddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ samabhyayāt

original: āhvayāmāsa pāñcālyastaṃ dhṛt āsiravismayaḥ / 26.283 /
analyzed: āhvayāmāsa pāñcālyaḥ tam dhṛt āsiḥ avismayaḥ

original: tadā jagrāha śaineyaṃ bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇapracoditaḥ /
analyzed: tadā jagrāha śaineyam bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇa pracoditaḥ

original: śamayāmāsa pārthaṃ ca pāñcālyasnehayantritaḥ / 26.284 /
analyzed: śamayāmāsa pārtham ca pāñcālya sneha yantritaḥ  /

original: te vāsudevena tadā'nuśikṣit āḥ snehaṃ punaḥ pūrvavadāpuruttamam /
analyzed: te vāsudevena tadā anuśikṣit āḥ sneham punar pūrva vat āpuḥ uttamam

original: yattāṇsca yuddhāya samudyatāṇsca tadā'gamad drauṇirapyāttadhanvā / 26.285 /
analyzed: yattān ca yuddhāya samudyatān ca tadā agamat drauṇiḥ api ātta dhanvā

original: āṇsrutya tātaṃ nihataṃ pratijñāṃ cakāra niḥ śeṣaripupramāthane /
analyzed: tātam nihatam pratijñām cakāra niḥ śeṣa ripu pramāthane

original: nārāyaṇāstraṃ visasarja kopāt tadā bhīt ā bhīmamṛte samastāḥ / 26.286 /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa astram visasarja kopāt tadā ā bhīmam ṛte samastāḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha viṣaṇṇacetanaḥ śaineyapūrvāḥ pratiyāntu sarve /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha viṣaṇṇa cetanaḥ śaineya pūrvāḥ pratiyāntu sarve

original: sabhrātṛko'haṃ drauṇivarāstramagno bhaveyamityatra jagāda keśavaḥ / 26.287 /
analyzed: sa bhrātṛkaḥ ham drauṇi vara astra magnaḥ bhaveyam iti atra jagāda keśavaḥ

original: namadhvamastrasya tato vimokṣyathetyatha praṇemuśca dhanañjayādikāḥ /

analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

nḸarāyaṇāstropaśamanaṃ nḸama ṣaḍviṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: vikṣobhayāmāsa ca śatru sainyam siṃ ho yathā eva śva sṛgāla yūtham

analyzed: nirdhūta yuddha śramaḥ ātta dhanvā yoddhum gaja ogham pratinādita aṇsaḥ

analyzed: gajān mardayati dhārtarāṣṭraḥ yudhiṣṭhiram

analyzed: agāt yuddhāya tau yuddham rājānau cakratuḥ ciram

analyzed: nakulam viratham kṛtvā karṇa utha prapalāyitam

analyzed: anudrutya ca vegena kaṇṭhe dhanuḥ avāsṛjat  /

analyzed: na jaghāna eva nakulam visṛjya ca yayau parān

original: yuyodha śaineyamathārathāvubhau parasparaṃ cakraturuttamāhave / 27.18 /
analyzed: yuyodha śaineyam atha arathau ubhau parasparam cakratuḥ uttama āhave

analyzed: nikṛtya ca anyonyam ubhau ca carmaṇī vara asi pāṇī yugapad samīyatuḥ  /

original: tatrāpahastena śiraḥ sakuṇḍalaṃ jahāra vindasya mṛdhe sa sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: tatra apahastena śiraḥ sa kuṇḍalam jahāra vindasya mṛdhe sa sātyakiḥ

analyzed: nihatya tam bandhu janaiḥ su pūjitaḥ jagāma śatrūn aparān prakampayan  /

original: kṛpamāyāntamīkṣyaiva tapasāṃ māṃ prapīḍayet /
analyzed: kṛpam āyāntam īkṣya eva tapasām mām prapīḍayet

original: iti matvā pārṣatastu bhīmaṃ śaraṇameyivān / 27.21 /
analyzed: iti matvā pārṣataḥ tu bhīmam śaraṇam eyivān

original: karṇaṃ samantāt pratikālayantaṃ varūthinīmindrasutaḥ samabhyayāt /

analyzed: bāhum pratigṛhya pārthaḥ jigāya mām anya manaskam ājau  /

original: kāmaṃ ratho me dhanurapyabhedyaṃ dattaṃ bhṛgūṇāmadhipena divyam /

analyzed: duryodhanaḥ rathinaḥ sāratheḥ tu vyāvarṇayan uttama tām aśāmayat  /

analyzed: buddhyā balena jñānena dhairya ādyaiḥ api yodhikaḥ

original: ityādivākyaiḥ saṃ śānta iva śalyo'sya sārathiḥ /

original: babhūva tena sahitaḥ senāṃ vyūhya raveḥ sutaḥ / 27.27 /

original: gacchan yuddhāya darpeṇa prāha yo me'rjunaṃ pumān /
analyzed: gacchan yuddhāya darpeṇa prāha yaḥ mā irjunam pumān

analyzed: darśayet tasya dāsyāmi prītaḥ

analyzed: iti bruvantam bahuśas prāha śalyaḥ prahasya ca

original: kākagomāyudharmā tvaṃ haṃ sasiṃ hopamaṃ raṇe /
analyzed: kāka gomāyu dharmā tvam ham sasim ha upamam raṇe

original: mā yāhi pārthaṃ mā yāhi hato'nena yamakṣayam / 27.30 /
analyzed: mā yāhi pārtham mā yāhi hata ūnena yama kṣayam

original: ityukte ravijo madrān nitarāṃ paryakutsayat /
analyzed: iti ukte ravijaḥ madrān nitarām paryakutsayat

original: śalyo'pi sarvadeśeṣu nīcamadhyottamā narāḥ /

original: santītyuktvā'sya sārathyaṃ cakre pārthahitepsayā / 27.31 /
analyzed: santi iti uktvā asya sārathyam cakre pārtha hita īpsayā

original: karṇo'tha śalyaniyatena rathena pārthasenāmavāpya vidudhāva śaraiḥ samantāt /
analyzed: karṇaḥ utha śalya niyatena rathena pārtha senām avāpya vidudhāva śaraiḥ samantāt

original: saṃ rakṣito yudhi suyodhanagautamādyairācāryajena ca mahāstravidāṃ vareṇa / 27.32 /
analyzed: sam rakṣitaḥ yudhi suyodhana gautama ādyaiḥ ācārya jena ca mahā astra vidām vareṇa

original: taṃ bhīmapārṣataśinipravarābhiguptā sā pāṇḍaveyapṛtanā'bhivavarṣa bāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tam bhīma pārṣata śini pravara abhiguptā sā pāṇḍaveya pṛtanā abhivavarṣa bāṇaiḥ

original: t āṃ sūryasūnuratha bāṇavarairvidārya samprārdayacchitaśarairapi dharmasūnum / 27.33 /
analyzed: t ām sūryasūnuḥ atha bāṇa varaiḥ vidārya samprārdayat śita śaraiḥ api dharmasūnum

original: cccxcii.kṛtvā tamāṇsu virathaṃ dhanurasya kaṇṭhe sajyaṃ nidhāya paruṣā gira āha coccaiḥ /
analyzed: viratham dhanuḥ asya kaṇṭhe sajyam nidhāya paruṣāḥ giraḥ āha ca uccais

original: dṛṣṭvaiva mārutiramuṃ bhṛśamātutoda duryodhanaṃ virathakārmukamatra kṛtvā / 27.34 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva mārutiḥ amum bhṛśam ātutoda duryodhanam viratha kārmukam atra kṛtvā

original: taṃ prāṇasaṃ śayagataṃ nṛpatiṃ nirīkṣya karṇaṃ jagāda yudhi madrapatiḥ pradarśya /
analyzed: tam prāṇasam śaya gatam nṛpatim nirīkṣya karṇam jagāda yudhi madra patiḥ pradarśya

original: yasyārtha eva samarastvamiyaṃ ca senāṃ taṃ tvaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prayiyāsumadya /
analyzed: yasya arthaḥ eva samaraḥ tvam iyam ca senām tam tvam yamasya sadanam prayiyāsum adya

original: bhīmena pīḍitamamuṃ paripāhi śīghraṃ kiṃ te yudhiṣṭhiramimaṃ hi mudhā'bhipīḍya / 27.35 /
analyzed: bhīmena pīḍitam amum paripāhi śīghram kim te yudhiṣṭhiram imam hi mudhā abhipīḍya

analyzed: śrutvā asya vākyam atihāya yudhiṣṭhiram tam karṇaḥ yayau

original: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ pavanasūnurabhi tviyāya krodhād didhakṣuriva karṇamameyadhāmā / 27.36 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tam pavanasūnuḥ abhi tu iyāya krodhāt didhakṣuḥ iva karṇam ameya dhāmā

original: rājāvanāya śinipuṅgavapārṣatau ca sandiśya karṇamabhigacchata āsa rūpam /
analyzed: rāja avanāya śini puṅgava pārṣatau ca sandiśya karṇam abhigacchataḥ āsa rūpam

original: ante kṛt āntanarasiṃ hatanoryathaiva viṣṇorharaṃ grasata āttasamastaviśvam /
analyzed: ante kṛt ha tanoḥ yathā eva viṣṇoḥ haram grasate ātta samasta viśvam

original: tadvegataḥ praticacāla dharā samastā vidrāvitā ca sakalā prativīrasenā / 27.37 /

original: vaikartanena śarasañcayatāḍitaḥ sa bāṇaṃ ca vajrasadṛśaṃ pramumoca tasmin /
analyzed: vaikartanena śara sañcaya tāḍitaḥ sa bāṇam ca vajra sadṛśam pramumoca tasmin

original: tenā'hato mṛtakavat sa papāta karṇo bhīmaḥ kṣuraṃ ca jagṛhe'bhiyayau ca padbhyām / 27.38 /
analyzed: tena āhataḥ mṛtaka vat sa papāta karṇaḥ bhīmaḥ kṣuram ca jagṛhe abhiyayau ca padbhyām

original: nindāṃ harestu vidadhāti parokṣago'pi yastaṃ pragṛhya karavāṇi vijiṃ hvameva /
analyzed: nindām hareḥ tu vidadhāti parokṣa gopi yaḥ tam pragṛhya karavāṇi vijim hvam eva

original: evaṃ hi vāyutanayasya mahāpratijñā chettuṃ sa tena ravijasya sasāra jiṃ hvām / 27.39 /
analyzed: evam hi vāyu tanayasya mahā pratijñā chettum sa tena ravijasya sasāra jim hvām

original: āyāntamantikamamuṃ prasamīkṣya śalyo netyāha hetubhiraho na mṛṣā pratijñā /
analyzed: āyāntam antikam amum prasamīkṣya śalyaḥ na iti āha hetubhiḥ aho na mṛṣā pratijñā

original: kāryā tvayaiva puruhūtasutasya jiṃ hvāṃ mā tena pātaya marutsuta sūtasūnoḥ / 27.40 /
analyzed: kāryā tvayā eva puruhūta sutasya jim hvām mā tena pātaya marut suta sūtasūnoḥ  /

original: ityuktvā pramukhāt tasya rathenaiva tu madrarāṭ/
analyzed: iti uktvā pramukhāt tasya rathena eva tu madra rāj

original: vaikartanamapovāha sarvalokasya paśyataḥ / 27.41 /
analyzed: vaikartanam apovāha sarva lokasya paśyataḥ

original: jitvā sūryasutaṃ bhīmaḥ kauravāṇāmanīkinīm /
analyzed: jitvā sūryasutam bhīmaḥ kauravāṇām anīkinīm

original: sarvāṃ vidrāvayāmāsa drauṇiduryodhanāvṛt ām / 27.42 /
analyzed: sarvām vidrāvayāmāsa drauṇi duryodhana āvṛt ām

original: akṣohiṇītrayaṃ tena tadā vilul . itaṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: akṣohiṇī trayam tena tadā kṣaṇāt

original: tadaiva guruputro'yāt pāṇḍavānāmanīkinīm / 27.43 /
analyzed: tadā eva guru putraḥ uyāt pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm

original: vimṛdya sakalāṃ senāṃ kṛtvā ca virathaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: vimṛdya sakalām senām kṛtvā ca viratham nṛpam

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ yamau caiva sātyakiṃ draupadīsutān /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam yamau ca eva sātyakim draupadī sutān

original: kṣaṇena virathīkṛtya sarvāṃ ścakre nirāyudhān / 27.44 /
analyzed: kṣaṇena virathīkṛtya sarvān ścakre nirāyudhān

original: cccxciii.t ān bhagnadarpān raṇato'payātānanveva bāṇāvṛtamantarikṣam /
analyzed: ān bhagna darpān raṇata upayātān anu eva bāṇa āvṛtam antarikṣam

original: kurvan yayau dharmarājastamāha kiṃ naḥ svadharme niratān vihaṃ si / 27.45 /
analyzed: kurvan yayau dharmarājaḥ tam āha kim naḥ svadharme niratān

original: kṣatriyān paradharmastho mā hiṃ sīriti coditaḥ /
analyzed: kṣatriyān para dharma sthaḥ mā him sīḥ iti coditaḥ

original: prahasya tān vihāyaiva yayau yatrācyutārjunau / 27.46 /
analyzed: prahasya tān vihāya eva yayau yatra acyuta arjunau

original: saṃ śaptakaistatra saṃ yuddhyamānaṃ samāhvayāmāsa sureśasūnum /
analyzed: sam śaptakaiḥ tatra sam yuddhyamānam samāhvayāmāsa sureśa sūnum

original: sa bāṇayuktaṃ bhujagendrakalpamunnamya bāhuṃ yudhaye suśūram / 27.47 /
analyzed: sa bāṇa yuktam bhujaga indra kalpam unnamya bāhum yudhaye su śūram

analyzed: pārthaḥ sam śaptaka gaṇaiḥ sam sṛṣṭaḥ samara arthibhiḥ

original: āhūto drauṇinā caiva kāryaṃ kṛṣṇamapṛcchata /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ drauṇinā ca eva kāryam kṛṣṇam apṛcchata

original: codayāmāsa ca hayān kṛṣṇo drauṇirathaṃ prati / 27.48 /
analyzed: codayāmāsa ca hayān kṛṣṇaḥ drauṇi ratham prati

original: ubhau ca tāvastravidāṃ pradhānau mahābalau saṃ yati jātadarpau /
analyzed: ubhau ca tau astra vidām pradhānau mahā balau sam yati jāta darpau

original: śaraiḥ samastāḥ pradiśo diśaśca droṇendrasūnū timirāḥ pracakratuḥ / 27.49 /
analyzed: śaraiḥ samastāḥ pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca droṇa indra sūnū timirāḥ pracakratuḥ  /

original: drauṇistadā syandanavājiromasvaromakūpadhvajakārmukebhyaḥ /
analyzed: drauṇiḥ tadā syandana vāji roma sva romakūpa dhvaja kārmukebhyaḥ

original: śarānamoghān satataṃ sṛj āno babandha pārthaṃ śarapañjareṇa / 27.50 /
analyzed: śarān amoghān satatam sṛj ānaḥ babandha pārtham śara pañjareṇa  /

original: tasmin nibaddhe hariraprameyo vibodhayāmāsa surendrasūnum /
analyzed: tasmin nibaddhe hariḥ aprameyaḥ vibodhayāmāsa sura indra sūnum

original: āliṅganenāsya dadau balaṃ ca sa utthito'strāṇyamucanmahānti / 27.51 /
analyzed: āliṅganena asya dadau balam ca saḥ utthita ustrāṇi amucat mahānti

original: nivārya tānyastravarairguroḥ sutaściccheda ca jyāṃ yudhi gāṇḍivasya /
analyzed: nivārya tāni astra varaiḥ guroḥ sutaḥ ciccheda ca jyām yudhi gāṇḍivasya

original: vavarṣa pārthaṃ ca śarairathā'nyā jyā'sīt tayā gāṇḍivaṃ so'pyayuṅkta / 27.52 /
analyzed: vavarṣa pārtham ca śaraiḥ atha anyā jyā āsīt tayā gāṇḍivam saḥ upi ayuṅkta

original: tataḥ śareṇa kupitaḥ śitena drauṇisāratheḥ /
analyzed: tatas śareṇa kupitaḥ śitena drauṇi sāratheḥ

original: śiro jahāra kaunteyaḥ sārathyaṃ so'karot svayam / 27.53 /
analyzed: śiraḥ jahāra kaunteyaḥ sārathyam saḥ akarot svayam

original: śarān visṛjatā tena sārathyamapi kurvatā /
analyzed: śarān visṛjatā tena sārathyam api kurvatā

original: śarakūṭena pārthaḥ sa punarbaddho dvijanmanā / 27.54 /
analyzed: śarakūṭena pārthaḥ sa punar baddhaḥ dvijanmanā  /

original: punarāliṅgya kṛṣṇastamadhācchatruvighātakam /
analyzed: punar āliṅgya kṛṣṇaḥ tam adhāt śatru vighātakam

original: balamasmiṃ stataḥ pārthaḥ uttasthau śaracāpabhṛt /
analyzed: balam asmin pārthaḥ uttasthau śara cāpa bhṛt

original: vavarṣa caśarān bhūyo droṇaputre'rimardanaḥ / 27.55 /
analyzed: vavarṣa ca śarān bhūyas droṇaputra iri mardanaḥ

original: cccxciv.punastasya nunoda jyāṃ drauṇiḥ sandhāya tāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: punar tasya nunoda jyām drauṇiḥ sandhāya tām punar

original: pārtho droṇasutasyāṇsvaraśmīṃ ściccheda sāyakaiḥ / 27.56 /
analyzed: pārthaḥ droṇa sutasya āṇ sva raśmīm ściccheda sāyakaiḥ

original: viraśmayo hayā drauṇeḥ punaḥ pārthaśarāhatāḥ /
analyzed: viraśmayaḥ hayāḥ drauṇeḥ punar pārtha śara āhatāḥ

original: apohurdūrametasmāt so'pi saṃ sthāpya tān punaḥ /
analyzed: apohuḥ dūram etasmāt saḥ upi sam sthāpya tān punar

original: cintayāmāsa naitasmādadhikaṃ śakyate'rjune / 27.57 /
analyzed: cintayāmāsa na etasmāt adhikam śakyateḥ june  /

original: sārathitvāt keśavasya dhvajasthatvāddhanūmataḥ /
analyzed: sārathi tvāt keśavasya dhvaja stha tvāt hanūmataḥ

original: gāṇḍivatvāt kārmukasya ceṣudhyorakṣayatvataḥ / 27.58 /
analyzed: gāṇḍiva tvāt kārmukasya ca iṣudhyoḥ akṣaya tvataḥ  /

original: avadhyatvāt tathā'śvānāmabhedyatvād rathasya ca /
analyzed: avadhya tvāt tathā aśvānām abhedya tvāt rathasya ca

original: ato yoddhuṃ samartho'pi nādya yāmi dhanañjayam / 27.59 /
analyzed: atas yoddhum samarthaḥ api na adya yāmi dhanañjayam

original: evaṃ sa matvā praviveśa senāṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāmatha taṃ samabhyayāt /
analyzed: evam sa matvā praviveśa senām pāṇḍoḥ sutānām atha tam samabhyayāt

original: pāṇḍyastayorāsa suyuddhamadbhutaṃ pravarṣatoḥ sāyakapūgamugram / 27.60 /
analyzed: pāṇḍyaḥ tayoḥ āsa su yuddham adbhutam pravarṣatoḥ sāyaka pūgam ugram

original: aṣṭāvaṣṭaṇsatānyūhuḥ śakaṭāni yadāyudham /
analyzed: aṣṭau aṣṭaṣ satāni ūhuḥ śakaṭāni yat āyudham

original: ahnastadaṣṭabhāgena drauṇiścikṣepa tatra ha / 27.61 /
analyzed: ahnaḥ tad aṣṭa bhāgena drauṇiḥ cikṣepa tatra ha

original: atha taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā chitvā kārmukamāhave /
analyzed: atha tam viratham kṛtvā chitvā kārmukam āhave

original: sakuṇḍalaṃ śiro drauṇirjahāra makuṭojjvalam / 27.62 /
analyzed: sa kuṇḍalam śiraḥ drauṇiḥ jahāra makuṭa ujjvalam

original: atha vidrāvayāmāsa pṛtanāṃ pāṇḍavīṃ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: atha vidrāvayāmāsa pṛtanām pāṇḍavīm śaraiḥ

original: tadā jaghāna pārtho'pi daṇḍadhārākhyamāgadham / 27.63 /
analyzed: tadā jaghāna pārthaḥ upi daṇḍadhāra ākhya māgadham

original: vidrāpyamāṇāṃ pṛtanāṃ nirīkṣya guroḥ sutenābhyagamat tvarāvān /
analyzed: vidrāpyamāṇām pṛtanām nirīkṣya guroḥ sutena abhyagamat tvarāvān

original: dhṛṣṭadyumnastaṃ sa ūce supāpaṃ haniṣye tvāmadya yuddhe gurughnam / 27.64 /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tam saḥ ūce su pāpam haniṣye tvām adya yuddhe guru ghnam

original: ityukto darśayāmāsa pārṣataḥ khaḍgamuttamam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ darśayāmāsa pārṣataḥ khaḍgam uttamam

original: ayaṃ tava piturhantā vadiṣyati tavottaram / 27.65 /
analyzed: ayam tava pituḥ hantā vadiṣyati tava uttaram  /

original: ityuktvā dhanurādāya vavarṣa caśarān bahūn /
analyzed: iti uktvā dhanuḥ ādāya vavarṣa ca śarān bahūn

original: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam / 27.66 /
analyzed: tayoḥ samabhavat yuddham tumulam roma harṣaṇam

original: cccxcv.tatra pārṣataṃ drauṇiḥ kṣaṇena virathāyudham /
analyzed: tatra pārṣatam drauṇiḥ kṣaṇena viratha āyudham

original: kṛtvā'ntāya śarāṃ stīkṣṇān mumoca naca tasya te /
analyzed: kṛtvā antāya śarān stīkṣṇān mumoca na ca tasya te

original: tvacaṃ ca cicchidurdrauṇiḥ khaḍgahasto'bhijagmivān / 27.67 /
analyzed: tvacam ca cicchiduḥ drauṇiḥ khaḍga hastaḥ abhijagmivān

original: khaḍgena sāstraiḥ śastrairapyanirbhiṇṇatvacaṃ tadā /
analyzed: khaḍgena sa astraiḥ śastraiḥ api anirbhiṇṇa tvacam tadā

original: maurvyā mamantha dhanuṣaḥ pātayitvā dharātal . e / 27.68 /
analyzed: maurvyā mamantha dhanuṣaḥ pātayitvā

original: ākṛṣyamāṇaṃ pārṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇapracoditaḥ /
analyzed: ākṛṣyamāṇam pārṣatam dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇa pracoditaḥ

original: pārtho bhīmaścobhayataḥ śarairabhinijaghnatuḥ / 27.69 /
analyzed: pārthaḥ bhīmaḥ ca ubhayatas śaraiḥ abhinijaghnatuḥ  /

original: sa tābhyāṃ vajrasadṛśaiḥ śarairabhihato bhṛśam /
analyzed: sa tābhyām vajra sadṛśaiḥ śaraiḥ abhihataḥ bhṛśam

original: visṛjya pārṣataṃ svīyamāruroha rathaṃ punaḥ / 27.70 /
analyzed: visṛjya pārṣatam svīyam āruroha ratham punar

original: jagāma ca tato'nyatra pāñcālyo'pi rathaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: jagāma ca tatas nyatra pāñcālyaḥ api ratham punar

original: āruṃ hyānyaṃ svāttadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇamabhyayāt / 27.71 /
analyzed: ārum hi ānyam svāttadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam abhyayāt

original: tayorāsīt sutumulaṃ yuddhamadbhutadarśanam /
analyzed: tayoḥ āsīt su tumulam yuddham adbhuta darśanam

original: tatra nātiprayatnena pāñcālyo virathāyudham /
analyzed: tatra na ati prayatnena pāñcālyaḥ viratha āyudham

original: cakāra kṛtavarmāṇaṃ tamapovāha gautamaḥ / 27.72 /
analyzed: cakāra kṛtavarmāṇam tam apovāha gautamaḥ

original: atha duryodhano rājā mādreyāvabhyayād rathī /
analyzed: atha duryodhanaḥ rājā mādreyau abhyayāt rathī

original: t ābhyāṃ tasyābhavad ghoraṃ yuddhamadbhutadarśanam /
analyzed: ābhyām tasya bhavat ghoram yuddham adbhuta darśanam

original: tatra nātiprayatnena tena tau virathīkṛtau / 27.73 /
analyzed: tatra na ati prayatnena tena tau virathīkṛtau

original: svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tadā taṃ samavārayat /
analyzed: svayam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā tadā tam samavārayat

original: vyaśvasūtadhvajaṃ cakre taṃ ca duryodhano raṇe / 27.74 /
analyzed: vyaśva sūta dhvajam cakre tam ca duryodhanaḥ raṇe

original: athā'gataṃ sūryasutaṃ punaśca jagāma bhīmo rabhaso rathena /
analyzed: athāgatam sūryasutam punar ca jagāma bhīmaḥ rabhasaḥ rathena

original: duryodhanaṃ cāsya samakṣameva cakāra vīro virathaṃ kṣaṇena / 27.75 /
analyzed: duryodhanam ca asya samakṣam eva cakāra vīraḥ viratham kṣaṇena

original: nivārya karṇaṃ ca śarairamuṣya sūnoḥ suṣeṇasya śiraścakarta /
analyzed: nivārya karṇam ca śaraiḥ amuṣya sūnoḥ suṣeṇasya śiraḥ cakarta

original: papāta bhūmau sa pituḥ samīpe yathā hataḥ satyaseno'munaiva /
analyzed: papāta bhūmau sa pituḥ samīpe yathā hataḥ satyasenaḥ umunā eva

original: yathaiva karṇāvarajau puraiva niśāyuddhe karṇapuraḥ prapātitau / 27.76 /
analyzed: yathā eva karṇa avarajau purā eva niśā yuddhe karṇa puras prapātitau  /

original: hataṃ tamīkṣyaiva vikartanātmajaḥ krodhānvito bhīmasenaṃ vihāya /
analyzed: hatam tam īkṣya eva vikartana ātmajaḥ krodha anvitaḥ bhīmasenam vihāya

original: cccxcvi.yayau pramṛdyaiva camūṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ rathe'pare svaśvayute vyavasthitam / 27.77 /
analyzed: pramṛdya eva camūm yudhiṣṭhiram rathe pare su aśva yute vyavasthitam  /

original: nyavārayetāṃ śinipautrapārṣatau kṛṣṇāsutāḥ somakasaṅghayuktāḥ /
analyzed: nyavārayetām śini pautra pārṣatau kṛṣṇā sutāḥ somaka saṅgha yuktāḥ

original: sa tān samastān virathān vidhāya yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prāpa yutaṃ yamābhyām / 27.78 /
analyzed: sa tān samastān virathān vidhāya yudhiṣṭhiram prāpa yutam yamābhyām

original: nihatya so'śvān yudhi dharmasūnornirāyudhau tau ca yamau cakāra /
analyzed: nihatya sa uśvān yudhi dharmasūnoḥ nirāyudhau tau ca yamau cakāra

original: t ānekayānopagatān punaśca mamarda bāṇaiśca vacobhirugraiḥ / 27.79 /
analyzed: t ān eka yāna upagatān punar ca mamarda bāṇaiḥ ca vacobhiḥ ugraiḥ

original: tadaiva mokṣāya nṛpasya bhīmo duryodhanaṃ virathaṃ saṃ vidhāya /
analyzed: tadā eva mokṣāya nṛpasya bhīmaḥ duryodhanam viratham sam vidhāya

original: vivyādha marmasvatitīkṣṇasāyakaistaṃ darśayāmāsa raveḥ sutāya / 27.80 /
analyzed: vivyādha marmasu ati tīkṣṇa sāyakaiḥ tam darśayāmāsa raveḥ sutāya  /

original: śalyastadā dharmasutaṃ vihāya karṇo yayau tatra yudhiṣṭhiro'pi /
analyzed: śalyaḥ tadā dharmasutam vihāya karṇaḥ yayau tatra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ api

original: gatvā ṇsanaiḥ śibiraṃ tatra śiśye karṇo yadā rājagṛdhnī jagāma / 27.81 /
analyzed: gatvā śibiram tatra śiśye karṇaḥ yadā rāja gṛdhnī jagāma

original: drauṇiḥ kṛpaścātra tadaiva jagmatustadā bhīmo drauṇikarṇau jagāma /
analyzed: drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ ca atra tadā eva jagmatuḥ tadā bhīmaḥ drauṇi karṇau jagāma

original: yadā bhīmo drauṇikarṇau jagāma kṛpo nṛpaṃ rathamāropayacca / 27.82 /
analyzed: yadā bhīmaḥ drauṇi karṇau jagāma kṛpaḥ nṛpam ratham āropayat ca

original: nṛpaṃ samādāya kṛpe'payāte bhīmārditau drauṇikarṇau śaraughaiḥ /
analyzed: nṛpam samādāya bhīma arditau drauṇi karṇau śara oghaiḥ

original: vihāya taṃ jagmatuḥ somakānāṃ camūṃ śaraughairabhipātayantau / 27.83 /
analyzed: vihāya tam jagmatuḥ somakānām camūm śara oghaiḥ abhipātayantau

original: athātra rājānamacakṣamāṇo dhanañjayo vāsudevapraṇunnaḥ /
analyzed: atha atra rājānam acakṣamāṇaḥ dhanañjayaḥ vāsudeva praṇunnaḥ

original: abhyāyayau pārṣataḥ svāṃ tu senāṃ karṇāhatāṃ vīkṣya kurūnapīḍayat / 27.84 /
analyzed: abhyāyayau pārṣataḥ svām tu senām karṇa āhatām vīkṣya kurūn apīḍayat  /

original: nyavārayat samāyāntaṃ kapipravaraketanam /
analyzed: nyavārayat samāyāntam kapi pravara ketanam

original: drauṇirduḥ śāsanaścaiva dhṛṣṭadyumnamavārayat / 27.85 /
analyzed: drauṇiḥ duḥ śāsanaḥ ca eva dhṛṣṭadyumnam avārayat  /

original: ubhāvatirathau tau tu śastrāstrairabhyavarṣatām /
analyzed: ubhau atirathau tau tu śastra astraiḥ abhyavarṣatām

original: duḥ śāsanaḥ pārṣataśca kurvantau bāṇajaṃ tamaḥ / 27.86 /
analyzed: duḥ śāsanaḥ pārṣataḥ ca kurvantau bāṇa jam tamaḥ  /

original: tatra duḥ śāsanenā'jau stambhito drupadātmajaḥ /
analyzed: tatra duḥ śāsanena ājau stambhitaḥ drupada ātmajaḥ

original: yatamāno'pi niryatnaḥ kṛto yuddhe nirāyudhaḥ / 27.87 /
analyzed: yatamānaḥ api niryatnaḥ kṛtaḥ yuddhe nirāyudhaḥ

original: tadā'bhavad yuddhamatīva dāruṇaṃ drauṇestanūjena tu vajrapāṇeḥ /
analyzed: tadā abhavat yuddham atīva dāruṇam drauṇeḥ tanūjena tu vajrapāṇeḥ

original: tatrāpi baddhaḥ śarapañjareṇa pārtho'panuttā'pi hi gāṇḍivajyā / 27.88 /
analyzed: tatra api baddhaḥ śara pañjareṇa pārtha upanuttā api hi gāṇḍiva jyā

original: cccxcvii.pārtho'tha kṛṣṇedhitabāhuvīryo nihatya sūtaṃ guruputrakasya /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa idhita bāhu vīryaḥ nihatya sūtam guru putrakasya

original: chitvā caraśmīṃ sturagānamuṣya vidrāvayāmāsa śaraiḥ sudūram / 27.89 /
analyzed: chitvā ca raśmīm s turagān amuṣya vidrāvayāmāsa śaraiḥ su dūram

original: atītya putraṃ tu guroḥ samāgate pārthe karṇo drāvayāmāsa senām /
analyzed: atītya putram tu guroḥ samāgate pārthe karṇaḥ drāvayāmāsa senām

original: pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ śaravarṣadhāro duryodhanaścānu yayau tameva / 27.90 /
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ sutānām śara varṣa dhāraḥ duryodhanaḥ ca anu yayau tam eva

original: karṇamāyāntamālokya drāvayantaṃ nijāṃ camūm /
analyzed: karṇam āyāntam ālokya drāvayantam nijām camūm

original: dhanuranyat samādāya dhṛṣṭadyumno nyavārayat / 27.91 /
analyzed: dhanuḥ anyat samādāya dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ nyavārayat  /

original: tayorāsīnmahad yuddhaṃ ciraṃ samamaviśramam /
analyzed: tayoḥ āsīt mahat yuddham ciram samama viśramam

original: tadaiva sātyakirvīro duryodhanamavārayat / 27.92 /
analyzed: tadā eva sātyakiḥ vīraḥ duryodhanam avārayat  /

original: nivāritaḥ sātyakinā raṇe duryodhano nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: nivāritaḥ sātyakinā raṇe duryodhanaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: nihatya sātyakeraśvān draupadeścāpamacchinat / 27.93 /
analyzed: nihatya sātyakeḥ aśvān draupadeḥ cāpam acchinat  /

original: tadantaraiva karṇo'pi pārṣatāṇsvānapātayat /
analyzed: tad antarā eva karṇaḥ api pārṣatān svān apātayat

original: tayorvirathayoreva bhagnaṃ tat pāṇḍavaṃ balam / 27.94 /
analyzed: tayoḥ virathayoḥ eva bhagnam tat pāṇḍavam balam  /

original: balaṃ svakīyaṃ bahudhā vibhinnaṃ samīkṣya bhīmo mṛgarājaketuḥ /
analyzed: balam svakīyam bahudhā vibhinnam samīkṣya bhīmaḥ mṛgarāja ketuḥ

original: kṛtvā dharākampakamugranādaṃ raṇe'bhyayāt kauravarājasainyam / 27.95 /
analyzed: kṛtvā dharā kampakam ugra nādam raṇebhyayāt kaurava rāja sainyam

original: nādena bāṇaiśca vṛkodareṇa bhagnaṃ tadā kauravasainyamāṇsu /
analyzed: nādena bāṇaiḥ ca vṛkodareṇa bhagnam tadā kaurava sainyam āṇsu

original: diśo vidudrāva suyodhano'pi kṛto raṇe tena vivāhananāyudhaḥ / 27.96 /
analyzed: diśaḥ vidudrāva suyodhanaḥ api kṛtaḥ raṇe tena vivāha nanāyudhaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvaiva tat pāṇḍavānāṃ ca senā samāvṛtt ā kṣipramavāryavegā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tat pāṇḍavānām ca senā samāvṛtt ā kṣipram avārya vegā

original: tayā punaḥ kauravāṇāṃ balaṃ tad bhagnaṃ dūrād dūrataraṃ pradudruve / 27.97 /
analyzed: tayā punar kauravāṇām balam tat bhagnam dūrāt dūrataram pradudruve  /

original: hanyamānaṃ diśo yātaṃ pāñcālairbhīmasaṃ śrayāt /
analyzed: hanyamānam diśaḥ yātam pāñcālaiḥ bhīmasam śrayāt

original: suyodhanabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jajvālā'dhirathiḥ krudhā / 27.98 /
analyzed: suyodhana balam dṛṣṭvā jajvāla ādhirathiḥ krudhā

original: so'moghaṃ rāmadevatyamastraṃ bhārgavasañjñitam /
analyzed: sa u mogham rāma devatyam astram bhārgava sañjñitam

original: sarvāstranāṇsakaṃ divyamapratidvandvamādade / 27.99 /
analyzed: sarva astra nāṇsakam divyam apratidvandvam ādade

original: tacca bhīmapurogeṣu sainyeṣvamucadudblaṇam /
analyzed: tat ca bhīma purogeṣu sainyeṣu amucat udblaṇam

original: tadastraṃ varjayāmāsa bhīmaṃ rāmaprasādataḥ /
analyzed: tat astram varjayāmāsa bhīmam rāma prasādataḥ

original: cccxcviii.anye tu dudruvuḥ kecicchiṣṭāḥ prāpuryamakṣayam / 27.100 /
analyzed: anye tu dudruvuḥ kecid śiṣṭāḥ prāpuḥ yama kṣayam

original: nahyastraṃ dravamāṇāṃ staddhanti tena sapārṣatāḥ /
analyzed: na hi astram dravamāṇām stat hanti tena sa pārṣatāḥ

original: pāñcālā draupadeyāṇsca śaineyādyāṇsca sarvaśaḥ / 27.101 /
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ draupadeyān ca śaineya ādyān ca sarvaśas

original: palāyanenorvaritā arjuno'pyastramudyatam /
analyzed: palāyanena urvaritāḥ arjunaḥ pi astram udyatam

original: vīkṣya pratyastrahīnaṃ tadaprāpyaiva raveḥ sutam / 27.102 /
analyzed: vīkṣya prati astra hīnam tat a prāpya eva raveḥ sutam

original: vāsudevamidaṃ prāha varjayitvaiva sūtajam /
analyzed: vāsudevam idam prāha varjayitvā eva sūtajam

original: anyatra yāmi naivāsmādastrājjīvanamanyathā / 27.103 /
analyzed: anyatra yāmi na eva asmāt astrāt jīvanam anyathā

original: ityūcivāṃ saṃ pārthaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇo'prāpyaiva sūtajam /
analyzed: iti ūcivān sam pārtham tam kṛṣṇaḥ u prāpya eva sūtajam

original: anyenaiva pathā bhīmaṃ prāpayāmāsa viśvakṛt / 27.104 /
analyzed: anyena eva pathā bhīmam prāpayāmāsa viśvakṛt

original: tatrārjuno'vadad bhīmaṃ yāhi draṣṭuṃ yudhiṣṭhiram /
analyzed: tatra arjunaḥ uvadat bhīmam yāhi draṣṭum yudhiṣṭhiram

original: pravṛttiṃ viddhi bhūpasya māṃ tu saṃ śaptakā yudhe /
analyzed: pravṛttim viddhi bhūpasya mām tu sam śaptakāḥ yudhe

original: āhvayanti hatoccheṣāstānahaṃ yāmi tad yudhe / 27.105 /
analyzed: āhvayanti hata uccheṣāḥ tān aham yāmi tat yudhe

original: ityūcivāṃ saṃ tamuvāca bhīmo j ānan svabāhvorbalamaprameyam /
analyzed: iti ūcivān sam tam uvāca bhīmaḥ j ānan sva bāhvoḥ balam aprameyam

original: saṃ śaptakān sūtajaṃ kauravāṃ śca yotsye'hamekastvamupaihi bhūpam / 27.106 /
analyzed: sam śaptakān sūtajam kauravān śca yotsye iham ekaḥ tvam upaihi bhūpam

original: tyaktvā raṇaṃ nāhamito vrajeyaṃ na māṃ vadet kaścana yuddhabhītam /
analyzed: tyaktvā raṇam na aham itas vrajeyam na mām vadet kaścana yuddha bhītam

original: iti bruvāṇaṃ tamanantaśaktiḥ prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ praśaśaṃ sādhikeṣṭam / 27.107 /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam tam anantaśaktiḥ prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ praśaśam sādhika iṣṭam  /

original: yayau yudhiṣṭhiraṃ draṣṭuṃ śibiraṃ sārjuno hariḥ /
analyzed: yayau yudhiṣṭhiram draṣṭum śibiram sa arjunaḥ hariḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā tau nṛpatiḥ karṇaṃ hataṃ matvā ṇsaśaṃ sa ha / 27.108 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tau nṛpatiḥ karṇam hatam matvā sa ha

original: abhivādya haniṣyāmītyuktaḥ pārthena sā krudhā /
analyzed: abhivādya haniṣyāmi iti uktaḥ pārthena sā krudhā

original: bhṛśaṃ vinindya bībhatsumāha kṛṣṇāya gāṇḍivam /
analyzed: bhṛśam vinindya bībhatsum āha kṛṣṇāya gāṇḍivam

original: dehi putraṃ sa rādhāyā haniṣyati na saṃ śayaḥ / 27.109 /
analyzed: dehi putram sa rādhāyāḥ haniṣyati na sam śayaḥ

original: athavā bhīma evainaṃ nivṛtte tvayi pātayet /
analyzed: athavā bhīmaḥ eva enam nivṛtte tvayi pātayet

original: tvaṃ tu kuntyā vṛthā sūtaḥ klībo mithyāpratiśrutaḥ / 27.110 /
analyzed: tvam tu kuntyā vṛthā sūtaḥ klībaḥ mithyā pratiśrutaḥ

original: ahaṃ hi sūtaputreṇa kliṣṭo mārutitejasā /
analyzed: aham hi sūtaputreṇa kliṣṭaḥ māruti tejasā

original: cccxcix.jīvāmītyagrajenokta udbabarhāsimuttamam /
analyzed: jīvāmi iti agrajena uktaḥ

original: vāsudevastadā'hedaṃ kimetaditi sarvavit / 27.111 /
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ tat āha idam kim etat iti sarva vid

original: tamāha gāṇḍivaṃ dātuṃ yo vadet tadvadho mayā /
analyzed: tam āha gāṇḍivam dātum yaḥ vadet tad vadhaḥ mayā

original: pratijñātastato hanmi nṛpamityāha taṃ hariḥ / 27.112 /
analyzed: pratijñātaḥ tatas hanmi nṛpam iti āha tam hariḥ

original: satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyajñānaṃ tu duṣkaram /
analyzed: satyasya vacanam śreyaḥ satya jñānam tu duṣkaram

original: yatsatāṃ hitamatyantaṃ tat satyamiti niścayaḥ / 27.113 /
analyzed: yat satām hitam atyantam tat satyam iti niścayaḥ

original: dharmasya caraṇaṃ śreyo dharmajñānaṃ tu duṣkaram /
analyzed: dharmasya caraṇam śreyaḥ dharma jñānam tu duṣkaram

original: yaḥ satāṃ dhārako nityaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ / 27.114 /
analyzed: yaḥ satām dhārakaḥ nityam sa dharmaḥ iti niścayaḥ

original: kauśikākhyo brāhmaṇo hi līnaṃ grāmajanaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: kauśika ākhyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ hi līnam grāma janam kvacid

original: taskareṣvabhidhāyaiva nirayaṃ pratyapadyata / 27.115 /
analyzed: taskareṣu abhidhāya eva nirayam pratyapadyata

original: kaścid vyādho mṛgaṃ hatvā mātāpitṛnimittataḥ /
analyzed: kaścid vyādhaḥ mṛgam hatvā mātā pitṛ nimittataḥ

original: bhakṣārthamabhyagāt svargamasuro'sau mṛgo yataḥ /
analyzed: bhakṣa artham abhyagāt svargam asurā usau mṛgaḥ yatas

original: upadravāya lokasya tapaścarati durmatiḥ / 27.116 /
analyzed: upadravāya lokasya tapaḥ carati durmatiḥ

original: tasmāt saddhārako dharma iti kṛtvā viniścayam /
analyzed: tasmāt sat dhārakaḥ dharmaḥ iti kṛtvā viniścayam

original: mā nṛpaṃ jahi satyāṃ tvaṅkuru vācaṃ tataḥ kuru /
analyzed: mā nṛpam jahi satyām tvam kuru vācam tatas kuru

original: ityukto bahudhā'nindat krodhādevārjuno bhṛśam / 27.117 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ bahudhā anindat krodhāt eva arjunaḥ bhṛśam

original: tvaṃ nṛśaṃ so'kṛtajñaśca nirvīryaḥ paruṣaṃ vadaḥ /
analyzed: tvam nṛśam saḥ kṛtajñaḥ ca nirvīryaḥ paruṣam vadaḥ

original: tvattaḥ sukhaṃ nāsti kiñcinna māṃ garhitumarhasi / 27.118 /
analyzed: tvattaḥ sukham nā asti kiñcid na mām garhitum arhasi  /

original: bhīmo māṃ garhituṃ yogyo yo hyasmākaṃ sadā gatiḥ /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ mām garhitum yogyaḥ yaḥ hi asmākam sadā gatiḥ

original: yo yuddhyate sarvavīrairadyāpi tvaṃ tu nindakaḥ / 27.119 /
analyzed: yaḥ yuddhyate sarva vīraiḥ adya api tvam tu nindakaḥ

original: ityādyuktvā'tmanāṇsāya vikośaṃ cakṛvānasim /
analyzed: ityādi uktvā ātmanā āṇsāya vikośam cakṛvān asim

original: punaḥ kṛṣṇena puṣṭaḥ san svābhiprāyamuvāca saḥ /
analyzed: punar kṛṣṇena puṣṭaḥ san sva abhiprāyam uvāca saḥ

original: tacchrutvā garhayitvainaṃ punarāha janārdanaḥ / 27.120 /
analyzed: tat śrutvā garhayitvā enam punar āha janārdanaḥ

original: matipūrvaṃ dehahānāt pāpaṃ mahadavāpyate /
analyzed: mati pūrvam deha hānāt pāpam mahat avāpyate

original: dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ dehato'sti yat / 27.121 /
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām sādhanam dehataḥ asti yat

original: cd.ato mā tyaja dehaṃ tu kuru cā'tmapraśaṃ sanam /
analyzed: mā tyaja deham tu kuru ca ātma praśam sanam

original: vadho gurūṇāṃ tvaṅkāraḥ svapraśaṃ saiva cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vadhaḥ gurūṇām tvaṅkāraḥ sva praśam sā eva ca ātmanaḥ

original: ityuktaḥ sa tvahaṅkārācchaśaṃ sa svaguṇānalam / 27.122 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tu ahaṅkārāt śaśam sa sva guṇa analam

original: gurunindā'tmapūjā ca na dharmāya bhavet kvacit /
analyzed: guru nindā ātma pūjā ca na dharmāya bhavet kvacid

original: tathā'pyarjunahārdaṃ tat samprakāṇsya janārdanaḥ / 27.123 /
analyzed: tathā api arjuna hārdam tat janārdanaḥ

original: tasya lajjāṃ samutpādya nāṇsayitvā ca taṃ madam /
analyzed: tasya lajjām samutpādya ca tam madam

original: nāhaṃ veda paraṃ dharmaṃ kṛṣṇa eva gatirmama / 27.124 /
analyzed: na aham veda param dharmam kṛṣṇaḥ eva gatiḥ mama

original: iti bhāvaṃ samutpādya doṣān nāṇsayituṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: iti bhāvam samutpādya doṣān hariḥ

original: kārayāmāsa tat sarvamarjunena jagatpatiḥ / 27.125 /
analyzed: kārayāmāsa tat sarvam arjunena jagatpatiḥ

original: tata evadavijñānāt kupito nṛpatirbhṛśam /
analyzed: tatas kupitaḥ nṛpatiḥ bhṛśam

original: āhāstu rājā bhīmastvaṃ yuvā māṃ jahi ca svayam /
analyzed: āha astu rājā bhīmaḥ tvam yuvā mām jahi ca svayam

original: vanaṃ vā viphalo yāmītyuktvottasthau svatalpataḥ / 27.126 /
analyzed: vanam vā viphalaḥ yāmi iti uktvā uttasthau sva talpataḥ

original: taṃ vāsudevaḥ pratigṛhya hetumuktvā sarvaṃ śamayāmāsa netā /
analyzed: tam vāsudevaḥ pratigṛhya hetum uktvā sarvam śamayāmāsa netā

original: pārthaśca bhūpasya papāta pādayoḥ kṣamāpayan so'pi suprītimāpa / 27.127 /
analyzed: pārthaḥ ca bhūpasya papāta pādayoḥ kṣamāpayan saḥ api su prītim āpa

original: tau bhrātarau vāsudevaprasādānmahāpado muktimāpyātihṛṣṭau /
analyzed: tau bhrātarau vāsudeva prasādāt mahāpadaḥ muktim āpya ati hṛṣṭau

original: bhaktyā samastādhipatiṃ śaśaṃ satustvayā samaḥ ko nu hare hito naḥ / 27.128 /
analyzed: bhaktyā samasta adhipatim śaśam satuḥ tvayā samaḥ kaḥ nu hare hitaḥ naḥ  /

original: tataḥ praṇamya bībhatsuragrajaṃ parirambhitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas praṇamya bībhatsuḥ agrajam parirambhitaḥ

original: tenābhinanditaḥ prītyā cā'śīrbhiḥ prayayau yudhe / 27.129 /
analyzed: tena abhinanditaḥ prītyā ca āśīrbhiḥ prayayau yudhe

original: taṃ śaṅkitaṃ karṇajaye svinnagātraṃ haristadā /
analyzed: tam śaṅkitam karṇa jaye svinna gātram hariḥ tadā

original: saṅkīrtya pūrvakarmāṇi narāveśaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: saṅkīrtya pūrva karmāṇi nara āveśam viśeṣataḥ

original: vyañjayāmāsa dhairyaṃ ca tasyā'sīt tena susthiram / 27.130 /
analyzed: vyañjayāmāsa dhairyam ca tasya āsīt tena susthiram

original: bhīmastadā ṇsatrubalaṃ samastaṃ vidrāvayāmāsa jaghāna cā'jau /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tadā samastam vidrāvayāmāsa jaghāna ca ājau

original: vīrān raṇāyābhimukhān svayantrā kurvaṃ śca vārtā ramamāṇa eva/ 27.131 /
analyzed: vīrān raṇāya abhimukhān sva yantrā kurvan śca vārtāḥ ramamāṇaḥ eva

original: tadā'sadat taṃ śakuniḥ sasainyo duryodhanasyāvarajairupetaḥ /
analyzed: tadā asadat tam śakuniḥ sa sainyaḥ duryodhanasya avarajaiḥ upetaḥ

original: cdi.taṃ bhīmaseno virathaṃ nirāyudhaṃ vidhāya bāṇairbhuvi ca nyapātayat / 27.132 /
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ viratham nirāyudham vidhāya bāṇaiḥ bhuvi ca nyapātayat  /

original: na jaghnivāṃ staṃ sahadevabhāgaṃ prakalpitaṃ svena tadā'kṣagoṣṭhyām /
analyzed: na jaghnivān stam sahadeva bhāgam prakalpitam svena tadā akṣa goṣṭhyām

original: taṃ mūrcchitaṃ śvāsamātrāvaśeṣaṃ duryodhanaḥ svarathenāpaninye / 27.133 /
analyzed: tam mūrcchitam śvāsa mātra avaśeṣam duryodhanaḥ sva rathena apaninye

original: duryodhanasyāvarajā daśātra pradudruvurbhīmasenaṃ vihāya /
analyzed: duryodhanasya avarajāḥ daśa atra pradudruvuḥ bhīmasenam vihāya

original: tadā'rjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā prītaḥ śrutvā dharmarājapravṛttim / 27.134 /
analyzed: tadā arjunam vāsudevam ca dṛṣṭvā prītaḥ śrutvā dharmarāja pravṛttim

original: punaśca nighnantamaripravīrān vidrāvayantaṃ ca nijāṃ varūthinīm /
analyzed: punar ca nighnantam ari pravīrān vidrāvayantam ca nijām varūthinīm

original: sasāra duḥ śāsana āttadhanvā bhīmo'pi taṃ siṃ ha ivābhipetivān / 27.135 /
analyzed: sasāra dus śāsanaḥ ātta dhanvā bhīmaḥ upi tam sim haḥ iva abhipetivān

original: taṃ rūkṣavāco muhurarpayantaṃ vidhāya bhīmo virathaṃ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: tam rūkṣa vācaḥ muhur arpayantam vidhāya bhīmaḥ viratham kṣaṇena

original: pragṛhya bhūmau vinipātya vakṣo vidārayāmāsa gadāprahārataḥ / 27.136 /
analyzed: pragṛhya bhūmau vinipātya vakṣaḥ vidārayāmāsa gadā prahārataḥ

original: ākramya kaṇṭhaṃ ca padodare'sya niviśya paśyan mukhamāttaroṣaḥ /
analyzed: ākramya kaṇṭham ca niviśya paśyan mukham ātta roṣaḥ

original: vikośamākāṇsanibhaṃ vidhāya mahāsimasyorasi sañcakhāna / 27.137 /
analyzed: vikośam ākāṇsa nibham vidhāya mahā asim asya urasi sañcakhāna

original: kṛtvā'sya vakṣasyurusattaṭākaṃ papau nikāmaṃ tṛṣito'mṛtopamam /
analyzed: kṛtvā asya vakṣasi uru sat taṭākam papau nikāmam tṛṣita umṛta upamam

original: tacchoṇit āmbho bhramadakṣamenaṃ saṃ smārayāmāsa purākṛt āni / 27.138 /
analyzed: tat śoṇit bhramat akṣam enam sam smārayāmāsa purākṛt

original: vāksāyakāṃ ścāsya purā samarpitān saṃ smārayāmāsa punaḥ punarbhṛśam /
analyzed: vāc sāyakān śca asya purā samarpitān sam smārayāmāsa punar punar bhṛśam

original: dantāntaraṃ na praviveśa tasya raktaṃ hyapeyaṃ puruṣasya jānataḥ / 27.139 /
analyzed: danta antaram na praviveśa tasya raktam hi apeyam puruṣasya jānataḥ  /

original: tathā'pi śatrupratibhīṣaṇāya papāvivā'svādya punaḥ punarbhṛśam /
analyzed: tathā api śatru pratibhīṣaṇāya papau iva āsvādya punar punar bhṛśam

original: smaran nṛsiṃ haṃ bhagavantamīśvaraṃ sa manyusūktaṃ ca dadarśa bhaktyā / 27.140 /
analyzed: smaran ham bhagavantam īśvaram sa manyu sūktam ca dadarśa bhaktyā

original: “yaste manyo” 81 ityato nārasiṃ haṃ somaṃ tasmai cā'rpayacchoṇit ākhyam /
analyzed: yaḥ te manyo iti atas nārasim ham somam tasmai ca arpayat śoṇit ākhyam

original: yuddhākhyayajñe somabuddhyā'rivakṣa iheti sāmnā gadayā vibhindan / 27.141 /
analyzed: yuddha ākhya yajñe soma buddhyā ari vakṣaḥ iha iti sāmnā gadayā vibhindan

original: uvāca vācaṃ puruṣapravīraḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ lokamadhye vidhāya /
analyzed: uvāca vācam puruṣa pravīraḥ satyām pratijñām loka madhye vidhāya

original: yāḥ sapatayastā apatayo hi jātā yāsā'patiḥ sā sapatiśca jātā / 27.142 /
analyzed: yāḥ sapatayaḥ tāḥ apatayaḥ hi jātāḥ yāsā apatiḥ sā sapatiḥ ca jātā

original: paśyantu citrāṃ paramasya śaktiṃ ye vai tilāḥ ṣaṇḍhatilā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: paśyantu citrām paramasya śaktim ye vai tilāḥ ṣaṇḍhatilāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: 81 Ṛgveda 10.83.1
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: cdii.enaṃ gṛhītaṃ ca mayā yadīha kaścit pumān mocayatu svavīryāt / 27.143 /
analyzed: gṛhītam ca mayā yadi iha kaścid pumān mocayatu sva vīryāt

original: iti bruvāṇaḥ punareva raktaṃ papau sudhāṃ devavaro yathā divi /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaḥ punar eva raktam papau sudhām deva varaḥ yathā divi

original: punaśca saprāṇamamuṃ visṛjya nadan nanartāribale nirāyudhaḥ / 27.144 /
analyzed: punar ca sa prāṇam amum visṛjya nadan nanarta ari bale nirāyudhaḥ

original: pratyanṛtyan ye'smān punargauriti gauriti /
analyzed: pratyanṛtyan ye smān punar gauḥ iti gauḥ iti

original: t ān vayaṃ pratinṛtyāmaḥ punargauriti gauriti / 27.145 /
analyzed: t ān vayam pratinṛtyāmaḥ punar gauḥ iti gauḥ iti

original: iti bruvan nṛtyamāno'rimadhya āsphoṭayañchatrugaṇānajohavīt /
analyzed: iti bruvan nṛtyamāna ūri madhye āsphoṭayan śatru gaṇān ajohavīt

original: śaśāka ca draṣṭumamuṃ na kaścid vaikartanadrauṇisuyodhanādiṣu / 27.146 /
analyzed: śaśāka ca draṣṭum amum na kaścid vaikartana drauṇi suyodhana ādiṣu

original: bhayācca karṇasya papāta kārmukaṃ nimīlayāmāsa tadā'kṣiṇī ca/
analyzed: bhayāt ca karṇasya papāta kārmukam nimīlayāmāsa tadā akṣiṇī ca

original: sambodhito madrarājena yuddhe sthitaḥ kathañcit sa tu pārthabhāgaḥ / 27.147 /
analyzed: sambodhitaḥ madra rājena yuddhe sthitaḥ kathañcid sa tu pārthabhāgaḥ

original: drauṇirvihāyainamapājagāma dūraṃ tadā bhīmaseno jagāda /
analyzed: drauṇiḥ vihāya enam apājagāma dūram tadā bhīmasenaḥ jagāda

original: pītaḥ somo yuddhayajñe mayā'dya vadhyaḥ paśurme haraye suyodhanaḥ / 27.148 /
analyzed: pītaḥ somaḥ yuddha yajñe mayā adya vadhyaḥ paśuḥ me haraye suyodhanaḥ

original: iti bruvan mṛtamutsṛjya śatruṃ duryodhanaṃ cā'śu ruṣā'bhidudruve /
analyzed: iti bruvan mṛtam utsṛjya śatrum duryodhanam ca āśu ruṣā abhidudruve

original: āyāntamīkṣyaiva tamugrapauruṣaṃ dudrāva bhītaḥ sa suyodhano bhṛśam / 27.149 /
analyzed: āyāntam īkṣya eva tam ugra pauruṣam dudrāva bhītaḥ sa suyodhanaḥ bhṛśam

original: baladvayaṃ cāpayayau vihāya bhayād bhīmaṃ kṛṣṇapārthau vinaiva /
analyzed: bala dvayam ca apayayau vihāya bhayāt bhīmam kṛṣṇa pārthau vinā eva

original: āyodhanaṃ śūnyamabhūnmuhūrtaṃ nanarta bhīmo vyāghrapadena harṣāt / 27.150 /
analyzed: āyodhanam śūnyam abhūt muhūrtam nanarta bhīmaḥ vyāghra padena harṣāt

original: saṅkalpya śatrūn govadevā'jimadhye śārdūlavat taccaritaṃ niśāmya /
analyzed: saṅkalpya śatrūn go vat eva āji madhye śārdūla vat tad caritam niśāmya

original: jahāsa kṛṣṇaṇsca dhanañjayaśca śaśaṃ satuścainamatiprahṛṣṭau / 27.151 /
analyzed: jahāsa kṛṣṇaṃs ca dhanañjayaḥ ca śaśam satuḥ ca enam ati prahṛṣṭau

original: yadā saraṅgaḥ pavamānasūnunā ṇsūnyaḥ kṛtastatra mahūrtamātrāt /
analyzed: yadā saraṅgaḥ pavamāna sūnunā ṇsūnyaḥ kṛtaḥ tatra mahūrta mātrāt

original: duryodhanasyāvarajāḥ śaraughairavīvṛṣan bhīmamudārasattvam / 27.152 /
analyzed: duryodhanasya avarajāḥ śara oghaiḥ avīvṛṣan bhīmam udāra sattvam

original: t ān mārutirbāṇavarairnikṛttaśīrṣān yamāyānayadāṇsu vīraḥ /
analyzed: ān mārutiḥ bāṇa varaiḥ nikṛtta śīrṣān yamāya anayat āṇsu vīraḥ

original: tasmin dine viṃ śatidhārtarāṣṭra hatāstadanye samarāt pradudruvuḥ / 27.153 /
analyzed: tasmin dine vim śati dhārtarāṣṭra hatāḥ tad anye samarāt pradudruvuḥ  /

original: karmāṇyananyaupayikāni bhīme kurvatyevaṃ bhītabhīte'risa' nghe /
analyzed: karmāṇi an anya aupayikāni bhīme kurvati evam nghe

original: nimīlitākṣe ca bhayena karṇe karṇātmajo nakulaṃ pratyadhāvat / 27.154 /
analyzed: nimīlita akṣe ca bhayena karṇe karṇa ātmajaḥ nakulam pratyadhāvat  /

original: cdiii.mādrīsuto vṛṣasenaṃ śaraughairavārayat taṃ virathaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: vṛṣasenam śara oghaiḥ avārayat tam viratham cakāra

original: karṇātmajaḥ so'pyasicarmapāṇistasyānugāṃ strisahasraṃ jaghāna / 27.155 /
analyzed: karṇa ātmajaḥ saḥ upi asi carma pāṇiḥ tasya anugām strī sahasram jaghāna

original: karṇātmajastasya sañchidya carma bhīmārjunādīnapi bāṇasaṅghaiḥ /
analyzed: karṇa ātmajaḥ tasya sañchidya carma bhīma arjuna ādīn api bāṇa saṅghaiḥ

original: avīvṛṣat tasya pārthaḥ śareṇa grīvābāhūrūn yugapaccakarta / 27.156 /
analyzed: avīvṛṣat tasya pārthaḥ śareṇa grīvā bāhu ūrūn yugapad cakarta  /

original: ekena bāṇena sute hate sve vaikartano vāsavimabhyadhāvat /
analyzed: ekena bāṇena sute hate sve vaikartanaḥ vāsavim abhyadhāvat

original: tayorabhūd dvairathayuddhamadbhutaṃ sarvāstravidvarayorugrarūpam / 27.157 /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhūt dvairatha yuddham adbhutam sarva astra vid varayoḥ ugra rūpam

original: pakṣagrahāstatra surāsurāstayoranye ca jīvā gaganaṃ samāsthitāḥ /
analyzed: pakṣa grahāḥ tatra sura asurāḥ tayoḥ anye ca jīvāḥ gaganam samāsthitāḥ

original: mahān vivādo'pyabhavat tayoḥ kṛte tadā girīśo'vadadabjayonim / 27.158 /
analyzed: mahān vivādaḥ upi abhavat tayoḥ kṛte tadā girīśaḥ vadat abjayonim

original: surāsurāṇāṃ bhīmaduryodhanau dvau samāṇsrayau tatpriyau karṇapārthau /
analyzed: sura asurāṇām bhīma duryodhanau dvau sa māṇsrayau tad priyau karṇa pārthau

original: prāṇopamau tena caitatkṛte te surāsurāḥ kartumicchanti yuddham /
analyzed: prāṇa upamau tena ca etad kṛte te sura asurāḥ kartum icchanti yuddham

original: tadā vināṇso jagatāṃ mahān syāt tenānayoḥ samamevāstu yuddham / 27.159 /
analyzed: tadā jagatām mahān syāt tena anayoḥ samam eva astu yuddham  /

original: itīrite vāsavaḥ padmayoniṃ jagāda kṛṣṇo yatra jayaśca tatra /
analyzed: iti īrite vāsavaḥ padmayonim jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ yatra jayaḥ ca tatra

original: kāmo na kṛṣṇasya mṛṣā bhaveddhi kāmo'sya pārthasya jayaṃ pradātum / 27.160 /
analyzed: kāmaḥ na kṛṣṇasya mṛṣā bhavet hi kāmaḥ usya pārthasya jayam pradātum

original: ityūcivān vāsavaḥ phalgunasya jayo'stu karṇasya vadhastatheti /
analyzed: iti ūcivān vāsavaḥ phalgunasya jayoḥ tu karṇasya vadhaḥ tathā iti

original: uktvā'namat kañjabhavastatheti prāhāsurān devatāṇscā'babhāṣe / 27.161 /
analyzed: uktvā anamat kañja bhavaḥ tathā iti prāha asurān

original: na karṇārjunayorarthe virodhaṃ kuruta kvacit /
analyzed: na karṇa arjunayoḥ arthe virodham kuruta kvacid

original: bhīmaduryodhanārthe vā paśyantveva ca saṃ yugam /
analyzed: bhīma duryodhana arthe vā paśyantu eva ca sam yugam

original: ityukte śāntimāpannā dadṛśuḥ saṃ yugaṃ tayoḥ / 27.162 /
analyzed: iti ukte śāntim āpannāḥ dadṛśuḥ sam yugam tayoḥ

original: vavarṣatustau ca mahāstraśastrairbhīmo rathastho'varajaṃ jugopa /
analyzed: vavarṣatuḥ tau ca mahā astra śastraiḥ bhīmaḥ ratha sthovarajam jugopa

original: śaineyapāñcālamukhāṇsca pārthamāvārya tasthuḥ prasabhaṃ nadantaḥ / 27.163 /
analyzed: śaineya pāñcāla mukhān ca pārtham āvārya tasthuḥ prasabham nadantaḥ  /

original: duryodhano drauṇimukhāṇsca karṇaṃ rarakṣurāvārya tadā'sa yuddham /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ drauṇi mukhān ca karṇam rarakṣuḥ āvārya tat āsa yuddham

original: tatrārjunaṃ bāṇavaraiḥ sa karṇaḥ samardayāmāsa viśeṣayan raṇe / 27.164 /
analyzed: tatra arjunam bāṇa varaiḥ sa karṇaḥ samardayāmāsa viśeṣayan raṇe  /

original: tadā nadan bhīmaseno jagāda gadāṃ samādāya samāttaroṣaḥ /
analyzed: tadā nadan bhīmasenaḥ jagāda gadām samādāya samātta roṣaḥ

original: ahaṃ vainaṃ gadayā pothayāmi tvaṃ vā jahīmaṃ samupāttavīryaḥ /
analyzed: aham vā enam gadayā pothayāmi tvam vā jahi imam samupātta vīryaḥ

original: kṛṣṇo'pi taṃ bodhayāmāsa samyaṅ narāveśaṃ vyañjayan bhūya eva / 27.165 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api tam bodhayāmāsa samyak nara āveśam vyañjayan bhūyas eva

original: cdiv.samṛddhavīryaḥ sa tadā dhanañjayaḥ suyodhanadrauṇikṛpān sabhojān /
analyzed: sa tadā dhanañjayaḥ suyodhana drauṇi kṛpān sa bhojān

original: sākaṃ ca bāṇairvirathāṃ ścakāra vivyādha tānapyarihā supuṅkhaiḥ / 27.166 /
analyzed: sākam ca bāṇaiḥ virathām cakāra vivyādha tān api ari hā su puṅkhaiḥ

original: te kiñcid dūratastasthuḥ paśyanto yuddhamuttamam /
analyzed: te kiñcid dūratas tasthuḥ paśyantaḥ yuddham uttamam

original: amānuṣaṃ tat pārthasya dṛṣṭvā karma guroḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: amānuṣam tat pārthasya dṛṣṭvā karma guroḥ sutaḥ

original: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇiṃ duryodhanamabhāṣata / 27.167 /
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim duryodhanam abhāṣata

original: dṛṣṭaṃ hi bhīmasya balaṃ tvayā'dya tathaiva pārthasya yathā jitā vayam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam hi bhīmasya balam tvayā adya tathā eva pārthasya yathā jitāḥ vayam

original: alaṃ virodhena sametya pāṇḍavaiḥ praśādhi rājyaṃ ca mayā sametaḥ / 27.168 /
analyzed: alam virodhena sametya pāṇḍavaiḥ praśādhi rājyam ca mayā sametaḥ

original: dhanañjayastiṣṭhati vārito mayā janārdano naiva virodhamicchati /
analyzed: dhanañjayaḥ tiṣṭhati vāritaḥ mayā janārdanaḥ nā eva virodham icchati

original: vṛkodarastadvacane sthitaḥ sadā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śāntamanāstathā yamau / 27.169 /
analyzed: vṛkodaraḥ tad vacane sthitaḥ sadā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śānta manāḥ tathā yamau

original: hitārthametat tava vākyamīritaṃ gṛhāṇa me naiva bhayādudīritam /
analyzed: hita artham etat tava vākyam īritam gṛhāṇa me nā eva bhayāt udīritam

original: ahaṃ hyavadhyo mama caiva mātulo na śaṅkituṃ me vacanaṃ tvamarhasi / 27.170 /
analyzed: aham hi avadhyaḥ mama ca eva mātulaḥ na śaṅkitum me vacanam tvam arhasi  /

original: itīritaḥ prāha suyodhanastaṃ duḥ śāsanasyādya papau hi śoṇitam /
analyzed: iti īritaḥ prāha suyodhanaḥ tam duḥ śāsanasya adya papau hi śoṇitam

original: śārdūlaceṣṭāmakarocca bhīmo na me kathañcit tadanena sandhiḥ / 27.171 /
analyzed: śārdūla ceṣṭām akarot ca bhīmaḥ na me kathañcid tat anena sandhiḥ

original: ityukto drauṇirāsīt sa tūṣṇīṃ karṇadhanañjayau /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ drauṇiḥ āsīt sa tūṣṇīm karṇa dhanañjayau

original: mahāstraśastravarṣeṇa cakratuḥ khamanantaram / 27.172 /
analyzed: mahā astra śastra varṣeṇa cakratuḥ kham anantaram

original: āgneyavāruṇaindrādīnyetānyanyonyamṛtyave /
analyzed: āgneya vāruṇa aindra ādīni etāni anyonya mṛtyave

original: brahmāstramapyubhau tatra prayujyā'nadatāṃ raṇe /
analyzed: brahmāstram api ubhau tatra prayujya anadatām raṇe

original: anyonyāstrapratīghātaṃ kṛtvobhau ca virejatuḥ / 27.173 /
analyzed: anyonya astra pratīghātam kṛtvā ubhau ca virejatuḥ  /

original: krameṇa vṛddhorubalena tatra surendraputreṇa virocanātmajaḥ /
analyzed: krameṇa vṛddha uru balena tatra sura indra putreṇa virocana ātmajaḥ

original: nirākṛto nāgamayaṃ śarottamaṃ brahmāstrayuktaṃ visasarja vāsavau / 27.174 /
analyzed: nirākṛtaḥ nāga mayam śara uttamam brahmāstra yuktam visasarja vāsavau

original: taṃ vāsudevo rathamānamayya moghaṃ cakārārjunataḥ kirīṭam /
analyzed: tam vāsudevaḥ ratham ānamayya mogham cakāra arjunataḥ kirīṭam

original: cūrṇīkṛtaṃ tena surendrasūnordivyaṃ yayau bāṇagataśca nāgaḥ / 27.175 /
analyzed: cūrṇīkṛtam tena sura indra sūnoḥ divyam yayau bāṇa gataḥ ca nāgaḥ

original: namite vāsudevena rathe pañcāṅgulaṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: namite vāsudevena rathe pañca aṅgulam bhuvi

original: apāṅgadeśamuddiśya mukte nāge kirīṭinaḥ / 27.176 /
analyzed: apāṅga deśam uddiśya mukte nāge kirīṭinaḥ

original: cdv.bhaṅktvā kirīṭaṃ viyati gacchati prabhuṇoditaḥ /
analyzed: kirīṭam viyati gacchati prabhuṇā uditaḥ

analyzed: satyena dharmeṇa ca sanniyojya mumoca karṇasya vadhāya bāṇam

analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: t āvubhau śaravarṣeṇa vārayāmāsa mārutiḥ /

analyzed: sa vihvalita sarva aṅgaḥ śiśraye dhvajam uttamam

analyzed: nirbhidya bāṇauḥ viratham cakāra punar tṛtīyam ca ratham ruroja  /

analyzed: evam akṣohiṇī ṣaṭkam bhīmena nihatam raṇe

analyzed: pañca pārthena nihatāḥ arddham kāliṅgaka anṛte

analyzed: ekādaśa akṣohiṇībhyaḥ śiṣṭam anyaiḥ nisūditam

analyzed: duryodhanaḥ bhauma sūnuḥ prāyas senā hanaḥ kramāt

analyzed: jayam labdhvā tadatsu uccais pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu

analyzed: duryodhanaḥ jala stambham kṛtvā mantrān jajāpa ha

analyzed: mantrāḥ durvāsasā dattāḥ mṛta sañjīvana pradāḥ

original: cdx.jale sthitvā japan saptadinaiḥ sarvān mṛt ānapi /
analyzed: sthitvā japan saptadinaiḥ sarvān mṛd ān api

original: uddhared dhārtarāṣṭro'yaṃ syuravadhyāṇsca te punaḥ / 28.44 /
analyzed: uddharet dhārtarāṣṭraḥ yam syuḥ avadhyān ca te punar

original: iti vidyābalaṃ tasya jñātvā pāṇḍusutāstataḥ /

iti tat kārayitveśa āha moghaṃ tavākhilam / 28.103 /

original: ityuktā taṃ punaḥ prāha kathaṃ te naraśoṇitam /

original: iti te saṃ śayo mā bhūd rājā kālasya kāraṇam” 83 / 30.36 /

mahā

original: cdxxxiv.ityukto vāsudevena mocito dharmajena ca /

original: ityāha vyāsavākyānu bhīmo'pyāha nṛpottamam / 30.74 /
