original: naiva tat kṛṣṇayā jñḸataṃ pṛthayā ca saputrayā / 31.13 /
analyzed: na eva tat kṛṣṇayā pṛthayā ca sa putrayā

original: tacchrutvotpannanirvedaṃ kṣattā jyeṣṭhasya varddhayan /
analyzed: tat śrutvā utpanna nirvedam kṣattā jyeṣṭhasya varddhayan

original: uvāca jīvitāṇsā te nanu rājan mahīyasī /
analyzed: uvāca jīvitāṇsā te nanu rājan mahīyasī

original: bhīmāpavarjitaṃ piṇḍamādatse gṛhapālavat / 31.14 /
analyzed: bhīma apavarjitam piṇḍam ādatse gṛhapāla vat

original: nacāparādho bhīmasya bruvatastvāmidaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: na ca aparādhaḥ bhīmasya bruvataḥ tvām idam vacaḥ

original: agnirnisṛṣṭo dattaśca garo dārāṇsca dūṣitāḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ nisṛṣṭaḥ dattaḥ ca garaḥ dārān ca dūṣitāḥ

original: hṛtaṃ kṣetraṃ dhanaṃ yasya kiṃ bhīmena kṛtaṃ tvayi / 31.15 /
analyzed: hṛtam kṣetram dhanam yasya kim bhīmena kṛtam tvayi

original: alamāsajjataste'dya nirvedakaramīritam /
analyzed: alam āsajjataḥ tedya nirveda karam īritam

original: upakārāya bhīmena tava dveṣaṃ tyajātra tat / 31.16 /
analyzed: upakārāya bhīmena tava dveṣam tyaja atra tat

original: vimucya dveṣakāmau tvaṃ vane tīrthaniṣevakaḥ /
analyzed: vimucya dveṣa kāmau tvam vane tīrtha niṣevakaḥ

original: tapasā'rādhaya hariṃ tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi / 31.17 /
analyzed: tapasā ārādhaya harim tatas pūtaḥ bhaviṣyasi  /

original: ityukto dveṣamutsṛjya bhīme nirvedamāgataḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ dveṣam utsṛjya bhīme nirvedam āgataḥ

original: anujñḸaṃ tapase prāptumupavāsaparo'bhavat / 31.18 /
analyzed: tapase prāptum upavāsa paraḥ bhavat

original: anaśnantaṃ caturthe'hni dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: an aśnantam caturthehni dhṛtarāṣṭram yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: jñḸatvā samprārthayāmāsa bhojanārthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / 31.19 /
analyzed: samprārthayāmāsa bhojana artham punar punar

original: anujñḸaṃ vanavāsāya tvattaḥ prāpyaiva sarvathā /
analyzed: anujñḍam vana vāsāya tvattaḥ prāpya eva sarvathā

original: bhokṣye'nyathā neti vadan dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ śramānvitaḥ /
analyzed: bhokṣye nī athā nā iti vadan dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ śrama anvitaḥ

original: upavāsakṛśo bhāryāṃ śiśriye mūrcchitaḥ kṣaṇāt / 31.20 /
analyzed: upavāsa kṛśaḥ bhāryām śiśriye mūrcchitaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: śantamena kareṇātha dharmajastaṃ mṛdu spṛśan /
analyzed: śantamena kareṇa atha dharmajaḥ tam mṛdu spṛśan

original: śanaiḥ sañjñḸamagamayadabravīcca suduḥkhitaḥ / 31.21 /
analyzed: śanais sañjñḍam agamayat abravīt ca su duḥkhitaḥ

original: puraskṛtya yuyutsuṃ tvaṃ kuru rājyamakaṇṭakam /
analyzed: puraskṛtya yuyutsum tvam kuru rājyam akaṇṭakam

original: cdxlviii.vayameva tvadarthāya kurmaḥ sarve tapo vane / 31.22 /
analyzed: mayam eva tvad arthāya kurmaḥ sarve tapaḥ vane   /

original: netyāha dhṛtarāṣṭrastaṃ kuladharmo hi no vane /
analyzed: na iti āha dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ tam kula dharmaḥ hi naḥ vane

original: ante dehaparityāgastanmā'nuj ñḸatumarhasi / 31.23 /
analyzed: ante deha parityāgaḥ tat mām uc arhasi  /

original: tayorvivadatorevaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ vivadatoḥ evam kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvakarteśa āvirbhūto'bravīnnṛpam / 31.24 /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva kartā īśaḥ āvirbhūtaḥ bravīt nṛpam

original: tapasā'śeṣadoṣāṇāṃ kṣayakāmamimaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: tapasā aśeṣa doṣāṇām kṣaya kāmam imam nṛpam

original: anujānīhi naivāsya dharmavighnakaro bhava / 31.25 /
analyzed: anujānīhi na eva asya dharma vighna karaḥ bhava

original: kḸale nirvedamāpannastapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ /
analyzed: kḸale nirvedam āpannaḥ tapasā dagdha kilbiṣaḥ

original: śubhrāṃ gatimayaṃ yḸayādanyathā na kathañcana / 31.26 /
analyzed: śubhrām gatim ayam yḥayāt anyathā na kathañcana

original: ityukto dharmarājastamanujajñe sa cāṇsitaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ dharmarājaḥ tam anujajñe sa ca aṇsitaḥ

original: śikṣayāmāsa saddharmān nītiṃ ca viduṣe'pyalam /
analyzed: śikṣayāmāsa saddharmān nītim ca viduṣā ipi alam

original: kevalasnehato rājñe śuśrāva vinayāya saḥ / 31.27 /
analyzed: kevala snehataḥ rājñe śuśrāva vinayāya saḥ

original: anujñḸaya gṛhaṃ prāpte dharmaje viduraṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: anujñḍaya gṛham prāpte dharmaje viduram punar

original: śrāddhāya vittamākāṅkṣan preṣayāmāsa tadvacaḥ / 31.28 /
analyzed: śrāddhāya vittam ākāṅkṣan preṣayāmāsa tat vacaḥ

original: śrutvā yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmamāha dātavyamadya naḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīmam āha dātavyam adya naḥ

original: putrapautrāptabandhūnāṃ śrāddhecchorvittamañjasā / 31.29 /
analyzed: putra pautra āpta bandhūnām śrāddha icchoḥ vittam añjasā

original: tamāha bhīmaḥ pḸapānāṃ vimukhānāṃ madhudviṣaḥ /
analyzed: tam āha bhīmaḥ pḹapānām vimukhānām madhudviṣaḥ

original: pḸaralaukikasāhāyyaṃ na kāryamitarārthataḥ /
analyzed: na kāryam itarārthataḥ

original: dattenāpi hi vittena putraśrāddhaṃ kariṣyati / 31.30 /
analyzed: dattena api hi vittena putra śrāddham kariṣyati

original: tajj ñḸatvā dadatāṃ doṣo bhavediti vicintayan /
analyzed: dadatām doṣaḥ bhavet iti vicintayan

original: kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ yḸantu sarve duryodhanādayaḥ / 31.31 /
analyzed: kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataram sarve duryodhana ādayaḥ

original: bhīṣmḸadīnāṃ vayaṃ śrāddhakartārastena kiṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: vayam śrāddha kartāraḥ tena kim tatas

original: kḸanīnatvāttu karṇasya sahāsmābhiḥ pṛthaiva hi /
analyzed: kḸanīna tvāt tu karṇasya saha asmābhiḥ pṛthā eva hi

original: śrāddhakarmaṇyadhikṛtā kiṃ tasmai dīyate dhanam / 31.32 /
analyzed: śrāddha karmaṇi adhikṛtā kim tasmai dīyate dhanam

original: cdxlix.ityuktavantaṃ nṛpatirarjunaścocatuḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: cdxlixiti uktavantam nṛpatiḥ arjunaḥ cocatuḥ punar

original: yiyāsoryācamānāya nijabāhubalārjitam /
analyzed: yiyāsoḥ yācamānāya nija bāhu bala arjitam

original: dehi vittaṃ paramataḥ kiṃ tvāmeṣo'bhiyācate / 31.33 /
analyzed: dehi vittam paramatas kim tvām eṣaḥ abhiyācate

original: ityuktamapi netyeva bruvāṇaṃ śuddhadhārmikam /
analyzed: iti uktam api na iti eva bruvāṇam śuddha dhārmikam

original: aprītyā joṣamāsveti procyovāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 31.34 /
analyzed: aprītyā joṣam āsva iti procya uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: kośato yad bahirvittaṃ dḸanabhogādikāraṇam /
analyzed: kośataḥ yat bahis vittam dḥana bhoga ādi kāraṇam

original: mama sannihitaṃ sarvaṃ tat pitre'dyārpitaṃ mayā / 31.35 /
analyzed: mama sannihitam sarvam tat pitrā idyā arpitam mayā

original: evamevārjuno'pyāha viduraṃ punarūcatuḥ /
analyzed: evam eva arjunaḥ upyāha viduram punar ūcatuḥ

original: mukhyadharmarate bhīme na pitā kroddhumarhati /
analyzed: mukhya dharma rate bhīme na pitā kroddhum arhati

original: ityukto vittamādāya gatvā kṣattā'graje'bravīt / 31.36 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ vittam ādāya gatvā kṣattā agrajā ibravīt

original: yudhiṣṭhirārjunau bhaktiṃ nitarāṃ tvayi cakratuḥ /
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira arjunau bhaktim nitarām tvayi cakratuḥ

original: nḸatihṛṣṭastvadājñḸayāṃ bhīmastanmā krudho'tra ca / 31.37 /
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tat mā krudha utra ca

original: śuddhe kṣatriyadharme hi nitaro'yaṃ vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: śuddhe kṣatriya dharme hi nitaraḥ yam vṛkodaraḥ

original: nṛpḸarjunau dharmaratāvapi lokakṛpḸaparau / 31.38 /
analyzed: nṛpḥ arjunau dharma ratau api loka kṛpaḥ aparau

original: ajātakopastacchrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ praśāntadhīḥ /
analyzed: ajāta kopaḥ tat śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ praśānta dhīḥ

original: kṛtvā ṇsrāddhāni sarveṣāṃ mahādānānyanāratam /
analyzed: kṛtvā sarveṣām mahā dānāni anāratam

original: daśarātraṃ dadau śuddhamanasā nirṛṇatvadhīḥ / 31.39 /
analyzed: daśa rātram dadau śuddha manasā nirṛṇa tva dhīḥ

original: sarvaṃ samarpya govinde pārthebhyo'nyebhya eva ca /
analyzed: sarvam samarpya govinde pārthebhyaḥ nyebhyaḥ eva ca

original: svajanebhyaḥ samādāya sravannetrebhya uccadhīḥ /
analyzed: sva janebhyaḥ samādāya sravat netrebhyaḥ ucca dhīḥ

original: anujñḸaṃ nirgataḥ prāha paurajānapadān nṛpaḥ / 31.40 /
analyzed: nirgataḥ prāha paura jānapadān nṛpaḥ

original: dharmato rakṣitā yūyamasmatpūrvairmahātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: dharmataḥ rakṣitāḥ yūyam asmad pūrvaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ

original: nacāhaṃ paramasnehād yuṣmḸabhiḥ sukṛpḸalubhiḥ /
analyzed: na ca aham parama snehāt yuṣmḹabhiḥ su kṛpḍalubhiḥ

original: arakṣiteti kathitaḥ pramādādapi sajjanāḥ / 31.41 /
analyzed: arakṣita iti kathitaḥ pramādāt api sat janāḥ

original: iṣṭaṃ ca yajñaiḥ pūrtaiśca caritaṃ yuṣmadāṇsrayāt /
analyzed: iṣṭam ca yajñaiḥ pūrtaiḥ ca caritam yuṣmad āṇsrayāt

original: putrastu mama pāpātmā sarvakṣatravināṇsakaḥ /
analyzed: putraḥ tu mama pāpa ātmā sarva kṣatra vināṇsakaḥ

original: sarvātiśaṅkī mūḍhaśca vṛddhānāṃ śāsanātigaḥ / 31.42 /
analyzed: sarva atiśaṅkī mūḍhaḥ ca vṛddhānām śāsana atigaḥ

original: cdl.saubhrātraṃ yena santyajya pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu /
analyzed: yena santyajya pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu

original: kṛtaṃ virūpaṃ sumahat kuryād yannāparaḥ kvacit / 31.43 /
analyzed: kṛtam virūpam su mahat kuryāt yat na aparaḥ kvacid

original: apriyāṇi ca kṛṣṇasya subahūnyācarat kudhīḥ /
analyzed: apriyāṇi ca kṛṣṇasya su bahūni ācarat kudhīḥ

original: prāyastenāpi mandena na yuṣmḸasvaśivaṃ kṛtam / 31.44 /
analyzed: prāyas tena api mandena na kṛtam

original: bhrātaro'sya ca sarve'pi tacchīlamanuvartinaḥ /
analyzed: bhrātaraḥ asya ca sarve api tad śīlam anuvartinaḥ

original: hatāṇsca svena pāpena sasutāmātyabāndhavāḥ / 31.45 /
analyzed: svena pāpena sa suta amātya bāndhavāḥ

original: so'haṃ vayogataścaiva putrādhibhirabhiplutaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ uham vayaḥ gataḥ ca eva putra ādhibhiḥ abhiplutaḥ

original: tatsambandhakṛtaṃ pḸapaṃ svakṛtaṃ cḸatyapeśalam /
analyzed: tad sambandha kṛtam pḹapam sva kṛtam

original: pḸaṇḍaveṣu sakṛṣṇeṣu tapasā mārṣṭumudyataḥ / 31.46 /
analyzed: pḹaṇḍaveṣu sa kṛṣṇeṣu tapasā mārṣṭum udyataḥ

original: tatra māmanujānīdhvaṃ kṛpayā mitravatsalāḥ /
analyzed: tatra mām anujānīdhvam kṛpayā mitra vatsalāḥ

original: matpriyārthamapi snehaḥ pḸaṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu / 31.47 /
analyzed: mad priya artham api snehaḥ pḥaṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu

original: kriyamāṇo'pi kartavyo bhūya eva sadā'calaḥ /
analyzed: kriyamāṇaḥ api kartavyaḥ bhūyas eva sadā acalaḥ

original: te hi me putrakāḥ santa ihāmutra ca saukhyadāḥ / 31.48 /
analyzed: te hi me putrakāḥ santaḥ iha amutra ca saukhya dāḥ

original: ityuktaiḥ svaguṇānuccaiḥ kīrtayadbhiḥ suduḥkhitaiḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaiḥ sva guṇān uccaiḥ kīrtayadbhiḥ su duḥkhitaiḥ

original: paryaśrunayanaiḥ kṛcchrāt paurajānapadaiścirāt /
analyzed: paryaśru nayanaiḥ kṛcchrāt paura jānapadaiḥ cirāt

original: anujñḸato yayau pārthairanuyātaḥ sudūrataḥ / 31.49 /
analyzed: yayau pārthaiḥ anuyātaḥ su dūratas

original: sañjayo viduraścainaṃ sabhāryamanujagmatuḥ /
analyzed: sañjayaḥ viduraḥ ca enam sa bhāryam anujagmatuḥ

original: anuvavrāja taṃ kuntī vanāya kṛtaniścayā / 31.50 /
analyzed: anuvavrāja tam kuntī vanāya kṛta niścayā

original: vḸaryamāṇā'pi tanayaiḥ sabhāryairbhṛśaduḥkhitaiḥ /
analyzed: tanayaiḥ sa bhāryaiḥ bhṛśa duḥkhitaiḥ

original: saṃ sthāpya tān sukṛcchreṇa yayau sā'nveva taṃ nṛpam / 31.51 /
analyzed: sam sthāpya tān su kṛcchreṇa yayau sānu eva tam nṛpam

original: saṃ ndarśitapatho rājā kuntīvidurasañjayaiḥ /
analyzed: sam ndarśita pathaḥ rājā kuntī vidura sañjayaiḥ

original: gḸandhārīsahitaḥ prāpa kurukṣetre jagadguroḥ /
analyzed: gḹandhārī sahitaḥ prāpa kurukṣetre jagadguroḥ

original: krameṇaivā'śramaṃ vyāsadevasya surapūjitam / 31.52 /
analyzed: krameṇa eva āśramam vyāsa devasya sura pūjitam

original: trivatsarādasya nijasya lokasyā'ptiṃ sabhāryasya jagāda tatra /
analyzed: tri vatsarāt asya nijasya lokasya āptim sa bhāryasya jagāda tatra

original: cdli.brahmāṅkajastena bhṛśaṃ pratīto vyāsopadiṣṭaṃ vyacarat tapo'gryam / 31.53 /
analyzed: cdli brahma aṅkajaḥ tena bhṛśam pratītaḥ vyāsa upadiṣṭam vyacarat tapaḥ ugryam

original: sakṣattṛgḸandhāripṛthe sasañjaye tapobhirārādhayati prabhuṃ harim /
analyzed: sa kṣattṛ gḹandhāri pṛthe sa sañjaye tapobhiḥ ārādhayati prabhum harim

original: vaicitravīrye'tra sadārabandhubhṛtyāstu pārthā dṛśaye samāyayuḥ / 31.54 /
analyzed: sa dāra bandhu bhṛtyāḥ tu pārthāḥ dṛśaye samāyayuḥ

original: kṣattaikatāmatra yudhiṣṭhireṇa prāpto'tha bhāryāsahitaṃ sasañjayam /
analyzed: kṣattā eka tām atra yudhiṣṭhireṇa prāptā utha bhāryā sahitam sa sañjayam

original: upāsamāneṣu vicitravīryaputraṃ pṛthāṃ caiva pṛthāsuteṣu / 31.55 /
analyzed: upāsamāneṣu vicitravīrya putram pṛthām ca eva pṛthā suteṣu

original: prādurbabhūvāmitaśaktitejojñḸanādbhutaiśvaryasukhādir ūpaḥ /
analyzed: prādurbabhūva amita śakti tejaḥ jñḥana adbhuta aiśvarya sukha ādiḥ ūpaḥ

original: vyāso haristatra samīkṣya sarve sampūjayāmāsurudagrabhaktyā / 31.56 /
analyzed: vyāsaḥ hariḥ tatra samīkṣya sarve sampūjayāmāsuḥ udagra bhaktyā

original: taiḥ pūjitastatra niṣaṇṇa āha yadyad yadiṣṭaṃ pravadantu tattat /
analyzed: taiḥ pūjitaḥ tatra niṣaṇṇaḥ āha yat yat yat iṣṭam pravadantu tat tat

original: dḸasyāmi tasyādya tadityamuṣmin bhaktyucchrayaḥ pḸaṇḍusutaiḥ sadāraiḥ /
analyzed: tasya adya tat iti amuṣmin bhakti ucchrayaḥ pḥaṇḍu sutaiḥ sa dāraiḥ

original: vṛto'tra kuntī ravisūnujanmamṛtyūtthadoṣāpagamaṃ yayāce / 31.57 /
analyzed: vṛtaḥ utra kuntī ravi sūnu janma mṛtyu uttha doṣa apagamam yayāce

original: teṣāṃ pradatteṣvabhivāñchiteṣu vaicitravīryaḥ saha bhāryayaiva /
analyzed: teṣām pradatteṣu abhivāñchiteṣu vaicitravīryaḥ saha bhāryayā eva

original: sammantrya niḥ śeṣaraṇehatānāṃ sandarśanaṃ prārthitavāṃ stamīśam / 31.58 /
analyzed: sammantrya niḥ śeṣa raṇa īhatānām sandarśanam prārthitavān

original: tatastu te satyavatīsutasya sarveśvarasyā'j ñayā sarva eva /
analyzed: tatas tu te satyavatī sutasya sarva īśvarasya āt ñayā sarve eva

original: samāgatāḥ svargalokāt kṣaṇena dattā cadivyā dṛgamuṣya rājñaḥ / 31.59 /
analyzed: samāgatāḥ svarga lokāt kṣaṇena dattā ca divyā dṛś amuṣya rājñaḥ

original: ūṣuṇsca rātriṃ paramājñayaiva sarve svabhāryāsahitā yathā purā /
analyzed: ūṣuṇsca rātrim parama ājñayā eva sarve sva bhāryā sahitāḥ yathā purā

original: tṛptaḥ sadāro nṛpatiśca tatra sarve'pi dṛṣṭvḸa mahadadbhutaṃ tat / 31.60 /
analyzed: tṛptaḥ sa dāraḥ nṛpatiḥ ca tatra sarve pi dṛṣṭvā mahat adbhutam tat

original: athā'j ñayaivāsya parasya sarvāḥ striyo nijeśaiḥ sahitā yayuḥ svam /
analyzed: atha āt ñayā eva asya parasya sarvāḥ striyaḥ nija īśaiḥ sahitāḥ yayuḥ svam

original: vinottarāṃ tāṃ tu kathāṃ niśamya pārīkṣito'yācata tātadṛṣṭim / 31.61 /
analyzed: vinā uttarām tām tu kathām niśamya pārīkṣitaḥ yācata tāta dṛṣṭim

original: taṃ cḸa'nayāmāsa tadaiva kṛṣṇo hyacintyaśaktiḥ sa vikuṇṭhalokāt /
analyzed: tam tadā eva kṛṣṇaḥ hi acintya śaktiḥ sa vikuṇṭha lokāt

original: dṛṣṭvḸa sapārīkṣita āpa tuṣṭiṃ svatātamīśena samāhṛtaṃ punaḥ / 31.62 /
analyzed: sa pārīkṣitaḥ āpa tuṣṭim svatātam īśena samāhṛtam punar

original: sampūjya taṃ kṛṣṇamapīśavandyaṃ kṣamāpayāmāsa parīkṣidātmajaḥ /
analyzed: sampūjya tam kṛṣṇam api īśa vandyam kṣamāpayāmāsa parīkṣit ātmajaḥ

original: cakre ca visrambhamatīva bhārate punaśca tatratyajanaiḥ sametaḥ / 31.63 /
analyzed: cakre ca visrambham atīva bhārate punar ca tatratya janaiḥ sametaḥ

original: pḸarthāḥ punaḥ prāpya puraṃ svakīyaṃ dharmeṇa pṛthvīṃ paripālayantaḥ /
analyzed: pḹarthāḥ punar prāpya puram svakīyam dharmeṇa pṛthvīm paripālayantaḥ

original: bhogānarāgā ajuṣanta yogyān yuktā jagaddhātari vāsudeve / 31.64 /
analyzed: bhogān arāgāḥ ajuṣanta yogyān yuktāḥ jagaddhātari vāsudeve

original: cdlii.varṣatrayānte tmasamāhitāgniṃ tyaktāgnibhistairvanamālihadbhiḥ /
analyzed: tyakta agnibhiḥ taiḥ vanam ālihadbhiḥ

original: te śuśruvurdhṛtarāṣṭraṃ sabhāryaṃ sahaiva kuntyā paridagdhadeham / 31.65 /
analyzed: te śuśruvuḥ dhṛtarāṣṭram sa bhāryam saha eva kuntyā paridagdha deham

original: vrīl . āmukhā dhyānaparā niśamya svaryātamātmīyapitṛvyamāṇsu /
analyzed: āmukhāḥ dhyāna parāḥ niśamya svaryātam ātmīya pitṛvya māṇsu

original: sametya bhartrā pratipūjyamānāṃ kuntīṃ ca taptā vidadhuḥ kriyāṇsca / 31.66 /
analyzed: sametya bhartrā pratipūjyamānām kuntīm ca taptāḥ vidadhuḥ kriyān ca

original: te viṣṇubhaktyā paripūtakarmabhirjñḸanena cānte tamanusmarantaḥ /
analyzed: te viṣṇu bhaktyā paripūta karmabhiḥ jñḍanena ca ante tam anusmarantaḥ

original: pḸarthaiḥ suputraiḥ sukṛtordhvakarmabhirvṛddhiṃ sukhasyā'puranapyayāṃ śubhām / 31.67 /
analyzed: su putraiḥ sukṛta ūrdhva karmabhiḥ vṛddhim sukhasya āpuḥ anapyayām śubhām

original: gḸavadgaṇirvyāsasakāṇsametya śuśrūṣayā tasya punarnijāṃ gatim /
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā tasya punar nijām gatim

original: prapedivān pāṇḍusutāṇsca kṛṣṇaṃ pratīkṣamāṇāḥ pṛthivīmaśāsan / 31.68 /
analyzed: prapedivān pāṇḍu sutān ca kṛṣṇam pratīkṣamāṇāḥ pṛthivīm aśāsan

original: aṣṭādaśābdāḥ pṛthivīṃ samastāṃ praśāsatāmevamagurmahātmanām /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa abdāḥ pṛthivīm samastām praśāsatām evam aguḥ mahātmanām

original: ariktadharmārthasukhottamānāmanujjhitānantapadasmṛtīnām / 31.69 /
analyzed: arikta dharma artha sukha uttamānām anujjhita ananta pada smṛtīnām

original: iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite
analyzed: iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite

original: śrīmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye
(dhṛtarāṣṭrādisvargaprāptirnāma)
ekatriṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: ekatrim śodhyāyaḥ

original: cdliii.(pāṇḍavasvargārohaṇam)
analyzed: cdliii pāṇḍava svarga ārohaṇam

original: atha dvātriṃ śo'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: atha dvātrim śodhyāyaḥ

original: Oṃ / tataḥ kurukṣetramavāpya kṛṣṇo dīkṣāṃ prapede dviṣaḍabdasatre /
analyzed: om tatas kurukṣetram avāpya kṛṣṇaḥ dīkṣām prapede dvi ṣaṣ abda satre

original: sa eva ca vyāsabhṛgūdvahātmā cakre'tra sādasyamajo'prameyaḥ / 32.1 /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca vyāsa bhṛgu udvaha ātmā sādasyam aja uprameyaḥ

original: tatrartvijo dakṣabhṛgupradhānāḥ pḸarthā yadūnāṃ pravaraiḥ sametāḥ /
analyzed: tatra ṛtvijaḥ dakṣa bhṛgu pradhānāḥ yadūnām pravaraiḥ sametāḥ

original: brahmeśaśakrapramukhāḥ surāṇsca cakruḥ susācivyamanantadāsāḥ / 32.2 /
analyzed: brahma īśa śakra pramukhāḥ surān ca cakruḥ su sācivyam ananta dāsāḥ

original: sarve ca jīvā vasudhātal . asthā ye'nye'ntarikṣadyumukhottareṣu /
analyzed: sarve ca jīvāḥ vasu dhātal

original: vasanti nārāyaṇapādasaṃ śrayāste cātra sarve mumuduḥ sanāgāḥ / 32.3 /
analyzed: vasanti nārāyaṇa pādasam śrayāḥ te ca atra sarve mumuduḥ sa nāgāḥ

original: sunirṇayastattvavinirṇayārthināṃ tattvasya cābhūdiha vādaśīlinām /
analyzed: su nirṇayaḥ tattva vinirṇaya arthinām tattvasya ca abhūt iha vāda śīlinām

original: mitho vivādāt surabhūsurāṇāṃ vḸakyāddharervyāsabhṛgūdvahātmanaḥ / 32.4 /
analyzed: mithas vivādāt sura bhūsurāṇām vḥakyāt hareḥ vyāsa bhṛgu udvaha ātmanaḥ

original: dharmārthakāmānakhilānavāpustadarthino muktimapīha kṛṣṇāt /
analyzed: dharma artha kāmān akhilān avāpuḥ tad arthinaḥ muktim api iha kṛṣṇāt

original: yatheṣṭapānāṇsanavāsaso janā viceruratrāmaramānavādayaḥ / 32.5 /
analyzed: yatheṣṭa pānāṇsana vāsasaḥ janāḥ viceruḥ atra amara mānava ādayaḥ

original: kṣetraṃ tadāsīddharilokasammitaṃ yadīyuratrākhilasajjanā yutim /
analyzed: kṣetram tat āsīt hari loka sammitam yadi iyuḥ atra akhila sat janāḥ yutim

original: nḸanāptakāmāṇsca tato babhūvurniryatnadṛśyaśca yato'tra keśavaḥ / 32.6 /
analyzed: tatas babhūvuḥ niryatna dṛśyaḥ ca yatas utra keśavaḥ

original: dvādaśābdaṃ mahāsatramevametādṛśaṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: dvādaśa abdam mahā satram evam etādṛśam hariḥ

original: samāpyāvabhṛthasnātaḥ pūjayitvā'khilān janān / 32.7 /
analyzed: samāpya avabhṛtha snātaḥ pūjayitvā akhilān janān

original: anujajñe krameṇaiva vatsareṇa samāgatān /
analyzed: anujajñe krameṇa eva vatsareṇa samāgatān

original: svakulaṃ sañjihīrṣuḥ sa vipraśāpamajījanat / 32.8 /
analyzed: sva kulam sañjihīrṣuḥ sa vipra śāpam ajījanat

original: upadiśya paraṃ jñḸanamuddhavāyāmumāṇsramam /
analyzed: upadiśya param uddhavāyām umāṇsramam

original: badaryākhyaṃ prāpayitvā saptamābdaṃ śatottaram /
analyzed: badaryākhyam prāpayitvā saptama abdam śata uttaram

original: pratīkṣan pālayāmāsa pārthaiḥ saha bhuvaṃ prabhuḥ / 32.9 /
analyzed: pratīkṣan pālayāmāsa pārthaiḥ saha bhuvam prabhuḥ

original: samārabdhaṃ kaliyugaṃ yadā duryodhano'patat /
analyzed: samārabdham kali yugam yadā duryodhana upatat

original: ṣaṭtriṃ śābdaṃ punaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtamevānvavartayat / 32.10 /
analyzed: ṣaṭtrim śābdam punar kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtam eva anvavartayat  /

original: kṛtādapi viśeṣo'yaṃ yat puṇyasyādhikaṃ phalam /
analyzed: kṛtāt api viśeṣaḥ yat puṇyasya adhikam phalam

original: cdliv.alpameva ca pāpasya kālāt kṛṣṇājñayā tathā / 32.11 /
analyzed: ca pāpasya kālāt kṛṣṇa ājñayā tathā

original: evaṃ sudhārmike loke haribhaktiparāyaṇe /
analyzed: evam su dhārmike loke hari bhakti parāyaṇe

original: naṣṭeṣu kalili ṅgeṣu yugavṛttimabhīpsavaḥ / 32.12 /
analyzed: naṣṭeṣu ṅgeṣu yuga vṛttim abhīpsavaḥ

original: brahmarudrādayo devāḥ stutvā keśavamavyayam /
analyzed: brahma rudra ādayaḥ devāḥ stutvā keśavam avyayam

original: vyajñḸapayan svalokāptiṃ Oṃ ityāha sa cācyutaḥ / 32.13 /
analyzed: vyajñḍapayan sva loka āptim om iti āha sa ca acyutaḥ

original: prācurye sajjanasya syānna kalervṛddhirañjasā /
analyzed: prācurye sat janasya syāt na kaleḥ vṛddhiḥ añjasā

original: iti svakulasaṃ hṛtyai prabhāsamanayat prabhuḥ / 32.14 /
analyzed: iti sva kulasam hṛtyai prabhāsam anayat prabhuḥ

original: puṇyakṣetre'pi na mṛtiḥ svagṛhe tvatidharmadā /
analyzed: puṇya kṣetre api na mṛtiḥ sva gṛhe tu ati dharma dā

original: gatyaivālpamapi kṣetraṃ syānmahatphalamityajaḥ / 32.15 /
analyzed: gatya eva alpam api kṣetram syāt mahat phalam iti ajaḥ

original: prakāṇsayitumevainān prabhāsāya kuśasthalāt /
analyzed: prakāṇsayitum eva enān prabhāsāya kuśasthalāt

original: nītvā dānādisaddharmāṃ stairakārayadacyutaḥ / 32.16 /
analyzed: nītvā dāna ādi sat dharmām staiḥ akārayat acyutaḥ

original: te tataḥ śāpadoṣeṇa kṛṣṇenaiva vimohitāḥ /
analyzed: te tatas śāpa doṣeṇa kṛṣṇena eva vimohitāḥ

original: maireyamattā anyonyaṃ nipātya svāṃ tanuṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: maireya mattāḥ anyonyam nipātya svām tanum gatāḥ

original: tad dṛṣṭvḸa baladevo'pi yogena svatanuṃ yayau / 32.17 /
analyzed: tat baladevaḥ upi yogena sva tanum yayau  /

original: tataḥ pareśo'gaṇitānubhāvaḥ svasārathiṃ pḸaṇḍavānāṃ sakāṇsam /
analyzed: tatas pareśaḥ gaṇita anubhāvaḥ sva sārathim paṇḍavānām sa kāṇsam

original: svalokayānaprativedanāya svasyānu caiṣāṃ tvarayā'bhyayātayat / 32.18 /
analyzed: sva loka yāna prativedanāya svasya anu ca eṣām tvarayā abhyayātayat  /

original: athā'sataḥ pippalamūla īśiturūrusthitaṃ pḸadatal . aṃ sutāmram /
analyzed: atha asataḥ pippala mūle īśituḥ ūru sthitam su tāmram

original: dṛṣṭvḸa jarā nāma sasarja śalyaṃ bhakto'pyalaṃ rohitaṃ śaṅkamānaḥ / 32.19 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā jarā nāma sasarja śalyam bhaktaḥ api alam rohitam śaṅkamānaḥ  /

original: acchedyābhedyadehasya śalye pādamupasthite /
analyzed: acchedya abhedya dehasya śalye pādam upasthite

original: samīpamāgato vyādho dṛṣṭvḸa bhīto'patad bhuvi / 32.20 /
analyzed: samīpam āgataḥ vyādhaḥ bhīta upatat bhuvi

original: vipravākyaṃ mḸanayānaḥ kḸarayitvā'munā hariḥ /
analyzed: vipra vākyam hariḥ

original: pḸapaṃ mḸaṃ jahi deveti yācantamanayad divam / 32.21 /
analyzed: pḸapam mḹaṃ jahi deva iti yācantam anayat divam

original: pḸadaprahāradoṣeṇa taṃ bhṛguṃ vyādhatāṃ gatam /
analyzed: tam bhṛgum vyādha tām gatam

original: paścāttāpena bhaktyā ca suprītastaccharīriṇam /
analyzed: paścāttāpena bhaktyā ca su prītaḥ tad śarīriṇam

original: cdlv.svājñḸaprāptavimānena divaṃ ninye janārdanaḥ / 32.22 /
analyzed: divam ninye janārdanaḥ

original: nīcā yonirnīcanīca karmā'ptaṃ nīcakarmataḥ /
analyzed: nīcā yoniḥ nīca nīca karma āptam nīca karmataḥ

original: aduṣṭatvāttu manaso bhaktilopo nacāpyabhūt /
analyzed: aduṣṭa tvāt tu manasaḥ bhakti lopaḥ na ca api abhūt

original: bhṛgoratrābuddhipūrvaṃ nḸatidoṣakṛdapyabhūt / 32.23 /
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ atra abuddhi pūrvam

original: tato viri ñceśapurandarādyāḥ punaḥ stuvanto'bhiyayuḥ praṇamya /
analyzed: tatas viri ñca īśa purandara ādyāḥ punar stuvantaḥ abhiyayuḥ praṇamya

original: kṛṣṇaṃ sa cā'śveva yayau svalokaṃ svatejasā sarvamidaṃ prakāṇsayan / 32.24 /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam sa ca āśu eva yayau sva lokam sva tejasā sarvam idam prakāṇsayan

original: gopālamantraṃ bhajatāṃ phalaprada ekena r ūpeṇa sa bhuvyadṛśyaḥ /
analyzed: gopāla mantram bhajatām phala pradaḥ ekena r ūpeṇa sa bhuvi adṛśyaḥ

original: tasthau dvitīyena ca sūryamaṇḍale tṛtīyamāsīcchivapūjitaṃ vapuḥ / 32.25 /
analyzed: tasthau dvitīyena ca sūrya maṇḍale tṛtīyam āsīt śiva pūjitam vapuḥ

original: sampūjitaṃ brahmaloke caturthaṃ kañjodbhavenātha paraṃ svadhāma /
analyzed: sampūjitam brahma loke caturtham kañja udbhavena atha param sva dhāma

original: samāpnuvānaṃ vapurasya pañcamaṃ bhaktyā'nvayurdevavarāḥ svaśaktyā / 32.26 /
analyzed: samāpnuvānam vapuḥ asya pañcamam bhaktyā anvayuḥ deva varāḥ sva śaktyā

original: tattejasā te pratimuṣṭadṛṣṭayaḥ puruṣṭutādyā amitorudīdhiteḥ /
analyzed: tad tejasā te pratimuṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ puruṣṭuta ādyāḥ

original: yḸavat svagamyaṃ tvanugamya tasthurnimīlitākṣā vihatordhvacārāḥ / 32.27 /
analyzed: sva gamyam tu anugamya tasthuḥ nimīlita akṣāḥ vihata ūrdhva cārāḥ

original: vīndreśaśeṣānugataḥ svayambhūrdhāma praviṣṭaṃ tamajaṃ praṇamya /
analyzed: vi indra īśa śeṣa anugataḥ svayambhūḥ dhāma praviṣṭam tam ajam praṇamya

original: vīndrādikairapyayutaḥ svapitrā'śliṣṭo rahaścākathayat tathā'staut / 32.28 /
analyzed: vi indra ādikaiḥ api ayutaḥ sva pitrā āśliṣṭaḥ rahaḥ ca akathayat tathā astaut  /

original: sa pūrvarūpeṇa samāpya caikyaṃ vibhajya cecchānusṛto'tha reme /
analyzed: sa pūrva rūpeṇa samāpya ca aikyam vibhajya ca icchā anusṛtā utha reme

original: hariḥ śriyā brahmamukhaiśca muktaiḥ sampūjyamāno'mitasadguṇātmā / 32.29 /
analyzed: hariḥ śriyā brahma mukhaiḥ ca muktaiḥ sampūjyamāna umita sat guṇa ātmā

original: brahmā'pi śarvādiyutaḥ svalokaṃ prāptaḥ punastatra gataṃ ca kṛṣṇam /
analyzed: brahmā api śarva ādi yutaḥ sva lokam prāptaḥ punar tatra gatam ca kṛṣṇam

original: reme'bhipaśyan pratipūjayaṃ staṃ surāṇsca sarve ravibimbasaṃ stham / 32.30 /
analyzed: pratipūjayan stam surān ca sarve stham

original: yato na darśitā bhrāntiḥ prādurbhāveṣvapi kvacit /
analyzed: yatas na darśitā bhrāntiḥ prādurbhāveṣu api kvacid

original: dehatyāgānukāreṇa hariṇā tadihācyutaḥ / 32.31 /
analyzed: dehatyāga anukāreṇa hariṇā tat iha acyutaḥ

original: mohayitvā'surānandhaṃ tamaḥ prāpayituṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: mohayitvā asurān andham tamaḥ prāpayitum prabhuḥ

original: cidānandaikadeho'pi tyaktaṃ dehamivāparam /
analyzed: cidānanda eka dehaḥ api tyaktam deham iva aparam

original: sṛṣṭvḸa svadehopamitaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvyagād divam / 32.32 /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā sva deha upamitam śayānam bhuvi agāt divam

original: dḸarukoktyā samāyātaḥ pḸarthastamadahat tadā /
analyzed: dḥaruka uktyā samāyātaḥ tadā

original: cdlvi.rauhiṇeyādikānāṃ ca śarīrāṇi pradhānataḥ /
analyzed: cdlvi rauhiṇeya ādikānām ca śarīrāṇi pradhānataḥ

original: dḸaruko viṣṇulokaṃ tu punarāpa yathāgatam / 32.33 /
analyzed: dḸarukaḥ viṣṇu lokam tu punar āpa yathāgatam

original: tathaiva janamohāya prāpya vahnāvadṛśyatām /
analyzed: tathā eva jana mohāya prāpya vahnau adṛśya tām

original: rugmiṇyagāddhareḥ pḸarśvaṃ satyā kṛtvā tapastathā / 32.34 /
analyzed: rugmiṇī agāt hareḥ satyā kṛtvā tapaḥ tathā

original: cidānandaikadehe hi dvirūpe iva te yataḥ /
analyzed: cit ānanda eka dehe hi dvi rūpe iva te yatas

original: ekaivātaḥ kṛṣṇavat te duṣṭān mohayatastathā / 32.35 /
analyzed: ekā eva atas kṛṣṇa vat te duṣṭān mohayataḥ tathā

original: anyā mahāmahiṣyastu tyaktvā dehaṃ hutāṇsane /
analyzed: anyāḥ mahā mahiṣyaḥ tu tyaktvā deham hutāṇsane

original: kḸaṇscit kāṇscittu tapasā tyaktadehā hariṃ yayuḥ / 32.36 /
analyzed: tapasā tyakta dehāḥ harim yayuḥ

original: rauhiṇeyādikānāṃ ca bhāryā vahnimukhe tanum /
analyzed: rauhiṇeya ādikānām ca bhāryāḥ vahni mukhe tanum

original: tyaktvā svabhartḸṛnevā'puḥ sarvā eva pativratāḥ / 32.37 /
analyzed: tyaktvā sva bhartḹṛn eva āpuḥ sarvāḥ eva pativratāḥ

original: vasudevaḥ pḸarthamukhācchrutvaitad yogamāsthitaḥ /
analyzed: vasudevaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ

original: tyaktvā dehaṃ kaśyapatvaṃ prāpa kṛṣṇānurāgataḥ / 32.38 /
analyzed: tyaktvā deham kaśyapa tvam prāpa kṛṣṇa anurāgataḥ

original: tasyārjuno'śvamedhāgnāvantyakarmākarot tadā /
analyzed: tasya arjuna uśvamedha agnau antya karmā akarot tadā

original: tyaktadehāstasya bhāryā vahnau prāpustameva ca / 32.39 /
analyzed: tyakta dehāḥ tasya bhāryāḥ vahnau prāpuḥ tam eva ca

original: striyo bālāṃ stathā'dāya dhanaṃ caiva dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: striyaḥ bālām stathā ādāya dhanam ca eva dhanañjayaḥ

original: viniryayau dvāravatyāstāṃ jagrāsa ca sāgaraḥ / 32.40 /
analyzed: viniryayau dvāravatyāḥ tām jagrāsa ca sāgaraḥ

original: strībālasahite pārtha ekasmin pathi gacchati /
analyzed: strī bāla sahite pārtha ekasmin pathi gacchati

original: śāpāt supāpā Ḹabhīrāḥ strījanān jahruruddhatāḥ / 32.41 /
analyzed: śāpāt su pāpāḥ ḍabhīrāḥ strī janān jahruḥ uddhatāḥ

original: yḸastāḥ ṣoḍaṇsasāhasravanitāḥ śatasaṃ yutāḥ /
analyzed: yutāḥ

original: kṛṣṇaṇsāpānmlecchavaśaṃ yayurdarpanimittataḥ / 32.42 /
analyzed: yayuḥ darpa nimittataḥ

original: hriyamāṇe dhane caiva vanitāsu ca vāsaviḥ /
analyzed: hriyamāṇe dhane ca eva vanitāsu ca vāsaviḥ

original: yuyutsurgāṇḍivaṃ sajyaṃ kṛcchreṇaiva cakāra ha / 32.43 /
analyzed: yuyutsuḥ gāṇḍivam sajyam kṛcchreṇa eva cakāra ha

original: kṣīṇāstasya śarā daivānnāstrāṇi smṛtimāyayuḥ /
analyzed: kṣīṇāḥ tasya śarāḥ daivāt na astrāṇi smṛtim āyayuḥ

original: sa tad daivakṛtaṃ jñḸatvā saṃ smaran puruṣottamam /
analyzed: sa tat daiva kṛtam sam smaran puruṣottamam

original: bhīmādṛte hi caturṣu pakṣapātastu vāsavau /

original: yogya eveti kṛṣṇāyā na doṣaḥ syāt kathañcana / 32.67 /

analyzed: prāṇa tvāt bhoga śaktiḥ ca na hi doṣāya māruteḥ

analyzed: sahasraguṇam api etat tvayi sambhāvayāmi aham

analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumna ādayaḥ putrāḥ haiḍimba ādyān ca sarvaśas

original: ityukta āha pāpo'yaṃ pṛthivīkṣayakārakaḥ /

original: kathaṃ duryodhanaḥ sthānaṃ sarvottamamavāptavān / 32.87 /

original: kathaṃ ca sarvadharmajñḸa nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ /

original: saṃ sthitāḥ parame dharme dṛśyante'tra na matpriyāḥ / 32.88 /

original: yatra santastu te santi tatra sthātavyameva me /

original: asya vīratamasyedaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya yujyate / 32.89 /
analyzed: asya vīratamasya idam dhārtarāṣṭrasya yujyate  /

analyzed: rājñaḥ sampreṣayāmāsuḥ tad sandarśita vartmanā

analyzed: āha dūtam yathā iṣṭam tvam gaccha na aham itas vraje

original: naca svargeṇa me kāryaṃ tyaktvā svajanamīdṛśam /
analyzed: na ca svargeṇa me kāryam tyaktvā sva janam īdṛśam

original: ityuktaḥ prayayau dūtastasthāveva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 32.95 /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prayayau dūtaḥ tasthau eva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: tato'tra devāḥ puruhūtapūrvakāḥ samāyayuḥ snehavaśād yudhiṣṭhire /
analyzed: tatas utra devāḥ puruhūta pūrvakāḥ samāyayuḥ sneha vaśāt yudhiṣṭhire

original: teṣvḸagateṣveva na tatra vāco dīnā na durgandhatamo'pyapaśyat /
analyzed: teṣu ḍa gateṣu eva na tatra vācaḥ dīnāḥ na durgandhatamā upyapaśyat

original: svargottamaṃ deśamapaśyadetamabhrāntacetāḥ sa yudhiṣṭhirastadā / 32.96 /
analyzed: svarga uttamam deśam apaśyat etam abhra anta cetāḥ sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tadā

original: āhātra dharmaḥ punarātmasadyaśaḥ prakāṇsayan pāṇḍusutābhidhaṃ svam /
analyzed: āha atra dharmaḥ punar ātma sat yaśaḥ prakāṇsayan pāṇḍu suta abhidham svam

original: dharmād viśiṣṭā hi sadā'nṛśaṃ satā dṛṣṭā casā tvayyadhikā triśo mayā / 32.97 /
analyzed: dharmāt viśiṣṭā hi sadā anṛśam satā dṛṣṭā ca sā tvayi adhikā triśas mayā

original: cdlxii.śakro'pyuvācainamidaṃ mṛṣā te pradarśitaṃ droṇakṛte mṛṣāgiraḥ /
analyzed: cdlxiii śakrā upi uvāca enam idam mṛṣā te pradarśitam droṇa kṛte mṛṣā giraḥ

original: kṛcchrādidaṃ te kathitaṃ nacātivisrambha āsīt tava kṛṣṇavākye / 32.98 /
analyzed: kṛcchrāt idam te kathitam na ca ati visrambhaḥ āsīt tava kṛṣṇa vākye

original: nahyājñayā vāsudevasya kiñcit pāpaṃ bhavet sarvavidharmiṇo'pi /
analyzed: na hi ājñayā vāsudevasya kiñcid pāpam bhavet sarva vidharmiṇaḥ api

original: brahmāparākṣye'pi vikarma sūcakaṃ prārabdhapāpasya viṣāṇsanaṃ yathā / 32.99 /
analyzed: vikarma sūcakam prārabdha pāpasya yathā

original: paśyātra bhīmapramukhān sukhasthān sampūjyamānāṃ stridaśaiḥ surūpān /
analyzed: paśya atra bhīma pramukhān sukha sthān sampūjyamānām stridaśaiḥ surūpān

original: kutaḥ parabrahmadṛśāṃ suśuddhasatkarmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇaparāyaṇānām /
analyzed: kutas para brahma dṛśām su śuddha sat karmaṇām kṛṣṇa parāyaṇānām

original: pareṇa yogena visṛṣṭatanvāṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaved devavarādhipānām / 32.100 /
analyzed: pareṇa yogena visṛṣṭa tanvām duḥkham bhavet deva vara adhipānām

original: ete hi devapravarāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātā bhuvo bhārajihīrṣumīśam /
analyzed: ete hi deva pravarāḥ pṛthivyām jātāḥ bhuvaḥ bhāra jihīrṣum īśam

original: pratoṣya tadbhāvitabuddhikarmabhiḥ punaśca tenaiva sahā'pire divam / 32.101 /
analyzed: pratoṣya tad bhāvita buddhi karmabhiḥ punar ca tena eva saha āpire divam

original: na te nṛpḸadyāpi hi mānuṣo gato bhāvastato dveṣṭi suyodhanādīn /
analyzed: na te nṛpaḥ adyā api hi mānuṣaḥ gataḥ bhāvaḥ tatas dveṣṭi suyodhana ādīn

original: nimajjya tad viṣṇupadodake'tra visṛjya dehaṃ bhaja devabhāvam / 32.102 /
analyzed: nimajjya tat viṣṇu pada udaka itra visṛjya deham bhaja deva bhāvam

original: suyodhanādyā yadime supāpā Ḹarabdhakarmakṣayamāpya nitye /
analyzed: suyodhana ādyāḥ yat ime su pāpāḥ ḥarabdha karma kṣayam āpya nitye

original: niḥ śeṣasaukhyojjhitanityaduḥkhe'vaśāḥ patiṣyantyapunarnivṛttāḥ / 32.103 /
analyzed: niḥ śeṣa saukhya ujjhita nitya duḥkha ivaśāḥ patiṣyanti apunar nivṛttāḥ

original: devāṃ śajā ye tu samastaśaste svamūlarūpaṃ samavāpya kāle /
analyzed: ye tu samastaśas te sva mūla rūpam samavāpya kāle

original: svatāratamyānusṛtāṃ vimuktiṃ prāpsyanti nātrāpi vicāryamasti / 32.104 /
analyzed: sva tāratamya anusṛtām vimuktim prāpsyanti na atra api vicāryam asti

original: ityukta āṇsveva nimajjya gaṅgāṃ dharmātmajastaṃ pravisṛjya deham /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ nimajjya gaṅgām dharmātmajaḥ tam pravisṛjya deham

original: sadyo babhau daivamavāpya kāyaṃ visṛṣṭaroṣādisamastadoṣaḥ / 32.105 /
analyzed: sadyas babhau daivam avāpya kāyam visṛṣṭa roṣa ādi samasta doṣaḥ

original: sa tu prapaśyan svajanaṃ samastaṃ svamūlarūpātisamīpasaṃ stham /
analyzed: sa tu prapaśyan sva janam samastam sva mūla rūpa ati samīpa sam stham

original: dadarśa bhīmaṃ ca marutsamīpe madhye jvalantaṃ marutāṃ gaṇasya / 32.106 /
analyzed: dadarśa bhīmam ca marut samīpe madhye jvalantam marutām gaṇasya

original: dadarśa kṛṣṇāmapi tatsamīpe śriyā jvalantīṃ samatītya cānyāḥ /
analyzed: dadarśa kṛṣṇām api tad samīpe śriyā jvalantīm samatītya ca anyāḥ

original: spraṣṭuṃ ca saṃ skāravaśādiyeṣa niṣidhya taṃ prāha surādhirājaḥ / 32.107 /
analyzed: spraṣṭum ca sam skāra vaśāt iyeṣa niṣidhya tam prāha sura adhirājaḥ

original: eṣā hi sākṣājjagatāṃ priyasya prāṇātmano jīvavareśvarasya /
analyzed: eṣā hi sākṣāt jagatām priyasya prāṇa ātmanaḥ jīva vara īśvarasya

original: prāṇapriyā ṇsrīriti nāma yasyāḥ śamātmake'smin ramate yadeṣā / 32.108 /
analyzed: prāṇapriyā nāma yasyāḥ śama ātmake ismin ramate yat eṣā

original: cdlxiii.yuṣmaccaturdehagatasya vāyorvāyupriyā bhīmatanostathaiva /
analyzed: tvad catur deha gatasya vāyoḥ vāyu priyāḥ bhīma tanoḥ tathā eva

original: bhogāya sṛṣṭā puruṣottamena yuṣmatpriyārthaṃ bhavat āṃ ca dāraiḥ / 32.109 /
analyzed: bhogāya sṛṣṭā puruṣottamena yuṣmad priya artham bhavat āṃ ca dāraiḥ

original: prītistato hyabhyadhikā babhūva bhīmasya cāsyāstadanu sma pārthe /
analyzed: prītiḥ tatas hi abhyadhikā babhūva bhīmasya ca asyāḥ tadanu sma pārthe

original: tato bhavatsveva yathākrameṇa guṇānusāreṇa samīraṇasya / 32.110 /
analyzed: tatas bhavatsu eva yathākrameṇa guṇa anusāreṇa samīraṇasya

original: idā hisā ṇsuddhatanuḥ prajātā ṇsacyādiyogāpagatāgryadehā /
analyzed: idā hi sā prajātā

original: yūyaṃ ca sarve maruto viśeṣasaṃ yogahīnāḥ svaśarīrasaṃ sthāḥ / 32.111 /
analyzed: yūyam ca sarve marutaḥ viśeṣa sam yoga hīnāḥ sva śarīra sam stha

original: sparśe'pi nāsyāḥ pavamānapatnyāḥ supūtatā'laṃ bhavat āmidānīm /
analyzed: sparśe pi na asyāḥ pavamāna patnyāḥ su pūta tālam bhavat ām idānīm

original: nacottaratrāpi bhavet kathañcid divaukasāṃ mḸanuṣadehino yathā / 32.112 /
analyzed: na ca uttaratra api bhavet kathañcid divaukasām yathā

original: itīritaṃ taṃ pratisannivṛttaṃ vināṇsayan mānuṣavāsanāṃ svayam /
analyzed: iti īritam tam pratisannivṛttam mānuṣa vāsanām svayam

original: samāṇsliṣacchuddhatanuḥ stanottho dharmo hareḥ so'bhavadāṇsu tatsamaḥ / 32.113 /
analyzed: stana utthaḥ dharmaḥ hareḥ tad samaḥ

original: tatastu pārthā akhilāḥ svamūlarūpaiḥ sahaivā'viviśurmudā'nvitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu pārthāḥ akhilāḥ sva mūla rūpaiḥ saha eva āviviśuḥ mudā anvitāḥ

original: svīyāni dhāmāni tato'pyanūnabhogāḥ sadā sannyavasaṃ śca tatra / 32.114 /
analyzed: svīyāni dhāmāni tatas api anūna bhogāḥ sadā sannyavasam ca tatra

original: tatrāpi kṛṣṇena samāgamo'bhūt pureva teṣāmatitatparāṇām /
analyzed: tatra api kṛṣṇena samāgamaḥ bhūt purā iva teṣām ati tatparāṇām

original: cikrīḍa ebhiḥ sahitastathaiva kṛṣṇo'pi tadvat saratho'rjunena / 32.115 /
analyzed: cikrīḍe ebhiḥ sahitaḥ tathā eva kṛṣṇaḥ api tadvat sa rathaḥ ūrjunena

original: anye ca devāṃ śabhavāḥ samastāḥ svamūlarūpaikyamavāpurāṇsu /
analyzed: anye ca śabhavāḥ samastāḥ sva mūla rūpa aikyam avāpuḥ āṇsu

original: karmakṣayādeva suretarāstu puṇyakṣayaṃ prāpya bhuvi prajātāḥ / 32.116 /
analyzed: karma kṣayāt eva suretarāḥ tu puṇya kṣayam prāpya bhuvi prajātāḥ

original: catuḥ sahasraṃ triśatottaraṃ te saṃ vatsarāṇāmanubhūya divyān /
analyzed: catuḥ sahasram tri śata uttaram te sam vatsarāṇām anubhūya divyān

original: bhogān naratve'pi sadeśvaro'hamasajjagacceti dhiyā'pnuvaṃ stamaḥ / 32.117 /
analyzed: bhogān nara tve pi sadā īśvaraḥ aham asat jagat ca iti dhiyā āpnuvam stamaḥ

original: duḥkhe'pi teṣāmiha tāratamyaṃ kaleḥ paraṃ duḥkhamihākhilācca /
analyzed: duḥkhe api teṣām iha tāratamyam kaleḥ param duḥkham iha akhilāt ca

original: yathā viri ñcasya sukhaṃ paraṃ syānmuktau haridveṣakṛto viśeṣaḥ / 32.118 /
analyzed: yathā sukham param syāt muktau hari dveṣa kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: kecit piśācāsurarākṣasatvamavāpya viṣṇorapi tatparāṇām /
analyzed: kecid piśāca asura rākṣasa tvam avāpya viṣṇoḥ api tad parāṇām

original: dveṣāt tamo'ndhaṃ tvarayā samāpnuyurdevāḥ svakāle nijayogyamuktim / 32.119 /
analyzed: dveṣāt tamaḥ ndham tvarayā samāpnuyuḥ devāḥ sva kāle nija yogya muktim

original: catuḥ sahasre triśatottare gate saṃ vatsarāṇāṃ tu kalau pṛthivyām /
analyzed: catuḥ sahasre tri śata uttare gate sam vatsarāṇām tu kalau pṛthivyām

original: jātaḥ punarvipratanuḥ sa bhīmo daityairnigūḍhaṃ haritattvamāha / 32.120 /
analyzed: jātaḥ punar vipra tanuḥ sa bhīmaḥ daityaiḥ nigūḍham hari tattvam āha

original: cdlxiv.tadaiva kṛṣṇā'pi bhuvi prajātā prītyai harerandhatamasyapātayat /
analyzed: tadā eva kṛṣṇā api bhuvi prajātā prītyai hareḥ andha tamasi apātayat

original: mahāsurān viṣṇuparārjunādyā kṛte prajātā haritoṣaṇāya /
analyzed: mahā asurān viṣṇu para arjuna ādyā kṛte prajātāḥ hari toṣaṇāya

original: punaśca te sthānamavāpya sarve svīyaṃ parānte tu vimuktimāpnuyuḥ / 32.121 /
analyzed: punar ca te sthānam avāpya sarve svīyam parānte tu vimuktim āpnuyuḥ

original: vḸayutvamāptaḥ sa hanūmadaṃ śo brāhmaṃ padaṃ prāpya vṛkodaraśca /
analyzed: vḥayu tvam āptaḥ sa brāhmam padam prāpya vṛkodaraḥ ca

original: vḸagīśvaratvaṃ gatayaiva kṛṣṇayā sahaiva muktiṃ gamitā'khilottamām / 32.122 /
analyzed: vḹagīśvara tvam gatayā eva kṛṣṇayā saha eva muktim gamitā akhila uttamām

original: bhuvi dyuloke ca viri ñcatāyāṃ muktau ca tābhyāmadhikaṃ samastāt /
analyzed: bhuvi dyu loke ca muktau ca tābhyām adhikam samastāt

original: santoṣyate pūrṇaguṇo rameśaḥ sadaiva nityorjitatadratibhyām / 32.123 /
analyzed: santoṣyate pūrṇa guṇaḥ rameśaḥ sadā eva nitya ūrjita tad ratibhyām

original: “bhūṣan na yo'dhi babhrūṣu namnate” “bal . itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśatam” /
analyzed: bhūṣan na yodhi babhrūṣu nannate bal itthā tat vapuṣe dhāyi darśatam

original: “tāṃ su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā” 84 ityādisūktāni ca tatpramāṇam / 32.124 /
analyzed: tām su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā ityādi sūktāni ca tad pramāṇam

original: anyāni vākyāni ca vaidikāni sapañcarātroktipurāṇakāni /
analyzed: anyāni vākyāni ca vaidikāni sa pañcarātra ukti purāṇakāni

original: pṛṣṭaṇsca bhīṣmo'tra yudhiṣṭhireṇaitanmokṣadharmeṣvapi kiñcidāha / 32.125 /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ utra yudhiṣṭhireṇa etat mokṣa dharmeṣu api kiñcid āha

original: evaṃ prayāteṣu sukeśaveṣu svāneva lokān yadupāṇḍaveṣu /
analyzed: evam prayāteṣu su keśaveṣu svān eva lokān yadu pāṇḍaveṣu

original: parīkṣidādyāstu tadanvayotthā vyāsānuśiṣṭāḥ pṛthivīmarakṣan / 32.126 /
analyzed: parīkṣit ādyāḥ tu tad anvaya utthāḥ vyāsa anuśiṣṭāḥ pṛthivīm arakṣan

original: tai kṣemakāntairiha bhāratādiśāstrāṇi śṛṇvadbhiraśeṣavidbhiḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ kṣemakāntaiḥ iha bhārata ādi śāstrāṇi śṛṇvadbhiḥ aśeṣa vidbhiḥ

original: vyāsaprabhāvācca kalau ca dharmo j ñḸanaṃ ca sutrātamagānna nāṇsam / 32.127 /
analyzed: vyāsa prabhāvāt ca kalau ca dharmaḥ ca sutrātam agāt na

original: saṃ vatsarāṇāṃ tu sahasrake gate prāpteṣu cadyāmakhileṣu satsu /
analyzed: sam vatsarāṇām tu sahasrake gate prāpteṣu cadyām akhileṣu satsu

original: dagdhā purā ye tripuraṃ ghnataiva rudreṇa jātāḥ pṛthivītal . e te/ 32.128 /
analyzed: dagdhā purā ye tripuram ghnata eva rudreṇa jātāḥ pṛthivī tal

original: adarśanaṃ sarvamunīndravṛndaiḥ sahaiva sajj ñḸanamahānidāne /
analyzed: adarśanam sarva muni indra vṛndaiḥ saha eva

original: vyāse prayāte'pi sutattvavidyā tatsampradāyādapi tairavāptā / 32.129 /
analyzed: vyāse prayātā ipi sutattva vidyā tad sampradāyāt api taiḥ avāptā

original: utsāditatvāttu durāgamānāṃ tatsampradāyasya ca nāṇsitatvāt /
analyzed: utsādita tvāt tu durāgamānām tad sampradāyasya ca

original: prasāritatvācca sadāgamānāṃ pḸapā api j ñḸanamavāpuretat / 32.130 /
analyzed: prasārita tvāt ca sat āgamānām pḸapāḥ api j ñḍanam avāpuḥ etat

original: śunā puroḍāṇsamivāvalīḍhaṃ vedaśrutiṃ vḸa'ntyajanairavāptām /
analyzed: śunā puroḍāṇsam iva avalīḍham veda śrutim vḥantya janaiḥ avāptām
ṛgveda

original: cdlxv.anantaduḥkhāptisuyogyadaityairvidyāmavāptāṃ tu na sehire surāḥ / 32.131 /
analyzed: ananta duḥkha āpti suyogya daityaiḥ vidyām avāp tu na sehire sura

original: nḸavāggatiḥ kvāpi suvedināṃ bhavet prāpyaṃ sukhaṃ nityamavaśyamebhiḥ /
analyzed: kvāpi su vedinām bhavet prāpyam sukham nityam avaśyam ebhiḥ

original: prāpyaṃ tamo'ndhaṃ tvasurairna muktiḥ kadācidāpyā tadacintayan surāḥ / 32.132 /
analyzed: prāpyam tamaḥ undham tu asuraiḥ na muktiḥ kadācid āpyā tat acintayan surāḥ

original: jñḸanapradānāya satāṃ tadanyajñḸanapraṇāṇsāya ca viṣṇunaite /
analyzed: jñḍana pradānāya satām tad anya jñḍana praṇāṇsāya ca viṣṇunā ete

original: klṛptāstataste saviri ñcaśarvā vijñḸapayāmāsurupetya viṣṇum / 32.133 /
analyzed: klṛptāḥ tatas te saviri ñca śarvāḥ vijñḥapayāmāsuḥ upetya viṣṇum

original: kṣīrodadheruttaratīraviṣṭhitairabhiṣṭutaḥ suṣṭutibhiḥ puruṣṭutaḥ /
analyzed: kṣīrodadheḥ uttara tīra viṣṭhitaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ suṣṭutibhiḥ puruṣṭutaḥ

original: pradāya teṣāmabhayaṃ ramāpatiḥ kṣaṇādabhūccārutamākṛtiḥ śiśuḥ / 32.134 /
analyzed: pradāya teṣām abhayam ramāpatiḥ kṣaṇāt abhūt cārutama ākṛtiḥ śiśuḥ

original: yastraipurāṇāṃ prathamo'tra jātaḥ śuddhodanetyeva jineti coktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ traipurāṇām prathamaḥ utra jātaḥ śuddhodana iti eva jina iti ca uktaḥ

original: kṣetre gayākhye'sya śiśuṃ prajātaṃ samprāsya dūre'tra babhūva viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: kṣetre gayā ākhye isya śiśum prajātam samprāsya dūretra babhūva viṣṇuḥ

original: ajānamānāḥ svaśiśuṃ gataṃ taṃ śiśuṃ hariṃ vīkṣya nijaṃ sma menire / 32.135 /
analyzed: a jānamānāḥ sva śiśum gatam tam śiśum harim vīkṣya nijam sma menire

original: teṣāṃ tadā vaidikakarma vīkṣya samprāhasat tadvapuṣaiva keśavaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tadā vaidika karma vīkṣya samprāhasat tad vapuṣā eva keśavaḥ

original: taṃ jātamātraṃ prahasantamīkṣya suvismitaiḥ pṛṣṭa uvāca viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: tam jāta mātram prahasantam īkṣya su vismitaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ uvāca viṣṇuḥ

original: buddho'hamityeva sunityabodhājjagāda caiṣāmatha buddhadarśanam / 32.136 /
analyzed: buddhaḥ ham iti eva su nitya bodhāt jagāda ca eṣām atha buddha darśanam

original: tathā'pyaviśvāsamavekṣya teṣāṃ sasmāra devānakhilān janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api aviśvāsam avekṣya teṣām sasmāra devān akhilān janārdanaḥ

original: vijñḸaya te tasya manogataṃ nijān pracikṣipurhetigaṇānamuṣmin / 32.137 /
analyzed: te tasya manogatam nijān pracikṣipuḥ heti gaṇān amuṣmin  /

original: sa jātamātraḥ śivapūrvakāṇāṃ śūlādihetīrakhilā nigīrya /
analyzed: sa jāta mātraḥ śiva pūrvakāṇām śūla ādi hetīḥ akhilāḥ nigīrya

original: daityātimohāya nijaṃ ca cakraṃ svamuktamāṇsveva vaśī samagrahīt / 32.138 /
analyzed: daitya ati mohāya nijam ca cakram vaśī samagrahīt  /

original: tadāsanatvena vidhāya tasmin samāsthitaṃ devagaṇāḥ praṇamya /
analyzed: tad āsana tvena vidhāya tasmin samāsthitam deva gaṇāḥ praṇamya

original: jagmuḥ svadhāmāni vacāṃ si cāsya svīcakrurāṇsveva jinādidaityāḥ / 32.139 /
analyzed: jagmuḥ sva dhāmāni vacām si ca asya svīcakruḥ āṇsu eva jina ādi daityāḥ

original: te j ñḸanadharmāvapahāya pāpā vimohitā devavareṇa sarve /
analyzed: te j ñḍana dharmau apahāya pāpāḥ vimohitāḥ deva vareṇa sarve

original: jagmustamo'ndhaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ samastaṃ jñḸanaṃ nasacceti dṛḍhaṃ smarantaḥ / 32.140 /
analyzed: jagmuḥ tamaḥ ndham kṣaṇikam samastam dṛḍham smarantaḥ

original: nḸarāyaṇo'pyāpya surendravṛndaṃ vṛttaṃ ca teṣāmakhilaṃ nigadya /
analyzed: nḹarāyaṇaḥ upyāpya sura indra vṛndam vṛttam ca teṣām akhilam nigadya

original: pṛṣṭaṇsca tairāha nijaṃ hṛdisthaṃ bauddhāgamārthaṃ sṛtibandhamocanam / 32.141 /
analyzed: taiḥ āha nijam hṛdistham bauddha āgama artham sṛtibandha mocanam

original: kṣaṇādayaṃ kṣaṇikāstadviśeṣā yataḥ prayāntyeva nisargato'khilāḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt ayam kṣaṇikāḥ tad viśeṣāḥ yatas prayānti eva nisargataḥ khilāḥ

original: tadvān viśeṣaṇsca yato na bhinno sadā svanirvāhakaśaktiyuktau /

original: ataḥ kṣaṇasthāyi samastametat sthirātmakaṃ ceti hi nāsti bhedaḥ / 32.143 /
